 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
 jayati parāśarasūnuḥ satyavatīhṛdayanandano vyāsaḥ
 yasyāsyakamalagalitaṃ vāṅmayam amṛtaṃ jagat pibati
 jitaṃ bhagavatā tena hariṇā lokadhāriṇā
 ajena viśvarūpeṇa nirguṇena mahātmanā
 śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam
 prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye
 janamejaya uvāca
a tam apratimasattvaujobalavīryaparākramam
c hataṃ devavrataṃ śrutvā pāñcālyena śikhaṇḍinā
a dhṛtarāṣṭras tadā rājā śokavyākulacetanaḥ
c kim aceṣṭata viprarṣe hate pitari vīryavān
a tasya putro hi bhagavan bhīṣmadroṇamukhai rathaiḥ
c parājitya maheṣvāsān pāṇḍavān rājyam icchati
a tasmin hate tu bhagavan ketau sarvadhanuṣmatām
c yad aceṣṭata kauravyas tan me brūhi dvijottama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a nihataṃ pitaraṃ śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭro janādhipaḥ
c lebhe na śāntiṃ kauravyaś cintāśokaparāyaṇaḥ
a tasya cintayato duḥkham aniśaṃ pārthivasya tat
c ājagāma viśuddhātmā punar gāvalgaṇis tadā
d niḥśvāsaparamo rājā dhyāyann āste hy adhomukhaḥ
d astaṃ prāpte dinakare niśi gāvalgaṇis tadā
d khidyamānena manasā jagāma gajasāhvayam
d vyāsaprasādād vijñāya sarvaṃ vṛttāntam uttamam
d sainikānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ senayor ubhayos tadā
a śibirāt saṃjayaṃ prāptaṃ niśi nāgāhvayaṃ puram
c āmbikeyo mahārāja dhṛtarāṣṭro 'nvapṛcchata
a śrutvā bhīṣmasya nidhanam aprahṛṣṭamanā bhṛśam
c putrāṇāṃ jayam ākāṅkṣan vilalāpāturo yathā
d dhārtarāṣṭrān mṛtān sarvān manye saṃjaya saṃyuge
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a saṃsādhya tu mahātmānaṃ bhīṣmaṃ bhīmaparākramam
c kim akārṣuḥ paraṃ tāta kuravaḥ kālacoditāḥ
d hataṃ śrutvā mama sutaḥ kim akārṣīc ca saṃjaya
a tasmin vinihate śūre durādharṣe mahaujasi
c kiṃ nu svit kuravo 'kārṣur nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
d saṃprāptāḥ kuravo yuddhe ke 'trātiṣṭhan paraṃtapāḥ
a tad udīrṇaṃ mahat sainyaṃ trailokyasyāpi saṃjaya
b bhīṣmataḥ kauraveyāṇām abhiyāsyati kaḥ pumān
c bhayam utpādayet tīvraṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
d ko hi dauryodhane sainye pumān āsīn mahārathaḥ
d yaṃ prāpya sumahāyuddhe tan naḥ śaṃsa mahābhaye
a devavrate tu nihate kurūṇām ṛṣabhe tadā
c yad akārṣur nṛpatayas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śṛṇu rājann ekamanā vacanaṃ bruvato mama
c yat te putrās tadākārṣur hate devavrate mṛdhe
a nihate tu tadā bhīṣme rājan satyaparākrame
c tāvakāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca prādhyāyanta pṛthak pṛthak
a vismitāś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca kṣatradharmaṃ niśāmya te
b jugupsamānāḥ paramaṃ kṣātraṃ karma viśāṃ pate
c svadharmaṃ nindamānāś ca praṇipatya mahātmane
a śayanaṃ kalpayām āsur bhīṣmāyāmitatejase
c sopadhānaṃ naravyāghra śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a vidhāya rakṣāṃ bhīṣmāya samābhāṣya parasparam
c anumānya ca gāṅgeyaṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
a krodhasaṃraktanayanāḥ samavekṣya parasparam
c punar yuddhāya nirjagmuḥ kṣatriyāḥ kālacoditāḥ
a tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
c tāvakānām anīkāni pareṣāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ
a vyāvṛtte 'hani rājendra patite jāhnavīsute
c amarṣavaśam āpannāḥ kālopahatacetasaḥ
a anādṛtya vacaḥ pathyaṃ gāṅgeyasya mahātmanaḥ
c niryayur bharataśreṣṭhāḥ śastrāṇy ādāya sarvaśaḥ
a mohāt tava saputrasya vadhāc chāṃtanavasya ca
c kauravyā mṛtyusād bhūtāḥ sahitāḥ sarvarājabhiḥ
a ajāvaya ivāgopā vane śvāpadasaṃkule
b karṇa karṇeti cakranduḥ śeṣā bhārata pārthivāḥ
c bhṛśam udvignamanaso hīnā devavratena te
a patite bharataśreṣṭhe babhūva kuruvāhinī
c dyaur ivāpetanakṣatrā hīnaṃ kham iva vāyunā
a vipannasasyeva mahī vāk caivāsaṃskṛtā yathā
c āsurīva yathā senā nigṛhīte purā balau
a vidhaveva varārohā śuṣkatoyeva nimnagā
b lakṣmīr iva surais tyaktā śrutihīnā yathā dvijāḥ
c vṛkair iva vane ruddhā pṛṣatī hatayūthapā
a svādharṣā hatasiṃheva mahatī girikandarā
c bhāratī bharataśreṣṭha patite jāhnavīsute
a viṣvagvātahatā rugṇā naur ivāsīn mahārṇave
c balibhiḥ pāṇḍavair vīrair labdhalakṣair bhṛśārditā
a sā tadāsīd bhṛśaṃ senā vyākulāśvarathadvipā
c viṣaṇṇabhūyiṣṭhanarā kṛpaṇā draṣṭum ābabhau
a tasyāṃ trastā nṛpatayaḥ sainikāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
c pātāla iva majjanto hīnā devavratena te
e karṇaṃ hi kuravo 'smārṣuḥ sa hi devavratopamaḥ
a sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ rocamānam ivātithim
c bandhum āpadgatasyeva tam evopāgaman manaḥ
a cukruśuḥ karṇa karṇeti tatra bhārata pārthivāḥ
c rādheyaṃ hitam asmākaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam
a sa hi nāyudhyata tadā daśāhāni mahāyaśāḥ
c sāmātyabandhuḥ karṇo vai tam āhvayata māciram
a bhīṣmeṇa hi mahābāhuḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ
c ratheṣu gaṇyamāneṣu balavikramaśāliṣu
e saṃkhyāto 'rdharathaḥ karṇo dviguṇaḥ san nararṣabhaḥ
a rathātirathasaṃkhyāyāṃ yo 'graṇīḥ śūrasaṃmataḥ
c pitṛvittāmbudeveśān api yo yoddhum utsahet
a sa tu tenaiva kopena rājan gāṅgeyam uktavān
c tvayi jīvati kauravya nāhaṃ yotsye kathaṃ cana
a tvayā tu pāṇḍaveyeṣu nihateṣu mahāmṛdhe
c duryodhanam anujñāpya vanaṃ yāsyāmi kaurava
a pāṇḍavair vā hate bhīṣme tvayi svargam upeyuṣi
c hantāsmy ekarathenaiva kṛtsnān yān manyase rathān
a evam uktvā mahārāja daśāhāni mahāyaśāḥ
c nāyudhyata tataḥ karṇaḥ putrasya tava saṃmate
a bhīṣmaḥ samaravikrāntaḥ pāṇḍaveyasya pārthiva
c jaghāna samare yodhān asaṃkhyeyaparākramaḥ
a tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre satyasaṃdhe mahaujasi
c tvatsutāḥ karṇam asmārṣus tartukāmā iva plavam
a tāvakās tava putrāś ca sahitāḥ sarvarājabhiḥ
c hā karṇa iti cākrandan kālo 'yam iti cābruvan
d evaṃ te sma hi rādheyaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam
d cukruśuḥ sahitā yodhās tatra tatra mahābalāḥ
a jāmadagnyābhyanujñātam astre durvārapauruṣam
c agaman no manaḥ karṇaṃ bandhum ātyayikeṣv iva
a sa hi śakto raṇe rājaṃs trātum asmān mahābhayāt
c tridaśān iva govindaḥ satataṃ sumahābhayāt
d devān iva yathā viṣṇus trāyate mahato bhayāt
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tathā karṇaṃ yudhi varaṃ kīrtayantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
b gāvalgaṇiṃ saṃjayaṃ tu śokavyākulalocanaḥ
c āśīviṣavad ucchvasya dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bravīd idam
a yat tad vaikartanaṃ karṇam agamad vo manas tadā
c apy apaśyata rādheyaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam
a api tan na mṛṣākārṣīd yudhi satyaparākramaḥ
c saṃbhrāntānāṃ tadārtānāṃ trastānāṃ trāṇam icchatām
a api tat pūrayāṃ cakre dhanurdharavaro yudhi
c yat tad vinihate bhīṣme kauravāṇām apāvṛtam
a tat khaṇḍaṃ pūrayām āsa pareṣām ādadhad bhayam
b sa hi vai puruṣavyāghro loke saṃjaya kathyate
b ārtānāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca krandatāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
b parityajya raṇe prāṇāṃs tattrāṇārthaṃ ca śarma ca
c kṛtavān mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśāṃ saphalām api
 saṃjaya uvāca
a hataṃ bhīṣmam ādhirathir viditvā
bhinnāṃ nāvam ivātyagādhe kurūṇām
c sodaryavad vyasanāt sūtaputraḥ
saṃtārayiṣyaṃs tava putrasya senām
a śrutvā tu karṇaḥ puruṣendram acyutaṃ
nipātitaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ mahāratham
c athopāyāt tūrṇam amitrakarśano
dhanurdharāṇāṃ pravaras tadā vṛṣaḥ
a hate tu bhīṣme rathasattame parair
nimajjatīṃ nāvam ivārṇave kurūn
c piteva putrāṃs tvarito 'bhyayāt tataḥ
saṃtārayiṣyaṃs tava putrasya senām
d saṃmṛjya divyaṃ dhanur ātatajyaṃ
d sa rāmadattaṃ ripusaṃghahantā
d bāṇāṃś ca kālānalatulyakalpān
d ullāḷayan vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
 karṇa uvāca
a yasmin dhṛtir buddhiparākramaujo
damaḥ satyaṃ vīraguṇāś ca sarve
c astrāṇi divyāny atha saṃnatir hrīḥ
priyā ca vāg anapāyīni bhīṣme
a brahmadviṣaghne satataṃ kṛtajñe
sanātanaṃ candramasīva lakṣma
c sa cet praśāntaḥ paravīrahantā
manye hatān eva hi sarvayodhān
a neha dhruvaṃ kiṃ cana jātu vidyate
asmiṃl loke karmaṇo 'nityayogāt
c sūryodaye ko hi vimuktasaṃśayo
bhāvaṃ kurvītādya mahāvrate hate
a vasuprabhāve vasuvīryasaṃbhave
gate vasūn eva vasuṃdharādhipe
c vasūni putrāṃś ca vasuṃdharāṃ tathā
kurūṃś ca śocadhvam imāṃ ca vāhinīm
 saṃjaya uvāca
a mahāprabhāve varade nipātite
lokaśreṣṭhe śāṃtanave mahaujasi
c parājiteṣu bharateṣu durmanāḥ
karṇo bhṛśaṃ nyaśvasad aśru vartayan
a idaṃ tu rādheyavaco niśamya te
sutāś ca rājaṃs tava sainikāś ca ha
c parasparaṃ cukruśur ārtijaṃ bhṛśaṃ
tadāśru netrair mumucur hi śabdavat
a pravartamāne tu punar mahāhave
vigāhyamānāsu camūṣu pārthivaiḥ
c athābravīd dharṣakaraṃ vacas tadā
ratharṣabhān sarvamahāratharṣabhaḥ
 karṇa uvāca
a jagaty anitye satataṃ pradhāvati
pracintayann asthiram adya lakṣaye
c bhavatsu tiṣṭhatsv iha pātito raṇe
giriprakāśaḥ kurupuṃgavaḥ katham
a nipātite śāṃtanave mahārathe
divākare bhūtalam āsthite yathā
c na pārthivāḥ soḍhum alaṃ dhanaṃjayaṃ
giripravoḍhāram ivānilaṃ drumāḥ
a hatapradhānaṃ tv idam ārtarūpaṃ
parair hatotsāham anātham adya vai
c mayā kurūṇāṃ paripālyam āhave
balaṃ yathā tena mahātmanā tathā
a samāhitaṃ cātmani bhāram īdṛśaṃ
jagat tathānityam idaṃ ca lakṣaye
c nipātitaṃ cāhavaśauṇḍam āhave
kathaṃ nu kuryām aham āhave bhayam
a ahaṃ tu tān kuruvṛṣabhān ajihmagaiḥ
praverayan yamasadanaṃ raṇe caran
c yaśaḥ paraṃ jagati vibhāvya vartitā
parair hato yudhi śayitātha vā punaḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiro dhṛtimatidharmatattvavān
vṛkodaro gajaśatatulyavikramaḥ
c tathārjunas tridaśavarātmajo yato
na tad balaṃ sujayam athāmarair api
a yamau raṇe yatra yamopamau bale
sasātyakir yatra ca devakīsutaḥ
c na tad balaṃ kāpuruṣo 'bhyupeyivān
nivartate mṛtyumukhād ivāsakṛt
a tapo 'bhyudīrṇaṃ tapasaiva gamyate
balaṃ balenāpi tathā manasvibhiḥ
c manaś ca me śatrunivāraṇe dhruvaṃ
svarakṣaṇe cācalavad vyavasthitam
d athābravīt sūtaputraḥ svasūtaṃ
d hantāsmy ahaṃ pāṇḍavasomakāṃś ca
a evaṃ caiṣāṃ budhyamānaḥ prabhāvaṃ
gatvaivāhaṃ tāñ jayāmy adya sūta
c mitradroho marṣaṇīyo na me 'yaṃ
bhagne sainye yaḥ sahāyaḥ sa mitram
a kartāsmy etat satpuruṣāryakarma
tyaktvā prāṇān anuyāsyāmi bhīṣmam
c sarvān saṃkhye śatrusaṃghān haniṣye
hatas tair vā vīralokaṃ gamiṣye
a saṃprākruṣṭe ruditastrīkumāre
parābhūte pauruṣe dhārtarāṣṭre
c mayā kṛtyam iti jānāmi sūta
tasmāc chatrūn dhārtarāṣṭrasya jeṣye
a kurūn rakṣan pāṇḍuputrāñ jighāṃsaṃs
tyaktvā prāṇān ghorarūpe raṇe 'smin
c sarvān saṃkhye śatrusaṃghān nihatya
dāsyāmy ahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāya rājyam
a nibadhyatāṃ me kavacaṃ vicitraṃ
haimaṃ śubhraṃ maṇiratnāvabhāsi
c śirastrāṇaṃ cārkasamānabhāsaṃ
dhanuḥ śarāṃś cāpi viṣāhikalpān
a upāsaṅgān ṣoḍaśa yojayantu
dhanūṃṣi divyāni tathāharantu
c asīṃś ca śaktīś ca gadāś ca gurvīḥ
śaṅkhaṃ ca jāmbūnadacitrabhāsam
a etāṃ raukmīṃ nāgakakṣyāṃ ca jaitrīṃ
jaitraṃ ca me dhvajam indīvarābham
c ślakṣṇair vastrair vipramṛjyānayasva
citrāṃ mālāṃ cātra baddhvā sajālām
a aśvān agryān pāṇḍurābhraprakāśān
puṣṭān snātān mantrapūtābhir adbhiḥ
c taptair bhāṇḍaiḥ kāñcanair abhyupetāñ
śīghrāñ śīghraṃ sūtaputrānayasva
a rathaṃ cāgryaṃ hemajālāvanaddhaṃ
ratnaiś citraṃ candrasūryaprakāśaiḥ
c dravyair yuktaṃ saṃprahāropapannair
vāhair yuktaṃ tūrṇam āvartayasva
a citrāṇi cāpāni ca vegavanti
jyāś cottamāḥ saṃhananopapannāḥ
c tūṇāṃś ca pūrṇān mahataḥ śarāṇām
āsajya gātrāvaraṇāni caiva
a prāyātrikaṃ cānayatāśu sarvaṃ
kanyāḥ pūrṇaṃ vīrakāṃsyaṃ ca haimam
c ānīya mālām avabadhya cāṅge
pravādayantv āśu jayāya bherīḥ
a prayāhi sūtāśu yataḥ kirīṭī
vṛkodaro dharmasuto yamau ca
c tān vā haniṣyāmi sametya saṃkhye
bhīṣmāya vaiṣyāmi hato dviṣadbhiḥ
a yasmin rājā satyadhṛtir yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
samāsthito bhīmasenārjunau ca
c vāsudevaḥ sātyakiḥ sṛñjayāś ca
manye balaṃ tad ajayyaṃ mahīpaiḥ
a taṃ cen mṛtyuḥ sarvaharo 'bhirakṣet
sadāpramattaḥ samare kirīṭinam
c tathāpi hantāsmi sametya saṃkhye
yāsyāmi vā bhīṣmapathā yamāya
a na tv evāhaṃ na gamiṣyāmi teṣāṃ
madhye śūrāṇāṃ tat tathāhaṃ bravīmi
c mitradruho durbalabhaktayo ye
pāpātmāno na mamaite sahāyāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a sa siddhimantaṃ ratham uttamaṃ dṛḍhaṃ
sakūbaraṃ hemapariṣkṛtaṃ śubham
c patākinaṃ vātajavair hayottamair
yuktaṃ samāsthāya yayau jayāya
a saṃpūjyamānaḥ kurubhir mahātmā
ratharṣabhaḥ pāṇḍuravājiyātā
c yayau tadāyodhanam ugradhanvā
yatrāvasānaṃ bharatarṣabhasya
a varūthinā mahatā sadhvajena
suvarṇamuktāmaṇivajraśālinā
c sadaśvayuktena rathena karṇo
meghasvanenārka ivāmitaujāḥ
a hutāśanābhaḥ sa hutāśanaprabhe
śubhaḥ śubhe vai svarathe dhanurdharaḥ
c sthito rarājādhirathir mahārathaḥ
svayaṃ vimāne surarāḍ iva sthitaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śaratalpe mahātmānaṃ śayānam amitaujasam
c mahāvātasamūhena samudram iva śoṣitam
d utpādya pṛthivīṃ gurvīṃ pātitāṃ savyasācinā
d udyamyāpy atha vā meruṃ līlayākṣiptam ambhasi
d utsādya cākhilām urvīṃ sarvakṣatrāntakaṃ gurum
a divyair astrair maheṣvāsaṃ pātitaṃ savyasācinā
c jayāśāṃ tava putrāṇāṃ saṃbhagnāṃ śarma varma ca
a apārāṇām iva dvīpam agādhe gādham icchatām
c srotasā yāmuneneva śaraugheṇa pariplutam
a mahāntam iva mainākam asahyaṃ bhuvi pātitam
c nabhaścyutam ivādityaṃ patitaṃ dharaṇītale
a śatakrator ivācintyaṃ purā vṛtreṇa nirjayam
c mohanaṃ sarvasainyasya yudhi bhīṣmasya pātanam
a kakudaṃ sarvasainyānāṃ lakṣma sarvadhanuṣmatām
c dhanaṃjayaśaravyāptaṃ pitaraṃ te mahāvratam
a taṃ vīraśayane vīraṃ śayānaṃ puruṣarṣabham
c bhīṣmam ādhirathir dṛṣṭvā bharatānām amadhyamam
a avatīrya rathād ārto bāṣpavyākulitākṣaram
a   śokamohapariplutaḥ
a padbhyām eva jagāmārto
c abhivādyāñjaliṃ baddhvā vandamāno 'bhyabhāṣata
a karṇo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te adya mā vada bhārata
c puṇyayā kṣemayā vācā cakṣuṣā cāvalokaya
a na nūnaṃ sukṛtasyeha phalaṃ kaś cit samaśnute
c yatra dharmaparo vṛddhaḥ śete bhuvi bhavān iha
a kośasaṃjanane mantre vyūhapraharaṇeṣu ca
c nātham anyaṃ na paśyāmi kurūṇāṃ kurusattama
a buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto yaḥ kurūṃs tārayed bhayāt
c yodhāṃs tvam aplave hitvā pitṛlokaṃ gamiṣyasi
a adya prabhṛti saṃkruddhā vyāghrā iva mṛgakṣayam
c pāṇḍavā bharataśreṣṭha kariṣyanti kurukṣayam
a adya gāṇḍīvaghoṣasya vīryajñāḥ savyasācinaḥ
c kuravaḥ saṃtrasiṣyanti vajrapāṇer ivāsurāḥ
a adya gāṇḍīvamuktānām aśanīnām iva svanaḥ
c trāsayiṣyati saṃgrāme kurūn anyāṃś ca pārthivān
a samiddho 'gnir yathā vīra mahājvālo drumān dahet
c dhārtarāṣṭrān pradhakṣyanti tathā bāṇāḥ kirīṭinaḥ
a yena yena prasarato vāyvagnī sahitau vane
c tena tena pradahato bhagavantau yad icchataḥ
a yādṛśo 'gniḥ samiddho hi tādṛk pārtho na saṃśayaḥ
b tādṛg eva hi kaunteyo davāgnir iva parvate
c yathā vāyur naravyāghra tathā kṛṣṇo na saṃśayaḥ
d nirdahantam anīkāni pravakṣyati janārdanaḥ
a nadataḥ pāñcajanyasya rasato gāṇḍivasya ca
c śrutvā sarvāṇi sainyāni trāsaṃ yāsyanti bhārata
a kapidhvajasya cotpāte rathasyāmitrakarśinaḥ
c śabdaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakṣyanti tvām ṛte vīra pārthivāḥ
a ko hy arjunaṃ raṇe yoddhuṃ tvad anyaḥ pārthivo 'rhati
c yasya divyāni karmāṇi pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a amānuṣaś ca saṃgrāmas tryambakena ca dhīmataḥ
c tasmāc caiva varaḥ prāpto duṣprāpaś cākṛtātmabhiḥ
d ko 'nyaḥ śakto raṇe jetuṃ pūrvaṃ yo na jitaḥ suraiḥ
d jito yena raṇe rāmo bhavatā vīryaśālinā
d kṣatriyāntakaro ghoro devadānavapūjitaḥ
d pāṇḍuputro balaślāghī mādhavena ca rakṣitaḥ
d so 'py adya nihataḥ śete śaraiḥ protaḥ śikhaṇḍinā
a tam adyāhaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhaśauṇḍam
amṛṣyamāṇo bhavatānuśiṣṭaḥ
c āśīviṣaṃ dṛṣṭiharaṃ sughoram
iyāṃ puraskṛtya vadhaṃ jayaṃ vā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tasya lālapyataḥ śrutvā vṛddhaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
c deśakālocitaṃ vākyam abravīt prītamānasaḥ
d rahitaṃ dhiṣṇyam ālokya samutsārya ca rakṣiṇaḥ
d piteva putraṃ gāṅgeyaḥ pariṣvajyaikabāhunā
d ehy ehi bho spardhase tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ hi sūtaja
d yadi māṃ nādhigacchethā na te śreyo bhaved dhruvam
d kaunteyas tvaṃ na rādheyo na tavādhirathaḥ pitā
d sūryatas tvaṃ mahābāho vidito nāradān mama
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva keśavāc ca na saṃśayaḥ
d mānahā bhava śatrūṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ śokahā bhava
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva tejasā ca na saṃśayaḥ
d na ca dveṣo 'sti me karṇa tvayi satyaṃ bravīmi te
d tejovadhanimittaṃ tu paruṣaṃ cāham abruvam
d akasmāt pāṇḍavān hi tvaṃ dviṣasīti matir mama
d tenāsi bahuśo rūkṣaṃ śrāvitaḥ kurusaṃsadi
d hantāsi samare vīrāñ śatrupakṣakṣayaṃkara
d brahmaṇyatā ca śauryaṃ ca dāne vā paramo nidhiḥ
d kulabhedabhayāc cāhaṃ sadā paruṣam abruvam
d iṣvastre vīra saṃdhāne lāghave 'strabale 'pi ca
d sadṛśaḥ phalgunasyāpi kṛṣṇasya ca samo bale
a samudra iva sindhūnāṃ jyotiṣām iva bhāskaraḥ
c satyasya ca yathā santo bījānām iva corvarā
a parjanya iva bhūtānāṃ pratiṣṭhā suhṛdāṃ bhava
c bāndhavās tvānujīvantu sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
d mānahā bhava śatrūṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ nandivardhanaḥ
d kauravāṇāṃ bhava gatir yathā viṣṇur divaukasām
a svabāhubalavīryeṇa dhārtarāṣṭrapriyaiṣiṇā
c karṇa rājapuraṃ gatvā kāmbojā nihatās tvayā
a girivrajagatāś cāpi nagnajitpramukhā nṛpāḥ
c ambaṣṭhāś ca videhāś ca gāndhārāś ca jitās tvayā
d tathātibalavān rājā jarāsaṃdho 'dbhutopamaḥ
d samare samaraślāghī na tvayābhyadhiko raṇe
a himavaddurganilayāḥ kirātā raṇakarkaśāḥ
c duryodhanasya vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ karṇa tvayā purā
d utkalā mekalāḥ pauṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāndhrāś ca saṃyuge
d niṣādāś ca trigartāś ca bāhlīkāś ca jitās tvayā
a tatra tatra ca saṃgrāme duryodhanahitaiṣiṇā
c bahavaś ca jitā vīrās tvayā karṇa mahaujasā
d brahmaṇyaḥ satyavādī ca tejasārko na saṃśayaḥ
d devagarbho 'jitaḥ saṃkhye manuṣyebhyo 'dhiko yudhi
d vyapanīto 'dya me manyur yas tvāṃ prati purā kṛtaḥ
d daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa na śakyam ativartitum
d saudaryāḥ pāṇḍavā vīra bhrātaras te 'risūdana
d gacchaikatvaṃ mahābāho mama ced icchasi priyam
d mayā bhavatu nirvṛttaṃ vairam ādityanandana
d pṛthivyāṃ sarvarājāno bhavantv adya nirāmayāḥ
d karṇa uvāca
d jānāmy etan mahābāho kaunteyo 'smi na sūtajaḥ
d parityaktas tv ahaṃ kuntyā sūtena ca vivardhitaḥ
d bhuktvā duryodhanaiśvaryaṃ na mithyā kartum utsahe
d vasu caiva śarīraṃ ca putradārāṃs tathā yaśaḥ
d sarvaṃ duryodhanasyārthe tyaktaṃ me bhūridakṣiṇa
d neṣyati vyādhimaraṇaṃ kṣatriyasyeti kaurava
d kopitāḥ pāṇḍavā nityaṃ mayāśritya suyodhanam
d aparāvartino ye 'rthās te na śakyā nivartitum
d daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa ko nivartitum utsahet
d pṛthivīkṣayaṃ śaṃsanti nimittānīha bhārata
d bhavadbhir hi purā dṛṣṭvā kathitāni ca saṃsadi
d ajeyāḥ puruṣair anyair iti tāṃś cotsahāmahe
d anujānīhi māṃ tāta yuddhāya prītimānasam
d anujñātas tvayā vīra yudhyeyam iti me matiḥ
d duruktāni ca vākyāni saṃrambhāc cāpalād api
d yan mayā te kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tyaja tad bharatarṣabha
a yathā duryodhanas tāta sajñātikulabāndhavaḥ
b kṣemaṃ vindati sarvatra śatruhāniṃ ca vindati
c tathā tvam api sarveṣāṃ kauravāṇāṃ gatir bhava
a śivenābhivadāmi tvāṃ gaccha yudhyasva śatrubhiḥ
c anuśādhi kurūn saṃkhye dhatsva duryodhane jayam
d tathā kuru manuṣyendra yathā duryodhane jayam
a bhavān pautrasamo 'smākaṃ yathā duryodhanas tathā
c tavāpi dharmataḥ sarve yathā tasya vayaṃ tathā
a yaunāt saṃbandhakāl loke viśiṣṭaṃ saṃgataṃ satām
c sadbhiḥ saha naraśreṣṭha pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a sa satyasaṃgaro bhūtvā mamedam iti niścitam
c kurūṇāṃ pālaya balaṃ yathā duryodhanas tathā
d tathā hi kauravān yuddhe dhruvaṃ jeṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
d kṣatradharmārjitāṃl lokān avāpsyanti na saṃśayaḥ
d yudhyasva nirahaṃkāro balavīryavyapāśrayāt
d dharmo hi yuddhād adhikaḥ kṣatriyasya na vidyate
d saṃjaya uvāca
d evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ
d yathā ca kuravo yuddhe yodhayanti sma pāṇḍavān
a iti śrutvā vacaḥ so 'tha caraṇāv abhivādya ca
c yayau vaikartanaḥ karṇas tūrṇam āyodhanaṃ prati
d atha tatra maheṣvāso vyādiśad rathino varān
d vāraṇāṃs tatprakāreṇa cakāra tadanantaram
d sādinaś ca padātāṃś ca yathāśāstraṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
d sthāpayām āsa tathā putrāṇāṃ te jayapriyaḥ
d tataḥ pakṣau prapakṣau ca vidhāya bharatarṣabha
d pakṣakoṭyāṃ punar dvābhyāṃ pakṣau dvābhyāṃ suhṛdvṛtaḥ
d evam etan mayā vyūhaṃ karṇena vihitaṃ purā
d prekṣaṇīyam amanyanta rājānaḥ kurubhiḥ saha
d nṛtyantam iva taṃ vyūhaṃ didhakṣantam ivāhitān
d kṛtaṃ bṛhaspatimataṃ matvā karṇena dhīmatā
d balaṃ vyūhaśarīrasya sārānīkaṃ parasparam
a so 'bhivīkṣya naraughāṇāṃ sthānam apratimaṃ mahat
c vyūḍhapraharaṇoraskaṃ sainyaṃ tat samabṛṃhayat
d hṛṣitāḥ kuravaḥ sarve duryodhanapurogamāḥ
d tam āgataṃ mahābāhuṃ sarvānīkapuraḥsaram
a karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā maheṣvāsaṃ yuddhāya samavasthitam
c kṣveḍitāsphoṭitaravaiḥ siṃhanādaravair api
e dhanuḥśabdaiś ca vividhaiḥ kuravaḥ samapūjayan
 saṃjaya uvāca
a rathasthaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇam avasthitam
c hṛṣṭo duryodhano rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a sanātham idam atyarthaṃ bhavatā pālitaṃ balam
c manye kiṃ tu samarthaṃ yad dhitaṃ tat saṃpradhāryatām
 karṇa uvāca
a brūhi tat puruṣavyāghra tvaṃ hi prājñatamo nṛpa
c yathā cārthapatiḥ kṛtyaṃ paśyate na tathetaraḥ
a te sma sarve tava vacaḥ śrotukāmā nareśvara
c nānyāyyaṃ hi bhavān vākyaṃ brūyād iti matir mama
 duryodhana uvāca
a bhīṣmaḥ senāpraṇetāsīd vayasā vikrameṇa ca
c śrutena ca susaṃpannaḥ sarvair yodhaguṇais tathā
a tenātiyaśasā karṇa ghnatā śatrugaṇān mama
c suyuddhena daśāhāni pālitāḥ smo mahātmanā
a tasminn asukaraṃ karma kṛtavaty āsthite divam
c kaṃ nu senāpraṇetāraṃ manyase tadanantaram
a na ṛte nāyakaṃ senā muhūrtam api tiṣṭhati
b āhaveṣu viśeṣeṇa bhraṣṭanetreṣv ivāñjanam
c āhaveṣv āhavaśreṣṭha netṛhīneva naur jale
a yathā hy akarṇadhārā nau rathaś cāsārathir yathā
c draved yatheṣṭaṃ tadvat syād ṛte senāpatiṃ balam
d adaiśiko yathā sārthaḥ sarvaṃ pāpaṃ samarchati
d anāyakā tathā senā sarvān doṣān samarchati
a sa bhavān vīkṣya sarveṣu māmakeṣu mahātmasu
c paśya senāpatiṃ yuktam anu śāṃtanavād iha
a yaṃ hi senāpraṇetāraṃ bhavān vakṣyati saṃyuge
c taṃ vayaṃ sahitāḥ sarve prakariṣyāma māriṣa
 karṇa uvāca
a sarva eva mahātmāna ime puruṣasattamāḥ
c senāpatitvam arhanti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
a kulasaṃhananajñānair balavikramabuddhibhiḥ
c yuktāḥ kṛtajñā hrīmanta āhaveṣv anivartinaḥ
a yugapan na tu te śakyāḥ kartuṃ sarve puraḥsarāḥ
c eka evātra kartavyo yasmin vaiśeṣikā guṇāḥ
a anyonyaspardhināṃ teṣāṃ yady ekaṃ satkariṣyasi
c śeṣā vimanaso vyaktaṃ na yotsyante hi bhārata
a ayaṃ tu sarvayodhānām ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
c yuktaḥ senāpatiḥ kartuṃ droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a ko hi tiṣṭhati durdharṣe droṇe brahmaviduttame
c senāpatiḥ syād anyo 'smāc chukrāṅgirasadarśanāt
a na ca sa hy asti te yodhaḥ sarvarājasu bhārata
c yo droṇaṃ samare yāntaṃ nānuyāsyati saṃyuge
a eṣa senāpraṇetṝṇām eṣa śastrabhṛtām api
c eṣa buddhimatāṃ caiva śreṣṭho rājan guruś ca te
a evaṃ duryodhanācāryam āśu senāpatiṃ kuru
c jigīṣanto 'surān saṃkhye kārttikeyam ivāmarāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a karṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
c senāmadhyagataṃ droṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a varṇaśraiṣṭhyāt kulotpattyā śrutena vayasā dhiyā
c vīryād dākṣyād adhṛṣyatvād arthajñānān nayāj jayāt
a tapasā ca kṛtajñatvād vṛddhaḥ sarvaguṇair api
c yukto bhavatsamo goptā rājñām anyo na vidyate
a sa bhavān pātu naḥ sarvān vibudhān iva vāsavaḥ
c bhavannetrāḥ parāñ jetum icchāmo dvijasattama
a rudrāṇām iva kāpālī vasūnām iva pāvakaḥ
c kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ marutām iva vāsavaḥ
a vasiṣṭha iva viprāṇāṃ tejasām iva bhāskaraḥ
c pitṝṇām iva dharmo 'tha ādityānām ivāmburāṭ
a nakṣatrāṇām iva śaśī ditijānām ivośanāḥ
b sarveṣām eva lokānāṃ viśvasya ca yathā kṣayaḥ
b viśvotpattisthitilaye śreṣṭho nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
c śreṣṭhaḥ senāpraṇetṝṇāṃ sa naḥ senāpatir bhava
a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca vaśagāḥ santu te 'nagha
c tābhiḥ śatrūn prativyūhya jahīndro dānavān iva
a prayātu no bhavān agre devānām iva pāvakiḥ
c anuyāsyāmahe tv ājau saurabheyā ivarṣabham
a ugradhanvā maheṣvāso divyaṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ
c agre bhavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā no nārjunaḥ prasahiṣyate
a dhruvaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ saṃkhye sānubandhaṃ sabāndhavam
c jeṣyāmi puruṣavyāghra bhavān senāpatir yadi
a evam ukte tato droṇe jayety ūcur narādhipāḥ
c siṃhanādena mahatā harṣayantas tavātmajam
a sainikāś ca mudā yuktā vardhayanti dvijottamam
c duryodhanaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
d menire nihitān pārthān ātmanaś cottamaṃ yaśaḥ
d duryodhanaṃ tadā rājan droṇo vacanam abravīt
 droṇa uvāca
a vedaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ vedāham arthavidyāṃ ca mānavīm
c traiyambakam atheṣvastram astrāṇi vividhāni ca
a ye cāpy uktā mayi guṇā bhavadbhir jayakāṅkṣibhiḥ
c cikīrṣus tān ahaṃ satyān yodhayiṣyāmi pāṇḍavān
d pārṣataṃ tu raṇe rājan na haniṣye kathaṃ cana
d sa hi sṛṣṭo vadhārthāya mamaiva puruṣarṣabha
d yodhayiṣye tu sainyāni nāśayan sarvasomakān
d na ca māṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe yodhayiṣyanti harṣitāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a sa evam abhyanujñātaś cakre senāpatiṃ tataḥ
c droṇaṃ tava suto rājan vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a athābhiṣiṣicur droṇaṃ duryodhanamukhā nṛpāḥ
b svastivādaravaiś cānyaiḥ ślakṣṇaiḥ puṇyair manoramaiḥ
c senāpatye yathā skandaṃ purā śakramukhāḥ surāḥ
a tato vāditraghoṣeṇa saha puṃsāṃ mahāsvanaiḥ
c prādurāsīt kṛte droṇe harṣaḥ senāpatau tadā
a tataḥ puṇyāhaghoṣeṇa svastivādasvanena ca
c saṃstavair gītaśabdaiś ca sūtamāgadhabandinām
a jayaśabdair dvijāgryāṇāṃ subhagānartitais tathā
b prādurāsīn mahāśabdaḥ kṛte senāpatau dvije
b senāpatye mahātmānaṃ sarve saṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ
c satkṛtya vidhivad droṇaṃ jitān manyanta pāṇḍavān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a senāpatyaṃ tu saṃprāpya bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ
c yuyutsur vyūhya sainyāni prāyāt tava sutaiḥ saha
a saindhavaś ca kaliṅgaś ca vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
c dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam āsthāya samatiṣṭhanta daṃśitāḥ
a prapakṣaḥ śakunis teṣāṃ pravarair hayasādibhiḥ
c yayau gāndhārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ vimalaprāsayodhibhiḥ
a kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca citraseno viviṃśatiḥ
c duḥśāsanamukhā yattāḥ savyaṃ pārśvam apālayan
a teṣāṃ prapakṣāḥ kāmbojāḥ sudakṣiṇapuraḥsarāḥ
c yayur aśvair mahāvegaiḥ śakāś ca yavanaiḥ saha
a madrās trigartāḥ sāmbaṣṭhāḥ pratīcyodīcyavāsinaḥ
c śibayaḥ śūrasenāś ca śūdrāś ca maladaiḥ saha
a sauvīrāḥ kitavāḥ prācyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c tavātmajaṃ puraskṛtya sūtaputrasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
a harṣayan sarvasainyāni baleṣu balam ādadhat
c yayau vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ pramukhe sarvadhanvinām
a tasya dīpto mahākāyaḥ svāny anīkāni harṣayan
c hastikakṣyāmahāketur babhau sūryasamadyutiḥ
a na bhīṣmavyasanaṃ kaś cid dṛṣṭvā karṇam amanyata
c viśokāś cābhavan sarve rājānaḥ kurubhiḥ saha
a hṛṣṭāś ca bahavo yodhās tatrājalpanta saṃgatāḥ
c na hi karṇaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā yudhi sthāsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
a karṇo hi samare śakto jetuṃ devān savāsavān
c kim u pāṇḍusutān yuddhe hīnavīryaparākramān
a bhīṣmeṇa tu raṇe pārthāḥ pālitā bāhuśālinā
c tāṃs tu karṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair nāśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
a evaṃ bruvantas te 'nyonyaṃ hṛṣṭarūpā viśāṃ pate
c rādheyaṃ pūjayantaś ca praśaṃsantaś ca niryayuḥ
a asmākaṃ śakaṭavyūho droṇena vihito 'bhavat
c pareṣāṃ krauñca evāsīd vyūho rājan mahātmanām
e prīyamāṇena vihito dharmarājena bhārata
a vyūhapramukhatas teṣāṃ tasthatuḥ puruṣarṣabhau
c vānaradhvajam ucchritya viṣvaksenadhanaṃjayau
a kakudaṃ sarvasainyānāṃ lakṣma sarvadhanuṣmatām
c ādityapathagaḥ ketuḥ pārthasyāmitatejasaḥ
a dīpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
c yathā prajvalitaḥ sūryo yugānte vai vasuṃdharām
d arjunena tathā rājan tāpitā bhāratī camūḥ
d dīpyan dṛśyeta hi tathā ketuḥ sarvatra dhīmataḥ
a asyatām arjunaḥ śreṣṭho gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanuṣāṃ varam
c vāsudevaś ca bhūtānāṃ cakrāṇāṃ ca sudarśanam
a catvāry etāni tejāṃsi vahañ śvetahayo rathaḥ
c pareṣām agratas tasthau kālacakram ivodyatam
a evam etau mahātmānau balasenāgragāv ubhau
c tāvakānāṃ mukhaṃ karṇaḥ pareṣāṃ ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
a tato jātābhisaṃrambhau parasparavadhaiṣiṇau
c avekṣetāṃ tadānyonyaṃ samare karṇapāṇḍavau
d didhakṣantau raṇe kruddhau netrābhyām itaretaram
d niścarantau mahāvīryau dhunvānau dhanuṣī dṛḍhau
d samucchritapatākena dhvajena rathināṃ varaḥ
d ācāryaḥ kurupāṇḍūnāṃ saṃgrāmaśirasi sthitaḥ
a tataḥ prayāte sahasā bhāradvāje mahārathe
c antarnādena ghoreṇa vasudhā samakampata
a tatas tumulam ākāśam āvṛṇot sadivākaram
c vātoddhūtaṃ rajas tīvraṃ kauśeyanikaropamam
a anabhre pravavarṣa dyaur māṃsāsthirudhirāṇy uta
c gṛdhrāḥ śyenā baḍāḥ kaṅkā vāyasāś ca sahasraśaḥ
e upary upari senāṃ te tadā paryapatan nṛpa
a gomāyavaś ca prākrośan bhayadān dāruṇān ravān
c akārṣur apasavyaṃ ca bahuśaḥ pṛtanāṃ tava
e cikhādiṣanto māṃsāni pipāsantaś ca śoṇitam
a apatad dīpyamānā ca sanirghātā sakampanā
c ulkā jvalantī saṃgrāme pucchenāvṛtya sarvaśaḥ
a pariveṣo mahāṃś cāpi savidyutstanayitnumān
c bhāskarasyābhavad rājan prayāte vāhinīpatau
a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prādurāsan sudāruṇāḥ
c utpātā yudhi vīrāṇāṃ jīvitakṣayakārakāḥ
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ parasparavadhaiṣiṇām
c kurupāṇḍavasainyānāṃ śabdenānādayaj jagat
a te tv anyonyaṃ susaṃrabdhāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kauravaiḥ saha
c pratyaghnan niśitair bāṇair jayagṛddhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
a sa pāṇḍavānāṃ mahatīṃ maheṣvāso mahādyutiḥ
c vegenābhyadravat senāṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ śitaiḥ
a droṇam abhyudyataṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
c pratyagṛhṇaṃs tadā rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak
a saṃkṣobhyamāṇā droṇena bhidyamānā mahācamūḥ
c vyaśīryata sapāñcālā vāteneva balāhakāḥ
a bahūnīha vikurvāṇo divyāny astrāṇi saṃyuge
c apīḍayat kṣaṇenaiva droṇaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayān
a te vadhyamānā droṇena vāsaveneva dānavāḥ
c pāñcālāḥ samakampanta dhṛṣṭadyumnapurogamāḥ
a tato divyāstravic chūro yājñasenir mahārathaḥ
c abhinac charavarṣeṇa droṇānīkam anekadhā
a droṇasya śaravarṣais tu śaravarṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ
c saṃnivārya tataḥ senāṃ kurūn apy avadhīd balī
a saṃhṛtya tu tato droṇaḥ samavasthāpya cāhave
c svam anīkaṃ mahābāhuḥ pārṣataṃ samupādravat
a sa bāṇavarṣaṃ sumahad asṛjat pārṣataṃ prati
c maghavān samabhikruddhaḥ sahasā dānaveṣv iva
a te kampyamānā droṇena bāṇaiḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
c punaḥ punar abhajyanta siṃhenevetare mṛgāḥ
a atha paryapatad droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ balī
c alātacakravad rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a khacaranagarakalpaṃ kalpitaṃ śāstradṛṣṭyā
caladanilapatākaṃ hrādinaṃ valgitāśvam
c sphaṭikavimalaketuṃ tāpanaṃ śātravāṇāṃ
rathavaram adhirūḍhaḥ saṃjahārārisenām
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tathā droṇam abhighnantaṃ sāśvasūtarathadvipān
c vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavā dṛṣṭvā na cainaṃ paryavārayan
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dhṛṣṭadyumnadhanaṃjayau
c abravīt sarvato yattaiḥ kumbhayonir nivāryatām
a tatrainam arjunaś caiva pārṣataś ca sahānugaḥ
c paryagṛhṇaṃs tataḥ sarve samāyāntaṃ mahārathāḥ
a kekayā bhīmasenaś ca saubhadro 'tha ghaṭotkacaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiro yamau matsyā drupadasyātmajās tathā
a draupadeyāś ca saṃhṛṣṭā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sasātyakiḥ
c cekitānaś ca saṃkruddho yuyutsuś ca mahārathaḥ
a ye cānye pārthivā rājan pāṇḍavasyānuyāyinaḥ
c kulavīryānurūpāṇi cakruḥ karmāṇy anekaśaḥ
a saṃgṛhyamāṇāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavair vāhinīṃ raṇe
c vyāvṛtya cakṣuṣī kopād bhāradvājo 'nvavaikṣata
a sa tīvraṃ kopam āsthāya rathe samaradurmadaḥ
c vyadhamat pāṇḍavānīkam abhrāṇīva sadāgatiḥ
a rathān aśvān narān nāgān abhidhāvaṃs tatas tataḥ
c cacāronmattavad droṇo vṛddho 'pi taruṇo yathā
a tasya śoṇitadigdhāṅgāḥ śoṇās te vātaraṃhasaḥ
c ājāneyā hayā rājann avibhrāntāḥ śriyaṃ dadhuḥ
a tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ yatavratam
c dṛṣṭvā saṃprādravan yodhāḥ pāṇḍavasya tatas tataḥ
a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ punar āvartatām api
c vīkṣatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ cāsīc chabdaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
a śūrāṇāṃ harṣajanano bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥ
c dyāvāpṛthivyor vivaraṃ pūrayām āsa sarvataḥ
a tataḥ punar api droṇo nāma viśrāvayan yudhi
c akarod raudram ātmānaṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ parān
a sa tathā tāny anīkāni pāṇḍaveyasya dhīmataḥ
c kālavan nyavadhīd droṇo yuveva sthaviro balī
a utkṛtya ca śirāṃsy ugro bāhūn api sabhūṣaṇān
c kṛtvā śūnyān rathopasthān udakrośan mahārathaḥ
a tasya harṣapraṇādena bāṇavegena cābhibho
c prākampanta raṇe yodhā gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
a droṇasya rathaghoṣeṇa maurvīniṣpeṣaṇena ca
c dhanuḥśabdena cākāśe śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
a athāsya bahuśo bāṇā niścarantaḥ sahasraśaḥ
c vyāpya sarvā diśaḥ petur gajāśvarathapattiṣu
a taṃ kārmukamahāvegam astrajvalitapāvakam
c droṇam āsādayāṃ cakruḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
a tān vai sarathahastyaśvān prāhiṇod yamasādanam
c droṇo 'cireṇākaroc ca mahīṃ śoṇitakardamām
a tanvatā paramāstrāṇi śarān satatam asyatā
c droṇena vihitaṃ dikṣu bāṇajālam adṛśyata
a padātiṣu rathāśveṣu vāraṇeṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
c tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu caran ketur adṛśyata
a sa kekayānāṃ pravarāṃś ca pañca
pāñcālarājaṃ ca śaraiḥ pramṛdya
c yudhiṣṭhirānīkam adīnayodhī
droṇo 'bhyayāt kārmukabāṇapāṇiḥ
a taṃ bhīmasenaś ca dhanaṃjayaś ca
śineś ca naptā drupadātmajaś ca
c śaibyātmajaḥ kāśipatiḥ śibiś ca
hṛṣṭā nadanto vyakirañ śaraughaiḥ
d śreṇīkṛtāḥ saṃyati moghavegā
d dvīpe nadīnām iva kāśarohāḥ
a teṣām atho droṇadhanurvimuktāḥ
patatriṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhāḥ
c bhittvā śarīrāṇi gajāśvayūnāṃ
jagmur mahīṃ śoṇitadigdhavājāḥ
a sā yodhasaṃghaiś ca rathaiś ca bhūmiḥ
śarair vibhinnair gajavājibhiś ca
c pracchādyamānā patitair babhūva
samantato dyaur iva kālameghaiḥ
a śaineyabhīmārjunavāhinīpāñ
śaibyābhimanyū saha kāśirājñā
c anyāṃś ca vīrān samare pramṛdnād
droṇaḥ sutānāṃ tava bhūtikāmaḥ
a etāni cānyāni ca kauravendra
karmāṇi kṛtvā samare mahātmā
c pratāpya lokān iva kālasūryo
droṇo gataḥ svargam ito hi rājan
d sa tu kṛtvā mahatkarma droṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
a evaṃ rukmarathaḥ śūro hatvā śatasahasraśaḥ
c pāṇḍavānāṃ raṇe yodhān pārṣatena nipātitaḥ
a akṣauhiṇīm abhyadhikāṃ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c nihatya paścād dhṛtimān agacchat paramāṃ gatim
a pāṇḍavaiḥ saha pāñcālair aśivaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
c hato rukmaratho rājan kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
a tato ninādo bhūtānām ākāśe samajāyata
c sainyānāṃ ca tato rājann ācārye nihate yudhi
a dyāṃ dharāṃ khaṃ diśo vāri pradiśaś cānunādayan
c aho dhig iti bhūtānāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
a devatāḥ pitaraś caiva pūrve ye cāsya bāndhavāḥ
c dadṛśur nihataṃ tatra bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
a pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā siṃhanādān pracakrire
c tena nādena mahatā samakampata medinī
d vicitrajāmbūnadabhūṣitadhvajaṃ
d mahārathaṃ rukmarathaṃ nipātitam
d niśamya kaś cid dhi na harṣam eyivān
d ṛte mṛdhe drupadasutāt sasṛñjayāt
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a kiṃ kurvāṇaṃ raṇe droṇaṃ jaghnuḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
c tathā nipuṇam astreṣu sarvaśastrabhṛtām api
a rathabhaṅgo babhūvāsya dhanur vāśīryatāsyataḥ
c pramatto vābhavad droṇas tato mṛtyum upeyivān
a kathaṃ nu pārṣatas tāta śatrubhir duṣpradharṣaṇam
c kirantam iṣusaṃghātān rukmapuṅkhān anekaśaḥ
a kṣiprahastaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtinaṃ citrayodhinam
c dūreṣupātinaṃ dāntam astrayuddhe ca pāragam
a pāñcālaputro nyavadhīd diṣṭyā sa varam acyutam
c kurvāṇaṃ dāruṇaṃ karma raṇe yattaṃ mahāratham
a vyaktaṃ diṣṭaṃ hi balavat pauruṣād iti me matiḥ
c yad droṇo nihataḥ śūraḥ pārṣatena mahātmanā
a astraṃ caturvidhaṃ vīre yasminn āsīt pratiṣṭhitam
c tam iṣvastravarācāryaṃ droṇaṃ śaṃsasi me hatam
a śrutvā hataṃ rukmarathaṃ vaiyāghraparivāraṇam
c jātarūpapariṣkāraṃ nādya śokam apānude
a na nūnaṃ paraduḥkhena kaś cin mriyati saṃjaya
c yatra droṇam ahaṃ śrutvā hataṃ jīvāmi na mriye
d daivam eva paraṃ manye na sunītaṃ na pauruṣam
d madīyo nāyako yatra guṇaśreṣṭho hataḥ paraiḥ
a aśmasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ mama
c yac chrutvā nihataṃ droṇaṃ śatadhā na vidīryate
a brāhme vede tatheṣv astre yam upāsan guṇārthinaḥ
c brāhmaṇā rājaputrāś ca sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥ
a śoṣaṇaṃ sāgarasyeva meror iva visarpaṇam
c patanaṃ bhāskarasyeva na mṛṣye droṇapātanam
a dṛptānāṃ pratiṣeddhāsīd dhārmikānāṃ ca rakṣitā
c yo 'tyākṣīt kṛpaṇasyārthe prāṇān api paraṃtapaḥ
a mandānāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśā yasya vikrame
c bṛhaspatyuśanastulyo buddhyā sa nihataḥ katham
d guṇānāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ sthitir āsīn mahādyutiḥ
d yaṃ mṛtyur vaśagas tiṣṭhet sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥ
a te ca śoṇā bṛhanto 'śvāḥ saindhavā hemamālinaḥ
c rathe vātajavā yuktāḥ sarvaśabdātigā raṇe
a balino ghoṣiṇo dāntāḥ saindhavāḥ sādhuvāhinaḥ
c dṛḍhāḥ saṃgrāmamadhyeṣu kaccid āsan na vihvalāḥ
a kariṇāṃ bṛṃhatāṃ yuddhe śaṅkhadundubhinisvanam
c jyākṣepaśaravarṣāṇāṃ śastrāṇāṃ ca sahiṣṇavaḥ
a āśaṃsantaḥ parāñ jetuṃ jitaśvāsā jitavyathāḥ
c hayāḥ prajavitāḥ śīghrā bhāradvājarathodvahāḥ
a te sma rukmarathe yuktā naravīrasamāhitāḥ
c kathaṃ nābhyataraṃs tāta pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
d taṃ tu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidravanti sma śatravaḥ
d divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ saṃgatāḥ sarvataḥ pare
a jātarūpapariṣkāram āsthāya ratham uttamam
c bhāradvājaḥ kim akaroc chūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi
a vidyāṃ yasyopajīvanti sarvalokadhanurbhṛtaḥ
c sa satyasaṃdho balavān droṇaḥ kim akarod yudhi
a divi śakram iva śreṣṭhaṃ mahāmātraṃ dhanurbhṛtām
c ke nu taṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ yuddhe pratyudyayū rathāḥ
a nanu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā pradravanti sma pāṇḍavāḥ
c divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ senāṃ kṣiṇvantam avyayam
a utāho sarvasainyena dharmarājaḥ sahānujaḥ
c pāñcālyapragraho droṇaṃ sarvataḥ samavārayat
a nūnam āvārayat pārtho rathino 'nyān ajihmagaiḥ
c tato droṇaṃ samārohat pārṣataḥ pāpakarmakṛt
a na hy anyaṃ paripaśyāmi vadhe kaṃ cana śuṣmiṇaḥ
c dhṛṣṭadyumnād ṛte raudrāt pālyamānāt kirīṭinā
d utsṛjya sarvasainyāni droṇam evābhidudruve
a tair vṛtaḥ sarvataḥ śūraiḥ pāñcālyāpasadas tataḥ
c kekayaiś cedikārūṣair matsyair anyaiś ca bhūmipaiḥ
a vyākulīkṛtam ācāryaṃ pipīlair uragaṃ yathā
c karmaṇy asukare saktaṃ jaghāneti matir mama
a yo 'dhītya caturo vedān sarvān ākhyānapañcamān
c brāhmaṇānāṃ pratiṣṭhāsīt srotasām iva sāgaraḥ
d kṣatraṃ ca brahma caiveha yo 'nvatiṣṭhat paraṃtapaḥ
d dṛptānāṃ pratiṣeddhā ca cakṣur āsīd acakṣuṣām
d amarṣī cāvalipteṣu dhārmikeṣu ca dhārmikaḥ
e sa kathaṃ brāhmaṇo vṛddhaḥ śastreṇa vadham āptavān
a amarṣaṇo marṣitavān kliśyamānaḥ sadā mayā
c anarhamāṇaḥ kaunteyaḥ karmaṇas tasya tat phalam
a yasya karmānujīvanti loke sarvadhanurbhṛtaḥ
c sa satyasaṃdhaḥ sukṛtī śrīkāmair nihataḥ katham
a divi śakra iva śreṣṭho mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
c sa kathaṃ nihataḥ pārthaiḥ kṣudramatsyair yathā timiḥ
a kṣiprahastaś ca balavān dṛḍhadhanvārimardanaḥ
b vā kathaṃ nihataḥ pāpai raṇe brāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥ
c na yasya jīvitākāṅkṣī viṣayaṃ prāpya jīvati
a yaṃ dvau na jahataḥ śabdau jīvamānaṃ kadā cana
c brāhmaś ca vedakāmānāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca dhanurbhṛtām
d adīnaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ hrīmantam aparājitam
a nāhaṃ mṛṣye hataṃ droṇaṃ siṃhadviradavikramam
b paśyatāṃ puruṣendrāṇāṃ samare pārṣato 'vadhīt
b ke purastād ayudhyanta rakṣanto droṇam antikāt
b ke nu paścād avartanta gacchato durgamāṃ gatim
c kathaṃ saṃjaya durdharṣam anādhṛṣyayaśobalam
d brahmakalpo 'bhavad brāhme kṣātre nārāyaṇopamaḥ
d brahmakṣatre ca yasyāstāṃ vaśe sthāṇor ivākhile
d sarvān hi māmakān yuddhe sahāśvarathakuñjarān
d yudhiṣṭhirasya tapasā hatān manyāmahe kurūn
a ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ savyaṃ ke ca mahātmanaḥ
c purastāt ke ca vīrasya yudhyamānasya saṃyuge
a ke ca tatra tanuṃ tyaktvā pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajan
c droṇasya samare vīrāḥ ke 'kurvanta parāṃ dhṛtim
d kaccin nainaṃ bhayān mandāḥ kṣatriyā vyajahan raṇe
d rakṣitāras tataḥ śūnye kaccin naiko hataḥ paraiḥ
d na sa pṛṣṭham ares trāsād raṇe śauryāt pradarśayet
d parām apy āpadaṃ prāpya sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
d yaḥ sa devān sagandharvān sayakṣoragarākṣasān
d jetum utsahate droṇaḥ sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
a etad āryeṇa kartavyaṃ kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃjaya
c parākramed yathāśaktyā tac ca tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
d kaccin nainaṃ bhayāt kṣudrāḥ pārthebhyaḥ pradadū raṇe
d goptṛbhis taiḥ samutsṛṣṭaḥ kaccin naiṣa parair hataḥ
d dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ hi paśyāmi nighnantam iva brāhmaṇam
d vāryamāṇaṃ raṇe tāta drauṇināmitatejasā
a muhyate me manas tāta kathā tāvan nivartyatām
b kṣaṇam ekam ahaṃ sūta na śakṣyāmīti jalpitum
c bhūyas tu labdhasaṃjñas tvā pariprakṣyāmi saṃjaya
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ pṛṣṭvā sūtaputraṃ hṛcchokenārdito bhṛśam
c jaye nirāśaḥ putrāṇāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro 'patat kṣitau
a taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ siṣicuḥ paricārakāḥ
c jalenātyarthaśītena vījantaḥ puṇyagandhinā
a patitaṃ cainam ājñāya samantād bharatastriyaḥ
c parivavrur mahārājam aspṛśaṃś caiva pāṇibhiḥ
a utthāpya cainaṃ śanakai rājānaṃ pṛthivītalāt
c āsanaṃ prāpayām āsur bāṣpakaṇṭhyo varāṅganāḥ
a āsanaṃ prāpya rājā tu mūrchayābhipariplutaḥ
c niśceṣṭo 'tiṣṭhata tadā vījyamānaḥ samantataḥ
a sa labdhvā śanakaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vepamāno mahīpatiḥ
c punar gāvalgaṇiṃ sūtaṃ paryapṛcchad yathātatham
a yat tad udyann ivādityo jyotiṣā praṇudaṃs tamaḥ
c āyād ajātaśatrur vai kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
a prabhinnam iva mātaṅgaṃ tathā kruddhaṃ tarasvinam
c āsaktamanasaṃ dīptaṃ pratidviradaghātinam
e vāśitāsaṃgame yadvad ajayyaṃ pratiyūthapaiḥ
a ati cānyān raṇe yodhān vīraḥ puruṣasattamaḥ
c yo hy eko hi mahābāhur nirdahed ghoracakṣuṣā
e kṛtsnaṃ duryodhanabalaṃ dhṛtimān satyasaṃgaraḥ
a cakṣurhaṇaṃ jaye saktam iṣvāsavararakṣitam
c dāntaṃ bahumataṃ loke ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan
a ke duṣpradharṣaṃ rājānam iṣvāsavaram acyutam
c samāsedur naravyāghraṃ kaunteyaṃ tatra māmakāḥ
a tarasaivābhipatyātha yo vai droṇam upādravat
b yaḥ karoti mahatkarma śatrūṇāṃ vai mahābalaḥ
b mahākāyo mahotsāho nāgāyutasamo bale
c taṃ bhīmasenam āyāntaṃ ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan
a yad āyāj jaladaprakhyo rathaḥ paramavīryavān

a prāptaḥ prakṛtito dharmo nādharmo mānavān prati
c krūraḥ sarvavināśāya kālaḥ samativartate
a anyathā cintitā hy arthā narais tāta manasvibhiḥ
c anyathaiva hi gacchanti daivād iti matir mama
a tasmād aparihārye 'rthe saṃprāpte kṛcchra uttame
c apāraṇīye duścintye yathābhūtaṃ pracakṣva me
 saṃjaya uvāca
 śuśrūṣasva sthiro bhūtvā śaṃsato mama bhārata
a hanta te varṇayiṣyāmi sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśivān
c yathā sa nyapatad droṇaḥ sāditaḥ pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥ
a senāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ
c madhye sarvasya sainyasya putraṃ te vākyam abravīt
a yat kauravāṇām ṛṣabhād āpageyād anantaram
c senāpatyena māṃ rājann adya satkṛtavān asi
d anurūpaṃ phalaṃ tasya karmaṇo labhyatāṃ tvayā
a sadṛśaṃ karmaṇas tasya phalaṃ prāpnuhi pārthiva
c karomi kāmaṃ kaṃ te 'dya pravṛṇīṣva yam icchasi
a tato duryodhanaś cintya karṇaduḥśāsanādibhiḥ
c tam athovāca durdharṣam ācāryaṃ jayatāṃ varam
a dadāsi ced varaṃ mahyaṃ jīvagrāhaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c gṛhītvā rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ matsamīpam ihānaya
d iccheyaṃ vai mahātmānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
d bhrātṝṇāṃ paśyatām eva jīvagrāheṇa me dvija
d prīṇāmy anena kāryeṇa sasuhṛjjanabāndhavaḥ
a tataḥ kurūṇām ācāryaḥ śrutvā putrasya te vacaḥ
c senāṃ praharṣayan sarvām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a dhanyaḥ kuntīsuto rājā yasya grahaṇam icchasi
c na vadhārthaṃ sudurdharṣa varam adya prayācasi
a kimarthaṃ ca naravyāghra na vadhaṃ tasya kāṅkṣasi
c nāśaṃsasi kriyām etāṃ matto duryodhana dhruvam
a āho svid dharmaputrasya dveṣṭā tasya na vidyate
c yad icchasi tvaṃ jīvantaṃ kulaṃ rakṣasi cātmani
a atha vā bharataśreṣṭha nirjitya yudhi pāṇḍavān
c rājyāṃśaṃ pratidattvā ca saubhrātraṃ kartum icchasi
a dhanyaḥ kuntīsuto rājā sujātā cāsya dhīmataḥ
c ajātaśatrutā satyā tasya yat snihyate bhavān
a droṇena tv evam uktasya tava putrasya bhārata
c sahasā niḥsṛto bhāvo yo 'sya nityaṃ pravartate
a nākāro gūhituṃ śakyo bṛhaspatisamair api
c tasmāt tava suto rājan prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt
a vadhe kuntīsutasyājau nācārya vijayo mama
c hate yudhiṣṭhire pārtho hanyāt sarvān hi no dhruvam
a na ca śakyo raṇe sarvair nihantum amarair api
b yadi sarve haniṣyante pāṇḍavāḥ sasutā mṛdhe
b tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ vaśe kṛtvā niḥśeṣaṃ nṛpamaṇḍalam
b sasāgaravanāṃ sphītāṃ vijitya vasudhām imām
b viṣṇur dāsyati kṛṣṇāyai kuntyai vā puruṣottamaḥ
c ya eva caiṣāṃ śeṣaḥ syāt sa evāsmān na śeṣayet
a satyapratijñe tv ānīte punardyūtena nirjite
b tasmiñ jīvati cānīte hy upāyair bahubhiḥ kṛtaiḥ
c punar yāsyanty araṇyāya kaunteyās tam anuvratāḥ
a so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati
c ato na vadham icchāmi dharmarājasya karhi cit
a tasya jihmam abhiprāyaṃ jñātvā droṇo 'rthatattvavit
c taṃ varaṃ sāntaraṃ tasmai dadau saṃcintya buddhimān
 droṇa uvāca
a na ced yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīra pālayed arjuno yudhi
c manyasva pāṇḍavaṃ jyeṣṭham ānītaṃ vaśam ātmanaḥ
a na hi pārtho raṇe śakyaḥ sendrair devāsurair api
b sthite pārthe dharmarājo naiva śakyo mayā raṇe
c pratyudyātum atas tāta naitad āmarṣayāmy aham
a asaṃśayaṃ sa śiṣyo me matpūrvaś cāstrakarmaṇi
c taruṇaḥ kīrtiyuktaś ca ekāyanagataś ca saḥ
a astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca bhūyāṃsi samavāptavān
c amarṣitaś ca te rājaṃs tena nāmarṣayāmy aham
a sa cāpakramyatāṃ yuddhād yenopāyena śakyate
c apanīte tataḥ pārthe dharmarājo jitas tvayā
a grahaṇaṃ cej jayaṃ tasya manyase puruṣarṣabha
c etena cābhyupāyena dhruvaṃ grahaṇam eṣyati
a ahaṃ gṛhītvā rājānaṃ satyadharmaparāyaṇam
c ānayiṣyāmi te rājan vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥ
a yadi sthāsyati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api me 'grataḥ
c apanīte naravyāghre kuntīputre dhanaṃjaye
a phalgunasya samakṣaṃ tu na hi pārtho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c grahītuṃ samare śakyaḥ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 evam ukte tadā tasmin yuddhe devāsuropame
a sāntaraṃ tu pratijñāte rājño droṇena nigrahe
c gṛhītaṃ tam amanyanta tava putrāḥ subāliśāḥ
a pāṇḍaveṣu hi sāpekṣaṃ droṇaṃ jānāti te sutaḥ
c tataḥ pratijñāsthairyārthaṃ sa mantro bahulīkṛtaḥ
a tato duryodhanenāpi grahaṇaṃ pāṇḍavasya tat
b skandhāvāreṣu sarveṣu yathāsthāneṣu māriṣa
c sainyasthāneṣu sarveṣu vyāghoṣitam ariṃdama
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tatas te sainikāḥ śrutvā taṃ yudhiṣṭhiranigraham
c siṃhanādaravāṃś cakrur bāṇaśaṅkharavaiḥ saha
a tat tu sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ dharmarājena bhārata
c āptair āśu parijñātaṃ bhāradvājacikīrṣitam
a tataḥ sarvān samānāyya bhrātṝn sainyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
c abravīd dharmarājas tu dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥ
a śrutaṃ te puruṣavyāghra droṇasyādya cikīrṣitam
c yathā tan na bhavet satyaṃ tathā nītir vidhīyatām
a sāntaraṃ hi pratijñātaṃ droṇenāmitrakarśana
c tac cāntaram amogheṣau tvayi tena samāhitam
a sa tvam adya mahābāho yudhyasva madanantaram
c yathā duryodhanaḥ kāmaṃ nemaṃ droṇād avāpnuyāt
 arjuna uvāca
a yathā me na vadhaḥ kārya ācāryasya kathaṃ cana
c tathā tava parityāgo na me rājaṃś cikīrṣitaḥ
a apy evaṃ pāṇḍava prāṇān utsṛjeyam ahaṃ yudhi
c pratīyāṃ nāham ācāryaṃ tvāṃ na jahyāṃ kathaṃ cana
a tvāṃ nigṛhyāhave rājan dhārtarāṣṭro yam icchati
c na sa taṃ jīvaloke 'smin kāmaṃ prāptaḥ kathaṃ cana
a prapated dyauḥ sanakṣatrā pṛthivī śakalībhavet
c na tvāṃ droṇo nigṛhṇīyāj jīvamāne mayi dhruvam
a yadi tasya raṇe sāhyaṃ kurute vajrabhṛt svayam
c devair vā sahito daityair na tvāṃ prāpsyaty asau mṛdhe
a mayi jīvati rājendra na bhayaṃ kartum arhasi
c droṇād astrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhāt sarvaśastrabhṛtām api
d anyac ca brūyāṃ rājendra pratijñāṃ mama nityadā
a na smarāmy anṛtāṃ vācaṃ na smarāmi parājayam
c na smarāmi pratiśrutya kiṃ cid apy anapākṛtam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ saha
c prāvādyanta mahārāja pāṇḍavānāṃ niveśane
a siṃhanādaś ca saṃjajñe pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
c dhanurjyātalaśabdaś ca gaganaspṛk subhairavaḥ
a taṃ śrutvā śaṅkhanirghoṣaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
c tvadīyeṣv apy anīkeṣu vāditrāṇy abhijaghnire
a tato vyūḍhāny anīkāni tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
c śanair upeyur anyonyaṃ yotsyamānāni saṃyuge
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca droṇapāñcālyayor api
a yatamānāḥ prayatnena droṇānīkaviśātane
c na śekuḥ sṛñjayā rājaṃs tad dhi droṇena pālitam
a tathaiva tava putrasya rathodārāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c na śekuḥ pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ pālyamānāṃ kirīṭinā
a āstāṃ te stimite sene rakṣyamāṇe parasparam
c saṃprasupte yathā naktaṃ vanarājyau supuṣpite
a tato rukmaratho rājann arkeṇeva virājatā
c varūthinā viniṣpatya vyacarat pṛtanāntare
a tam udyataṃ rathenaikam āśukāriṇam āhave
c anekam iva saṃtrāsān menire pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥ
a tena muktāḥ śarā ghorā viceruḥ sarvatodiśam
c trāsayanto mahārāja pāṇḍaveyasya vāhinīm
a madhyaṃ dinam anuprāpto gabhastiśatasaṃvṛtaḥ
c yathādṛśyata gharmāṃśus tathā droṇo 'py adṛśyata
a na cainaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ kaś cic chaknoti māriṣa
c vīkṣituṃ samare kruddhaṃ mahendram iva dānavāḥ
a mohayitvā tataḥ sainyaṃ bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
c dhṛṣṭadyumnabalaṃ tūrṇaṃ vyadhaman niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a sa diśaḥ sarvato ruddhvā saṃvṛtya kham ajihmagaiḥ
c pārṣato yatra tatraiva mamṛde pāṇḍuvāhinīm
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ sa pāṇḍavānīke janayaṃs tumulaṃ mahat
c vyacarat pāṇḍavān droṇo dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
a nirdahantam anīkāni sākṣād agnim ivotthitam
c dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ yuddhe samakampanta sṛñjayāḥ
a pratataṃ cāsyamānasya dhanuṣo 'syāśukāriṇaḥ
c jyāghoṣaḥ śrūyate 'tyarthaṃ visphūrjitam ivāśaneḥ
a rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva nāgān aśvān padātinaḥ
c raudrā hastavatā muktāḥ pramathnanti sma sāyakāḥ
a nānadyamānaḥ parjanyaḥ sānilaḥ śucisaṃkṣaye
c aśmavarṣam ivāvarṣat pareṣām āvahad bhayam
a vyacarat sa tadā rājan senāṃ vikṣobhayan prabhuḥ
c vardhayām āsa saṃtrāsaṃ śātravāṇām amānuṣam
a tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu cāpaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam
c bhramad rathāmbude tasmin dṛśyate sma punaḥ punaḥ
a sa vīraḥ satyavān prājño dharmanityaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
c yugāntakāle yanteva raudrāṃ prāskandayan nadīm
a amarṣavegaprabhavāṃ kravyādagaṇasaṃkulām
c balaughaiḥ sarvataḥ pūrṇāṃ vīravṛkṣāpahāriṇīm
a śoṇitodāṃ rathāvartāṃ hastyaśvakṛtarodhasam
c kavacoḍupasaṃyuktāṃ māṃsapaṅkasamākulām
d keśaśaivālasaṃyuktāṃ māṃsāsṛkkardamāruṇām
a medomajjāsthisikatām uṣṇīṣavaraphenilām
c saṃgrāmajaladāpūrṇāṃ prāsamatsyasamākulām
a naranāgāśvasaṃbhūtāṃ śaravegaughavāhinīm
c śarīradāruśṛṅgāṭāṃ bhujanāgasamākulām
a uttamāṅgopalatalāṃ nistriṃśajhaṣasevitām
c rathanāgahradopetāṃ nānābharaṇanīrajām
a mahārathaśatāvartāṃ bhūmireṇūrmimālinīm
c mahāvīryavatāṃ saṃkhye sutarāṃ bhīrudustarām
d śarīraśatasaṃbādhāṃ gṛdhrakaṅkaniṣevitām
d mahārathasahasrāṇi nayantīṃ yamasādanam
a śūravyālasamākīrṇāṃ prāṇivāṇijasevitām
c chinnacchatramahāhaṃsāṃ mukuṭāṇḍajasaṃkulām
a cakrakūrmāṃ gadānakrāṃ śarakṣudrajhaṣākulām
c baḍagṛdhrasṛgālānāṃ ghorasaṃghair niṣevitām
d nadīṃ prāsyandayan droṇaḥ keśaśaivalaśāḍvalām
a nihatān prāṇinaḥ saṃkhye droṇena balinā śaraiḥ
c vahantīṃ pitṛlokāya śataśo rājasattama
d uvāha śataśo rājan pitṛlokāya vāhinīm
a śarīraśatasaṃbādhāṃ keśaśaivalaśādvalām
c nadīṃ prāvartayad rājan bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinīm
a taṃ jayantam anīkāni tāni tāny eva bhārata
c sarvato 'bhyadravan droṇaṃ yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥ
a tān abhidravataḥ śūrāṃs tāvakā dṛḍhakārmukāḥ
c sarvataḥ pratyagṛhṇanta tad abhūl lomaharṣaṇam
a śatamāyas tu śakuniḥ sahadevaṃ samādravat
c saniyantṛdhvajarathaṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a tasya mādrīsutaḥ ketuṃ dhanuḥ sūtaṃ hayān api
c nātikruddhaḥ śaraiś chittvā ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha mātulam
d bhittvā ca śaravarṣeṇa śakuniṃ pratyavārayat
a saubalas tu gadāṃ gṛhya pracaskanda rathottamāt
c sa tasya gadayā rājan rathāt sūtam apātayat
a tatas tau virathau rājan gadāhastau mahābalau
c cikrīḍatū raṇe śūrau saśṛṅgāv iva parvatau
a droṇaḥ pāñcālarājānaṃ viddhvā daśabhir āśugaiḥ
b tayos tatra mahārāja bāṇavarṣaiḥ prakāśitam
b khadyotair iva cākāśaṃ pradoṣe puruṣarṣabha
c bahubhis tena cābhyastas taṃ vivyādha śatādhikaiḥ
a viviṃśatiṃ bhīmaseno viṃśatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c viddhvā nākampayad vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a viviṃśatis tu sahasā vyaśvaketuśarāsanam
c bhīmaṃ cakre mahārāja tataḥ sainyāny apūjayan
d cakre taṃ sarvasainyāni prahṛṣṭāny abhyapūjayan
a sa tan na mamṛṣe vīraḥ śatror vijayam āhave
c tato 'sya gadayā dāntān hayān sarvān apātayat
d hatāśvāt sa rathād rājan gṛhya carma mahābalaḥ
d abhyayād bhīmasenaṃ tu matto mattam iva dvipam
a śalyas tu nakulaṃ vīraḥ svasrīyaṃ priyam ātmanaḥ
c vivyādha prahasan bāṇair lāḍayan kopayann iva
a tasyāśvān ātapatraṃ ca dhvajaṃ sūtam atho dhanuḥ
c nipātya nakulaḥ saṃkhye śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
d ciccheda samare yattaḥ sa ca yuddhād upāramat
a dhṛṣṭaketuḥ kṛpenāstāñ chittvā bahuvidhāñ śarān
c kṛpaṃ vivyādha saptatyā lakṣma cāsyāharat tribhiḥ
a taṃ kṛpaḥ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākirat
c nivārya ca raṇe vipro dhṛṣṭaketum ayodhayat
a sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmāṇaṃ nārācena stanāntare
c viddhvā vivyādha saptatyā punar anyaiḥ smayann iva
a saptasaptatibhir bhojas taṃ viddhvā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c nākampayata śaineyaṃ śīghro vāyur ivācalam
a senāpatiḥ suśarmāṇaṃ śīghraṃ marmasv atāḍayat
c sa cāpi taṃ tomareṇa jatrudeśe atāḍayat
a vaikartanaṃ tu samare virāṭaḥ pratyavārayat
c saha matsyair mahāvīryais tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tat pauruṣam abhūt tatra sūtaputrasya dāruṇam
c yat sainyaṃ vārayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a drupadas tu svayaṃ rājā bhagadattena saṃgataḥ
c tayor yuddhaṃ mahārāja citrarūpam ivābhavat
d bhagadattas tu rājānaṃ drupadaṃ nataparvabhiḥ
d saniyantṛdhvajarathaṃ vivyādha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
d drupadas tu tataḥ kruddho bhagadattaṃ mahāratham
d ājaghānorasi kṣipraṃ śareṇānataparvaṇā
d yuddhaṃ yodhavarau loke saumadattiśikhaṇḍinau
e bhūtānāṃ trāsajananaṃ cakrāte 'straviśāradau
f śrotṝṇāṃ vīkṣitṝṇāṃ ca mohakāraṇam āhave
a bhūriśravā raṇe rājan yājñaseniṃ mahāratham
c mahatā sāyakaughena chādayām āsa vīryavān
a śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ saumadattiṃ viśāṃ pate
c navatyā sāyakānāṃ tu kampayām āsa bhārata
d chādayām āsa nārācais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
f ṛkṣacarmapinaddhau tu cakratus tau parasparam
f bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃplavantau yaśasvinau
f dadṛśāte mahātmānau sapakṣāv iva parvatau
f piśitāśanasaṃyuktau vāhair udbāṇapātibhiḥ
f bṛhatpatākau tūṇīrau ghorarūpau bhayānakau
f kālameghāv iva gajau lokānāṃ bhartsya garjanaiḥ
f rathaghoṣeṇa mahatā vyāsthitau syandanottamau
f bṛhatpatākau tūṇīrau paiśācair vāhanair yutau
a rākṣasau bhīmakarmāṇau haiḍimbālambusāv ubhau
c cakrāte 'tyadbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ parasparavadhaiṣiṇau
a māyāśatasṛjau dṛptau māyābhir itaretaram
c antarhitau ceratus tau bhṛśaṃ vismayakāriṇau
a cekitāno 'nuvindena yuyudhe tv atibhairavam
b tayos tu yuddham abhavat parasparavadhaiṣiṇau
b yudhiṣṭhiraḥ svayaṃ rājā duryodhanam ayodhayat
b tau putrau tava durdharṣau yuyudhāte parasparam
c yathā devāsure yuddhe balaśakrau mahābalau
a lakṣmaṇaḥ kṣatradevena vimardam akarod bhṛśam
c yathā viṣṇuḥ purā rājan hiraṇyākṣeṇa saṃyuge
a tataḥ prajavitāśvena vidhivat kalpitena ca
c rathenābhyapatad rājan saubhadraṃ pauravo nadan
a tato 'bhiyāya tvarito yuddhākāṅkṣī mahābalaḥ
c tena cakre mahad yuddham abhimanyur ariṃdamaḥ
a pauravas tv atha saubhadraṃ śaravrātair avākirat
c tasyārjunir dhvajaṃ chatraṃ dhanuś corvyām apātayat
a saubhadraḥ pauravaṃ tv anyair viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
c pañcabhis tasya vivyādha hayān sūtaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
a tataḥ saṃharṣayan senāṃ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
c samādattārjunis tūrṇaṃ pauravāntakaraṃ śaram
d tasya saṃdhitam ājñāya sāyakaṃ ghoradarśanam
a dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ hārdikyaś cakarta saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
c tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
e udbabarha sitaṃ khaḍgam ādadānaḥ śarāvaram
a sa tenānekatāreṇa carmaṇā kṛtahastavat
c bhrāntāsir acaran mārgān darśayan vīryam ātmanaḥ
a bhrāmitaṃ punar udbhrāntam ādhūtaṃ punar ucchritam
c carmanistriṃśayo rājan nirviśeṣam adṛśyata
a sa pauravarathasyeṣām āplutya sahasā nadan
c pauravaṃ ratham āsthāya keśapakṣe parāmṛśat
a jaghānāsya padā sūtam asināpātayad dhvajam
c vikṣobhyāmbhonidhiṃ tārkṣyas taṃ nāgam iva cākṣipat
a tam ākalitakeśāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
c ukṣāṇam iva siṃhena pātyamānam acetanam
a tam ārjunivaśaṃ prāptaṃ kṛṣyamāṇam anāthavat
c pauravaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāmṛṣyata jayadrathaḥ
a sa barhiṇamahāvājaṃ kiṅkiṇīśatajālavat
c carma cādāya khaḍgaṃ ca nadan paryapatad rathāt
a tataḥ saindhavam ālokya kārṣṇir utsṛjya pauravam
c utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ śyenavan nipapāta ca
a prāsapaṭṭiśanistriṃśāñ śatrubhiḥ saṃpraveritān
c cicchedāthāsinā kārṣṇiś carmaṇā saṃrurodha ca
a sa darśayitvā sainyānāṃ svabāhubalam ātmanaḥ
c tam udyamya mahākhaḍgaṃ carma cātha punar balī
d dudhāva sahasā khaḍgaṃ carma cātirathaḥ punaḥ
a vṛddhakṣatrasya dāyādaṃ pitur atyantavairiṇam
c sasārābhimukhaḥ śūraḥ śārdūla iva kuñjaram
a tau parasparam āsādya khaḍgadantanakhāyudhau
c hṛṣṭavat saṃprajahrāte vyāghrakesariṇāv iva
a saṃpāteṣv abhipāteṣu nipāteṣv asicarmaṇoḥ
c na tayor antaraṃ kaś cid dadarśa narasiṃhayoḥ
a avakṣepo 'sinirhrādaḥ śastrāntaranidarśanam
c bāhyāntaranipātaś ca nirviśeṣam adṛśyata
a bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ caiva carantau mārgam uttamam
c dadṛśāte mahātmānau sapakṣāv iva parvatau
a tato vikṣipataḥ khaḍgaṃ saubhadrasya yaśasvinaḥ
c śarāvaraṇapakṣānte prajahāra jayadrathaḥ
a rukmapakṣāntare saktas tasmiṃś carmaṇi bhāsvare
c sindhurājabaloddhūtaḥ so 'bhajyata mahān asiḥ
a bhagnam ājñāya nistriṃśam avaplutya padāni ṣaṭ
c so 'dṛśyata nimeṣeṇa svarathaṃ punar āsthitaḥ
a taṃ kārṣṇiṃ samarān muktam āsthitaṃ ratham uttamam
c sahitāḥ sarvarājānaḥ parivavruḥ samantataḥ
a tataś carma ca khaḍgaṃ ca samutkṣipya mahābalaḥ
c nanādārjunadāyādaḥ prekṣamāṇo jayadratham
a sindhurājaṃ parityajya saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
c tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāskaro yathā
a tasya sarvāyasīṃ śaktiṃ śalyaḥ kanakabhūṣaṇām
c cikṣepa samare ghorāṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva
a tām avaplutya jagrāha sakośaṃ cākarod asim
c vainateyo yathā kārṣṇiḥ patantam uragottamam
a tasya lāghavam ājñāya sattvaṃ cāmitatejasaḥ
c sahitāḥ sarvarājānaḥ siṃhanādam athānadan
a tatas tām eva śalyasya saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
c mumoca bhujavīryeṇa vaiḍūryavikṛtājirām
a sā tasya ratham āsādya nirmuktabhujagopamā
c jaghāna sūtaṃ śalyasya rathāc cainam apātayat
a tato virāṭadrupadau dhṛṣṭaketur yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c sātyakiḥ kekayā bhīmo dhṛṣṭadyumnaśikhaṇḍinau
e yamau ca draupadeyāś ca sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
a bāṇaśabdāś ca vividhāḥ siṃhanādāś ca puṣkalāḥ
c prādurāsan harṣayantaḥ saubhadram apalāyinam
d parivavruḥ sma te sarve pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
d harṣayantaś ca saubhadraṃ roṣayantaḥ sutāṃś ca te
e tan nāmṛṣyanta putrās te śatror vijayalakṣaṇam
a athainaṃ sahasā sarve samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c abhyākiran mahārāja jaladā iva parvatam
a teṣāṃ ca priyam anvicchan sūtasya ca parābhavāt
c ārtāyanir amitraghnaḥ kruddhaḥ saubhadram abhyayāt
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a bahūni suvicitrāṇi dvaṃdvayuddhāni saṃjaya
c tvayoktāni niśamyāhaṃ spṛhayāmi sacakṣuṣām
d na hi devāsuraṃ yuddham īdṛgrūpaṃ bhaved iti
d cintayāmi ca yuddhāni śrutvā ghorāṇi saṃjaya
a āścaryabhūtaṃ lokeṣu kathayiṣyanti mānavāḥ
c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yuddhaṃ devāsuropamam
a na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvato yuddham uttamam
c tasmād ārtāyaner yuddhaṃ saubhadrasya ca śaṃsa me
 saṃjaya uvāca
a sāditaṃ prekṣya yantāraṃ śalyaḥ sarvāyaṣīṃ gadām
c samutkṣipya nadan kruddhaḥ pracaskanda rathottamāt
a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ daṇḍahastam ivāntakam
c javenābhyapatad bhīmaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
a saubhadro 'py aśaniprakhyāṃ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
c ehy ehīty abravīc chalyaṃ yatnād bhīmena vāritaḥ
a vārayitvā tu saubhadraṃ bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān
c śalyam āsādya samare tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
a tathaiva madrarājo 'pi bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābalam
c sasārābhimukhas tūrṇaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjaram
a tatas tūryaninādāś ca śaṅkhānāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
c siṃhanādāś ca saṃjajñur bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanāḥ
a paśyatāṃ śataśo hy āsīd anyonyasamacetasām
c pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca sādhu sādhv iti nisvanaḥ
a na hi madrādhipād anyaḥ sarvarājasu bhārata
c soḍhum utsahate vegaṃ bhīmasenasya saṃyuge
a tathā madrādhipasyāpi gadāvegaṃ mahātmanaḥ
c soḍhum utsahate loke ko 'nyo yudhi vṛkodarāt
a paṭṭair jāmbūnadair baddhā babhūva janaharṣiṇī
c prajajvāla tathāviddhā bhīmena mahatī gadā
d sāgnidīptā mahāraudrā gadā sā śuśubhe tadā
a tathaiva carato mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
c mahāvidyutpratīkāśā śalyasya śuśubhe gadā
a tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
c āvarjitagadāśṛṅgāv ubhau śalyavṛkodarau
d kopatāmrekṣaṇau vīrau śatrusaṃghavimardanau
d mahāmātrau mahotsāhau gadāyuddhaviśāradau
a maṇḍalāvartamārgeṣu gadāviharaṇeṣu ca
c nirviśeṣam abhūd yuddhaṃ tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ
a tāḍitā bhīmasenena śalyasya mahatī gadā
c sāgnijvālā mahāraudrā gadācūrṇam aśīryata
a tathaiva bhīmasenasya dviṣatābhihatā gadā
c varṣāpradoṣe khadyotair vṛto vṛkṣa ivābabhau
a gadā kṣiptā tu samare madrarājena bhārata
c vyoma saṃdīpayānā sā sasṛje pāvakaṃ bahu
a tathaiva bhīmasenena dviṣate preṣitā gadā
b bhīmarūpā mahāvegā gadā śalyaṃ raṇe 'nudat
c tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ maholkā patatī yathā
a te caivobhe gade śreṣṭhe samāsādya parasparam
c śvasantyau nāgakanyeva sasṛjāte vibhāvasum
d punaḥ śalyena bhīmasya gadāgrād gadayā hatāt
d saṃgharṣaṇād utthito 'gnir dīpayām āsa medinīm
d punaś ca bhīmasenena śalyasya mahatī gadā
d tāḍitā sahasā rājan visasarjātha pāvakam
a nakhair iva mahāvyāghrau dantair iva mahāgajau
c tau viceratur āsādya gadābhyāṃ ca parasparam
a tato gadāgrābhihatau kṣaṇena rudhirokṣitau
c dadṛśāte mahātmānau puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
a śuśruve dikṣu sarvāsu tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ
c gadābhighātasaṃhrādaḥ śakrāśanir ivopamaḥ
a gadayā madrarājena savyadakṣiṇam āhataḥ
c nākampata tadā bhīmo bhidyamāna ivācalaḥ
a tathā bhīmagadāvegais tāḍyamāno mahābalaḥ
c dhairyān madrādhipas tasthau vajrair girir ivāhataḥ
a āpetatur mahāvegau samucchritamahāgadau
c punar antaramārgasthau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
a athāplutya padāny aṣṭau saṃnipatya gajāv iva
c sahasā lohadaṇḍābhyām anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
a tau parasparavegāc ca gadābhyāṃ ca bhṛśāhatau
c yugapat petatur vīrau kṣitāv indradhvajāv iva
a tato vihvalamānaṃ taṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
c śalyam abhyapatat tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ mahārāja gadayābhinipīḍitam
c viceṣṭantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ mūrchayābhipariplutam
a tataḥ sagadam āropya madrāṇām adhipaṃ ratham
c apovāha raṇāt tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
a kṣībavad vihvalo vīro nimeṣāt punar utthitaḥ
c bhīmo 'pi sumahābāhur gadāpāṇir adṛśyata
a tato madrādhipaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrāḥ parāṅmukham
c sanāgarathapattyaśvāḥ samakampanta māriṣa
a te pāṇḍavair ardyamānās tāvakā jitakāśibhiḥ
c bhītā diśo 'nvapadyanta vātanunnā ghanā iva
a nirjitya dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tu pāṇḍaveyā mahārathāḥ
c vyarocanta raṇe rājan dīpyamānā yaśasvinaḥ
a siṃhanādān bhṛśaṃ cakruḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca harṣitāḥ
c bherīś ca vādayām āsur mṛdaṅgāṃś cānakaiḥ saha
d atha maḍḍukabherimahāmurajāḥ
d paṇavānakadundubhijharjharibhiḥ
d vinadanti bhṛśaṃ saha śaṅkharavair
d vividhaiś ca narottama siṃharavaiḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tad balaṃ sumahad dīrṇaṃ tvadīyaṃ prekṣya vīryavān
c dadhāraiko raṇe pāṇḍūn vṛṣaseno 'stramāyayā
a śarā daśa diśo muktā vṛṣasenena māriṣa
c vicerus te vinirbhidya naravājirathadvipān
a tasya dīptā mahābāṇā viniśceruḥ sahasraśaḥ
c bhānor iva mahābāho grīṣmakāle marīcayaḥ
a tenārditā mahārāja rathinaḥ sādinas tathā
c nipetur urvyāṃ sahasā vātanunnā iva drumāḥ
a hayaughāṃś ca rathaughāṃś ca gajaughāṃś ca samantataḥ
c apātayad raṇe rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā tam evaṃ samare vicarantam abhītavat
c sahitāḥ sarvarājānaḥ parivavruḥ samantataḥ
a nākulis tu śatānīko vṛṣasenaṃ samabhyayāt
c vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhir nārācair marmabhedibhiḥ
a tasya karṇātmajaś cāpaṃ chittvā ketum apātayat
c taṃ bhrātaraṃ parīpsanto draupadeyāḥ samabhyayuḥ
a karṇātmajaṃ śaravrātaiś cakruś cādṛśyam añjasā
c tān nadanto 'bhyadhāvanta droṇaputramukhā rathāḥ
a chādayanto mahārāja draupadeyān mahārathān
c śarair nānāvidhais tūrṇaṃ parvatāñ jaladā iva
a tān pāṇḍavāḥ pratyagṛhṇaṃs tvaritāḥ putragṛddhinaḥ
c pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ sṛñjayāś codyatāyudhāḥ
a tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c tvadīyaiḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ devānām iva dānavaiḥ
a evam uttamasaṃrambhā yuyudhuḥ kurupāṇḍavāḥ
c parasparam udīkṣantaḥ parasparakṛtāgasaḥ
a teṣāṃ dadṛśire kopād vapūṃṣy amitatejasām
c yuyutsūnām ivākāśe patatrivarabhoginām
a bhīmakarṇakṛpadroṇadrauṇipārṣatasātyakaiḥ
c babhāse sa raṇoddeśaḥ kālasūryair ivoditaiḥ
d prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye ghore yathā sūryodayo bhavet
d śūrāṇām udayas tadvat sa āsīt puruṣarṣabha
a tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ nighnatām itaretaram
c mahābalānāṃ balibhir dānavānāṃ yathā suraiḥ
a tato yudhiṣṭhirānīkam uddhūtārṇavanisvanam
c tvadīyam avadhīt sainyaṃ saṃpradrutamahāratham
a tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrubhir bhṛśam arditam
c alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrā iti droṇo 'bhyabhāṣata
d bhāradvājam amarṣaś ca vikramaś ca samāviśat
d samuddhṛtya niṣaṅgāc ca dhanur jyām avamṛjya ca
d mahāśaradhanuṣpāṇir yantāram idam abravīt
d sārathe yāhi yatraiṣa pāṇḍareṇa virājatā
d dhriyamāṇena chattreṇa rājā tiṣṭhati dharmarāṭ
d tad etad dīryate sainyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭram anekadhā
d etat saṃstambhayiṣyāmi prativārya yudhiṣṭhiram
d na hi mām abhivarṣantaṃ saṃyuge tāta pāṇḍavāḥ
d mātsyapāñcālarājānaḥ sarve ca sahasomakāḥ
d arjuno matprasādād dhi mahāstrāṇi samāptavān
d na mām utsahate tāta na bhīmo na ca sātyakiḥ
d matprasādād dhi bībhatsuḥ parameṣvāsatāṃ gataḥ
d mamaivāstraṃ vijānāti dhṛṣṭadyumno 'pi pārṣataḥ
d nāyaṃ saṃrakṣituṃ kālaḥ prāṇāṃs tāta jayaiṣiṇā
d saṃjaya uvāca
d yāhi svargaṃ puraskṛtya yaśase ca jayāya ca
d evaṃ saṃcodito yantā droṇam abhyavahat tataḥ
d tadāśvahṛdayenāśvān abhimantryāśu harṣayan
d rathena savarūthena bhāsvareṇa virājatā
d taṃ karūśāś ca matsyāś ca cedayaś ca sasātvatāḥ
d pāṇḍavāś ca sapāñcālāḥ sahitāḥ paryavārayan
a tataḥ śoṇahayaḥ kruddhaś caturdanta iva dvipaḥ
c praviśya pāṇḍavānīkaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat
a tam avidhyac chitair bāṇaiḥ kaṅkapatrair yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c tasya droṇo dhanuś chittvā taṃ drutaṃ samupādravat
a cakrarakṣaḥ kumāras tu pāñcālānāṃ yaśaskaraḥ
c dadhāra droṇam āyāntaṃ veleva saritāṃ patim
a droṇaṃ nivāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāreṇa dvijarṣabham
c siṃhanādaravo hy āsīt sādhu sādhv iti bhāṣatām
a kumāras tu tato droṇaṃ sāyakena mahāhave
c vivyādhorasi saṃkruddhaḥ siṃhavac cānadan muhuḥ
a saṃvārya tu raṇe droṇaḥ kumāraṃ vai mahābalaḥ
c śarair anekasāhasraiḥ kṛtahasto jitaklamaḥ
a taṃ śūram āryavratinam astrārthakṛtaniśramam
c cakrarakṣam apāmṛdnāt kumāraṃ dvijasattamaḥ
d bāṇair nivārayām āsa paśyatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
a sa madhyaṃ prāpya senāyāḥ sarvāḥ paricaran diśaḥ
c tava sainyasya goptāsīd bhāradvājo ratharṣabhaḥ
a śikhaṇḍinaṃ dvādaśabhir viṃśatyā cottamaujasam
c nakulaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvādaśabhir draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
c sātyakiṃ pañcabhir viddhvā matsyaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a vyakṣobhayad raṇe yodhān yathāmukhyān abhidravan
c abhyavartata saṃprepsuḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
a yugaṃdharas tato rājan bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
c vārayām āsa saṃkruddhaṃ vātoddhūtam ivārṇavam
a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sa viddhvā tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c yugaṃdharaṃ ca bhallena rathanīḍād apāharat
d taṃ vijitya mahātejā bhāradvājo mahāmanāḥ
a tato virāṭadrupadau kekayāḥ sātyakiḥ śibiḥ
c vyāghradattaś ca pāñcālyaḥ siṃhasenaś ca vīryavān
a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ parīpsanto yudhiṣṭhiram
c āvavrus tasya panthānaṃ kirantaḥ sāyakān bahūn
a vyāghradattaś ca pāñcālyo droṇaṃ vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ
c pañcāśadbhiḥ śitai rājaṃs tata uccukruśur janāḥ
a tvaritaṃ siṃhasenas tu droṇaṃ viddhvā mahāratham
c prāhasat sahasā hṛṣṭas trāsayan vai yatavratam
a tato visphārya nayane dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
c talaśabdaṃ mahat kṛtvā droṇas taṃ samupādravat
a tatas tu siṃhasenasya śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṇḍalam
c vyāghradattasya cākramya bhallābhyām aharad balī
a tān pramṛdya śaravrātaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathān
c yudhiṣṭhirasamabhyāśe tasthau mṛtyur ivāntakaḥ
a tato 'bhavan mahāśabdo rājan yaudhiṣṭhire bale
c hṛto rājeti yodhānāṃ samīpasthe yatavrate
a abruvan sainikās tatra dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikramam
c adya rājā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ kṛtārtho vai bhaviṣyati
d asmin muhūrte droṇas tu pāṇḍavaṃ gṛhya harṣitaḥ
e āgamiṣyati no nūnaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya saṃyuge
a evaṃ saṃjalpatāṃ teṣāṃ tāvakānāṃ mahārathaḥ
c āyāj javena kaunteyo rathaghoṣeṇa nādayan
d mā bhaiṣīr iti saṃvārya śarair droṇam avārayat
a śoṇitodāṃ rathāvartāṃ kṛtvā viśasane nadīm
c śūrāsthicayasaṃkīrṇāṃ pretakūlāpahāriṇīm
a tāṃ śaraughamahāphenāṃ prāsamatsyasamākulām
c nadīm uttīrya vegena kurūn vidrāvya pāṇḍavaḥ
a tataḥ kirīṭī sahasā droṇānīkam upādravat
c chādayann iṣujālena mahatā mohayann iva
a śīghram abhyasyato bāṇān saṃdadhānasya cāniśam
c nāntaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cit kaunteyasya yaśasvinaḥ
a na diśo nāntarikṣaṃ ca na dyaur naiva ca medinī
c adṛśyata mahārāja bāṇabhūtam ivābhavat
a nādṛśyata tadā rājaṃs tatra kiṃ cana saṃyuge
c bāṇāndhakāre mahati kṛte gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
a sūrye cāstam anuprāpte rajasā cābhisaṃvṛte
c nājñāyata tadā śatrur na suhṛn na ca kiṃ cana
a tato 'vahāraṃ cakrus te droṇaduryodhanādayaḥ
c tān viditvā bhṛśaṃ trastān ayuddhamanasaḥ parān
a svāny anīkāni bībhatsuḥ śanakair avahārayat
c tato 'bhituṣṭuvuḥ pārthaṃ prahṛṣṭāḥ pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥ
e pāñcālāś ca manojñābhir vāgbhiḥ sūryam ivarṣayaḥ
a evaṃ svaśibiraṃ prāyāj jitvā śatrūn dhanaṃjayaḥ
c pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvasainyānāṃ mudito vai sakeśavaḥ
a masāragalvarkasuvarṇarūpyair
vajrapravālasphaṭikaiś ca mukhyaiḥ
c citre rathe pāṇḍusuto babhāse
nakṣatracitre viyatīva candraḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a te sene śibiraṃ gatvā nyaviśetāṃ viśāṃ pate
c yathābhāgaṃ yathānyāyaṃ yathāgulmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a kṛtvāvahāraṃ sainyānāṃ droṇaḥ paramadurmanāḥ
c duryodhanam abhiprekṣya savrīḍam idam abravīt
a uktam etan mayā pūrvaṃ na tiṣṭhati dhanaṃjaye
c śakyo grahītuṃ saṃgrāme devair api yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a iti tad vaḥ prayatatāṃ kṛtaṃ pārthena saṃyuge
c mātiśaṅkīr vaco mahyam ajeyau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
a apanīte tu yogena kena cic chvetavāhane
c tata eṣyati te rājan vaśam adya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a kaś cid āhvayatāṃ saṃkhye deśam anyaṃ prakarṣatu
c tam ajitvā tu kaunteyo na nivartet kathaṃ cana
a etasminn antare śūnye dharmarājam ahaṃ nṛpa
c grahīṣyāmi camūṃ bhittvā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya paśyataḥ
a arjunena vihīnas tu yadi notsṛjate raṇam
c mām upāyāntam ālokya gṛhītam iti viddhi tam
a evaṃ te sahasā rājan dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
b kṣobhayitvā balaṃ teṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
c samāneṣyāmi sagaṇaṃ vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥ
a yadi tiṣṭhati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api pāṇḍavaḥ
c athāpayāti saṃgrāmād vijayāt tad viśiṣyate
a droṇasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā trigartādhipatis tataḥ
c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a vayaṃ vinikṛtā rājan sadā gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
c anāgaḥsv api cāgaskṛd asmāsu bharatarṣabha
a te vayaṃ smaramāṇās tān vinikārān pṛthagvidhān
c krodhāgninā dahyamānā na śemahi sadā niśāḥ
a sa no divyāstrasaṃpannaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ
c kartāraḥ sma vayaṃ sarvaṃ yac cikīrṣāma hṛdgatam
a bhavataś ca priyaṃ yat syād asmākaṃ ca yaśaskaram
c vayam enaṃ haniṣyāmo nikṛṣyāyodhanād bahiḥ
a adyāstv anarjunā bhūmir atrigartātha vā punaḥ
c satyaṃ te pratijānīmo naitan mithyā bhaviṣyati
a evaṃ satyarathaś coktvā satyadharmā ca bhārata
c satyavarmā ca satyeṣuḥ satyakarmā tathaiva ca
a sahitā bhrātaraḥ pañca rathānām ayutena ca
c nyavartanta mahārāja kṛtvā śapatham āhave
a mālavās tuṇḍikerāś ca rathānām ayutais tribhiḥ
c suśarmā ca naravyāghras trigartaḥ prasthalādhipaḥ
a mācellakair lalitthaiś ca sahito madrakair api
c rathānām ayutenaiva so 'śapad bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
d maladāś ca karūśāś ca daradāś ca mahārathāḥ
d taṅkaṇāś ca parādāś ca yugapatte samāgatāḥ
a nānājanapadebhyaś ca rathānām ayutaṃ punaḥ
c samutthitaṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ saṃśapārtham upāgatam
a tato jvalanam ādāya hutvā sarve pṛthak pṛthak
c jagṛhuḥ kuśacīrāṇi citrāṇi kavacāni ca
a te ca baddhatanutrāṇā ghṛtāktāḥ kuśacīriṇaḥ
c maurvīmekhalino vīrāḥ sahasraśatadakṣiṇāḥ
a yajvānaḥ putriṇo lokyāḥ kṛtakṛtyās tanutyajaḥ
c yokṣyamāṇās tadātmānaṃ yaśasā vijayena ca
a brahmacaryaśrutimukhaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c prāpya lokān suyuddhena kṣipram eva yiyāsavaḥ
a brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayitvā ca niṣkān dattvā pṛthak pṛthak
c gāś ca vāsāṃsi ca punaḥ samābhāṣya parasparam
d dvijamukhyaiḥ samuditaiḥ kṛtasvasty ayanāśiṣaḥ
d muditāś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca jalaṃ saṃspṛśya nirmalam
a prajvālya kṛṣṇavartmānam upāgamya raṇe vratam
c tasminn agnau tadā cakruḥ pratijñāṃ dṛḍhaniścayāḥ
a śṛṇvatāṃ sarvabhūtānām uccair vācaḥ sma menire
c dhṛtvā dhanaṃjayavadhe pratijñāṃ cāpi cakrire
a ye vai lokāś cānṛtānāṃ ye caiva brahmaghātinām
c pānapasya ca ye lokā gurudāraratasya ca
a brahmasvahāriṇaś caiva rājapiṇḍāpahāriṇaḥ
c śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajato yācamānaṃ tathā ghnataḥ
a agāradāhināṃ ye ca ye ca gāṃ nighnatām api
c apacāriṇāṃ ca ye lokā ye ca brahmadviṣām api
a jāyāṃ ca ṛtukāle vai ye mohād abhigacchatām
c śrāddhasaṃgatikānāṃ ca ye cāpy ātmāpahāriṇām
a nyāsāpahāriṇāṃ ye ca śrutaṃ nāśayatāṃ ca ye
c kopena yudhyamānānāṃ ye ca nīcānusāriṇām
a nāstikānāṃ ca ye lokā ye 'gnihorāpitṛtyajām
b satyam ākramatāṃ ye ca pratyādityaṃ pramehatām
c tān āpnuyāmahe lokān ye ca pāpakṛtām api
a yady ahatvā vayaṃ yuddhe nivartema dhanaṃjayam
c tena cābhyarditās trāsād bhavema hi parāṅmukhāḥ
a yadi tv asukaraṃ loke karma kuryāma saṃyuge
c iṣṭān puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān prāpnuyāma na saṃśayaḥ
a evam uktvā tato rājaṃs te 'bhyavartanta saṃyuge
c āhvayanto 'rjunaṃ vīrāḥ pitṛjuṣṭāṃ diśaṃ prati
a āhūtas tair naravyāghraiḥ pārthaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
c dharmarājam idaṃ vākyam apadāntaram abravīt
a āhūto na nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitam
c saṃśaptakāś ca māṃ rājann āhvayanti punaḥ punaḥ
a eṣa ca bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suśarmāhvayate raṇe
c vadhāya sagaṇasyāsya mām anujñātum arhasi
a naitac chaknomi saṃsoḍhum āhvānaṃ puruṣarṣabha
c satyaṃ te pratijānāmi hatān viddhi parān yudhi
d na hy arjuno raṇe rājan mithyā kiṃ cit pravakṣyati
d hatāṃs traigartakān paśya mā sma te kaśmalaṃ bhavet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrutam etat tvayā tāta yad droṇasya cikīrṣitam
c yathā tad anṛtaṃ tasya bhavet tadvat samācara
a droṇo hi balavāñ śūraḥ kṛtāstraś ca jitaśramaḥ
c pratijñātaṃ ca tenaitad grahaṇaṃ me mahāratha
 arjuna uvāca
 sarvathā na nivarteyam āhūto 'haṃ paraṃtapa
 trigarto bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ sa mām āhvayate bhṛśam
 tavāpi tu raṇe rakṣā vihitā me janādhipa
 nirapekṣo gamiṣyāmi vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanām
a ayaṃ vai satyajid rājann adya te rakṣitā yudhi
c dhriyamāṇe hi pāñcālye nācāryaḥ kāmam āpsyati
a hate tu puruṣavyāghre raṇe satyajiti prabho
c sarvair api sametair vā na sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
 saṃjaya uvāca
a anujñātas tato rājñā pariṣvaktaś ca phalgunaḥ
c premṇā dṛṣṭaś ca bahudhā āśiṣā ca prayojitaḥ
a vihāyainaṃ tataḥ pārthas trigartān pratyayād balī
c kṣudhitaḥ kṣudvighātārthaṃ siṃho mṛgagaṇān iva
a tato dauryodhanaṃ sainyaṃ mudā paramayā yutam
c gate 'rjune bhṛśaṃ kruddhaṃ dharmarājasya nigrahe
d grahaṇe dharmarājasya kṛtotsāhaṃ mahāmṛdhe
a tato 'nyonyena te sene samājagmatur ojasā
b vegena śaṅkhān āpūrya harṣayukte mahāsvane
c gaṅgāsarayvor vegena prāvṛṣīvolbaṇodake
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ saṃśaptakā rājan same deśe vyavasthitāḥ
c vyūhyānīkaṃ rathair eva candrārdhākhyaṃ mudānvitāḥ
a te kirīṭinam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣeṇa māriṣa
b atīva saṃprahṛṣṭās te hy upalakṣya dhanaṃjayam
c udakrośan naravyāghrāḥ śabdena mahatā tadā
a sa śabdaḥ pradiśaḥ sarvā diśaḥ khaṃ ca samāvṛṇot
c āvṛtatvāc ca lokasya nāsīt tatra pratisvanaḥ
a atīva saṃprahṛṣṭāṃs tān upalabhya dhanaṃjayaḥ
c kiṃ cid abhyutsmayan kṛṣṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a paśyaitān devakīmātar mumūrṣūn adya saṃyuge
c bhrātṝṃs traigartakān evaṃ roditavye praharṣitān
a atha vā harṣakālo 'yaṃ traigartānām asaṃśayam
c kunarair duravāpān hi lokān prāpsyanty anuttamān
d mayā hatā hi saṃgrāme lokān prāpsyanti puṣkalān
a evam uktvā mahābāhur hṛṣīkeśaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ
c āsasāda raṇe vyūḍhāṃ traigartānām anīkinīm
a sa devadattam ādāya śaṅkhaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam
c dadhmau vegena mahatā phalgunaḥ pūrayan diśaḥ
a tena śabdena vitrastā saṃśaptakavarūthinī
c niśceṣṭāvasthitā saṃkye aśmasāramayī yathā
d sā senā bharataśreṣṭha niśceṣṭā śuśubhe tadā
d citrapaṭṭe yathā nyastā kuśalaiḥ śilpibhir naraiḥ
d svanena tena sainyānāṃ divam āvṛṇvatā tadā
d sasvanā pṛthivī sarvā tathaiva ca mahodadhiḥ
d vyūḍhānīkais tu taiḥ sarvaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ samarārṇave
d svanena sarvasainyānāṃ karṇās tu badhirīkṛtāḥ
a vāhās teṣāṃ vivṛttākṣāḥ stabdhakarṇaśirodharāḥ
c viṣṭabdhacaraṇā mūtraṃ rudhiraṃ ca prasusruvuḥ
d tato vyupāramac chabdaḥ prahṛṣṭās te tato 'bhavan
a upalabhya ca te saṃjñām avasthāpya ca vāhinīm
c yugapat pāṇḍuputrāya cikṣipuḥ kaṅkapatriṇaḥ
a tāny arjunaḥ sahasrāṇi daśa pañcaiva cāśugaiḥ
c anāgatāny eva śaraiś cicchedāśuparākramaḥ
a tato 'rjunaṃ śitair bāṇair daśabhir daśabhiḥ punaḥ
c pratyavidhyaṃs tataḥ pārthas tān avidhyat tribhis tribhiḥ
a ekaikas tu tataḥ pārthaṃ rājan vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
c sa ca tān prativivyādha dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parākramī
a bhūya eva tu saṃrabdhās te 'rjunaṃ sahakeśavam
c āpūrayañ śarais tīkṣṇais taṭākam iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ
a tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi prāpatann arjunaṃ prati
c bhramarāṇām iva vrātāḥ phulladrumagaṇe vane
a tataḥ subāhus triṃśadbhir adrisāramayair dṛḍhaiḥ
c avidhyad iṣubhir gāḍhaṃ kirīṭe savyasācinam
a taiḥ kirīṭī kirīṭasthair hemapuṅkhair ajihmagaiḥ
c śātakumbhamayāpīḍo babhau yūpa ivocchritaḥ
a hastāvāpaṃ subāhos tu bhallena yudhi pāṇḍavaḥ
c ciccheda taṃ caiva punaḥ śaravarṣair avākirat
a tataḥ suśarmā daśabhiḥ surathaś ca kirīṭinam
c sudharmā sudhanuś caiva subāhuś ca samarpayan
a tāṃs tu sarvān pṛthag bāṇair vānarapravaradhvajaḥ
c pratyavidhyad dhvajāṃś caiṣāṃ bhallaiś ciccheda kāñcanān
a sudhanvano dhanuś chittvā hayān vai nyavadhīc charaiḥ
c athāsya saśirastrāṇaṃ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
d jahāra pārthaḥ sainyeṣu sahasre dve ca yodhinām
a tasmiṃs tu patite vīre trastās tasya padānugāḥ
b bhūyiṣṭhaṃ pratiruddhās te hatair yodhair yaśasvinaḥ
c vyadravanta bhayād bhītā yena dauryodhanaṃ balam
a tato jaghāna saṃkruddho vāsavis tāṃ mahācamūm
c śarajālair avicchinnais tamaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
a tato bhagne bale tasmin viprayāte samantataḥ
c savyasācini saṃkruddhe traigartān bhayam āviśat
a te vadhyamānāḥ pārthena śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c amuhyaṃs tatra tatraiva trastā mṛgagaṇā iva
a tatas trigartarāṭ kruddhas tān uvāca mahārathān
c alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrā na bhayaṃ kartum arhatha
a śaptvā tu śapathān ghorān sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
c gatvā dauryodhanaṃ sainyaṃ kiṃ vai vakṣyatha mukhyagāḥ
a nāvahāsyāḥ kathaṃ loke karmaṇānena saṃyuge
c bhavema sahitāḥ sarve nivartadhvaṃ yathābalam
a evam uktās tu te rājann udakrośan muhur muhuḥ
c śaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmire vīrā harṣayantaḥ parasparam
a tatas te saṃnyavartanta saṃśaptakagaṇāḥ punaḥ
c nārāyaṇāś ca gopālāḥ kṛtvā mṛtyuṃ nivartanam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a dṛṣṭvā tu saṃnivṛttāṃs tān saṃśaptakagaṇān punaḥ
c vāsudevaṃ mahātmānam arjunaḥ samabhāṣata
a codayāśvān hṛṣīkeśa saṃśaptakagaṇān prati
c naite hāsyanti saṃgrāmaṃ jīvanta iti me matiḥ
a paśya me 'strabalaṃ ghoraṃ bāhvor iṣvasanasya ca
c adyaitān pātayiṣyāmi kruddho rudraḥ paśūn iva
a tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pariṇandya śivena tam
b evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ bībhatsuṃ keśavaḥ śatruvāhinīm
c prāveśayata durdharṣo yatra yatraicchad arjunaḥ
a babhrāje sa ratho 'tyartham uhyamāno raṇe tadā
c uhyamānam ivākāśe vimānaṃ pāṇḍurair hayaiḥ
a maṇḍalāni tataś cakre gatapratyāgatāni ca
c yathā śakraratho rājan yuddhe devāsure purā
a atha nārāyaṇāḥ kruddhā vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥ
c chādayantaḥ śaravrātaiḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayam
a adṛśyaṃ ca muhūrtena cakrus te bharatarṣabha
c kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ yuddhe kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayam
a kruddhas tu phalgunaḥ saṃkhye dviguṇīkṛtavikramaḥ
c gāṇḍīvam upasaṃmṛjya tūrṇaṃ jagrāha saṃyuge
a baddhvā ca bhṛkuṭīṃ vaktre krodhasya pratilakṣaṇam
c devadattaṃ mahāśaṅkhaṃ pūrayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
a athāstram arisaṃghaghnaṃ tvāṣṭram abhyasyad arjunaḥ
c tato rūpasahasrāṇi prādurāsan pṛthak pṛthak
a ātmanaḥ pratirūpais tair nānārūpair vimohitāḥ
c anyonyam arjunaṃ matvā svam ātmānaṃ ca jaghnire
a ayam arjuno 'yaṃ govinda imau yādavapāṇḍavau
c iti bruvāṇāḥ saṃmūḍhā jaghnur anyonyam āhave
d anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tāvakā bharatarṣabha
a mohitāḥ paramāstreṇa kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ parasparam
b rudhirokṣitagātrās te prekṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
c aśobhanta raṇe yodhāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ
d rudhirotpīḍanās te tu rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ
d candanasya raseneva vyabhrājanta raṇājire
d tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ bhṛśam
d nyahanat tāñ śarais tīkṣṇais tamaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
d hatāvaśiṣṭās te bhūyaḥ parivārya dhanaṃjayam
d sāśvadhvajarathaṃ cakrur adṛśyaṃ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
a tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi tair vimuktāni bhasmasāt
c kṛtvā tad astraṃ tān vīrān anayad yamasādanam
a atha prahasya bībhatsur lalitthān mālavān api
c mācellakāṃs trigartāṃś ca yaudheyāṃś cārdayac charaiḥ
a te vadhyamānā vīreṇa kṣatriyāḥ kālacoditāḥ
c vyasṛjañ śaravarṣāṇi pārthe nānāvidhāni ca
a tato naivārjunas tatra na ratho na ca keśavaḥ
c pratyadṛśyata ghoreṇa śaravarṣeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
a tatas te labdhalakṣyatvād anyonyam abhicukruśuḥ
c hatau kṛṣṇāv iti prītā vāsāṃsy ādudhuvus tadā
a bherīmṛdaṅgaśaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmur vīrāḥ sahasraśaḥ
c siṃhanādaravāṃś cogrāṃś cakrire tatra māriṣa
a tataḥ prasiṣvide kṛṣṇaḥ khinnaś cārjunam abravīt
c kvāsi pārtha na paśye tvāṃ kaccij jīvasi śatruhan
a tasya taṃ mānuṣaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvajño ''jñāya pāṇḍavaḥ
c vāyavyāstreṇa tair astāṃ śaravṛṣṭim apāharat
a tataḥ saṃśaptakavrātān sāśvadviparathāyudhān
c uvāha bhagavān vāyuḥ śuṣkaparṇacayān iva
a uhyamānās tu te rājan bahv aśobhanta vāyunā
c praḍīnāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ kāle vṛkṣebhya iva māriṣa
a tāṃs tathā vyākulīkṛtya tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥ
c jaghāna niśitair bāṇaiḥ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
a śirāṃsi bhallair aharad bāhūn api ca sāyudhān
c hastihastopamāṃś corūñ śarair urvyām apātayat
a pṛṣṭhacchinnān vicaraṇān vimastiṣkekṣaṇāṅgulīn
c nānāṅgāvayavair hīnāṃś cakārārīn dhanaṃjayaḥ
a gandharvanagarākārān vidhivat kalpitān rathān
c śarair viśakalīkurvaṃś cakre vyaśvarathadvipān
a muṇḍatālavanānīva tatra tatra cakāśire
c chinnadhvajarathavrātāḥ ke cit ke cit kva cit kva cit
a sottarāyudhino nāgāḥ sapatākāṅkuśāyudhāḥ
c petuḥ śakrāśanihatā drumavanta ivācalāḥ
a cāmarāpīḍakavacāḥ srastāntranayanāsavaḥ
c sārohās turagāḥ petuḥ pārthabāṇahatāḥ kṣitau
a vipraviddhāsinakharāś chinnavarmarṣṭiśaktayaḥ
c pattayaś chinnavarmāṇaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ śerate hatāḥ
