a śikhaṇḍinaṃ dvādaśabhir viṃśatyā cottamaujasam
c vasudānaṃ ca bhallena preṣayad yamasādanam
a aśītyā kṣatravarmāṇaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatyā sudakṣiṇam
c kṣatradevaṃ tu bhallena rathanīḍād apāharat
a yudhāmanyuṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā triṃśatā caiva sātyakim
c viddhvā rukmarathas tūrṇaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat
a tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kṣipraṃ kitavo rājasattamaḥ
c apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ pāñcālyo droṇam abhyayāt
a taṃ droṇaḥ sadhanuṣkaṃ tu sāśvayantāram akṣiṇot
c sa hataḥ prāpatad bhūmau rathāj jyotir ivāmbarāt
d taṃ hatvā vibabhau droṇaḥ kurubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
a tasmin hate rājaputre pāñcālānāṃ yaśaskare
c hata droṇaṃ hata droṇam ity āsīt tumulaṃ mahat
a tāṃs tathā bhṛśasaṃkruddhān pāñcālān matsyakekayān
c sṛñjayān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva droṇo vyakṣobhayad balī
a sātyakiṃ cekitānaṃ ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaśikhaṇḍinau
c vārdhakṣemiṃ citrasenaṃ senābinduṃ suvarcasam
a etāṃś cānyāṃś ca subahūn nānājanapadeśvarān
c sarvān droṇo 'jayad yuddhe kurubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
a tāvakās tu mahārāja jayaṃ labdhvā mahāhave
c pāṇḍaveyān raṇe jaghnur dravamāṇān samantataḥ
d vārdhakṣemis tu vārṣṇeyo droṇaṃ viddhvā śarottamaiḥ
d navabhiś cāvanīpālaḥ punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
d citrasenas tato droṇaṃ pāñcālas tv ardayac charaiḥ
d punar vivyādha saṃkruddhaḥ senābinduś ca pañcabhiḥ
d suvarmā pañcabhiś caiva dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pañcabhiḥ
d śikhaṇḍī navabhir bāṇaiś cekitānaś ca pañcabhiḥ
d sātyakiś ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā rājan vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
d sucitro daśabhir bāṇair droṇaṃ viddhvānadad balī
d taṃ droṇaḥ samare rājañ śaravarṣair avākirat
d apātayat tato droṇaḥ sucitraṃ sahasārathim
d sāśvaś ca samare rājan hato vai prāpatat kṣitau
d pātyamāno mahārāja babhau jyotir ivāmbarāt
a te dānavā ivendreṇa vadhyamānā mahātmanā
c pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ samakampanta bhārata
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a bhāradvājena bhagneṣu pāṇḍaveṣu mahāmṛdhe
c pāñcāleṣu ca sarveṣu kaś cid anyo 'bhyavartata
a āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā kṣatriyāṇāṃ yaśaskarīm
c asevitāṃ kāpuruṣaiḥ sevitāṃ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ
a sa hi vīro naraḥ sūta yo bhagneṣu nivartate
c aho nāsīt pumān kaś cid dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ vyavasthitam
a jṛmbhamāṇam iva vyāghraṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
c tyajantam āhave prāṇān saṃnaddhaṃ citrayodhinam
a maheṣvāsaṃ naravyāghraṃ dviṣatām aghavardhanam
c kṛtajñaṃ satyanirataṃ duryodhanahitaiṣiṇam
a bhāradvājaṃ tathānīke dṛṣṭvā śūram avasthitam
c ke vīrāḥ saṃnyavartanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tān dṛṣṭvā calitān saṃkhye praṇunnān droṇasāyakaiḥ
c pāñcālān pāṇḍavān matsyān sṛñjayāṃś cedikekayān
a droṇacāpavimuktena śaraugheṇāsuhāriṇā
c sindhor iva mahaughena hriyamāṇān yathā plavān
a kauravāḥ siṃhanādena nānāvādyasvanena ca
c rathadvipanarāśvaiś ca sarvataḥ paryavārayan
a tān paśyan sainyamadhyastho rājā svajanasaṃvṛtaḥ
c duryodhano 'bravīt karṇaṃ prahṛṣṭaḥ prahasann iva
a paśya rādheya pāñcālān praṇunnān droṇasāyakaiḥ
c siṃheneva mṛgān vanyāṃs trāsitān dṛḍhadhanvanā
a naite jātu punar yuddham īheyur iti me matiḥ
c yathā tu bhagnā droṇena vāteneva mahādrumāḥ
a ardyamānāḥ śarair ete rukmapuṅkhair mahātmanā
c pathā naikena gacchanti ghūrṇamānās tatas tataḥ
a saṃniruddhāś ca kauravyair droṇena ca mahātmanā
c ete 'nye maṇḍalībhūtāḥ pāvakeneva kuñjarāḥ
a bhramarair iva cāviṣṭā droṇasya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c anyonyaṃ samalīyanta palāyanaparāyaṇāḥ
a eṣa bhīmo dṛḍhakrodho hīnaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayaiḥ
c madīyair āvṛto yodhaiḥ karṇa tarjayatīva mām
a vyaktaṃ droṇamayaṃ lokam adya paśyati durmatiḥ
c nirāśo jīvitān nūnam adya rājyāc ca pāṇḍavaḥ
 karṇa uvāca
a naiṣa jātu mahābāhur jīvann āhavam utsṛjet
c na cemān puruṣavyāghra siṃhanādān viśakṣyate
a na cāpi pāṇḍavā yuddhe bhajyerann iti me matiḥ
c śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
a viṣāgnidyūtasaṃkleśān vanavāsaṃ ca pāṇḍavāḥ
c smaramāṇā na hāsyanti saṃgrāmam iti me matiḥ
a nikṛto hi mahābāhur amitaujā vṛkodaraḥ
c varān varān hi kaunteyo rathodārān haniṣyati
a asinā dhanuṣā śaktyā hayair nāgair narai rathaiḥ
c āyasena ca daṇḍena vrātān vrātān haniṣyati
a tam ete cānuvartante sātyakipramukhā rathāḥ
c pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca viśeṣataḥ
a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca vikrāntāś ca mahārathāḥ
c viśeṣataś ca bhīmena saṃrabdhenābhicoditāḥ
d eṣa cāpi mahābāhur himavān iva susthiraḥ
d vadhiṣyati mahārāja gadayā bhīmavegayā
a te droṇam abhivartante sarvataḥ kurupuṃgavāḥ
c vṛkodaraṃ parīpsantaḥ sūryam abhragaṇā iva
d samareṣu tu nirdiṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇabāṃdhavāḥ
d hrīmantaḥ śatrumaraṇe nipuṇāḥ puṇyalakṣaṇāḥ
d bahavaḥ pārthivā rājaṃs teṣāṃ vaśagatā raṇe
d māvamaṃsthāḥ pāṇḍavāṃs tvaṃ nārāyaṇapurogamān
a ekāyanagatā hy ete pīḍayeyur yatavratam
c arakṣyamāṇaṃ śalabhā yathā dīpaṃ mumūrṣavaḥ
e asaṃśayaṃ kṛtāstrāś ca paryāptāś cāpi vāraṇe
a atibhāraṃ tv ahaṃ manye bhāradvāje samāhitam
c te śīghram anugacchāmo yatra droṇo vyavasthitaḥ
e kākā iva mahānāgaṃ mā vai hanyur yatavratam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a rādheyasya vacaḥ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan prāyād droṇarathaṃ prati
a tatrārāvo mahān āsīd ekaṃ droṇaṃ jighāṃsatām
c pāṇḍavānāṃ nivṛttānāṃ nānāvarṇair hayottamaiḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a sarveṣām eva me brūhi rathacihnāni saṃjaya
b tān ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa pṛthak pṛthak
b dūyate me manas tāta droṇaṃ prati paraṃtapa
b śrutvā bhīṣmasya nidhanaṃ tadvad etad bhaviṣyati
c ye droṇam abhyavartanta kruddhā bhīmapurogamāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a ṛśyavarṇair hayair dṛṣṭvā vyāyacchantaṃ vṛkodaram
c rajatāśvas tataḥ śūraḥ śaineyaḥ saṃnyavartata
d sāraṅgaiś ca yudhāmanyur uhyamāno hayottamaiḥ
d paryavartata durdharṣaḥ kruddho droṇarathaṃ prati
d pārāvatasavarṇais tu hemabhāṇḍair mahājavaiḥ
d pāñcālarājasya suto dhṛṣṭadyumno 'bhyavartata
d pitaraṃ tu pariprepsuḥ kṣatradharmā yatavrataḥ
d siddhiṃ cāsya parāṃ kāṃkṣañ śoṇākṣaḥ saṃnyavartata
d padmapatranibhaiś cāśvair mallikākṣair alaṃkṛtaiḥ
d śikhaṇḍī kṣatradevaś ca svayaṃ pratvarayan yayau
a darśanīyās tu kāmbojāḥ śukapatraparicchadāḥ
c vahanto nakulaṃ śīghraṃ tāvakān abhidudruvuḥ
a kṛṣṇās tu meghasaṃkāśāḥ sahadevam udāyudham
a   prāvahann uttamaujasam
a durdharṣāyābhisaṃdhāya kruddhaṃ kruddhāya bhārata
a tathā tittirikalmāṣā hayā vātasamā jave
a avahaṃs tumule yuddhe
b dantavarṇās tu rājānaṃ kālavālā yudhiṣṭhiram
c bhīmavegā naravyāghram avahan vātaraṃhasaḥ
a hemottamapraticchannair hayair vātasamair jave
c abhyavartanta sainyāni sarvāṇy eva yudhiṣṭhiram
a rājñas tv anantaraṃ rājā pāñcālyo drupado 'bhavat
c jātarūpamayacchatraḥ sarvaiḥ svair abhirakṣitaḥ
a lalāmair haribhir yuktaiḥ sarvaśabdakṣamair yudhi
c rājñāṃ madhye maheṣvāsaḥ śāntabhīr abhyavartata
a taṃ virāṭo 'nvayāt paścāt saha śūrair mahārathaiḥ
c kekayāś ca śikhaṇḍī ca dhṛṣṭaketus tathaiva ca
e svaiḥ svaiḥ sainyaiḥ parivṛtā matsyarājānam anvayuḥ
a te tu pāṭalapuṣpāṇāṃ samavarṇā hayottamāḥ
c vahamānā vyarājanta matsyasyāmitraghātinaḥ
a hāridrasamavarṇās tu javanā hemamālinaḥ
c putraṃ virāṭarājasya satvarāḥ samudāvahan
a indragopakavarṇais tu bhrātaraḥ pañca kekayāḥ
c jātarūpasamābhāsaḥ sarve lohitakadhvajāḥ
a te hemamālinaḥ śūrāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
c varṣanta iva jīmūtāḥ pratyadṛśyanta daṃśitāḥ
a āmapātranibhākārāḥ pāñcālyam amitaujasam
c dāntās tāmrāruṇā yuktāḥ śikhaṇḍinam udāvahan
a tathā dvādaśasāhasrāḥ pāñcālānāṃ mahārathāḥ
c teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi ye śikhaṇḍinam anvayuḥ
a putraṃ tu śiśupālasya narasiṃhasya māriṣa
c ākrīḍanto vahanti sma sāraṅgaśabalā hayāḥ
a dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedīnām ṛṣabho 'tibaloditaḥ
c kāmbojaiḥ śabalair aśvair abhyavartata durjayaḥ
a bṛhatkṣatraṃ tu kaikeyaṃ sukumāraṃ hayottamāḥ
c palāladhūmavarṇābhāḥ saindhavāḥ śīghram āvahan
a mallikākṣāḥ padmavarṇā bāhlijātāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
c śūraṃ śikhaṇḍinaḥ putraṃ kṣatradevam udāvahan
d rukmabhāṇḍapraticchannāḥ kauśeyasadṛśā hayāḥ
d kṣamāvanto 'vahan saṃkhye senābindum araṭṭajāḥ
a yuvānam avahan yuddhe krauñcavarṇā hayottamāḥ
c kāśyasyābhibhuvaḥ putraṃ sukumāraṃ mahāratham
a śvetās tu prativindhyaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇagrīvā manojavāḥ
c yantuḥ preṣyakarā rājan rājaputram udāvahan
d yuvānam avahan yuddhe yantuḥ preṣyakarāḥ hayāḥ
a sutasomaṃ tu yaṃ dhaumyāt pārthaḥ putram ayācata
c māṣapuṣpasavarṇās tam avahan vājino raṇe
a sahasrasomapratimā babhūvuḥ
pure kurūṇām udayendunāmni
c tasmiñ jātaḥ somasaṃkrandamadhye
yasmāt tasmāt sutasomo 'bhavat saḥ
d sahasrasomapratimā hayāḥ kanakabhūṣaṇāḥ
d vīraṃ tam avahan yuddhe heṣamāṇāḥ samantataḥ
a nākuliṃ tu śatānīkaṃ śālapuṣpanibhā hayāḥ
c ādityataruṇaprakhyāḥ ślāghanīyam udāvahan
a kāñcanapratimair yoktrair mayūragrīvasaṃnibhāḥ
c draupadeyaṃ naravyāghraṃ śrutakarmāṇam āvahan
a śrutakīrtiṃ śrutanidhiṃ draupadeyaṃ hayottamāḥ
c ūhuḥ pārthasamaṃ yuddhe cāṣapatranibhā hayāḥ
a yam āhur adhyardhaguṇaṃ kṛṣṇāt pārthāc ca saṃyuge
c abhimanyuṃ piśaṅgās taṃ kumāram avahan raṇe
a ekas tu dhārtarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pāṇḍavān yaḥ samāśritaḥ
c taṃ bṛhanto mahākāyā yuyutsum avahan raṇe
a palālakāṇḍavarṇās tu vārdhakṣemiṃ tarasvinam
c ūhuḥ sutumule yuddhe hayā hṛṣṭāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
a kumāraṃ śitipādās tu rukmapatrair uraśchadaiḥ
c saucittim avahan yuddhe yantuḥ preṣyakarā hayāḥ
a rukmapṛṣṭhāvakīrṇās tu kauśeyasadṛśā hayāḥ
c suvarṇamālinaḥ kṣāntāḥ śreṇimantam udāvahan
a rukmamālādharāḥ śūrā hemavarṇāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
c kāśirājaṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ ślāghanīyam udāvahan
a astrāṇāṃ ca dhanurvede brāhme vede ca pāragam
c taṃ satyadhṛtim āyāntam aruṇāḥ samudāvahan
a yaḥ sa pāñcālasenānīr droṇam aṃśam akalpayat
c pārāvatasavarṇāśvā dhṛṣṭadyumnam udāvahan
a tam anvayāt satyadhṛtiḥ saucittir yuddhadurmadaḥ
c śreṇimān vasudānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibho
a yuktaiḥ paramakāmbojair javanair hemamālibhiḥ
c bhīṣayanto dviṣatsainyaṃ yamavaiśravaṇopamāḥ
a prabhadrakās tu pāñcālāḥ ṣaṭ sahasrāṇy udāyudhāḥ
c nānāvarṇair hayaśreṣṭhair hemacitrarathadhvajāḥ
a śaravrātair vidhunvantaḥ śatrūn vitatakārmukāḥ
c samānamṛtyavo bhūtvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samanvayuḥ
a babhrukauśeyavarṇās tu suvarṇavaramālinaḥ
c ūhur aglānamanasaś cekitānaṃ hayottamāḥ
a indrāyudhasavarṇais tu kuntibhojo hayottamaiḥ
c āyāt suvaśyaiḥ purujin mātulaḥ savyasācinaḥ
a antarikṣasavarṇās tu tārakācitritā iva
c rājānaṃ rocamānaṃ te hayāḥ saṃkhye samāvahan
a karburāḥ śitipādās tu svarṇajālaparicchadāḥ
c jārāsaṃdhiṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ sahadevam udāvahan
a ye tu puṣkaranālasya samavarṇā hayottamāḥ
c jave śyenasamāś citrāḥ sudāmānam udāvahan
a śaśalohitavarṇās tu pāṇḍurodgatarājayaḥ
c pāñcālyaṃ gopateḥ putraṃ siṃhasenam udāvahan
a pāñcālānāṃ naravyāghro yaḥ khyāto janamejayaḥ
c tasya sarṣapapuṣpāṇāṃ tulyavarṇā hayottamāḥ
a māṣavarṇās tu javanā bṛhanto hemamālinaḥ
c dadhipṛṣṭhāś candramukhāḥ pāñcālyam avahan drutam
a śūrāś ca bhadrakāś caiva śarakāṇḍanibhā hayāḥ
c padmakiñjalkavarṇābhā daṇḍadhāram udāvahan
d rāsabhāruṇavarṇābhāḥ pṛṣṭhato mūṣakaprabhāḥ
d valganta iva saṃyattā vyāghradantam udāvahan
d harayaḥ kālakāś citrāś citramālyavibhūṣitāḥ
d sudhanvānaṃ naravyāghra pāñcālyaṃ samudāvahan
d indrāśanisamasparśā indragopakasaṃnibhāḥ
d kośaiś citrāntarāś citrāś citrāyudham udāvahan
a bibhrato hemamālāś ca cakravākodarā hayāḥ
c kosalādhipateḥ putraṃ sukṣatraṃ vājino 'vahan
a śabalās tu bṛhanto 'śvā dāntā jāmbūnadasrajaḥ
c yuddhe satyadhṛtiṃ kṣaimim avahan prāṃśavaḥ śubhāḥ
a ekavarṇena sarveṇa dhvajena kavacena ca
c aśvaiś ca dhanuṣā caiva śuklaiḥ śuklo nyavartata
a samudrasenaputraṃ tu sāmudrā rudratejasam
c aśvāḥ śaśāṅkasadṛśāś candradevam udāvahan
a nīlotpalasavarṇās tu tapanīyavibhūṣitāḥ
c śaibyaṃ citrarathaṃ yuddhe citramālyāvahan hayāḥ
a kalāyapuṣpavarṇās tu śvetalohitarājayaḥ
c rathasenaṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ samūhur yuddhadurmadam
a yaṃ tu sarvamanuṣyebhyaḥ prāhuḥ śūrataraṃ nṛpam
c taṃ paṭaccarahantāraṃ śukavarṇāvahan hayāḥ
a citrāyudhaṃ citramālyaṃ citravarmāyudhadhvajam
c ūhuḥ kiṃśukapuṣpāṇāṃ tulyavarṇā hayottamāḥ
a ekavarṇena sarveṇa dhvajena kavacena ca
c dhanuṣā rathavāhaiś ca nīlair nīlo 'bhyavartata
a nānārūpai ratnacitrair varūthadhvajakārmukaiḥ
c vājidhvajapatākābhiś citraiś citro 'bhyavartata
a ye tu puṣkarapatrasya tulyavarṇā hayottamāḥ
c te rocamānasya sutaṃ hemavarṇam udāvahan
a yodhāś ca bhadrakārāś ca śaradaṇḍānudaṇḍajāḥ
c śvetāṇḍāḥ kukkuṭāṇḍābhā daṇḍaketum udāvahan
d keśavena hate saṃkhye pitary atha narādhipe
d bhinne kapāṭe pāṇḍyānāṃ vidruteṣu ca bandhuṣu
d bhīṣmād avāpya cāstrāṇi droṇād rāmāt kṛpāt tathā
d astraiḥ samatvaṃ saṃprāpya rukmikarṇārjunācyutaiḥ
d iyeṣa dvārakāṃ hantuṃ kṛtsnāṃ jetuṃ ca medinīm
d nivāritas tataḥ prājñaiḥ suhṛdbhir hitakāmyayā
d vairānubandham utsṛjya svarājyam anuśāsti yaḥ
d sasāgaradhvajaḥ pāṇḍyaś candraraśminibhair hayaiḥ
d vaiḍūryajālasaṃchannair vīryadraviṇam āśritaḥ
d divyaṃ visphārayaṃś cāpaṃ droṇam abhyapatad balī
a āṭarūṣakapuṣpābhā hayāḥ pāṇḍyānuyāyinām
c avahan rathamukhyānām ayutāni caturdaśa
a nānārūpeṇa varṇena nānākṛtimukhā hayāḥ
c rathacakradhvajaṃ vīraṃ ghaṭotkacam udāvahan
d bharatānāṃ sametānām utsṛjyaiko matāni yaḥ
d gato yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhaktyā tyaktvā sarvasvam īhitam
d lohitākṣaṃ mahābāhuṃ bṛhantaṃ taṃ varadhvajam
d mahāsattvā mahākāyā sauvarṇe syandane sthitam
d nānādhvajapatākena nānākavacavājinā
a suvarṇavarṇā dharmajñam anīkasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c rājaśreṣṭhaṃ hayaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ
e varṇaiś coccāvacair divyaiḥ sadaśvānāṃ prabhadrakāḥ
f saṃnyavartanta yuddhāya bahavo devarūpiṇaḥ

d taṃ tuṣṭaḥ pradadau rāmaḥ saubhadrāya mahātmane
d ete cānye ca bahavo dhvajā hemavibhūṣaṇāḥ

c abhinat kuñjarānīkam acireṇaiva māriṣa
d tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pradṛptāni bahūni ca
a te gajā girisaṃkāśāḥ kṣarantaḥ sarvato madam
c bhīmasenasya nārācair vimukhā vimadīkṛtāḥ
a vidhamed abhrajālāni yathā vāyuḥ samantataḥ
c vyadhamat tāny anīkāni tathaiva pavanātmajaḥ
a sa teṣu visṛjan bāṇān bhīmo nāgeṣv aśobhata
c bhuvaneṣv iva sarveṣu gabhastīn udito raviḥ
a te bhīmabāṇaiḥ śataśaḥ saṃsyūtā vibabhur gajāḥ
c gabhastibhir ivārkasya vyomni nānābalāhakāḥ
a tathā gajānāṃ kadanaṃ kurvāṇam anilātmajam
c kruddho duryodhano 'bhyetya pratyavidhyac chitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a tataḥ kṣaṇena kṣitipaṃ kṣatajapratimekṣaṇaḥ
c kṣayaṃ ninīṣur niśitair bhīmo vivyādha patribhiḥ
a sa śarārpitasarvāṅgaḥ kruddho vivyādha pāṇḍavam
c nārācair arkaraśmyābhair bhīmasenaṃ smayann iva
a tasya nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ ratnacitraṃ dhvaje sthitam
c bhallābhyāṃ kārmukaṃ caiva kṣipraṃ ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
a duryodhanaṃ pīḍyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmena māriṣa
c cukṣobhayiṣur abhyāgād aṅgo mātaṅgam āsthitaḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ mātaṅgam ambudapratimasvanam
c kumbhāntare bhīmaseno nārācenārdayad bhṛśam
a tasya kāyaṃ vinirbhidya mamajja dharaṇītale
c tataḥ papāta dvirado vajrāhata ivācalaḥ
a tasyāvarjitanāgasya mlecchasyāvapatiṣyataḥ
c śiraś ciccheda bhallena kṣiprakārī vṛkodaraḥ
a tasmin nipatite vīre saṃprādravata sā camūḥ
c saṃbhrāntāśvadviparathā padātīn avamṛdnatī
a teṣv anīkeṣu sarveṣu vidravatsu samantataḥ
c prāgjyotiṣas tato bhīmaṃ kuñjareṇa samādravat
a yena nāgena maghavān ajayad daityadānavān
b tadanvayena nāgena bhīmasenam upādravat
c sa nāgapravaro bhīmaṃ sahasā samupādravat
a śravaṇābhyām atho padbhyāṃ saṃhatena kareṇa ca
c vyāvṛttanayanaḥ kruddhaḥ pradahann iva pāṇḍavam
d vṛkodararathaṃ sāśvam aviśeṣam acūrṇayat
d padbhyāṃ bhīmo 'py atho dhāvaṃs tasya gātreṣv alīyata
d jānann añjalikāvedhaṃ nāpākrāmata pāṇḍavaḥ
d gātrābhyantarago bhūtvā kareṇātāḍayan muhuḥ
d lālayām āsa taṃ nāgaṃ vadhākāṅkṣiṇam avyayam
d kulālacakravan nāgas tadā tūrṇam athābhramat
d nāgāyutabalaḥ śrīmān kālayāno vṛkodaram
d bhīmo 'pi niṣkramya tataḥ supratīkāgrato 'bhavat
d bhīmaṃ kareṇāvanamya jānubhyām abhyapātayat
d grīvāyāṃ veṣṭayitvainaṃ sa gajo hantum aihata
d karaveṣṭaṃ bhīmaseno bhramaṃ dattvā vyamocayat
d punar gātrāṇi nāgasya praviveśa vṛkodaraḥ
d yāvat pratigajāyātaṃ svabalastham avaikṣata
d bhīmo 'pi nāgagātrebhyo viniḥsṛtyāpayāj javāt
a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya nādaḥ samabhavan mahān
c hā hā vinihato bhīmaḥ kuñjareṇeti māriṣa
a tena nādena vitrastā pāṇḍavānām anīkinī
c sahasābhyadravad rājan yatra tasthau vṛkodaraḥ
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā hataṃ matvā vṛkodaram
c bhagadattaṃ sapāñcālaḥ sarvataḥ samavārayat
d bhīmo 'pi dorbhyāṃ nāgendraṃ nipīḍyāmocayad balī
a taṃ rathai rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ parivārya samantataḥ
c avākirañ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a sa vighātaṃ pṛṣatkānām aṅkuśena samācaran
c gajena pāṇḍupāñcālān vyadhamat parvateśvaraḥ
a tad adbhutam apaśyāma bhagadattasya saṃyuge
c tathā vṛddhasya caritaṃ kuñjareṇa viśāṃ pate
a tato rājā daśārṇānāṃ prāgjyotiṣam upādravat
c tiryagyātena nāgena samadenāśugāminā
a tayor yuddhaṃ samabhavan nāgayor bhīmarūpayoḥ
c sapakṣayoḥ parvatayor yathā sadrumayoḥ purā
a prāgjyotiṣapater nāgaḥ saṃnipatyāpavṛtya ca
b prāgjyotiṣānādhipater gatvā nāgam abodhayat
c pārśve daśārṇādhipater bhittvā nāgam apātayat
a tomaraiḥ sūryaraśmyābhair bhagadatto 'tha saptabhiḥ
c jaghāna dviradasthaṃ taṃ śatruṃ pracalitāsanam
d tato yudhiṣṭhiro dṛṣṭvā daśārṇādhipatiṃ hatam
d mahatā rathavaṃśena prāgjyotiṣam abhidravat
a upasṛtya tu rājānaṃ bhagadattaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c rathānīkena mahatā sarvataḥ paryavārayat
a sa kuñjarastho rathibhiḥ śuśubhe sarvato vṛtaḥ
c parvate vanamadhyastho jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
a maṇḍalaṃ sarvataḥ śliṣṭaṃ rathinām ugradhanvinām
c kiratāṃ śaravarṣāṇi sa nāgaḥ paryavartata
a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā parigṛhya dviparṣabham
c preṣayām āsa sahasā yuyudhānarathaṃ prati
d āpatantaṃ tu saṃprekṣya nāgaṃ sātvatapuṃgavaḥ
d avidhyat pañcabhir bāṇaiḥ śitair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
d so 'tividdho balavatā satyakena viśāṃ pate
d vyavartata paritrāsān maṇḍalāni śarārditaḥ
a śineḥ pautrasya tu rathaṃ parigṛhya mahādvipaḥ
c abhicikṣepa vegena yuyudhānas tv apākramat
a bṛhataḥ saindhavān aśvān samutthāpya tu sārathiḥ
c tasthau sātyakim āsādya saṃplutas taṃ rathaṃ punaḥ
a sa tu labdhvāntaraṃ nāgas tvarito rathamaṇḍalāt
c niścakrāma tataḥ sarvān paricikṣepa pārthivān
a te tv āśugatinā tena trāsyamānā nararṣabhāḥ
c tam ekaṃ dviradaṃ saṃkhye menire śataśo nṛpāḥ
a te gajasthena kālyante bhagadattena pāṇḍavāḥ
c airāvatasthena yathā devarājena dānavāḥ
a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ pāñcālānām itas tataḥ
c gajavājikṛtaḥ śabdaḥ sumahān samajāyata
a bhagadattena samare kālyamāneṣu pāṇḍuṣu
c prāgjyotiṣam abhikruddhaḥ punar bhīmaḥ samabhyayāt
a tasyābhidravato vāhān hastamuktena vāriṇā
c siktvā vyatrāsayan nāgas te pārtham aharaṃs tataḥ
a tatas tam abhyayāt tūrṇaṃ ruciparvākṛtīsutaḥ
c samukṣañ śaravarṣeṇa rathastho 'ntakasaṃnibhaḥ
a tato ruciraparvāṇaṃ śareṇa nataparvaṇā
c suparvā parvatapatir ninye vaivasvatakṣayam
a tasmin nipatite vīre saubhadro draupadīsutāḥ
c cekitāno dhṛṣṭaketur yuyutsuś cārdayan dvipam
a ta enaṃ śaradhārābhir dhārābhir iva toyadāḥ
c siṣicur bhairavān nādān vinadanto jighāṃsavaḥ
a tataḥ pārṣṇyaṅkuśāṅguṣṭhaiḥ kṛtinā codito dvipaḥ
c prasāritakaraḥ prāyāt stabdhakarṇekṣaṇo drutam
a so 'dhiṣṭhāya padā vāhān yuyutsoḥ sūtam ārujat
b rathaṃ babhañja saṃkruddhaś caṇḍavāto yathā drumam
b yuyutsus tu rathād rājann apākrāmat tvarānvitaḥ
b tataḥ pāṇḍavayodhās te nāgarājaṃ śarair drutam
c putras tu tava saṃbhrāntaḥ saubhadrasyāpluto ratham
a sa kuñjarastho visṛjann iṣūn ariṣu pārthivaḥ
c babhau raśmīn ivādityo bhuvaneṣu samutsṛjan
d sa bhīmenātha bahudhā dantābhyām avapīḍayan
d mokṣito yuddhaśauṇḍena nāgāyutabalo gajaḥ
a tam ārjunir dvādaśabhir yuyutsur daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c tribhis tribhir draupadeyā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vivyadhuḥ
d cekitānaś catuḥṣaṣṭyā sottarāyudhikaṃ punaḥ
d pratyavidhyac charaiḥ sarvān bhagadattas tribhis tribhiḥ
a so 'riyatnārpitair bāṇair ācito dvirado babhau
c saṃsyūta iva sūryasya raśmibhir jalado mahān
a niyantuḥ śilpayatnābhyāṃ preṣito 'riśarārditaḥ
c paricikṣepa tān nāgaḥ sa ripūn savyadakṣiṇam
a gopāla iva daṇḍena yathā paśugaṇān vane
c āveṣṭayata tāṃ senāṃ bhagadattas tathā muhuḥ
a kṣipraṃ śyenābhipannānāṃ vāyasānām iva svanaḥ
b rajaś ca sumahad rājann antarikṣaṃ samācinot
b sa reṇumārgo viyati bhāti daṇḍa ivotthitaḥ
b samucchrito bhṛśārtāyā senāyā subhujo yathā
b abhidhāveti kaunteyaṃ saṃcodayad ivārjunam
c babhūva pāṇḍaveyānāṃ bhṛśaṃ vidravatāṃ svanaḥ
a sa nāgarājaḥ pravarāṅkuśāhataḥ
purā sapakṣo 'drivaro yathā nṛpa
c bhayaṃ tathā ripuṣu samādadhad bhṛśaṃ
vaṇiggaṇānāṃ kṣubhito yathārṇavaḥ
a tato dhvanir dviradarathāśvapārthivair
bhayād dravadbhir janito 'tibhairavaḥ
c kṣitiṃ viyad dyāṃ vidiśo diśas tathā
samāvṛṇot pārthiva saṃyuge tadā
d samantatas tatra janādhipeśvara
a sa tena nāgapravareṇa pārthivo
bhṛśaṃ jagāhe dviṣatām anīkinīm
c purā suguptāṃ vibudhair ivāhave
virocano devavarūthinīm iva
a bhṛśaṃ vavau jvalanasakho viyad rajaḥ
samāvṛṇon muhur api caiva sainikān
c tam ekanāgaṃ gaṇaśo yathā gajāḥ
samantato drutam iva menire janāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a yan māṃ pārthasya saṃgrāme karmāṇi paripṛcchasi
c tac chṛṇuṣva mahārāja pārtho yad akaron mṛdhe
a rajo dṛṣṭvā samudbhūtaṃ śrutvā ca gajanisvanam
c bhajyatāṃ bhagadattena kaunteyaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt
a yathā prāgjyotiṣo rājā gajena madhusūdana
c tvaramāṇo 'bhyatikrānto dhruvaṃ tasyaiṣa nisvanaḥ
a indrād anavaraḥ saṃkhye gajayānaviśāradaḥ
c prathamo vā dvitīyo vā pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
a sa cāpi dviradaśreṣṭhaḥ sadāpratigajo yudhi
c sarvaśabdātigaḥ saṃkhye kṛtakarmā jitaklamaḥ
a sahaḥ śastranipātānām agnisparśasya cānagha
c sa pāṇḍavabalaṃ vyaktam adyaiko nāśayiṣyati
d siṃhanādaṃ mahat kṛtvā dhanurbāṇaravaiḥ saha
d vidrāvyamāṇaṃ saṃpaśya hatabhūyiṣṭhanāyakam
d dṛṣṭvā vinadya sahasā mama senāṃ pramṛdnati
a na cāvābhyām ṛte 'nyo 'sti śaktas taṃ pratibādhitum
c tvaramāṇas tato yāhi yataḥ prāgjyotiṣādhipaḥ
a śakrasakhyād dvipabalair vayasā cāpi vismitam
c adyainaṃ preṣayiṣyāmi balahantuḥ priyātithim
a vacanād atha kṛṣṇas tu prayayau savyasācinaḥ
c dāryate bhagadattena yatra pāṇḍavavāhinī
a taṃ prayāntaṃ tataḥ paścād āhvayanto mahārathāḥ
c saṃśaptakāḥ samārohan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
a daśaiva tu sahasrāṇi trigartānāṃ narādhipa
c catvāri tu sahasrāṇi vāsudevasya ye 'nugāḥ
a dāryamāṇāṃ camūṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagadattena māriṣa
c āhūyamānasya ca tair abhavad dhṛdayaṃ dvidhā
a kiṃ nu śreyaskaraṃ karma bhaved iti vicintayan
c ito vā vinivarteyaṃ gaccheyaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhiram
a tasya buddhyā vicāryaitad arjunasya kurūdvaha
c abhavad bhūyasī buddhiḥ saṃśaptakavadhe sthirā
a sa saṃnivṛttaḥ sahasā kapipravaraketanaḥ
c eko rathasahasrāṇi nihantuṃ vāsavī raṇe
a sā hi duryodhanasyāsīn matiḥ karṇasya cobhayoḥ
c arjunasya vadhopāye tena dvaidham akalpayat
a sa tu saṃvartayām āsa dvaidhībhāvena pāṇḍavaḥ
c rathena tu rathāgryāṇām akarot tāṃ mṛṣā tadā
a tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
c vyasṛjann arjune rājan saṃśaptakamahārathāḥ
a naiva kuntīsutaḥ pārtho naiva kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
c na hayā na ratho rājan dṛśyante sma śaraiś citāḥ
d tato naivārjunopendrau na rathaḥ sāśvaketanaḥ
d dṛśyante śaravarṣeṇa prabalena samāvṛtāḥ
d tatas tena śaraugheṇa mahatā samavāstṛtaḥ
d nāśakan nāma bībhatsur amitrān pratibādhitum
a yadā moham anuprāptaḥ sasvedaś ca janārdanaḥ
b tato janārdanaḥ pārthaṃ pratyuvāca hasann iva
b vajram astraṃ tu saṃdhāya jahi saṃśaptakān iha
c tatas tān prāyaśaḥ pārtho vajrāstreṇa nijaghnivān
a śataśaḥ pāṇayaś chinnāḥ seṣujyātalakārmukāḥ
c ketavo vājinaḥ sūtā rathinaś cāpatan kṣitau
a drumācalāgrāmbudharaiḥ samarūpāḥ sukalpitāḥ
c hatārohāḥ kṣitau petur dvipāḥ pārthaśarāhatāḥ
a vipraviddhakuthāvalgāś chinnabhāṇḍāḥ parāsavaḥ
c sārohās turagāḥ petur mathitāḥ pārthamārgaṇaiḥ
a sarṣṭicarmāsinakharāḥ samudgaraparaśvadhāḥ
c saṃchinnā bāhavaḥ petur nṛṇāṃ bhallaiḥ kirīṭinā
a bālādityāmbujendūnāṃ tulyarūpāṇi māriṣa
c saṃchinnāny arjunaśaraiḥ śirāṃsy urvīṃ prapedire
a jajvālālaṃkṛtaiḥ senā patribhiḥ prāṇabhojanaiḥ
c nānāliṅgais tadāmitrān kruddhe nighnati phalgune
a kṣobhayantaṃ tadā senāṃ dviradaṃ nalinīm iva
c dhanaṃjayaṃ bhūtagaṇāḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan
a dṛṣṭvā tat karma pārthasya vāsavasyeva mādhavaḥ
c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā talam āhatya pūjayat
d karmaitat pārtha śakreṇa yamena dhanadena ca
d duṣkaraṃ samare yat te kṛtam adyeti me matiḥ
d yugapac caiva saṃgrāme śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d patitā eva me dṛṣṭāḥ saṃśaptakamahārathāḥ
a tataḥ saṃśaptakān hatvā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
c bhagadattāya yāhīti pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam acodayat
 saṃjaya uvāca
a yiyāsatas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pārthasyāśvān manojavān
c apraiṣīd dhemasaṃchannān droṇānīkāya pāṇḍurān
a taṃ prayāntaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ svāṃs trātuṃ droṇatāpitān
c suśarmā bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ yuddhārthī pṛṣṭhato 'nvayāt
a tataḥ śvetahayaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīd ajitaṃ jayaḥ
c eṣa māṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suśarmāhvayate 'cyuta
a dīryate cottareṇaitat sainyaṃ naḥ śatrusūdana
c dvaidhībhūtaṃ mano me 'dya kṛtaṃ saṃśaptakair idam
a kiṃ nu saṃśaptakān hanmi svān rakṣāmy ahitārditān
c iti me tvaṃ mataṃ vettha tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
a evam uktas tu dāśārhaḥ syandanaṃ pratyavartayat
c yena trigartādhipatiḥ pāṇḍavaṃ samupāhvayat
a tato 'rjunaḥ suśarmāṇaṃ viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
c dhvajaṃ dhanuś cāsya tathā kṣurābhyāṃ samakṛntata
a trigartādhipateś cāpi bhrātaraṃ ṣaḍbhir āyasaiḥ
c sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ tvaritaḥ pārthaḥ praiṣīd yamakṣayam
a tato bhujagasaṃkāśāṃ suśarmā śaktim āyasīm
c cikṣepārjunam ādiśya vāsudevāya tomaram
a śaktiṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś chittvā tomaraṃ tribhir arjunaḥ
c suśarmāṇaṃ śaravrātair mohayitvā nyavartata
a taṃ vāsavam ivāyāntaṃ bhūrivarṣaśaraughiṇam
c rājaṃs tāvakasainyānāṃ nograṃ kaś cid avārayat
a tato dhanaṃjayo bāṇais tata eva mahārathān
c āyād vinighnan kauravyān dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
a tasya vegam asahyaṃ tu kuntīputrasya dhīmataḥ
c nāśaknuvaṃs te saṃsoḍhuṃ sparśam agner iva prajāḥ
a saṃveṣṭayann anīkāni śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
c suparṇapātavad rājann āyāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prati
a yat tadānāmayaj jiṣṇur bharatānām apāyinām
c dhanuḥ kṣemakaraṃ saṃkhye dviṣatām aśruvardhanam
a tad eva tava putrasya rājan durdyūtadevinaḥ
c kṛte kṣatravināśāya dhanur āyacchad arjunaḥ
a tathā vikṣobhyamāṇā sā pārthena tava vāhinī
c vyadīryata mahārāja naur ivāsādya parvatam
a tato daśa sahasrāṇi nyavartanta dhanuṣmatām
c matiṃ kṛtvā raṇe kruddhā vīrā jayaparājaye
a vyapetahṛdayatrāsa āpaddharmātigo rathaḥ
c ārchat pārtho guruṃ bhāraṃ sarvabhārasaho yudhi
a yathā naḍavanaṃ kruddhaḥ prabhinnaḥ ṣaṣṭihāyanaḥ
c mṛdnīyāt tadvad āyastaḥ pārtho 'mṛdnāc camūṃ tava
a tasmin pramathite sainye bhagadatto narādhipaḥ
c tena nāgena sahasā dhanaṃjayam upādravat
a taṃ rathena naravyāghraḥ pratyagṛhṇād abhītavat
c sa saṃnipātas tumulo babhūva rathanāgayoḥ
a kalpitābhyāṃ yathāśāstraṃ rathena ca gajena ca
c saṃgrāme ceratur vīrau bhagadattadhanaṃjayau
a tato jīmūtasaṃkāśān nāgād indra ivābhibhūḥ
c abhyavarṣac charaugheṇa bhagadatto dhanaṃjayam
a sa cāpi śaravarṣaṃ tac charavarṣeṇa vāsaviḥ
c aprāptam eva ciccheda bhagadattasya vīryavān
d saṃnyavārayad asyāśu laghutvāt pākaśāsaniḥ
d vavarṣa śaravarṣaṃ tu punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā śaravarṣaṃ nivārya tat
c śarair jaghne mahābāhuṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
a tataḥ sa śarajālena mahatābhyavakīrya tau
c codayām āsa taṃ nāgaṃ vadhāyācyutapārthayoḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ dviradaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham ivāntakam
c cakre 'pasavyaṃ tvaritaḥ syandanena janārdanaḥ
a saṃprāptam api neyeṣa parāvṛttaṃ mahādvipam
c sārohaṃ mṛtyusāt kartuṃ smaran dharmaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
a sa tu nāgo dviparathān hayāṃś cārujya māriṣa
c prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya tato 'krudhyad dhanaṃjayaḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tathā kruddhaḥ kim akarod bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥ
c prāgjyotiṣo vā pārthasya tan me śaṃsa yathātatham
 saṃjaya uvāca
a prāgjyotiṣeṇa saṃsaktāv ubhau dāśārhapāṇḍavau
c mṛtyor ivāntikaṃ prāptau sarvabhūtāni menire
a tathā hi śaravarṣāṇi pātayaty aniśaṃ prabho
c bhagadatto gajaskandhāt kṛṣṇayoḥ syandanasthayoḥ
a atha kārṣṇāyasair bāṇaiḥ pūrṇakārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥ
c avidhyad devakīputraṃ hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
a agnisparśasamās tīkṣṇā bhagadattena coditāḥ
c nirbhidya devakīputraṃ kṣitiṃ jagmuḥ śarās tataḥ
a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nihatya ca
c lāḍayann iva rājānaṃ bhagadattam ayodhayat
a so 'rkaraśminibhāṃs tīkṣṇāṃs tomarān vai caturdaśa
c prerayat savyasācī tāṃs tridhaikaikam athācchinat
a tato nāgasya tad varma vyadhamat pākaśāsaniḥ
c śarajālena sa babhau vyabhraḥ parvatarāḍ iva
c   tad vyaśīryata bhūtale
c viśīrṇavarmā sa gajaḥ śaraiḥ subhṛśam arditaḥ
c babhau śirasi mātaṃgo
a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaḥ śaktiṃ hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīm
c vyasṛjad vāsudevāya dvidhā tām arjuno 'cchinat
a tataś chatraṃ dhvajaṃ caiva chittvā rājño 'rjunaḥ śaraiḥ
c vivyādha daśabhis tūrṇam utsmayan parvatādhipam
a so 'tividdho 'rjunaśaraiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
c bhagadattas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
a vyasṛjat tomarān mūrdhni śvetāśvasyonnanāda ca
c tair arjunasya samare kirīṭaṃ parivartitam
a parivṛttaṃ kirīṭaṃ taṃ yamayann eva phalgunaḥ
c sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loka iti rājānam abravīt
a evam uktas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
c abhyavarṣat sagovindaṃ dhanur ādāya bhāsvaram
d tau vidhyamānau nārācair bhagadattena bhārata
d jagmatur naiva saṃmohaṃ cukṣubhāte na cācyutau
a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā tūṇīrān saṃnikṛtya ca
c tvaramāṇo dvisaptatyā sarvamarmasv atāḍayat
a viddhas tathāpy avyathito vaiṣṇavāstram udīrayan
c abhimantryāṅkuśaṃ kruddho vyasṛjat pāṇḍavorasi
d tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
d arjunaḥ pṛṣṭhataṃ kṛtvā pratijagrāha vīryavān
a visṛṣṭaṃ bhagadattena tad astraṃ sarvaghātakam
c urasā pratijagrāha pārthaṃ saṃchādya keśavaḥ
a vaijayanty abhavan mālā tad astraṃ keśavorasi
b padmakośavicitrā ca sarvartukusumākulā
b jvalanārkenduvarṇāḍhyā tārakojjvalapāvakā
b tayā padmābhiśobhinyā vāyukampitalolayā
b śobhate 'bhyadhikaṃ śauriratasīpuṣpasaṃnibhaḥ
b keśavaḥ keśimathanaḥ śārṅgadhanvārimardanaḥ
b sandhyābhrair iva saṃchannaḥ prāvṛṭkāle nagottamaḥ
c tato 'rjunaḥ klāntamanāḥ keśavaṃ pratyabhāṣata
a ayudhyamānas turagān saṃyantāsmi janārdana
c ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣa pratijñāṃ svāṃ na rakṣasi
d idam astram avasthāpya prāptaṃ māṃ devakīsuta
d kimarthaṃ puruṣavyāghra svayaṃ pratigṛhītavān
a yady ahaṃ vyasanī vā syām aśakto vā nivāraṇe
c tatas tvayaivaṃ kāryaṃ syān na tu kāryaṃ mayi sthite
a sabāṇaḥ sadhanuś cāhaṃ sasurāsuramānavān
c śakto lokān imāñ jetuṃ tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
a tato 'rjunaṃ vāsudevaḥ pratyuvācārthavad vacaḥ
c śṛṇu guhyam idaṃ pārtha yathā vṛttaṃ purānagha
d yeyaṃ lokadharā devī sarvabhūtadharā dharā
d sakāmā lokakartāraṃ nārāyaṇam upasthitā
d sa saṃgamya tayā sārdhaṃ prītas tasyai varaṃ dadau
d sā vavre viṣṇusadṛśaṃ putram astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavam
d babhūva ca sutas tasyāṃ narako nāma viśrutaḥ
d astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tasmai dadau nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
d tad etan narakasyāsīd astraṃ sarvāhitāntakam
d tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ sarvaśastravighātanam
d nāsyāvadhyo 'sti loke 'smin mad anyaḥ kaś cid arjuna
d saṃjaya uvāca
d tasmān mayā kṛtaṃ hy etan mā te 'bhūd buddhir anyathā
d anunīya tu dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ tvarito 'bravīt
d jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ kṣipraṃ vākyaśeṣaṃ ca me śṛṇu
a caturmūrtir ahaṃ śaśval lokatrāṇārtham udyataḥ
c ātmānaṃ pravibhajyeha lokānāṃ hitam ādadhe
a ekā mūrtis tapaścaryāṃ kurute me bhuvi sthitā
c aparā paśyati jagat kurvāṇaṃ sādhvasādhunī
a aparā kurute karma mānuṣaṃ lokam āśritā
c śete caturthī tv aparā nidrāṃ varṣasahasrikām
a yāsau varṣasahasrānte mūrtir uttiṣṭhate mama
c varārhebhyo varāñ śreṣṭhāṃs tasmin kāle dadāti sā
a taṃ tu kālam anuprāptaṃ viditvā pṛthivī tadā
c prāyācata varaṃ yaṃ māṃ narakārthāya taṃ śṛṇu
a devānām asurāṇāṃ ca avadhyas tanayo 'stu me
c upeto vaiṣṇavāstreṇa tan me tvaṃ dātum arhasi
a evaṃ varam ahaṃ śrutvā jagatyās tanaye tadā
c amogham astram adadaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tad ahaṃ purā
a avocaṃ caitad astraṃ vai hy amoghaṃ bhavatu kṣame
c narakasyābhirakṣārthaṃ nainaṃ kaś cid vadhiṣyati
a anenāstreṇa te guptaḥ sutaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
c bhaviṣyati durādharṣaḥ sarvalokeṣu sarvadā
a tathety uktvā gatā devī kṛtakāmā manasvinī
b vyajāyata dharā devī putraṃ putraśatāvaram
c sa cāpy āsīd durādharṣo narakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
a tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ tad astraṃ pārtha māmakam
b tad astraṃ devagandharvayakṣapannagarākṣasān
b sarvān samāgatān hanyāt kiṃ punas tvāṃ dhanaṃjaya
b bhogināṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mayā dattaṃ surāsuraiḥ
b jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ pārtha purā sarvān hinasti saḥ
c nāsyāvadhyo 'sti lokeṣu sendrarudreṣu māriṣa
a tan mayā tvatkṛtenaitad anyathā vyapanāśitam
c viyuktaṃ paramāstreṇa jahi pārtha mahāsuram
a vairiṇaṃ yudhi durdharṣaṃ bhagadattaṃ suradviṣam
c yathāhaṃ jaghnivān pūrvaṃ hitārthaṃ narakaṃ tathā
d avadhyo 'yaṃ mahāstreṇa bhagadattaḥ surāsuraiḥ
d yathāhaṃ narakaṃ lokahitārtham ahanaṃ purā
a evam uktas tataḥ pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā
c bhagadattaṃ śitair bāṇaiḥ sahasā samavākirat
d ghaṇṭāṃ kāñcanasaṃchannāṃ viśvakarmavinirmitām
d kāñcanaśṛṅkhalānaddhāṃ savyāṃ ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
d sā hatā śaraghātena vajraniṣpeṣasaṃnibhā
d papāta dūrapātena candrabimbasamujjvalā
d dakṣiṇāpi hatā rājan ghaṇṭā bāṇaiḥ kirīṭinaḥ
d papāta dūram adhvānaṃ gatvā sūrya iva kṣitau
d bhagadattena nirmuktaḥ supratīko 'pi vegataḥ
d hanumān sūryabimbasya grasanārtham ivodyataḥ
a tataḥ pārtho mahābāhur asaṃbhrānto mahāmanāḥ
c kumbhayor antare nāgaṃ nārācena samārpayat
d tataḥ saṃdhāya viśikhaṃ dīpyamānam ivānalam
d avidhyad arjuno nāgaṃ kumbhayor antare bhṛśam
a samāsādya tu taṃ nāgaṃ bāṇo vajra ivācalam
c abhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
d sa karī bhagadattena preryamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d na karoti vacas tasya daridrasyeva kāminī
d madhye vidīrṇas tasthau sa prāsyandata punaḥ punaḥ
d syandamānaṃ tato nāgaṃ caraṇābhyām anodayat
a sa tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi dantābhyām avaniṃ yayau
c nadann ārtasvaraṃ prāṇān utsasarja mahādvipaḥ
d tato gāṇḍīvadhanvānam abhyabhāṣata keśavaḥ
d ayaṃ mahattaraḥ pārtha palitena samāvṛtaḥ
d valīsaṃchannanayanaḥ śūraḥ paramadurjayaḥ
d akṣṇor unmīlanārthāya baddhapaṭṭaḥ sadā nṛpaḥ
d devavākyāt praciccheda śareṇa bhṛśam arjunaḥ
d chinnamātreṃ 'śuke tasmin ruddhanetro babhūva saḥ
d tamomayaṃ jagan mene bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
a tataś candrārdhabimbena śareṇa nataparvaṇā
b bibheda sakalo deho dvidhābhūto babhūva ha
b rājñā balavatā tena jānubhyāṃ dhārito raṇe
b arjunaṃ prati yuddhe na cirakālaṃ dadhāra saḥ
b evaṃ yuddhaṃ tadā tena rājñā tena durātmanā
b kirīṭī cārdhabimbena śareṇānataparvaṇā
c bibheda hṛdayaṃ rājño bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥ
a sa bhinnahṛdayo rājā bhagadattaḥ kirīṭinā
c śarāsanaṃ śarāṃś caiva gatāsuḥ pramumoca ha
a śirasas tasya vibhraṣṭaḥ papāta ca varāṅkuśaḥ
c nālatāḍanavibhraṣṭaṃ palāśaṃ nalinād iva
a sa hemamālī tapanīyabhāṇḍāt
papāta nāgād girisaṃnikāśāt
c supuṣpito mārutavegarugṇo
mahīdharāgrād iva karṇikāraḥ
a nihatya taṃ narapatim indravikramaṃ
sakhāyam indrasya tathaindrir āhave
c tato 'parāṃs tava jayakāṅkṣiṇo narān
babhañja vāyur balavān drumān iva
 saṃjaya uvāca
a priyam indrasya satataṃ sakhāyam amitaujasam
c hatvā prāgjyotiṣaṃ pārthaḥ pradakṣiṇam avartata
d pūrvadaityaṃ mahāvīraṃ bhagadattaṃ mahābalam
d kṛṣṇau daśārhabībhatsū jaghnatur yudhi durjayam
d nāgāyutabalaprāṇaṃ śūram āhavaśobhinam
d supratīko 'pi balavān nāgāyutasamo balī
d vaiṣṇavāstreṇa saṃyukto aṃkuśena ca vīryavān
d trīṇi tejāṃsi tatraiva tretāgnir iva cādhvare
d bhagadattaṃ raṇe śūraṃ nihanyāt ko 'rjunaṃ vinā
d arjuno 'pi mahāvīryo hatvā pitṛsakhaṃ raṇe
d kṣatradharmaṃ vicintyājau dhig dhig ity eva cābravīt
d tam ādityasamaṃ kāntyā bhūmau nipatitaṃ divaḥ
d prasamīkṣya tadā pārtho reṇunā tv avaguṇṭhitam
a tato gāndhārarājasya sutau parapuraṃjayau
c ārchetām arjunaṃ saṃkhye bhrātarau vṛṣakācalau
a tau sametyārjunaṃ vīrau puraḥ paścāc ca dhanvinau
c avidhyetāṃ mahāvegair niśitair āśugair bhṛśam
a vṛṣakasya hayān sūtaṃ dhanuś chatraṃ rathaṃ dhvajam
c tilaśo vyadhamat pārthaḥ saubalasya śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a tato 'rjunaḥ śaravrātair nānāpraharaṇair api
c gāndhārān vyākulāṃś cakre saubalapramukhān punaḥ
a tataḥ pañcaśatān vīrān gāndhārān udyatāyudhān
c prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya kruddho bāṇair dhanaṃjayaḥ
a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avatīrya mahābhujaḥ
c āruroha rathaṃ bhrātur anyac ca dhanur ādade
a tāv ekaratham ārūḍhau bhrātarau vṛṣakācalau
c śaravarṣeṇa bībhatsum avidhyetāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
a syālau tava mahātmānau rājānau vṛṣakācalau
c bhṛśaṃ nijaghnatuḥ pārtham indraṃ vṛtrabalāv iva
a labdhalakṣyau tu gāndhārāv ahatāṃ pāṇḍavaṃ punaḥ
c nidāghavārṣikau māsau lokaṃ gharmāmbubhir yathā
a tau rathasthau naravyāghrau rājānau vṛṣakācalau
c saṃśliṣṭāṅgau sthitau rājañ jaghānaikeṣuṇārjunaḥ
a tau rathāt siṃhasaṃkāśau lohitākṣau mahābhujau
c gatāsū petatur vīrau sodaryāv ekalakṣaṇau
a tayor dehau rathād bhūmiṃ gatau bandhujanapriyau
c yaśo daśa diśaḥ puṇyaṃ gamayitvā vyavasthitau
a dṛṣṭvā vinihatau saṃkhye mātulāv apalāyinau
c bhṛśaṃ mumucur aśrūṇi putrās tava viśāṃ pate
a nihatau bhrātarau dṛṣṭvā māyāśataviśāradaḥ
c kṛṣṇau saṃmohayan māyāṃ vidadhe śakunis tataḥ
a laguḍāyoguḍāśmānaḥ śataghnyaś ca saśaktayaḥ
c gadāparighanistriṃśaśūlamudgarapaṭṭiśāḥ
a sakampanarṣṭinakharā musalāni paraśvadhāḥ
c kṣurāḥ kṣurapranālīkā vatsadantās trisaṃdhinaḥ
a cakrāṇi viśikhāḥ prāsā vividhāny āyudhāni ca
c prapetuḥ sarvato digbhyaḥ pradigbhyaś cārjunaṃ prati
a kharoṣṭramahiṣāḥ siṃhā vyāghrāḥ sṛmaracillikāḥ
c ṛkṣāḥ sālāvṛkā gṛdhrāḥ kapayo 'tha sarīsṛpāḥ
a vividhāni ca rakṣāṃsi kṣudhitāny arjunaṃ prati
c saṃkruddhāny abhyadhāvanta vividhāni vayāṃsi ca
a tato divyāstravic chūraḥ kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
c visṛjann iṣujālāni sahasā tāny atāḍayat
a te hanyamānāḥ śūreṇa pravaraiḥ sāyakair dṛḍhaiḥ
c viruvanto mahārāvān vineśuḥ sarvato hatāḥ
a tatas tamaḥ prādurabhūd arjunasya rathaṃ prati
c tasmāc ca tamaso vācaḥ krūrāḥ pārtham abhartsayan
d tat tamo bhairavaṃ ghoraṃ bhayakartṛ mahāhave
a tat tamo 'streṇa mahatā jyotiṣeṇārjuno 'vadhīt
c hate tasmiñ jalaughās tu prādurāsan bhayānakāḥ
a ambhasas tasya nāśārtham ādityāstram athārjunaḥ
c prāyuṅktāmbhas tatas tena prāyaśo 'streṇa śoṣitam
a evaṃ bahuvidhā māyāḥ saubalasya kṛtāḥ kṛtāḥ
c jaghānāstrabalenāśu prahasann arjunas tadā
d durdyūtadevin gāndhāre nākṣān kṣipati gāṇḍivam
d jvalitān niśitāṃs tīkṣṇāñ śarān kṣipati gāṇḍivam
a tathā hatāsu māyāsu trasto 'rjunaśarāhataḥ
c apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ śakuniḥ prākṛto yathā
a tato 'rjuno 'stravic chraiṣṭhyaṃ darśayann ātmano 'riṣu
c abhyavarṣac charaugheṇa kauravāṇām anīkinīm
a sā hanyamānā pārthena putrasya tava vāhinī
c dvaidhībhūtā mahārāja gaṅgevāsādya parvatam
a droṇam evānvapadyanta ke cit tatra mahārathāḥ
c ke cid duryodhanaṃ rājann ardyamānāḥ kirīṭinā
a nāpaśyāma tatas tv etat sainyaṃ vai tamasāvṛtam
c gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣaḥ śruto dakṣiṇato mayā
a śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣaṃ vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvanam
c gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣo vyatikramyāspṛśad divam
a tataḥ punar dakṣiṇataḥ saṃgrāmaś citrayodhinām
c suyuddham arjunasyāsīd ahaṃ tu droṇam anvagām
d yaudhiṣṭhirāṇy anīkāni pradahanti tatas tataḥ
a nānāvidhāny anīkāni putrāṇāṃ tava bhārata
c arjuno vyadhamat kāle divīvābhrāṇi mārutaḥ
a taṃ vāsavam ivāyāntaṃ bhūrivarṣaśaraughiṇam
c maheṣvāsaṃ naravyāghraṃ nograṃ kaś cid avārayat
a te hanyamānāḥ pārthena tvadīyā vyathitā bhṛśam
c svān eva bahavo jaghnur vidravantas tatas tataḥ
a te 'rjunena śarā muktāḥ kaṅkapatrās tanucchidaḥ
c śalabhā iva saṃpetuḥ saṃvṛṇvānā diśo daśa
a turagaṃ rathinaṃ nāgaṃ padātim api māriṣa
c vinirbhidya kṣitiṃ jagmur valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
a na ca dvitīyaṃ vyasṛjat kuñjarāśvanareṣu saḥ
c pṛthag ekaśarārugṇā nipetus te gatāsavaḥ
a hatair manuṣyais turagaiś ca sarvataḥ
śarābhivṛṣṭair dviradaiś ca pātitaiḥ
c tadā śvagomāyubaḍābhināditaṃ
vicitram āyodhaśiro babhūva ha
a pitā sutaṃ tyajati suhṛdvaraṃ suhṛt
tathaiva putraḥ pitaraṃ śarāturaḥ
c svarakṣaṇe kṛtamatayas tadā janās
tyajanti vāhān api pārthapīḍitāḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a teṣv anīkeṣu bhagneṣu pāṇḍuputreṇa saṃjaya
c calitānāṃ drutānāṃ ca katham āsīn mano hi vaḥ
a anīkānāṃ prabhagnānāṃ vyavasthānam apaśyatām
b ataḥ paraṃ raṇe sūta kim akurvanta māmakāḥ
c duṣkaraṃ pratisaṃdhānaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tathāpi tava putrasya priyakāmā viśāṃ pate
c yaśaḥ pravīrā lokeṣu rakṣanto droṇam anvayuḥ
a samudyateṣu śastreṣu saṃprāpte ca yudhiṣṭhire
c akurvann āryakarmāṇi bhairave satyabhītavat
a antaraṃ bhīmasenasya prāpatann amitaujasaḥ
c sātyakeś caiva śūrasya dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cābhibho
a droṇaṃ droṇam iti krūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ samacodayan
c mā droṇam iti putrās te kurūn sarvān acodayan
a droṇaṃ droṇam iti hy eke mā droṇam iti cāpare
c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca droṇadyūtam avartata
a yaṃ yaṃ sma bhajate droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajam
c tatra tatra sma pāñcālyo dhṛṣṭadyumno 'tha dhīyate
a yathābhāgaviparyāse saṃgrāme bhairave sati
c vīrāḥ samāsadan vīrān agacchan bhīravaḥ parān
a akampanīyāḥ śatrūṇāṃ babhūvus tatra pāṇḍavāḥ
c akampayaṃs tv anīkāni smarantaḥ kleśam ātmanaḥ
a te tv amarṣavaśaṃ prāptā hrīmantaḥ sattvacoditāḥ
c tyaktvā prāṇān nyavartanta ghnanto droṇaṃ mahāhave
a ayasām iva saṃpātaḥ śilānām iva cābhavat
c dīvyatāṃ tumule yuddhe prāṇair amitatejasām
a na tu smaranti saṃgrāmam api vṛddhās tathāvidham
c dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mahārāja śrutapūrvam athāpi vā
a prākampateva pṛthivī tasmin vīrāvasādane
c pravartatā balaughena mahatā bhārapīḍitā
a ghūrṇato hi balaughasya divaṃ stabdhveva nisvanaḥ
c ajātaśatroḥ kruddhasya putrasya tava cābhavat
a samāsādya tu pāṇḍūnām anīkāni sahasraśaḥ
c droṇena caratā saṃkhye prabhagnāni śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a teṣu pramathyamāneṣu droṇenādbhutakarmaṇā
c paryavārayad āsādya droṇaṃ senāpatiḥ svayam
a tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ droṇapāñcālyayos tadā
c naiva tasyopamā kā cit saṃbhaved iti me matiḥ
a tato nīlo 'nalaprakhyo dadāha kuruvāhinīm
c śarasphuliṅgaś cāpārcir dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
a taṃ dahantam anīkāni droṇaputraḥ pratāpavān
c pūrvābhibhāṣī suślakṣṇaṃ smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata
a nīla kiṃ bahubhir dagdhais tava yodhaiḥ śarārciṣā
c mayaikena hi yudhyasva kruddhaḥ prahara cāśugaiḥ
a taṃ padmanikarākāraṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam
c vyākośapadmābhamukhaṃ nīlo vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
a tenātividdhaḥ sahasā drauṇir bhallaiḥ śitais tribhiḥ
c dhanur dhvajaṃ ca chatraṃ ca dviṣataḥ sa nyakṛntata
a sotplutya syandanāt tasmān nīlaś carmavarāsidhṛk
c droṇāyaneḥ śiraḥ kāyād dhartum aicchat patatrivat
a tasyodyatāseḥ sunasaṃ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṇḍalam
c bhallenāpāharad drauṇiḥ smayamāna ivānagha
a saṃpūrṇacandrābhamukhaḥ padmapatranibhekṣaṇaḥ
c prāṃśur utpalagarbhābho nihato nyapatat kṣitau
a tataḥ pravivyathe senā pāṇḍavī bhṛśam ākulā
c ācāryaputreṇa hate nīle jvalitatejasi
a acintayaṃś ca te sarve pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
c kathaṃ no vāsavis trāyāc chatrubhya iti māriṣa
a dakṣiṇena tu senāyāḥ kurute kadanaṃ balī
c saṃśaptakāvaśeṣasya nārāyaṇabalasya ca
 saṃjaya uvāca
a pratighātaṃ tu sainyasya nāmṛṣyata vṛkodaraḥ
c so 'bhinad bāhlikaṃ ṣaṣṭyā karṇaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a tasya droṇaḥ śitair bāṇais tīkṣṇadhārair ayasmayaiḥ
c jīvitāntam abhiprepsur marmaṇy āśu jaghāna ha
d ānantaryam abhiprepsuḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyā samārpayat
d punaś cāgnisamasparśair āśīviṣaviṣopamaiḥ
a karṇo dvādaśabhir bāṇair aśvatthāmā ca saptabhiḥ
c ṣaḍbhir duryodhano rājā tata enam avākirat
a bhīmaseno 'pi tān sarvān pratyavidhyan mahābalaḥ
c droṇaṃ pañcāśateṣūṇāṃ karṇaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a duryodhanaṃ dvādaśabhir drauṇiṃ cāṣṭābhir āśugaiḥ
c ārāvaṃ tumulaṃ kurvann abhyavartata tān raṇe
a tasmin saṃtyajati prāṇān mṛtyusādhāraṇīkṛte
c ajātaśatrus tān yodhān bhīmaṃ trātety acodayat
a te yayur bhīmasenasya samīpam amitaujasaḥ
c yuyudhānaprabhṛtayo mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
a te sametya susaṃrabdhāḥ sahitāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c maheṣvāsavarair guptaṃ droṇānīkaṃ bibhitsavaḥ
a samāpetur mahāvīryā bhīmaprabhṛtayo rathāḥ
c tān pratyagṛhṇād avyagro droṇo 'pi rathināṃ varaḥ
a mahābalān atirathān vīrān samaraśobhinaḥ
c bāhyaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ kṛtvā tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavān yayuḥ
a sādinaḥ sādino 'bhyaghnaṃs tathaiva rathino rathān
c āsīc chaktyasisaṃpāto yuddham āsīt paraśvadhaiḥ
a nikṛṣṭam asiyuddhaṃ ca babhūva kaṭukodayam
b kuñjarāṇāṃ ca saṃpāto babhūva kaṭukodayaḥ
c kuñjarāṇāṃ ca saṃghātair yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam
a apatat kuñjarād anyo hayād anyas tv avākśirāḥ
c naro bāṇena nirbhinno rathād anyaś ca māriṣa
a tatrānyasya ca saṃmarde patitasya vivarmaṇaḥ
c śiraḥ pradhvaṃsayām āsa vakṣasy ākramya kuñjaraḥ
a apare 'py aparāñ jaghnur vāraṇāḥ patitān narān
c viṣāṇaiś cāvaniṃ gatvā vyabhindan rathino bahūn
a narāntraiḥ ke cid apare viṣāṇālagnasaṃsravaiḥ
c babhramuḥ śataśo nāgā mṛdnantaḥ śataśo narān
a kāṃsyāyasatanutrāṇān narāśvarathakuñjarān
c patitān pothayāṃ cakrur dvipāḥ sthūlanaḍān iva
d anīkānāṃ prabhagnānām avasthānam apaśyatām
d duṣkaraṃ pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhuvi cāsīt tadā nṛpa
a gṛdhrapatrādhivāsāṃsi śayanāni narādhipāḥ
c hrīmantaḥ kālasaṃpakvāḥ suduḥkhāny adhiśerate
a hanti smātra pitā putraṃ rathenābhyativartate
c putraś ca pitaraṃ mohān nirmaryādam avartata
a akṣo bhagno dhvajaś chinnaś chatram urvyāṃ nipātitam
c yugārdhaṃ chinnam ādāya pradudrāva tathā hayaḥ
a sāsir bāhur nipatitaḥ śiraś chinnaṃ sakuṇḍalam
c gajenākṣipya balinā rathaḥ saṃcūrṇitaḥ kṣitau
a rathinā tāḍito nāgo nārācenāpatad vyasuḥ
c sārohaś cāpatad vājī gajenātāḍito bhṛśam
a nirmaryādaṃ mahad yuddham avartata sudāruṇam
c hā tāta hā putra sakhe kvāsi tiṣṭha kva dhāvasi
a praharāhara jahy enaṃ smitakṣveḍitagarjitaiḥ
c ity evam uccarantyaḥ sma śrūyante vividhā giraḥ
a narasyāśvasya nāgasya samasajjata śoṇitam
c upāśāmyad rajo bhaumaṃ bhīrūn kaśmalam āviśat
d cakreṇa cakram āsādya vīro vīrasya saṃyuge
d atīteṣupathe kāle jahāra gadayā śiraḥ
a āsīt keśaparāmarśo muṣṭiyuddhaṃ ca dāruṇam
c nakhair dantaiś ca śūrāṇam advīpe dvīpam icchatām
a tatrācchidyata vīrasya sakhaḍgo bāhur udyataḥ
c sadhanuś cāparasyāpi saśaraḥ sāṅkuśas tathā
a prākrośad anyam anyo 'tra tathānyo vimukho 'dravat
c anyaḥ prāptasya cānyasya śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
a śabdam abhyadravac cānyaḥ śabdād anyo 'dravad bhṛśam
c svān anyo 'tha parān anyo jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
d bhītaś cānya udakrośad anyo bhīta upādravat
d asaṃprāptasya taṃ deśam anyo jīvitam ādade
a giriśṛṅgopamaś cātra nārācena nipātitaḥ
c mātaṅgo nyapatad bhūmau nadīrodha ivoṣṇage

c bahūn apy āviśan moho bhīrūn hṛdayadurbalān
a sarvam āvignam abhavan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
c sainye ca rajasā dhvaste nirmaryādam avartata
a tataḥ senāpatiḥ śīghram ayaṃ kāla iti bruvan

c saro haṃsā ivāpetur ghnanto droṇarathaṃ prati
a gṛhṇītādravatānyonyaṃ vibhītā vinikṛntata
c ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo durdharṣasya rathaṃ prati
a tato droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇī rājā jayadrathaḥ
c vindānuvindāv avantyau śalyaś cainān avārayan
a te tv āryadharmasaṃrabdhā durnivāryā durāsadāḥ
c śarārtā na juhur droṇaṃ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
a tato droṇo 'bhisaṃkruddho visṛjañ śataśaḥ śarān
c cedipāñcālapāṇḍūnām akarot kadanaṃ mahat
a tasya jyātalanirghoṣaḥ śuśruve dikṣu māriṣa

a taṃ śaraughamahāvartaṃ śoṇitodaṃ mahāhradam

c dīpyamānam apaśyāma tejasā vānaradhvajam

c yugānte sarvabhūtāni dhūmaketur ivotthitaḥ
a tena bāṇasahasraughair gajāśvarathayodhinaḥ
c tāḍyamānāḥ kṣitiṃ jagmur muktaśastrāḥ śarārditāḥ
a ke cid ārtasvaraṃ cakrur vinedur apare punaḥ
c pārthabāṇahatāḥ ke cin nipetur vigatāsavaḥ
a teṣām utpatatāṃ kāṃś cit patitāṃś ca parāṅmukhān
c na jaghānārjuno yodhān yodhavratam anusmaran
a te viśīrṇarathāśvebhāḥ prāyaśaś ca parāṅmukhāḥ
c kuravaḥ karṇa karṇeti hā heti ca vicukruśuḥ

c mā bhaiṣṭeti pratiśrutya yayāv abhimukho 'rjunam

b rāmaśiṣyo mahābāhur dhanvināṃ mānahā sadā

a tasya dīptaśaraughasya dīptacāpadharasya ca
c śaraughāñ śarajālena vidudhāva dhanaṃjayaḥ
d tathaivādhirathis tasya bāṇāñ jvalitatejasaḥ
e astram astreṇa saṃvārya prāṇadad visṛjañ śarān
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca bhīmaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
c vivyadhuḥ karṇam āsādya tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
a arjunāstraṃ tu rādheyaḥ saṃvārya śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
c teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ cāpāni ciccheda viśikhais tribhiḥ
a te nikṛttāyudhāḥ śūrā nirviṣā bhujagā iva

c dīpyamānā mahāśaktyo jagmur ādhirathiṃ prati

c karṇād avarajaṃ bāṇair jaghāna niśitais tribhiḥ

c jahāra sadyo bhallena vipāṭasya śiro rathāt

c vivyādha daśabhiḥ karṇaṃ sūtam aśvāṃś ca pañcabhiḥ
a dhṛṣṭadyumno 'py asivaraṃ carma cādāya bhāsvaram
c jaghāna candravarmāṇaṃ bṛhatkṣatraṃ ca pauravam
a tataḥ svaratham āsthāya pāñcālyo 'nyac ca kārmukam
c ādāya karṇaṃ vivyādha trisaptatyā nadan raṇe
a śaineyo 'py anyad ādāya dhanur indrāyudhadyuti
c sūtaputraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā viddhvā siṃha ivānadat
a bhallabhyāṃ sādhumuktābhyāṃ chittvā karṇasya kārmukam

a tato duryodhano droṇo rājā caiva jayadrathaḥ
c nimajjamānaṃ rādheyam ujjahruḥ sātyakārṇavāt
d pattyaśvarathamātaṅgās tvadīyāḥ śataśo 'pare

a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca bhīmaś ca saubhadro 'rjuna eva ca
c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiṃ jugupū raṇe

a padātirathanāgāśvair gajāśvarathapattayaḥ
c rathino nāgapattyaśvai rathapattī rathadvipaiḥ
a aśvair aśvā gajair nāgā rathino rathibhiḥ saha

d kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca droṇārjunasamāgame

anekaśo dviparathavājipattayaḥ
c gajair gajā rathibhir udāyudhā rathā
hayair hayāḥ pattigaṇaiś ca pattayaḥ
a rathair dvipā dviradavarair mahāhayā
hayair narā vararathibhiś ca vājinaḥ
c nirastajihvādaśanekṣaṇāḥ kṣitau
kṣayaṃ gatāḥ pramathitavarmabhūṣaṇāḥ

hatā gatāḥ pratibhayadarśanāḥ kṣitim

d mahābale kṣubdhamahārṇavopame

c rajasvalā bhṛśodvignā vīkṣamāṇā diśo daśa

c keśavasya ca sauhārde kīrtyamāne 'rjunaṃ prati
e abhiśastā ivābhūvan dhyānamūkatvam āsthitāḥ
f nistejaso vimanaso nirvīryā niṣparākramāḥ

f rājāno rājaputrāś ca sarve duryodhanādayaḥ
a tataḥ prabhātasamaye droṇaṃ duryodhano 'bravīt
b tato duryodhano rājā droṇaṃ dīno 'bhyabhāṣata
c praṇayād abhimānāc ca dviṣadvṛddhyā ca durmanāḥ

a varaṃ dattvā mama prītaḥ paścād vikṛtavān asi

a taṃ cābhimanyur vacanāt pitur jyeṣṭhasya bhārata
c bibheda durbhidaṃ saṃkhye cakravyūham anekadhā
a sa kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma hatvā vīrān sahasraśaḥ
b rājaputraśataṃ hatvā kausalyaṃ ca bṛhadbalam
b mahārathaṃ śalyaputraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca tava priyam
c ṣaṭsu vīreṣu saṃsakto dauḥśāsanivaśaṃ gataḥ
d nihataḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ putro gāṇḍīvadhanvinaḥ
d saubhadraḥ pṛthivīpāla jahau prāṇān paraṃtapa

 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a putraṃ puruṣasiṃhasya saṃjayāprāptayauvanam

a dāruṇaḥ kṣatradharmo 'yaṃ vihito dharmakartṛbhiḥ

a bibhitsatā rathānīkaṃ saubhadreṇāmitaujasā
c vikrīḍitaṃ yathā saṃkhye tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya

a yan māṃ pṛcchasi rājendra saubhadrasya nipātanam

e vikrīḍitaṃ kumāreṇa yathānīkaṃ bibhitsatā
f ārugṇāś ca yathā vīrā duḥsādhyāś cāpi viplave

 saṃjaya uvāca
a samare 'tyugrakarmāṇaḥ karmabhir vyañjitaśramāḥ
c sakṛṣṇāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ pañca devair api durāsadāḥ

a pratijñākarmadakṣasya raṇe gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ

a śrutagāmbhīryamādhuryasattvavīryaparākramaiḥ
c sadṛśo devayor vīraḥ sahadevaḥ kilāśvinoḥ
a ye ca kṛṣṇe guṇāḥ sphītāḥ pāṇḍaveṣu ca ye guṇāḥ

c vinayāt sahadevasya sadṛśo nakulasya ca
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a abhimanyum ahaṃ sūta saubhadram aparājitam

d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ

d vistareṇa mahārāja paryapṛcchat sa saṃjayam
 saṃjaya uvāca
 sthiro bhava mahārāja śokaṃ dhāraya durdharam

d tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
d tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tad anīkam anādhṛṣyaṃ bhāradvājena rakṣitam
c pārthāḥ samabhyavartanta bhīmasenapurogamāḥ
a sātyakiś cekitānaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
c kuntibhojaś ca vikrānto drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ

a yudhāmanyuś ca vikrāntaḥ śikhaṇḍī cāparājitaḥ
c uttamaujāś ca durdharṣo virāṭaś ca mahārathaḥ
a draupadeyāś ca saṃrabdhāḥ śaiśupāliś ca vīryavān

c aviṣahyaṃ guruṃ bhāraṃ saubhadre samavāsṛjat
a vāsudevād anavaraṃ phalgunāc cāmitaujasam
c abravīt paravīraghnam abhimanyum idaṃ vacaḥ
a etya no nārjuno garhed yathā tāta tathā kuru
c cakravyūhasya na vayaṃ vidma bhedaṃ kathaṃ cana
a tvaṃ vārjuno vā kṛṣṇo vā bhindyāt pradyumna eva vā
c cakravyūhaṃ mahābāho pañcamo 'nyo na vidyate
a abhimanyo varaṃ tāta yācatāṃ dātum arhasi
c pitṝṇāṃ mātulānāṃ ca sainyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
a dhanaṃjayo hi nas tāta garhayed etya saṃyugāt
c kṣipram astraṃ samādāya droṇānīkaṃ viśātaya
 abhimanyur uvāca
 śṛṇu rājan mahābāho vacanaṃ mama suvrata
 purā garbhagate vāpi cakravyūhapraveśanam
 mukhāt kṛṣṇasya rājendra śrutam asmi mayā prabho

a droṇasya dṛḍham avyagram anīkapravaraṃ yudhi

c notsahe tu vinirgantum ahaṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhindhy anīkaṃ yudhā śreṣṭha dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva naḥ
c vayaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmo yena tvaṃ tāta yāsyasi
a dhanaṃjayasamaṃ yuddhe tvāṃ vayaṃ tāta saṃyuge
c praṇidhāyānuyāsyāmo rakṣantaḥ sarvatomukhāḥ
 bhīma uvāca
a ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi dhṛṣṭadyumno 'tha sātyakiḥ
c pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyās tathā sarve prabhadrakāḥ
a sakṛd bhinnaṃ tvayā vyūhaṃ tatra tatra punaḥ punaḥ
c vayaṃ pradhvaṃsayiṣyāmo nighnamānā varān varān
 abhimanyur uvāca
 yāto 'ham arjunād rājan subhadrāyāṃ tathaiva ca
 mahadbalena saṃpūrṇaṃ paśyadhvaṃ pauruṣaṃ mama

 jyeṣṭhā mātā madīyā yat sabhāṃ nītā durāsadaiḥ
 duḥśāsanena ca tadā pāpena duṣṭakarmaṇā

a tat karmādya kariṣyāmi hitaṃ yad vaṃśayor dvayoḥ
c mātulasya ca yā prītir bhaviṣyati pituś ca me
a śiśunaikena saṃgrāme kālyamānāni saṃghaśaḥ
b dusthāni sarvasainyāni matkathā    
c adya drakṣyanti bhūtāni dviṣatsainyāni vai mayā
d nāhaṃ pārthena jātaḥ syāṃ na ca jātaḥ subhadrayā

d yadi caikarathenāhaṃ samagraṃ kṣatramaṇḍalam

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

c sādhyarudramarutkalpair vasvagnyādityavikramaiḥ

c abhyavarṣata saṃkruddhaḥ putrasya hitakṛt tava
a tasya cānucarāṃs tīkṣṇair vivyādha parameṣubhiḥ
c avajñāpūrvakaṃ vīraḥ saubhadrasya raṇājire
a abhimanyus tu rādheyaṃ trisaptatyā śilīmukhaiḥ
c avidhyat tvarito rājan droṇaṃ prepsur mahāmanāḥ
a taṃ tadā nāśakat kaś cid droṇād vārayituṃ raṇe
c ārujantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhān vajrahastam ivāsurān
a tataḥ karṇo jayaprepsur mānī sarvadhanurbhṛtām
c saubhadraṃ śataśo 'vidhyad uttamāstrāṇi darśayan
a so 'strair astravidāṃ śreṣṭho rāmaśiṣyaḥ pratāpavān
c samare śatrudurdharṣam abhimanyum apīḍayat
a sa tathā pīḍyamānas tu rādheyenāstravṛṣṭibhiḥ
c samare 'marasaṃkāśaḥ saubhadro na vyaṣīdata
a tataḥ śilāśitais tīkṣṇair bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c chittvā dhanūṃṣi śūrāṇām ārjuniḥ karṇam ārdayat
d dhanurmaṇḍalanirmuktaiḥ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
d sacchattradhvajayantāraṃ sāśvam āśu smayann iva
d karṇo 'pi cāsya cikṣepa bāṇān saṃnataparvaṇaḥ
d asaṃbhrāntaś ca tān sarvān agṛhṇāt phalgunātmajaḥ
d tato muhūrtāt karṇasya bāṇenaikena vīryavān
d tasmai cikṣepa niśitaṃ śaraṃ paramasaṃhitam
e sa dhvajaṃ kārmukaṃ cāsya chittvā bhūmau nyapātayat
a tataḥ kṛcchragataṃ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇād anantaraḥ
c saubhadram abhyayāt tūrṇaṃ dṛḍham udyamya kārmukam
a tata uccukruśuḥ pārthās teṣāṃ cānucarā janāḥ
c vāditrāṇi ca saṃjaghnuḥ saubhadraṃ cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a so 'bhigarjan dhanuṣpāṇir jyāṃ vikarṣan punaḥ punaḥ
c tayor mahātmanos tūrṇaṃ rathāntaram avāpatat
a so 'vidhyad daśabhir bāṇair abhimanyuṃ durāsadam
c sacchatradhvajayantāraṃ sāśvam āśu smayann iva
a pitṛpaitāmahaṃ karma kurvāṇam atimānuṣam
c dṛṣṭvārditaṃ śaraiḥ kārṣṇiṃ tvadīyā hṛṣitābhavan
a tasyābhimanyur āyamya smayann ekena patriṇā
c śiraḥ pracyāvayām āsa sa rathāt prāpatad bhuvi
a karṇikāram ivoddhūtaṃ vātena mathitaṃ nagāt
b karṇānujaṃ ca saṃprekṣya tāvakā vyathitābhavan
c bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājan karṇo vyathāṃ yayau
d punaḥ karṇaṃrṇaḥ pravivyādha śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
d vivyādha daśabhiḥ śūro abhimanyuṃ mahābalam
d aprāptān eva tān sarvāṃś ciccheda laghuhastavat
d smayan dhanuś chittvā submetric
rādheyasya mahābalaḥ
d hayāṃś ca jaghne tvarito dhvajaṃ sārathinā saha
d rādheyaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā saubhadro vākyam abravīt
d mayā jito 'si rādheya viratho 'si mahāmate
d anyaṃ rathaṃ samāruhya yudhyasva ca mahābalaḥ
d bhṛtyo 'si sūtaputro 'si baiḍālavratikaḥ sadā
d pāṇḍavaiḥ saha paiśunyaṃ nitya tvaṃ kṛtavān asi
d sabhāṃ nītvā ca pāñcālī vivastrā kāritā tvayā
d tattadrūpāny anekāni vāsāṃsi subahūni ca
d dṛṣṭāni tatra yuṣmābhiḥ kurubhiś ca durātmabhiḥ
d tatphalaṃ saṃpradṛśyāmi yadi notsahase raṇam
d yuṣmābhiś ca kṛto 'dyaiva cakravyūho durātmabhiḥ
d kulīnā ye ca rājāno dharmiṣṭhāḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ
d cakrākhyaṃ ca na kurvanti vyūhaṃ pāpiṣṭhakāritam
d krauñcāḥ suparṇā haṃsāhvā muśalā gāruḍās tathā
d ete vyūhāś ca śūrāṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhānāṃ mahātmanām
d yūyaṃ daityāṃśasaṃbhūtāḥ sarve tatra na saṃśayaḥ
d ity evam uktvā sa tadā mahātmā
d karṇaṃ subhadrātanayo mahābalaḥ
d sa yoddhukāmaḥ kurubhir nṛvīro
d mahābalaḥ satyavatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
a vimukhīkṛtya karṇaṃ tu saubhadraḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
c anyān api maheṣvāsāṃs tūrṇam evābhidudruve
a tatas tad vitataṃ jālaṃ hastyaśvarathapattimat
c jhaṣaḥ kruddha ivābhindad abhimanyur mahāyaśāḥ
a karṇas tu bahubhir bāṇair ardyamāno 'bhimanyunā
c apāyāj javanair aśvais tato 'nīkam abhidyata
d tiṣṭha karṇa maheṣvāsa kṛpa duryodhaneti ca
d droṇasya krośato rājaṃs tad anīkam abhajyata
a śalabhair iva cākāśe dhārābhir iva cāvṛte
c abhimanyoḥ śarai rājan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
a tāvakānāṃ tu yodhānāṃ vadhyatāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c anyatra saindhavād rājan na sma kaś cid atiṣṭhata
a saubhadras tu tataḥ śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
c śīghram abhyapatat senāṃ bhāratīṃ bharatarṣabha
a sa kakṣe 'gnir ivotsṛṣṭo nirdahaṃs tarasā ripūn
c madhye bhāratasainyānām ārjuniḥ paryavartata
a rathanāgāśvamanujān ardayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c sa praviśyākarod bhūmiṃ kabandhagaṇasaṃkulām
a saubhadracāpaprabhavair nikṛttāḥ parameṣubhiḥ
c svān evābhimukhān ghnantaḥ prādravañ jīvitārthinaḥ
a te ghorā raudrakarmāṇo vipāṭhāḥ pṛthavaḥ śitāḥ
c nighnanto rathanāgāśvāñ jagmur āśu vasuṃdharām
a sāyudhāḥ sāṅgulitrāṇāḥ sakhaḍgāḥ sāṅgadā raṇe
c dṛśyante bāhavaś chinnā hemābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
a śarāś cāpāni khaḍgāś ca śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
c sakuṇḍalāni sragvīṇi bhūmāv āsan sahasraśaḥ
a apaskarair adhiṣṭhānair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥ
c akṣair vimathitaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā rathaiḥ
e śakticāpāyudhaiś cāpi patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
f carmacāpadharaiś cāpi vyavakīrṇaiḥ samantataḥ
a nihataiḥ kṣatriyair aśvair vāraṇaiś ca viśāṃ pate
c agamyakalpā pṛthivī kṣaṇenāsīt sudāruṇā
a vadhyatāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ krandatām itaretaram
c prādurāsīn mahāśabdo bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanaḥ
e sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha diśaḥ sarvā vyanādayat
a saubhadraś cādravat senāṃ nighnann aśvarathadvipān
c vyacarat sa diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś cāhitān rujan
a taṃ tadā nānupaśyāma sainyena rajasāvṛtam
c ādadānaṃ gajāśvānāṃ nṛṇāṃ cāyūṃṣi bhārata
a kṣaṇena bhūyo 'paśyāma sūryaṃ madhyaṃdine yathā
c abhimanyuṃ mahārāja pratapantaṃ dviṣadgaṇān
a sa vāsavasamaḥ saṃkhye vāsavasyātmajātmajaḥ
c abhimanyur mahārāja sainyamadhye vyarocata
d yathā purā vahnisutaḥ surasainyeṣu vīryavān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a bālam atyantasukhinam avāryabaladarpitam
c yuddheṣu kuśalaṃ vīraṃ kulaputraṃ tanutyajam
a gāhamānam anīkāni sadaśvais taṃ trihāyanaiḥ
c api yaudhiṣṭhirāt sainyāt kaś cid anvapatad rathī
 saṃjaya uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhiro bhīmasenaḥ śikhaṇḍī sātyakir yamau
c dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca sakekayaḥ
e dhṛṣṭaketuś ca saṃrabdho matsyāś cānvapatan raṇe
f tenaiva tu pathā yātāḥ pitaro mātulaiḥ saha
a abhyadravan parīpsanto vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrāṃs tvadīyā vimukhābhavan
a tatas tad vimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava sūnor mahad balam
c jāmātā tava tejasvī viṣṭambhayiṣur ādravat
a saindhavasya mahārāja putro rājā jayadrathaḥ
c sa putragṛddhinaḥ pārthān sahasainyān avārayat
a ugradhanvā maheṣvāso divyam astram udīrayan
c vārdhakṣatrir upāsedhat pravaṇād iva kuñjarān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a atibhāram ahaṃ manye saindhave saṃjayāhitam
c yad ekaḥ pāṇḍavān kruddhān putragṛddhīn avārayat
a atyadbhutam idaṃ manye balaṃ śauryaṃ ca saindhave
c tad asya brūhi me vīryaṃ karma cāgryaṃ mahātmanaḥ
a kiṃ dattaṃ hutam iṣṭaṃ vā sutaptam atha vā tapaḥ
b damo vā brahmacaryaṃ vā sūta yac cāsya sattama
b devaṃ katamam ārādhya viṣṇum īśānam agnijam
c sindhurājena yenaikaḥ kruddhān pārthān avārayat
d naivaṃ kṛtaṃ mahatkarma bhīṣmeṇājñāsiṣaṃ tathā
d sindhurāṭtanayas tv eko yathā pārthān avārayat
 saṃjaya uvāca
a draupadīharaṇe yat tad bhīmasenena nirjitaḥ
c mānāt sa taptavān rājā varārthī sumahat tapaḥ
a indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ priyebhyaḥ saṃnivartya saḥ
c kṣutpipāsātapasahaḥ kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ
e devam ārādhayac charvaṃ gṛṇan brahma sanātanam
a bhaktānukampī bhagavāṃs tasya cakre tato dayām
c svapnānte 'py atha caivāha haraḥ sindhupateḥ sutam
e varaṃ vṛṇīṣva prīto 'smi jayadratha kim icchasi
a evam uktas tu śarveṇa sindhurājo jayadrathaḥ
c uvāca praṇato rudraṃ prāñjalir niyatātmavān
a pāṇḍaveyān ahaṃ saṃkhye bhīmavīryaparākramān
c eko raṇe dhārayeyaṃ samastān iti bhārata
d tasya cālpena kālena niyamena sutoṣitaḥ
d prīto maheśvaras tasmai varaṃ caivaṃ dadau tadā
d sa tu vavre varaṃ tatra pāṇḍaveyān ahaṃ raṇe
d vārayeyaṃ rathenaikaḥ
a evam uktas tu deveśo jayadratham athābravīt
c dadāmi te varaṃ saumya vinā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
d yam āhur ajitaṃ saṃkhye śaṅkhacakragadādharam
d viṣṇusahasramūrdhānaṃ sa kṛṣṇaḥ pāti phālgunam
a dhārayiṣyasi saṃgrāme caturaḥ pāṇḍunandanān
c evam astv iti deveśam uktvābudhyata pārthivaḥ
d tenoktas tam ṛte pārthaṃ śarvas tasmai varaṃ dadau
d ekāham iti rājendra tatraivādarśanaṃ gataḥ
a sa tena varadānena divyenāstrabalena ca
c ekaḥ saṃdhārayām āsa pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
a tasya jyātalaghoṣeṇa kṣatriyān bhayam āviśat
c parāṃs tu tava sainyasya harṣaḥ paramako 'bhavat
a dṛṣṭvā tu kṣatriyā bhāraṃ saindhave sarvam arpitam
c utkruśyābhyadravan rājan yena yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ balam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a yan mā pṛcchasi rājendra sindhurājasya vikramam
c śṛṇu tat sarvam ākhyāsye yathā pāṇḍūn ayodhayat
a tam ūhuḥ sārather vaśyāḥ saindhavāḥ sādhuvāhinaḥ
c vikurvāṇā bṛhanto 'śvāḥ śvasanopamaraṃhasaḥ
a gandharvanagarākāraṃ vidhivat kalpitaṃ ratham
c tasyābhyaśobhayat ketur vārāho rājato mahān
a śvetacchatrapatākābhiś cāmaravyajanena ca
c sa babhau rājaliṅgais tais tārāpatir ivāmbare
a muktāvajramaṇisvarṇair bhūṣitaṃ tad ayasmayam
c varūthaṃ vibabhau tasya jyotirbhiḥ kham ivāvṛtam
a sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirann iṣugaṇān bahūn
c tat khaṇḍaṃ pūrayām āsa yad vyadārayad ārjuniḥ
a sa sātyakiṃ tribhir bāṇair aṣṭabhiś ca vṛkodaram
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tathā ṣaṣṭyā virāṭaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a drupadaṃ pañcabhis tīkṣṇair daśabhiś ca śikhaṇḍinam
c kekayān pañcaviṃśatyā draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca saptatyā tataḥ śeṣān apānudat
c iṣujālena mahatā tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a athāsya śitapītena bhallenādiśya kārmukam
c ciccheda prahasan rājā dharmaputraḥ pratāpavān
a akṣṇor nimeṣamātreṇa so 'nyad ādāya kārmukam
c vivyādha daśabhiḥ pārtha tāṃś caivānyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
a tasya tal lāghavaṃ jñātvā bhīmo bhallais tribhiḥ punaḥ
c dhanur dhvajaṃ ca chatraṃ ca kṣitau kṣipram apātayat
a so 'nyad ādāya balavān sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam
c bhīmasyāpothayat ketuṃ dhanur aśvāṃś ca māriṣa
a sa hatāśvād avaplutya chinnadhanvā rathottamāt
c sātyaker āpluto yānaṃ giryagram iva kesarī
a tatas tvadīyāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
c sindhurājasya tat karma prekṣyāśraddheyam uttamam
d vivyadhuḥ śaravarṣeṇa samantān nṛpasattamāḥ
d saṃchādyamāno bahubhiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaiḥ
d na vivyathe mahārāja divyam astram upāśritaḥ
d chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
d chādayām āsa tān sarvāṃs tad abhūd romaharṣaṇam
a saṃkruddhān pāṇḍavān eko yad dadhārāstratejasā
c tat tasya karma bhūtāni sarvāṇy evābhyapūjayan
a saubhadreṇa hataiḥ pūrvaṃ sottarāyudhibhir dvipaiḥ
c pāṇḍūnāṃ darśitaḥ panthāḥ saindhavena nivāritaḥ
a yatamānās tu te vīrā matsyapāñcālakekayāḥ
c pāṇḍavāś cānvapadyanta pratyaikaśyena saindhavam
a yo yo hi yatate bhettuṃ droṇānīkaṃ tavāhitaḥ
c taṃ taṃ devavaraprāptyā saindhavaḥ pratyavārayat
 saṃjaya uvāca
a saindhavena niruddheṣu jayagṛddhiṣu pāṇḍuṣu
c sughoram abhavad yuddhaṃ tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
a praviśya tv ārjuniḥ senāṃ satyasaṃdho durāsadām
c vyakṣobhayata tejasvī makaraḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
a taṃ tathā śaravarṣeṇa kṣobhayantam ariṃdamam
c yathāpradhānāḥ saubhadram abhyayuḥ kurusattamāḥ
a teṣāṃ tasya ca saṃmardo dāruṇaḥ samapadyata
c sṛjatāṃ śaravarṣāṇi prasaktam amitaujasām
a rathavrajena saṃruddhas tair amitrair athārjuniḥ
c vṛṣasenasya yantāraṃ hatvā ciccheda kārmukam
a tasya vivyādha balavāñ śarair aśvān ajihmagaiḥ
c vātāyamānair atha tair aśvair apahṛto raṇāt
a tenāntareṇābhimanyor yantāpāsārayad ratham
c rathavrajās tato hṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
a taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ pramathnantaṃ śarair arīn
c ārād āyāntam abhyetya vasātīyo 'bhyayād drutam
a so 'bhimanyuṃ śaraiḥ ṣaṣṭyā rukmapuṅkhair avākirat
c abravīc ca na me jīvañ jīvato yudhi mokṣyase
a tam ayasmayavarmāṇam iṣuṇā āśupātinā
c vivyādha hṛdi saubhadraḥ sa papāta vyasuḥ kṣitau
a vasātyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhāḥ kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
c parivavrus tadā rājaṃs tava pautraṃ jighāṃsavaḥ
a visphārayantaś cāpāni nānārūpāṇy anekaśaḥ
c tad yuddham abhavad raudraṃ saubhadrasyāribhiḥ saha
a teṣāṃ śarān seṣvasanāñ śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
c sakuṇḍalāni sragvīṇi kruddhaś ciccheda phālguniḥ
a sakhaḍgāḥ sāṅgulitrāṇāḥ sapaṭṭiśaparaśvadhāḥ
c adṛśyanta bhujāś chinnā hemābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
a sragbhir ābharaṇair vastraiḥ patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
c varmabhiś carmabhir hārair mukuṭaiś chatracāmaraiḥ
a apaskarair adhiṣṭhānair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥ
c akṣair vimathitaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā yugaiḥ
a anukarṣaiḥ patākābhis tathā sārathivājibhiḥ
c rathaiś ca bhagnair nāgaiś ca hataiḥ kīrṇābhavan mahī
a nihataiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ śūrair nānājanapadeśvaraiḥ
c jayagṛddhair vṛtā bhūmir dāruṇā samapadyata
a diśo vicaratas tasya sarvāś ca pradiśas tathā
c raṇe 'bhimanyoḥ kruddhasya rūpam antaradhīyata
a kāñcanaṃ yad yad asyāsīd varma cābharaṇāni ca
c dhanuṣaś ca śarāṇāṃ ca tad apaśyāma kevalam
a taṃ tadā nāśakat kaś cic cakṣurbhyām abhivīkṣitum
c ādadānaṃ śarair yodhān madhye sūryam iva sthitam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a ādadānas tu śūrāṇām āyūṃṣy abhavad ārjuniḥ
c antakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāṇān kāla ivāgate
a sa śakra iva vikrāntaḥ śakrasūnoḥ suto balī
c abhimanyus tadānīkaṃ loḍayan bahv aśobhata
a praviśyaiva tu rājendra kṣatriyendrāntakopamaḥ
c satyaśravasam ādatta vyāghro mṛgam ivolbaṇam
a satyaśravasi cākṣipte tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
c pragṛhya vipulaṃ śastram abhimanyum upādravan
a ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
c spardhamānāḥ samājagmur jighāṃsanto 'rjunātmajam
a kṣatriyāṇām anīkāni pradrutāny abhidhāvatām
c jagrāsa timir āsādya kṣudramatsyān ivārṇave
a ye ke cana gatās tasya samīpam apalāyinaḥ
c na te pratinyavartanta samudrād iva sindhavaḥ
a mahāgrāhagṛhīteva vātavegabhayārditā
c samakampata sā senā vibhraṣṭā naur ivārṇave
d saṃtrastā vāhinī tubhyaṃ naur ivāsīn mahārṇave
a atha rukmaratho nāma madreśvarasuto balī

d mṛtā iti ca śabdo 'yaṃ vartate ca gatārthavat
d ime mṛtā mahīpālāḥ prāyaśo bhīmavikramāḥ
d rājaputrāś ca saṃrabdhā vaiśvānaramukhaṃ gatāḥ
d atra me saṃśayaḥ prāptaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā iti
d kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur imāḥ prajāḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d taṃ tathā paripṛcchantaṃ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
d āśvāsanam idaṃ vākyam uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
d atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d akampanasya kathitaṃ nāradena purā nṛpa
d sa cāpi rājā rājendra putravyasanam uttamam
d aprasahyatamaṃ loke prāptavān iti me matiḥ
d tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi mṛtyoḥ prabhavam uttamam
d tatas tvaṃ mokṣyase duḥkhāt snehabaṃdhanasaṃśrayāt
d purā vṛttam idaṃ tāta śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
d dhanyam ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ śokaghnaṃ puṣṭivardhanam
d purā kṛtayuge tāta āsīd rājā hy akampanaḥ
d sa śatruvaśam āpanno madhye saṃgrāmamūrdhani
d tasya putro harir nāma nārāyaṇasamadyutiḥ
d śrīmān kṛtāstro medhāvī yudhi śakrasamo balī
d sa śatrubhiḥ parivṛto bahudhā raṇamūrdhani
d vyasyan bāṇasahasrāṇi yodheṣu ca gajeṣu ca
d sa karma duṣkaraṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāme śatrutāpanaḥ
d śatrubhir nihataḥ saṃkhye pṛtanāyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d sa rājā pretakṛtyāni tasya kṛtvā śucānvitaḥ
d śocann ahani rātrau ca nālabhat sukham ātmanaḥ
d tasya śokaṃ viditvā tu putravyasanasaṃbhavam
d athājagāma devarṣir nārado 'sya samīpataḥ
d sa tu rājā mahābhāgo dṛṣṭvā devarṣisattamam
d pūjayitvā yathānyāyaṃ kathām akathayat tadā
d tasya sarvaṃ samācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ nareśvara
d śatrubhir vijayaṃ saṃkhye putrasya ca vadhaṃ tathā
d mama putro mahāvīrya indraviṣṇusamadyutiḥ
d śatrubhir bahubhiḥ saṃkhye parākramya hato balī
d ka eṣa mṛtyur bhagavan kiṃvīryabalapauruṣaḥ
d etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ matimatāṃ vara
d tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado varadaḥ prabhuḥ
d ākhyānam idam ācaṣṭa putraśokāpahaṃ mahat
d nārada uvāca
d śṛṇu rājan mahābāho ākhyānaṃ bahuvistaram
d yathā vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ caiva mayāpi vasudhādhipa
d prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tadā brahmā ādisarge pitāmahaḥ
d asaṃhṛtaṃ mahātejā dṛṣṭvā jagad idaṃ prabhuḥ
d tasya cintā samutpannā saṃhāraṃ prati pārthiva
d cintayan na hy asau veda saṃhāraṃ vasudhādhipa
d tasya roṣān mahārāja khebhyo 'gnir udatiṣṭhata
d tena sarvā diśo vyāptāḥ sāntardeśā didhakṣatā
d tato divaṃ bhuvaṃ khaṃ ca jvālāmālāsamāvṛtam
d carācaraṃ jagat sarvaṃ dadāha bhagavān prabhuḥ
d tato hatāni bhūtāni carāṇi sthāvarāṇi ca
d mahatā krodhavegena trāsayann iva vīryavān
d tato haro jaṭī sthāṇur niśācarapatiḥ śivaḥ
d jagāma śaraṇaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam
d tasminn āpatite sthāṇau prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d abravīt paramo devo jvalann iva mahāmuniḥ
d kiṃ kurma kāmaṃ kāmārha kāmāj jāto 'si putraka
d sthāṇur uvāca
d kariṣyāmi priyaṃ sarvaṃ brūhi sthāṇo yad icchasi
d prajāsarganimittaṃ hi kṛto yatnas tvayā vibho
d tvayā sṛṣṭāś ca vṛddhāś ca bhūtagrāmāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
d tās taveha punaḥ krodhāt prajā dahyanti sarvaśaḥ
d brahmovāca
d tā dṛṣṭvā mama kāruṇyaṃ prasīda bhagavan prabho
d na krudhye na ca me kāma etad evaṃ bhaved iti
d pṛthivyā hitakāmāt tu tato māṃ manyur āviśat
d iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacūcudat
d saṃhārārthaṃ mahādeva bhāreṇābhihatā satī
d tato 'haṃ nādhigacchāmi tapye bahuvidhaṃ tadā
d sthāṇur uvāca
d saṃhāram aprameyasya tato māṃ manyur āviśat
d saṃhārārthaṃ prasīdasva mā ruṣo vibudhādhipa
d mā prajāḥ sthāvarāś caiva jaṅgamāś ca vyanīnaśan
d tava prasādād bhagavann idaṃ vartet tridhā jagat
d anāgatam atītaṃ ca yac ca saṃprati vartate
d bhagavān krodhasaṃdīptaḥ krodhād agniṃ samāsṛjat
d sa dahaty aśmakūṭāni drumāṃś ca saritas tathā
d palvalāni ca sarvāṇi sarve caiva tṛṇolapāḥ
d sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva niḥśeṣaṃ kurute jagat
d tad etad bhasmasād bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad anāvilam
d prasīda bhagavan sa tvaṃ roṣo na syād varo mama
d sarve hi naṣṭā neṣyanti tava deva kathaṃ cana
d tasmān nivartatāṃ tejas tvayy eveha pralīyatām
d upāyam anyaṃ saṃpaśya prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d yatheme prāṇinaḥ sarve nivarteraṃs tathā kuru
d abhāvaṃ neha gaccheyur utsannajananāḥ prajāḥ
d adhidaive niyukto 'smi tvayā lokeṣu lokahan
d mā vinaśyej jagannātha jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
d nārada uvāca
d prasādābhimukhaṃ devaṃ tasmād evaṃ bravīmy aham
d śrutvā hi vacanaṃ devaḥ sthāṇor nihatapāpmanaḥ
d tejaḥ saṃveṣṭayām āsa punar evāntarātmani
d tato 'gnim upasaṃhṛtya bhagavāṃl lokasatkṛtaḥ
d pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kalpayām āsa vai prabhuḥ
d upasaṃharatas tasya tam agniṃ roṣajaṃ tathā
d prādurbabhūva viśvebhyaḥ khebhyo nārī mahātmanaḥ
d kṛṣṇā raktāmbaradharā raktajihvāsyalocanā
d kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca rājendra taptābhyāṃ samalaṃkṛtā
d sā viniḥsṛtya vai khebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritā
d smayamāneva cāvaikṣad devau viśveśvarāv ubhau
d tām āhūya tadā devo lokādinidhaneśvaraḥ
d mṛtyo iti mahīpāla jahi cemāḥ prajā iti
d tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyātha prādurbhūtā ruṣo mama
d tasmāt saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajāḥ sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
d mama tvaṃ hi niyogena tataḥ śreyo hy avāpsyasi
d evam uktā tu sā tena mṛtyuḥ kamalalocanā
d dadhyau cātyartham abalā praruroda ca susvaram
d pāṇibhyāṃ pratijagrāha tāny aśrūṇi pitāmahaḥ
d nārada uvāca
d sarvabhūtahitārthāya tāṃ cāpy anunayat tadā
d vinīya duḥkham abalā ātmany eva prajāpatim
d uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā latevāvarjitā punaḥ
d tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī īdṛśī vadatāṃ vara
d krūraṃ karmāhitaṃ kuryāṃ mūḍheva kim u jānatī
d bibhemy aham adharmād dhi prasīda bhagavan prabho
d priyān putrān vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn mātṝḥ pitṝn patīn
d anudhyāsyanti ye deva mṛtāṃs teṣāṃ bibhemy aham
d kṛpaṇānāṃ hi rudatāṃ ye patanty aśrubindavaḥ
d tebhyo hi balavad bhītā śaraṇaṃ tvāham āgatā
d yamasya bhavanaṃ deva na gaccheyaṃ surottama
d prasādaye tvā varada mūrdhnodagranakhena ca
d etad icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmaha
d iccheyaṃ tvatprasādād vai tapas taptuṃ prajeśvara
d pradiśemaṃ varaṃ deva tvaṃ mahyaṃ bhagavan prabho
d tvayā hy uktā gamiṣyāmi dhenukāśramam uttamam
d tatra tapsye tapas tīvraṃ tavaivārādhane ratā
d na hi śakṣyāmi deveśa prāṇān prāṇabhṛtāṃ priyān
d brahmovāca
d hartuṃ vilapamānānām adharmād abhirakṣa mām
d mṛtyo saṃkalpitāsi tvaṃ prajāsaṃhārahetunā
d gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā te vicāraṇā
d bhavitā tv etad evaṃ hi naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet
d nārada uvāca
d bhavatv aninditā loke kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
d evam uktābhavadbhītā prāñjalir bhagavanmukhī
d saṃhāre nākarod buddhiṃ prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā devaḥ prajānām īśvareśvaraḥ
d prasādaṃ cāgamat kṣipram ātmany eva pitāmahaḥ
d smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣata
d lokāś cāsan yathāpūrvaṃ dṛṣṭās tenāpamanyunā
d nivṛttaroṣe tasmiṃs tu bhagavaty aparājite
d sā kanyāpi jagāmātha samīpāt tasya dhīmataḥ
d apasṛtyāpratiśrutya prajāsaṃharaṇaṃ tadā
d tvaramāṇā ca rājendra mṛtyur dhenukam abhyayāt
d sā tatra paramaṃ tīvraṃ cacāra vratam uttamam
d samāhitaikapādena tasthau padmāni ṣoḍaśa
d pañca cānyāni kāruṇyāt prajānām abhayaiṣiṇī
d indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyaḥ priyebhyaḥ saṃnivartya sā
d tatas tv ekena pādena punar anyāni sapta vai
d tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva sapta caikaṃ ca pārthiva
d tataḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sā
d punar gatvā tato nandāṃ puṇyāṃ śītāmalodakām
d apsu varṣasahasrāṇi sapta caikaṃ ca sānayat
d dhārayitvā tu niyamaṃ nandāyāṃ vītakalmaṣā
d sā pūrvaṃ kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ jagāma niyame dhṛtā
d tatra vāyujalāhārā cacāra niyutaṃ punaḥ
d pañcagaṅge ca sā puṇye kanyā vetasakeṣu ca
d tapoviśeṣair bahubhiḥ karśayad deham ātmanaḥ
d tato gatvā mahāgaṅgāṃ mahāmeruṃ ca kevalam
d tasthau cāśmeva niśceṣṭā prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇā
d punar himavato mūrdhni yatra devā purāyajan
d tatrāṅguṣṭena sā tasthau nikharvaṃ paramā śubhā
d puṣkareṣv atha gokarṇe naimiṣe malaye tathā
d akarśayat svakaṃ dehaṃ niyamair manasaḥ priyaiḥ
d ananyadevatā nityaṃ dṛḍhabhaktā pitāmahe
d tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa dharmataḥ
d tatas tām abravīt prīto lokānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ
d mṛtyo kim idam atyarthaṃ tapāṃsi carasīti ha
d tato 'bravīt punar mṛtyur bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham
d nāhaṃ hanyāṃ prajā deva svasthāś cākrośatīs tathā
d etad icchāmi sarveśa tvatto varam ahaṃ prabho
d adharmabhayabhītāsmi tato 'haṃ tapa āsthitā
d bhītāyās tu mahābhāga prayacchābhayam avyaya
d ārtā cānāgasī nārī yācāmi bhava me gatiḥ
d tām abravīt tato devo bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyavit
d adharmo nāsti te mṛtyo saṃharantyā imāḥ prajāḥ
d mayā coktaṃ mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā na kathaṃ cana
d tasmāt saṃhara kalyāṇi prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥ
d dharmaḥ sanātanaś ca tvā sarvathānupravekṣyati
d lokapālo yamaś caiva sahāyā vyādhayas tathā
d ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva punar dāsyāma te varam
d yathā tvam enasā muktā virajāḥ khyātim eṣyasi
d saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vibhum
d punar evābravīd vākyaṃ prasādya śirasā tadā
d yady evam etat kartavyaṃ mayā na syād vinā prabho
d tavājñā mūrdhni me nyastā yat te vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
d lobhaḥ krodho 'bhyasūyerṣyā droho mohaś ca dehinām
d brahmovāca
d ahrīś cānyonyaparuṣā dehaṃ bhindyuḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
d tathā bhaviṣyate mṛtyo sādhu saṃhara vai prajāḥ
d adharmas te na bhavitā nāpadhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhe
d yāny aśrubindūni kare samāsate
d te vyādhayaḥ prāṇinām ātmajātāḥ
d te mārayiṣyanti narān gatāsūn
d nādharmas te bhavitā mā sma bhaiṣīḥ
d dharmo mṛtyo māraṇe prāṇināṃ te
d tvaṃ vai dharmas tvaṃ hi dharmasya ceśā
d dharmyā bhūtvā dharmanityā dharitrī
d tasmāt prāṇān sarvathemān niyaccha
d sarveṣāṃ vai prāṇināṃ kāmaroṣau
d saṃtyajya tvaṃ saṃharasveha jīvān
d evaṃ dharmas te bhaviṣyaty ananto
d mithyāvṛttān mārayiṣyaty adharmaḥ
d tenātmānaṃ pāvayasvātmanā tvaṃ
d pāpe ''tmānaṃ majjayiṣyanty asattvāḥ
d tasmāt kāmaṃ roṣam apy āgataṃ tvaṃ
d nārada uvāca
d saṃtyajyātaḥ saṃharasveha jīvān
d sā vai bhītā mṛtyusaṃjñopadeśāc
d chāpād bhītā bāḍham ity abravīt tam
d sā ca prāṇān prāṇinām antakāle
d kāmakrodhau tyajya haraty asaktā
d mṛtyus teṣāṃ vyādhayas tatprasūtā
d vyādhī rogo rujyate yena jantuḥ
d sarveṣāṃ vai prāṇināṃ prāyaṇānte
d prāṇā gatvā saṃnivṛttās tathaiva
d vāyur bhīmo bhīmanādo mahaujā
d bhettā dehān prāṇināṃ sarvago 'sau
d naivāvṛttiṃ nānuvṛttiṃ kadā cit
d prāpnoty ugro 'nantatejā viśiṣṭaḥ
d sarve devā martyasaṃjñā viśiṣṭās
d tasmāt putraṃ mā śuco rājasiṃha
d svargaṃ prāpto modate tvattanūjo
d nityaṃ ramyān vīralokān avāpya
d tyaktvā duḥkhaṃ saṃgataḥ puṇyakṛdbhir
d eṣā mṛtyur devadiṣṭā prajānām
d prāpte kāle saṃharitrī yathāvat
d svayaṃ kṛtā prāṇaharā prajānām
d ātmānaṃ vai prāṇino ghnanti sarve
d nainaṃ mṛtyur daṇḍapāṇir hinasti
d tasmān mṛtān nānuśocanti dhīrās
d vyāsa uvāca
d tattvaṃ jñātvā niścayaṃ brahmasṛṣṭam
d etac chrutvārthavad vākyaṃ nāradena prakāśitam
d uvācākampano rājā sakhāyaṃ nāradaṃ tadā
d vyapetaśokaḥ prīto 'smi bhagavann ṛṣisattama
d śrutvetihāsaṃ tvatto 'dya kṛtārtho 'smy abhivādaye
d tathokto nāradas tena rājñā ṛṣivarottamaḥ
d jagāma nandanaṃ śīghraṃ devarṣir amitātmavān
d puṇyaṃ yaśasyaṃ svargyaṃ ca dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca
d asyetihāsasya sadā śravaṇaṃ śrāvaṇaṃ tathā
d etad arthapadaṃ śrutvā vijñāya tvaṃ ca pāṇḍava
d kṣatradharmaṃ ca vijñāya śūrāṇāṃ ca parāṃ gatim
d saṃprāpto 'sau mahāvīryaḥ svargalokaṃ mahārathaḥ
d abhimanyuḥ parān hatvā pramukhe sarvadhanvinām
d yudhyamāno maheṣvāso hataḥ so 'bhimukho raṇe
d asinā gadayā śaktyā dhanuṣā ca mahārathaḥ
d tasmāt parāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha pāṇḍava
d saṃjaya uvāca
d apramattaḥ susaṃnaddhaḥ śīghraṃ yoddhum upākrama
d śrutvā mṛtyusamutpattiṃ karmāṇy anupamāni ca
d dharmarājaḥ punar vākyaṃ prasādyainam athābravīt
d guravaḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ śakrapratimavikramāḥ
d pūrvarājarṣayo brahman kiyanto mṛtyunā hatāḥ
d bhūya eva tu māṃ tathyair vacobhir abhibṛṃhaya
d rājarṣīṇāṃ purāṇānāṃ samāśvāsaya karmabhiḥ
d kiyatyo dakṣiṇā dattāḥ kaiś ca dattā mahātmabhiḥ
d vyāsa uvāca
d rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyakṛdbhis tad bhavān prabravītu me
d śvityasya nṛpateḥ putraḥ sṛñjayo nāma bhūmipaḥ
d sakhāyau tasya caivobhau ṛṣī nāradaparvatau
d tau kadā cid gṛhaṃ tasya praviṣṭau taddidṛkṣayā
d vidhivac cārcitau tena prītau tatroṣatuḥ sukham
d taṃ kadā cit sukhāsīnaṃ tābhyāṃ saha śucismitā
d nārada uvāca
d duhitābhyāgamat kanyā sṛñjayaṃ varavarṇinī
d kasyeyaṃ capalāpāṅgī sarvalakṣaṇasaṃmatā
d utāho bhāsvid arkasya jvalanasya śikhā tv iyam
d vyāsa uvāca
d hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtir dhṛtiḥ puṣṭiḥ siddhiś candramasaḥ prabhā
d evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ devarṣiṃ nṛpatiḥ sṛñjayo 'bravīt
d mameyaṃ bhagavan kanyā matto varam abhīpsati
d nāradas tv abravīd enaṃ dehi mahyam imāṃ nṛpa
d bhāryārthaṃ sumahac chreyaḥ prāptuṃ ced icchase 'nagha
d dadānīty eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sṛñjayaḥ prāha nāradam
d parvatas tu susaṃkruddho nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt
d hṛdayena mayā pūrvaṃ vṛtāṃ vai vṛtavān asi
d yasmād vṛtā tvayā vipra mā gāḥ svargaṃ yathecchayā
d evam ukto nāradas taṃ pratyuvācottaraṃ vacaḥ
d manovāgbuddhisaṃbhāṣāḥ satyaṃ toyam athāgnayaḥ
d pāṇigrahaṇamantrāś ca prathitaṃ varalakṣaṇam
d na tv eṣā niścitā niṣṭhā niṣṭhā saptapadī smṛtā
d anutpanne ca kāryārthe māṃ tvaṃ vyāhṛtavān asi
d tasmāt tvam api na svargaṃ gamiṣyasi mayā vinā
d anyonyam evaṃ śaptvā vai tasthatus tatra tau tadā
d sṛñjayo hy api vai viprān pānācchādanabhojanaiḥ
d putrakāmaḥ paraṃ śaktyā yatnenopācarac chuciḥ
d tasya prasannā viprendrāḥ kadā cit putram īpsavaḥ
d tapaḥsvādhyāyaniratā vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ
d sahitā nāradaṃ prāhur dehy asmai putram īpsitam
d tathety uktvā dvijair uktaḥ sṛñjayaṃ nārado 'bravīt
d varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yādṛśaṃ putram īpsitam
d tathoktaḥ prāñjalī rājā putraṃ vavre guṇānvitam
d yaśasvinaṃ kīrtimantaṃ tejasvinam ariṃdamam
d yasya mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca kledaḥ svedaś ca kāñcanam

d so 'syākaraḥ kāñcanasya tasya yatnaṃ carāmahe

d hatvā viśasya nāpaśyan sulubdhā vasu kiṃ cana
d tasya prāṇair vimuktasya naṣṭaṃ tad varadaṃ vasu

d hatvā parasparaṃ naṣṭāḥ kumāraṃ cādbhutaṃ bhuvi
d asaṃbhāvyaṃ gatā ghoraṃ narakaṃ duṣṭakāriṇaḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ putraṃ varadattaṃ mahātapāḥ
d vilalāpa suduḥkhārto bahudhā karuṇaṃ nṛpaḥ

d āvikṣitaṃ maruttaṃ ca mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma

d yasmai rājarṣaye prādād varaṃ sa bhagavān prabhuḥ
d haimaṃ himavataḥ pādaṃ yiyakṣor vividhaiḥ savaiḥ
d yasya sendrā marudgaṇā bṛhaspatipurogamāḥ

d havirbhis tarpitā yena samyak kḷptair divaukasaḥ
d ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sukhajīvinām
d brahmacaryaśrutasutair yajñair dānena cānṛṇaḥ
d śayanāsanayānāni svarṇarāśīś ca dustyajāḥ
d tat sarvam amitaṃ vittaṃ dattvā viprebhya icchayā
d so 'nudhyātas tu śakreṇa prajāḥ kṛtvā nirāmayāḥ
d śraddadhāno jitāṃl lokān gataḥ puṇyaduho 'kṣayān
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat

d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat

d tasyāśvamedhe rājarṣer deśād deśāt sameyuṣām

d vedavidyāvratasnātā vadānyāḥ priyadarśanāḥ
d subhakṣācchādanagṛhāḥ suśayyāsanavāhanāḥ
d naṭanartakagandharvaiḥ pūrṇakair vardhamānakaiḥ
d niyodhakaiś ca krīḍadbhis tatra sma pariharṣitāḥ
d yajñe yajñe yathākālaṃ dakṣiṇāḥ so 'tyakālayat
d dvipā daśasahasrākhyāḥ pramadāḥ kāñcanaprabhāḥ
d sadhvajāḥ sapatākāś ca rathā hemamayās tathā

d aṅgasya yajamānasya svadharmādhigatāḥ śubhāḥ
d guṇottarās te kratavas tasyāsan sārvakāmikāḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d śibim auśīnaraṃ cāpi mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ carmavat paryaveṣṭayat
d sādridvīpārṇavavanāṃ rathaghoṣeṇa nādayan
d sa śibir vai ripūn nityaṃ mukhyān nighnan sapatnajit
d tena yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ paryāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
d sa rājā vīryavān dhīmān avāpya vasu puṣkalam

d hemayūpāsanagṛhā hemaprākāratoraṇāḥ

d nānābhakṣoccayataṭāḥ payodadhimadhuhradāḥ

d pibata snāta khādadhvam iti yatrocyate janaiḥ
d yasmai prādād varaṃ rudras tuṣṭaḥ puṇyena karmaṇā

d yathoktam eva bhūtānāṃ priyatvaṃ svargam uttamam
d etāṃl labdhvā varān iṣṭāñ śibiḥ kāle divaṃ gataḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d nārada uvāca
d rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ caiva mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma

d vane vanitayā sārdham avasal lakṣmaṇānugaḥ

d tapasvināṃ rakṣaṇārthaṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
