d surāsurair avadhyaṃ taṃ devabrāhmaṇakaṇṭakam
d jaghāna sa mahābāhuḥ paulastyaṃ sagaṇaṃ raṇe

d kṣutpipāse 'jayad rāmaḥ sarvarogāṃś ca dehinām

d ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca mānuṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d pṛthivyāṃ sahavāso 'bhūd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
d nāhīyata tadā prāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ na tad anyathā
d prāṇāpānasamānāś ca rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
d dīrghāyuṣaḥ prajāḥ sarvā yuvā na mriyate tadā
d vedaiś caturbhiḥ saṃprītāḥ prāpnuvanti divaukasaḥ
d havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca vividhaṃ niṣpūrtaṃ hutam eva ca
d adaṃśamaśakā deśā naṣṭavyālasarīsṛpāḥ
d nāpsu prāṇabhṛtāṃ mṛtyur nākāle jvalano 'dahat
d adharmarucayo lubdhā mūrkhā vā nābhavaṃs tadā

d svadhām ūrjaṃ ca rakṣobhir janasthāne praṇāśite

d sahasraputrāḥ puruṣā daśavarṣaśatāyuṣaḥ

d bhagīrathaṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d yena bhāgīrathī gaṅgā cayanaiḥ kāñcanaiś citā
d yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ kanyā hemavibhūṣitāḥ
d rājñaś ca rājaputrāṃś ca brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d sarvā rathagatāḥ kanyā rathāḥ sarve caturyujaḥ
d rathe rathe śataṃ nāgāḥ padmino hemamālinaḥ
d sahasram aśvāś caikaikaṃ gajānāṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ
d aśve aśve śataṃ gāvo gavāṃ paścād ajāvikam
d tenākrāntā janaughena dakṣiṇā bhūyasīr dadat

d tatra gāthāṃ jaguḥ prītā gandharvāḥ sūryavarcasaḥ

d mṛgayāṃ vicaran rājā tṛṣitaḥ klāntavāhanaḥ

d janamejayaṃ sudhanvānaṃ gayaṃ pūruṃ bṛhadratham

d adadad rohitān aśvān brāhmaṇebhyo viśāṃ pate

d bhakṣyānnapānanicayāḥ śuśubhus tv annaparvatāḥ
d ghṛtahradāḥ sūpapaṅkā dadhiphenā guḍodakāḥ
d rurudhuḥ parvatān nadyo madhukṣīravahāḥ śubhāḥ
d devāsurā narā yakṣā gandharvoragapakṣiṇaḥ
d viprās tatrāgatāś cāsan vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ
d brāhmaṇā ṛṣayaś cāpi nāsaṃs tatrāvipaścitaḥ
d samudrāntāṃ vasumatīṃ vasupūrṇāṃ tu sarvataḥ
d sa tāṃ brāhmaṇasāt kṛtvā jagāmāstaṃ tadā nṛpaḥ
d gataḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān vyāpya svayaśasā diśaḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ

d puṇḍarīkasahasreṇa vājapeyaśatais tathā

d agniṣṭomaiś ca vividhaiḥ satraiś ca prājyadakṣiṇaiḥ
d abrāhmaṇānāṃ yad vittaṃ pṛthivyām asti kiṃ cana
d tat sarvaṃ parisaṃkhyāya tato brāhmaṇasāt karot
d vyūḍhe devāsure yuddhe kṛtvā devasahāyatām
d caturdhā vyabhajat sarvāṃ caturbhyaḥ pṛthivīm imām
d yajñair nānāvidhair iṣṭvā prajām utpādya cottamām
d devayānyāṃ cauśanasyāṃ śarmiṣṭhāyāṃ ca dharmataḥ
d devāraṇyeṣu sarveṣu vijahārāmaropamaḥ
d ātmanaḥ kāmacāreṇa dvitīya iva vāsavaḥ
d yadā nādhyagamat so 'ntaṃ kāmānāṃ sarvavedavit
d tato gāthām imāṃ gītvā sadāraḥ prāviśad vanam
d yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
d nālam ekasya tat sarvam iti matvā śamaṃ vrajet
d evaṃ kāmān parityajya yayātir dhṛtim etya ca
d pūruṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya prayāto vanam īśvaraḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d nābhāgam ambarīṣaṃ ca mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ rājñāṃ caikas tv ayodhayat
d jigīṣamāṇāḥ saṃgrāme samantād vairiṇo 'bhyayuḥ
d śastrayuddhavido ghorāḥ sṛjantaś cāśivā giraḥ
d balalābhād vaśīkṛtya teṣāṃ śastrabalena ca
d chattrāyudhadhvajarathāṃś chittvā prāsān gatavyathaḥ
d ta enaṃ muktasaṃnāhā nāthanto jīvitaiṣiṇaḥ
d śaraṇyam īyuḥ śaraṇaṃ tavāsma iti vādinaḥ
d sa tu tān vaśagān kṛtvā jitvā cemāṃ vasuṃdharām
d īje yajñaśatair iṣṭair yathā śakras tathānagha
d bubhujuḥ sarvasaṃpannam annam anye janās tadā
d tasya yajñeṣu viprendrāḥ sutṛptāḥ paramārcitāḥ
d modakān pūrikāpūpān dhānā vaṭakaśaṣkulīḥ
d karambhān pṛthukān manthān anyāni sukṛtāni ca
d sūpān maireyakān yūṣān rāgaṣāṇḍavapānakān
d mṛṣṭānnāni suyuktāni mṛdūni surabhīṇi ca
d ghṛtaṃ madhu payas toyaṃ dadhīni rasavanti ca
d phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca susvādu dvijās tatropabhujyate
d madanīyāni pānāni viditvā cātmanaḥ sukham
d apibanta yathākāmaṃ pānapā gītavāditaiḥ
d tatra sma gāthā gāyanti kṣībā hṛṣṭāḥ paṭhanti ca
d nābhāgastutisaṃyuktā nanṛtuś ca sahasraśaḥ
d teṣu yajñeṣv ambarīṣo dakṣiṇām atyakālayat
d rājñāṃ daśasahasrāṇi daśa prayutayājinām
d hiraṇyakavacān sarvāñ śvetacchattraprakīrṇakān
d hiraṇyasyandanārūḍhān sānuyātraparicchadān
d ījāno vitate yajñe dakṣiṇām atyakālayat
d mūrdhābhiṣiktāṃś ca nṛpān rājaputraśatāni ca
d sadaṇḍaṃ kośanicayān brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d naiva pūrve janāś cakrur na kariṣyanti cāpare
d yad ambarīṣo nṛpatiḥ karoty amitadakṣiṇaḥ
d ity evam anvamodanta prītā yasya maharṣayaḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvaāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d śaśabinduṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d īje sa vividhair yajñaiḥ śrīmān satyaparākramaḥ
d tasya bhāryāsahasrāṇāṃ śatam āsīn mahātmanaḥ
d ekaikasyāṃ ca bhāryāyāṃ sahasraṃ tanayābhavan
d te kumārāḥ parākrāntāḥ sarve niyutayājinaḥ
d rājānaḥ kratubhir mukhyair ījānā vedapāragāḥ
d hiraṇyakavacāḥ sarve sarve cottamadhanvinaḥ
d sarve 'śvamedhair ījānāḥ kumārāḥ śāśabindavaḥ
d tān aśvamedhe rājendro brāhmaṇebhyo 'dadat pitā
d śataṃ śataṃ rathagatā ekaikaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ
d rājaputraṃ tadā kanyās tapanīyasvalaṃkṛtāḥ
d kanyāṃ kanyāṃ śataṃ nāgā nāge nāge śataṃ rathāḥ
d rathe rathe śataṃ cāśvā balino hemamālinaḥ
d aśve aśve sahasraṃ gā gavāṃ paścād ajāvikam
d etad dhanam aparyantam aśvamedhe mahāmakhe
d śaśabindur mahābhāgo brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d vārkṣāś ca yūpā yāvanto aśvamedhe mahāmakhe
d te tathaiva punaś cānye tāvantaḥ kāñcanābhavan
d bhakṣyānnapānanicayāḥ parvatāḥ krośam ucchritāḥ
d tasyāśvamedhe nirvṛtte rājñaḥ śiṣṭās trayodaśa
d tuṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ śāntavighnām anāmayām
d śaśabindur imāṃ bhūmiṃ ciraṃ bhuktvā divaṃ gataḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d gayaṃ cāmūrtarayasaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d yo vai varṣaśataṃ rājā hutaśiṣṭāśano 'bhavat
d tasmai hy agnir varaṃ prādāt tato vavre varaṃ gayaḥ
d tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vratena niyamena ca
d gurūṇāṃ ca prasādena vedān icchāmi veditum
d svadharmeṇāvihiṃsyānyān dhanam icchāmi cākṣayam
d vipreṣu dadataś caiva śraddhā bhavatu nityaśaḥ
d ananyāsu savarṇāsu putrajanma ca me bhavet
d annaṃ me dadataḥ śraddhā dharme me ramatāṃ manaḥ
d avighnaṃ cāstu me nityaṃ dharmakāryeṣu pāvaka
d tathā bhaviṣyatīty uktvā tatraivāntaradhīyata
d gayo 'py avāpya tat sarvaṃ dharmeṇārīn ajījayat
d sa darśapaurṇamāsābhyāṃ kāleṣv āgrayaṇena ca
d cāturmāsyaiś ca vividhair yajñaiś cāvāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
d ayajac chraddhayā rājā parisaṃvatsaraṃ śatam
d daśa nāgasahasrāṇi śatam aśvaśatāni ca
d śataṃ niṣkasahasrāṇi gavāṃ cāpy ayutāni ṣaṭ
d utthāyotthāya sa prādāt parisaṃvatsaraṃ śatam
d nakṣatreṣu ca sarveṣu dadan nakṣatradakṣiṇāḥ
d īje ca vividhair yajñair yathā somo 'ṅgirā yathā
d sauvarṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā ya imāṃ maṇiśarkarām
d viprebhyaḥ prādadad rājā so 'śvamedhe mahāmakhe
d jāmbūnadamayā yūpāḥ sarve ratnaparicchadāḥ
d gayasyāsan samṛddhās tu sarvabhūtamanoharāḥ
d sarvakāmasamṛddhāṃś ca prādāt tāṃś ca gayas tadā
d brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prahṛṣṭebhyaḥ sarvabhūtebhya eva ca
d samudradvīpaśaileṣu nadīnadavaneṣu ca
d nagareṣu ca rāṣṭreṣu divi vyomni ca ye 'vasan
d bhūtagrāmāś ca vividhāḥ saṃtṛptā yajñasaṃpadā
d gayasya sadṛśo yajño nāsty anya iti te 'bruvan
d ṣaṭtriṃśadyojanāyāmā triṃśadyojanam āyatā
d paścāt puraś caturviṃśad vedī hy āsīd dhiraṇmayī
d gayasya yajamānasya muktāvajramaṇistṛtā
d prādāt sa brāhmaṇebhyo 'tha vāsāṃsyābharaṇāni ca
d yathoktā dakṣiṇāś cānyā viprebhyo bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
d yatra bhojanaśiṣṭasya parvatāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ
d kulyāḥ kṛśaravāhinyo rasānām abhavaṃs tadā
d vastrābharaṇagandhānāṃ rāśayaś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
d yasya prabhāvāc ca gayas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
d vaṭaś cākṣayyakaraṇaḥ puṇyaṃ brahmasaraś ca tat
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d sāṃkṛtiṃ rantidevaṃ ca mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d yasya dviśatasāhasrā āsan sūdā mahātmanaḥ
d gṛhān abhyāgatān viprān atithīn pariveṣakāḥ
d pakvāpakvaṃ divārātraṃ varānnam amṛtopamam
d nyāyenādhigataṃ vittaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d vedān adhītya dharmeṇa yaś cakre dviṣato vaśe
d upasthitāś ca paśavaḥ svayaṃ yaṃ saṃśitavratam
d bahavaḥ svargam icchanto vidhivat satrayājinam
d nadī mahānasād yasya pravṛttā carmarāśitaḥ
d tasmāc carmaṇvatī pūrvam agnihotre 'bhavat purā
d brāhmaṇebhyo dadau niṣkān sauvarṇān sa prabhāvataḥ
d tubhyaṃ niṣkaṃ tubhyaṃ niṣkam iti ha sma prabhāṣate
d tubhyaṃ tubhyam iti prādān niṣkān niṣkān sahasraśaḥ
d tataḥ punaḥ samāśvāsya niṣkān eva prayacchati
d alpaṃ dattaṃ mayādyeti niṣkakoṭiṃ pradāya saḥ
d ekāhnā dāsyati punaḥ ko 'nyas tat saṃpradāsyati
d sahasraśaś ca sauvarṇān vṛṣabhān gośatānugān
d adhyardhamāsam adadad brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śataṃ samāḥ
d agnihotropakaraṇaṃ yajñopakaraṇaṃ ca yat
d ṛṣibhyaḥ karakān kumbhān sthālīpiṭharam eva ca
d śayanāsanayānāni prāsādāṃś ca gṛhāṇi ca
d vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān dadyād annāni ca dhanāni ca
d sarvaṃ sauvarṇam evāsīd rantidevasya dhīmataḥ
d tatrāsya gāthā gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ
d rantidevasya tāṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhim atimānuṣīm
d naitādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kuberasadaneṣv api
d dhanaṃ ca pūryamāṇaṃ naḥ kiṃ punar manujeṣv iti
d vyaktaṃ vasvokasāreyam ity ūcus tatra vismitāḥ
d sāṃkṛte rantidevasya yāṃ rātrim atithiṃ vaset
d ālabhyanta tadā gāvaḥ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ
d tatra sma sūdāḥ krośanti sumṛṣṭamaṇikuṇḍalāḥ
d sūpabhūyiṣṭam aśnīdhvaṃ nādya māṃsaṃ yathāpuram
d rantidevasya yat kiṃ cit sauvarṇam abhavat tadā
d tat sarvaṃ vitate yajñe brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d pratyakṣaṃ tasya havyāni pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ
d kavyāni pitaraḥ kāle sarvakāmān dvijottamāḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d dauṣyantiṃ bharataṃ cāpi mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d karmāṇy asukarāṇy anyaiḥ kṛtavān yaḥ śiśur vane
d hemāvadātān yaḥ siṃhān nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhān balī
d nirvīryāṃs tarasā kṛtvā vicakarṣa babandha ca
d krūrāṃś cograbalān vyāghrān damitvā cākarod vaśe
d manaḥśilā iva śilāḥ saṃyuktā jaturāśibhiḥ
d vyālādīṃś cātibalavāṃs tatpratīpān gajān api
d daṃṣṭrāsu gṛhyāvaruhya śuṣkāsyān akarod vaśe
d mahiṣān apy atibalān balena vicakarṣa ha
d balinaḥ sṛmarān khaḍgān nānāsattvāni cāpy uta
d kṛcchraprāṇān vane baddhvā damayitvāpy avāsṛjat
d taṃ sarvadamanety āhus tadvidas tena karmaṇā
d taṃ pratyaṣedhaj jananī mā sattvāni vijījahi
d so 'śvamedhaśateneṣṭvā yamunām anu vīryavān
d triśatāśvān sarasvatyāṃ gaṅgām anu catuḥśatān
d so 'śvamedhasahasreṇa rājasūyaśatena ca
d punar īje mahāyajñaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ
d agniṣṭomātirātrāṇām ukthyaviśvajitām api
d vājapeyeṣṭisatrāṇāṃ sahasraiś ca susaṃbhṛtaiḥ
d iṣṭvā śākuntalo rājā tarpayitvā dvijān dhanaiḥ
d sahasraṃ yatra padmānāṃ kaṇvāya bharato dadau
d jāmbūnadasya śuddhasya kanakasya mahāyaśāḥ
d yasya yūpāḥ śatavyāmāḥ pariṇāhena kāñcanāḥ
d samāgamya dvijaiḥ sārdhaṃ sendrair devaiḥ samucchritāḥ
d svalaṃkṛtā bhrājamānāḥ sarvaratnair manoramaiḥ
d hiraṇyam aśvān dviradān rathān uṣṭrān ajāvikān
d dāsīdāsaṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ gāḥ savatsāḥ payasvinīḥ
d grāmān gṛhāṇi kṣetrāṇi vividhāṃś ca paricchadān
d koṭīśatāyutaṃ caiva brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d cakravartī hy adīnātmā jetāris tv ajitaḥ paraiḥ
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
d yam abhyaṣiñcan sāmrājye rājasūye maharṣayaḥ
d ayaṃ naḥ prathayiṣyeta sarvān ity abhavat pṛthuḥ
d kṣatān nas trāsyate sarvān ity evaṃ kṣatriyo 'bhavat
d pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ prajā dṛṣṭvā raktāḥ smeti yad abruvan
d tato rājeti nāmāsya anurāgād ajāyata
d akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī āsīd vainyasya kāmadhuk
d sarvāḥ kumbhaduho gāvaḥ puṭake puṭake madhu
d āsan hiraṇmayā darbhāḥ sukhasparśāḥ sukhāvahāḥ
d teṣāṃ cīrāṇi saṃvītāḥ prajās teṣv eva śerate
d phalāny amṛtakalpāni mūlāni ca madhūni ca
d teṣām āsīt tadāhāro nirāhārāś ca nābhavan
d arogāḥ sarvasiddhārthā manuṣyā akutobhayāḥ
d nyavasanta yathākāmaṃ vṛkṣeṣu ca guhāsu ca
d pravibhāgo na rāṣṭrāṇāṃ purāṇāṃ cābhavat tadā
d yathāsukhaṃ yathākāmaṃ tathaitā muditāḥ prajāḥ
d tasya saṃstambhayann āpaḥ samudram abhiyāsyataḥ
d parvatāś ca dadur mārgaṃ dhvajabhaṅgaś ca nābhavat
d taṃ vanaspatayaḥ śailā devāsuranaroragāḥ
d saptarṣayaḥ puṇyajanā gandharvāpsaraso 'pi ca
d pitaraś ca sukhāsīnam abhigamyedam abruvan
d samrāḍ asi kṣatriyo 'si rājā goptā pitāsi naḥ
d dehy asmabhyaṃ mahārāja prabhuḥ sann īpsitān varān
d yair vayaṃ śāśvatīs tṛptīr vartayiṣyāmahe sukham
d tathety uktvā pṛthur vainyo gṛhītvājagavaṃ dhanuḥ
d śarāṃś cāpratimān ghorāṃś cintayitvābravīn mahīm
d ehy ehi vasudhe kṣipraṃ kṣaraibhyaḥ kāṅkṣitaṃ payaḥ
d tato dāsyāmi bhadraṃ te annaṃ yasya yathepsitam
d vasudhovāca
d nārada uvāca
d duhitṛtvena māṃ vīra saṃkalpayitum arhasi
d tathety uktvā pṛthuḥ sarvaṃ vidhānam akarod vaśī
d tato bhūtanikāyās te vasudhāṃ duduhus tadā
d tāṃ vanaspatayaḥ pūrvaṃ samuttasthur dudhukṣavaḥ
d sātiṣṭhad vatsalā vatsaṃ dogdhṝn pātrāṇi cecchatī
d vatso 'bhūt puṣpitaḥ śālaḥ plakṣo dogdhābhavat tadā
d chinnaprarohaṇaṃ dugdhaṃ pātram audumbaraṃ śubham
d udayaḥ parvato vatso merur dogdhā mahāgiriḥ
d ratnāny oṣadhayo dugdhaṃ pātram aśmamayaṃ tathā
d dogdhā cāsīt tadā devo dugdham ūrjaskaraṃ priyam
d asurā duduhur māyām āmapātre tu te tadā
d dogdhā dvimūrdhā tatrāsīd vatsaś cāsīd virocanaḥ
d kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ ca narā duduhuḥ pṛthivītale
d svāyaṃbhuvo manur vatsas teṣāṃ dogdhābhavat pṛthuḥ
d alābupātre ca tathā viṣaṃ dugdhā vasuṃdharā
d dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bhavad dogdhā teṣāṃ vatsas tu takṣakaḥ
d saptarṣibhir brahma dugdhā tathā cākliṣṭakarmabhiḥ
d dogdhā bṛhaspatiḥ pātraṃ chando vatsas tu somarāṭ
d antardhānaṃ cāmapātre dugdhā puṇyajanair virāṭ
d dogdhā vaiśravaṇas teṣāṃ vatsa āsīt kuberakaḥ
d puṇyagandhān padmapātre gandharvāpsaraso 'duhan
d vatsaś citrarathas teṣāṃ dogdhā viśvaruciḥ prabhuḥ
d svadhāṃ rajatapātre tu duduhuḥ pitaraś ca tām
d vatso 'tra vatsaras teṣāṃ yamo dogdhā tathāntakaḥ
d evaṃ nikāyais tair dugdhā payo 'bhīṣṭaṃ hi sā virāṭ
d yair vartayanti te hy adya pātrair vatsaiś ca nityaśaḥ
d sa yajñair vividhair iṣṭvā pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān
d saṃtarpayitvā bhūtāni sarvaiḥ kāmair manaḥpriyaiḥ
d hairaṇyān akarod rājā ye ke cit pārthivā bhuvi
d tān brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prāyacchad aśvamedhe mahāmakhe
d ṣaṣṭināgasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭināgaśatāni ca
d sauvarṇān akarod rājā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca tāṃ dadau
d imāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ maṇiratnavibhūṣitām
d sauvarṇīm akarod rājā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca tān dadau
d sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
d putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d nārada uvāca
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
d rāmo mahātapāḥ śūro vīralokanamaskṛtaḥ
d jāmadagnyo 'py atiyaśā avitṛpto mariṣyati
d yasyābhram anuparyeti bhūmiṃ kurvan vipāṃsulām
d na cāsīd vikriyā yasya prāpya śriyam anuttamām
d yaḥ kṣatriyaiḥ parāmṛṣṭe vatse pitari cukrudhe
d tato 'vadhīt kārtavīryam ajitaṃ samare paraiḥ
d kṣatriyāṇāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭim ayutāni sahasraśaḥ
d tadā mṛtyoḥ sametāni ekaikaṃ dhanuṣājayat
d brahmadviṣāṃ cātha tasmin sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
d punar anyāni jagrāha dantakrūre jaghāna ha
d sahasraṃ musalenāghnan sahasram asināvadhīt
d udbandhanāt sahasraṃ ca haihayāḥ samare hatāḥ
d sarathāśvagajā vīrā nihatās tatra śerate
d pitur vadhāmarṣitena jāmadagnyena dhīmatā
d nijaghne daśasāhasrān rāmaḥ paraśunā tadā
d na hy amṛśyata tā vāco yās tair bhṛśam udīritāḥ
d bhṛgo rāmābhidhāveti yadākrandan dvijottamāḥ
d tataḥ kāśmīradaradān kuntikṣudrakamālavān
d aṅgavaṅgakaliṅgāṃś ca videhāṃs tāmraliptakān
d rakṣovāhān vītihotrāṃs trigartān mārtikāvatān
d śibīn anyāṃś ca rājanyān deśe deśe sahasraśaḥ
d nijaghāna śitair bāṇair jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
d koṭīśatasahasrāṇi kṣatriyāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ
d indragopakavarṇasya bandhujīvanibhasya ca
d rudhirasya parīvāhaiḥ pūrayitvā sarāṃsi ca
d sarvān aṣṭādaśa dvīpān vaśam ānīya bhārgavaḥ
d īje kratuśataiḥ puṇyaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ
d vedīm aṣṭanavotsedhāṃ sauvarṇāṃ vidhinirmitām
d sarvaratnaśataiḥ pūrṇāṃ patākāśatamālinīm
d grāmyāraṇyaiḥ paśugaṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇāṃ ca mahīm imām
d rāmasya jāmadagnyasya pratijagrāha kaśyapaḥ
d tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi dvipendrān hemabhūṣaṇān
d nirdasyuṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā śiṣṭeṣṭajanasaṃkulām
d kaśyapāya dadau rāmo hayamedhe mahāmakhe
d triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ prabhuḥ
d iṣṭvā kratuśatair vīro brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
d sa kaśyapasya vacanāt protsārya saritāṃ patim
d iṣupāte yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kurvan brāhmaṇaśāsanam
d adhyāvasad giriśreṣṭhaṃ mahendraṃ parvatottamam
d evaṃ guṇaśatair juṣṭo bhṛgūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ
d jāmadagnyo 'py atiyaśā mariṣyati mahādyutiḥ
d tvayā caturbhadrataraḥ putrāt puṇyataras tava
d ayajvānam adākṣiṇyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d ete caturbhadratarās tvayā bhadraśatādhikāḥ
d vyāsa uvāca
d mṛtā naravaraśreṣṭhā mariṣyanti ca sṛñjaya
d puṇyam ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ śrutvā ṣoḍaśarājakam
d avyāharan narapatis tūṣṇīm āsīt sa sṛñjayaḥ
d tam abravīt tathāsīnaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
d śrutaṃ kīrtayato mahyaṃ gṛhītaṃ te mahādyute
d āho svid antato naṣṭaṃ śrāddhaṃ śūdrāpatāv iva
d sa evam uktaḥ pratyāha prāñjaliḥ sṛñjayas tadā
d putraśokāpahaṃ śrutvā dhanyam ākhyānam uttamam
d rājarṣīṇāṃ purāṇānāṃ yajvanāṃ dakṣiṇāvatām
d vismayena hate śoke tamasīvārkatejasā
d nārada uvāca
d vipāpmāsmy avyathopeto brūhi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
d diṣṭyāpahataśokas tvaṃ vṛṇīṣveha yad icchasi
d sṛñjaya uvāca
d tat tat prapatsyase sarvaṃ na mṛṣāvādino vayam
d etenaiva pratīto 'haṃ prasanno yad bhavān mama
d nārada uvāca
d prasanno yasya bhagavān na tasyāstīha durlabham
d punar dadāmi te putraṃ dasyubhir nihataṃ vṛthā
d vyāsa uvāca
d uddhṛtya narakāt kaṣṭāt paśum aprokṣitaṃ yathā
d prādur āsīt tataḥ putraḥ sṛñjayasyādbhutaprabhaḥ
d prasannenarṣiṇā dattaḥ kuberatanayopamaḥ
d tataḥ saṃgamya putreṇa prītimān abhavan nṛpaḥ
d īje ca kratubhir mukhyaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ
d akṛtāstraś ca bhītaś ca na ca sāṃnāhiko hataḥ
d ayajvā cānapatyaś ca tato 'sau jīvitaḥ punaḥ
d śūro vīraḥ kṛtāstraś ca pramathyārīn sahasraśaḥ
d abhimanyur gataḥ svargaṃ pṛtanābhimukho hataḥ
d brahmacaryeṇa yān kāṃś cit prajñayā ca śrutena ca
d iṣṭaiś ca kratubhir yānti tāṃs te putro 'kṣayān gataḥ
d vidvāṃsaḥ karmabhiḥ puṇyaiḥ svargam īhanti nityaśaḥ
d na tu svargād ayaṃ lokaḥ kāmyate svargavāsibhiḥ
d tasmāt svargagataṃ putram arjunasya hataṃ raṇe
d nehānayituṃ śakyaṃ hi kiṃ cid aprāpyam īśitum
d evaṃ jñātvā sthiro bhūtvā mā śuco dhairyam āpnuhi
d jīvanta eva naḥ śocyā na tu svargagatānagha
d śocato hi mahārāja agham evābhivardhate
d tasmāc chokaṃ parityajya śreyase prayated budhaḥ
d praharṣam abhimānaṃ ca sukhaprāptiṃ ca cintayan
d etad āhur budhāḥ śreyo na śokaḥ śoka ucyate
d evaṃ vidvan samuttiṣṭha prayato bhava mā śucaḥ
d śrutas te saṃbhavo mṛtyos tapāṃsy anupamāni ca
d sarvabhūtasamatvaṃ ca cañcalāś ca vibhūtayaḥ
d sṛñjayasya tu taṃ putraṃ mṛtaṃ saṃjīvitaṃ punaḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d evaṃ vidvan mahārāja mā śucaḥ sādhayāmy aham
d etāvad uktvā bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyata
d vāgīśāne bhagavati vyāse vyabhranabhaḥprabhe
d gate matimatāṃ śreṣṭhe samāśvāsya yudhiṣṭhiram
d pūrveṣāṃ pārthivendrāṇāṃ mahendrapratimaujasām
d nyāyādhigatavittānāṃ tāṃ śrutvā yajñasaṃpadam
d saṃpūjya manasā vidvān viśoko 'bhūd yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d punaś cācintayad dīnaḥ kiṃ svid vakṣye dhanaṃjayam
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
 atha saṃśaptakaiḥ sārdhaṃ yudhyamāne dhanaṃjaye
 abhimanyau hate cāpi bāle balavatāṃ vare
 maharṣisattame yāte vyāse sa tu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 pāṇḍavāḥ kim athākārṣuḥ śokopahatacetasaḥ
 kathaṃ saṃśaptakebhyo vā nivṛtto vānaradhvajaḥ
 kena vā kathitas tasya praśāntaḥ sutapāvakaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 etan me śaṃsa tattvena sarvam eveha saṃjaya
 śṛṇu rājan yathā tebhyo nivṛttaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
 tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni dahan kṛṣṇagatir yathā
 saṃprayāte 'stam āditye saṃdhyākāla upasthite
 āyātasyātmaśibiraṃ nimittair aghaśaṃsibhiḥ
 yac cāsīn mānasaṃ tasya yac ca kṛṣṇena bhāṣitam
 yathā ca kathitas tasya nihataḥ sutapāvakaḥ
 vistareṇaiva me sarvaṃ bruvataḥ śṛṇu māriṣa
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tasminn ahani nirvṛtte ghore prāṇabhṛtāṃ kṣaye
c āditye 'staṃgate śrīmān saṃdhyākāla upasthite
a vyapayāteṣu sainyeṣu vāsāya bharatarṣabha
c hatvā saṃśaptakavrātān divyair astraiḥ kapidhvajaḥ
a prāyāt svaśibiraṃ jiṣṇur jaitram āsthāya taṃ ratham
c gacchann eva ca govindaṃ sannakaṇṭho 'bhyabhāṣata
a kiṃ nu me hṛdayaṃ trastaṃ vākyaṃ sajjati keśava
c spandanti cāpy aniṣṭāni gātraṃ sīdati cācyuta
a aniṣṭaṃ caiva me śliṣṭaṃ hṛdayān nāpasarpati
c bhuvi yad dikṣu cāpy ugrā utpātās trāsayanti mām
a bahuprakārā dṛśyante sarva evāghaśaṃsinaḥ
c api svasti bhaved rājñaḥ sāmātyasya guror mama
 vāsudeva uvāca
a vyaktaṃ śivaṃ tava bhrātuḥ sāmātyasya bhaviṣyati
c mā śucaḥ kiṃ cid evānyat tatrāniṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva vīrau vīrāvasādane
c kathayantau raṇe vṛttaṃ prayātau ratham āsthitau
a tataḥ svaśibiraṃ prāptau hatānandaṃ hatatviṣam
c vāsudevo 'rjunaś caiva kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
a dhvastākāraṃ samālakṣya śibiraṃ paravīrahā
c bībhatsur abravīt kṛṣṇam asvasthahṛdayas tataḥ
a nādya nandanti tūryāṇi maṅgalyāni janārdana
c miśrā dundubhinirghoṣaiḥ śaṅkhāś cāḍambaraiḥ saha
e vīṇā vā nādya vādyante śamyātālasvanaiḥ saha
a maṅgalyāni ca gītāni na gāyanti paṭhanti ca
c stutiyuktāni ramyāṇi mamānīkeṣu bandinaḥ
a yodhāś cāpi hi māṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartante hy adhomukhāḥ
c karmāṇi ca yathāpūrvaṃ kṛtvā nābhivadanti mām
a api svasti bhaved adya bhrātṛbhyo mama mādhava
c na hi śudhyati me bhāvo dṛṣṭvā svajanam ākulam
a api pāñcālarājasya virāṭasya ca mānada
c sarveṣāṃ caiva yodhānāṃ sāmagryaṃ syān mamācyuta
a na ca mām adya saubhadraḥ prahṛṣṭo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
c raṇād āyāntam ucitaṃ pratyudyāti hasann iva
a evaṃ saṃkathayantau tau praviṣṭau śibiraṃ svakam
c dadṛśāte bhṛśāsvasthān pāṇḍavān naṣṭacetasaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝṃś ca putrāṃś ca vimanā vānaradhvajaḥ
c apaśyaṃś caiva saubhadram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a mukhavarṇo 'prasanno vaḥ sarveṣām eva lakṣyate
c na cābhimanyuṃ paśyāmi na ca māṃ pratinandatha
a mayā śrutaś ca droṇena cakravyūho vinirmitaḥ
c na ca vas tasya bhettāsti ṛte saubhadram āhave
a na copadiṣṭas tasyāsīn mayānīkavinirgamaḥ
c kaccin na bālo yuṣmābhiḥ parānīkaṃ praveśitaḥ
a bhittvānīkaṃ maheṣvāsaḥ pareṣāṃ bahuśo yudhi
c kaccin na nihataḥ śete saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
a lohitākṣaṃ mahābāhuṃ jātaṃ siṃham ivādriṣu
c upendrasadṛśaṃ brūta katham āyodhane hataḥ
a sukumāraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ vāsavasyātmajātmajam
c sadā mama priyaṃ brūta katham āyodhane hataḥ
a vārṣṇeyīdayitaṃ śūraṃ mayā satatalālitam
c ambāyāś ca priyaṃ nityaṃ ko 'vadhīt kālacoditaḥ
a sadṛśo vṛṣṇisiṃhasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥ
c vikramaśrutamāhātmyaiḥ katham āyodhane hataḥ
a subhadrāyāḥ priyaṃ nityaṃ draupadyāḥ keśavasya ca
c yadi putraṃ na paśyāmi yāsyāmi yamasādanam
a mṛdukuñcitakeśāntaṃ bālaṃ bālamṛgekṣaṇam
c mattadviradavikrāntaṃ śālapotam ivodgatam
a smitābhibhāṣiṇaṃ dāntaṃ guruvākyakaraṃ sadā
c bālye 'py abālakarmāṇaṃ priyavākyam amatsaram
a mahotsāhaṃ mahābāhuṃ dīrgharājīvalocanam
c bhaktānukampinaṃ dāntaṃ na ca nīcānusāriṇam
a kṛtajñaṃ jñānasaṃpannaṃ kṛtāstram anivartinam
c yuddhābhinandinaṃ nityaṃ dviṣatām aghavardhanam
a sveṣāṃ priyahite yuktaṃ pitṝṇāṃ jayagṛddhinam
c na ca pūrvaprahartāraṃ saṃgrāme naṣṭasaṃbhramam
e yadi putraṃ na paśyāmi yāsyāmi yamasādanam
f ratheṣu gaṇyamāneṣu gaṇitaṃ taṃ mahāratham
f mayādhyardhaguṇaṃ saṃkhye taruṇaṃ bāhuśālinam
f pradyumnasya priyaṃ śiṣyaṃ keśavasya mamaiva ca
a sulalāṭaṃ sukeśāntaṃ subhrvakṣidaśanacchadam
c apaśyatas tad vadanaṃ kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
a tantrīsvanasukhaṃ ramyaṃ puṃskokilasamadhvanim
c aśṛṇvataḥ svanaṃ tasya kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
a rūpaṃ cāpratirūpaṃ tat tridaśeṣv api durlabham
c apaśyato 'dya vīrasya kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
a abhivādanadakṣaṃ taṃ pitṝṇāṃ vacane ratam
c nādyāhaṃ yadi paśyāmi kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
a sukumāraḥ sadā vīro mahārhaśayanocitaḥ
c bhūmāv anāthavac chete nūnaṃ nāthavatāṃ varaḥ
a śayānaṃ samupāsanti yaṃ purā paramastriyaḥ
c tam adya vipraviddhāṅgam upāsanty aśivāḥ śivāḥ
a yaḥ purā bodhyate suptaḥ sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥ
c bodhayanty adya taṃ nūnaṃ śvāpadā vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ
a chatracchāyāsamucitaṃ tasya tad vadanaṃ śubham
c nūnam adya rajodhvastaṃ raṇe reṇuḥ kariṣyati
a hā putrakāvitṛptasya satataṃ putradarśane
c bhāgyahīnasya kālena yathā me nīyase balāt
a sādya saṃyamanī nūnaṃ sadā sukṛtināṃ gatiḥ
c svabhābhir bhāsitā ramyā tvayātyarthaṃ virājate
a nūnaṃ vaivasvataś ca tvā varuṇaś ca priyātithiḥ
c śatakratur dhaneśaś ca prāptam arcanty abhīrukam
a evaṃ vilapya bahudhā bhinnapoto vaṇig yathā
c duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭo yudhiṣṭhiram apṛcchata
d arjunaḥ
d kathaṃ tvayi ca bhīme ca dhṛṣṭadyumne ca jīvati
d sātyake śakravikrānte saubhadro nihataḥ paraiḥ
a kaccit sa kadanaṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ pāṇḍunandana
c svargato 'bhimukhaḥ saṃkhye yudhyamāno nararṣabhaḥ
a sa nūnaṃ bahubhir yattair yudhyamāno nararṣabhaiḥ
c asahāyaḥ sahāyārthī mām anudhyātavān dhruvam
a pīḍyamānaḥ śarair bālas tāta sādhv abhidhāva mām
b nānāliṅgaiḥ sudhautāgrair mama putro 'lpacetanaḥ
b iha me syād api trāṇaṃ piteti sa punaḥ punaḥ
c iti vipralapan manye nṛśaṃsair bahubhir hataḥ
a atha vā matprasūtaś ca svasrīyo mādhavasya ca
c subhadrāyāṃ ca saṃbhūto naivaṃ vaktum ihārhati
a vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ mama
c apaśyato dīrghabāhuṃ raktākṣaṃ yan na dīryate
a kathaṃ bāle maheṣvāse nṛśaṃsā marmabhedinaḥ
c svasrīye vāsudevasya mama putre 'kṣipañ śarān
a yo māṃ nityam adīnātmā pratyudgamyābhinandati
c upayāntaṃ ripūn hatvā so 'dya māṃ kiṃ na paśyati
a nūnaṃ sa patitaḥ śete dharaṇyāṃ rudhirokṣitaḥ
c śobhayan medinīṃ gātrair āditya iva pātitaḥ
d subhadrāṃ nanu śocāmi yā putram apalāyinam
a raṇe vinihataṃ śrutvā śokārtā vai vinaṃkṣyati
b śrutvā nipatitaṃ śūram anaghaṃ kṛtalāghavam
c subhadrā vakṣyate kiṃ mām abhimanyum apaśyatī
e draupadī caiva duḥkhārte te ca vakṣyāmi kiṃ nv aham
a vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ yan na yāsyati
c sahasradhā vadhūṃ dṛṣṭvā rudatīṃ śokakarśitām
a hṛṣṭānāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ siṃhanādo mayā śrutaḥ
c yuyutsuś cāpi kṛṣṇena śruto vīrān upālabhan
a aśaknuvanto bībhatsuṃ bālaṃ hatvā mahārathāḥ
c kiṃ nadadhvam adharmajñāḥ pārthe vai dṛśyatāṃ balam
a kiṃ tayor vipriyaṃ kṛtvā keśavārjunayor mṛdhe
c siṃhavan nadata prītāḥ śokakāla upasthite
a āgamiṣyati vaḥ kṣipraṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
c adharmo hi kṛtas tīvraḥ kathaṃ syād aphalaś ciram
a iti tān prati bhāṣan vai vaiśyāputro mahāmatiḥ
c apāyāc chastram utsṛjya kopaduḥkhasamanvitaḥ
a kimartham etann ākhyātaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa raṇe mama
c adhakṣyaṃ tān ahaṃ sarvāṃs tadā krūrān mahārathān
d bālam ekaṃ parikṣipya hatvā hṛṣṭān pranarditān
d saṃjaya uvāca
d putraśokārditaṃ pārthaṃ dhyāyantaṃ sāśrulocanam
a nigṛhya vāsudevas taṃ putrādhibhir abhiplutam
c maivam ity abravīt kṛṣṇas tīvraśokasamanvitam
a sarveṣām eṣa vai panthāḥ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa yeṣāṃ yuddhena jīvikā
a eṣā vai yudhyamānānāṃ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c vihitā dharmaśāstrajñair gatir gatimatāṃ vara
a dhruvaṃ yuddhe hi maraṇaṃ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c gataḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān abhimanyur na saṃśayaḥ
a etac ca sarvavīrāṇāṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ bharatarṣabha
c saṃgrāme 'bhimukhā mṛtyuṃ prapnuyāmeti mānada
a sa ca vīrān raṇe hatvā rājaputrān mahābalān
c vīrair ākāṅkṣitaṃ mṛtyuṃ saṃprāpto 'bhimukho raṇe
a mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra pūrvair eṣa sanātanaḥ
c dharmakṛdbhiḥ kṛto dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ raṇe kṣayaḥ
a ime te bhrātaraḥ sarve dīnā bharatasattama
c tvayi śokasamāviṣṭe nṛpāś ca suhṛdas tava
a etāṃs tvaṃ vacasā sāmnā samāśvāsaya mānada
c viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
d kālo grasati kaunteya viśvam etac carācaram
d nālaṃ buddhis tathāpy asya pumān vāpi virajyate
d utpattau ca vipattau ca karmaṇā galahastinā
d baddhaḥ śakuntavaj jīvo madhye svapnopamā gatiḥ
d na śocanti kṛtaprajñāḥ śvasatām upakalpanāt
d nūnaṃ jātena martavyaṃ kim u śocasi bālavat
a evam āśvāsitaḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇenādbhutakarmaṇā
c tato 'bravīt tadā bhrātṝn sarvān pārthaḥ sagadgadān
a sa dīrghabāhuḥ pṛthvaṃso dīrgharājīvalocanaḥ
c abhimanyur yathā vṛttaḥ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tathā
a sanāgasyandanahayān drakṣyadhvaṃ nihatān mayā
c saṃgrāme sānubandhāṃs tān mama putrasya vairiṇaḥ
d kṣipraṃ drakṣyanti me nūnaṃ mama putraṃ nihatya vai
a kathaṃ ca vaḥ kṛtāstrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śastrapāṇinām
c saubhadro nidhanaṃ gacched vajriṇāpi samāgataḥ
a yady evam aham ajñāsyam aśaktān rakṣaṇe mama
c putrasya pāṇḍupāñcālān mayā gupto bhavet tataḥ
d sūnoḥ pāṇḍavapāñcālān agopsyaṃ taṃ mahāraṇe
a kathaṃ ca vo rathasthānāṃ śaravarṣāṇi muñcatām
c nīto 'bhimanyur nidhanaṃ kadarthīkṛtya vaḥ paraiḥ
a aho vaḥ pauruṣaṃ nāsti na ca vo 'sti parākramaḥ
c yatrābhimanyuḥ samare paśyatāṃ vo nipātitaḥ
a ātmānam eva garheyaṃ yad ahaṃ vaḥ sudurbalān
c yuṣmān ājñāya niryāto bhīrūn akṛtaniśramān
a āho svid bhūṣaṇārthāya varmaśastrāyudhāni vaḥ
c vācaś ca vaktuṃ saṃsatsu mama putram arakṣatām
a evam uktvā tato vākyaṃ tiṣṭhaṃś cāpavarāsimān
c na smāśakyata bībhatsuḥ kena cit prasamīkṣitum
a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
b mahendram iva tiṣṭhantaṃ vajrodyatamahābhujam
c putraśokābhisaṃtaptam aśrupūrṇamukhaṃ tadā
a nābhibhāṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti draṣṭuṃ vā suhṛdo 'rjunam
c anyatra vāsudevād vā jyeṣṭād vā pāṇḍunandanāt
a sarvāsv avasthāsu hitāv arjunasya manonugau
c bahumānāt priyatvāc ca tāv enaṃ vaktum arhataḥ
a tatas taṃ putraśokena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasam
c rājīvalocanaṃ kruddhaṃ rājā vacanam abravīt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a tvayi yāte mahābāho saṃśaptakabalaṃ prati
c prayatnam akarot tīvram ācāryo grahaṇe mama
a vyāḍhānīkaṃ vayaṃ droṇaṃ varayāmaḥ sma sarvaśaḥ
c prativyūhya rathānīkaṃ yatamānaṃ tathā raṇe
a sa vāryamāṇo rathibhī rakṣitena mayā tathā
c asmān api jaghānāśu pīḍayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a te pīḍyamānā droṇena droṇānīkaṃ na śaknumaḥ
c prativīkṣitum apy ājau bhettuṃ tat kuta eva tu
a vayaṃ tv apratimaṃ vīrye sarve saubhadram ātmajam
c uktavantaḥ sma te tāta bhindhy anīkam iti prabho
d tatas tam apratiratham ahaṃ saubhadram abravam
d droṇānīkam idaṃ bhindhi dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva naḥ
a sa tathā codito 'smābhiḥ sadaśva iva vīryavān
c asahyam api taṃ bhāraṃ voḍhum evopacakrame
a sa tavāstropadeśena vīryeṇa ca samanvitaḥ
c prāviśat tad balaṃ bālaḥ suparṇa iva sāgaram
a te 'nuyātā vayaṃ vīraṃ sātvatīputram āhave

a tataḥ saindhavako rājā kṣudras tāta jayadrathaḥ
c varadānena rudrasya sarvān naḥ samavārayat
a tato droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇiś ca sa bṛhadbalaḥ
c kṛtavarmā ca saubhadraṃ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
a parivārya tu taiḥ sarvair yudhi bālo mahārathaiḥ
c yatamānaḥ paraṃ śaktyā bahubhir virathīkṛtaḥ
a tato dauḥśāsaniḥ kṣipraṃ tathā tair virathīkṛtam
c saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ prāpya diṣṭāntenābhyayojayat
d gadāhasto 'bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ jighāṃsur aparājitam
d gadinaṃ tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavasyātmajātmajaḥ
d sa jagrāha gadāṃ vīro gadāyuddhaviśāradaḥ
d gadāmaṇḍalamārgasthau sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ
d tau saṃprajahratur vīrāv anyonyasyāntaraiṣiṇau
d tāv anyonyaṃ gadāgrābhyāṃ tāḍitau yuddhadurmadau
d indradhvajāv ivotsṛṣṭau gatasattvau mahīṃ gatau
a sa tu hatvā sahasrāṇi dvipāśvarathasādinām
b aṣṭau rathasahasrāṇi nava dantiśatāni ca
c rājaputraśataṃ cāgryaṃ vīrāṃś cālakṣitān bahūn
a bṛhadbalaṃ ca rājānaṃ svargeṇājau prayojya ha
b tato duryodhanasutaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ hatavān balī
b gataḥ sukṛtināṃ lokān ye ca svargajitāṃ śubhāḥ
b adīnas trāsayañ śatrūn nandayitvā ca bāndhavān
b asakṛn nāma viśrāvya pitṝṇāṃ mātulasya ca
c tataḥ paramadharmātmā diṣṭāntam upajagmivān
d vīro diṣṭāntam āpannaḥ śocayan bāndhavān bahūn
d tataḥ sma śokasaṃtaptā bhavatādya sameyuṣaḥ
a etāvad eva nirvṛttam asmākaṃ śokavardhanam
c sa caivaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ svargalokam avāptavān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato 'rjuno vacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājena bhāṣitam
c hā putra iti niḥśvasya vyathito nyapatad bhuvi
d vyathito nyapatad bhūmau duḥkhārtaḥ sa mumoha ca
a viṣaṇṇavadanāḥ sarve parigṛhya dhanaṃjayam
c netrair animiṣair dīnāḥ pratyavekṣan parasparam
a pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ vāsaviḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c kampamāno jvareṇeva niḥśvasaṃś ca muhur muhuḥ
a pāṇiṃ pāṇau viniṣpiṣya śvasamāno 'śrunetravān
b triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ

c na ced vadhabhayād bhīto dhārtarāṣṭrān prahāsyati
a na cāsmāñ śaraṇaṃ gacchet kṛṣṇaṃ vā puruṣottamam

b mayi vismṛtasauhārdaṃ duryodhanahite ratam
c pāpaṃ bālavadhe hetuṃ śvo 'smi hantā jayadratham
a rakṣamāṇāś ca taṃ saṃkhye ye māṃ yotsyanti ke cana
c api droṇakṛpau vīrau chādayiṣyāmi tāñ śaraiḥ
d rājan droṇamukhāṃs tāṃs tān vārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ śaraiḥ
a yady etad evaṃ saṃgrāme na kuryāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c mā sma puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān prāpnuyāṃ śūrasaṃmatān
a ye lokā mātṛhantṝṇāṃ ye cāpi pitṛghātinām
c gurudāragāmināṃ ye ca piśunānāṃ ca ye tathā
a sādhūn asūyatāṃ ye ca ye cāpi parivādinām
c ye ca nikṣepahartṝṇāṃ ye ca viśvāsaghātinām
a bhuktapūrvāṃ striyaṃ ye ca nindatām aghaśaṃsinām
c brahmaghnānāṃ ca ye lokā ye ca goghātinām api
a pāyasaṃ vā yavānnaṃ vā śākaṃ kṛsaram eva vā
c saṃyāvāpūpamāṃsāni ye ca lokā vṛthāśnatām
d adattvā bhuñjatāṃ yā vai māṃsaṃ vā sā gatir mama
e tān ahnaivādhigaccheyaṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadratham
a vedādhyāyinam atyarthaṃ saṃśitaṃ vā dvijottamam
c avamanyamāno yān yāti vṛddhān sādhūṃs tathā gurūn
a spṛśatāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāṃ ca pādenāgniṃ ca yāṃ labhet
c yāpsu śleṣma purīṣaṃ vā mūtraṃ vā muñcatāṃ gatiḥ
e tāṃ gaccheyaṃ gatiṃ ghorāṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadratham
f śītabhītāś ca ye viprā raṇabhītāś ca kṣatriyāḥ
f teṣāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi na ced dhanyāṃ jayadratham
a nagnasya snāyamānasya yā ca vandhyātither gatiḥ
c utkocināṃ mṛṣoktīnāṃ vañcakānāṃ ca yā gatiḥ
e ātmāpahāriṇāṃ yā ca yā ca mithyābhiśaṃsinām
a bhṛtyaiḥ saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ putradārāśritais tathā
c asaṃvibhajya kṣudrāṇāṃ yā gatir mṛṣṭam aśnatām
d yaḥ pratyavasito vipro na saṃnyāsaṃ punaś caret
d prāyaścittena yasya syāc chuddhas tasya ca yā gatiḥ
e tāṃ gaccheyaṃ gatiṃ ghorāṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadratham
a saṃśritaṃ vāpi yas tyaktvā sādhuṃ tadvacane ratam
c na bibharti nṛśaṃsātmā nindate copakāriṇam
d tathā devalakāñ śrāddhe satataṃ paṅktidūṣakān
d ye bhojayanti saṃmūḍhās tāṃ gatiṃ samavāpnuyām
a arhate prātiveśyāya śrāddhaṃ yo na dadāti ca
c anarhate ca yo dadyād vṛṣalīpatyur eva ca
d matsyakacchapabhakṣāṇāṃ bhakṣyamastakaśāyinām
d saindhavānāṃ gatiṃ yāmi śvo na hanyāṃ jayadratham
a madyapo bhinnamaryādaḥ kṛtaghno bhrātṛnindakaḥ
c teṣāṃ gatim iyāṃ kṣipraṃ na ced dhanyāṃ jayadratham
a dharmād apetā ye cānye mayā nātrānukīrtitāḥ
c ye cānukīrtitāḥ kṣipraṃ teṣāṃ gatim avāpnuyām
e yadi vyuṣṭām imāṃ rātriṃ śvo na hanyāṃ jayadratham
a imāṃ cāpy aparāṃ bhūyaḥ pratijñāṃ me nibodhata
b anastamita āditye na ced dhanmi jayadratham
c yady asminn ahate pāpe sūryo 'stam upayāsyati
e ihaiva saṃpraveṣṭāhaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasam
f gāṇḍīvahasto rājñāṃ ca samakṣaṃ pṛthivīpate
a asurasuramanuṣyāḥ pakṣiṇo voragā vā
pitṛrajanicarā vā brahmadevarṣayo vā
c caram acaram apīdaṃ yat paraṃ cāpi tasmāt
tad api mama ripuṃ taṃ rakṣituṃ naiva śaktāḥ
a yadi viśati rasātalaṃ tadagryaṃ
viyad api devapuraṃ diteḥ puraṃ vā
c tad api śaraśatair ahaṃ prabhāte
bhṛśam abhipatya ripoḥ śiro 'bhihartā
a evam uktvā vicikṣepa gāṇḍīvaṃ savyadakṣiṇam
c tasya śabdam atikramya dhanuḥśabdo 'spṛśad divam
a arjunena pratijñāte pāñcajanyaṃ janārdanaḥ
c pradadhmau tatra saṃkruddho devadattaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
a sa pāñcajanyo 'cyutavaktravāyunā
bhṛśaṃ supūrṇodaraniḥsṛtadhvaniḥ
c jagat sapātālaviyaddigīśvaraṃ
prakampayām āsa yugātyaye yathā
a tato vāditraghoṣāś ca prādurāsan samantataḥ
c siṃhanādāś ca pāṇḍūnāṃ pratijñāte mahātmanā
d anṛtyad iva gāṇḍīvaṃ śarās tūṇīgatā mudā
d nirākrāmann iva tadā svayam eva mṛdhaiṣiṇaḥ
d bhīmasenas tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pratyabhāṣata bhārata
d dhanaṃjayam abhiprekṣya harṣagadgadayā girā
d pratijñodbhavaśabdena kṛṣṇaśaṅkhasvanena ca
d nihato dhārtarāṣṭro 'yaṃ sānubandhaḥ suyodhanaḥ
d atha mṛditatamāgryadāmamālyaṃ
d tava sutaśokamayaṃ ca roṣajātam
d vyapanudati mahāprabhāvam etan
d naravara vākyam idaṃ mahārtham iṣṭam
d saṃjaya uvāca
d atha śaṅkhaiś ca bherībhiḥ paṇavaiḥ sainikās tathā
d sasūtamāgadhā jiṣṇuṃ stutibhiḥ samapūjayan
d tadā bhīmaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ tena nādena mohitam
d tāvakaṃ tan mahārājaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ samapadyata
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śrutvā tu taṃ mahāśabdaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ putragṛddhinām
c cāraiḥ pravedite tatra samutthāya jayadrathaḥ
a śokasaṃmūḍhahṛdayo duḥkhenābhihato bhṛśam
c majjamāna ivāgādhe vipule śokasāgare
a jagāma samitiṃ rājñāṃ saindhavo vimṛśan bahu
c sa teṣāṃ naradevānāṃ sakāśe paridevayan
a abhimanyoḥ pitur bhītaḥ savrīḍo vākyam abravīt
c yo 'sau pāṇḍoḥ kila kṣetre jātaḥ śakreṇa kāminā
a sa ninīṣati durbuddhir māṃ kilaikaṃ yamakṣayam
c tat svasti vo 'stu yāsyāmi svagṛhaṃ jīvitepsayā
a atha vā stha pratibalās trātuṃ māṃ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
c pārthena prārthitaṃ vīrās te dadantu mamābhayam
a droṇaduryodhanakṛpāḥ karṇamadreśabāhlikāḥ
c duḥśāsanādayaḥ śaktās trātum apy antakādritam
a kim aṅga punar ekena phalgunena jighāṃsatā
b pratijñātaṃ na jānāmi sarvān vijñāpayāmi vaḥ
c na trāyeyur bhavanto māṃ samastāḥ patayaḥ kṣiteḥ
a praharṣaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ śrutvā mama mahad bhayam
c sīdantīva ca me 'ṅgāni mumūrṣor iva pārthivāḥ
a vadho nūnaṃ pratijñāto mama gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
c tathā hi hṛṣṭāḥ krośanti śokakāle 'pi pāṇḍavāḥ
d vaśam eṣyanti catvāras tam ṛte sarvapāṇḍavāḥ
a na devā na ca gandharvā nāsuroragarākṣasāḥ
c utsahante 'nyathā kartuṃ kuta eva narādhipāḥ
a tasmān mām anujānīta bhadraṃ vo 'stu nararṣabhāḥ
c adarśanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na māṃ drakṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
d vṛttam āsthāya tanyūjyaṃ sic
sopanīto bhavāmy aham
d duḥśalā bhrātṛsauhārdān māṃ rakṣasyatha vā dhruvam
a evaṃ vilapamānaṃ taṃ bhayād vyākulacetasam
c ātmakāryagarīyastvād rājā duryodhano 'bravīt
a na bhetavyaṃ naravyāghra ko hi tvā puruṣarṣabha
c madhye kṣatriyavīrāṇāṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ prārthayed yudhi
d eṣāṃ hi naradevānāṃ mattamātaṅgagāminām
d saṃghātam upayātānām api bibhyet puraṃdaraḥ
a ahaṃ vaikartanaḥ karṇaś citraseno viviṃśatiḥ
c bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyo vṛṣaseno durāsadaḥ
a purumitro jayo bhojaḥ kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
c satyavrato mahābāhur vikarṇo durmukhaḥ sahaḥ
a duḥśāsanaḥ subāhuś ca kaliṅgaś cāpy udāyudhaḥ
c vindānuvindāv āvantyau droṇo drauṇiḥ sasaubalaḥ
d ete cānye ca bahavo nānājanapadeśvarāḥ
d sasainyās tvābhiyāsyanti vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
d māyāvī balavāñ śūro rākṣasaś cāpy alambusaḥ
d ime ca tvābhigopsyanti sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥ
a tvaṃ cāpi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ svayaṃ śūro 'mitadyutiḥ
c sa kathaṃ pāṇḍaveyebhyo bhayaṃ paśyasi saindhava
a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca madīyās tava rakṣaṇe
c yattā yotsyanti mā bhais tvaṃ saindhava vyetu te bhayam
a evam āśvāsito rājan putreṇa tava saindhavaḥ
c duryodhanena sahito droṇaṃ rātrāv upāgamat
a upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā droṇāya sa viśāṃ pate
c upopaviśya praṇataḥ paryapṛcchad idaṃ tadā
d arjunasyātmanaś cārthe viśeṣaṃ paryapṛcchata
a nimitte dūrapātitve laghutve dṛḍhavedhane
c mama bravītu bhagavān viśeṣaṃ phalgunasya ca
a vidyāviśeṣam icchāmi jñātum ācārya tattvataḥ
c mamārjunasya ca vibho yathātattvaṃ pracakṣva me
 droṇa uvāca
a samam ācāryakaṃ tāta tava caivārjunasya ca
c yogād duḥkhocitatvāc ca tasmāt tvatto 'dhiko 'rjunaḥ
a na tu te yudhi saṃtrāsaḥ kāryaḥ pārthāt kathaṃ cana
c ahaṃ hi rakṣitā tāta bhayāt tvāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a na hi madbāhuguptasya prabhavanty amarā api
c vyūhiṣyāmi ca taṃ vyūhaṃ yaṃ pārtho na tariṣyati
a tasmād yudhyasva mā bhais tvaṃ svadharmam anupālaya
c pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mārgam anuyāhi narādhipa
a adhītya vidhivad vedān agnayaḥ suhutās tvayā
c iṣṭaṃ ca bahubhir yajñair na te mṛtyubhayād bhayam
a durlabhaṃ mānuṣair mandair mahābhāgyam avāpya tu
c bhujavīryārjitāṃl lokān divyān prāpsyasy anuttamān
a kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva vṛṣṇayo 'nye ca mānavāḥ
c ahaṃ ca saha putreṇa adhruvā iti cintyatām
a paryāyeṇa vayaṃ sarve kālena balinā hatāḥ
c paralokaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir anvitāḥ
a tapas taptvā tu yāṃl lokān prāpnuvanti tapasvinaḥ
c kṣatradharmāśritāḥ śūrāḥ kṣatriyāḥ prāpnuvanti tān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam āśvāsito rājan bhāradvājena saindhavaḥ
c apānudad bhayaṃ pārthād yuddhāya ca mano dadhe
d tataḥ praharṣaḥ sainyānāṃ tavāpy āsīd viśāṃ pate
d vāditrāṇāṃ dhvaniś cograḥ siṃhanādaravaiḥ saha
 saṃjaya uvāca
a pratijñāte tu pārthena sindhurājavadhe tadā
c vāsudevo mahābāhur dhanaṃjayam abhāṣata
a bhrātṝṇāṃ matam ājñāya tvayā vācā pratiśrutam
c saindhavaṃ śvo 'smi hanteti tat sāhasatamaṃ kṛtam
a asaṃmantrya mayā sārdham atibhāro 'yam udyataḥ
c kathaṃ nu sarvalokasya nāvahāsyā bhavemahi
a dhārtarāṣṭrasya śibire mayā praṇihitāś carāḥ
c ta ime śīghram āgamya pravṛttiṃ vedayanti naḥ
a tvayā vai saṃpratijñāte sindhurājavadhe tadā
b saṃśrute sindhurājasya vadhe gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
c siṃhanādaḥ savāditraḥ sumahān iha taiḥ śrutaḥ
a tena śabdena vitrastā dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ sasaindhavāḥ
c nākasmāt siṃhanādo 'yam iti matvā vyavasthitāḥ
a sumahāñ śabdasaṃpātaḥ kauravāṇāṃ mahābhuja
c āsīn nāgāśvapattīnāṃ rathaghoṣaś ca bhairavaḥ
a abhimanyuvadhaṃ śrutvā dhruvam ārto dhanaṃjayaḥ
c rātrau niryāsyati krodhād iti matvā vyavasthitāḥ
a tair yatadbhir iyaṃ satyā śrutā satyavatas tava
c pratijñā sindhurājasya vadhe rājīvalocana
a tato vimanasaḥ sarve trastāḥ kṣudramṛgā iva
c āsan suyodhanāmātyāḥ sa ca rājā jayadrathaḥ
a athotthāya sahāmātyair dīnaḥ śibiram ātmanaḥ
b bhṛśaṃ vimanaso bhūtvā śibirāṇi svakāni te
c āyāt sauvīrasindhūnām īśvaro bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
a sa mantrakāle saṃmantrya sarvā naiḥśreyasīḥ kriyāḥ
c suyodhanam idaṃ vākyam abravīd rājasaṃsadi
a mām asau putrahanteti śvo 'bhiyātā dhanaṃjayaḥ
c pratijñāto hi senāyā madhye tena vadho mama
d mama putratro hato 'nena haniṣye 'haṃ jayadratham
d iti vāco bahuvidhāḥ pārthena pratijñā kṛtā
a tāṃ na devā na gandharvā nāsuroragarākṣasāḥ
c utsahante 'nyathā kartuṃ pratijñāṃ savyasācinaḥ
a te māṃ rakṣata saṃgrāme mā vo mūrdhni dhanaṃjayaḥ
c padaṃ kṛtvāpnuyāl lakṣyaṃ tasmād atra vidhīyatām
a atha rakṣā na me saṃkhye kriyate kurunandana
c anujānīhi māṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi gṛhān prati
a evam uktas tv avākśīrṣo vimanāḥ sa suyodhanaḥ
c śrutvābhiśaptavantaṃ tvāṃ dhyānam evānvapadyata
a tam ārtam abhisaṃprekṣya rājā kila sa saindhavaḥ
c mṛdu cātmahitaṃ caiva sāpekṣam idam uktavān
a nāhaṃ paśyāmi bhavatāṃ tathāvīryaṃ dhanurdharam
c yo 'rjunasyāstram astreṇa pratihanyān mahāhave
a vāsudevasahāyasya gāṇḍīvaṃ dhunvato dhanuḥ
c ko 'rjunasyāgratas tiṣṭhet sākṣād api śatakratuḥ
d arjunasyāgrato yoddhuṃ bibhiyād api devarāṭ
a maheśvaro 'pi pārthena śrūyate yodhitaḥ purā
c padātinā mahātejā girau himavati prabhuḥ
a dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi hiraṇyapuravāsinām
c jaghān ekarathenaiva devarājapracoditaḥ
a samāyukto hi kaunteyo vāsudevena dhīmatā
c sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn nihanyād iti me matiḥ
d yathā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ sahāyaṃ prāpya durdharam
d vālinaṃ ghātayām āsa sugrīvo 'sau tathātra mām
a so 'ham icchāmy anujñātuṃ rakṣituṃ vā mahātmanā
c droṇena sahaputreṇa vīreṇa yadi manyase
a sa rājñā svayam ācāryo bhṛśam ākrandito 'rjuna
c saṃvidhānaṃ ca vihitaṃ rathāś ca kila sajjitāḥ
a karṇo bhūriśravā drauṇir vṛṣasenaś ca durjayaḥ
c kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca ṣaḍ ete 'sya purogamāḥ
a śakaṭaḥ padmapaś cārdho vyūho droṇena kalpitaḥ
c padmakarṇikamadhyasthaḥ sūcīpāśe jayadrathaḥ
e sthāsyate rakṣito vīraiḥ sindhurāḍ yuddhadurmadaiḥ
a dhanuṣy astre ca vīrye ca prāṇe caiva tathorasi
c aviṣahyatamā hy ete niścitāḥ pārtha ṣaḍ rathāḥ
e etān ajitvā sagaṇān naiva prāpyo jayadrathaḥ
a teṣām ekaikaśo vīryaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tvam anucintaya
c sahitā hi naravyāghrā na śakyā jetum añjasā
a bhūyaś ca cintayiṣyāmi nītim ātmahitāya vai
c mantrajñaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ kāryasiddhaye
 arjuna uvāca
a ṣaḍ rathān dhārtarāṣṭrasya manyase yān balādhikān
c teṣāṃ vīryaṃ mamārdhena na tulyam iti lakṣaye
a astram astreṇa sarveṣām eteṣāṃ madhusūdana
c mayā drakṣyasi nirbhinnaṃ jayadrathavadhaiṣiṇā
d paśyatas te nihantāsmi yadi te vajradhāriṇaḥ
a droṇasya miṣataḥ so 'haṃ sagaṇasya vilapyataḥ
c mūrdhānaṃ sindhurājasya pātayiṣyāmi bhūtale
a yadi sādhyāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca sahāśvinaḥ
c marutaś ca sahendreṇa viśvedevās tathāsurāḥ
a pitaraḥ sahagandharvāḥ suparṇāḥ sāgarādrayaḥ
c dyaur viyat pṛthivī ceyaṃ diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
a grāmyāraṇyāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
c trātāraḥ sindhurājasya bhavanti madhusūdana
a tathāpi bāṇair nihataṃ śvo draṣṭāsi raṇe mayā
c satyena te śape kṛṣṇa tathaivāyudham ālabhe
a yaś ca goptā maheṣvāsas tasya pāpasya durmateḥ
c tam eva prathamaṃ droṇam abhiyāsyāmi keśava
a tasmin dyūtam idaṃ baddhaṃ manyate sma suyodhanaḥ
c tasmāt tasyaiva senāgraṃ bhittvā yāsyāmi saindhavam
a draṣṭāsi śvo maheṣvāsān nārācais tigmatejanaiḥ
c śṛṅgāṇīva girer vajrair dāryamāṇān mayā yudhi
d mayā nipātitān saṃkhye vajrair iva girivrajān
a naranāgāśvadehebhyo visraviṣyati śoṇitam
c patadbhyaḥ patitebhyaś ca vibhinnebhyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a gāṇḍīvapreṣitā bāṇā manonilasamā jave
c nṛnāgāśvān videhāsūn kartāraś ca sahasraśaḥ
a yamāt kuberād varuṇād rudrād indrāc ca yan mayā
c upāttam astraṃ ghoraṃ vai tad draṣṭāro narā yudhi
a brāhmeṇāstreṇa cāstrāṇi hanyamānāni saṃyuge
c mayā draṣṭāsi sarveṣāṃ saindhavasyābhirakṣiṇām
a śaravegasamutkṛttai rājñāṃ keśava mūrdhabhiḥ
c āstīryamāṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭāsi śvo mayā yudhi
d mayā draṣṭāsi vistīrṇāṃ kīryamāṇāṃ ca medinīm
a kravyādāṃs tarpayiṣyāmi drāvayiṣyāmi śātravān
c suhṛdo nandayiṣyāmi pātayiṣyāmi saindhavam
a bahv āgaskṛt kusaṃbandhī pāpadeśasamudbhavaḥ
c mayā saindhavako rājā hataḥ svāñ śocayiṣyati
a sarvakṣīrānnabhoktāraḥ pāpācārā raṇājire
c mayā sarājakā bāṇair nunnā naṃkṣyanti saindhavāḥ
a tathā prabhāte kartāsmi yathā kṛṣṇa suyodhanaḥ
c nānyaṃ dhanurdharaṃ loke maṃsyate matsamaṃ yudhi
a gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ yoddhā cāhaṃ nararṣabha
c tvaṃ ca yantā hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ nu syād ajitaṃ mayā
d tava prasādād bhagavan kim ivāsti raṇe mama
d aviṣahyaṃ hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ jānan māṃ vigarhase
a yathā hi lakṣma candre vai samudre ca yathā jalam
c evam etāṃ pratijñāṃ me satyāṃ viddhi janārdana
d yathā rāmeṇa caikena sādhito daśakaṃdharaḥ
d vibhunā sādhayiṣyāmi tathā taṃ saindhavaṃ ripum
a māvamaṃsthā mamāstrāṇi māvamaṃsthā dhanur dṛḍham
c māvamaṃsthā balaṃ bāhvor māvamaṃsthā dhanaṃjayam
a yathā hi yātvā saṃgrāme na jīye vijayāmi ca
c tena satyena saṃgrāme hataṃ viddhi jayadratham
a dhruvaṃ vai brāhmaṇe satyaṃ dhruvā sādhuṣu saṃnatiḥ
c śrīr dhruvā cāpi dakṣeṣu dhruvo nārāyaṇe jayaḥ
d tvaṃ ca mādhava sarvaṃ tat tathā pratividhāsyasi
d yathā ripūṇāṃ miṣatāṃ pramathiṣyāmi saindhavam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
c saṃdideśārjuno nardan vāsaviḥ keśavaṃ prabhum
a yathā prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ kalpitaḥ syād ratho mama
c tathā kāryaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tāṃ niśāṃ duḥkhaśokārtau śvasantāv iva coragau
c nidrāṃ naivopalebhāte vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
d vāsudevārjunau vīrau na svapnam upalebhatuḥ
a naranārāyaṇau kruddhau jñātvā devāḥ savāsavāḥ
c vyathitāś cintayām āsuḥ kiṃ svid etad bhaviṣyati
a vavuś ca dāruṇā vātā rūkṣā gorābhiśaṃsinaḥ
c sakabandhas tathāditye parighaḥ samadṛśyata
a śuṣkāśanyaś ca niṣpetuḥ sanirghātāḥ savidyutaḥ
c cacāla cāpi pṛthivī saśailavanakānanā
a cukṣubhuś ca mahārāja sāgarā makarālayāḥ
c pratisrotaḥ pravṛttāś ca tathā gantuṃ samudragāḥ
a rathāśvanaranāgānāṃ pravṛttam adharottaram
c kravyādānāṃ pramodārthaṃ yamarāṣṭravivṛddhaye
a vāhanāni śakṛnmūtre mumucū ruruduś ca ha
c tān dṛṣṭvā dāruṇān sarvān utpātāṃl lomaharṣaṇān
d dīnāś ca pārthivāḥ sarve nāśaṃsur jayam ātmanaḥ
a sarve te vyathitāḥ sainyās tvadīyā bharatarṣabha
c śrutvā mahābalasyogrāṃ pratijñāṃ savyasācinaḥ
a atha kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāhur abravīt pākaśāsaniḥ
c āśvāsaya subhadrāṃ tvaṃ bhaginīṃ snuṣayā saha
a snuṣā śvaśvrānaghāyaste viśoke kuru mādhava
c sāmnā satyena yuktena vacasāśvāsaya prabho
a tato 'rjunagṛhaṃ gatvā vāsudevaḥ sudurmanāḥ
c bhaginīṃ putraśokārtām āśvāsayata duḥkhitām
a mā śokaṃ kuru vārṣṇeyi kumāraṃ prati sasnuṣā
c sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ bhīru niṣṭhaiṣā kālanirmitā
a kule jatasya vīrasya kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥ
c sadṛśaṃ maraṇaṃ hy etat tava putrasya mā śucaḥ
a diṣṭyā mahāratho vīraḥ pitus tulyaparākramaḥ
c kṣātreṇa vidhinā prāpto vīrābhilaṣitāṃ gatim
a jitvā subahuśaḥ śatrūn preṣayitvā ca mṛtyave
c gataḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān sarvakāmaduho 'kṣayān
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śrutena prajñayāpi ca
c santo yāṃ gatim icchanti prāptas tāṃ tava putrakaḥ
a vīrasūr vīrapatnī tvaṃ vīraśvaśurabāndhavā
c mā śucas tanayaṃ bhadre gataḥ sa paramāṃ gatim
d svādhyāyayuktaṃ brāhmaṇī yācitāraṃ
d gaurvoḍhāraṃ tv āśugantāram aśvā
d dāsaṃ śūdrā karmakaraṃ tu vaiśyā
d śūraṃ sūte tvadvidhā rājaputrī
a prāpsyate cāpy asau kṣudraḥ saindhavo bālaghātakaḥ
c asyāvalepasya phalaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇabāndhavaḥ
a vyuṣṭāyāṃ tu varārohe rajanyāṃ pāpakarmakṛt
c na hi mokṣyati pārthāt sa praviṣṭo 'py amarāvatīm
a śvaḥ śiraḥ śroṣyase tasya saindhavasya raṇe hṛtam
c samantapañcakād bāhyaṃ viśokā bhava mā rudaḥ
a kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya gataḥ śūraḥ satāṃ gatim
c yāṃ vayaṃ prāpnuyāmeha ye cānye śastrajīvinaḥ
a vyūḍhorasko mahābāhur anivartī varapraṇut
c gatas tava varārohe putraḥ svargaṃ jvaraṃ jahi
a anu jātaś ca pitaraṃ mātṛpakṣaṃ ca vīryavān
c sahasraśo ripūn hatvā hataḥ śūro mahārathaḥ
a āśvāsaya snuṣāṃ rājñi mā śucaḥ kṣatriye bhṛṣam
c śvaḥ priyaṃ sumahac chrutvā viśokā bhava nandini
a yat pārthena pratijñātaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathā
c cikīrṣitaṃ hi te bhartur na bhavej jātu niṣphalam
a yadi ca manujapannagāḥ piśācā
rajanicarāḥ patagāḥ surāsurāś ca
c raṇagatam abhiyānti sindhurājaṃ
na sa bhavitā saha tair api prabhāte
 saṃjaya uvāca
a etac chrutvā vacas tasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥ
c subhadrā putraśokārtā vilalāpa suduḥkhitā
a hā putra mama mandāyāḥ kathaṃ saṃyugam etya ha
c nidhanaṃ prāptavāṃs tāta pitṛtulyaparākramaḥ
a katham indīvaraśyāmaṃ sudaṃṣṭraṃ cārulocanam
c mukhaṃ te dṛśyate vatsa guṇṭhitaṃ raṇareṇunā
a nūnaṃ śūraṃ nipatitaṃ tvāṃ paśyanty anivartinam
c suśirogrīvabāhvaṃsaṃ vyūḍhoraskaṃ nirūdaram
a cārūpacitasarvāṅgaṃ svakṣaṃ śastrakṣatācitam
c bhūtāni tvā nirīkṣante nūnaṃ candram ivoditam
a śayanīyaṃ purā yasya spardhyāstaraṇasaṃvṛtam
c bhūmāv adya kathaṃ śeṣe vipraviddhaḥ sukhocitaḥ
a yo 'nvāsyata purā vīro varastrībhir mahābhujaḥ
c katham anvāsyate so 'dya śivābhiḥ patito mṛdhe
a yo 'stūyata purā hṛṣṭaiḥ sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥ
c so 'dya kravyādgaṇair ghorair vinadadbhir upāsyate
a pāṇḍaveṣu ca nātheṣu vṛṣṇivīreṣu cābhibho
c pāñcāleṣu ca vīreṣu hataḥ kenāsy anāthavat
d yatra tvaṃ keśave nāthe satyanātho yathā hataḥ
a atṛptadarśanā putra darśanasya tavānagha
c mandabhāgyā gamiṣyāmi vyaktam adya yamakṣayam
a viśālākṣaṃ sukeśāntaṃ cāruvākyaṃ sugandhi ca
c tava putra kadā bhūyo mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi nirvraṇam
d ehy ehi tṛṣito vatsa stanau pūrṇau pibāśu me
d aṅkam āruhya mandāyā hy atṛptāyāś ca darśane
a dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatām
c dhig vīryaṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca dhig balam
a dhik kekayāṃs tathā cedīn matsyāṃś caivātha sṛñjayān
c ye tvā raṇe gataṃ vīraṃ na jānanti nipātitam
a adya paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ śūnyām iva hatatviṣam
c abhimanyum apaśyantī śokavyākulalocanā
d sākṣān maghavataḥ pautraṃ putraṃ gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
d svasrīyaṃ vāsudevasya taṃ gṛdhrāḥ paryupāsate
a svasrīyaṃ vāsudevasya putraṃ gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
c kathaṃ tvā virathaṃ vīraṃ drakṣyāmy anyair nipātitam
a hā vīra dṛṣṭo naṣṭaś ca dhanaṃ svapna ivāsi me
c aho hy anityaṃ mānuṣyaṃ jalabudbudacañcalam
a imāṃ te taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ tvadādhibhir abhiplutām
b uttarām uttarāṃ jātyā suśīlāṃ priyabhāṣiṇīm
b śanakaiḥ parirabhyaināṃ snuṣāṃ mama yaśasvinīm
b sukumārīṃ viśālākṣīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām
b bālapallavatanvaṅgīṃ mattamātaṅgagāminīm
b bimbādharoṣṭhīm abalām abhimanyo praharṣaya
b tvayā vinā kathaṃ putra jīrṇāṃ patitamānasām
c kathaṃ saṃdhārayiṣyāmi vivatsām iva dhenukām
a aho hy akāle prasthānaṃ kṛtavān asi putraka
c vihāya phalakāle māṃ sugṛddhāṃ tava darśane
a nūnaṃ gatiḥ kṛtāntasya prājñair api sudurvidā
c yatra tvaṃ keśave nāthe saṃgrāme 'nāthavad dhataḥ
a yajvanāṃ dānaśīlānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ kṛtātmanām
c caritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ puṇyatīrthāvagāhinām
a kṛtajñānāṃ vadānyānāṃ guruśuśrūṣiṇām api
c sahasradakṣiṇānāṃ ca yā gatis tām avāpnuhi
a yā gatir yudhyamānānāṃ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c hatvārīn nihatānāṃ ca saṃgrāme tāṃ gatiṃ vraja
a gosahasrapradātṝṇāṃ kratudānāṃ ca yā gatiḥ
c naiveśikaṃ cābhimataṃ dadatāṃ yā gatiḥ śubhā
d brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śaraṇyebhyo nidhiṃ nidadhatāṃ ca yā
d yā cāpi nyastadaṇḍānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
a brahmacaryeṇa yāṃ yānti munayaḥ saṃśitavratā
c ekapatnyaś ca yāṃ yānti tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
a rājñāṃ sucaritair yā ca gatir bhavati śāśvatī
c caturāśramiṇāṃ puṇyaiḥ pāvitānāṃ surakṣitaiḥ
a dīnānukampināṃ yā ca satataṃ saṃvibhāginām
c paiśunyāc ca nivṛttānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
a vratināṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ guruśuśrūṣiṇām api
c amoghātithināṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
d kṛcchreṣu yā dhārayatām ātmānaṃ vyasaneṣu ca
d gatiḥ śokāgnidagdhānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
d pitur mātuś ca śuśrūṣāṃ kalpayantīha ye sadā
d svadāraniratānāṃ ca yā gatis tām avāpnuhi
a ṛtukāle svakāṃ patnīṃ gacchatāṃ yā manasvinām
c na cānyadārasevīnāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
a sāmnā ye sarvabhūtāni gacchanti gatamatsarāḥ
c nāruṃtudānāṃ kṣamiṇāṃ yā gatis tām avāpnuhi
a madhumāṃsanivṛttānāṃ madād dambhāt tathānṛtāt
c paropatāpatyaktānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
a hrīmantaḥ sarvaśāstrajñā jñānatṛptā jitendriyāḥ
c yāṃ gatiṃ sādhavo yānti tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
a evaṃ vilapatīṃ dīnāṃ subhadrāṃ śokakarśitām
c abhyapadyata pāñcālī vairāṭīsahitā tadā
a tāḥ prakāmaṃ ruditvā ca vilapya ca suduḥkhitāḥ
b draupadī śokasaṃtaptā ruditvā ca vilapya ca
c unmattavat tadā rājan visaṃjñā nyapatan kṣitau
a sopacāras tu kṛṣṇas tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
c siktvāmbhasā samāśvāsya tat tad uktvā hitaṃ vacaḥ
a visaṃjñakalpāṃ rudatīm apaviddhāṃ pravepatīm
c bhaginīṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a subhadre mā śucaḥ putraṃ pāñcālyāśvāsayottarām
c gato 'bhimanyuḥ prathitāṃ gatiṃ kṣatriyapuṃgavaḥ
a ye cānye 'pi kule santi puruṣā no varānane
c sarve te vai gatiṃ yāntu abhimanyor yaśasvinaḥ
a kuryāma tad vayaṃ karma kriyāsuḥ suhṛdaś ca naḥ
c kṛtavān yādṛg adyaikas tava putro mahārathaḥ
a evam āśvāsya bhaginīṃ draupadīm api cottarām
c pārthasyaiva mahābāhuḥ pārśvam āgād ariṃdamaḥ
a tato 'bhyanujñāya nṛpān kṛṣṇo bandhūṃs tathābhibhūḥ
c viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājaṃs te 'nye jagmur yathālayam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato 'rjunasya bhavanaṃ praviśyāpratimaṃ vibhuḥ
c spṛṣṭvāmbhaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sthaṇḍile śubhalakṣaṇe
e saṃtastāra śubhāṃ śayyāṃ darbhair vaiḍūryasaṃnibhaiḥ
a tato mālyena vidhival lājair gandhaiḥ sumaṅgalaiḥ
c alaṃcakāra tāṃ śayyāṃ parivāryāyudhottamaiḥ
a tataḥ spṛṣṭodakaṃ pārthaṃ vinītāḥ paricārakāḥ
c darśayāṃ naityakaṃ cakrur naiśaṃ traiyambakaṃ balim
a tataḥ prītamanāḥ pārtho gandhair mālyaiś ca mādhavam
