a tataḥ pārśvād vṛṣāṅkasya brahmacārī nyavartata
c piṅgākṣas tapasaḥ kṣetraṃ balavān nīlalohitaḥ
a sa tad gṛhya dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ tasthau sthānaṃ samāhitaḥ
c vyakarṣac cāpi vidhivat saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
a tasya maurvīṃ ca muṣṭiṃ ca sthānaṃ cālakṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
c śrutvā mantraṃ bhavaproktaṃ jagrāhācintyavikramaḥ
a sarasy eva ca taṃ bāṇaṃ mumocātibalaḥ prabhuḥ
c cakāra ca punar vīras tasmin sarasi tad dhanuḥ
a tataḥ prītaṃ bhavaṃ jñātvā smṛtimān arjunas tadā
c varam āraṇyakaṃ dattaṃ darśanaṃ śaṃkarasya ca
e manasā cintayām āsa tan me saṃpadyatām iti
a tasya tan matam ājñāya prītaḥ prādād varaṃ bhavaḥ
c tac ca pāśupataṃ ghoraṃ pratijñāyāś ca pāraṇam
d tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam avāpya punar īśvarāt
a saṃhṛṣṭaromā durdharṣaḥ kṛtaṃ kāryam amanyata
b tato 'rjunahṛṣīkeśau punaḥ punar ariṃdamau
c vavandatuś ca saṃhṛṣṭau śirobhyāṃ tau maheśvaram
a anujñātau kṣaṇe tasmin bhavenārjunakeśavau
c prāptau svaśibiraṃ vīrau mudā paramayā yutau
d tathā bhavenānumatau mahāsuranighātinau
e indrāviṣṇū yathā prītau jambhasya vadhakāṅkṣiṇau
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tayoḥ saṃvadator eva kṛṣṇadārukayos tadā
c sātyagād rajanī rājann atha rājānvabudhyata
a paṭhanti pāṇisvanikā māgadhā madhuparkikāḥ
c vaitālikāś ca sūtāś ca tuṣṭuvuḥ puruṣarṣabham
a nartakāś cāpy anṛtyanta jagur gītāni gāyakāḥ
c kuruvaṃśastavārthāni madhuraṃ raktakaṇṭhinaḥ
a mṛdaṅgā jharjharā bheryaḥ paṇavānakagomukhāḥ
c āḍambarāś ca śaṅkhāś ca dundubhyaś ca mahāsvanāḥ
a evam etāni sarvāṇi tathānyāny api bhārata
c vādayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāḥ sādhuśikṣitāḥ
a sa meghasamanirghoṣo mahāñ śabdo 'spṛśad divam
c pārthivapravaraṃ suptaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram abodhayat
a pratibuddhaḥ sukhaṃ supto mahārhe śayanottame
c utthāyāvaśyakāryārthaṃ yayau snānagṛhaṃ tataḥ
a tataḥ śuklāmbarāḥ snātās taruṇāṣṭottaraṃ śatam
c snāpakāḥ kāñcanaiḥ kumbhaiḥ pūrṇaiḥ samupatasthire
a bhadrāsane sūpaviṣṭaḥ paridhāyāmbaraṃ laghu
c sasnau candanasaṃyuktaiḥ pānīyair abhimantritaiḥ
a utsāditaḥ kaṣāyeṇa balavadbhiḥ suśikṣitaiḥ
c āplutaḥ sādhivāsena jalena ca sugandhinā
d rājahaṃsanibhaṃ prāpya uṣṇīṣaṃ śithilārpitam
d jalakṣayanimittaṃ vai veṣṭayām āsa mūrdhani
a hariṇā candanenāṅgam anulipya mahābhujaḥ
c sragvī cākliṣṭavasanaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitaḥ
d kṛtvendriyāṇām aikāgryaṃ manasaś ca mahāmanāḥ
a jajāpa japyaṃ kaunteyaḥ satāṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitaḥ
c tato 'gniśaraṇaṃ dīptaṃ praviveśa vinītavat
a samiddhaṃ sa pavitrābhir agnim āhutibhis tathā
c mantrapūtābhir arcitvā niścakrāma gṛhāt tataḥ
a dvitīyāṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ kakṣyāṃ niṣkramya pārthivaḥ
c tatra vedavido viprān apaśyad brāhmaṇarṣabhān
a dāntān vedavratasnātān snātān avabhṛtheṣu ca
c sahasrānucarān saurān aṣṭau daśaśatāni ca
a akṣataiḥ sumanobhiś ca vācayitvā mahābhujaḥ
c tān dvijān madhusarpirbhyāṃ phalaiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ sumaṅgalaiḥ
a prādāt kāñcanam ekaikaṃ niṣkaṃ viprāya pāṇḍavaḥ
c alaṃkṛtaṃ cāśvaśataṃ vāsāṃsīṣṭāś ca dakṣiṇāḥ
a tathā gāḥ kapilā dogdhrīḥ sarṣabhāḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
c hemaśṛṅgī rūpyakhurā dattvā cakre pradakṣiṇam
a svastikān vardhamānāṃś ca nandyāvartāṃś ca kāñcanān
c mālyaṃ ca jalakumbhāṃś ca jvalitaṃ ca hutāśanam
a pūrṇāny akṣatapātrāṇi rucakān rocanāṃs tathā
c svalaṃkṛtāḥ śubhāḥ kanyā dadhisarpirmadhūdakam
a maṅgalyān pakṣiṇaś caiva yac cānyad api pūjitam
c dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca kaunteyo bāhyāṃ kakṣyām agāt tataḥ
a tatas tasya mahābāhos tiṣṭhataḥ paricārakāḥ
c sauvarṇaṃ sarvatobhadraṃ muktāvaiḍūryamaṇḍitam
a parārdhyāstaraṇāstīrṇaṃ sottaracchadam ṛddhimat
c viśvakarmakṛtaṃ divyam upajahrur varāsanam
a tatra tasyopaviṣṭasya bhūṣaṇāni mahātmanaḥ
c upajahrur mahārhāṇi preṣyāḥ śubhrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
d śubhāni sarvapuṣpāṇi muktāhārāṃś ca puṣkalān
a yuktābharaṇaveṣasya kaunteyasya mahātmanaḥ
c rūpam āsīn mahārāja dviṣatāṃ śokavardhanam
a pāṇḍaraiś candraraśmyābhair hemadaṇḍaiś ca cāmaraiḥ
c dodhūyamānaḥ śuśubhe vidyudbhir iva toyadaḥ
a saṃstūyamānaḥ sūtaiś ca vandyamānaś ca bandibhiḥ
c upagīyamāno gandharvair āste sma kurunandanaḥ
a tato muhūrtād āsīt tu bandināṃ nisvano mahān
c nemighoṣaś ca rathināṃ khuraghoṣaś ca vājinām
a hrādena gajaghaṇṭānāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ninadena ca
c narāṇāṃ padaśabdaiś ca kampatīva sma medinī
a tataḥ śuddhāntam āsādya jānubhyāṃ bhūtale sthitaḥ
c śirasā vandanīyaṃ tam abhivandya jagatpatim
a kuṇḍalī baddhanistriṃśaḥ saṃnaddhakavaco yuvā
c abhipraṇamya śirasā dvāḥstho dharmātmajāya vai
e nyavedayad dhṛṣīkeśam upayātaṃ mahātmane
f śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsāś caturbhujaḥ
f tavājñādarśanākāṅkṣī dvāri tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ
a so 'bravīt puruṣavyāghraḥ svāgatenaiva mādhavam
b praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kimarthaṃ pravilambase
c arghyaṃ caivāsanaṃ cāsmai dīyatāṃ paramārcitam
a tataḥ praveśya vārṣṇeyam upaveśya varāsane
c satkṛtya satkṛtas tena paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pratinandya janārdanam
 uvāca paramaprītaḥ kaunteyo devakīsutam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sukhena rajanī vyuṣṭā kaccit te madhusūdana
c kaccij jñānāni sarvāṇi prasannāni tavācyuta
 saṃjaya uvāca
a vāsudevo 'pi tad yuktaṃ paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiram
b darśanād eva te saumya na kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ mama
c tataḥ kṣattā prakṛtayo nyavedayad upasthitāḥ
a anujñātaś ca rājñā sa prāveśayata taṃ janam
c virāṭaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca sātyakim
d cedipaṃ dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca drupadaṃ ca mahāratham
a śikhaṇḍinaṃ yamau caiva cekitānaṃ ca kekayān
b kekayān sṛñjayān matsyān pāñcālāṃś cāpi rājakān
c yuyutsuṃ caiva kauravyaṃ pāñcālyaṃ cottamaujasam
d yudhāmanyuṃ subāhuṃ ca draupadeyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabham
c upatasthur mahātmānaṃ viviśuś cāsaneṣu te
d etāṃś ca suhṛdaś cānyān darśayām āsa pāṇḍavam
d anujñātāś ca pārthena āsīnā āsaneṣu te
d sthiteṣv adhiparārdhyeṣu yathārhaṃ vaṃdya pārthivam
a ekasminn āsane vīrāv upaviṣṭau mahābalau
c kṛṣṇaś ca yuyudhānaś ca mahātmānau mahādyutī
a tato yudhiṣṭhiras teṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ madhusūdanam
c abravīt puṇḍarīkākṣam ābhāṣya madhuraṃ vacaḥ
a ekaṃ tvāṃ vayam āśritya sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
c prārthayāmo jayaṃ yuddhe śāśvatāni sukhāni ca
a tvaṃ hi rājyavināśaṃ ca dviṣadbhiś ca nirākriyām
c kleśāṃś ca vividhān kṛṣṇa sarvāṃs tān api vettha naḥ
a tvayi sarveśa sarveṣām asmākaṃ bhaktavatsala
c sukham āyattam atyarthaṃ yātrā ca madhusūdana
a sa tathā kuru vārṣṇeya yathā tvayi mano mama
c arjunasya yathā satyā pratijñā syāc cikīrṣitā
a sa bhavāṃs tārayatv asmād duḥkhāmarṣamahārṇavāt
c pāraṃ titīrṣatām adya plavo no bhava mādhava
a na hi tat kurute saṃkhye kārtavīryasamas tv api
c rathī yat kurute kṛṣṇa sārathir yatnam āsthitaḥ
d yathaiva sarvāsv āpatsu pāsi vṛṣṇīñ janārdana
d tathaivāsmān mahābāho vṛjināt trātum arhasi
d tvam agādhe 'plave magnān pāṇḍavān kurusāgare
d samuddhara plavo bhūtvā śaṅkhacakragadādhara
d namaste devadeveśa sanātana viśātana
d viṣṇo jiṣṇo hare kṛṣṇa vaikuṇṭhapuruṣottama
d nāradas tvāṃ samācakhyau purāṇam ṛṣisattamam
d varadaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ devaṃ tat satyaṃ kuru mādhava
d ity uktaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo dharmarājena saṃsadi
d toyameghasvano vāgmī pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
 vāsudeva uvāca
a sāmareṣv api lokeṣu sarveṣu na tathāvidhaḥ
c śarāsanadharaḥ kaś cid yathā pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
a vīryavān astrasaṃpannaḥ parākrānto mahābalaḥ
c yuddhaśauṇḍaḥ sadāmarṣī tejasā paramo nṛṇām
a sa yuvā vṛṣabhaskandho dīrghabāhur mahābalaḥ
c siṃharṣabhagatiḥ śrīmān dviṣatas te haniṣyati
a ahaṃ ca tat kariṣyāmi yathā kuntīsuto 'rjunaḥ
c dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainyāni dhakṣyaty agnir ivotthitaḥ
a adya taṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ kṣudraṃ saubhadraghātinam
c apunardarśanaṃ mārgam iṣubhiḥ kṣepsyate 'rjunaḥ
a tasyādya gṛdhrāḥ śyenāś ca vaḍagomāyavas tathā
c bhakṣayiṣyanti māṃsāni ye cānye puruṣādakāḥ
a yady asya devā goptāraḥ sendrāḥ sarve tathāpy asau
c rājadhānīṃ yamasyādya hataḥ prāpsyati saṃkule
a nihatya saindhavaṃ jiṣṇur adya tvām upayāsyati
c viśoko vijvaro rājan bhava bhūtipuraskṛtaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tathā saṃbhāṣatāṃ teṣāṃ prādurāsīd dhanaṃjayaḥ
c didṛkṣur bharataśreṣṭhaṃ rājānaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇam
a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ śubhāṃ kakṣyām abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitam
c samutthāyārjunaṃ premṇā sasvaje pāṇḍavarṣabhaḥ
a mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya pariṣvajya ca bāhunā
c āśiṣaḥ paramāḥ procya smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata
a vyaktam arjuna saṃgrāme dhruvas te vijayo mahān
c yādṛg rūpā hi te chāyā prasannaś ca janārdanaḥ
a tam abravīt tato jiṣṇur mahad āścaryam uttamam
c dṛṣṭavān asmi bhadraṃ te keśavasya prasādajam
a tatas tat kathayām āsa yathādṛṣṭaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
c āśvāsanārthaṃ suhṛdāṃ tryambakena samāgamam
a tataḥ śirobhir avaniṃ spṛṣṭvā sarve ca vismitāḥ
c namaskṛtya vṛṣāṅkāya sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan
a anujñātās tataḥ sarve suhṛdo dharmasūnunā
c tvaramāṇāḥ susaṃnaddhā hṛṣṭā yuddhāya niryayuḥ
a abhivādya tu rājānaṃ yuyudhānācyutārjunāḥ
c hṛṣṭā viniryayus te vai yudhiṣṭhiraniveśanāt
a rathenaikena durdharṣau yuyudhānajanārdanau
c jagmatuḥ sahitau vīrāv arjunasya niveśanam
a tatra gatvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ kalpayām āsa sūtavat
c rathaṃ rathavarasyājau vānararṣabhalakṣaṇam
a sa meghasamanirghoṣas taptakāñcanasaprabhaḥ
c babhau rathavaraḥ kḷptaḥ śiśur divasakṛd yathā
a tataḥ puruṣaśārdūlaḥ sajjaḥ sajjaṃ puraḥsaraḥ
c kṛtāhnikāya pārthāya nyavedayata taṃ ratham
d rathaṃ puruṣasiṃhasya sadhvajaṃ sapatākinam
a taṃ tu loke varaḥ puṃsāṃ kirīṭī hemavarmabhṛt
c bāṇabāṇāsanī vāhaṃ pradakṣiṇam avartata
a tato vidyāvayovṛddhaiḥ kriyāvadbhir jitendriyaiḥ
c stūyamāno jayāśībhir āruroha mahāratham
a jaitraiḥ sāṃgrāmikair mantraiḥ pūrvam eva rathottamam
c abhimantritam arciṣmān udayaṃ bhāskaro yathā
a sa rathe rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kāñcane kāñcanāvṛtaḥ
c vibabhau vimalo 'rciṣmān merāv iva divākaraḥ
a anvārurohatuḥ pārthaṃ yuyudhānajanārdanau
c śaryāter yajñam āyāntaṃ yathendraṃ devam aśvinau
a atha jagrāha govindo raśmīn raśmivatāṃ varaḥ
c mātalir vāsavasyeva vṛtraṃ hantuṃ prayāsyataḥ
a sa tābhyāṃ sahitaḥ pārtho rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
c sahito budhaśukrābhyāṃ tamo nighnan yathā śaśī
a saindhavasya vadhaprepsuḥ prayātaḥ śatrupūgahā
c sahāmbupatimitrābhyāṃ yathendras tārakāmaye
d dhanur jaitraṃ tathā bāṇān dadhāno nirgato 'rjunaḥ
d hantuṃ laṃkāpatiṃ devo bhagavān iva rāghavaḥ
a tato vāditranirghoṣair maṅgalyaiś ca stavaiḥ śubhaiḥ
c prayāntam arjunaṃ sūtā māgadhāś caiva tuṣṭuvuḥ
a sajayāśīḥ sapuṇyāhaḥ sūtamāgadhanisvanaḥ
c yukto vāditraghoṣeṇa teṣāṃ ratikaro 'bhavat
a tam anuprayato vāyuḥ puṇyagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
c vavau saṃharṣayan pārthaṃ dviṣataś cāpi śoṣayan
d tatas tasmin kṣaṇe rājan vividhāni śubhāni ca
a prādurāsan nimittāni vijayāya bahūni ca
c pāṇḍavānāṃ tvadīyānāṃ viparītāni māriṣa
a dṛṣṭvārjuno nimittāni vijayāya pradakṣiṇam
c yuyudhānaṃ maheṣvāsam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a yuyudhānādya yuddhe me dṛśyate vijayo dhruvaḥ
c yathā hīmāni liṅgāni dṛśyante śinipuṃgava
a so 'haṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra saindhavako nṛpaḥ
c yiyāsur yamalokāya mama vīryaṃ pratīkṣate
d gaccha tvaṃ rakṣa rājānaṃ tvaṃ hi tulyo mayā raṇe
a yathā paramakaṃ kṛtyaṃ saindhavasya vadhe mama
c tathaiva sumahat kṛtyaṃ dharmarājasya rakṣaṇe
a sa tvam adya mahābāho rājānaṃ paripālaya
c yathaiva hi mayā guptas tvayā gupto bhavet tathā
d na hi paśyāmi taṃ loke yas tvāṃ yuddhe parājayet
d vāsudevasamaṃ yuddhe svayam apy amareśvaraḥ
a tvayi cāhaṃ parāśvasya pradyumne vā mahārathe
c śaknuyāṃ saindhavaṃ hantum anapekṣo nararṣabha
a mayy apekṣā na kartavyā kathaṃ cid api sātvata
c rājany eva parā guptiḥ kāryā sarvātmanā tvayā
a na hi yatra mahābāhur vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥ
c kiṃ cid vyāpadyate tatra yatrāham api ca dhruvam
a evam uktas tu pārthena sātyakiḥ paravīrahā
c tathety uktvāgamat tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a śvobhūte kim akārṣus te duḥkhaśokasamanvitāḥ
c abhimanyau hate tatra ke vāyudhyanta māmakāḥ
a jānantas tasya karmāṇi kuravaḥ savyasācinaḥ
c kathaṃ tat kilbiṣaṃ kṛtvā nirbhayā brūhi māmakāḥ
a putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ kruddhaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakam
c āyāntaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ kathaṃ dadṛśur āhave
a kapirājadhvajaṃ saṃkhye vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
c dṛṣṭvā putraparidyūnaṃ kim akurvanta māmakāḥ
a kiṃ nu saṃjaya saṃgrāme vṛttaṃ duryodhanaṃ prati
c paridevo mahān atra śruto me nābhinandanam
a babhūvur ye manogrāhyāḥ śabdāḥ śrutisukhāvahāḥ
c na śrūyante 'dya te sarve saindhavasya niveśane
d bhūyāñ śabdān atīvānyāñ śabdaḥ saindhavaveśmani
d paurāṇikānāṃ tūryāṇāṃ śaṅkhadundubhighoṣavān
a stuvatāṃ nādya śrūyante putrāṇāṃ śibire mama
c sūtamāgadhasaṃghānāṃ nartakānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a śabdena nāditābhīkṣṇam abhavad yatra me śrutiḥ
c dīnānām adya taṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇomi samīritam
a niveśane satyadhṛteḥ somadattasya saṃjaya
c āsīno 'haṃ purā tāta śabdam aśrauṣam uttamam
a tad adya hīnapuṇyo 'ham ārtasvaranināditam
c niveśanaṃ hatotsāhaṃ putrāṇāṃ mama lakṣaye
a viviṃśater durmukhasya citrasenavikarṇayoḥ
c anyeṣāṃ ca sutānāṃ me na tathā śrūyate dhvaniḥ
a brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yaṃ śiṣyāḥ paryupāsate
c droṇaputraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ putrāṇāṃ me parāyaṇam
a vitaṇḍālāpasaṃlāpair hutayācitavanditaiḥ
c gītaiś ca vividhair iṣṭai ramate yo divāniśam
a upāsyamāno bahubhiḥ kurupāṇḍavasātvataiḥ
c sūta tasya gṛhe śabdho nādya drauṇer yathā purā
a droṇaputraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ gāyanā nartakāś ca ye
c atyartham upatiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥ
a vindānuvindayoḥ sāyaṃ śibire yo mahādhvaniḥ
c śrūyate so 'dya na tathā kekayānāṃ ca veśmasu
a nityapramuditānāṃ ca tālagītasvano mahān
c nṛtyatāṃ śrūyate tāta gaṇānāṃ so 'dya na dhvaniḥ
a saptatantūn vitanvānā yam upāsanti yājakāḥ
c saumadattiṃ śrutanidhiṃ teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥ
a jyāghoṣo brahmaghoṣaś ca tomarāsirathadhvaniḥ
c droṇasyāsīd avirato gṛhe tan na śṛṇomy aham
a nānādeśasamutthānāṃ gītānāṃ yo 'bhavat svanaḥ
c vāditranāditānāṃ ca so 'dya na śrūyate mahān
a yadā prabhṛty upaplavyāc chāntim icchañ janārdanaḥ
c āgataḥ sarvabhūtānām anukampārtham acyutaḥ
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ sūta mandaṃ duryodhanaṃ tadā
c vāsudevena tīrthena putra saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
a kālaprāptam ahaṃ manye mā tvaṃ duryodhanātigāḥ
b saṃśāmya bhrātṛbhis tais tu kṣatriyān abhipālaya
c śame ced yācamānaṃ tvaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi keśavam
e hitārtham abhijalpantaṃ na tathāsty aparājayaḥ
a pratyācaṣṭa sa dāśārham ṛṣabhaṃ sarvadhanvinām
c anuneyāni jalpantam anayān nānvapadyata
d karṇaduḥśāsanamate saubalasya ca durmateḥ
d pratyākhyāto mahābāhuḥ kulāntakaraṇena me
a tato duḥśāsanasyaiva karṇasya ca mataṃ dvayoḥ
c anvavartata hitvā māṃ kṛṣṭaḥ kālena durmatiḥ
a na hy ahaṃ dyūtam icchāmi viduro na praśaṃsati
c saindhavo necchate dyūtaṃ bhīṣmo na dyūtam icchati
c   viduro droṇa eva vā
c bāhlikaḥ somadatto vā bhīṣmo droṇāyanis tadā
a śalyo bhūriśravāś caiva purumitro jayas tathā
c aśvatthāmā kṛpo droṇo dyūtaṃ necchanti saṃjaya
d jayaḥ kṛpo vā dharmātmā ye cānye mama bāndhavāḥ
a eteṣāṃ matam ājñāya yadi varteta putrakaḥ
c sajñātimitraḥ sasuhṛc ciraṃ jīved anāmayaḥ
d etebhyaś ca madūrdhvaṃ ca abhokṣyad vasudhām imām
a ślakṣṇā madhurasaṃbhāṣā jñātimadhye priyaṃvadāḥ
c kulīnāḥ saṃmatāḥ prājñāḥ sukhaṃ prāpsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
a dharmāpekṣo naro nityaṃ sarvatra labhate sukham
c pretyabhāve ca kalyāṇaṃ prasādaṃ pratipadyate
a arhanty ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te bhoktuṃ sāmarthyasādhanāḥ
c teṣām api samudrāntā pitṛpaitāmahī mahī
d na ca tvābhibhaviṣyanti hitvā dharmaṃ pṛthātmajāḥ
a niyujyamānāḥ sthāsyanti pāṇḍavā dharmavartmani
c santi no jñātayas tāta yeṣāṃ śroṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
a śalyasya somadattasya bhīṣmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
c droṇasyātha vikarṇasya bāhlikasya kṛpasya ca
a anyeṣāṃ caiva vṛddhānāṃ bharatānāṃ mahātmanām
c tvadarthaṃ bruvatāṃ tāta kariṣyanti vaco hitam
a kaṃ vā tvaṃ manyase teṣāṃ yas tvā brūyād ato 'nyathā
c kṛṣṇo na dharmaṃ saṃjahyāt sarve te ca tvadanvayāḥ
a mayāpi coktās te vīrā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
c nānyathā prakariṣyanti dharmātmāno hi pāṇḍavāḥ
a ity ahaṃ vilapan sūta bahuśaḥ putram uktavān
c na ca me śrutavān mūḍho manye kālasya paryayam
a vṛkodarārjunau yatra vṛṣṇivīraś ca sātyakiḥ
c uttamaujāś ca pāñcālyo yudhāmanyuś ca durjayaḥ
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca durdharṣaḥ śikhaṇḍī cāparājitaḥ
c aśmakāḥ kekayāś caiva kṣatradharmā ca saumakiḥ
a caidyaś ca cekitānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibhuḥ
c draupadeyā virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ
e yamau ca puruṣavyāghrau mantrī ca madhusūdanaḥ
a ka etāñ jātu yudhyeta loke 'smin vai jijīviṣuḥ
c divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇān saṃhareyur ariṃdamāḥ
a anyo duryodhanāt karṇāc chakuneś cāpi saubalāt
c duḥśāsanacaturthānāṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi pañcamam
a yeṣām abhīśuhastaḥ syād viṣvakseno rathe sthitaḥ
c saṃnaddhaś cārjuno yoddhā teṣāṃ nāsti parājayaḥ
a teṣāṃ mama vilāpānāṃ na hi duryodhanaḥ smaret
c hatau hi puruṣavyāghrau bhīṣmadroṇau tvam āttha me
a teṣāṃ viduravākyānām uktānāṃ dīrghadarśinām
c dṛṣṭvemāṃ phalanirvṛttiṃ manye śocanti putrakāḥ
d senāṃ dṛṣṭvābhibhūtāṃ me śaineyenārjunena ca
d śūnyān dṛṣṭvā rathopasthān manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a himātyaye yathā kakṣaṃ śuṣkaṃ vāterito mahān
c agnir dahet tathā senāṃ māmikāṃ sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
a ācakṣva tad dhi naḥ sarvaṃ kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
c yad upāyāt tu sāyāhne kṛtvā pārthasya kilbiṣam
e abhimanyau hate tāta katham āsīn mano hi vaḥ
a na jātu tasya karmāṇi yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
c apakṛtvā mahat tāta soḍhuṃ śakṣyanti māmakāḥ
a kiṃ nu duryodhanaḥ kṛtyaṃ karṇaḥ kṛtyaṃ kim abravīt
c duḥśāsanaḥ saubalaś ca teṣām evaṃ gate api
e sarveṣāṃ samavetānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama saṃjaya
a yad vṛttaṃ tāta saṃgrāme mandasyāpanayair bhṛśam
c lobhānugatadurbuddheḥ krodhena vikṛtātmanaḥ
a rājyakāmasya mūḍhasya rāgopahatacetasaḥ
c durnītaṃ vā sunītaṃ vā tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśivān
c śuśrūṣasva sthiro bhūtvā tava hy apanayo mahān
a gatodake setubandho yādṛk tādṛg ayaṃ tava
c vilāpo niṣphalo rājan mā śuco bharatarṣabha
d prathamaṃ śiro muṇḍayitvā paścān nakṣatrapṛcchanam
d kiṃ karoṣi ca tvaṃ rājan kālo hi duratikramaḥ
a anatikramaṇīyo 'yaṃ kṛtāntasyādbhuto vidhiḥ
c mā śuco bharataśreṣṭha diṣṭam etat purātanam
a yadi hi tvaṃ purā dyūtāt kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c nivartayethāḥ putrāṃś ca na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
a yuddhakāle punaḥ prāpte tadaiva bhavatā yadi
c nivartitāḥ syuḥ saṃrabdhā na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
a duryodhanaṃ cāvidheyaṃ badhnīteti purā yadi
c kurūn acodayiṣyas tvaṃ na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
a tat te buddhivyabhīcāram upalapsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
c pāñcālā vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve ye cānye 'pi mahājanāḥ
a sa kṛtvā pitṛkarma tvaṃ putraṃ saṃsthāpya satpathe
b aprāptaḥ sa mahad dharmaṃ kāmam arthaṃ yaśas tathā
c vartethā yadi dharmeṇa na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
a tvaṃ tu prājñatamo loke hitvā dharmaṃ sanātanam
c duryodhanasya karṇasya śakuneś cānvagā matam
a tat te vilapitaṃ sarvaṃ mayā rājan niśāmitam
c arthe niviśamānasya viṣamiśraṃ yathā madhu
a na tathā manyate kṛṣṇo rājānaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ purā
c na bhīṣmaṃ naiva ca droṇaṃ yathā tvāṃ manyate nṛpa
a vyajānata yadā tu tvāṃ rājadharmād adhaś cyutam
c tadā prabhṛti kṛṣṇas tvāṃ na tathā bahu manyate
a paruṣāṇy ucyamānāṃś ca yathā pārthān upekṣase
c tasyānubandhaḥ prāptas tvāṃ putrāṇāṃ rājyakāmukam
a pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam apavṛttaṃ tadānagha
c atha pārthair jitāṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ pratyapadyathāḥ
a pāṇḍunāvarjitaṃ rājyaṃ kauravāṇāṃ yaśas tathā
c tataś cābhyadhikaṃ bhūyaḥ pāṇḍavair dharmacāribhiḥ
a teṣāṃ tat tādṛśaṃ karma tvām āsādya suniṣphalam
c yat pitryād bhraṃśitā rājyāt tvayehāmiṣagṛddhinā
a yat punar yuddhakāle tvaṃ putrān garhayase nṛpa
c bahudhā vyāharan doṣān na tad adyopapadyate
d yat punar yuddhasaṃsaktān bharatān parikutsayan
d bahu vyāharase tasmān naitad adyopapadyate
a na hi rakṣanti rājāno yudhyanto jīvitaṃ raṇe
c camūṃ vigāhya pārthānāṃ yudhyante kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
a yāṃ tu kṛṣṇārjunau senāṃ yāṃ sātyakivṛkodarau
c rakṣeran ko nu tāṃ yudhyec camūm anyatra kauravaiḥ
a yeṣāṃ yoddhā guḍākeśo yeṣāṃ mantrī janārdanaḥ
c yeṣāṃ ca sātyakir goptā yeṣāṃ goptā vṛkodaraḥ
a ko hi tān viṣahed yoddhuṃ martyadharmā dhanurdharaḥ
c anyatra kauraveyebhyo ye vā teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
a yāvat tu śakyate kartum anuraktair janādhipaiḥ
c kṣatradharmarataiḥ śūrais tāvat kurvanti kauravāḥ
a yathā tu puruṣavyāghrair yuddhaṃ paramasaṅkaṭam
c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu tattvataḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tasyāṃ niśāyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c svāny anīkāni sarvāṇi prākrāmad vyūhituṃ tataḥ
a śūrāṇāṃ garjatāṃ rājan saṃkruddhānām amarṣiṇām
c śrūyante sma giraś citrāḥ parasparavadhaiṣiṇām
a visphārya ca dhanūṃṣy ājau jyāḥ karaiḥ parimṛjya ca
c viniḥśvasantaḥ prākrośan kvedānīṃ sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
a vikośān sutsarūn anye kṛtadhārān samāhitān
c pītān ākāśasaṃkāśān asīn ke cic ca cikṣipuḥ
a carantas tv asimārgāṃś ca dhanurmārgāṃś ca śikṣayā
c saṃgrāmamanasaḥ śūrā dṛśyante sma sahasraśaḥ
d dṛśyante kuñjaraiś cānyair vājibhiś ca yuyutsavaḥ
a saghaṇṭāś candanādigdhāḥ svarṇavajravibhūṣitāḥ
c samutkṣipya gadāś cānye paryapṛcchanta pāṇḍavam
a anye balamadonmattāḥ parighair bāhuśālinaḥ
c cakruḥ saṃbādham ākāśam ucchritendradhvajopamaiḥ
a nānāpraharaṇaiś cānye vicitrasragalaṃkṛtāḥ
c saṃgrāmamanasaḥ śūrās tatra tatra vyavasthitāḥ
a kvārjunaḥ kva ca govindaḥ kva ca mānī vṛkodaraḥ
c kva ca te suhṛdas teṣām āhvayanto raṇe tadā
a tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāya tvarayan vājinaḥ svayam
c itas tatas tān racayan droṇaś carati vegitaḥ
a teṣv anīkeṣu sarveṣu sthiteṣv āhavanandiṣu
c bhāradvājo mahārāja jayadratham athābravīt
a tvaṃ caiva saumadattiś ca karṇaś caiva mahārathaḥ
c aśvatthāmā ca śalyaś ca vṛṣasenaḥ kṛpas tathā
a śataṃ cāśvasahasrāṇāṃ rathānām ayutāni ṣaṭ
c dviradānāṃ prabhinnānāṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
a padātīnāṃ sahasrāṇi daṃśitāny ekaviṃśatiḥ
c gavyūtiṣu trimātreṣu mām anāsādya tiṣṭhata
a tatrasthaṃ tvāṃ na saṃsoḍhuṃ śaktā devāḥ savāsavāḥ
c kiṃ punaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve samāśvasihi saindhava
a evam uktaḥ samāśvastaḥ sindhurājo jayadrathaḥ
c saṃprāyāt saha gāndhārair vṛtas taiś ca mahārathaiḥ
e varmibhiḥ sādibhir yattaiḥ prāsapāṇibhir āsthitaiḥ
a cāmarāpīḍinaḥ sarve jāmbūnadavibhūṣitāḥ
c jayadrathasya rājendra hayāḥ sādhupravāhinaḥ
e te caiva saptasāhasrā dvisāhasrāś ca saindhavāḥ
a mattānām adhirūḍhānāṃ hastyārohair viśāradaiḥ
c nāgānāṃ bhīmarūpāṇāṃ varmiṇāṃ raudrakarmiṇām
a adhyardhena sahasreṇa putro durmarṣaṇas tava
c agrataḥ sarvasainyānāṃ yotsyamāno vyavasthitaḥ
a tato duḥśāsanaś caiva vikarṇaś ca tavātmajau
c sindhurājārthasiddhyartham agrānīke vyavasthitau
a dīrgho dvādaśagavyūtiḥ paścārdhe pañca vistṛtaḥ
c vyūhaḥ sa cakraśakaṭo bhāradvājena nirmitaḥ
a nānānṛpatibhir vīrais tatra tatra vyavasthitaiḥ
c rathāśvagajapattyoghair droṇena vihitaḥ svayam
a paścārdhe tasya padmas tu garbhavyūhaḥ sudurbhidaḥ
c sūcī padmasya madhyastho gūḍho vyūhaḥ punaḥ kṛtaḥ
a evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya droṇo vyavasthitaḥ
c sūcīmukhe maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtavarmā vyavasthitaḥ
a anantaraṃ ca kāmbojo jalasaṃdhaś ca māriṣa
c duryodhanaḥ sahāmātyas tadanantaram eva ca
a tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi yodhānām anivartinām
c vyavasthitāni sarvāṇi śakaṭe sūcirakṣiṇaḥ
a teṣāṃ ca pṛṣṭhato rāja balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
c jayadrathas tato rājan sūcipāśe vyavasthitaḥ
a śakaṭasya tu rājendra bhāradvājo mukhe sthitaḥ
c anu tasyābhavad bhojo jugopainaṃ tataḥ svayam
a śvetavarmāmbaroṣṇīṣo vyūḍhorasko mahābhujaḥ
c dhanur visphārayan droṇas tasthau kruddha ivāntakaḥ
d tasya sarvasya sainyasya netā goptā ca vīryavān
a patākinaṃ śoṇahayaṃ vedīkṛṣṇājinadhvajam
c droṇasya ratham ālokya prahṛṣṭāḥ kuravo 'bhavan
a siddhacāraṇasaṃghānāṃ vismayaḥ sumahān abhūt
c droṇena vihitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyūhaṃ kṣubdhārṇavopamam
a saśailasāgaravanāṃ nānājanapadākulām
c grased vyūhaḥ kṣitiṃ sarvām iti bhūtāni menire
a bahurathamanujāśvapattināgaṃ
pratibhayanisvanam adbhutābharūpam
c ahitahṛdayabhedanaṃ mahad vai
śakaṭam avekṣya kṛtaṃ nananda rājā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu samutkruṣṭeṣu māriṣa
c tāḍyamānāsu bherīṣu mṛdaṅgeṣu nadatsu ca
a anīkānāṃ ca saṃhrāde vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvane
c pradhmāpiteṣu śaṅkheṣu saṃnāde lomaharṣaṇe
a abhihārayatsu śanakair bharateṣu yuyutsuṣu
c raudre muhūrte saṃprāpte savyasācī vyadṛśyata
a vaḍānāṃ vāyasānāṃ ca purastāt savyasācinaḥ
c bahulāni sahasrāṇi prākrīḍaṃs tatra bhārata
d piśitāsṛgbhujāṃ saṃghāḥ pralīyante sahasraśaḥ
a mṛgāś ca ghorasaṃnādāḥ śivāś cāśivadarśanāḥ
c dakṣiṇena prayātānām asmākaṃ prāṇadaṃs tathā
d lokakṣaye mahārāja yādṛśās tādṛśā hi te
d aśivā dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ śivāḥ pārthasya saṃyuge
a sanirghātā jvalantyaś ca petur ulkāḥ samantataḥ
c cacāla ca mahī kṛtsnā bhaye ghore samutthite
a viṣvag vātāḥ sanirghātā rūkṣāḥ śarkaravarṣiṇaḥ
c vavur āyāti kaunteye saṃgrāme samupasthite
a nākulis tu śatānīko dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
c pāṇḍavānām anīkāni prājñau tau vyūhatus tadā
a tato rathasahasreṇa dviradānāṃ śatena ca
c tribhir aśvasahasraiś ca padātīnāṃ śataiḥ śataiḥ
a adhyardhamātre dhanuṣāṃ sahasre tanayas tava
c agrataḥ sarvasainyānāṃ sthitvā durmarṣaṇo 'bravīt
a adya gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ tapantaṃ yuddhadurmadam
c aham āvārayiṣyāmi veleva makarālayam
a adya paśyantu saṃgrāme dhanaṃjayam amarṣaṇam
c viṣaktaṃ mayi durdharṣam aśmakūṭam ivāśmani
d tiṣṭhadhvaṃ rathino yūyaṃ saṃgrāmam abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
d yudhyāmi saṃhatān etān yaśo mānaṃ ca vardhayan
a evaṃ bruvan mahārāja mahātmā sa mahāmatiḥ
c maheṣvāsair vṛto rājan maheṣvāso vyavasthitaḥ
d tato 'rjuno mahārāja pratyadṛśyata bhārata
a tato 'ntaka iva kruddhaḥ savajra iva vāsavaḥ
c daṇḍapāṇir ivāsahyo mṛtyuḥ kālena coditaḥ
a śūlapāṇir ivākṣobhyo varuṇaḥ pāśavān iva
c yugāntāgnir ivārciṣmān pradhakṣyan vai punaḥ prajāḥ
a krodhāmarṣabaloddhūto nivātakavacāntakaḥ
c jayo jetā sthitaḥ satye pārayiṣyan mahāvratam
a āmuktakavacaḥ khaḍgī jāmbūnadakirīṭabhṛt
c śubhravarmāmbaradharaḥ svaṅgadī cārukuṇḍalī
a rathapravaram āsthāya naro nārāyaṇānugaḥ
c vidhunvan gāṇḍivaṃ saṃkhye babhau sūrya ivoditaḥ
a so 'grānīkasya mahata iṣupāte dhanaṃjayaḥ
c vyavasthāpya rathaṃ sajjaṃ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
a atha kṛṣṇo 'py asaṃbhrāntaḥ pārthena saha māriṣa
c prādhmāpayat pāñcajanyaṃ śaṅkhapravaram ojasā
a tayoḥ śaṅkhapraṇādena tava sainye viśāṃ pate
c āsan saṃhṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ kampitā gatacetasaḥ
a yathā trasanti bhūtāni sarvāṇy aśaninisvanāt
c tathā śaṅkhapraṇādena vitresus tava sainikāḥ
a prasusruvuḥ śakṛnmūtraṃ vāhanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
c evaṃ savāhanaṃ sarvam āvignam abhavad balam
a vyaṣīdanta narā rājañ śaṅkhaśabdena māriṣa
c visaṃjñāś cābhavan ke cit ke cid rājan vitatrasuḥ
a tataḥ kapir mahānādaṃ saha bhūtair dhvajālayaiḥ
c akarod vyāditāsyaś ca bhīṣayaṃs tava sainikān
a tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ saha
c punar evābhyahanyanta tava sainyapraharṣaṇāḥ
a nānāvāditrasaṃhrādaiḥ kṣveḍitāsphoṭitākulaiḥ
c siṃhanādaiḥ savāditraiḥ samāhūtair mahārathaiḥ
d durmarṣaṇabalaṃ pūrvam atha duḥśāsanānugam
d tataḥ śakaṭasaṃsthaṃ ca ghoranādasamākulam
a tasmin sutumule śabde bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
c atīva hṛṣṭo dāśārham abravīt pākaśāsaniḥ
a codayāśvān hṛṣīkeśa yatra durmarṣaṇaḥ sthitaḥ
c etad bhittvā gajānīkaṃ pravekṣyāmy arivāhinīm
a evam ukto mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ savyasācinā
c acodayad dhayāṃs tatra yatra durmarṣaṇaḥ sthitaḥ
a sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ saṃpravṛttaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
c ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca rathanāganarakṣayaḥ
a tataḥ sāyakavarṣeṇa parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
c parān avākirat pārthaḥ parvatān iva nīradaḥ
a te cāpi rathinaḥ sarve tvaritāḥ kṛtahastavat
c avākiran bāṇajālais tataḥ kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
a tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur vāryamāṇaḥ parair yudhi
c śirāṃsi rathināṃ pārthaḥ kāyebhyo 'pāharac charaiḥ
a udbhrāntanayanair vaktraiḥ saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhapuṭaiḥ śubhaiḥ
c sakuṇḍalaśirastrāṇair vasudhā samakīryata
d   amarṣād bhrukuṭīkṛtaiḥ
d tathaiva krodhadaṣṭoṣṭhair avākīryata medinī
a puṇḍarīkavanānīva vidhvastāni samantataḥ
c vinikīrṇāni yodhānāṃ vadanāni cakāśire
a tapanīyavicitrāṇi siktāni rudhireṇa ca
c adṛśyanta yathā rājan meghasaṃghāḥ savidyutaḥ
a śirasāṃ patatāṃ rājañ śabdo 'bhūt pṛthivītale
c kālena paripakvānāṃ tālānāṃ patatām iva
a tataḥ kabandhaḥ kaś cit tu dhanur ālambya tiṣṭhati
c kaś cit khaḍgaṃ viniṣkṛṣya bhujenodyamya tiṣṭhati
d gṛhītvānyasya keśeṣu śiro nṛtyati cāparaḥ
a nājānanta śirāṃsy urvyāṃ patitāni nararṣabhāḥ
c amṛṣyamāṇāḥ kaunteyaṃ saṃgrāme jayagṛddhinaḥ
a hayānām uttamāṅgaiś ca hastihastaiś ca medinī
c bāhubhiś ca śirobhiś ca vīrāṇāṃ samakīryata
a ayaṃ pārthaḥ kutaḥ pārtha eṣa pārtha iti prabho
b tiṣṭha pārthair hi māṃ pārtha kva yāsīti ca jalpatām
c tava sainyeṣu yodhānāṃ pārthabhūtam ivābhavat
a anyonyam api cājaghnur ātmānam api cāpare
c pārthabhūtam amanyanta jagat kālena mohitāḥ
a niṣṭanantaḥ sarudhirā visaṃjñā gāḍhavedanāḥ
c śayānā bahavo vīrāḥ kīrtayantaḥ suhṛjjanam
a sabhiṇḍipālāḥ saprāsāḥ saśaktyṛṣṭiparaśvadhāḥ
c saniryūhāḥ sanistriṃśāḥ saśarāsanatomarāḥ
a sabāṇavarmābharaṇāḥ sagadāḥ sāṅgadā raṇe
c mahābhujagasaṃkāśā bāhavaḥ parighopamāḥ
a udveṣṭanti viceṣṭanti saṃveṣṭanti ca sarvaśaḥ
c vegaṃ kurvanti saṃrabdhā nikṛttāḥ parameṣubhiḥ
a yo yaḥ sma samare pārthaṃ pratisaṃrabhate naraḥ
c tasya tasyāntako bāṇaḥ śarīram upasarpati
a nṛtyato rathamārgeṣu dhanur vyāyacchatas tathā
c na kaś cit tatra pārthasya dadarśāntaram aṇv api
a yat tasya ghaṭamānasya kṣipraṃ vikṣipataḥ śarān
c lāghavāt pāṇḍuputrasya vyasmayanta pare janāḥ
a hastinaṃ hastiyantāram aśvam āśvikam eva ca
c abhinat phalguno bāṇai rathinaṃ ca sasārathim
a āvartamānam āvṛttaṃ yudhyamānaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c pramukhe tiṣṭhamānaṃ ca na kaṃ cin na nihanti saḥ
a yathodayan vai gagane sūryo hanti mahat tamaḥ
c tathārjuno gajānīkam avadhīt kaṅkapatribhiḥ
a hastibhiḥ patitair bhinnais tava sainyam adṛśyata
c antakāle yathā bhūmir vinikīrṇair mahīdharaiḥ
a yathā madhyaṃdine sūryo duṣprekṣyaḥ prāṇibhiḥ sadā
c tathā dhanaṃjayaḥ kruddho duṣprekṣyo yudhi śatrubhiḥ
a tat tathā tava putrasya sainyaṃ yudhi paraṃtapa
c prabhagnaṃ drutam āvignam atīva śarapīḍitam
a māruteneva mahatā meghānīkaṃ vidhūyatā
c prakālyamānaṃ tat sainyaṃ nāśakat prativīkṣitum
a pratodaiś cāpakoṭībhir huṃkāraiḥ sādhuvāhitaiḥ
c kaśāpārṣṇyabhighātaiś ca vāgbhir ugrābhir eva ca
a codayanto hayāṃs tūrṇaṃ palāyante sma tāvakāḥ
c sādino rathinaś caiva pattayaś cārjunārditāḥ
a pārṣṇyaṅguṣṭhāṅkuśair nāgāṃś codayantas tathāpare
c śaraiḥ saṃmohitāś cānye tam evābhimukhā yayau
e tava yodhā hatotsāhā vibhrāntamanasas tadā
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tasmin prabhagne sainyāgre vadhyamāne kirīṭinā
c ke nu tatra raṇe vīrāḥ pratyudīyur dhanaṃjayam
a āho svic chakaṭavyūhaṃ praviṣṭā moghaniścayāḥ
c droṇam āśritya tiṣṭhantaḥ prākāram akutobhayāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tathārjunena saṃbhagne tasmiṃs tava bale tadā
c hatavīre hatotsāhe palāyanakṛtakṣaṇe
a pākaśāsaninābhīkṣṇaṃ vadhyamāne śarottamaiḥ
c na tatra kaś cit saṃgrāme śaśākārjunam īkṣitum
a tatas tava suto rājan dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ tathāgatam
c duḥśāsano bhṛśaṃ kruddho yuddhāyārjunam abhyayāt
a sa kāñcanavicitreṇa kavacena samāvṛtaḥ
c jāmbūnadaśirastrāṇaḥ śūras tīvraparākramaḥ
a nāgānīkena mahatā grasann iva mahīm imām
c duḥśāsano mahārāja savyasācinam āvṛṇot
d yuvarājo balaślāghī piṅgalaḥ priyadarśanaḥ
a hrādena gajaghaṇṭānāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ninadena ca
c jyākṣepaninadaiś caiva virāveṇa ca dantinām
a bhūr diśaś cāntarikṣaṃ ca śabdenāsīt samāvṛtam
c sa muhūrtaṃ pratibhayo dāruṇaḥ samapadyata
a tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇam aṅkuśair abhicoditān
c vyālambahastān saṃrabdhān sapakṣān iva parvatān
a siṃhanādena mahatā narasiṃho dhanaṃjayaḥ
c gajānīkam amitrāṇām abhito vyadhamac charaiḥ
d tadācalaghanaprakhyaṃ patākāśatasaṃkulam
a mahormiṇam ivoddhūtaṃ śvasanena mahārṇavam
b dhanaṃjayaśarodvignāḥ palāyanto babhur gajāḥ
c kirīṭī tad gajānīkaṃ prāviśan makaro yathā
a kāṣṭhātīta ivādityaḥ pratapan yugasaṃkṣaye
c dadṛśe dikṣu sarvāsu pārthaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
a khuraśabdena cāśvānāṃ nemighoṣeṇa tena ca
c tena cotkruṣṭaśabdena jyāninādena tena ca
d nānāvāditraśabdena pāñcajanyasvanena ca
e devadattasya ghoṣeṇa gāṇḍīvaninadena ca
a mandavegatarā nāgā babhūvus te vicetasaḥ
c śarair āśīviṣasparśair nirbhinnāḥ savyasācinā
a te gajā viśikhais tīkṣṇair yudhi gāṇḍīvacoditaiḥ
a   tīrṇāḥ paṅkārṇaveṣv iva
a yugapac ca samāviṣṭair
c anekaśatasāhasraiḥ sarvāṅgeṣu samarpitāḥ
d puṅkhāvaśiṣṭair bahubhiḥ śoṇitotpīḍavāhinaḥ
a ārāvaṃ paramaṃ kṛtvā vadhyamānāḥ kirīṭinā
c nipetur aniśaṃ bhūmau chinnapakṣā ivādrayaḥ
a apare dantaveṣṭeṣu kumbheṣu ca kaṭeṣu ca
c śaraiḥ samarpitā nāgāḥ krauñcavad vyanadan muhuḥ
a gajaskandhagatānāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ kirīṭinā
c ācchidyantottamāṅgāni bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a sakuṇḍalānāṃ patatāṃ śirasāṃ dharaṇītale
c padmānām iva saṃghātaiḥ pārthaś cakre nivedanam
a yantrabaddhā vikavacā vraṇārtā rudhirokṣitāḥ
c bhramatsu yudhi nāgeṣu manuṣyā vilalambire
a ke cid ekena bāṇena sumuktena patatriṇā
c dvau trayaś ca vinirbhinnā nipetur dharaṇītale
d apare mandasaṃrabdhā mātaṅgāḥ parvatopamāḥ
d petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ nihatā vajrarugṇā ivācalāḥ
d atividdhāś ca nārācair vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥ
d sārohā nyapatan bhūmau drumavanta ivācalāḥ
d tato 'rjuno bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ pradahann iva tejasā
d vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi yodhānām anivartinām
a maurvīṃ dhanur dhvajaṃ caiva yugānīṣās tathaiva ca
c rathināṃ kuṭṭayām āsa bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a na saṃdadhan na cāpy asyan na vimuñcan na coddharan
c maṇḍalenaiva dhanuṣā nṛtyan pārthaḥ sma dṛśyate
a atividdhāś ca nārācair vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥ
c muhūrtān nipatanty anye vāraṇā vasudhātale
a utthitāny agaṇeyāni kabandhāni samantataḥ
c adṛśyanta mahārāja tasmin paramasaṃkule
a sacāpāḥ sāṅgulitrāṇāḥ sakhaḍgāḥ sāṅgadā raṇe
c adṛśyanta bhujāś chinnā hemābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
a sūpaskarair adhiṣṭhānair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥ
c cakrair vimathitair akṣai bhagnaiś ca bahudhā yugaiḥ
a varmacāpaśaraiś caiva vyavakīrṇais tatas tataḥ
c sragbhir ābharaṇair vastraiḥ patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
a nihatair vāraṇair aśvaiḥ kṣatriyaiś ca nipātitaiḥ
c adṛśyata mahī tatra dāruṇapratidarśanā
a evaṃ duḥśāsanabalaṃ vadhyamānaṃ kirīṭinā
c saṃprādravan mahārāja vyathitaṃ vai sanāyakam
d evaṃ bale drute yāte rājaputraṃ mahāratham
d vivyādha daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
d jīvitena kathaṃ gantā duruktaṃ yāvad adya te
d tad vākyasadṛśaṃ karma kuru tvaṃ yadi manyase
d evam uktvā tato rājan pārthaḥ pārthivamardanaḥ
d bhṛśaṃ kruddho mahārāja avidhyat tanayaṃ tava
a tato duḥśāsanas trastaḥ sahānīkaḥ śarārditaḥ
c droṇaṃ trātāram ākāṅkṣañ śakaṭavyūham abhyagāt
 saṃjaya uvāca
a duḥśāsanabalaṃ hatvā savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ
c sindhurājaṃ parīpsan vai droṇānīkam upādravat
a sa tu droṇaṃ samāsādya vyūhasya pramukhe sthitam
c kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ kṛṣṇasyānumate 'bravīt
a śivena dhyāhi māṃ brahman svasti caiva vadasva me
c bhavatprasādād icchāmi praveṣṭuṃ durbhidāṃ camūm
a bhavān pitṛsamo mahyaṃ dharmarājasamo 'pi ca
c tathā kṛṣṇasamaś caiva satyam etad bravīmi te
a aśvatthāmā yathā tāta rakṣaṇīyas tavānagha
c tathāham api te rakṣyaḥ sadaiva dvijasattama
a tava prasādād icchāmi sindhurājānam āhave
c nihantuṃ dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha pratijñāṃ rakṣa me vibho
a evam uktas tadācāryaḥ pratyuvāca smayann iva
b yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase pārtha mamāpy evaṃ mataṃ vibho
b kiṃ tu svāmyarthayuktais tu kāryaṃ yuddhaṃ manīṣibhiḥ
c mām ajitvā na bībhatso śakyo jetuṃ jayadrathaḥ
a etāvad uktvā taṃ droṇaḥ śaravrātair avākirat
c sarathāśvadhvajaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ prahasan vai sasārathim
a tato 'rjunaḥ śaravrātān droṇasyāvārya sāyakaiḥ
c droṇam abhyardayad bāṇair ghorarūpair mahattaraiḥ
a vivyādha ca raṇe droṇam anumānya viśāṃ pate
c kṣatradharmaṃ samāsthāya navabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ punaḥ
a tasyeṣūn iṣubhiś chittvā droṇo vivyādha tāv ubhau
c viṣāgnijvalanaprakhyair iṣubhiḥ kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
a iyeṣa pāṇḍavas tasya bāṇaiś chettuṃ śarāsanam
c tasya cintayatas tv evaṃ phalgunasya mahātmanaḥ
e droṇaḥ śarair asaṃbhrānto jyāṃ cicchedāśu vīryavān
a vivyādha ca hayān asya dhvajaṃ sārathim eva ca
c arjunaṃ ca śarair vīraṃ smayamāno 'bhyavākirat
a etasminn antare pārthaḥ sajjaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
c viśeṣayiṣyann ācāryaṃ sarvāstraviduṣāṃ varam
e mumoca ṣaṭśatān bāṇān gṛhītvaikam iva drutam
a punaḥ sapta śatān anyān sahasraṃ cānivartinām
c cikṣepāyutaśaś cānyāṃs te 'ghnan droṇasya tāṃ camūm
a taiḥ samyag astair balinā kṛtinā citrayodhinā
c manuṣyavājimātaṅgā viddhāḥ petur gatāsavaḥ
a vidrutāś ca raṇe petuḥ saṃchinnāyudhajīvitāḥ
c rathino rathamukhyebhyaḥ sahayāḥ śarapīḍitāḥ
a cūrṇitākṣiptadagdhānāṃ vajrānilahutāśanaiḥ
c tulyarūpā gajāḥ petur giryagrāmbudaveśmanām
a petur aśvasahasrāṇi prahatāny arjuneṣubhiḥ
c haṃsā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe vāriviprahatā iva
a rathāśvadvipapattyoghāḥ salilaughā ivādbhutāḥ
c yugāntādityaraśmyābhaiḥ pāṇḍavāstaśarair hatāḥ
a taṃ pāṇḍavādityaśarāṃśujālaṃ
kurupravīrān yudhi niṣṭapantam
c sa droṇameghaḥ śaravarṣavegaiḥ
prācchādayan megha ivārkaraśmīn
a athātyarthavisṛṣṭena dviṣatām asubhojinā
c ājaghne vakṣasi droṇo nārācena dhanaṃjayam
a sa vihvalitasarvāṅgaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥ
c dhairyam ālambya bībhatsur droṇaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ
a droṇas tu pañcabhir bāṇair vāsudevam atāḍayat
c arjunaṃ ca trisaptatyā dhvajaṃ cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
a viśeṣayiṣyañ śiṣyaṃ ca droṇo rājan parākramī
c adṛśyam arjunaṃ cakre nimeṣāc charavṛṣṭibhiḥ
a prasaktān patato 'drākṣma bhāradvājasya sāyakān
c maṇḍalīkṛtam evāsya dhanuś cādṛśyatādbhutam
a te 'bhyayuḥ samare rājan vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
c droṇasṛṣṭāḥ subahavaḥ kaṅkapatraparicchadāḥ
d tatrādbhutam apaśyāma śilānām iva sarpaṇam
d yad droṇaṃ tarasā pārtho vṛddhaṃ bālo 'pi nātarat
d cintayām āsa vārṣṇeyo dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikramam
d nātivartiṣyate hy enaṃ velām iva mahārṇavaḥ
a tad dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ droṇapāṇḍavayos tadā
c vāsudevo mahābuddhiḥ kāryavattām acintayat
d tataḥ pārthaṃ samudvignaṃ lakṣya cintayate 'cyutaḥ
d droṇasya cāpi vikrāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā madhunighātanaḥ
a tato 'bravīd vāsudevo dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥ
c pārtha pārtha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
a droṇam utsṛjya gacchāmaḥ kṛtyam etan mahattaram
c pārthaś cāpy abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ yatheṣṭam iti keśava
a tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā droṇaṃ prāyān mahābhujaḥ
c parivṛttaś ca bībhatsur agacchad visṛjañ śarān
a tato 'bravīt smayan droṇaḥ kvedaṃ pāṇḍava gamyate
c nanu nāma raṇe śatrum ajitvā na nivartase
 arjuna uvāca
a gurur bhavān na me śatruḥ śiṣyaḥ putrasamo 'smi te
c na cāsti sa pumāṃl loke yas tvāṃ yudhi parājayet
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evaṃ bruvāṇo bībhatsur jayadrathavadhotsukaḥ
c tvarāyukto mahābāhus tat sainyaṃ samupādravat
a taṃ cakrarakṣau pāñcālyau yudhāmanyūttamaujasau
c anvayātāṃ mahātmānau viśantaṃ tāvakaṃ balam
a tato jayo mahārāja kṛtavarmā ca sāttvataḥ
c kāmbojaś ca śrutāyuś ca dhanaṃjayam avārayan
a teṣāṃ daśasahasrāṇi rathānām anuyāyinām
c abhīṣāhāḥ śūrasenāḥ śibayo 'tha vasātayaḥ
a mācellakā lalitthāś ca kekayā madrakās tathā
c nārāyaṇāś ca gopālāḥ kāmbojānāṃ ca ye gaṇāḥ
a karṇena vijitāḥ pūrvaṃ saṃgrāme śūrasaṃmatāḥ
c bhāradvājaṃ puraskṛtya tyaktātmāno 'rjunaṃ prati
a putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ kruddhaṃ mṛtyum ivāntakam
c tyajantaṃ tumule prāṇān saṃnaddhaṃ citrayodhinam
a gāhamānam anīkāni mātaṅgam iva yūthapam
c maheṣvāsaṃ parākrāntaṃ naravyāghram avārayan
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c anyonyaṃ vai prārthayatāṃ yodhānām arjunasya ca
a jayadrathavadhaprepsum āyāntaṃ puruṣarṣabham
c nyavārayanta sahitāḥ kriyā vyādhim ivotthitam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a saṃniruddhas tu taiḥ pārtho mahābalaparākramaḥ
c drutaṃ samanuyātaś ca droṇena rathināṃ varaḥ
a kirann iṣugaṇāṃs tikṣṇān svaraśmīn iva bhāskaraḥ
c tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ dehaṃ vyādhigaṇo yathā
a aśvo viddho dhvajaś chinnaḥ sārohaḥ patito gajaḥ
c chatrāṇi cāpaviddhāni rathāś cakrair vinā kṛtāḥ
a vidrutāni ca sainyāni śarārtāni samantataḥ
c ity āsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
a teṣām āyacchatāṃ saṃkhye parasparam ajihmagaiḥ
c arjuno dhvajinīṃ rājann abhīkṣṇaṃ samakampayat
a satyāṃ cikīrṣamāṇas tu pratijñāṃ satyasaṃgaraḥ
c abhyadravad rathaśreṣṭhaṃ śoṇāśvaṃ śvetavāhanaḥ
a taṃ droṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā marmabhidbhir ajihmagaiḥ
c antevāsinam ācāryo maheṣvāsaṃ samardayat
a taṃ tūrṇam iva bībhatsuḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c abhyadhāvad iṣūn asyann iṣuvegavighātakān
a tasyāśu kṣipato bhallān bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c pratyavidhyad ameyātmā brahmāstraṃ samudīrayan
a tad adbhutam apaśyāma droṇasyācāryakaṃ yudhi
c yatamāno yuvā nainaṃ pratyavidhyad yad arjunaḥ
a kṣarann iva mahāmegho vāridhārāḥ sahasraśaḥ

c pratijagrāha tejasvī bāṇair bāṇān viśātayan
d   śaravarṣeṇa vīryavān
d avārayad asaṃbhrānto na tv ācāryam apīḍayat
a droṇas tu pañcaviṃśatyā śvetavāhanam ārdayat

a pārthas tu prahasan dhīmān ācāryaṃ sa śaraughiṇam
c visṛjantaṃ śitān bāṇān avārayata taṃ yudhi

c āvarjayetāṃ durdharṣaṃ yugāntāgnim ivotthitam

c abhyayād varjayan droṇaṃ mainākam iva parvatam

c śarair agniśikhākāraiḥ kruddhāśīviṣasaṃnibhaiḥ
a athānyad dhanur ādāya kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
c pañcabhiḥ sāyakais tūrṇaṃ vivyādhorasi bhārata

c taṃ pārtho navabhir bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntare
a viṣaktaṃ dṛśya kaunteyaṃ kṛtavarmarathaṃ prati
c cintayām āsa vārṣṇeyo na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
a tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'bravīt pārthaṃ kṛtavarmaṇi mā dayām
c kurusāṃbandhikaṃ kṛtvā pramathyainaṃ viśātaya
a tataḥ sa kṛtavarmāṇaṃ mohayitvārjunaḥ śaraiḥ
c abhyagāj javanair aśvaiḥ kāmbojānām anīkinīm
a amarṣitas tu hārdikhyaḥ praviṣṭe śvetavāhane
c vidhunvan saśaraṃ cāpaṃ pāñcālyābhyāṃ samāgataḥ
a cakrarakṣau tu pāñcālyāv arjunasya padānugau

a tāv avidhyat tato bhojaḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥ
c tribhir eva yudhāmanyuṃ caturbhiś cottamaujasam
a tāv apy enaṃ vivyadhatur daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c saṃcicchidatur apy asya dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
a athānyad dhanur ādāya hārdikyaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c kṛtvā vidhanuṣau vīrau śaravarṣair avākirat

c tenāntareṇa bībhatsur viveśāmitravāhinīm

c dhārtarāṣṭreṣv anīkeṣu yatamānau nararṣabhau

c nāvadhīt kṛtavarmāṇaṃ prāptam apy arisūdanaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tathāyāntaṃ śūro rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
c abhyadravat susaṃkruddho vidhunvāno mahad dhanuḥ
d dradrāvyamāṇeṣu sainyeṣu pāṇḍavena tatas tataḥ
d śrutāyudho mahātejāḥ kiran bāṇān samabhyayāt
a sa pārthaṃ tribhir ānarchat saptatyā ca janārdanam

c ājaghāna bhṛśaṃ kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipam

c ājaghānorasi kruddhaḥ saptabhir nataparvabhiḥ

c vāsaviṃ navabhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat

c śarair anekasāhasraiḥ pīḍayām āsa bhārata
a aśvāṃś cāsyāvadhīt tūrṇaṃ sārathiṃ ca mahārathaḥ
c vivyādha cainaṃ saptatyā nārācānāṃ mahābalaḥ
a hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya sa tu rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
c abhyadravad raṇe pārthaṃ gadām udyamya vīryavān
a varuṇasyātmajo vīraḥ sa tu rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
c parṇāśā jananī yasya śītatoyā mahānadī

c divyam astraṃ sutas te 'yaṃ yanāvadhyo bhaviṣyati
a nāsti cāpy amaratvaṃ vai manuṣyasya kathaṃ cana
c sarveṇāvaśyamartavyaṃ jātena saritāṃ vare

c astrasyāsya prabhāvād vai vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
a ity uktvā varuṇaḥ prādād gadāṃ mantrapuraskṛtām
c yām āsādya durādharṣaḥ sarvaloke śrutāyudhaḥ
a uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān punar eva jaleśvaraḥ
c ayudhyati na moktavyā sā tvayy eva pated iti
d hanyād eṣā pratīpaṃ hi prayoktāram iti prabho
d na cākarot sa tadvākyaṃ prāpte kāle śrutāyudhaḥ
a sa tayā vīraghātinyā janārdanam atāḍayat
c pratijagrāha tāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pīnenāṃsena vīryavān
a nākampayata śauriṃ sā vindhyaṃ girim ivānilaḥ
b tato 'rjunaḥ kṣuraprābhyāṃ bhujau parighasaṃnibhau
b vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ śīghraṃ jaleśvarasutasya vai
b sā jvalantī maholkeva samāsādya janārdanam
c pratyabhyayāt taṃ viproḍhā kṛtyeva duradhiṣṭhitā
a jaghāna cāsthitaṃ vīraṃ śrutāyudham amarṣaṇam
b sa papāta hato bhūmau viśirā vibhujo balī
b sa bhagna iva vātena bahuśākho vanaspatiḥ
b sā visphurantī jvalitā vajravegasamā gadā
c hatvā śrutāyudhaṃ vīraṃ jagatīm anvapadyata
d gadāṃ nivartitāṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ ca śrutāyudham
a hāhākāro mahāṃs tatra sainyānāṃ samajāyata
c svenāstreṇa hataṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutāyudham ariṃdamam
a ayudhyamānāya hi sā keśavāya narādhipa
c kṣiptā śrutāyudhenātha tasmāt tam avadhīd gadā
a yathoktaṃ varuṇenājau tathā sa nidhanaṃ gataḥ
c vyasuś cāpy apatad bhūmau prekṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
a patamānas tu sa babhau parṇāśāyāḥ priyaḥ sutaḥ
c saṃbhagna iva vātena bahuśākho vanaspatiḥ
a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāmukhyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c prādravanta hataṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutāyudham ariṃdamam
a tatha kāmbojarājasya putraḥ śūraḥ sudakṣiṇaḥ
c abhyayāj javanair aśvaiḥ phalgunaṃ śatrusūdanam
a tasya pārthaḥ śarān sapta preṣayām āsa bhārata

c arjunaṃ prativivyādha daśabhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
a vāsudevaṃ tribhir viddhvā punaḥ pārthaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
c tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā ketuṃ ciccheda māriṣa
a bhallābhyāṃ bhṛśatīkṣṇābhyāṃ taṃ ca vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ
c sa tu pārthaṃ tribhir viddhvā siṃhanādam athānadat
a sarvapāraśavīṃ caiva śaktiṃ śūraḥ sudakṣiṇaḥ
c saghaṇṭāṃ prāhiṇod ghorāṃ kruddho gāṇḍīvadhanvane
a sā jvalantī maholkeva tam āsādya mahāratham
c savisphuliṅgā nirbhidya nipapāta mahītale
d śaktyā cābhihato gāḍhaṃ mūrchayābhipariplutaḥ
d samāśvāsya mahātejāḥ sṛkkiṇī parilelihan

c sāśvadhvajadhanuḥsūtaṃ vivyādhācintyavikramaḥ
e rathaṃ cānyaiḥ subahubhiś cakre viśakalaṃ śaraiḥ
a sudakṣiṇaṃ tu kāmbojaṃ moghasaṃkalpavikramam
c bibheda hṛdi bāṇena pṛthudhāreṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
a sa bhinnamarmā srastāṅgaḥ prabhraṣṭamukuṭāṅgadaḥ
c papātābhimukhaḥ śūro yantramukta iva dhvajaḥ
a gireḥ śikharajaḥ śrīmān suśākhaḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ
c nirbhagna iva vātena karṇikāro himātyaye

a śete sma nihato bhūmau kāmbojāstaraṇocitaḥ
b mahārhābharaṇopetaḥ sānumān iva parvataḥ
c sudarśanīyas tāmrākṣaḥ karṇinā sa sudakṣiṇaḥ
e putraḥ kāmbojarājasya pārthena vinipātitaḥ
f aśobhata mahābāhur vyasur bhūmau nipātitaḥ
f śocayan sarvabhūtāni keśavaṃ ca sahārjunam
a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni vyadravanta sutasya te
c hataṃ śrutāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmbojaṃ ca sudakṣiṇam

a hate sudakṣiṇe rājan vīre caiva śrutāyudhe
c javenābhyadravan pārthaṃ kupitāḥ sainikās tava

c abhyavarṣaṃs tato rājañ śaravarṣair dhanaṃjayam

c raṇe sapatnān nighnantaṃ jigīṣantan parān yudhi

d uccakarta śirāṃsy ugro nāḷebhya iva paṅkajān

c śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca dhanaṃjayam ayudhyatām

c tāv enaṃ śaravarṣāṇi savyadakṣiṇam asyatām

a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
c siṃhanādo mahān āsīd dhataṃ matvā dhanaṃjayam
a kṛṣṇaś ca bhṛśasaṃtapto dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ vicetasam
c āśvāsayat suhṛdyābhir vāgbhis tatra dhanaṃjayam

c vāsudevaṃ ca vārṣṇeyaṃ śaravarṣaiḥ samantataḥ
a sacakrakūbararathaṃ sāśvadhvajapatākinam
c adṛśyaṃ cakratur yuddhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat

c tasmād āsan sahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām

c vasudhām anvapadyetāṃ vātanunnāv iva drumau

a ṣaṭsahasrān varān vīrān punar daśaśatān varān

a śaraiḥ sahasraśo viddhā vidhivat kalpitā dvipāḥ
c śerate bhūmim āsādya śailā vajrahatā iva
