c nirdahed analo 'raṇyaṃ yathā vāyusamīritaḥ
a sainyāraṇyaṃ tava tathā kṛṣṇānilasamīritaḥ
c śarārcir adahat kruddhaḥ pāṇḍavāgnir dhanaṃjayaḥ
a śūnyān kurvan rathopasthān mānavaiḥ saṃstaran mahīm
c prānṛtyad iva saṃbādhe cāpahasto dhanaṃjayaḥ
a vajrakalpaiḥ śarair bhūmiṃ kurvann uttaraśoṇitām
b tataḥ prāvartata nadī śoṇitasya taraṅgiṇī
b narāśvadvipakāyebhyaḥ parvatebhya ivāpagā
b asthiśarkarasaṃbādhā dhvajavṛkṣā rathahradā
b saṃchinnaśīrṣapāṣāṇā hastihastamahāgrahā
b māṃsamajjāsthipaṅkāḍhyā hatāśvamakarākulā
b yodhagomāyusaṃkīrṇā kabandhaśatasaṃkulā
b uṣṇīṣaphenasaṃchannā śaraghorajhaṣākulā
b rudrasyākrīḍasadṛśīṃ bhūmiṃ kurvan vibhīṣaṇām
c prāviśad bhāratīṃ senāṃ saṃkruddho vai dhanaṃjayaḥ
e taṃ śrutāyus tathāmbaṣṭho vrajamānaṃ nyavārayat
a tasyārjunaḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kaṅkapatraparicchadaiḥ
c nyapātayad dhayāñ śīghraṃ yatamānasya māriṣa
e dhanuś cāsyāparaiś chittvā śaraiḥ pārtho vicakrame
a ambaṣṭhas tu gadāṃ gṛhya krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
b gadāpāṇir drutaṃ yātvā pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
c āsasāda raṇe pārthaṃ keśavaṃ ca mahāratham
a tataḥ sa prahasan vīro gadām udyamya bhārata
c ratham āvārya gadayā keśavaṃ samatāḍayat
a gadayā tāḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā keśavaṃ paravīrahā
c arjuno bhṛśasaṃkruddhaḥ so 'mbaṣṭhaṃ prati bhārata
a tataḥ śarair hemapuṅkhaiḥ sagadaṃ rathināṃ varam
c chādayām āsa samare meghaḥ sūryam ivoditam
a tato 'paraiḥ śaraiś cāpi gadāṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
c acūrṇayat tadā pārthas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a atha tāṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhyānyāṃ mahatīṃ gadām
c arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca punaḥ punar atāḍayat
a tasyārjunaḥ kṣuraprābhyāṃ sagadāv udyatau bhujau
c cicchedendradhvajākārau śiraś cānyena patriṇā
a sa papāta hato rājan vasudhām anunādayan
c indradhvaja ivotsṛṣṭo yantranirmuktabandhanaḥ
d ambaṣṭhe tu tadā bhagne tava sainyam abhajyata
a rathānīkāvagāḍhaś ca vāraṇāśvaśatair vṛtaḥ
b ādadānaṃ śaraiḥ prāṇān gajāśvarathasādinām
c so 'dṛśyata tadā pārtho ghanaiḥ sūrya ivāvṛtaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ praviṣṭe kaunteye sindhurājajighāṃsayā
c droṇānīkaṃ vinirbhidya bhojānīkaṃ ca dustaram
a kāmbojasya ca dāyāde hate rājan sudakṣiṇe
c śrutāyudhe ca vikrānte nihate savyasācinā
a vipradruteṣv anīkeṣu vidhvasteṣu samantataḥ
c prabhagnaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā putras te droṇam abhyayāt
a tvarann ekarathenaiva sametya droṇam abravīt
c gataḥ sa puruṣavyāghraḥ pramathyemāṃ mahācamūm
a atra buddhyā samīkṣasva kiṃ nu kāryam anantaram
c arjunasya vighātāya dāruṇe 'smiñ janakṣaye
a yathā sa puruṣavyāghro na hanyeta jayadrathaḥ
c tathā vidhatsva bhadraṃ te tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
a asau dhanaṃjayāgnir hi kopamārutacoditaḥ
c senākakṣaṃ dahati me vahniḥ kakṣam ivotthitaḥ
a atikrānte hi kaunteye bhittvā sainyaṃ paraṃtapa
c jayadrathasya goptāraḥ saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
a sthirā buddhir narendrāṇām āsīd brahmavidāṃ vara
c nātikramiṣyati droṇaṃ jātu jīvan dhanaṃjayaḥ
a so 'sau pārtho vyatikrānto miṣatas te mahādyute
c sarvaṃ hy adyāturaṃ manye naitad asti balaṃ mama
a jānāmi tvāṃ mahābhāga pāṇḍavānāṃ hite ratam
c tathā muhyāmi ca brahman kāryavattāṃ vicintayan
a yathāśakti ca te brahman vartaye vṛttim uttamām
c prīṇāmi ca yathāśakti tac ca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase
a asmān na tvaṃ sadā bhaktān icchasy amitavikrama
c pāṇḍavān satataṃ prīṇāsy asmākaṃ vipriye ratān
a asmān evopajīvaṃs tvam asmākaṃ vipriye rataḥ
c na hy ahaṃ tvāṃ vijānāmi madhudigdham iva kṣuram
c   vacasā lalitaṃ sadā
c hṛdayena bhṛśaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ
a nādāsyac ced varaṃ mahyaṃ bhavān pāṇḍavanigrahe
c nāvārayiṣyaṃ gacchantam ahaṃ sindhupatiṃ gṛhān
a mayā tv āśaṃsamānena tvattas trāṇam abuddhinā
c āśvāsitaḥ sindhupatir mohād dattaś ca mṛtyave
a yamadaṃṣṭrāntaraṃ prāpto mucyetāpi hi mānavaḥ
c nārjunasya vaśaṃ prāpto mucyetājau jayadrathaḥ
a sa tathā kuru śoṇāśva yathā rakṣyeta saindhavaḥ
c mama cārtapralāpānāṃ mā krudhaḥ pāhi saindhavam
 droṇa uvāca
a nābhyasūyāmi te vācam aśvatthāmnāsi me samaḥ
c satyaṃ tu te pravakṣyāmi taj juṣasva viśāṃ pate
a sārathiḥ pravaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śīghrāś cāsya hayottamāḥ
c alpaṃ ca vivaraṃ kṛtvā tūrṇaṃ yāti dhanaṃjayaḥ
a kiṃ nu paśyasi bāṇaughān krośamātre kirīṭinaḥ
c paścād rathasya patitān kṣiptāñ śīghraṃ hi gacchataḥ
a na cāhaṃ śīghrayāne 'dya samartho vayasānvitaḥ
c senāmukhe ca pārthānām etad balam upasthitam
a yudhiṣṭhiraś ca me grāhyo miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
c evaṃ mayā pratijñātaṃ kṣatramadhye mahābhuja
a dhanaṃjayena cotsṛṣṭo vartate pramukhe mama
c tasmād vyūhamukhaṃ hitvā nāhaṃ yāsyāmi phalgunam
a tulyābhijanakarmāṇaṃ śatrum ekaṃ sahāyavān
c gatvā yodhaya mā bhais tvaṃ tvaṃ hy asya jagataḥ patiḥ
a rājā śūraḥ kṛtī dakṣo vairam utpādya pāṇḍavaiḥ
c vīra svayaṃ prayāhy āśu yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
 duryodhana uvāca
a kathaṃ tvām apy atikrāntaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c dhanaṃjayo mayā śakya ācārya pratibādhitum
a api śakyo raṇe jetuṃ vajrahastaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c nārjunaḥ samare śakyo jetuṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ
a yena bhojaś ca hārdikyo bhavāṃś ca tridaśopamaḥ
c astrapratāpena jitau śrutāyuś ca nibarhitaḥ
a sudakṣiṇaś ca nihataḥ sa ca rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
c śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca mlecchāś ca śataśo hatāḥ
a taṃ kathaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe dahantam ahitān bahūn
c pratiyotsyāmi durdharṣaṃ tan me śaṃsāstrakovida
a kṣamaṃ cen manyase yuddhaṃ mama tenādya śādhi mām
c paravān asmi bhavati preṣyakṛd rakṣa me yaśaḥ
 droṇa uvāca
a satyaṃ vadasi kauravya durādharṣo dhanaṃjayaḥ
c ahaṃ tu tat kariṣyāmi yathainaṃ prasahiṣyasi
a adbhutaṃ cādya paśyantu loke sarvadhanurdharāḥ
c viṣaktaṃ tvayi kaunteyaṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ
a eṣa te kavacaṃ rājaṃs tathā badhnāmi kāñcanam
c yathā na bāṇā nāstrāṇi viṣahiṣyanti te raṇe
a yadi tvāṃ sāsurasurāḥ sayakṣoragarākṣasāḥ
c yodhayanti trayo lokāḥ sanarā nāsti te bhayam
a na kṛṣṇo na ca kaunteyo na cānyaḥ śastrabhṛd raṇe
c śarān arpayituṃ kaś cit kavace tava śakṣyati
a sa tvaṃ kavacam āsthāya kruddham adya raṇe 'rjunam
c tvaramāṇaḥ svayaṃ yāhi na cāsau tvāṃ sahiṣyate
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktvā tvaran droṇaḥ spṛṣṭvāmbho varma bhāsvaram
c ābabandhādbhutatamaṃ japan mantraṃ yathāvidhi
a raṇe tasmin sumahati vijayāya sutasya te
c visismāpayiṣur lokaṃ vidyayā brahmavittamaḥ
d sa saṃyukto mahābāhur ācāryeṇa mahātmanā
 droṇa uvāca
a karotu svasti te brahmā svasti cāpi dvijātayaḥ
c sarīsṛpāś ca ye śreṣṭhās tebhyas te svasti bhārata
a yayātir nahuṣaś caiva dhundhumāro bhagīrathaḥ
c tubhyaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sarve svasti kurvantu sarvaśaḥ
a svasti te 'stv ekapādebhyo bahupādebhya eva ca
c svasty astv apādakebhyaś ca nityaṃ tava mahāraṇe
a svāhā svadhā śacī caiva svasti kurvantu te sadā
c lakṣmīr arundhatī caiva kurutāṃ svasti te 'nagha
a asito devalaś caiva viśvāmitras tathāṅgirāḥ
c vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapaś caiva svasti kurvantu te nṛpa
a dhātā vidhātā lokeśo diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
c svasti te 'dya prayacchantu kārttikeyaś ca ṣaṇmukhaḥ
d yena devāḥ sakṛdbhagnāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye
d dhṛtāḥ sa cāhataḥ śūro hy avadhyo devatāgaṇaiḥ
a vivasvān bhagavān svasti karotu tava sarvaśaḥ
b pārṣadā vaśagā yasya svasti tubhyaṃ prayacchatu
c diggajāś caiva catvāraḥ kṣitiḥ khaṃ gaganaṃ grahāḥ
d diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva svasti tubhyaṃ prakurvatām
d prajānāṃ patayaś caiva siddhā lokahite ratāḥ
d svasti kurvantu te nityaṃ mantreṇānena saṃstutāḥ
a adhastād dharaṇīṃ yo 'sau sadā dhārayate nṛpa
c sa śeṣaḥ pannagaśreṣṭhaḥ svasti tubhyaṃ prayacchatu
a gāndhāre yudhi vikramya nirjitāḥ surasattamāḥ
c purā vṛtreṇa daityena bhinnadehāḥ sahasraśaḥ
a hṛtatejobalāḥ sarve tadā sendrā divaukasaḥ
b vihvalā hṛtavīryāś ca sahendrā vibudhā drutāḥ
c brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur vṛtrād bhītā mahāsurāt
 devā ūcuḥ
a pramarditānāṃ vṛtreṇa devānāṃ devasattama
c gatir bhava suraśreṣṭha trāhi no mahato bhayāt
 droṇa uvāca
a atha pārśve sthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
c prāha tathyam idaṃ vākyaṃ viṣaṇṇān surasattamān
a rakṣyā me satataṃ devāḥ sahendrāḥ sadvijātayaḥ
c tvaṣṭuḥ sudurdharaṃ tejo yena vṛtro vinirmitaḥ
a tvaṣṭrā purā tapas taptvā varṣāyutaśataṃ tadā
c vṛtro vinirmito devāḥ prāpyānujñāṃ maheśvarāt
a sa tasyaiva prasādād vai hanyād eva ripur balī
c nāgatvā śaṃkarasthānaṃ bhagavān dṛśyate haraḥ
a dṛṣṭvā haniṣyatha ripuṃ kṣipraṃ gacchata mandaram
c yatrāste tapasāṃ yonir dakṣayajñavināśanaḥ
e pinākī sarvabhūteśo bhaganetranipātanaḥ
a te gatvā sahitā devā brahmaṇā saha mandaram
c apaśyaṃs tejasāṃ rāśiṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabham
a so 'bravīt svāgataṃ devā brūta kiṃ karavāṇy aham
c amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mahyaṃ kāmaprāptir ato 'stu vaḥ
a evam uktās tu te sarve pratyūcus taṃ divaukasaḥ
c tejo hṛtaṃ no vṛtreṇa gatir bhava divaukasām
a mūrtīr īkṣaṣva no deva prahārair jarjarīkṛtāḥ
c śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ sma gatir bhava maheśvara
 maheśvara uvāca
a viditaṃ me yathā devāḥ kṛtyeyaṃ sumahābalā
c tvaṣṭus tejobhavā ghorā durnivāryākṛtātmabhiḥ
a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ sāhyaṃ sarvadivaukasām
c mamedaṃ gātrajaṃ śakra kavacaṃ gṛhya bhāsvaram
e badhānānena mantreṇa mānasena sureśvara
f vadhāyāsuramukhyasya vṛtrasya suraghātinaḥ
 droṇa uvāca
a ity uktvā varadaḥ prādād varma tan mantram eva ca
c sa tena varmaṇā guptaḥ prāyād vṛtracamūṃ prati
a nānāvidhaiś ca śastraughaiḥ pātyamānair mahāraṇe
c na saṃdhiḥ śakyate bhettuṃ varmabandhasya tasya tu
d sa tena varmaṇā gupto vṛtraṃ devaripuṃ tadā
a tato jaghāna samare vṛtraṃ devapatiḥ svayam
b jaghāna samare 'bhītaḥ śakro devāgraṇīs tadā
c taṃ ca matramayaṃ bandhaṃ varma cāṅgirase dadau
a aṅgirāḥ prāha putrasya mantrajñasya bṛhaspateḥ
c bṛhaspatir athovāca agniveśyāya dhīmate
a agniveśyo mama prādāt tena badhnāmi varma te
c tavādya deharakṣārthaṃ mantreṇa nṛpasattama
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktvā tato droṇas tava putraṃ mahādyutiḥ
c punar eva vacaḥ prāha śanair ācāryapuṃgavaḥ
d   tasya karma babandha ca
d uvāca cainam ācāryas tava putram idaṃ vacaḥ
a brahmasūtreṇa badhnāmi kavacaṃ tava pārthiva
b brahmaṇaś ca svasūktena badhnāmi kavacaṃ tava
c hiraṇyagarbheṇa yathā baddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ purā raṇe
a yathā ca brahmaṇā baddhaṃ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye
c śakrasya kavacaṃ divyaṃ tathā badhnāmy ahaṃ tava
a baddhvā tu kavacaṃ tasya mantreṇa vidhipūrvakam
c preṣayām āsa rājānaṃ yuddhāya mahate dvijaḥ
a sa saṃnaddho mahābāhur ācāryeṇa mahātmanā
b prasthitaḥ sahasā rājan yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
c rathānāṃ ca sahasreṇa trigartānāṃ prahāriṇām
a tathā dantisahasreṇa mattānāṃ vīryaśālinām
c aśvānām ayutenaiva tathānyaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
a vṛtaḥ prāyān mahābāhur arjunasya rathaṃ prati
c nānāvāditraghoṣeṇa yathā vairocanis tathā
c   nānājanapadāyutaḥ
c tava putraḥ prayātas tu
a tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt sainyānāṃ tava bhārata
c agādhaṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā samudram iva kauravam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a praviṣṭayor mahārāja pārthavārṣṇeyayos tadā
c duryodhane prayāte ca pṛṣṭhataḥ puruṣarṣabhe
a javenābhyadravan droṇaṃ mahatā nisvanena ca
c pāṇḍavāḥ somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ tato yuddham avartata
a tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca vyūhasya purato 'dbhutam
a rājan kadā cin nāsmābhir dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛṅ na ca śrutam
b rājan na tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na ca śrutam
c yādṛṅ madhyagate sūrye yuddham āsīd viśāṃ pate
a dhṛṣṭadyumnamukhāḥ pārthā vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c droṇasya sainyaṃ te sarve śaravarṣair avākiran
a vayaṃ droṇaṃ puraskṛtya sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
c pārṣatapramukhān pārthān abhyavarṣāma sāyakaiḥ
a mahāmeghāv ivodīrṇau miśravātau himātyaye
c senāgre viprakāśete rucire rathabhūṣite
a sametya tu mahāsene cakratur vegam uttamam
c jāhnavīyamune nadyau prāvṛṣīvolbaṇodake
a nānāśastrapurovāto dvipāśvarathasaṃvṛtaḥ
c gadāvidyun mahāraudraḥ saṃgrāmajalado mahān
a bhāradvājāniloddhūtaḥ śaradhārāsahasravān
c abhyavarṣan mahāraudraḥ pāṇḍusenāgnim uddhatam
a samudram iva gharmānte vivān ghoro mahānilaḥ
c vyakṣobhayad anīkāni pāṇḍavānāṃ dvijottamaḥ
a te 'pi sarvaprayatnena droṇam eva samādravan
c bibhitsanto mahāsetuṃ vāryoghāḥ prabalā iva
a vārayām āsa tān droṇo jalaughān acalo yathā
c pāṇḍavān samare kruddhān pāñcālāṃś ca sakekayān
a athāpare 'pi rājānaḥ parāvṛtya samantataḥ
c mahābalā raṇe śūrāḥ pāñcālān anvavārayan
a tato raṇe naravyāghraḥ pārṣataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
c saṃjaghānāsakṛd droṇaṃ bibhitsur arivāhinīm
a yathaiva śaravarṣāṇi droṇo varṣati pārṣate
c tathaiva śaravarṣāṇi dhṛṣṭadyumno 'bhyavarṣata
a sanistriṃśapurovātaḥ śaktiprāsarṣṭisaṃvṛtaḥ
c jyāvidyuc cāpasaṃhrādo dhṛṣṭadyumnabalāhakaḥ
a śaradhārāśmavarṣāṇi vyasṛjat sarvatodiśam
c nighnan rathavarāśvaughāṃś chādayām āsa vāhinīm
a yaṃ yam ārchac charair droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ rathavrajam
c tatas tataḥ śarair droṇam apākarṣata pārṣataḥ
a tathā tu yatamānasya droṇasya yudhi bhārata
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samāsādya tridhā sainyam abhidyata
a bhojam eke nyavartanta jalasaṃdham athāpare
c pāṇḍavair hanyamānāś ca droṇam evāpare 'vrajan
a sainyāny aghaṭayad yāni droṇas tu rathināṃ varaḥ
c vyadhamac cāpi tāny asya dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
a dhārtarāṣṭrās tridhābhūtā vadhyante pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥ
c agopāḥ paśavo 'raṇye bahubhiḥ śvāpadair iva
a kālaḥ saṃgrasate yodhān dhṛṣṭadyumnena mohitān
c saṃgrāme tumule tasminn iti saṃmenire janāḥ
a kunṛpasya yathā rāṣṭraṃ durbhikṣavyādhitaskaraiḥ
c drāvyate tadvad āpannā pāṇḍavais tava vāhinī
a arkaraśmiprabhinneṣu śastreṣu kavaceṣu ca
c cakṣūṃṣi pratihanyante sainyena rajasā tathā
a tridhābhūteṣu sainyeṣu vadhyamāneṣu pāṇḍavaiḥ
c amarṣitas tato droṇaḥ pāñcālān vyadhamac charaiḥ
a mṛdnatas tāny anīkāni nighnataś cāpi sāyakaiḥ
c babhūva rūpaṃ droṇasya kālāgner iva dīpyataḥ
a rathaṃ nāgaṃ hayaṃ cāpi pattinaś ca viśāṃ pate
c ekaikeneṣuṇā saṃkhye nirbibheda mahārathaḥ
a pāṇḍavānāṃ tu sainyeṣu nāsti kaś cit sa bhārata
c dadhāra yo raṇe bāṇān droṇacāpacyutāñ śitān
a tat pacyamānam arkeṇa droṇasāyakatāpitam
c babhrāma pārṣataṃ sainyaṃ tatra tatraiva bhārata
d hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ bhāradvājena sarvataḥ
d śarair agniśikhākārair dahyate bharatarṣabha
a tathaiva pārṣatenāpi kālyamānaṃ balaṃ tava
c abhavat sarvato dīptaṃ śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
a vadhyamāneṣu sainyeṣu droṇapārṣatasāyakaiḥ
c tyaktvā prāṇān paraṃ śaktyā prāyudhyanta sma sainikāḥ
a tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca yudhyatāṃ bharatarṣabha
c nāsīt kaś cin mahārāja yo 'tyākṣīt saṃyugaṃ bhayāt
a bhīmasenaṃ tu kaunteyaṃ sodaryāḥ paryavārayan
c viviṃśatiś citraseno vikarṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
a vindānuvindāv āvantyau kṣemadhūrtiś ca vīryavān
c trayāṇāṃ tava putrāṇāṃ traya evānuyāyinaḥ
a bāhlīkarājas tejasvī kulaputro mahārathaḥ
c sahasenaḥ sahāmātyo draupadeyān avārayat
a śaibyo govāsano rājā yodhair daśaśatāvaraiḥ
c kāśyasyābhibhuvaḥ putraṃ parākrāntam avārayat
a ajātaśatruṃ kaunteyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
c madrāṇām īśvaraḥ śalyo rājā rājānam āvṛṇot
a duḥśāsanas tv avasthāpya svam anīkam amarṣaṇaḥ
c sātyakiṃ prayayau kruddhaḥ śūro rathavaraṃ yudhi
a svakenāham anīkena saṃnaddhakavacāvṛtaḥ
c catuḥśatair maheṣvāsaiś cekitānam avārayam
a śakunis tu sahānīko mādrīputram avārayat
c gāndhārakaiḥ saptaśataiś cāpaśaktiśarāsibhiḥ
a vindānuvindāv āvantyau virāṭaṃ matsyam ārchatām
c prāṇāṃs tyaktvā maheṣvāsau mitrārthe 'bhyudyatau yudhi
a śikhaṇḍinaṃ yājñaseniṃ rundhānam aparājitam
c bāhlikaḥ pratisaṃyattaḥ parākrāntam avārayat
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyaṃ krūraiḥ sārdhaṃ prabhadrakaiḥ
c āvantyaḥ saha sauvīraiḥ kruddharūpam avārayat
a ghaṭotkacaṃ tathā śūraṃ rākṣasaṃ krūrayodhinam
c alāyudho 'dravat tūrṇaṃ kruddham āyāntam āhave
a alambusaṃ rākṣasendraṃ kuntibhojo mahārathaḥ
c sainyena mahatā yuktaḥ kruddharūpam avārayat
d evaṃ dvaṃdvaśatāny āsaṃs tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
a saindhavaḥ pṛṣṭhatas tv āsīt sarvasainyasya bhārata
c rakṣitaḥ parameṣvāsaiḥ kṛpaprabhṛtibhī rathaiḥ
a tasyāstāṃ cakrarakṣau dvau saindhavasya bṛhattamau
c drauṇir dakṣiṇato rājan sūtaputraś ca vāmataḥ
a pṛṣṭhagopās tu tasyāsan saumadattipurogamāḥ
c kṛpaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca śalaḥ śalyaś ca durjayaḥ
a nītimanto maheṣvāsāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
c saindhavasya vidhāyaivaṃ rakṣāṃ yuyudhire tadā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yathā yuddham avartata
a bhāradvājaṃ samāsādya vyūhasya pramukhe sthitam
c ayodhayan raṇe pārthā droṇānīkaṃ bibhitsavaḥ
a rakṣamāṇāḥ svakaṃ vyūhaṃ droṇasyāpi ca sainikāḥ
c ayodhayan raṇe pārthān prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
a vindānuvindāv āvantyau virāṭaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c ājaghnatuḥ susaṃkruddhau tava putrahitaiṣiṇau
a virāṭaś ca mahārāja tāv ubhau samare sthitau
c parākrāntau parākramya yodhayām āsa sānugau
a teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ samabhavad dāruṇaṃ śoṇitodakam
c siṃhasya dvipamukhyābhyāṃ prabhinnābhyāṃ yathā vane
a bāhlīkaṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe yājñasenir mahābalaḥ
c ājaghne viśikhais tīkṣṇair ghorair marmāsthibhedibhiḥ
a bāhlīko yājñaseniṃ tu hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
c ājaghāna bhṛśaṃ kruddho navabhir nataparvabhiḥ
a tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ śaraśaktisamākulam
c bhīrūṇāṃ trāsajananaṃ śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanam
d āvantyau bhrātarau śūrau dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayudhyatām
d sālvako bilvakaś cobhau yathā viṣṇuṃ kṛte yuge
a tābhyāṃ tatra śarair muktair antarikṣaṃ diśas tathā
c abhavat saṃvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
d na sma vijñāyate rājan nāpy anyo bubudhe kriyām
a śaibyo govāsano yuddhe kāśyaputraṃ mahāratham
c sasainyo yodhayām āsa gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathā
a bāhlīkarājaḥ saṃrabdho draupadeyān mahārathān
c manaḥ pañcendriyāṇīva śuśubhe yodhayan raṇe
a ayodhayaṃs te ca bhṛśaṃ taṃ śaraughaiḥ samantataḥ
c indriyārthā yathā dehaṃ śaśvad dehabhṛtāṃ vara
a vārṣṇeyaṃ sātyakiṃ yuddhe putro duḥśāsanas tava
c ājaghne sāyakais tīkṣṇair navabhir nataparvabhiḥ
a so 'tividdho balavatā maheṣvāsena dhanvinā
c īṣan mūrchāṃ jagāmāśu sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
a samāśvastas tu vārṣṇeyas tava putraṃ mahāratham
c vivyādha daśabhis tūrṇaṃ sāyakaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
a tāv anyonyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ viddhāv anyonyaśaravikṣatau
c rejatuḥ samare rājan puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
a alambusas tu saṃkruddhaḥ kuntibhojaśarārditaḥ
c aśobhata paraṃ lakṣmyā puṣpāḍhya iva kiṃśukaḥ
a kuntibhojaṃ tato rakṣo viddhvā bahubhir āyasaiḥ
c anadad bhairavaṃ nādaṃ vāhinyāḥ pramukhe tava
a tatas tau samare śūrau yodhayantau parasparam
c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni śakrajambhau yathā purā
a śakuniṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe kṛtavairaṃ ca bhārata
c mādrīputrau ca saṃrabdhau śarair ardayatāṃ mṛdhe
a tan mūlaḥ sa mahārāja prāvartata janakṣayaḥ
c tvayā saṃjanito 'tyarthaṃ karṇena ca vivardhitaḥ
a uddhukṣitaś ca putreṇa tava krodhahutāśanaḥ
c ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ rājan dagdhuṃ sarvāṃ samudyataḥ
a śakuniḥ pāṇḍuputrābhyāṃ kṛtaḥ sa vimukhaḥ śaraiḥ
c nābhyajānata kartavyaṃ yudhi kiṃ cit parākramam
a vimukhaṃ cainam ālokya mādrīputrau mahārathau
c vavarṣatuḥ punar bāṇair yathā meghau mahāgirim
a sa vadhyamāno bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c saṃprāyāj javanair aśvair droṇānīkāya saubalaḥ
a ghaṭotkacas tathā śūraṃ rākṣasaṃ tam alāyudham
c abhyayād rabhasaṃ yuddhe vegam āsthāya madhyamam
a tayor yuddhaṃ mahārāja citrarūpam ivābhavat
c yādṛśaṃ hi purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā madrarājānam āhave
c viddhvā pañcāśatā bāṇaiḥ punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tayor atyadbhutaṃ nṛpa
c yathā pūrvaṃ mahad yuddhaṃ śambarāmararājayoḥ
a viviṃśatiś citraseno vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
c ayodhayan bhīmasenaṃ mahatyā senayā vṛtāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tathā tasmin pravṛtte tu saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
c kauraveyāṃs tridhābhūtān pāṇḍavāḥ samupādravan
a jalasaṃdhaṃ mahābāhur bhīmaseno nyavārayat
c yudhiṣṭhiraḥ sahānīkaḥ kṛtavarmāṇam āhave
a kirantaṃ śaravarṣāṇi rocamāna ivāṃśumān
c dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇam abhyadravad raṇe
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tvaratāṃ sarvadhanvinām
c kurūṇāṃ somakānāṃ ca saṃkruddhānāṃ parasparam
a saṃkṣaye tu tathā bhūte vartamāne mahābhaye
c dvaṃdvībhūteṣu sainyeṣu yudhyamāneṣv abhītavat
a droṇaḥ pāñcālaputreṇa balī balavatā saha
c vicikṣepa pṛṣatkaughāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a puṇḍarīkavanānīva vidhvastāni samantataḥ
c cakrāte droṇapāñcālyau nṛṇāṃ śīrṣāṇy anekaśaḥ
a vinikīrṇāni vīrāṇām anīkeṣu samantataḥ
c vastrābharaṇaśastrāṇi dhvajavarmāyudhāni ca
a tapanīyavicitrāṅgāḥ saṃsiktā rudhireṇa ca
c saṃsaktā iva dṛśyante meghasaṃghāḥ savidyutaḥ
d tāvakāḥ samare yodhāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca vikṣatāḥ
a kuñjarāśvanarān saṃkhye pātayantaḥ patatribhiḥ
c tālamātrāṇi cāpāni vikarṣanto mahārathāḥ
a asicarmāṇi cāpāni śirāṃsi kavacāni ca
c viprakīryanta śūrāṇāṃ saṃprahāre mahātmanām
a utthitāny agaṇeyāni kabandhāni samantataḥ
c adṛśyanta mahārāja tasmin paramasaṃkule
a gṛdhrāḥ kaṅkā vaḍāḥ śyenā vāyasā jambukās tathā
c bahavaḥ piśitāśāś ca tatrādṛśyanta māriṣa
a bhakṣayantaḥ sma māṃsāni pibantaś cāpi śoṇitam
c vilumpantaḥ sma keśāṃś ca majjāś ca bahudhā nṛpa
a ākarṣantaḥ śarīrāṇi śarīrāvayavāṃs tathā
c narāśvagajasaṃghānāṃ śirāṃsi ca tatas tataḥ
a kṛtāstrā raṇadīkṣābhir dīkṣitāḥ śaradhāriṇaḥ
c raṇe jayaṃ prārthayanto bhṛśaṃ yuyudhire tadā
a asimārgān bahuvidhān vicerus tāvakā raṇe
c ṛṣṭibhiḥ śaktibhiḥ prāsaiḥ śūlatomarapaṭṭiśaiḥ
a gadābhiḥ parighaiś cānye vyāyudhāś ca bhujair api
c anyonyaṃ jaghnire kruddhā yuddharaṅgagatā narāḥ
a rathino rathibhiḥ sārdham aśvārohāś ca sādibhiḥ
c mātaṅgā varamātaṅgaiḥ padātāś ca padātibhiḥ
a kṣībā ivānye conmattā raṅgeṣv iva ca cāraṇāḥ
c uccukruśus tathānyonyaṃ jaghnur anyonyam āhave
a vartamāne tathā yuddhe nirmaryāde viśāṃ pate
c dhṛṣṭadyumno hayān aśvair droṇasya vyatyamiśrayat
a te hayā sādhv aśobhanta vimiśrā vātaraṃhasaḥ
c pārāvatasavarṇāś ca raktaśoṇāś ca saṃyuge
e hayāḥ śuśubhire rājan meghā iva savidyutaḥ
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca saṃprekṣya droṇam abhyāśam āgatam
c asicarmādade vīro dhanur utsṛjya bhārata
a cikīrṣur duṣkaraṃ karma pārṣataḥ paravīrahā
c īṣayā samatikramya droṇasya ratham āviśat
a atiṣṭhad yugamadhye sa yugasaṃnahaneṣu ca
c jaghānārdheṣu cāśvānāṃ tat sainyāny abhyapūjayan
a khaḍgena caratas tasya śoṇāśvān adhitiṣṭhataḥ
c na dadarśāntaraṃ droṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a yathā śyenasya patanaṃ vaneṣv āmiṣagṛddhinaḥ
c tathaivāsīd abhīsāras tasya droṇaṃ jighāṃsataḥ
a tataḥ śaraśatenāsya śatacandraṃ samākṣipat
c droṇo drupadaputrasya khaḍgaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a hayāṃś caiva catuḥṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ jaghnivān balī
c dhvajaṃ chatraṃ ca bhallābhyāṃ tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī
a athāsmai tvarito bāṇam aparaṃ jīvitāntakam
c ākarṇapūrṇaṃ cikṣepa vajraṃ vajradharo yathā
d dhṛṣṭadyumnāya cikṣepa śacīpatir ivāśanim
a taṃ caturdaśabhir bāṇair bāṇaṃ ciccheda sātyakiḥ
c grastam ācāryamukhyena dhṛṣṭadyumnam amocayat
a siṃheneva mṛgaṃ grastaṃ narasiṃhena māriṣa
c droṇena mocayām āsa pāñcālyaṃ śinipuṃgavaḥ
a sātyakiṃ prekṣya goptāraṃ pāñcālyasya mahāhave
c śarāṇāṃ tvarito droṇaḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyā samarpayat
a tato droṇaṃ śineḥ pautro grasantam iva sṛñjayān
c pratyavidhyac chitair bāṇaiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatyā stanāntare
a tataḥ sarve rathās tūrṇaṃ pāñcālā jayagṛddhinaḥ
c sātvatābhisṛte droṇe dhṛṣṭadyumnam amocayan
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a bāṇe tasmin nikṛtte tu dhṛṣṭadyumne ca mokṣite
c tena vṛṣṇipravīreṇa yuyudhānena saṃjaya
a amarṣito maheṣvāsaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c naravyāghraḥ śineḥ pautre droṇaḥ kim akarod yudhi
 saṃjaya uvāca
a saṃpradrutaḥ krodhaviṣo vyāditāsyaśarāsanaḥ
c tīkṣṇadhāreṣudaśanaḥ śitanārācadaṃṣṭravān
a saṃrambhāmarṣatāmrākṣo mahāhir iva niḥśvasan
c naravīrapramuditaiḥ śoṇair aśvair mahājavaiḥ
a utpatadbhir ivākāśaṃ kramadbhir iva sarvataḥ
c rukmapuṅkhāñ śarān asyan yuyudhānam upādravat
a śarapātamahāvarṣaṃ rathaghoṣabalāhakam
c kārmukākarṣavikṣiptaṃ nārācabahuvidyutam
a śaktikhaḍgāśanidharaṃ krodhavegasamutthitam
c droṇamegham anāvāryaṃ hayamārutacoditam
a dṛṣṭvaivābhipatantaṃ taṃ śūraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
c uvāca sūtaṃ śaineyaḥ prahasan yuddhadurmadaḥ
a etaṃ vai brāhmaṇaṃ krūraṃ svakarmaṇy anavasthitam
c āśrayaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya rājño duḥkhabhayāvaham
a śīghraṃ prajavitair aśvaiḥ pratyudyāhi prahṛṣṭavat
c ācāryaṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ satataṃ śūramāninam
d evam uktas tataḥ sūtaḥ satyakasyāvahad ratham
a tato rajatasaṃkāśā mādhavasya hayottamāḥ
c droṇasyābhimukhāḥ śīghram agacchan vātaraṃhasaḥ
d tatas tau droṇaśaineyau yuyudhāte paraṃtapau
d śarair anekasāhasrais tāḍayantau parasparam
d iṣujālāvṛtaṃ vyoma cakratuḥ puruṣarṣabhau
d pūrayām āsatur vīrāv ubhau daśa diśaḥ śaraiḥ
d meghāv ivātapāpāye dhārābhir itaretaram
d na sma sūryas tadā bhāti na vavau ca samīraṇaḥ
a iṣujālāvṛtaṃ ghoram andhakāram anantaram
c anādhṛṣyam ivānyeṣāṃ śūrāṇām abhavat tadā
d andhakārīkṛte loke droṇaśaineyayoḥ śaraiḥ
a tataḥ śīghrāstraviduṣor droṇasātvatayos tadā
c nāntaraṃ śaravṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛśyate narasiṃhayoḥ
a iṣūṇāṃ saṃnipātena śabdo dhārābhighātajaḥ
c śuśruve śakramuktānām aśanīnām iva svanaḥ
a nārācair atividdhānāṃ śarāṇāṃ rūpam ābabhau
c āśīviṣavidaṣṭānāṃ sarpāṇām iva bhārata
a tayor jyātalanirghoṣo vyaśrūyata sudāruṇaḥ
c ajasraṃ śailaśṛṅgāṇāṃ vajreṇāhanyatām iva
a ubhayos tau rathau rājaṃs te cāśvāstau ca sārathī
c rukmapuṅkhaiḥ śaraiś channāś citrarūpā babhus tadā
a nirmalānām ajihmānāṃ nārācānāṃ viśāṃ pate
c nirmuktāśīviṣābhānāṃ saṃpāto 'bhūt sudāruṇaḥ
a ubhayoḥ patite chatre tathaiva patitau dhvajau
b nikṛntatoḥ śarais tīkṣṇair droṇasatyakayos tadā
c ubhau rudhirasiktāṅgāv ubhau ca vijayaiṣiṇau
a sravadbhiḥ śoṇitaṃ gātraiḥ prasrutāv iva vāraṇau
c anyonyam abhividhyetāṃ jīvitāntakaraiḥ śaraiḥ
a garjitotkruṣṭasaṃnādāḥ śaṅkhadundubhinisvanāḥ
c upāraman mahārāja vyājahāra na kaś cana
a tūṣṇīṃbhūtāny anīkāni yodhā yuddhād upāraman
c dadṛśe dvairathaṃ tābhyāṃ jātakautūhalo janaḥ
a rathino hastiyantāro hayārohāḥ padātayaḥ
c avaikṣantācalair netraiḥ parivārya ratharṣabhau
d sarvataḥ parivāryobhau pratatākṣabhivīkṣire
a hastyanīkāny atiṣṭhanta tathānīkāni vājinām
c tathaiva rathavāhinyaḥ prativyūhya vyavasthitāḥ
a muktāvidrumacitraiś ca maṇikāñcanabhūṣitaiḥ
c dhvajair ābharaṇaiś citraiḥ kavacaiś ca hiraṇmayaiḥ
a vaijayantīpatākābhiḥ paristomāṅgakambalaiḥ
c vimalair niśitaiḥ śastrair hayānāṃ ca prakīrṇakaiḥ
a jātarūpamayībhiś ca rājatībhiś ca mūrdhasu
c gajānāṃ kumbhamālābhir dantaveṣṭaiś ca bhārata
a sabalākāḥ sakhadyotāḥ sairāvataśatahradāḥ
c adṛśyantoṣṇaparyāye meghānām iva vāgurāḥ
a apaśyann asmadīyāś ca te ca yaudhiṣṭhirāḥ sthitāḥ
c tad yuddhaṃ yuyudhānasya droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a vimānāgragatā devā brahmaśakrapurogamāḥ
c siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca vidyādharamahoragāḥ
d gandharvā dānavā yakṣā rākṣasāpsarasaḥ khagāḥ
a gatapratyāgatākṣepaiś citraiḥ śastravighātibhiḥ
c vividhair vismayaṃ jagmus tayoḥ puruṣasiṃhayoḥ
a hastalāghavam astreṣu darśayantau mahābalau
c anyonyaṃ samavidhyetāṃ śarais tau droṇasātyakī
a tato droṇasya dāśārhaḥ śarāṃś ciccheda saṃyuge
c patribhiḥ sudṛḍhair āśu dhanuś caiva mahādyute
a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa bhāradvājo 'paraṃ dhanuḥ
c sajyaṃ cakāra tac cāśu cicchedāsya sa sātyakiḥ
a tatas tvaran punar droṇo dhanurhasto vyatiṣṭhata
c sajyaṃ sajyaṃ punaś cāsya ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
d cakāra tatra panthānaṃ yayau yena janārdanaḥ
d evam ekaśataṃ chinnaṃ dhanuṣāṃ dṛḍhadhanvinā
d na cāntaraṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ saṃdhāne chedane 'pi ca
a tato 'sya saṃyuge droṇo dṛṣṭvā karmātimānuṣam
c yuyudhānasya rājendra manasedam acintayat
a etad astrabalaṃ rāme kārtavīrye dhanaṃjaye
c bhīṣme ca puruṣavyāghre yad idaṃ sātvatāṃ vare
a taṃ cāsya manasā droṇaḥ pūjayām āsa vikramam
c lāghavaṃ vāsavasyeva saṃprekṣya dvijasattamaḥ
a tutoṣāstravidāṃ śreṣṭhas tathā devāḥ savāsavāḥ
b lāghavaṃ vṛṣṇivīrasya vāsavasyeva dṛśya saḥ
b tuṣṭuvur lāghavāt tasya devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
b siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
c na tām ālakṣayām āsur laghutāṃ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
a devāś ca yuyudhānasya gandharvāś ca viśāṃ pate
c siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca vidur droṇasya karma tat
a tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
c astrair astravidāṃ śreṣṭho yodhayām āsa bhārata
a tasyāstrāṇy astramāyābhiḥ pratihanya sa sātyakiḥ
c jaghāna niśitair bāṇais tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tasyātimānuṣaṃ karma dṛṣṭvānyair asamaṃ raṇe
c yuktaṃ yogena yogajñās tāvakāḥ samapūjayan
a yad astram asyati droṇas tad evāsyati sātyakiḥ
c tam ācāryo 'py asaṃbhrānto 'yodhayac chatrutāpanaḥ
d ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo durdharṣasya rathaṃ prati
a tataḥ kruddho mahārāja dhanurvedasya pāragaḥ
c vadhāya yuyudhānasya divyam astram udairayat
a tad āgneyaṃ mahāghoraṃ ripughnam upalakṣya saḥ
c astraṃ divyaṃ maheṣvāso vāruṇaṃ samudairayat
a hāhākāro mahān āsīd dṛṣṭvā divyāstradhāriṇau
c na vicerus tadākāśe bhūtāny ākāśagāny api
a astre te vāruṇāgneye tābhyāṃ bāṇasamāhite
c na tāvad abhiṣajyete vyāvartad atha bhāskaraḥ
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca paryarakṣanta sātyakim
a dhṛṣṭadyumnamukhaiḥ sārdhaṃ virāṭaś ca sakekayaḥ
c matsyāḥ śālveyasenāś ca droṇam ājagmur añjasā
a duḥśāsanaṃ puraskṛtya rājaputrāḥ sahasraśaḥ
c droṇam abhyupapadyanta sapatnaiḥ parivāritam
a tato yuddham abhūd rājaṃs tava teṣāṃ ca dhanvinām
c rajasā saṃvṛte loke śarajālasamāvṛte
a sarvam āvignam abhavan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
c sainyena rajasā dhvaste nirmaryādam avartata
d tenāntareṇa pārthas tu raṇe jitvā mahārathān
d atikrāntas tadā yuddhaṃ kṛtvā paryavatasthivān
 saṃjaya uvāca
 vartamāne tathā yuddhe droṇasya saha pāṇḍubhiḥ
a parivartamāne tv āditye tatra sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
c rajasā kīryamāṇāś ca mandībhūtāś ca sainikāḥ
a tiṣṭhatāṃ yudhyamānānāṃ punar āvartatām api
c bhajyatāṃ jayatāṃ caiva jagāma tad ahaḥ śanaiḥ
a tathā teṣu viṣakteṣu sainyeṣu jayagṛddhiṣu
c arjuno vāsudevaś ca saindhavāyaiva jagmatuḥ
a rathamārgapramāṇaṃ tu kaunteyo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c cakāra tatra panthānaṃ yayau yena janārdanaḥ
a yatra yatra ratho yāti pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
c tatra tatraiva dīryante senās tava viśāṃ pate
a rathaśikṣāṃ tu dāśārho darśayām āsa vīryavān
c uttamādhamamadhyāni maṇḍalāni vidarśayan
a te tu nāmāṅkitāḥ pītāḥ kālajvalanasaṃnibhāḥ
c snāyunaddhāḥ suparvāṇaḥ pṛthavo dīrghagāminaḥ
a vaiṇavāyasmayaśarāḥ svāyatā vividhānanāḥ
c rudhiraṃ patagaiḥ sārdhaṃ prāṇināṃ papur āhave
a rathasthitaḥ krośamātre yān asyaty arjunaḥ śarān
c rathe krośam atikrānte tasya te ghnanti śātravān
a tārkṣyamārutaraṃhobhir vājibhiḥ sādhuvāhibhiḥ
c tathāgacchad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ kṛtsnaṃ vismāpayañ jagat
a na tathā gacchati rathas tapanasya viśāṃ pate
c nendrasya na ca rudrasya nāpi vaiśravaṇasya ca
a nānyasya samare rājan gatapūrvas tathā rathaḥ
c yathā yayāv arjunasya manobhiprāyaśīghragaḥ
a praviśya tu raṇe rājan keśavaḥ paravīrahā
c senāmadhye hayāṃs tūrṇaṃ codayām āsa bhārata
a tatas tasya rathaughasya madhyaṃ prāpya hayottamāḥ
c kṛcchreṇa ratham ūhus taṃ kṣutpipāsāśramānvitāḥ
a kṣatāś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair yuddhaśauṇḍair anekaśaḥ
c maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi vicerus te muhur muhuḥ
a hatānāṃ vājināgānāṃ rathānāṃ ca naraiḥ saha
c upariṣṭād atikrāntāḥ śailābhānāṃ sahasraśaḥ
d śrameṇa mahatā yuktās te hayā vātaraṃhasaḥ
d mandavegagatā rājan saṃvṛttās tatra saṃyuge
a etasminn antare vīrāv āvantyau bhrātarau nṛpa
c sahasenau samārchetāṃ pāṇḍavaṃ klāntavāhanam
a tāv arjunaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā saptatyā ca janārdanam
c śarāṇāṃ ca śatenāśvān avidhyetāṃ mudānvitau
a tāv arjuno mahārāja navabhir nataparvabhiḥ
c ājaghāna raṇe kruddho marmajño marmabhedibhiḥ
a tatas tau tu śaraugheṇa bībhatsuṃ sahakeśavam
c ācchādayetāṃ saṃrabdhau siṃhanādaṃ ca nedatuḥ
a tayos tu dhanuṣī citre bhallābhyāṃ śvetavāhanaḥ
c ciccheda samare tūrṇaṃ dhvajau ca kanakojjvalau
a athānye dhanuṣī rājan pragṛhya samare tadā
c pāṇḍavaṃ bhṛśasaṃkruddhāv ardayām āsatuḥ śaraiḥ
a tayos tu bhṛśasaṃkruddhaḥ śarābhyāṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
b tau tu śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃtoṣya bhārata
c ciccheda dhanuṣī tūrṇaṃ bhūya eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
a tathānyair viśikhais tūrṇaṃ hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
c jaghānāśvān sapadātāṃs tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī
a jyeṣṭhasya ca śiraḥ kāyāt kṣurapreṇa nyakṛntata
c sa papāta hataḥ pṛthvyāṃ vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ
d nihato rudhirāktāṅgaḥ kampayann iva medinīm
a vindaṃ tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā anuvindaḥ pratāpavān
c hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya gadāṃ gṛhya mahābalaḥ
a abhyadravata saṃgrāme bhrātur vadham anusmaran
c gadayā gadināṃ śreṣṭho nṛtyann iva mahārathaḥ
a anuvindas tu gadayā lalāṭe madhusūdanam
c spṛṣṭvā nākampayat kruddho mainākam iva parvatam
a tasyārjunaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhir grīvāṃ pādau bhujau śiraḥ
c nicakarta sa saṃchinnaḥ papātādricayo yathā
a tatas tau nihatau dṛṣṭvā tayo rājan padānugāḥ
c abhyadravanta saṃkruddhāḥ kirantaḥ śataśaḥ śarān
a tān arjunaḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ nihatya bharatarṣabha
c vyarocata yathā vahnir dāvaṃ dagdhvā himātyaye
a tayoḥ senām atikramya kṛcchrān niryād dhanaṃjayaḥ
c vibabhau jaladān bhittvā divākara ivoditaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuravas trastāḥ prahṛṣṭāś cābhavan punaḥ
c abhyavarṣaṃs tadā pārthaṃ samantād bharatarṣabha
a śrāntaṃ cainaṃ samālakṣya jñātvā dūre ca saindhavam
c siṃhanādena mahatā sarvataḥ paryavārayan
a tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā susaṃrabdhān utsmayan puruṣarṣabhaḥ
c śanakair iva dāśārham arjuno vākyam abravīt
a śarārditāś ca glānāś ca hayā dūre ca saindhavaḥ
c kim ihānantaraṃ kāryaṃ jyāyiṣṭhaṃ tava rocate
a brūhi kṛṣṇa yathātattvaṃ tvaṃ hi prājñatamaḥ sadā
c bhavannetrā raṇe śatrūn vijeṣyantīha pāṇḍavāḥ
a mama tv anantaraṃ kṛtyaṃ yad vai tat saṃnibodha me
c hayān vimucya hi sukhaṃ viśalyān kuru mādhava
a evam uktas tu pārthena keśavaḥ pratyuvāca tam
c mamāpy etan mataṃ pārtha yad idaṃ te prabhāṣitam
 arjuna uvāca
a aham āvārayiṣyāmi sarvasainyāni keśava
c tvam apy atra yathānyāyaṃ kuru kāryam anantaram
 saṃjaya uvāca
a so 'vatīrya rathopasthād asaṃbhrānto dhanaṃjayaḥ
c gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur ādāya tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
a tam abhyadhāvan krośantaḥ kṣatriyā jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
c idaṃ chidram iti jñātvā dharaṇīsthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
a tam ekaṃ rathavaṃśena mahatā paryavārayan
c vikarṣantaś ca cāpāni visṛjantaś ca sāyakān
a astrāṇi ca vicitrāṇi kruddhās tatra vyadarśayan
c chādayantaḥ śaraiḥ pārthaṃ meghā iva divākaram
a abhyadravanta vegena kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabham
c rathasiṃhaṃ rathodārāḥ siṃhaṃ mattā iva dvipāḥ
a tatra pārthasya bhujayor mahad balam adṛśyata
b tataḥ pārthas tv ajetavyo mahābāhubalāśrayaḥ
c yat kruddho bahulāḥ senāḥ sarvataḥ samavārayat
a astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya dviṣatāṃ sarvato vibhuḥ
c iṣubhir bahubhis tūrṇaṃ sarvān eva samāvṛṇot
a tatrāntarikṣe bāṇānāṃ pragāḍhānāṃ viśāṃ pate
c saṃgharṣeṇa mahārciṣmān pāvakaḥ samajāyata
a tatra tatra maheṣvāsaiḥ śvasadbhiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ
c hayair nāgaiś ca saṃbhinnair nadadbhiś cārikarśanaiḥ
a saṃrabdhaiś cāribhir vīraiḥ prārthayadbhir jayaṃ mṛdhe
c ekasthair bahubhiḥ kruddhair ūṣmeva samajāyata
a śarormiṇaṃ dhvajāvartaṃ nāganakraṃ duratyayam
c padātimatsyakalilaṃ śaṅkhadundubhinisvanam
a asaṃkhyeyam apāraṃ ca rajo ''bhīlam atīva ca
c uṣṇīṣakamaṭhacchannaṃ patākāphenamālinam
a rathasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ mātaṅgāṅgaśilācitam
c velābhūtas tadā pārthaḥ patribhiḥ samavārayat
d dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
d arjune dharaṇīṃ prāpte hayahaste ca keśave
d saṃjaya uvāca
d etad antaram āsādya kathaṃ pārtho na nirjitaḥ
d sadyaḥ pārthiva pārthena niruddhāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
d rathasthā dharaṇīsthena vākyam acchāndasaṃ yathā
d bhūmistho 'pi rathasthāṃs tān pārthaḥ sarvadhanurdharān
d eko nivārayām āsa lobhaḥ sarvaguṇān iva
a tato janārdanaḥ saṃkhye priyaṃ puruṣasattamam
c asaṃbhrānto mahābāhur arjunaṃ vākyam abravīt
a udapānam ihāśvānāṃ nālam asti raṇe 'rjuna
c parīpsante jalaṃ ceme peyaṃ na tv avagāhanam
a idam astīty asaṃbhrānto bruvann astreṇa medinīm
c abhihatyārjunaś cakre vājipānaṃ saraḥ śubham
d haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaṃ cakravākopaśobhitam
d savistīrṇaṃ prasannāmbhaḥ praphullavarapaṅkajam
d kūrmamatsyagaṇākīrṇam agādham ṛṣisevitam
d bhagavan nāradamuner darśanārthaṃ kṛtaṃ kṣaṇāt
d evaṃ pārthas tataś cakre vājināṃ ca saraḥ śubham
a śaravaṃśaṃ śarasthūṇaṃ śarācchādanam adbhutam
c śaraveśmākarot pārthas tvaṣṭevādbhutakarmakṛt
a tataḥ prahasya govindaḥ sādhu sādhv ity athābravīt
c śaraveśmani pārthena kṛte tasmin mahāraṇe
 saṃjaya uvāca
a salile janite tasmin kaunteyena mahātmanā
c nivārite dviṣatsainye kṛte ca śaraveśmani
a vāsudevo rathāt tūrṇam avatīrya mahādyutiḥ
c mocayām āsa turagān vitunnān kaṅkapatribhiḥ
a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā siṃhanādo mahān abhūt
c siddhacāraṇasaṃghānāṃ sainikānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a padātinaṃ tu kaunteyaṃ yudhyamānaṃ nararṣabhāḥ
c nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a āpatatsu rathaugheṣu prabhūtagajavājiṣu
c nāsaṃbhramat tadā pārthas tad asya puruṣān ati
a vyasṛjanta śaraughāṃs te pāṇḍavaṃ prati pārthivāḥ
c na cāvyathata dharmātmā vāsaviḥ paravīrahā
a sa tāni śarajālāni gadāḥ prāsāṃś ca vīryavān
c āgatān agrasat pārthaḥ saritaḥ sāgaro yathā
a astravegena mahatā pārtho bāhubalena ca
c sarveṣāṃ pārthivendrāṇām agrasat tāñ śarottamān
a tat tu pārthasya vikrāntaṃ vāsudevasya cobhayoḥ
c apūjayan mahārāja kauravāḥ paramādbhutam
a kim adbhutataraṃ loke bhavitāpy atha vāpy abhūt
c yad aśvān pārthagovindau mocayām āsatū raṇe
a bhayaṃ vipulam asmāsu tāv adhattāṃ narottamau
c tejo vidadhatuś cograṃ visrabdhau raṇamūrdhani
d saṃjayaḥ
d tatrādbhutataraṃ manye tat sainyaṃ tāvakaṃ prabho
d dadhāraikau raṇe pārtho velodvṛttam ivārṇavam
d pārthasya śarasaṃchanne sainye mahati bhārata
d ākāśam iva saṃprāpya vicerus tatra pakṣiṇaḥ
d na cainaṃ yudhi tiṣṭhantaṃ tava sainyeṣu māriṣa
d abhyadravata saṃkruddhaḥ pumān kaś cit tu tāvakaḥ
d sarve vimanaso bhūtvā tava yaudhā viśāṃ pate
d saṃprekṣya tatra govindaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
a athotsmayan hṛṣīkeśaḥ strīmadhya iva bhārata
c arjunena kṛte saṃkhye śaragarbhagṛhe tadā
a upāvartayad avyagras tān aśvān puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
c miṣatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ tvadīyānāṃ viśāṃ pate
d upāvṛtyotthitān aśvān pāṇibhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
d saṃmārjayad raṇe rājan paśyatāṃ sarvayodhinām
a teṣāṃ śramaṃ ca glāniṃ ca vepathuṃ vamathuṃ vraṇān
c sarvaṃ vyapānudat kṛṣṇaḥ kuśalo hy aśvakarmaṇi
a śalyān uddhṛtya pāṇibhyāṃ parimṛjya ca tān hayān
c upāvṛtya yathānyāyaṃ pāyayām āsa vāri saḥ
a sa tāṃl labdhodakān snātāñ jagdhānnān vigataklamān
c yojayām āsa saṃhṛṣṭaḥ punar eva rathottame
a sa taṃ rathavaraṃ śauriḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c samāsthāya mahātejāḥ sārjunaḥ prayayau drutam
d yojayitvā hayāṃs tatra vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
d raṇe cacāra govindas tṛṇīkṛtya mahārathān
a rathaṃ rathavarasyājau yuktaṃ labdhodakair hayaiḥ
c dṛṣṭvā kurubalaśreṣṭhāḥ punar vimanaso 'bhavan
a viniḥśvasantas te rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭrā ivoragāḥ
c dhig aho dhig gataḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇaś cety abruvan pṛthak
d tatsenāḥ sarvato hṛṣṭā lomaharṣaṇam adbhutam
d tvaradhvam iti cākrandan naitad astīti cābruvan
a sarvakṣatrasya miṣato rathenaikena daṃśitau
c bālakrīḍanakeneva kadarthīkṛtya no balam
a krośatāṃ yatamānānām asaṃsaktau paraṃtapau
c darśayitvātmano vīryaṃ prayātau sarvarājasu
d yathā devāsure yuddhe tṛṇīkṛtya sadānavān
d indrāviṣṇū purā rājañ jambhasya vadhakāṅkṣiṇau
a tau prayātau punar dṛṣṭvā tadānye sainikābruvan
c tvaradhvaṃ kuravaḥ sarve vadhe kṛṣṇakirīṭinoḥ
a rathaṃ yuktvā hi dāśārho miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
c jayadrathāya yāty eṣa kadarthīkṛtya no raṇe
a tatra ke cin mitho rājan samabhāṣanta bhūmipāḥ
c adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃgrāme tad dṛṣṭvā mahad adbhutam
a sarvasainyāni rājā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro 'tyayaṃ gataḥ
c duryodhanāparādhena kṣatraṃ kṛtsnā ca medinī
a vilayaṃ samanuprāptā tac ca rājā na budhyate
c ity evaṃ kṣatriyās tatra bruvanty anye ca bhārata
a sindhurājasya yat kṛtyaṃ gatasya yamasādanam
c tat karotu vṛthādṛṣṭir dhārtarāṣṭro 'nupāyavit
a tataḥ śīghrataraṃ prāyāt pāṇḍavaḥ saindhavaṃ prati
c nivartamāne tigmāṃśau hṛṣṭaiḥ pītodakair hayaiḥ
a taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
c nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ yodhāḥ kruddham ivāntakam
a vidrāvya tu tataḥ sainyaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
c yathā mṛgagaṇān siṃhaḥ saindhavārthe vyaloḍayat
a gāhamānas tv anīkāni tūrṇam aśvān acodayat
c balākavarṇān dāśārhaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ vyanādayat
d dhanurgajāśvasiktānāṃ veditvāl lāghavena ca
d preṣamāṇo jayatu hi yiyāsūn api raṃhasā
d amoghāḥ śatruhantāro vimalāḥ krośapātinaḥ
d manojavās te 'pi raṇe vājino javasaṃpadā
d kṛṣṇapratodatunnānāṃ rathavṛndānuśālinām
d viśeṣitāḥ prayogāc ca sarvaśatrunibarhaṇāḥ
a kaunteyenāgrataḥ sṛṣṭā nyapatan pṛṣṭhataḥ śarāḥ
c tūrṇāt tūrṇataraṃ hy aśvās te 'vahan vātaraṃhasaḥ
a vātoddhūtapatākāntaṃ rathaṃ jaladanisvanam
c ghoraṃ kapidhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣaṇṇā rathino 'bhavan
a divākare 'tha rajasā sarvataḥ saṃvṛte bhṛśam
c śarārtāś ca raṇe yodhā na kṛṣṇau śekur īkṣitum
a tato nṛpatayaḥ kruddhāḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayam
c kṣatriyā bahavaś cānye jayadrathavadhaiṣiṇam
a apanīyatsu śalyeṣu dhiṣṭhitaṃ puruṣarṣabham
c duryodhanas tv agāt pārthaṃ tvaramāṇo mahāhave
 saṃjaya uvāca
a sraṃsanta iva majjānas tāvakānāṃ bhayān nṛpa
c tau dṛṣṭvā samatikrāntau vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
a sarve tu pratisaṃrabdhā hrīmantaḥ sattvacoditāḥ
c sthirībūtā mahātmānaḥ pratyagacchan dhanaṃjayam
a ye gatāḥ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe krodhāmarṣasamanvitāḥ
c te 'dyāpi na nivartante sindhavaḥ sāgarād iva
a asantas tu nyavartanta vedebhya iva nāstikāḥ
c narakaṃ bhajamānās te pratyapadyanta kilbiṣam
a tāv atītya rathānīkaṃ vimuktau puruṣarṣabhau
c dadṛśāte yathā rāhor āsyān muktau prabhākarau
a matsyāv iva mahājālaṃ vidārya vigatajvarau
c tathā kṛṣṇāv adṛśyetāṃ senājālaṃ vidārya tat
a vimuktau śastrasaṃbādhād droṇānīkāt sudurbhidāt
c adṛśyetāṃ mahātmānau kālasūryāv ivoditau
a astrasaṃbādhanirmuktau vimuktau śastrasaṃkaṭāt
c adṛśyetāṃ mahātmānau śatrusaṃbādhakāriṇau
a vimuktau jvalanasparśān makarāsyāj jhaṣāv iva
c vyakṣobhayetāṃ senāṃ tau samudraṃ makarāv iva
a tāvakās tava putrāś ca droṇānīkasthayos tayoḥ
c naitau tariṣyato droṇam iti cakrus tadā matim
a tau tu dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau droṇānīkaṃ mahādyutī
c nāśaśaṃsur mahārāja sindhurājasya jīvitam
a āśā balavatī rājan putrāṇām abhavat tava
c droṇahārdikyayoḥ kṛṣṇau na mokṣyete iti prabho
a tām āśāṃ viphalāṃ kṛtvā nistīrṇau tau paraṃtapau
c droṇānīkaṃ mahārāja bhojānīkaṃ ca dustaram
a atha dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau jvalitāv iva pāvakau
c nirāśāḥ sindhurājasya jīvitaṃ nāśaśaṃsire
a mithaś ca samabhāṣetām abhītau bhayavardhanau
c jayadrathavadhe vācas tās tāḥ kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
a asau madhye kṛtaḥ ṣaḍbhir dhārtarāṣṭrair mahārathaiḥ
c cakṣurviṣayasaṃprāpto na nau mokṣyati saindhavaḥ
a yady asya samare goptā śakro devagaṇaiḥ saha
c tathāpy enaṃ haniṣyāva iti kṛṣṇāv abhāṣatām
a iti kṛṣṇau mahābāhū mithaḥ kathayatāṃ tadā
c sindhurājam avekṣantau tat putrās tava śuśruvuḥ
a atītya marudhanveva prayāntau tṛṣitau gajau
c pītvā vāri samāśvastau tathaivāstām ariṃdamau
a vyāghrasiṃhagajākīrṇān atikramyeva parvatān
c adṛśyetāṃ mahābāhū yathā mṛtyujarātigau
a tathā hi mukhavarṇo 'yam anayor iti menire
c tāvakā dṛśya muktau tau vikrośanti sma sarvataḥ
a droṇād āśīviṣākārāj jvalitād iva pāvakāt
c anyebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaś ca bhāsvantāv iva bhāskarau
a tau muktau sāgaraprakhyād droṇānīkād ariṃdamau
c adṛśyetāṃ mudā yuktau samuttīryārṇavaṃ yathā
a śastraughān mahato muktau droṇahārdikyarakṣitān
c rocamānāv adṛśyetām indrāgnyoḥ sadṛśau raṇe
a udbhinnarudhirau kṛṣṇau bhāradvājasya sāyakaiḥ
c śitaiś citau vyarocetāṃ karṇikārair ivācalau
a droṇagrāhahradān muktau śaktyāśīviṣasaṃkaṭāt
c ayaḥśarogramakarāt kṣatriyapravarāmbhasaḥ
a jyāghoṣatalanirhrādād gadānistriṃśavidyutaḥ
c droṇāstrameghān nirmuktau sūryendū timirād iva
a bāhubhyām iva saṃtīrṇau sindhuṣaṣṭhāḥ samudragāḥ
c tapānte saritaḥ pūrṇā mahāgrāhasamākulāḥ
d mahāśailoccayāṃ ghorāṃ laṅghayitvā mahānadīm
d nistīrṇāv adhvagau yadvat tadvat tau tāritau raṇe
a iti kṛṣṇau maheṣvāsau yaśasā lokaviśrutau
c sarvabhūtāny amanyanta droṇāstrabalavismayāt
a jayadrathaṃ samīpastham avekṣantau jighāṃsayā
c ruruṃ nipāne lipsantau vyāghravat tāv atiṣṭhatām
a yathā hi mukhavarṇo 'yam anayor iti menire
c tava yodhā mahārāja hatam eva jayadratham
a lohitākṣau mahābāhū saṃyattau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
c sindhurājam abhiprekṣya hṛṣṭau vyanadatāṃ muhuḥ
a śaurer abhīśuhastasya pārthasya ca dhanuṣmataḥ
c tayor āsīt pratibhrājaḥ sūryapāvakayor iva
a harṣa eva tayor āsīd droṇānīkapramuktayoḥ
c samīpe saindhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā śyenayor āmiṣaṃ yathā
a tau tu saindhavam ālokya vartamānam ivāntike
c sahasā petatuḥ kruddhau kṣipraṃ śyenāv ivāmiṣe
a tau tu dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau hṛṣīkeśadhanaṃjayau
c sindhurājasya rakṣārthaṃ parākrāntaḥ sutas tava
a droṇenābaddhakavaco rājā duryodhanas tadā
c yayāv ekarathenājau hayasaṃskāravit prabho
a kṛṣṇapārthau maheṣvāsau vyatikramyātha te sutaḥ
c agrataḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ pratīyāya narādhipa
a tataḥ sarveṣu sainyeṣu vāditrāṇi prahṛṣṭavat
c prāvādyan samatikrānte tava putre dhanaṃjayam
a siṃhanādaravāś cāsañ śaṅkhadundubhimiśritāḥ
c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ tatra kṛṣṇayoḥ pramukhe sthitam
a ye ca te sindhurājasya goptāraḥ pāvakopamāḥ
c te prahṛṣyanta samare dṛṣṭvā putraṃ tavābhibho
a dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇas tv atikrāntaṃ sahānugam
c abravīd arjunaṃ rājan prāptakālam idaṃ vacaḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a suyodhanam atikrāntam enaṃ paśya dhanaṃjaya
c āpadgatam imaṃ manye nāsty asya sadṛśo rathaḥ
a dūrapātī maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtāstro yuddhadurmadaḥ
c dṛḍhāstraś citrayodhī ca dhārtarāṣṭro mahābalaḥ
a atyantasukhasaṃvṛddho mānitaś ca mahārathaiḥ
c kṛtī ca satataṃ pārtha nityaṃ dveṣṭi ca pāṇḍavān
a tena yuddham ahaṃ manye prāptakālaṃ tavānagha
c atra vo dyūtam āyātaṃ vijayāyetarāya vā
a atra krodhaviṣaṃ pārtha vimuñca cirasaṃbhṛtam
c eṣa mūlam anarthānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥ
a so 'yaṃ prāptas tavākṣepaṃ paśya sāphalyam ātmanaḥ
c kathaṃ hi rājā rājyārthī tvayā gaccheta saṃyugam
a diṣṭyā tv idānīṃ saṃprāpta eṣa te bāṇagocaram
c sa yathā jīvitaṃ jahyāt tathā kuru dhanaṃjaya
a aiśvaryamadasaṃmūḍho naiṣa duḥkham upeyivān
c na ca te saṃyuge vīryaṃ jānāti puruṣarṣabha
a tvāṃ hi lokās trayaḥ pārtha sasurāsuramānuṣāḥ
c notsahante raṇe jetuṃ kim utaikaḥ suyodhanaḥ
a sa diṣṭyā samanuprāptas tava pārtha rathāntikam
c jahy enaṃ vai mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥ
a eṣa hy anarthe satataṃ parākrāntas tavānagha
c nikṛtyā dharmarājaṃ ca dyūte vañcitavān ayam
a bahūni sunṛśaṃsāni kṛtāny etena mānada
c yuṣmāsu pāpamatinā apāpeṣv eva nityadā
a tam anāryaṃ sadā kṣudraṃ puruṣaṃ kāmacāriṇam
c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi pārthāvicārayan
a nikṛtyā rājyaharaṇaṃ vanavāsaṃ ca pāṇḍava
c parikleśaṃ ca kṛṣṇāyā hṛdi kṛtvā parākrama
a diṣṭyaiṣa tava bāṇānāṃ gocare parivartate
c pratighātāya kāryasya diṣṭyā ca yatate 'grataḥ
a diṣṭyā jānāti saṃgrāme yoddhavyaṃ hi tvayā saha
c diṣṭyā ca saphalāḥ pārtha sarve kāmā hi kāmitāḥ
a tasmāj jahi raṇe pārtha dhārtarāṣṭraṃ kulādhamam
c yathendreṇa hataḥ pūrvaṃ jambho devāsure mṛdhe
a asmin hate tvayā sainyam anāthaṃ bhidyatām idam
c vairasyāsyās tv avabhṛtho mūlaṃ chindhi durātmanām
 saṃjaya uvāca
a taṃ tathety abravīt pārthaḥ kṛtyarūpam idaṃ mama
c sarvam anyad anādṛtya gaccha yatra suyodhanaḥ
a yenaitad dīrghakālaṃ no bhuktaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
c apy asya yudhi vikramya chindyāṃ mūrdhānam āhave
a api tasyā anarhāyāḥ parikleśasya mādhava
c kṛṣṇāyāḥ śaknuyāṃ gantuṃ padaṃ keśapradharṣaṇe
d apy ahaṃ tāni duḥkhāni pūrvavṛttāni mādhava
d duryodhanaṃ raṇe hatvā pratimokṣye kathaṃ cana
a ity evaṃ vādinau hṛṣṭau kṛṣṇau śvetān hayottamān
c preṣayām āsatuḥ saṃkhye prepsantau taṃ narādhipam
a tayoḥ samīpaṃ saṃprāpya putras te bharatarṣabha
c na cakāra bhayaṃ prāpte bhaye mahati māriṣa
a tad asya kṣatriyās tatra sarva evābhyapūjayan
c yad arjunahṛṣīkeśau pratyudyāto 'vicārayan
a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
c mahān nādo hy abhūt tatra dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhave
a tasmiñ janasamunnāde pravṛtte bhairave sati
c kadarthīkṛtya te putraḥ pratyamitram avārayat
a āvāritas tu kaunteyas tava putreṇa dhanvinā
c saṃrambham agamad bhūyaḥ sa ca tasmin paraṃtapaḥ
a tau dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃrabdhau duryodhanadhanaṃjayau
c abhyavaikṣanta rājāno bhīmarūpāḥ samantataḥ
a dṛṣṭvā tu pārthaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca māriṣa
c prahasann iva putras te yoddhukāmaḥ samāhvayat
a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dāśārhaḥ pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
c vyākrośetāṃ mahānādaṃ dadhmatuś cāmbujottamau
a tau hṛṣṭarūpau saṃprekṣya kauraveyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c nirāśāḥ samapadyanta putrasya tava jīvite
a śokam īyuḥ paraṃ caiva kuravaḥ sarva eva te
c amanyanta ca putraṃ te vaiśvānaramukhe hutam
a tathā tu dṛṣṭvā yodhās te prahṛṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
c hato rājā hato rājety ūcur evaṃ bhayārditāḥ
a janasya saṃninādaṃ tu śrutvā duryodhano 'bravīt
c vyetu vo bhīr ahaṃ kṛṣṇau preṣayiṣyāmi mṛtyave
a ity uktvā sainikān sarvāñ jayāpekṣī narādhipaḥ
c pārtham ābhāṣya saṃrambhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a pārtha yac chikṣitaṃ te 'straṃ divyaṃ mānuṣam eva ca
c tad darśaya mayi kṣipraṃ yadi jāto 'si pāṇḍunā
a yad balaṃ tava vīryaṃ ca keśavasya tathaiva ca
c tat kuruṣva mayi kṣipraṃ paśyāmas tava pauruṣam
a asmat parokṣaṃ karmāṇi pravadanti kṛtāni te
c svāmisatkārayuktāni yāni tānīha darśaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktvārjunaṃ rājā tribhir marmātigaiḥ śaraiḥ
c pratyavidhyan mahāvegaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
a vāsudevaṃ ca daśabhiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare
c pratodaṃ cāsya bhallena chittvā bhūmāv apātayat
a taṃ caturdaśabhiḥ pārthaś citrapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
c avidhyat tūrṇam avyagras te 'syābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥ
a teṣāṃ vaiphalyam ālokya punar nava ca pañca ca
c prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇāṃs te cābhraśyanta varmaṇaḥ
a aṣṭāviṃśat tu tān bāṇān astān viprekṣya niṣphalān
b vaiphalyaṃ cāgatān bāṇāñ chinnān parapuraṃjayaḥ
c abravīt paravīraghnaḥ kṛṣṇo 'rjunam idaṃ vacaḥ
a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ paśyāmi śilānām iva sarpaṇam
c tvayā saṃpreṣitāḥ pārtha nārthaṃ kurvanti patriṇaḥ
a kaccid gāṇḍīvataḥ prāṇās tathaiva bharatarṣabha
c muṣṭiś ca te yathāpūrvaṃ bhujayoś ca balaṃ tava
a na ced vidher ayaṃ kālaḥ prāptaḥ syād adya paścimaḥ
c tava caivāsya śatroś ca tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
a vismayo me mahān pārtha tava dṛṣṭvā śarān imān
c vyarthān nipatataḥ saṃkhye duryodhanarathaṃ prati
a vajrāśanisamā ghorāḥ parakāyāvabhedinaḥ
c śarāḥ kurvanti te nārthaṃ pārtha kādya viḍambanā
 arjuna uvāca
a droṇenaiṣā matiḥ kṛṣṇa dhārtarāṣṭre niveśitā
c ante vihitam astrāṇām etat kavacadhāraṇam
a asminn antarhitaṃ kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇi
c eko droṇo hi vedaitad ahaṃ tasmāc ca sattamāt
a na śakyam etat kavacaṃ bāṇair bhettuṃ kathaṃ cana
c api vajreṇa govinda svayaṃ maghavatā yudhi
a jānaṃs tvam api vai kṛṣṇa māṃ vimohayase katham
c yadvṛttaṃ triṣu lokeṣu yac ca keśava vartate
a tathā bhaviṣyad yac caiva tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ tava
c na tv evaṃ veda vai kaś cid yathā tvaṃ madhusūdana
a eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imām
c tiṣṭhaty abhītavat saṃkhye bibhrat kavacadhāraṇām
a yat tv atra vihitaṃ kāryaṃ naiṣa tad vetti mādhava
c strīvad eṣa bibharty etāṃ yuktāṃ kavacadhāraṇām
a paśya bāhvoś ca me vīryaṃ dhanuṣaś ca janārdana
c parājayiṣye kauravyaṃ kavacenāpi rakṣitam
a idam aṅgirase prādād deveśo varma bhāsvaram
b tasmād bṛhaspatiḥ prāpa tataḥ prāpa puraṃdaraḥ
c punar dadau surapatir mahyaṃ varma sasaṃgraham
a daivaṃ yady asya varmaitad brahmaṇā vā svayaṃ kṛtam
c naitad gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇahataṃ mayā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktvārjuno bāṇān abhimantrya vyakarṣayat
b mānavāstreṇa mānārhaḥ sūkṣmāvaraṇabhedinā
c vikṛṣyamāṇāṃs tenaivaṃ dhanurmadhyagatāñ śarān
e tān asyāstreṇa ciccheda drauṇiḥ sarvāstraghātinā
a tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūrato brahmavādinā
c nyavedayat keśavāya vismitaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
a naitad astraṃ mayā śakyaṃ dviḥ prayoktuṃ janārdana
c astraṃ mām eva hanyād dhi paśya tv adya balaṃ mama
a tato duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇau navabhir nataparvabhiḥ
c avidhyata raṇe rājañ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
e bhūya evābhyavarṣac ca samare kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
a śaravarṣeṇa mahatā tato 'hṛṣyanta tāvakāḥ
c cakrur vāditraninadān siṃhanādaravāṃs tathā
a tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ sṛkkaṇī parisaṃlihan
c nāpaśyata tato 'syāṅgaṃ yan na syād varmarakṣitam
a tato 'sya niśitair bāṇaiḥ sumuktair antakopamaiḥ
c hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
a dhanur asyācchinac citraṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca vīryavān
c rathaṃ ca śakalīkartuṃ savyasācī pracakrame
a duryodhanaṃ ca bāṇābhyāṃ tīkṣṇābhyāṃ virathīkṛtam
b prayatnakārī kaunteyo nakhamāṃsāntareṣubhiḥ
b sa vedanābhir āvignaḥ palāyanaparāyaṇaḥ
c avidhyad dhastatalayor ubhayor arjunas tadā
a taṃ kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinaḥ
c samāpetuḥ parīpsanto dhanaṃjayaśarārditam
a te rathair bahusāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjarair hayaiḥ
c padātyoghaiś ca saṃrabdhaiḥ parivavrur dhanaṃjayam
a atha nārjunagovindau ratho vāpi vyadṛśyata
c astravarṣeṇa mahatā janaughaiś cāpi saṃvṛtau
a tato 'rjuno 'stravīryeṇa nijaghne tāṃ varūthinīm
c tatra vyaṅgīkṛtāḥ petuḥ śataśo 'tha rathadvipāḥ
a te hatā hanyamānāś ca nyagṛhṇaṃs taṃ rathottamam
c sa rathastambhitas tasthau krośamātraṃ samantataḥ
a tato 'rjunaṃ vṛṣṇivīras tvarito vākyam abravīt
c dhanur visphārayātyartham ahaṃ dhmāsyāmi cāmbujam
a tato visphārya balavad gāṇḍīvaṃ jaghnivān ripūn
c mahatā śaravarṣeṇa talaśabdena cārjunaḥ
a pāñcajanyaṃ ca balavad dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥ
c rajasā dhvastapakṣmāntaḥ prasvinnavadano bhṛśam
d tenācyutoṣṭhayugapūritamārutena
d śaṅkhāntarodaravivṛddhaviniḥsṛtena
d nādena sāsuraviyat suralokapālam
d udvignam īśvarajagat sphuṭatīva sarvam
a tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣo nisvanena ca
c niḥsattvāś ca sasattvāś ca kṣitau petus tadā janāḥ
a tair vimukto ratho reje vāyvīrita ivāmbudaḥ
c jayadrathasya goptāras tataḥ kṣubdhāḥ sahānugāḥ
a te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārthaṃ goptāraḥ saindhavasya tu
c cakrur nādān bahuvidhān kampayanto vasuṃdharām
a bāṇaśabdaravāṃś cogrān vimiśrāñ śaṅkhanisvanaiḥ
c prāduścakrur mahātmānaḥ siṃhanādaravān api
a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ samutthitam
c pradadhmatus tadā śaṅkhau vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
a tena śabdena mahatā pūriteyaṃ vasuṃdharā
c saśailā sārṇavadvīpā sapātālā viśāṃ pate
a sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
c pratisasvāna tatraiva kurupāṇḍavayor bale
a tāvakā rathinas tatra dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
c saṃrambhaṃ paramaṃ prāptās tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
a atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakā dṛśya daṃśitau
c abhyadravanta saṃkruddhās tad adbhutam ivābhavat
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tāvakās tu samīkṣyaiva vṛṣṇyandhakakurūttamau
c prāg atvarañ jighāṃsantas tathaiva vijayaḥ parān
a suvarṇacitrair vaiyāghraiḥ svanavadbhir mahārathaiḥ

c dvidhā ciccheda bhallena prahasann iva bhārata
a tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ cedirājo mahārathaḥ
c śaktiṃ jagrāha vipulāṃ rukmadaṇḍām ayasmayīm
a tāṃ tu śaktiṃ mahāvīryāṃ dorbhyām āyamya bhārata
c cikṣepa sahasā yatto vīradhanvarathaṃ prati
a sa tayā vīraghātinyā śaktyā tv abhihato bhṛśam
c nirbhinnahṛdayas tūrṇaṃ nipapāta rathān mahīm
a tasmin vinihate śūre trigartānāṃ mahārathe
c balaṃ te 'bhajyata vibho pāṇḍaveyaiḥ samantataḥ
d sahadevas tataḥ kruddho durmukhena samāgataḥ
a sahadeve tataḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ sāyakān durmukho 'kṣipat
c nanāda ca mahānādaṃ tarjayan pāṇḍavaṃ raṇe
a madreyas tu tataḥ kruddho durmukhaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c bhrātā bhrātaram āyāntaṃ vivyādha prahasann iva
a taṃ raṇe rabhasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahadevaṃ mahābalam
c durmukho navabhir bāṇais tāḍayām āsa bhārata
a durmukhasya tu bhallena chittvā ketuṃ mahābalaḥ
c jaghāna caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a athāpareṇa bhallena pītena niśitena ca
c ciccheda sāratheḥ kāyāc chiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
a kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena kauravyasya mahad dhanuḥ
c sahadevo raṇe chittvā taṃ ca vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
a hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā durmukho vimanās tadā
c āruroha rathaṃ rājan niramitrasya bhārata
a sahadevas tataḥ kruddho niramitraṃ mahāhave
c jaghāna pṛtanāmadhye bhallena paravīrahā
a sa papāta rathopasthān niramitro janeśvaraḥ
c trigartarājasya suto vyathayaṃs tava vāhinīm
a taṃ tu hatvā mahābāhuḥ sahadevo vyarocata
c yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kharaṃ hatvā mahābalam
a hāhākāro mahān āsīt trigartānāṃ janeśvara
c rājaputraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā niramitraṃ mahābalam
a nakulas te sutaṃ rājan vikarṇaṃ pṛthulocanam
c muhūrtāj jitavān saṃkhye tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a sātyakiṃ vyāghradattas tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c cakre 'dṛśyaṃ sāśvasūtaṃ sadhvajaṃ pṛtanāntare
d sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ cakre adṛśyaṃ pṛtanāntare
a tān nivārya śarāñ śūraḥ śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavat
c sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ bāṇair vyāghradattam apātayat
a kumāre nihate tasmin magadhasya sute prabho
c māgadhāḥ sarvato yattā yuyudhānam upādravan
a visṛjantaḥ śarāṃś caiva tomarāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
c bhiṇḍipālāṃs tathā prāsān mudgarān musalān api
a ayodhayan raṇe śūrāḥ sātvataṃ yuddhadurmadam
c tāṃs tu sarvān sa balavān sātyaktir yuddhadurmadaḥ
e nātikṛcchrād dhasann eva vijigye puruṣarṣabha
a māgadhān dravato dṛṣṭvā hataśeṣān samantataḥ
c balaṃ te 'bhajyata vibho yuyudhānaśarārditam
a nāśayitvā raṇe sainyaṃ tvadīyaṃ mādhavottamaḥ
c vidhunvāno dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ vyabhrājata mahāyaśāḥ
d yathā daityacamūṃ hatvā śakro rājan vyarocata
a bhajyamānaṃ balaṃ rājan sātvatena mahātmanā
c nābhyavartata yuddhāya trāsitaṃ dīrghabāhunā
a tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ sahasodvṛtya cakṣuṣī
c sātyakiṃ satyakarmāṇaṃ svayam evābhidudruve
 saṃjaya uvāca
a draupadeyān maheṣvāsān saumadattir mahāyaśāḥ
c ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
a te pīḍitā bhṛśaṃ tena raudreṇa sahasā vibho
c pramūḍhā naiva vividur mṛdhe kṛtyaṃ sma kiṃ cana
a nākulis tu śatānīkaḥ saumadattiṃ nararṣabham
c dvābhyāṃ viddhvānadad dhṛṣṭaḥ śarābhyāṃ śatrutāpanaḥ
a tathetare raṇe yattās tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
c vivyadhuḥ samare tūrṇaṃ saumadattim amarṣaṇam
a sa tān prati mahārāja cikṣipe pañca sāyakān
c ekaikaṃ hṛdi cājaghne ekaikena mahāyaśāḥ
a tatas te bhrātaraḥ pañca śarair viddhā mahātmanā
c parivārya rathair vīraṃ vivyadhuḥ sāyakair bhṛśam
a ārjunis tu hayāṃs tasya caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho yamasya sadanaṃ prati
a bhaimasenir dhanuś chittvā saumadatter mahātmanaḥ
c nanāda balavan nādaṃ vivyādha ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a yaudhiṣṭhiro dhvajaṃ tasya chittvā bhūmāv apātayat
c nākuliś cāśvayantāraṃ rathanīḍād apāharat
a sāhadevis tu taṃ jñātvā bhrātṛbhir vimukhīkṛtam
c kṣurapreṇa śiro rājan nicakarta mahāmanāḥ
a tacchiro nyapatad bhūmau tapanīyavibhūṣitam
c bhrājayantaṃ raṇoddeśaṃ bālasūryasamaprabham
a saumadatteḥ śiro dṛṣṭvā nipatat tan mahātmanaḥ
c vitrastās tāvakā rājan pradudruvur anekadhā
a alambusas tu samare bhīmasenaṃ mahābalam
c yodhayām āsa saṃkruddho lakṣmaṇaṃ rāvaṇir yathā
a saṃprayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau nararākṣasau
c vismayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ praharṣaś cābhavat tadā
a ārṣyaśṛṅgiṃ tato bhīmo navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c vivyādha prahasan rājan rākṣasendram amarṣaṇam
a tad rakṣaḥ samare viddhaṃ kṛtvā nādaṃ bhayāvaham
c abhyadravat tato bhīmaṃ ye ca tasya padānugāḥ
a sa bhīmaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c bhīmānugāñ jaghānāśu rathāṃs triṃśad ariṃdamaḥ
e punaś catuḥśatān hatvā bhīmaṃ vivyādha patriṇā
a so 'tividdhas tadā bhīmo rākṣasena mahābalaḥ
c niṣasāda rathopasthe mūrchayābhipariplutaḥ
a pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ mārutiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c vikṛṣya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ bhārasādhanam uttamam
e alambusaṃ śarais tīkṣṇair ardayām āsa sarvataḥ
a sa viddho bahubhir bāṇair nīlāñjanacayopamaḥ
c śuśubhe sarvato rājan pradīpta iva kiṃśukaḥ
a sa vadhyamānaḥ samare bhīmacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
c smaran bhrātṛvadhaṃ caiva pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
a ghoraṃ rūpam atho kṛtvā bhīmasenam abhāṣata
c tiṣṭhedānīṃ raṇe pārtha paśya me 'dya parākramam
a bako nāma sudurbuddhe rākṣasapravaro balī
c parokṣaṃ mama tadvṛttaṃ yad bhrātā me hatas tvayā
a evam uktvā tato bhīmam antardhānagatas tadā
c mahātā śaravarṣeṇa bhṛśaṃ taṃ samavākirat
a bhīmas tu samare rājann adṛśye rākṣase tadā
c ākāśaṃ pūrayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a sa vadhyamāno bhīmena nimeṣād ratham āsthitaḥ
c jagāma dharaṇīṃ kṣudraḥ khaṃ caiva sahasāgamat
a uccāvacāni rūpāṇi cakāra subahūni ca
b aṇur bṛhat punaḥ sthūlo nādān muñcann ivāmbudaḥ
c uccāvacās tathā vāco vyājahāra samantataḥ
d nipetur gaganāc caiva śaradhārāḥ sahasraśaḥ
d śaktayaḥ kaṇapāḥ prāsāḥ śūlapaṭṭiśatomarāḥ
d śataghnyaḥ parighāś caiva bhiṇḍipālāḥ paraśvadhāḥ
d śilāḥ khaḍgā guḍāś caiva ṛṣṭir vajrāṇi caiva ha
d sā rākṣasavisṛṣṭā tu śastravṛṣṭiḥ sudāruṇā
d jaghāna pāṇḍuputrasya sainikān raṇamūrdhani
a tena pāṇḍavasainyānāṃ mṛditā yudhi vāraṇāḥ
c hayāś ca bahavo rājan pattayaś ca tathā punaḥ
e rathebhyo rathinaḥ petus tasya nunnāḥ sma sāyakaiḥ
a śoṇitodāṃ rathāvartāṃ hastigrāhasamākulām
b sa hatvā rathabhūyiṣṭhāṃ nadīṃ prāvartayat tadā
c chatrahaṃsāṃ kardaminīṃ bāhupannagasaṃkulām
a nadīṃ pravartayām āsa rakṣogaṇasamākulām
c vahantīṃ bahudhā rājaṃś cedipāñcālasṛñjayān
d vahantīṃ sṛñjayāṃś caiva pāñcālān atha bāhlikān
a taṃ tathā samare rājan vicarantam abhītavat
c pāṇḍavā bhṛśasaṃvignāḥ prāpaśyaṃs tatsya vikramam
a tāvakānāṃ tu sainyānāṃ praharṣaḥ samajāyata
c vāditraninadaś cograḥ sumahāṃl lomaharṣaṇaḥ
d praharṣayad raṇe rakṣaḥ pāṇḍavāṃś ca vyamohayat
a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tava sainyasya pāṇḍavaḥ
c nāmṛṣyata yathā nāgas talaśabdaṃ samīritam
a tataḥ krodhābhitāmrākṣo nirdahann iva pāvakaḥ
c saṃdadhe tvāṣṭram astraṃ sa svayaṃ tvaṣṭeva māriṣa
a tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi prādurāsan samantataḥ
c taiḥ śarais tava sainyasya vidrāvaḥ sumahān abhūt
a tad astraṃ preṣitaṃ tena bhīmasenena saṃyuge
c rākṣasasya mahāmāyāṃ hatvā rākṣasam ārdayat
a sa vadhyamāno bahudhā bhīmasenena rākṣasaḥ
c saṃtyajya saṃyuge bhīmaṃ droṇānīkam upādravat
a tasmiṃs tu nirjite rājan rākṣasendre mahātmanā
c anādayan siṃhanādaiḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarvatodiśam
a apūjayan mārutiṃ ca saṃhṛṣṭās te mahābalam
c prahrādaṃ samare jitvā yathā śakraṃ marudgaṇāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 kirantaṃ śaravarṣāṇi roṣād droṇaṃ mahāmṛdhe
 vitrāsayantaṃ tāṃ senāṃ kaunteyānāṃ mahīpate
 dṛṣṭvā tato maheṣvāso nighnantaṃ ca rathān bhṛśam
 ghaṭotkaco mahābāhū raṇāyābhijagāma ha
 piśācavadanair yuktaṃ rathaṃ kāñcanabhūṣitam
 samāsthāya mahārāja nānāpraharaṇair vṛtam
 daṃśitas tapanīyena kavacena suvarcasā
 bhūṣaṇair ācitāṅgaś ca nadann iva ca toyadaḥ
 haiḍimbeyaḥ susaṃkruddho droṇam abhyadravad balī
 tam abhyadhāvad āyāntaṃ kruddharūpam alambusaḥ
 ṛkṣacarmaparikṣiptaṃ ratham āsthāya daṃśitaḥ
 raktoṣṭhaḥ sadhanuḥ prāṃśuḥ kalpavṛkṣa iva sthitaḥ
 kṣipañ chataghnīṃ vipulāṃ musalopalatomarān
 musaṇṭhīr bahulāś caiva triśūlān api paṭṭasān
 karpaṇāñ śatadhārāṃś ca pinākān vividhāṃs tathā
 cakrāṇi ca kṣuraprāṇi kṣepaṇīś ca kaṭaṃkaṭān
 nārācān vividhān asyan sakaṅkolūkavāyasaḥ
 cikṣepa dhanur ādāya ninadan bhairavān ravān
 taṃ raudraṃ krūram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā kālam ivāgatam
 prādravad bhayasaṃvignā sā rājan pāṇḍuvāhinī
 satyakas tu naravyāghro dṛṣṭvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ yudhi
 abhyayād amaraprakhyo bhrāmayitvā mahad dhanuḥ
 abhyadravac ca tad rakṣas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
 alambusaṃ rākṣasendraṃ so 'stravarṣair avākirat
 tataḥ pāṇḍavasainyāni vidrutāny atha bhārata
 nirīkṣyābhyadravat tūrṇaṃ tvaramāṇo ghaṭotkacaḥ
 cikṣepa ca gadāśaktīs tomarān atha paṭṭasān
 hemacitratsarūn ugrān khaḍgān ākāśasaprabhān
 anyonyam ārād ālokya rākṣasau tau mahābalau
 bhairavaṃ nadatur nādān satoyāv iva toyadau
 tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasasiṃhayoḥ
 yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe
 tau śaktīś ca pinākāṃś ca vajrān khaḍgān paraṣvadhān
 anyonyam abhisaṃkruddhau tadā vyasṛjatām ubhau
 ākṛṣyamāṇe dhanuṣī tayor bāhubalena ca
 yantreṇeva tadā rājan bhṛśaṃ nādān pracakratuḥ
 alambusas tataś cakraṃ kṛtāntajvalanaprabham
 ghaṭotkacāya cikṣepa yatnam āsthāya vīryavān
 tad bhaimaseniḥ saṃprekṣya cakraṃ vegavad antare
 gadayā tāḍayām āsa tad dīrṇaṃ śatadhābhavat
 tato 'gnicūrṇaiḥ sahasā cakraghātaviniḥsṛtaiḥ
 daṃśakair iva sā senā patadbhir bhṛśasaṃkulā
 tataḥ pratihate cakre sa vīro roṣasaṃkulaḥ
 prāhiṇot tarasā śūlaṃ śaktīr daśaśatās tadā
 jvalantīr vikirantīś ca jvālāmālāḥ sahasraśaḥ
 yugāntolkānibhās tīkṣṇā hemadaṇḍā mahāsvanāḥ
 tāś cāpatantīḥ saṃprekṣya rākṣasasya ghaṭotkacaḥ
 ardhacandraiḥ praciccheda nārācaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
 tato roṣaparītāṅgaḥ pramumoca sa rākṣasaḥ
 śaravarṣaṃ mahāghoraṃ ghaṭotkacarathaṃ prati
a alambusaṃ tathā yuddhe vicarantam abhītavat
c haiḍimbaḥ prayayau tūrṇaṃ vivyādha ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a tayoḥ pratibhayaṃ yuddham āsīd rākṣasasiṃhayoḥ
c kurvator vividhā māyāḥ śakraśambarayor iva
a alambuso bhṛśaṃ kruddho ghaṭotkacam atāḍayat
b tayor yuddhaṃ samabhavad rakṣogrāmaṇimukhyayoḥ
b yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayoḥ prabho
b tādṛg yuddhaṃ samabhavat tayo rākṣasasiṃhayoḥ
c ghaṭotkacas tu viṃśatyā nārācānāṃ stanāntare
e alambusam atho viddhvā siṃhavad vyanadan muhuḥ
a tathaivālambuso rājan haiḍimbaṃ yuddhadurmadam
c viddhvā viddhvānadad dhṛṣṭaḥ pūrayan khaṃ samantataḥ
a tathā tau bhṛśasaṃkruddhau rākṣasendrau mahābalau
c nirviśeṣam ayudhyetāṃ māyābhir itaretaram
a māyāśatasṛjau dṛptau mohayantau parasparam
c māyāyuddhe sukuśalau māyāyuddham ayudhyatām
a yāṃ yāṃ ghaṭotkaco yuddhe māyāṃ darśayate nṛpa
c tāṃ tām alambuso rājan māyayaiva nijaghnivān
a taṃ tathā yudhyamānaṃ tu māyāyuddhaviśāradam
c alambusaṃ rākṣasendraṃ dṛṣṭvākrudhyanta pāṇḍavāḥ
a ta enaṃ bhṛśasaṃkruddhāḥ sarvataḥ pravarā rathaiḥ
c abhyadravanta saṃkruddhā bhīmasenādayo nṛpa
a ta enaṃ koṣṭhakīkṛtya rathavaṃśena māriṣa
c sarvato vyakiran bāṇair ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
a sa teṣām astravegaṃ taṃ pratihatyāstramāyayā
c tasmād rathavrajān mukto vanadāhād iva dvipaḥ
a sa visphārya dhanur ghoram indrāśanisamasvanam
c mārutiṃ pañcaviṃśatyā bhaimaseniṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
e yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tribhir viddhvā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
a nakulaṃ ca trisaptatyā drupadeyāṃś ca māriṣa
c pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir viddhvā ghoraṃ nādaṃ nanāda ha
a taṃ bhīmaseno navabhiḥ sahadevaś ca pañcabhiḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śatenaiva rākṣasaṃ pratyavidhyata
e nakulaś ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā draupadeyās tribhis tribhiḥ
a haiḍimbo rākṣasaṃ viddhvā yuddhe pañcāśatā śaraiḥ
c punar vivyādha saptatyā nanāda ca mahābalaḥ
d tasya nādena mahatā kampiteyaṃ vasuṃdharā
d saparvatavanā rājan sapādapajalāśayā
a so 'tividdho maheṣvāsaḥ sarvatas tair mahārathaiḥ
c prativivyādha tān sarvān pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a taṃ kruddhaṃ rākṣasaṃ yuddhe pratikruddhas tu rākṣasaḥ
c haiḍimbo bharataśreṣṭha śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ
a so 'tividdho balavatā rākṣasendro mahābalaḥ
c vyasṛjat sāyakāṃs tūrṇaṃ svarṇapuṅkhāñ śilāśitān
a te śarā nataparvāṇo viviśū rākṣasaṃ tadā
c ruṣitāḥ pannagā yadvad girim ugrā mahābalāḥ
a tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan samantān niśitāñ śarān
c preṣayām āsur udvignā haiḍimbaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
a sa vadhyamānaḥ samare pāṇḍavair jitakāśibhiḥ
b martyadharmam anuprāptaḥ kartavyaṃ nānvapadyata
b tataḥ samaraśauṇḍo vai bhaimasenir mahābalaḥ
b samīkṣya tadavasthaṃ taṃ vadhāyāsya mano dadhe
b vegaṃ cakre mahāntaṃ ca rākṣasendrarathaṃ prati
b ghaṭotkaco 'py asaṃbhrāntaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mahattaram
b alambusavadhaprepsur mumocāgnir iva jvalan
b alambusarathāc cogrād ghaṭotkacarathād api
b śarāḥ prādurbhavanti sma dvirephā iva khād diśaḥ
b abhracchāyeva racitā bāṇais tatra nareśvara
b na sma vijñāyate kiṃ cid andhakāre kṛte śaraiḥ
b tata ākarṇamuktena bhallena ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
b alambusasya ciccheda śiro yantur mahābalaḥ
b tato 'parair vegavadbhiḥ kṣurais tasya ghaṭotkacaḥ
b akṣamīṣāṃ yugaṃ caiva ciccheda yudhi tāḍayan
b avaskandya rathāt tūrṇaṃ kairmīriḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
b tasmin māyāmayaṃ ghoram astravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
b ghaṭotkaco 'pyāśu rathāt praskandya sa tam eva ca
b māyāstreṇaiva māyāstraṃ vyadhamat samare ripoḥ
b haiḍimbenārdyamānas tu yudhi so 'lambuso dṛḍham
b antarhito mahārāja ghaṭotkacam ayodhayat
b antardhānagataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra tatra ghaṭotkacaḥ
b gadayā tāḍayām āsa vegavatyā mahābalaḥ
b utpapāta tato vyomni prahāraparipīḍitaḥ
b alambuso rākṣasendraḥ sahasā pakṣirāḍ iva
b ghaṭotkaco 'py asaṃbhrāntaḥ khaḍgapāṇir athotpatat
b tato vegena mahatā vivarṣiṣur ivāmbudaḥ
b tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kairmīrī rākṣasottamaḥ
b abhidudrāva vegena siṃhaḥ siṃham iva sthitam
b dakṣiṇenāsim udyamya vakṣaḥ pracchādya varmaṇā
b abhidudrāva vegena vegavantaṃ ghaṭotkacaḥ
b tāv ubhau vegasaṃrabdhāv alambusaghaṭotkacau
b anyonyasya tathaivorū samājaghnatur añjasā
b anyonyasyābhighātena tayo rākṣasasiṃhayoḥ
b śailenābhihatasyaiva śailasyābhūn mahāsvanaḥ
b tatopasṛtya sahasā punar āpetatur bhṛśam
b carantāv asimārgāṃs tān vividhān rākṣasottamau
b tayor gātreṣu patitāv asī bhinnau nipetatuḥ
b vegotsṛṣṭe maghavatā vajre śailataṭeṣv iva
b tataḥ sainyāni dadṛśus tad yuddham atidāruṇam
b yuddhaṃ tayo rākṣasayor āmiṣe śyenayor iva
b tato lohitaraktākṣāv ubhau tau rākṣasottamau
b adṛśyetāṃ tu śārdūlau sandhyāraktāv ivāmbudau
b cakrāte śyenavac caiva maṇḍalāni sahasraśaḥ
b ubhau nistriṃśahastau tau sapakṣāv iva pakṣiṇau
b tato bhrāmya tu taṃ khaḍgaṃ pāṇḍoḥ kirmīranandanaḥ
b cikṣepāsya śiro hartuṃ sa ca tasya ghaṭotkacaḥ
b tāv asī yugapad dīptau sametya vipulau bhuvi
b patitau tau tu bāhubhyāṃ rākṣasau samasajjatām
b śīrṣaghātāṃsaghātaiś ca parasparam athāhatau
b punar vimiśritau vīrau vyāyudhyete muhur muhuḥ
c dagdhādrikūṭaśṛṅgābhaṃ bhinnāñjanacayopamam
d rathād ratham abhidrutya kruddho haiḍimba ākṣipat
d udbabarha rathāc cāpi pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
a samutkṣipya ca bāhubhyām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ
c niṣpipeṣa kṣitau kṣipraṃ pūrṇakumbham ivāśmani
a balalāghavasaṃpannaḥ saṃpanno vikrameṇa ca
c bhaimasenī raṇe kruddhaḥ sarvasainyāny abhīṣayat
a sa visphuṭitasarvāṅgaś cūrṇitāsthivibhūṣaṇaḥ
c ghaṭotkacena vīreṇa hataḥ sālakaṭaṅkaṭaḥ
d pāṇḍavānāṃ tataḥ senā taṃ dṛṣṭvā vinipātitam
d nanāda sumahānādaṃ harṣavegasamāplutā
d tatas tu nipapātāśu gatāsur bhuvi rākṣasaḥ
d śikharaṃ parvatasyeva vajravegena pātitam
d patatā tena mahatā rathināṃ dantināṃ daśa
d tava sainye mahārāja nihatāḥ subṛhattayā
a tataḥ sumanasaḥ pārthā hate tasmin niśācare
c cukruśuḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca vāsāṃsy ādudhuvuś ca ha
a tāvakāś ca hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendraṃ mahābalam
c alambusaṃ bhīmarūpaṃ viśīrṇam iva parvatam
e hāhākāram akurvanta sainyāni bharatarṣabha
a janāś ca tad dadṛśire rakṣaḥ kautūhalānvitāḥ
c yadṛcchayā nipatitaṃ bhūmāv aṅgārakaṃ yathā
a ghaṭotkacas tu tad dhatvā rakṣo balavatāṃ varam
c mumoca balavan nādaṃ balaṃ hatveva vāsavaḥ
a sa pūjyamānaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sabāndhavair
ghaṭotkacaḥ karmaṇi duṣkare kṛte
b tato ghaṭotkaco hatvā tad rakṣo vṛtrasaṃnibham
b punaḥ svaratham āsthāya vijigīṣur nanāda ca
b nanāda cātīva hi pāṇḍavātmajo
b raṇājire hṛṣṭamanā ghaṭotkacaḥ
c ripuṃ nihatyābhinananda vai tadā
alambusaṃ pakvam alambusaṃ yathā
a tato ninādaḥ sumahān samutthitaḥ
saśaṅkhanānāvidhabāṇaghoṣavān

d svakarmāvedayan mūrdhnā sāñjalir nipapāta ha
d mūrdhny upāghrāya taṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ pariṣvajya ca pāṇḍavaḥ
d prīto 'smīty abravīd rājan harṣād utphullalocanaḥ
d ghaṭotkacena niṣpiṣṭe mṛte sālakaṭaṅkaṭe
d babhūvur muditāḥ sarve hate tasmin niśācare
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a bhāradvājaṃ kathaṃ yuddhe yuyudhāno 'bhyavārayat
c saṃjayācakṣva tattvena paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śṛṇu rājan mahāprājña saṃgrāmaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c droṇasya pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuyudhānapurogamaiḥ
a vadhyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuyudhānena māriṣa

a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
c sātyakiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samārpayat
a droṇo 'pi yudhi vikrānto yuyudhānaṃ samāhitaḥ
c avidhyat pañcabhis tūrṇaṃ hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ

c sātvataṃ pīḍayām āsa śatena nataparvaṇā

c nābhyapadyata kartavyaṃ kiṃ cid eva viśāṃ pate

a taṃ tu saṃprekṣya te putrāḥ sainikāś ca viśāṃ pate

a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pīḍyamānaṃ ca mādhavam
c yudhiṣṭhiro 'bravīd rājan sarvasainyāni bhārata

c grasyate yudhi vīreṇa bhānumān iva rāhuṇā

a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyam idam āha janādhipa
b droṇaṃ vāraya sukṣipraṃ satyakaṃ mā vadhīd dvijaḥ
c abhidrava drutaṃ droṇaṃ kiṃ nu tiṣṭhasi pārṣata

c tvayaiva sahitā yattā yuyudhānarathaṃ prati

c abhyadravad raṇe droṇaṃ yuyudhānasya kāraṇāt
a tatrārāvo mahān āsīd droṇam ekaṃ yuyutsatām
c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhadraṃ te sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a te sametya naravyāghrā bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham

c atithīn āgatān yadvat salilenāsanena ca

c ātitheyagṛhaṃ prāpya nṛpate 'tithayo yathā

a droṇasya ca vyadṛśyanta visarpanto mahāśarāḥ
c gabhastaya ivārkasya pratapantaḥ samantataḥ
a tasmin droṇena nihatāḥ pāñcālāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ
c mahārathasamākhyātā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya saṃmatāḥ
a pāṇḍūnāṃ sarvasainyeṣu pāñcālānāṃ tathaiva ca
b pāñcāleṣv atha śūreṣu kekayeṣu ca mānavāḥ
c droṇaṃ sma dadṛśuḥ śūraṃ vinighnantaṃ varān varān
a kekayānāṃ śataṃ hatvā vidrāvya ca samantataḥ
c droṇas tasthau mahārāja vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ
a pāñcālān sṛñjayān matsyān kekayān pāṇḍavān api
c droṇo 'jayan mahābāhuḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a teṣāṃ samabhavac chabdo vadhyatāṃ droṇasāyakaiḥ

a vartamāne tathā raudre tasmin vīravarakṣaye

a gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣe vipranaṣṭe samantataḥ
c kaśmalābhihato rājā cintayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
a na nūnaṃ svasti pārthasya yathā nadati śaṅkharāṭ

a so 'haṃ bhāraṃ samādhāsye tvayi taṃ voḍhum arhasi
c abhiprāyaṃ ca me nityaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi

c kuru kṛcchre sahāyārtham arjunasya nararṣabha

c pṛthivīṃ vā dvijātibhyo yo dadyāt samam eva tat

c raṇe saṃtyajati prāṇān dvitīyas tvaṃ ca sātyake

c prājñaḥ sarvāstravic chūro muhyate na ca saṃyuge

c parokṣaṃ tvadguṇāṃs tathyān kathayann āryasaṃsadi

c dhanaṃjayasya vārṣṇeya mama bhīmasya cobhayoḥ
a yac cāpi tīrthāni carann agacchaṃ dvārakāṃ prati

c siṃhanādaravāṃś caiva rathanemisvanāṃs tathā
a nāgānāṃ śṛṇu śabdaṃ ca pattīnāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
c sādināṃ dravatāṃ caiva śṛṇu kampayatāṃ mahīm

c tasmiṃś ca nihate yuddhe kathaṃ jīveta mādṛśaḥ

a śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c laghvastraś citrayodhī ca praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
a sūryodaye mahābāhur divasaś cātivartate

a yugapac ca sametānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ tvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
c mahārthaṃ laghusaṃyuktaṃ kartum arhasi mādhava
a tasya me sarvakāryeṣu kāryam etan mataṃ sadā
c arjunasya paritrāṇaṃ kartavyam iti saṃyuge
a nāhaṃ śocāmi dāśārhaṃ goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum
