a arjunas tv eva vārṣṇeya pīḍito bahubhir yudhi
c prajahyāt samare prāṇāṃs tasmād vindāmi kaśmalam
a tasya tvaṃ padavīṃ gaccha gaccheyus tvādṛśā yathā
c tādṛśasyedṛśe kāle mādṛśenābhicoditaḥ
d tvādṛśās tādṛśaṃ gacches tādṛśaṃ gaccha satyaka
d suhṛdo vai suhṛtkṛtye param āsthāya vikramam
d suhṛdaḥ padam anvicchan na vyatheta kathaṃ cana
a raṇe vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ dvāv evātirathau smṛtau
c pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ ca sātvata viśrutaḥ
a astre nārāyaṇasamaḥ saṃkarṣaṇasamo bale
c vīratāyāṃ naravyāghra dhanaṃjayasamo hy asi
a bhīṣmadroṇāv atikramya sarvayuddhaviśāradam
c tvām adya puruṣavyāghraṃ loke santaḥ pracakṣate
d sadevāsuragandharvān sakiṃnaramahoragān
d yodhayet sa jagat sarvaṃ vijayeta ripūn bahūn
d iti bruvanti lokeṣu janās tava guṇās tathā
d samāgameṣu jalpanti pṛthag eva ca sarvadā
a nāsādhyaṃ vidyate loke sātyaker iti mādhava
c tat tvāṃ yad abhivakṣyāmi tat kuruṣva mahābala
a saṃbhāvanā hi lokasya tava pārthasya cobhayoḥ
c nānyathā tāṃ mahābāho saṃprakartum ihārhasi
a parityajya priyān prāṇān raṇe vicara vīravat
c na hi śaineya dāśārhā raṇe rakṣanti jīvitam
a ayuddham anavasthānaṃ saṃgrāme ca palāyanam
c bhīrūṇām asatāṃ mārgo naiṣa dāśārhasevitaḥ
a tavārjuno gurus tāta dharmātmā śinipuṃgava
c vāsudevo guruś cāpi tava pārthasya dhīmataḥ
a kāraṇadvayam etad dhi jānānas tvāham abruvam
c māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ gurus tava guror hy aham
a vāsudevamataṃ caitan mama caivārjunasya ca
c satyam etan mayoktaṃ te yāhi yatra dhanaṃjayaḥ
a etad vacanam ājñāya mama satyaparākrama
c praviśaitad balaṃ tāta dhārtarāṣṭrasya durmateḥ
a praviśya ca yathānyāyaṃ saṃgamya ca mahārathaiḥ
c yathārham ātmanaḥ karma raṇe sātvata darśaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a prītiyuktaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca madhurākṣaram eva ca
c kālayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca svatayā cābhibhāṣitam
a dharmarājasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya śinipuṃgavaḥ
c sātyakir bharataśreṣṭha pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
a śrutaṃ te gadato vākyaṃ sarvam etan mayācyuta
c nyāyayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca phalgunārthe yaśaskaram
a evaṃvidhe tathā kāle madṛśaṃ prekṣya saṃmatam
c vaktum arhasi rājendra yathā pārthaṃ tathaiva mām
a na me dhanaṃjayasyārthe prāṇā rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ cana
c tvatprayuktaḥ punar ahaṃ kiṃ na kuryāṃ mahāhave
a lokatrayaṃ yodhayeyaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam
c tvatprayukto narendreha kim utaitat sudurbalam
a suyodhanabalaṃ tv adya yodhayiṣye samantataḥ
c vijeṣye ca raṇe rājan satyam etad bravīmi te
a kuśaly ahaṃ kuśalinaṃ samāsādya dhanaṃjayam
c hate jayadrathe rājan punar eṣyāmi te 'ntikam
a avaśyaṃ tu mayā sarvaṃ vijñāpyas tvaṃ narādhipa
c vāsudevasya yad vākyaṃ phalgunasya ca dhīmataḥ
a dṛḍhaṃ tv abhiparīto 'ham arjunena punaḥ punaḥ
c madhye sarvasya sainyasya vāsudevasya śṛṇvataḥ
a adya mādhava rājānam apramatto 'nupālaya
c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yāvad dhanmi jayadratham
a tvayi vāhaṃ mahābāho pradyumne vā mahārathe
c nṛpaṃ nikṣipya gaccheyaṃ nirapekṣo jayadratham
d sa evaṃ vai vinikṣipto nikṣepaḥ savyasācinā
d bhāradvājabhayaṃ te 'dya manyate vai dhanaṃjayaḥ
a jānīṣe hi raṇe droṇaṃ rabhasaṃ śreṣṭhasaṃmatam
c pratijñā cāpi te nityaṃ śrutā droṇasya mādhava
a grahaṇaṃ dharmarājasya bhāradvājo 'nugṛdhyati
c śaktaś cāpi raṇe droṇo nigṛhītuṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
a evaṃ tvayi samādhāya dharmarājaṃ narottamam
c aham adya gamiṣyāmi saindhavasya vadhāya hi
d sa tvam adya raṇe yatto rakṣa mādhava pāṇḍavam
d rakṣaṇe dharmarājasya dhruvo hi vijayo mama
a jayadratham ahaṃ hatvā dhruvam eṣyāmi mādhava
c dharmarājaṃ yathā droṇo nigṛhṇīyād raṇe balāt
a nigṛhīte naraśreṣṭhe bhāradvājena mādhava
c saindhavasya vadho na syān mamāprītis tathā bhavet
a evaṃ gate naraśreṣṭha pāṇḍave satyavādini
c asmākaṃ gamanaṃ vyaktaṃ vanaṃ prati bhavet punaḥ
a so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ vyartha eva bhaviṣyati
c yadi droṇo raṇe kruddho nigṛhṇīyād yudhiṣṭhiram
a sa tvam adya mahābāho priyārthaṃ mama mādhava
c jayārthaṃ ca yaśorthaṃ ca rakṣa rājānam āhave
a sa bhavān mayi nikṣepo nikṣiptaḥ savyasācinā
c bhāradvājād bhayaṃ nityaṃ paśyamānena te prabho
a tasyāpi ca mahābāho nityaṃ paśyati saṃyuge
c nānyaṃ hi pratiyoddhāraṃ raukmiṇeyād ṛte prabho
e māṃ vāpi manyate yuddhe bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
f bhīmo vāpi mahārāja prabhañjanasamo bale
a so 'haṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ caitām ācāryavacanaṃ ca tat
c pṛṣṭhato notsahe kartuṃ tvāṃ vā tyaktuṃ mahīpate
a ācāryo laghuhastatvād abhedyakavacāvṛtaḥ
c upalabhya raṇe krīḍed yathā śakuninā śiśuḥ
a yadi kārṣṇir dhanuṣpāṇir iha syān makaradhvajaḥ
c tasmai tvāṃ visṛjeyaṃ vai sa tvāṃ rakṣed yathārjunaḥ
a kuru tvam ātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
c yaḥ pratīyād raṇe droṇaṃ yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
a mā ca te bhayam adyāstu rājann arjunasaṃbhavam
c na sa jātu mahābāhur bhāram udyamya sīdati
a ye ca sauvīrakā yodhās tathā saindhavapauravāḥ
c udīcyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca ye cānye 'pi mahārathāḥ
a ye ca karṇamukhā rājan rathodārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
c ete 'rjunasya kruddhasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm
a udyuktā pṛthivī sarvā sasurāsuramānuṣā
c sarākṣasagaṇā rājan sakiṃnaramahoragā
a jaṅgamāḥ sthāvaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nālaṃ pārthasya saṃyuge
c evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja vyetu te bhīr dhanaṃjaye
a yatra vīrau maheṣvāsau kṛṣṇau satyaparākramau
c na tatra karmaṇo vyāpat kathaṃ cid api vidyate
a daivaṃ kṛtāstratāṃ yogam amarṣam api cāhave
c kṛtajñatāṃ dayāṃ caiva bhrātus tvam anucintaya
a mayi cāpy apayāte vai gacchamāne 'rjunaṃ prati
c droṇe citrāstratāṃ saṃkhye rājaṃs tvam anucintaya
a ācāryo hi bhṛśaṃ rājan nigrahe tava gṛdhyati
c pratijñām ātmano rakṣan satyāṃ kartuṃ ca bhārata
a kuruṣvādyātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
c yasyāhaṃ pratyayāt pārtha gaccheyaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
d pratyayo na hi me pārtha yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
a na hy ahaṃ tvā mahārāja anikṣipya mahāhave
c kva cid yāsyāmi kauravya satyam etad bravīmi te
d na paśyāmi rathaṃ kaṃ cid yas te goptā bhaved iha
d śaktaṃ yaṃ manyase rājan goptāraṃ prati pāṇḍava
a etad vicārya bahuśo buddhyā buddhimatāṃ vara
c dṛṣṭvā śreyaḥ paraṃ buddhyā tato rājan praśādhi mām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi mādhava
c na tu me śudhyate bhāvaḥ śvetāśvaṃ prati māriṣa
a kariṣye paramaṃ yatnam ātmano rakṣaṇaṃ prati
c gaccha tvaṃ samanujñāto yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
a ātmasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ saṃkhye gamanaṃ cārjunaṃ prati
c vicāryaitad dvayaṃ buddhyā gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
a sa tvam ātiṣṭha yānāya yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
b pṛṣṭhataḥ puruṣavyāghra bhīmas tvānugamiṣyati
c mamāpi rakṣaṇaṃ bhīmaḥ kariṣyati mahābalaḥ
a pārṣataś ca sasodaryaḥ pārthivāś ca mahābalāḥ
c draupadeyāś ca māṃ tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
a kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
c virāṭo drupadaś caiva śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
a dhṛṣṭaketuś ca balavān kuntibhojaś ca māriṣa
c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
e ete samāhitās tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
a na droṇaḥ saha sainyena kṛtavarmā ca saṃyuge
c samāsādayituṃ śakto na ca māṃ dharṣayiṣyati
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca samare droṇaṃ kruddhaṃ paraṃtapaḥ
c vārayiṣyati vikramya veleva makarālayam
a yatra sthāsyati saṃgrāme pārṣataḥ paravīrahā
c na droṇasainyaṃ balavat krāmet tatra kathaṃ cana
a eṣa droṇavināśāya samutpanno hutāśanāt
c kavacī sa śarī khaḍgī dhanvī ca varabhūṣaṇaḥ
d eṣa droṇaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayeta sa vai prabho
d pāñcālaḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dhanvibhiḥ
a viśrabdho gaccha śaineya mā kārṣīr mayi saṃbhramam
c dhṛṣṭadyumno raṇe kruddho droṇam āvārayiṣyati
 saṃjaya uvāca
a dharmarājasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya śinipuṃgavaḥ
c pārthāc ca bhayam āśaṅkan parityāgān mahīpateḥ
a apavādaṃ hy ātmanaś ca lokād rakṣan viśeṣataḥ
c na māṃ bhīta iti brūyur āyāntaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
a niścitya bahudhaivaṃ sa sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥ
b nātivyaktam ivābhāṣya dharmarājaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
b śokagadgadayā vācā śokopahatacetanaḥ
c dharmarājam idaṃ vākyam abravīt puruṣarṣabha
d yathedānīm iti dhyātvā dharmarājam athābravīt
a kṛtāṃ cen manyase rakṣāṃ svasti te 'stu viśāṃ pate
c anuyāsyāmi bībhatsuṃ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
a na hi me pāṇḍavāt kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
c yo vai priyataro rājan satyam etad bravīmi te
a tasyāhaṃ padavīṃ yāsye saṃdeśāt tava mānada
c tvatkṛte na ca me kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
a yathā hi me guror vākyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dvipadāṃ vara
c tathā tavāpi vacanaṃ viśiṣṭataram eva me
a priye hi tava vartete bhrātarau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
c tayoḥ priye sthitaṃ caiva viddhi māṃ rājapuṃgava
a tavājñāṃ śirasā gṛhya pāṇḍavārtham ahaṃ prabho
c bhittvedaṃ durbhidaṃ sainyaṃ prayāsye narasattama
a droṇānīkaṃ viśāmy eṣa kruddho jhaṣa ivārṇavam
c tatra yāsyāmi yatrāsau rājan rājā jayadrathaḥ
a yatra senāṃ samāśritya bhītas tiṣṭhati pāṇḍavāt
c gupto rathavaraśreṣṭhair drauṇikarṇakṛpādibhiḥ
a itas triyojanaṃ manye tam adhvānaṃ viśāṃ pate
c yatra tiṣṭhati pārtho 'sau jayadrathavadhodyataḥ
a triyojanagatasyāpi tasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ padam
c āsaindhavavadhād rājan sudṛḍhenāntarātmanā
a anādiṣṭas tu guruṇā ko nu yudhyeta mānavaḥ
c ādiṣṭas tu tvayā rājan ko na yudhyeta mādṛśaḥ
e abhijānāmi taṃ deśaṃ yatra yāsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
f yatra tiṣṭhati rājāsau saindhavo bālaghātakaḥ
f sāgarapratimaṃ sainyaṃ garjantam iva sāgaram
a huḍaśaktigadāprāsakhaḍgacarmarṣṭitomaram
c iṣvastravarasaṃbādhaṃ kṣobhayiṣye balārṇavam
a yad etat kuñjarānīkaṃ sāhasram anupaśyasi
c kulam añjanakaṃ nāma yatraite vīryaśālinaḥ
a āsthitā bahubhir mlecchair yuddhaśauṇḍaiḥ prahāribhiḥ
c nāgā meghanibhā rājan kṣaranta iva toyadāḥ
a naite jātu nivarteran preṣitā hastisādibhiḥ
c anyatra hi vadhād eṣāṃ nāsti rājan parājayaḥ
a atha yān rathino rājan samantād anupaśyasi
c ete rukmarathā nāma rājaputrā mahārathāḥ
a ratheṣv astreṣu nipuṇā nāgeṣu ca viśāṃ pate
c dhanurvede gatāḥ pāraṃ muṣṭiyuddhe ca kovidāḥ
a gadāyuddhaviśeṣajñā niyuddhakuśalās tathā
c khaḍgapraharaṇe yuktāḥ saṃpāte cāsicarmaṇoḥ
a śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca spardhante ca parasparam
c nityaṃ ca samare rājan vijigīṣanti mānavān
a karṇena vijitā rājan duḥśāsanam anuvratāḥ
c etāṃs tu vāsudevo 'pi rathodārān praśaṃsati
a satataṃ priyakāmāś ca karṇasyaite vaśe sthitāḥ
c tasyaiva vacanād rājan nivṛttāḥ śvetavāhanāt
a te na kṣatā na ca śrāntā dṛḍhāvaraṇakārmukāḥ
c madarthaṃ viṣṭhitā nūnaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya śāsanāt
a etān pramathya saṃgrāme priyārthaṃ tava kaurava
c prayāsyāmi tataḥ paścāt padavīṃ savyasācinaḥ
a yāṃs tv etān aparān rājan nāgān saptaśatāni ca
c prekṣase varmasaṃchannān kirātaiḥ samadhiṣṭhitān
a kirātarājo yān prādād gṛhītaḥ savyasācinā
c svalaṃkṛtāṃs tathā preṣyān icchañ jīvitam ātmanaḥ
a āsann ete purā rājaṃs tava karmakarā dṛḍham
c tvām evādya yuyutsante paśya kālasya paryayam
a teṣām ete mahāmātrāḥ kirātā yuddhadurmadāḥ
c hastiśikṣāvidaś caiva sarve caivāgniyonayaḥ
a ete vinirjitāḥ sarve saṃgrāme savyasācinā
c madartham adya saṃyattā duryodhanavaśānugāḥ
a etān bhittvā śarai rājan kirātān yuddhadurmadān
c saindhavasya vadhe yuktam anuyāsyāmi pāṇḍavam
a ye tv ete sumahānāgā añjanasya kulodbhavāḥ
c karkaśāś ca vinītāś ca prabhinnakaraṭāmukhāḥ
a jāmbūnadamayaiḥ sarvair varmabhiḥ suvibhūṣitāḥ
c labdhalakṣyā raṇe rājann airāvaṇasamā yudhi
a uttarāt parvatād ete tīkṣṇair dasyubhir āsthitāḥ
b āsthitā dasyubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ śūrair uttamapārvataiḥ
c karkaśaiḥ pravarair yodhaiḥ kārṣṇāyasatanucchadaiḥ
a santi goyonayaś cātra santi vānarayonayaḥ
c anekayonayaś cānye tathā mānuṣayonayaḥ
a anīkam asatām etad dhūmavarṇam udīryate
c mlecchānāṃ pāpakartṝṇāṃ himavaddurgavāsinām
a etad duryodhano labdhvā samagraṃ nāgamaṇḍalam
c kṛpaṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca droṇaṃ ca rathināṃ varam
a sindhurājaṃ tathā karṇam avamanyata pāṇḍavān
b bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇam āvantyāv atha saindhavam
b drauṇiṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca pāṇḍavān atimanyate
c kṛtārtham atha cātmānaṃ manyate kālacoditaḥ
a te ca sarve 'nusaṃprāptā mama nārācagocaram
c na vimokṣyanti kaunteya yady api syur manojavāḥ
a tena saṃbhāvitā nityaṃ paravīryopajīvinā
c vināśam upayāsyanti maccharaughanipīḍitāḥ
a ye tv ete rathino rājan dṛśyante kāñcanadhvajāḥ
c ete durvāraṇā nāma kāmbojā yadi te śrutāḥ
a śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitāḥ
c saṃhatāś ca bhṛśaṃ hy ete anyonyasya hitaiṣiṇaḥ
a akṣauhiṇyaś ca saṃrabdhā dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhārata
c yattā madarthaṃ tiṣṭhanti kuruvīrābhirakṣitāḥ
a apramattā mahārāja mām eva pratyupasthitāḥ
c tāṃs tv ahaṃ pramathiṣyāmi tṛṇānīva hutāśanaḥ
a tasmāt sarvān upāsaṅgān sarvopakaraṇāni ca
c rathe kurvantu me rājan yathāvad rathakalpakāḥ
a asmiṃs tu khalu saṃgrāme grāhyaṃ vividham āyudham
c yathopadiṣṭam ācāryaiḥ kāryaḥ pañcaguṇo rathaḥ
a kāmbojair hi sameṣyāmi kruddhair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
c nānāśastrasamāvāpair vividhāyudhayodhibhiḥ
a kirātaiś ca sameṣyāmi viṣakalpaiḥ prahāribhiḥ
c lālitaiḥ satataṃ rājñā duryodhanahitaiṣibhiḥ
a śakaiś cāpi sameṣyāmi śakratulyaparākramaiḥ
c agnikalpair durādharṣaiḥ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥ
a tathānyair vividhair yodhaiḥ kālakalpair durāsadaiḥ
c sameṣyāmi raṇe rājan bahubhir yuddhadurmadaiḥ
d triyojanagatasyāhaṃ padavīṃ savyasācinaḥ
d yāsyāmi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravaraṃ ca dhanuṣmatām
d sūryodayagatasyāhaṃ pāṇḍavasya gatiṃ caran
d apareṇa gate sūrye gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
a tasmād vai vājino mukhyā viśrāntāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ
c upāvṛttāś ca pītāś ca punar yujyantu me rathe
a tasya sarvān upāsaṅgān sarvopakaraṇāni ca
c rathe prāsthāpayad rājā śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
a tatas tān sarvato muktvā sadaśvāṃś caturo janāḥ
c rasavat pāyayām āsuḥ pānaṃ madasamīriṇam
a pītopavṛttān snātāṃś ca jagdhānnān samalaṃkṛtān
c vinītaśalyāṃs turagāṃś caturo hemamālinaḥ
a tān yattān rukmavarṇābhān vinītāñ śīghragāminaḥ
c saṃhṛṣṭamanaso 'vyagrān vidhivat kalpite rathe
a mahādhvajena siṃhena hemakesaramālinā
c saṃvṛte ketanair hemair maṇividrumacitritaiḥ
e pāṇḍurābhraprakāśābhiḥ patākābhir alaṃkṛte
a hemadaṇḍocchritacchatre bahuśastraparicchade
c yojayām āsa vidhivad dhemabhāṇḍavibhūṣitān
a dārukasyānujo bhrātā sūtas tasya priyaḥ sakhā
c nyavedayad rathaṃ yuktaṃ vāsavasyeva mātaliḥ
a tataḥ snātaḥ śucir bhūtvā kṛtakautukamaṅgalaḥ
c snātakānāṃ sahasrasya svarṇaniṣkān adāpayat
e āśīrvādaiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ sātyakiḥ śrīmatāṃ varaḥ
a tataḥ sa madhuparkārhaḥ pītvā kailāvataṃ madhu
c lohitākṣo babhau tatra madavihvalalocanaḥ
a ālabhya vīrakāṃsyaṃ ca harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
c dviguṇīkṛtatejā hi prajvalann iva pāvakaḥ
e utsaṅge dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ rathināṃ varaḥ
a kṛtasvastyayano vipraiḥ kavacī samalaṃkṛtaḥ
c lājair gandhais tathā mālyaiḥ kanyābhiś cābhinanditaḥ
a yudhiṣṭhirasya caraṇāv abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
c tena mūrdhany upāghrāta āruroha mahāratham
d āśiṣo vipulāḥ śrutvā dharmarājamukhodgatāḥ
d harṣeṇa mahatā yuktas tv āruroha rathottamam
a tatas te vājino hṛṣṭāḥ supuṣṭā vātaraṃhasaḥ
c ajayyā jaitram ūhus taṃ vikurvantaḥ sma saindhavāḥ
d yathā śakrarathaṃ rājann ūhus te harayaḥ purā
d tathaiva bhīmaseno 'pi dharmarājena pūjitaḥ
d prāyāt sātyakinā sārdham abhivādya yudhiṣṭhiram
d tau dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantau tava senām ariṃdamau
d saṃyattās tāvakāḥ sarve tasthur droṇapurogamāḥ
d saṃnaddham anugacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ sa sātyakiḥ
d abhinandyābravīd vīras tadā harṣakaraṃ vacaḥ
a atha harṣaparītāṅgaḥ sātyakir bhīmam abravīt
c tvaṃ bhīma rakṣa rājānam etat kāryatamaṃ hi te
a ahaṃ bhittvā pravekṣyāmi kālapakvam idaṃ balam
c āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca śreyo rājño 'bhirakṣaṇam
a jānīṣe mama vīryaṃ tvaṃ tava cāham ariṃdama
c tasmād bhīma nivartasva mama ced icchasi priyam
a tathoktaḥ sātyakiṃ prāha vraja tvaṃ kāryasiddhaye
c ahaṃ rājñaḥ kariṣyāmi rakṣāṃ puruṣasattama
a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca bhīmasenaṃ sa mādhavaḥ
c gaccha gaccha drutaṃ pārtha dhruvo 'dya vijayo mama
a yan me snigdho 'nuraktaś ca tvam adya vaśagaḥ sthitaḥ
c nimittāni ca dhanyāni yathā bhīma vadanti me
a nihate saindhave pāpe pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
c pariṣvajiṣye rājānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d apramādaś ca te kāryo droṇaṃ prati mahāratham
a etāvad uktvā bhīmaṃ tu visṛjya ca mahāmanāḥ
c saṃpraikṣat tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vyāghro mṛgagaṇān iva
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantaṃ sainyaṃ tava janādhipa
c bhūya evābhavan mūḍhaṃ subhṛśaṃ cāpy akampata
a tataḥ prayātaḥ sahasā sainyaṃ tava sa sātyakiḥ
c didṛkṣur arjunaṃ rājan dharmarājasya śāsanāt
 saṃjaya uvāca
a prayāte tava sainyaṃ tu yuyudhāne yuyutsayā
c dharmarājo mahārāja svenānīkena saṃvṛtaḥ
e prāyād droṇarathaprepsur yuyudhānasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
a tataḥ pāñcālarājasya putraḥ samaradurmadaḥ
b prayāte mādhave rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
c prākrośat pāṇḍavānīke vasudānaś ca pārthivaḥ
a āgacchata praharata drutaṃ viparidhāvata
c yathā sukhena gaccheta sātyakir yuddhadurmadaḥ
a mahārathā hi bahavo yatiṣyanty asya nirjaye
b senāpativacaḥ śrutvā pāṇḍaveyāḥ samantataḥ
b abhyudyayur mahārāja tava sainyaṃ samantataḥ
b jahi prahara gṛhṇīhi vidhya vidrāva cādrava
c iti bruvanto vegena samāpetur balaṃ tava
a vayaṃ pratijigīṣantas tatra tān samabhidrutāḥ
b bāṇaśabdaravān kṛtvā vimiśrāñ śaṅkhanisvanaiḥ
b yuyudhānarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāvakā abhidudruvuḥ
c tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd yuyudhānarathaṃ prati
a prakampyamānā mahatī tava putrasya vāhinī
c sātvatena mahārāja śatadhābhivyadīryata
a tasyāṃ vidīryamāṇāyāṃ śineḥ pautro mahārathaḥ
c sapta vīrān maheṣvāsān agrānīke vyapothayat
d athānyān api rājendra nānājanapadeśvarān
d śarair analasaṃkāśair ninye vīrān yamakṣayam
d śatam ekena vivyādha śatenaikaṃ ca patriṇām
d dvipārohān dvipāṃś caiva hayārohān hayāṃs tathā
d rathinaḥ sāśvasūtāṃś ca jaghāneśaḥ paśūn iva
d taṃ tathādbhutakarmāṇaṃ śarasaṃpātavarṣiṇam
d na ke canābhyadhāvan vai sātyakiṃ tava sainikāḥ
a te bhītā mṛdyamānāś ca pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunā
c āyodhanaṃ jahur vīrā dṛṣṭvā tam atimānuṣam
d tam ekaṃ bahudhā paśyan mohitās tasya tejasā
d saṃgrāmakovidaṃ vīraṃ vicarantam abhītavat
a rathair vimathitākṣaiś ca bhagnanīḍaiś ca māriṣa
c cakrair vimathitaiś chinnair dhvajaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
a anukarṣaiḥ patākābhiḥ śirastrāṇaiḥ sakāñcanaiḥ
c bāhubhiś candanādigdhaiḥ sāṅgadaiś ca viśāṃ pate
a hastihastopamaiś cāpi bhujagābhogasaṃnibhaiḥ
c ūrubhiḥ pṛthivī channā manujānāṃ narottama
a śaśāṅkasaṃnikāśaiś ca vadanaiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥ
c patitair vṛṣabhākṣāṇāṃ babhau bhārata medinī
a gajaiś ca bahudhā chinnaiḥ śayānaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ
c rarājātibhṛśaṃ bhūmir vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥ
a tapanīyamayair yoktrair muktājālavibhūṣitaiḥ
c uraśchadair vicitraiś ca vyaśobhanta turaṃgamāḥ
e gatasattvā mahīṃ prāpya pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunā
a nānāvidhāni sainyāni tava hatvā tu sātvataḥ
c praviṣṭas tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ drāvayitvā camūṃ bhṛśam
a tatas tenaiva mārgeṇa yena yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
c iyeṣa sātyakir gantuṃ tato droṇena vāritaḥ
a bharadvājaṃ samāsādya yuyudhānas tu māriṣa
c nābhyavartata saṃkruddho velām iva jalāśayaḥ
a nivārya tu raṇe droṇo yuyudhānaṃ mahāratham
c vivyādha niśitair bāṇaiḥ pañcabhir marmabhedibhiḥ
a sātyakis tu raṇe droṇaṃ rājan vivyādha saptabhiḥ
c hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilādhautaiḥ kaṅkabarhiṇavājitaiḥ
a taṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ sāyakair droṇaḥ sāśvayantāram ārdayat
c sa taṃ na mamṛṣe droṇaṃ yuyudhāno mahārathaḥ
a siṃhanādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā droṇaṃ vivyādha sātyakiḥ
c daśabhiḥ sāyakaiś cānyaiḥ ṣaḍbhir aṣṭābhir eva ca
a yuyudhānaḥ punar droṇaṃ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c ekena sārathiṃ cāsya caturbhiś caturo hayān
e dhvajam ekena bāṇena vivyādha yudhi māriṣa
a taṃ droṇaḥ sāśvayantāraṃ sarathadhvajam āśugaiḥ
c tvaran prācchādayad bāṇaiḥ śalabhānām iva vrajaiḥ
a tathaiva yuyudhāno 'pi droṇaṃ bahubhir āśugaiḥ
c prācchādayad asaṃbhrāntas tato droṇa uvāca ha
d droṇas tu paramakruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ paravīrahā
d avākirac chitair bāṇair vāsudevaparākramam
d taṃ tathā śarajālena pracchādya mahatā punaḥ
d droṇaḥ prahasya śaineyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a tavācāryo raṇaṃ hitvā gataḥ kāpuruṣo yathā
c yudhyamānaṃ hi māṃ hitvā pradakṣiṇam avartata
a tvaṃ hi me yudhyato nādya jīvan mokṣyasi mādhava
c yadi māṃ tvaṃ raṇe hitvā na yāsy ācāryavad drutam
 sātyakir uvāca
a dhanaṃjayasya padavīṃ dharmarājasya śāsanāt
c gacchāmi svasti te brahman na me kālātyayo bhavet
d ācāryānugato mārgaḥ śiṣyair anvāsyate sadā
d tasmād evaṃ vrajāmy āśu yathā me sa gurur gataḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a etāvad uktvā śaineya ācāryaṃ parivarjayan
c prayātaḥ sahasā rājan sārathiṃ cedam abravīt
a droṇaḥ kariṣyate yatnaṃ sarvathā mama vāraṇe
c yatto yāhi raṇe sūta śṛṇu cedaṃ vacaḥ param
a etad ālokyate sainyam āvantyānāṃ mahāprabham
b abhedyam aribhir vīraiḥ sumahadbhir mahad balam
c asyānantaratas tv etad dākṣiṇātyaṃ mahābalam
a tadanantaram etac ca bāhlikānāṃ balaṃ mahat
c bāhlikābhyāśato yuktaṃ karṇasyāpi mahad balam
a anyonyena hi sainyāni bhinnāny etāni sārathe
c anyonyaṃ samupāśritya na tyakṣyanti raṇājiram
d deśasākalyam āsādya dṛśyate sumahad balam
a etad antaram āsādya codayāśvān prahṛṣṭavat
c madhyamaṃ javam āsthāya vaha mām atra sārathe
a bāhlikā yatra dṛśyante nānāpraharaṇodyatāḥ
c dākṣiṇātyāś ca bahavaḥ sūtaputrapurogamāḥ
a hastyaśvarathasaṃbādhaṃ yac cānīkaṃ vilokyate
c nānādeśasamutthaiś ca padātibhir adhiṣṭhitam
d tataḥ śakyo mahāvyūho bhettuṃ sma sahasā raṇe
d taṃ deśaṃ tvaritā yāmo mṛdanto yudhi śātravān
d tatraite saṃprahṛṣṭatvān nāsmān prati yuyutsavaḥ
d ayudhyamāno bahubhir ekaṃ prāpya sudurbalam
d balaṃ pramathya gacchāmi miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
a etāvad uktvā yantāraṃ brahmāṇaṃ parivarjayan
c sa vyatīyāya yatrograṃ karṇasya sumahad balam
d yatraite paramakruddhā dākṣiṇātyā mahārathāḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d etān vijitya saṃgrāme tato yāmo dhanaṃjayam
d yuyudhānavacaḥ śrutvā yuyudhānasya sārathiḥ
d yathoktam agamad rājan varjayan droṇam āhave
a taṃ droṇo 'nuyayau kruddho vikiran viśikhān bahūn
c yuyudhānaṃ mahābāhuṃ gacchantam anivartinam
d sa ca sainyaṃ mahad bhittvā dākṣiṇātyabalaṃ ca tat
a karṇasya sainyaṃ sumahad abhihatya śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
b prayayau tvarito bhittvā karṇasya ca mahad balam
c prāviśad bhāratīṃ senām aparyantāṃ sa sātyakiḥ
d satyako hi tataḥ sainyaṃ drāvayan sa samantataḥ
a praviṣṭe yuyudhāne tu sainikeṣu druteṣu ca
b vidrute tu bale tasmin bhagne bhārata bhārate
c amarṣī kṛtavarmā tu sātyakiṃ paryavārayat
a tam āpatantaṃ viśikhaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āhatya sātyakiḥ
c caturbhiś caturo 'syāśvān ājaghānāśu vīryavān
a tataḥ punaḥ ṣoḍaśabhir nataparvabhir āśugaiḥ
c sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmāṇaṃ pratyavidhyat stanāntare
a sa tudyamāno viśikhair bahubhis tigmatejanaiḥ
c sātvatena mahārāja kṛtavarmā na cakṣame
a sa vatsadantaṃ saṃdhāya jihmagānalasaṃnibham
c ākṛṣya rājann ākarṇād vivyādhorasi sātyakim
a sa tasya dehāvaraṇaṃ bhittvā dehaṃ ca sāyakaḥ
c sapatrapuṅkhaḥ pṛthivīṃ viveśa rudhirokṣitaḥ
a athāsya bahubhir bāṇair acchinat paramāstravit
c samārgaṇaguṇaṃ rājan kṛtavarmā śarāsanam
a vivyādha ca raṇe rājan sātyakiṃ satyavikramam
c daśabhir viśikhais tīkṣṇair abhikruddhaḥ stanāntare
a tataḥ praśīrṇe dhanuṣi śaktyā śaktimatāṃ varaḥ
c abhyahan dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
a tato 'nyat sudṛḍhaṃ vīro dhanur ādāya sātyakiḥ
c vyasṛjad viśikhāṃs tūrṇaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d te śarāḥ sātvatenāstāḥ kṛtavarmāṇam āhave
d chādayāṃ cakrire vṛkṣaṃ śalabhā iva ghoṣiṇaḥ
a sarathaṃ kṛtavarmāṇaṃ samantāt paryavākirat
c chādayitvā raṇe 'tyarthaṃ hārdikyaṃ tu sa sātyakiḥ
a athāsya bhallena śiraḥ sāratheḥ samakṛntata
c sa papāta hataḥ sūto hārdikyasya mahārathāt
e tatas te yantari hate prādravaṃs turagā bhṛśam
a atha bhojas tv asaṃbhrānto nigṛhya turagān svayam
c tasthau śaradhanuṣpāṇis tat sainyāny abhyapūjayan
a sa muhūrtam ivāśvasya sadaśvān samacodayat
c vyapetabhīr amitrāṇām āvahat sumahad bhayam
e sātyakiś cābhyagāt tasmāt sa tu bhīmam upādravat
a yuyudhāno 'pi rājendra droṇānīkād viniḥsṛtaḥ
c prayayau tvaritas tūrṇaṃ kāmbojānāṃ mahācamūm
a sa tatra bahubhiḥ śūraiḥ saṃniruddho mahārathaiḥ
c na cacāla tadā rājan sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
a saṃdhāya ca camūṃ droṇo bhoje bhāraṃ niveśya ca
c anvadhāvad raṇe yatto yuyudhānaṃ yuyutsayā
a tathā tam anudhāvantaṃ yuyudhānasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
c nyavārayanta saṃkruddhāḥ pāṇḍusainye bṛhattamāḥ
a samāsādya tu hārdikyaṃ rathānāṃ pravaraṃ ratham
c pāñcālā vigatotsāhā bhīmasenapurogamāḥ
e vikramya vāritā rājan vīreṇa kṛtavarmaṇā
a yatamānāṃs tu tān sarvān īṣad vigatacetasaḥ
c abhitas tāñ śaraugheṇa klāntavāhān avārayat
a nigṛhītās tu bhojena bhojānīkepsavo raṇe
c atiṣṭhann āryavad vīrāḥ prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
d hārdikyaṃ samare yattā na śekuḥ prativīkṣitum
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ sainyam evaṃ pravicitaṃ varam
c vyūḍham evaṃ yathānyāyam evaṃ bahu ca saṃjaya
a nityaṃ pūjitam asmābhir abhikāmaṃ ca naḥ sadā
c prauḍham atyadbhutākāraṃ purastād dṛḍhavikramam
a nātivṛddham abālaṃ ca na kṛśaṃ nātipīvaram
c laghuvṛttāyataprāṇaṃ sāragātram anāmayam
a āttasaṃnāhasaṃpannaṃ bahuśastraparicchadam
c śastragrahaṇavidyāsu bahvīṣu pariniṣṭhitam
a ārohe paryavaskande saraṇe sāntaraplute
c samyakpraharaṇe yāne vyapayāne ca kovidam
a nāgeṣv aśveṣu bahuśo ratheṣu ca parīkṣitam
b carmanistriṃśayuddhe ca niyuddhe ca viśāradam
c parīkṣya ca yathānyāyaṃ vetanenopapāditam
a na goṣṭhyā nopacāreṇa na saṃbandhanimittataḥ
c nānāhūto na hy abhṛto mama sainye babhūva ha
a kulīnāryajanopetaṃ tuṣṭapuṣṭam anuddhatam
c kṛtamānopakāraṃ ca yaśasvi ca manasvi ca
a sacivaiś cāparair mukhyair bahubhir mukhyakarmabhiḥ
c lokapālopamais tāta pālitaṃ narasattamaiḥ
a bahubhiḥ pārthivair guptam asmatpriyacikīrṣubhiḥ
c asmān abhisṛtaiḥ kāmāt sabalaiḥ sapadānugaiḥ
a mahodadhim ivāpūrṇam āpagābhiḥ samantataḥ
c apakṣaiḥ pakṣisaṃkāśai rathair aśvaiś ca saṃvṛtam
d prabhinnakaraṭaiś caiva dviradair āvṛtaṃ mahat
d yad ahanyata me sainyaṃ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
a yodhākṣayyajalaṃ bhīmaṃ vāhanormitaraṅgiṇam
c kṣepaṇyasigadāśaktiśaraprāsajhaṣākulam
a dhvajabhūṣaṇasaṃbādhaṃ ratnapaṭṭena saṃcitam
c vāhanair api dhāvadbhir vāyuvegavikampitam
a droṇagambhīrapātālaṃ kṛtavarmamahāhradam
c jalasaṃdhamahāgrāhaṃ karṇacandrodayoddhatam
a gate sainyārṇavaṃ bhittvā tarasā pāṇḍavarṣabhe
c saṃjayaikarathenaiva yuyudhāne ca māmakam
a tatra śeṣaṃ na paśyāmi praviṣṭe savyasācini
c sātvate ca rathodāre mama sainyasya saṃjaya
a tau tatra samatikrāntau dṛṣṭvābhītau tarasvinau
c sindhurājaṃ ca saṃprekṣya gāṇḍīvasyeṣugocare
a kiṃ tadā kuravaḥ kṛtyaṃ vidadhuḥ kālacoditāḥ
c dāruṇaikāyane kāle kathaṃ vā pratipedire
a grastān hi kauravān manye mṛtyunā tāta saṃgatān
c vikramo hi raṇe teṣāṃ na tathā dṛśyate 'dya vai
a akṣatau saṃyuge tatra praviṣṭau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
c na ca vārayitā kaś cit tayor astīha saṃjaya
a bhṛtāś ca bahavo yodhāḥ parīkṣyaiva mahārathāḥ
c vetanena yathāyogyaṃ priyavādena cāpare
a akāraṇabhṛtas tāta mama sainye na vidyate
c karmaṇā hy anurūpeṇa labhyate bhaktavetanam
a na ca yodho 'bhavat kaś cin mama sainye tu saṃjaya
c alpadānabhṛtas tāta na kupyabhṛtako naraḥ
a pūjitā hi yathāśaktyā dānamānāsanair mayā
c tathā putraiś ca me tāta jñātibhiś ca sabāndhavaiḥ
a te ca prāpyaiva saṃgrāme nirjitāḥ savyasācinā
c śaineyena parāmṛṣṭāḥ kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
a rakṣyate yaś ca saṃgrāme ye ca saṃjaya rakṣiṇaḥ
c ekaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ panthā rakṣyasya saha rakṣibhiḥ
a arjunaṃ samare dṛṣṭvā saindhavasyāgrataḥ sthitam
c putro mama bhṛśaṃ mūḍhaḥ kiṃ kāryaṃ pratyapadyata
a sātyakiṃ ca raṇe dṛṣṭvā praviśantam abhītavat
c kiṃ nu duryodhanaḥ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyata
a sarvaśastrātigau senāṃ praviṣṭau rathasattamau
c dṛṣṭvā kāṃ vai dhṛtiṃ yuddhe pratyapadyanta māmakāḥ
a dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ tu dāśārham arjunārthe vyavasthitam
c śinīnām ṛṣabhaṃ caiva manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a dṛṣṭvā senāṃ vyatikrāntāṃ sātvatenārjunena ca
c palāyamānāṃś ca kurūn manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a vidrutān rathino dṛṣṭvā nirutsāhān dviṣajjaye
c palāyane kṛtotsāhān manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a śūnyān kṛtān rathopasthān sātvatenārjunena ca
c hatāṃś ca yodhān saṃdṛśya manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a vyaśvanāgarathān dṛṣṭvā tatra vīrān sahasraśaḥ
c dhāvamānān raṇe vyagrān manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a vivīrāṃś ca kṛtān aśvān virathāṃś ca kṛtān narān
c tatra sātyakipārthābhyāṃ manye śocanti putrakāḥ
d mahānāgān vidravato dṛṣṭvārjunaśarāhatān
d patitān patataś cānyān manye śocanti putrakāḥ
d hayaughān nihatān dṛṣṭvā drāvyamāṇāṃs tatas tataḥ
d raṇe sātvatapārthābhyāṃ manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a pattisaṃghān raṇe dṛṣṭvā dhāvamānāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
c nirāśā vijaye sarve manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a droṇasya samatikrāntāv anīkam aparājitau
c kṣaṇena dṛṣṭvā tau vīrau manye śocanti putrakāḥ
a saṃmūḍho 'smi bhṛśaṃ tāta śrutvā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
c praviṣṭau māmakaṃ sainyaṃ sātvatena sahācyutau
a tasmin praviṣṭe pṛtanāṃ śinīnāṃ pravare rathe
c bhojānīkaṃ vyatikrānte katham āsan hi kauravāḥ
a tathā droṇena samare nigṛhīteṣu pāṇḍuṣu
c kathaṃ yuddham abhūt tatra tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
a droṇo hi balavāñ śūraḥ kṛtāstro dṛḍhavikramaḥ
c pāñcālās taṃ maheṣvāsaṃ pratyayudhyan kathaṃ raṇe
a baddhavairās tathā droṇe dharmarājajayaiṣiṇaḥ
c bhāradvājas tathā teṣu kṛtavairo mahārathaḥ
a arjunaś cāpi yac cakre sindhurājavadhaṃ prati
c tan me sarvaṃ samācakṣva kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a ātmāparādhāt saṃbhūtaṃ vyasanaṃ bharatarṣabha
c prāpya prākṛtavad vīra na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
d purā yad ucyase prājñaiḥ suhṛdbhir vidurādibhiḥ
d māhārṣīḥ pāṇḍavān rājann iti tan na tvayā śrutam
d suhṛdāṃ hitakāmānāṃ vākyaṃ yo na śṛṇoti ha
d sa mahad vyasanaṃ prāpya śocate vai yathā bhavān
d yācito 'si purā rājan dāśārheṇa śamaṃ prati
d na ca taṃ labdhavān kāmaṃ tvattaḥ kṛṣṇo mahāyaśāḥ
a tava nirguṇatāṃ jñātvā pakṣapātaṃ suteṣu ca
c dvaidhībhāvaṃ tathā dharme pāṇḍaveṣu ca matsaram
d tava jihmam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā pāṇḍavān prati
e ārtapralāpāṃś ca bahūn manujādhipasattama
a sarvalokasya tattvajñaḥ sarvalokaguruḥ prabhuḥ
c vāsudevas tato yuddhaṃ kurūṇām akaron mahat
a ātmāparādhāt sumahān prāptas te vipulaḥ kṣayaḥ
b naivaṃ duryodhane doṣaṃ kartum arhasi mānada
c na hi te sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cid ādau madhye ca bhārata
e dṛśyate pṛṣṭhataś caiva tvanmūlo hi parājayaḥ
f ārtapralāpān iha yān idānīṃ kuruṣe nṛpa
f naitad vṛddhasya te sādhu gatāsor iva maṇḍalam
a tasmād adya sthiro bhūtvā jñātvā lokasya nirṇayam
c śṛṇu yuddhaṃ yathā vṛttaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam
a praviṣṭe tava sainyaṃ tu śaineye satyavikrame
c bhīmasenamukhāḥ pārthāḥ pratīyur vāhinīṃ tava
a āgacchatas tān sahasā kruddharūpān sahānugān
c dadhāraiko raṇe pāṇḍūn kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
a yathodvṛttaṃ dhārayate velā vai salilārṇavam
b udvṛttaṃ sāgaraṃ yadvad velā vārayate sadā
c pāṇḍusainyaṃ tathā saṃkhye hārdikyaḥ samavārayat

c yad enaṃ sahitāḥ pārthā nāticakramur āhave
a tato bhīmas tribhir viddhvā kṛtavarmāṇam āyasaiḥ
c śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau mahābāhur harṣayan sarvapāṇḍavān
a sahadevas tu viṃśatyā dharmarājaś ca pañcabhiḥ
c śatena nakulaś cāpi hārdikyaṃ samavidhyata
a draupadeyās trisaptatyā saptabhiś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
c dhṛṣṭadyumnas tribhiś cāpi kṛtavarmāṇam ārdayat
e virāṭo drupadaś caiva yājñaseniś ca pañcabhiḥ
a śikhaṇḍī cāpi hārdikyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
c punar vivyādha viṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ hasann iva
a kṛtavarmā tato rājan sarvatas tān mahārathān
c ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā bhīmaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
e dhanur dhvajaṃ ca saṃyatto rathād bhūmāv apātayat
a athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ tvaramāṇo mahārathaḥ
c ājaghānorasi kruddhaḥ saptatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

c cacāla rathamadhyasthaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥ

c visṛjantaḥ śarān ghorān kṛtavarmāṇam ārdayan
a taṃ tathā koṣṭhakīkṛtya rathavaṃśena māriṣa
c vivyadhuḥ sāyakair hṛṣṭā rakṣārthaṃ māruter mṛdhe

c śaktiṃ jagrāha samare hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīm
e cikṣepa ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmarathaṃ prati
a sā bhīmabhujanirmuktā nirmuktoragasaṃnibhā

c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ hārdikyo nicakarta dvidhā tadā
a sā chinnā patitā bhūmau śaktiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇā
c dyotayantī diśo rājan maholkeva divaś cyutā
e śaktiṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaś cukrodha vai bhṛśam
a tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya vegavat sumahāsvanam
c bhīmaseno raṇe kruddho hārdikyaṃ samavārayat

c bhīmo bhīmabalo rājaṃs tava durmantritena ha
a bhojas tu kṣatasarvāṅgo bhīmasenena māriṣa
c raktāśoka ivotphullo vyabhrājata raṇājire
a tataḥ kruddhas tribhir bāṇair bhīmasenaṃ hasann iva
c abhihatya dṛḍhaṃ yuddhe tān sarvān pratyavidhyata
a tribhis tribhir maheṣvāso yatamānān mahārathān
c te 'pi taṃ pratyavidhyanta saptabhiḥ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a śikhaṇḍinas tataḥ kruddhaḥ kṣurapreṇa mahārathaḥ
c dhanuś ciccheda samare prahasann iva bhārata
a śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ kruddhaś chinne dhanuṣi satvaram
c asiṃ jagrāha samare śatacandraṃ ca bhāsvaram
a bhrāmayitvā mahācarma cāmīkaravibhūṣitam
c tam asiṃ preṣayām āsa kṛtavarmarathaṃ prati
d   nistriṃśaṃ ca mahāprabham
d kṛtavarmāṇam uddiśya preṣayat tam asiṃ drutam
a sa tasya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ chittvā saṃkhye mahān asiḥ
c abhyagād dharaṇīṃ rājaṃś cyutaṃ jyotir ivāmbarāt
a etasminn eva kāle tu tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
c vivyadhuḥ sāyakair gāḍhaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam āhave
a athānyad dhanur ādāya tyaktvā tac ca mahad dhanuḥ
c viśīrṇaṃ bharataśreṣṭha hārdikyaḥ paravīrahā
a vivyādha pāṇḍavān yuddhe tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
c śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca vivyādha tribhiḥ pañcabhir eva ca
d punar anyena bāṇena dhanur asyācchinad drutam
d śikhaṇḍinaṃ tribhir bāṇaividdhvā ciccheda kārmukam
a dhanur anyat samādāya śikhaṇḍī tu mahāyaśāḥ
c avārayat kūrmanakhair āśugair hṛdikātmajam
a tataḥ kruddho raṇe rājan hṛdikasyātmasaṃbhavaḥ
c abhidudrāva vegena yājñaseniṃ mahāratham
a bhīṣmasya samare rājan mṛtyor hetuṃ mahātmanaḥ
c vidarśayan balaṃ śūraḥ śārdūla iva kuñjaram
a tau diśāgajasaṃkāśau jvalitāv iva pāvakau
c samāsedatur anyonyaṃ śarasaṃghair ariṃdamau
a vidhunvānau dhanuḥśreṣṭhe saṃdadhānau ca sāyakān
c visṛjantau ca śataśo gabhastīn iva bhāskarau
a tāpayantau śarais tīkṣṇair anyonyaṃ tau mahārathau
c yugāntapratimau vīrau rejatur bhāskarāv iva
a kṛtavarmā tu rabhasaṃ yājñaseniṃ mahāratham
c viddhveṣūṇāṃ trisaptatyā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
a sa gāḍhaviddho vyathito rathopastha upāviśat
c visṛjan saśaraṃ cāpaṃ mūrchayābhipariplutaḥ

c apovāha raṇād yantā tvaramāṇo mahāratham

c parivavrū rathais tūrṇaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam āhave
a tatrādbhutaṃ paraṃ cakre kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ

c kekayāṃś ca mahāvīryān kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
a te vadhyamānāḥ samare hārdikyena sma pāṇḍavāḥ
c itaś cetaś ca dhāvanto naiva cakrur dhṛtiṃ raṇe
a jitvā pāṇḍusutān yuddhe bhīmasenapurogamān
c hārdikyaḥ samare 'tiṣṭhad vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
a te drāvyamāṇāḥ samare hārdikyena mahārathāḥ
c vimukhāḥ samapadyanta śaravṛṣṭibhir arditāḥ
d lajjayāvanatā bhūtvā na kiṃ cit pravadanti te
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvaikamanā rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c drāvyamāṇe bale tasmin hārdikyena mahātmanā
a lajjayāvanate cāpi prahṛṣṭaiś caiva tāvakaiḥ
c dvīpo ya āsīt pāṇḍūnām agādhe gādham icchatām

d uvāca sārathiṃ tatra krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥ
d hārdikyābhimukhaṃ sūta kuru me ratham uttamam

d enaṃ jitvā punaḥ sūta yāsyāmi vijayaṃ prati

d nimeṣāntaramātreṇa kṛtavarmāṇam abhyayāt

c avākirat susaṃkruddhas tato 'krudhyata sātyakiḥ

c preṣayām āsa samare śarāṃś ca caturo 'parān

c yantāram abravīc chūraḥ śanair yāhīty asaṃbhramam

c padātijanasaṃpūrṇam abravīt sārathiṃ punaḥ

c duryodhanasamādiṣṭā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ
e rājaputrā maheṣvāsāḥ sarve vikrāntayodhinaḥ
f na cājitvā raṇe hy etāñ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ jayadrathaḥ
f nāpi pārtho mayā sūta śakyaḥ prāptuṃ kathaṃ cana
f ete tiṣṭhanti sahitāḥ sarve vidyāsu niṣṭhitāḥ
a trigartānāṃ rathodārāḥ suvarṇavikṛtadhvajāḥ
c mām evābhimukhā vīrā yotsyamānā vyavasthitāḥ

a tataḥ prāyāc chanaiḥ sūtaḥ sātvatasya mate sthitaḥ
c rathenādityavarṇena bhāsvareṇa patākinā
a tam ūhuḥ sārather vaśyā valgamānā hayottamāḥ
c vāyuvegasamāḥ saṃkhye kundendurajataprabhāḥ
d mārutasya gatau tulyāś candrakundanibhāḥ śubhāḥ

c parivavrus tataḥ śūrā gajānīkena sarvataḥ

a sātvato 'pi śitair bāṇair gajānīkam ayodhayat
c parvatān iva varṣeṇa tapānte jalado mahān
a vajrāśanisamasparśair vadhyamānāḥ śarair gajāḥ
c prādravan raṇam utsṛjya śinivīryasamīritaiḥ
a śīrṇadantā virudhirā bhinnamastakapiṇḍakāḥ
c viśīrṇakarṇāsyakarā viniyantṛpatākinaḥ
a saṃbhinnavarmaghaṇṭāś ca saṃnikṛttamahādhvajāḥ
c hatārohā diśo rājan bhejire bhraṣṭakambalāḥ
a ruvanto vividhān rāvāñ jaladopamanisvanāḥ

c   bhallair añjalikais tathā

d babhramuś caskhaluś cānye petur mamlus tathāpare

c yattaḥ saṃprāpayan nāgaṃ rajatāśvarathaṃ prati

c kuṇḍalī mukuṭī śaṅkhī raktacandanarūṣitaḥ

b sa vāryamāṇo bāṇaughaiḥ śaineyenātha vīryavān

c jalasaṃdhasya ciccheda vivyādha ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

b jalasaṃdham abhiprekṣya utsmayitvā ca mādhavaḥ

c palāyane kṛtotsāhā nirutsāhā dviṣajjaye

b saṃnyasya bhāraṃ sumahat kṛtavarmaṇi bhārata

c abhyayāj javanair aśvair yuyudhānaṃ mahāratham

d sahodarais tu saṃyuktaḥ sātyakiṃ samupādravat
d tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ satyakasya ca
a tam udīrṇaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā śaineyaṃ kurupuṃgavāḥ
c droṇenaiva saha kruddhāḥ sātyakiṃ paryavārayan
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ sātvatasya ca
c droṇasya ca raṇe rājan ghoraṃ devāsuropamam
 saṃjaya uvāca
 sātvatasya raṇe karma yoddhuṃ dṛṣṭvā mahārathāḥ
 amṛṣyamāṇāḥ saṃyattāḥ śaineyaṃ samupādravan
a te kirantaḥ śaravrātān sarve yattāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c tvaramāṇā mahārāja yuyudhānam ayodhayan
a taṃ droṇaḥ saptasaptatyā jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c durmarṣaṇo dvādaśabhir duḥsaho daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a vikarṇaś cāpi niśitais triṃśadbhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
c vivyādha savye pārśve tu stanābhyām antare tathā
a durmukho daśabhir bāṇais tathā duḥśāsano 'ṣṭabhiḥ
c citrasenaś ca śaineyaṃ dvābhyāṃ vivyādha māriṣa
a duryodhanaś ca mahatā śaravarṣeṇa mādhavam
c apīḍayad raṇe rājañ śūrāś cānye mahārathāḥ
a sarvataḥ pratividdhas tu tava putrair mahārathaiḥ
b sa tudyamānaś ca tathā sarvataḥ kurupuṃgavaiḥ
c tān pratyavidhyac chaineyaḥ pṛthak pṛthag ajihmagaiḥ
d sātyakiḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo hy astreṣu pariniṣṭhitaḥ
a bhāradvājaṃ tribhir bāṇair duḥsahaṃ navabhis tathā
c vikarṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā citrasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
d daśabhiś citrasenaṃ ca vikarṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā
a durmarṣaṇaṃ dvādaśabhiś caturbhiś ca viviṃśatim
c satyavrataṃ ca navabhir vijayaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
d duryodhanaṃ tribhir viddhvā supuṃkhais tigmatejasaiḥ
a tato rukmāṅgadaṃ cāpaṃ vidhunvāno mahārathaḥ
c abhyayāt sātyakis tūrṇaṃ putraṃ tava mahāratham
a rājānaṃ sarvalokasya sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
c śarair abhyāhanad gāḍhaṃ tato yuddham abhūt tayoḥ
d tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ kurumādhavavīrayoḥ
a vimuñcantau śarāṃs tīkṣṇān saṃdadhānau ca sāyakān
c adṛśyaṃ samare 'nyonyaṃ cakratus tau mahārathau
a sātyakiḥ kururājena nirviddho bahv aśobhata
c asravad rudhiraṃ bhūri svarasaṃ candano yathā
a sātvatena ca bāṇaughair nirviddhas tanayas tava
c śātakumbhamayāpīḍo babhau yūpa ivocchritaḥ
a mādhavas tu raṇe rājan kururājasya dhanvinaḥ
c dhanuś ciccheda sahasā kṣurapreṇa hasann iva
e athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ śarair bahubhir ācinot
a nirbhinnaś ca śarais tena dviṣatā kṣiprakāriṇā
c nāmṛṣyata raṇe rājā śatror vijayalakṣaṇam
a athānyad dhanur ādāya hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadam
c vivyādha sātyakiṃ tūrṇaṃ sāyakānāṃ śatena ha
a so 'tividdho balavatā putreṇa tava dhanvinā
c amarṣavaśam āpannas tava putram apīḍayat
a pīḍitaṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrā mahārathāḥ
c sātvataṃ śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsur añjasā
a sa chādyamāno bahubhis tava putrair mahārathaiḥ
c ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
a duryodhanaṃ ca tvarito vivyādhāṣṭabhir āśugaiḥ
c prahasaṃś cāsya ciccheda kārmukaṃ ripubhīṣaṇam
a nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ caiva śarair dhvajam apātayat
c hatvā tu caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
e sārathiṃ pātayām āsa kṣurapreṇa mahāyaśāḥ
a etasminn antare caiva kururājaṃ mahāratham
c avākirac charair hṛṣṭo bahubhir marmabhedibhiḥ
a sa vadhyamānaḥ samare śaineyasya śarottamaiḥ
c prādravat sahasā rājan putro duryodhanas tava
e āplutaś ca tato yānaṃ citrasenasya dhanvinaḥ
a hāhābhūtaṃ jagac cāsīd dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhave
c grasyamānaṃ sātyakinā khe somam iva rāhuṇā
a taṃ tu śabdaṃ mahac chrutvā kṛtavarmā mahārathaḥ
c abhyayāt sahasā tatra yatrāste mādhavaḥ prabhuḥ
a vidhunvāno dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ codayaṃś caiva vājinaḥ
c bhartsayan sārathiṃ cograṃ yāhi yāhīti satvaraḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya vyāditāsyam ivāntakam
c yuyudhāno mahārāja yantāram idam abravīt
a kṛtavarmā rathenaiṣa drutam āpatate śarī
c pratyudyāhi rathenainaṃ pravaraṃ sarvadhanvinām
d prayāhi satvaraṃ sūta rathena rathasattamam
d nihaniṣyāmi taṃ saṃkhe vṛṣṇivīram ariṃdamam
a tataḥ prajavitāśvena vidhivat kalpitena ca
c āsasāda raṇe bhojaṃ pratimānaṃ dhanuṣmatām
a tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhau jvalantāv iva pāvakau
c sameyātāṃ naravyāghrau vyāghrāv iva tarasvinau
a kṛtavarmā tu śaineyaṃ ṣaḍviṃśatyā samārpayat
c niśitaiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇair yantāraṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
a caturaś ca hayodārāṃś caturbhiḥ parameṣubhiḥ
c avidhyat sādhudāntān vai saindhavān sātvatasya ha
a rukmadhvajo rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahad visphārya kārmukam
c rukmāṅgadī rukmavarmā rukmapuṅkhān avākirat
a tato 'śītiṃ śineḥ pautraḥ sāyakān kṛtavarmaṇe
c prāhiṇot tvarayā yukto draṣṭukāmo dhanaṃjayam
a so 'tividdho balavatā śatruṇā śatrutāpanaḥ
c samakampata durdharṣaḥ kṣitikampe yathācalaḥ
d acalaḥ sa purā bhūtvā samakampata māriṣa
a triṣaṣṭyā caturo 'syāśvān saptabhiḥ sārathiṃ śaraiḥ
c vivyādha niśitais tūrṇaṃ sātyakiḥ kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
d hatāśvasūte tu rathe sthitāya śinipuṃgavaḥ
a suvarṇapuṅkhaṃ viśikhaṃ samādhāya sa sātyakiḥ
c vyasṛjat taṃ mahājvālaṃ saṃkruddham iva pannagam
d praiṣayat sātyako bāṇaṃ hārdikyasya nararṣabhaḥ
a so 'viśat kṛtavarmāṇaṃ yamadaṇḍopamaḥ śaraḥ
c jāmbūnadavicitraṃ ca varma nirbhidya bhānumat
d sahemavikṛtaṃ varma nirbhidya kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
e abhyagād dharaṇīm ugro rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥ
a saṃjātarudhiraś cājau sātvateṣubhir arditaḥ
c pracalan dhanur utsṛjya nyapatat syandanottame
a sa siṃhadaṃṣṭro jānubhyām āpanno 'mitavikramaḥ
c śarārditaḥ sātyakinā rathopasthe nararṣabhaḥ
a sahasrabāhoḥ sadṛśam akṣobhyam iva sāgaram
c nivārya kṛtavarmāṇaṃ sātyakiḥ prayayau tataḥ
d na hi tasya raṇe pārthaḥ kathaṃ cid api bhārata
d didṛkṣuḥ sa hi vegena prāyād yatra dhanaṃjayaḥ
d svaśaktyā kṣatriyais tatra niruddho balavattaraḥ
d yuyudhe sātvato rājan didṛkṣuḥ pāṇḍunandanam
a khaḍgaśaktidhanuḥkīrṇāṃ gajāśvarathasaṃkulām
c pravartitograrudhirāṃ śataśaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaiḥ
a prekṣatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ madhyena śinipuṃgavaḥ
c abhyagād vāhinīṃ bhittvā vṛtrahevāsurīṃ camūm
a samāśvāsya ca hārdikyo gṛhya cānyan mahad dhanuḥ
c tasthau tatraiva balavān vārayan yudhi pāṇḍavān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a kālyamāneṣu sainyeṣu śaineyena tatas tataḥ
c bhāradvājaḥ śaravrātair mahadbhiḥ samavākirat
a sa saṃprahāras tumulo droṇasātvatayor abhūt
c paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ balivāsavayor iva
d prāvartata mahāraudraḥ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
d śaineyasya ca rājendra bhāradvājasya cobhayoḥ
a tato droṇaḥ śineḥ pautraṃ citraiḥ sarvāyasaiḥ śaraiḥ
c tribhir āśīviṣākārair lalāṭe samavidhyata
a tair lalāṭārpitair bāṇair yuyudhānas tv ajihmagaiḥ
c vyarocata mahārāja triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
a tato 'sya bāṇān aparān indrāśanisamasvanān
c bhāradvājo 'ntaraprekṣī preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
a tān droṇacāpanirmuktān dāśārhaḥ patataḥ śarān
c dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ supuṅkhābhyāṃ ciccheda paramāstravit
a tām asya laghutāṃ droṇaḥ samavekṣya viśāṃ pate
c prahasya sahasāvidhyad viṃśatyā śinipuṃgavam
a punaḥ pañcāśateṣūṇāṃ śatena ca samārpayat
c laghutāṃ yuyudhānasya lāghavena viśeṣayan
a samutpatanti valmīkād yathā kruddhā mahoragāḥ
c tathā droṇarathād rājann utpatanti tanucchidaḥ
a tathaiva yuyudhānena sṛṣṭāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
c avākiran droṇarathaṃ śarā rudhirabhojanāḥ
a lāghavād dvijamukhyasya sātvatasya ca māriṣa
c viśeṣaṃ nādhyagacchāma samāvāstāṃ nararṣabhau
a sātyakis tu tato droṇaṃ navabhir nataparvabhiḥ
c ājaghāna bhṛśaṃ kruddho dhvajaṃ ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
e sārathiṃ ca śatenaiva bhāradvājasya paśyataḥ
a lāghavaṃ yuyudhānasya dṛṣṭvā droṇo mahārathaḥ
c saptatyā sātyakiṃ viddhvā turagāṃś ca tribhis tribhiḥ
e dhvajam ekena vivyādha mādhavasya rathe sthitam
a athāpareṇa bhallena hemapuṅkhena patriṇā
c dhanuś ciccheda samare mādhavasya mahātmanaḥ
a sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddho dhanus tyaktvā mahārathaḥ
c gadāṃ jagrāha mahatīṃ bhāradvājāya cākṣipat
a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā paṭṭabaddhām ayasmayīm
c nyavārayac charair droṇo bahubhir bahurūpibhiḥ
a athānyad dhanur ādāya sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
c vivyādha bahubhir vīraṃ bhāradvājaṃ śilāśitaiḥ
a sa viddhvā samare droṇaṃ siṃhanādam amuñcata
c taṃ vai na mamṛṣe droṇaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a tathaḥ śaktiṃ gṛhītvā tu rukmadaṇḍām ayasmayīm
c tarasā preṣayām āsa mādhavasya rathaṃ prati
a anāsādya tu śaineyaṃ sā śaktiḥ kālasaṃnibhā
c bhittvā rathaṃ jagāmogrā dharaṇīṃ dāruṇasvanā
a tato droṇaṃ śineḥ pautro rājan vivyādha patriṇā
c dakṣiṇaṃ bhujam āsādya pīḍayan bharatarṣabha
d mādhavo 'pi mahārāja brāhmaṇaṃ pīḍayann iva
a droṇo 'pi samare rājan mādhavasya mahad dhanuḥ
c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda rathaśaktyā ca sārathim
a mumoha sarathis tasya rathaśaktyā samāhataḥ
c sa rathopastham āsādya muhūrtaṃ saṃnyaṣīdata
a cakāra sātyakī rājaṃs tatra karmātimānuṣam
c ayodhayac ca yad droṇaṃ raśmīñ jagrāha ca svayam
a tataḥ śaraśatenaiva yuyudhāno mahārathaḥ
c avidhyad brāhmaṇaṃ saṃkhye hṛṣṭarūpo viśāṃ pate
a tasya droṇaḥ śarān pañca preṣayām āsa bhārata
c te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā papuḥ śoṇitam āhave
a nirviddhas tu śarair ghorair akrudhyat sātyakir bhṛśam
c sāyakān vyasṛjac cāpi vīro rukmarathaṃ prati
a tato droṇasya yantāraṃ nipātyaikeṣuṇā bhuvi
c aśvān vyadrāvayad bāṇair hatasūtān mahātmanaḥ
a sa rathaḥ pradrutaḥ saṃkhye maṇḍalāni sahasraśaḥ
c cakāra rājato rājan bhrājamāna ivāṃśumān
d tataḥ sārathinaṃ hatvā droṇasyāpātayad rathāt
d śoṇāśvāś ca rathaṃ gṛhya dudruvuḥ sarvatodiśam
a abhidravata gṛhṇīta hayān droṇasya dhāvata
c iti sma cukruśuḥ sarve rājaputrāḥ sarājakāḥ
a te sātyakim apāsyāśu rājan yudhi mahārathāḥ
c yato droṇas tataḥ sarve sahasā samupādravan
a tān dṛṣṭvā pradrutān sarvān sātvatena śarārditān
c prabhagnaṃ punar evāsīt tava sainyaṃ samākulam
a vyūhasyaiva punar dvāraṃ gatvā droṇo vyavasthitaḥ
c vātāyamānais tair aśvair hṛto vṛṣṇiśarārditaiḥ
a pāṇḍupāñcālasaṃbhagnaṃ vyūham ālokya vīryavān
c śaineye nākarod yatnaṃ vyūhasyaivābhirakṣaṇe
a nivārya pāṇḍupāñcālān droṇāgniḥ pradahann iva
c tasthau krodhāgnisaṃdīptaḥ kālasūrya ivoditaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a droṇaṃ sa jitvā puruṣapravīras
tathaiva hārdikyamukhāṃs tvadīyān
c prahasya sūtaṃ vacanaṃ babhāṣe
śinipravīraḥ kurupuṃgavāgrya
a nimittamātraṃ vayam atra sūta
dagdhārayaḥ keśavaphalgunābhyām
c hatān nihanmeha nararṣabheṇa
vayaṃ sureśātmasamudbhavena
d hatān nihantāsmi kirīṭamālinā
d hy ahaṃ sabhīmaḥ saha pārṣatena
a tam evam uktvā śinipuṃgavas tadā
mahāmṛdhe so 'gryadhanurdharo 'rihā
c kiran samantāt sahasā śarān balī
samāpatac chyena ivāmiṣaṃ yathā
a taṃ yāntam aśvaiḥ śaśiśaṅkhavarṇair
vigāhya sainyaṃ puruṣapravīram
c nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ samantād
ādityaraśmipratimaṃ narāgryam
a asahyavikrāntam adīnasattvaṃ
sarve gaṇā bhārata durviṣahyam
c sahasranetrapratimaprabhāvaṃ
divīva sūryaṃ jaladavyapāye
a amarṣapūrṇas tv aticitrayodhī
śarāsanī kāñcanavarmadhārī
c sudarśanaḥ sātyakim āpatantaṃ
nyavārayad rājavaraḥ prasahya
a tayor abhūd bharata saṃprahāraḥ
sudāruṇas taṃ samabhipraśaṃsan
c yodhās tvadīyāś ca hi somakāś ca
vṛtrendrayor yuddham ivāmaraughāḥ
a śaraiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ śataśo 'bhyavidhyat
sudarśanaḥ sātvatamukhyam ājau
c anāgatān eva tu tān pṛṣatkāṃś
ciccheda bāṇaiḥ śinipuṃgavo 'pi
a tathaiva śakrapratimo 'pi sātyakiḥ
sudarśane yān kṣipati sma sāyakān
c dvidhā tridhā tān akarot sudarśanaḥ
śarottamaiḥ syandanavaryam āsthitaḥ
a saṃprekṣya bāṇān nihatāṃs tadānīṃ
sudarśanaḥ sātyakibāṇavegaiḥ
c krodhād didhakṣann iva tigmatejāḥ
śarān amuñcat tapanīyacitrān
a punaḥ sa bāṇais tribhir agnikalpair
ākarṇapūrṇair niśitaiḥ supuṅkhaiḥ
c vivyādha dehāvaraṇaṃ vibhidya
te sātyaker āviviśuḥ śarīram
a tathaiva tasyāvanipālaputraḥ
saṃdhāya bāṇair aparair jvaladbhiḥ
c ājaghnivāṃs tān rajataprakāśāṃś
caturbhir aśvāṃś caturaḥ prasahya
a tathā tu tenābhihatas tarasvī
naptā śiner indrasamānavīryaḥ
c sudarśanasyeṣugaṇaiḥ sutīkṣṇair
hayān nihatyāśu nanāda nādam
a athāsya sūtasya śiro nikṛtya
bhallena vajrāśanisaṃnibhena
c sudarśanasyāpi śinipravīraḥ
kṣureṇa ciccheda śiraḥ prasahya
a sakuṇḍalaṃ pūrṇaśaśiprakāśaṃ
bhrājiṣṇu vaktraṃ nicakarta dehāt
c yathā purā vajradharaḥ prasahya
balasya saṃkhye 'tibalasya rājan
a nihatya taṃ pārthivaputrapautraṃ
raṇe yadūnām ṛṣabhas tarasvī
c mudā sametaḥ parayā mahātmā
rarāja rājan surarājakalpaḥ
d mudā mahatyābhiyuto mahātmā
d mahāhave śakra ivāmareśaḥ
a tato yayāv arjunam eva yena
nivārya sainyaṃ tava mārgaṇaughaiḥ
c sadaśvayuktena rathena niryāl
lokān visismāpayiṣur nṛvīraḥ
a tat tasya vismāpayanīyam agryam
apūjayan yodhavarāḥ sametāḥ
c yad vartamānān iṣugocare 'rīn
dadāha bāṇair hutabhug yathaiva
 saṃjaya uvāca
 nirjitya kṛtavarmāṇaṃ bhāradvājaṃ ca saṃyuge
a tataḥ sa sātyakir dhīmān mahātmā vṛṣṇipuṃgavaḥ
b duryodhanaṃ ca nirjitya śūraṃ caiva sudarśanam
b jalasaṃdhaṃ nihatyājau śūrasenaṃ ca pārthivam
b mlecchāṃś ca bahudhā rājan kāśyaputraṃ ca saṃyuge
b niṣādāṃs taṃkaṇāṃś caiva kaliṃgān magadhān api
b kekayāñ śūrasenāṃś ca tathā parvatavāsinaḥ
b kāmbojān yavanāṃś caiva vasātīṃś ca śibīn api
b kosalān magadhāṃś caiva yātudhānān satittirān
b etāṃś cānyān raṇe hatvāgacchad yuddhe sa sātyakiḥ
b rudhiraughanadīṃ ghorāṃ keśaśaivalaśāḍvalām
b śaktigrāhasamākīrṇāṃ chattrahaṃsopaśobhitām
b dustarāṃ bhīrubhir nityaṃ śūralokapravāhinīm
c sudarśanaṃ nihatyājau yantāram idam abravīt
a rathāśvanāgakalilaṃ śaraśaktyūrmimālinam
c khaḍgamatsyaṃ gadāgrāhaṃ śūrāyudhamahāsvanam
a prāṇāpahāriṇaṃ raudraṃ vāditrotkruṣṭanāditam
c yodhānām asukhasparśaṃ durdharṣam ajayaiṣiṇām
a tīrṇāḥ sma dustaraṃ tāta droṇānīkamahārṇavam
c jalasaṃdhabalenājau puruṣādair ivāvṛtam
d śauryasattvabalopetaṃ śūravāṇijasevitam
a ato 'nyaṃ pṛtanāśeṣaṃ manye kunadikām iva
c tartavyām alpasalilāṃ codayāśvān asaṃbhramam
a hastaprāptam ahaṃ manye sāṃprataṃ savyasācinam
c nirjitya durdharaṃ droṇaṃ sapadānugam āhave
a hārdikyaṃ yodhavaryaṃ ca prāptaṃ manye dhanaṃjayam
c na hi me jāyate trāso dṛṣṭvā sainyāny anekaśaḥ
e vahner iva pradīptasya grīṣme śuṣkaṃ tṛṇolapam
a paśya pāṇḍavamukhyena yātāṃ bhūmiṃ kirīṭinā
c pattyaśvarathanāgaughaiḥ patitair viṣamīkṛtām
d dravate tad yathā sainyaṃ tena bhagnaṃ mahātmanā
d rathair viparidhāvadbhir gajair aśvaiś ca sārathe
d kauśeyāruṇasaṃkāśam etad uddhūyate rajaḥ
a abhyāśastham ahaṃ manye śvetāśvaṃ kṛṣṇasārathim
c sa eṣa śrūyate śabdo gāṇḍīvasyāmitaujasaḥ
d śrūyate hy eṣa nirghoṣo jaladasyeva garjataḥ
d viṣphāryamāṇasya raṇe gāṇḍīvasyāmitaujasaḥ
d abhyāśastham ahaṃ manye saindhavasya kirīṭinam

a yādṛśāni nimittāni mama prādurbhavanti vai

c yatraite satanutrāṇāḥ suyodhanapurogamāḥ
a daṃśitāḥ krūrakarmāṇaḥ kāmbojā yuddhadurmadāḥ
c śarabāṇāsanadharā yavanāś ca prahāriṇaḥ

a etān sarathanāgāśvān nihatyājau sapattinaḥ
c idaṃ durgaṃ mahāghoraṃ tīrṇam evopadhāraya
 sūta uvāca
a na saṃbhramo me vārṣṇeya vidyate satyavikrama
c yady api syāt susaṃkruddho jāmadagnyo 'grataḥ sthitaḥ
a droṇo vā rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛpo madreśvaro 'pi vā
c tathāpi saṃbhramo na syāt tvām āśritya mahābhuja

e kim u caitat samāsādya vīra saṃyugagoṣpadam

 sātyakir uvāca
a muṇḍān etān haniṣyāmi dānavān iva vāsavaḥ
c pratijñāṃ pārayiṣyāmi kāmbojān eva mā vaha

a adya drakṣyanti me vīryaṃ kauravāḥ sasuyodhanāḥ
b pārthivās tasya vividhaṃ mahāstrasya prayojanam

c hatvā rājasahasrāṇi darśayiṣyāmi rājasu

d śastrāhatāḥ patanty urvyāṃ kāmbojāḥ sapadānugāḥ

d tatra tatra mahī bhāti pañcāsyair iva pannagaiḥ

c jitāḥ saṃkhye mahārāja yuyudhānena daṃśitāḥ
a pārṣṇibhiś ca kaśābhiś ca tāḍayantas turaṃgamān
c javam uttamam āsthāya sarvataḥ prādravan bhayāt

a sa tataḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
c prahṛṣṭas tāvakāñ jitvā sūtaṃ yāhīty acodayat

 saṃjaya uvāca
a jitvā yavanakāmbojān yuyudhānas tato 'rjunam

c rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahāvegaṃ rukmacandrakasaṃkulam

c mārutoddhūtavegasya sāgarasyeva parvaṇi

a śakuniḥ pañcaviṃśatyā citrasenaś ca pañcabhiḥ

a duḥśāsanaś ca daśabhir duḥsahaś ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

a kathaṃ caiṣāṃ tathā yuddhe dhṛtir āsīn mumūrṣatām

a nirjitya samare droṇaṃ kṛtinaṃ yuddhadurmadam

d na śakyaḥ samare jetuṃ nihaniṣyati me sutān

c yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān yuddhaṃ śiner naptā mahāyaśāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tava durmantrite rājan duryodhanakṛtena ca
c śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā yat te vakṣyāmi bhārata

d duryodhanāpanītena tava durmantritena ca

c parāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā putrasya tava śāsanāt

c śakāḥ kāmbojabāhlīkā yavanāḥ pāradās tathā
a kuṇindās taṅgaṇāmbaṣṭhāḥ paiśācāś ca samandarāḥ
c abhyadravanta śaineyaṃ śalabhāḥ pāvakaṃ yathā
a yuktāś ca pārvatīyānāṃ rathāḥ pāṣāṇayodhinām

a tato rathasahasreṇa mahārathaśatena ca
c dviradānāṃ sahasreṇa dvisāhasraiś ca vājibhiḥ
d niyutaiś ca padātyaughair vividhāyudhapāṇibhiḥ
a śaravarṣāṇi muñcanto vividhāni mahārathāḥ
c abhyadravanta śaineyam asaṃkhyeyāś ca pattayaḥ
a tāṃś ca saṃcodayan sarvān ghnatainam iti bhārata
c duḥśāsano mahārāja sātyaktiṃ paryavārayat
a tatrādbhutam apaśyāma śaineyacaritaṃ mahat
c yad eko bahubhiḥ sārdham asaṃbhrāntam ayudhyata
a avadhīc ca rathānīkaṃ dviradānāṃ ca tad balam
c sādinaś caiva tān sarvān dasyūn api ca sarvaśaḥ
d saṃprādravan mahat sainyaṃ bhagnaṃ ca bahudhā śaraiḥ
a tatra cakrair vimathitair bhagnaiś ca paramāyudhaiḥ
c akṣaiś ca bahudhā bhagnair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥ
a kūbarair mathitaiś cāpi dhvajaiś cāpi nipātitaiḥ
c varmabhiś cāmaraiś caiva vyavakīrṇā vasuṃdharā
a sragbhir ābharaṇair vastrair anukarṣaiś ca māriṣa
c saṃchannā vasudhā tatra dyaur grahair iva bhārata
a girirūpadharāś cāpi patitāḥ kuñjarottamāḥ
b mlecchāsthitair mahārāja bhinnāñjanacayopamaiḥ
b mṛgair mandaiś ca bhadraiś ca mṛgamandais tathāparaiḥ
b bhadrair mandamanobhiś ca mṛgabhadrais tathaiva ca
b mandair mandamadaiś caiva tathā mandamṛgair api
b tatra tatra dharākīrṇā śayānaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ
c añjanasya kule jātā vāmanasya ca bhārata
e supratīkakule jātā mahāpadmakule tathā
a airāvaṇakule caiva tathānyeṣu kuleṣu ca
c jātā dantivarā rājañ śerate bahavo hatāḥ
d kumudasya tathā nāgā airāvatakulodbhavāḥ
d nihatāḥ satyakenājau nārācair agnisaṃnibhaiḥ
a vanāyujān pārvatīyān kāmbojāraṭṭabāhlikān
c tathā hayavarān rājan nijaghne tatra sātyakiḥ
a nānādeśasamutthāṃś ca nānājātyāṃś ca pattinaḥ
c nijaghne tatra śaineyaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a teṣu prakālyamāneṣu dasyūn duḥśāsano 'bravīt
c nivartadhvam adharmajñā yudhyadhvaṃ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
a tāṃś cāpi sarvān saṃprekṣya putro duḥśāsanas tava
c pāṣāṇayodhinaḥ śūrān pārvatīyān acodayat
a aśmayuddheṣu kuśalā naitaj jānāti sātyakiḥ
c aśmayuddham ajānantaṃ ghnatainaṃ yuddhakāmukam
a tathaiva kuravaḥ sarve nāśmayuddhaviśāradāḥ
c abhidravata mā bhaiṣṭa na vaḥ prāpsyati sātyakiḥ
d te pārvatīyā rājānaḥ sarve pāṣāṇapāṇayaḥ
d abhyadravanta śaineyaṃ rājānam iva mantriṇaḥ
a tato gajaśiśuprakhyair upalaiḥ śailavāsinaḥ
c udyatair yuyudhānasya sthitā maraṇakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a kṣepaṇīyais tathāpy anye sātvatasya vadhaiṣiṇaḥ
c coditās tava putreṇa rurudhuḥ sarvatodiśam
d śaineyam abhyadhāvaṃs te grāvabhir dṛḍhahastavat
d mlecchāḥ pipāsavaḥ prājñā rājānam iva mantriṇaḥ
a teṣām āpatatām eva śilāyuddhaṃ cikīrṣatām
c sātyakiḥ pratisaṃdhāya triṃśataṃ prāhiṇoc charān
a tām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ tumulāṃ pārvatīyaiḥ samīritām
c bibhedoragasaṃkāśair nārācaiḥ śinipuṃgavaḥ
a tair aśmacūrṇair dīpyadbhiḥ khadyotānām iva vrajaiḥ
c prāyaḥ sainyāny avadhyanta hāhābhūtāni māriṣa
a tataḥ pañcaśatāḥ śūrāḥ samudyatamahāśilāḥ
c nikṛttabāhavo rājan nipetur dharaṇītale
d punar daśaśatāś cānye śatasāhasriṇas tathā
d sopalair bāhubhiś chinnaiḥ petur aprāpya sātyakim
d sātvatasya ca bhallena niṣpiṣṭais tais tathādribhiḥ
d nipatan nihatā mlecchās tatra tatra gatāsavaḥ
d te hanyamānāḥ samare sātvatena mahātmanā
d aśmavṛṣṭiṃ mahāghorāṃ pātayanti sma sātvate
a pāṣāṇayodhinaḥ śūrān yatamānān avasthitān
c avadhīd bahusāhasrāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tataḥ punar bastamukhair aśmavṛṣṭiṃ samantataḥ
c ayohastaiḥ śūlahastair daradaiḥ khaśataṅgaṇaiḥ
a ambaṣṭhaiś ca kuṇindaiś ca kṣiptāṃ kṣiptāṃ sa sātyakiḥ
c nārācaiḥ prativivyādha prekṣamāṇo mahābalaḥ
a adrīṇāṃ bhidyamānānām antarikṣe śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c śabdena prādravan rājan gajāśvarathapattayaḥ
a aśmacūrṇaiḥ samākīrṇā manuṣyāś ca vayāṃsi ca
c nāśaknuvann avasthātuṃ bhramarair iva daṃśitāḥ
a hataśiṣṭā virudhirā bhinnamastakapiṇḍikāḥ
b vibhinnaśiraso rājan dantaiś chinnaiś ca dantinaḥ
b nirdhūtaiś ca karair nāgā vyaṅgāś ca śataśaḥ kṛtāḥ
b hatvā pañcaśatān yodhān sa kṣaṇenaiva māriṣa
b vyacarat pṛtanāmadhye śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavat
c kuñjarāḥ saṃnyavartanta yuyudhānarathaṃ prathi
d aśmanāṃ bhidyamānānāṃ sāyakaiḥ śrūyate dhvaniḥ
d padmapatreṣu dhārāṇāṃ patantīnām iva dhvaniḥ
a tataḥ śabdaḥ samabhavat tava sainyasya māriṣa
c mādhavenārdyamānasya sāgarasyeva dāruṇaḥ
a taṃ śabdaṃ tumulaṃ śrutvā droṇo yantāram abravīt
c eṣa sūta raṇe kruddhaḥ sātvatānāṃ mahārathaḥ
a dārayan bahudhā sainyaṃ raṇe carati kālavat
c yatraiṣa śabdas tumulas tatra sūta rathaṃ naya
a pāṣāṇayodhibhir nūnaṃ yuyudhānaḥ samāgataḥ
c tathā hi rathinaḥ sarve hriyante vidrutair hayaiḥ
a viśastrakavacā rugṇās tatra tatra patanti ca
c na śaknuvanti yantāraḥ saṃyantuṃ tumule hayān
a ity evaṃ bruvato rājan bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
c pratyuvāca tato yantā droṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
a āyuṣman dravate sainyaṃ kauraveyaṃ samantataḥ
b āyuṣman vidravaty eva kurūṇāṃ sainyam āturam
c paśya yodhān raṇe bhinnān dhāvamānāṃs tatas tataḥ
a ete ca sahitāḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
c tvām eva hi jighāṃsantaḥ prādravanti samantataḥ
a atra kāryaṃ samādhatsva prāptakālam ariṃdama
c sthāne vā gamane vāpi dūraṃ yātaś ca sātyakiḥ
a tathaivaṃ vadatas tasya bhāradvājasya māriṣa
c pratyadṛśyata śaineyo nighnan bahuvidhān rathān
a te vadhyamānāḥ samare yuyudhānena tāvakāḥ
c yuyudhānarathaṃ tyaktvā droṇānīkāya dudruvuḥ
a yais tu duḥśāsanaḥ sārdhaṃ rathaiḥ pūrvaṃ nyavartata
c te bhītās tv abhyadhāvanta sarve droṇarathaṃ prati
 saṃjaya uvāca
a duḥśāsanarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā samīpe paryavasthitam
c bhāradvājas tato vākyaṃ duḥśāsanam athābravīt
a duḥśāsana rathāḥ sarve kasmād ete pravidrutāḥ
c kaccit kṣemaṃ tu nṛpateḥ kaccij jīvati saindhavaḥ
a rājaputro bhavān atra rājabhrātā mahārathaḥ
c kimarthaṃ dravase yuddhe yauvarājyam avāpya hi
d dāsī jitāsi dyūte tvaṃ yathākāmacarī bhava
d vāsasāṃ vāhikā rājño bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya me bhava
d na santi patayaḥ sarve te 'dya ṣaṇḍhatilaiḥ samāḥ
d duḥśāsanaivam uktvā tvaṃ pūrvaṃ kasmāt palāyase
a svayaṃ vairaṃ mahat kṛtvā pāñcālaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
c ekaṃ sātyakim āsādya kathaṃ bhīto 'si saṃyuge
a na jānīṣe purā tvaṃ tu gṛhṇann akṣān durodare
c śarā hy ete bhaviṣyanti dāruṇāśīviṣopamāḥ
a apriyāṇāṃ ca vacanaṃ pāṇḍaveṣu viśeṣataḥ
c draupadyāś ca parikleśas tvanmūlo hy abhavat purā
a kva te mānaś ca darpaś ca kva ca tad vīra garjitam
c āśīviṣasamān pārthān kopayitvā kva yāsyasi
a śocyeyaṃ bhāratī senā rājā caiva suyodhanaḥ
c yasya tvaṃ karkaśo bhrātā palāyanaparāyaṇaḥ
a nanu nāma tvayā vīra dīryamāṇā bhayārditā
c svabāhubalam āsthāya rakṣitavyā hy anīkinī
e sa tvam adya raṇaṃ tyaktvā bhīto harṣayase parān
a vidrute tvayi sainyasya nāyake śatrusūdana
c ko 'nyaḥ sthāsyati saṃgrāme bhīto bhīte vyapāśraye
a ekena sātvatenādya yudhyamānasya cānagha
c palāyane tava matiḥ saṃgrāmād dhi pravartate
a yadā gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca kaurava
c yamau ca yudhi draṣṭāsi tadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi
a yudhi phalgunabāṇānāṃ sūryāgnisamatejasām
c na tulyāḥ sātyakiśarā yeṣāṃ bhītaḥ palāyase
d tvarito vīra gaccha tvaṃ gāndhāry udaram āviśa
d pṛthivyāṃ dhāvamānasya na saṃpaśyāmi te śamam
a yadi tāvat kṛtā buddhiḥ palāyanaparāyaṇā
c pṛthivī dharmarājasya śamenaiva pradīyatām
a yāvat phalgunanārācā nirmuktoragasaṃnibhāḥ
c nāviśanti śarīraṃ te tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
a yāvat te pṛthivīṃ pārthā hatvā bhrātṛśataṃ raṇe
c nākṣipanti mahātmānas tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
a yāvan na krudhyate rājā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c kṛṣṇaś ca samaraślāghī tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
a yāvad bhīmo mahābāhur vigāhya mahatīṃ camūm
c sodarāṃs te na mṛdnāti tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
d mayā śamavatā cokto rakṣa śeṣaṃ suyodhana
d saṃśāmya vīra pārthais tvaṃ rakṣa sarvān mahīkṣitaḥ
a pūrvam uktaś ca te bhrātā bhīṣmeṇa sa suyodhanaḥ
c ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃkhye saumya saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
e na ca tat kṛtavān mandas tava bhrātā suyodhanaḥ
f tavāpi śoṇitaṃ bhīmaḥ pāsyatīti mayā śrutam
f tac cāpy avitathaṃ tasya tat tathaiva bhaviṣyati
f kiṃ bhīmasya na jānāsi vikramaṃ tvaṃ subāliśa
f yena te vairam ārabdhaṃ saṃyuge prapalāyatā
a sa yuddhe dhṛtim āsthāya yatto yudhyasva pāṇḍavaiḥ
c gaccha tūrṇaṃ rathenaiva tatra tiṣṭhati sātyakiḥ
a tvayā hīnaṃ balaṃ hy etad vidraviṣyati bhārata
c ātmārthaṃ yodhaya raṇe sātyakiṃ satyavikramam
a evam uktas tava suto nābravīt kiṃ cid apy asau
c śrutaṃ cāśrutavat kṛtvā prāyād yena sa sātyakiḥ
a sainyena mahatā yukto mlecchānām anivartinām
c āsādya ca raṇe yatto yuyudhānam ayodhayat
a droṇo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pāñcālān pāṇḍavāṃs tathā
c abhyadravata saṃkruddho javam āsthāya madhyamam
a praviśya ca raṇe droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ varūthinīm
c drāvayām āsa yodhān vai śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a tato droṇo mahārāja nāma viśrāvya saṃyuge
c pāṇḍupāñcālamatsyānāṃ pracakre kadanaṃ mahat
a taṃ jayantam anīkāni bhāradvājaṃ tatas tataḥ
c pāñcālaputro dyutimān vīraketuḥ samabhyayāt
a sa droṇaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c dhvajam ekena vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
d nanāda balavān nādaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
a tatrādbhutaṃ mahārāja dṛṣṭavān asmi saṃyuge
c yad droṇo rabhasaṃ yuddhe pāñcālyaṃ nābhyavartata
a saṃniruddhaṃ raṇe droṇaṃ pāñcālā vīkṣya māriṣa
c āvavruḥ sarvato rājan dharmaputrajayaiṣiṇaḥ
a te śarair agnisaṃkāśais tomaraiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
c śastraiś ca vividhai rājan droṇam ekam avākiran
a nihatya tān bāṇagaṇān droṇo rājan samantataḥ
c mahājaladharān vyomni mātariśvā vivān iva
d yathā vāyur mahābhrāṇi vivānnityaṃ viyaty uta
a tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ sūryapāvakasaṃnibham
c saṃdadhe paravīraghno vīraketurathaṃ prati
a sa bhittvā tu śaro rājan pāñcālyaṃ kulanandanam
c abhyagād dharaṇīṃ tūrṇaṃ lohitārdro jvalann iva
a tato 'patad rathāt tūrṇaṃ pāñcālyaḥ kulanandanaḥ
c parvatāgrād iva mahāṃś campako vāyupīḍitaḥ
a tasmin hate maheṣvāse rājaputre mahābale
c pāñcālās tvaritā droṇaṃ samantāt paryavārayan
a citraketuḥ sudhanvā ca citravarmā ca bhārata
c tathā citrarathaś caiva bhrātṛvyasanakarṣitāḥ
a abhyadravanta sahitā bhāradvājaṃ yuyutsavaḥ
c muñcantaḥ śaravarṣāṇi tapānte jaladā iva
d adṛśyaṃ samare cakrur bhāradvājaṃ sudhanvinaḥ
a sa vadhyamāno bahudhā rājaputrair mahārathaiḥ
b krodham āhārayat teṣām abhāvāya dvijarṣabhaḥ
b tataḥ śaramayaṃ jālaṃ droṇas teṣām avāsṛjat
b te hanyamānā droṇasya śarair ākarṇacoditaiḥ
b kartavyaṃ nābhyajānan vai kumārā rājasattama
b tān vimūḍhān raṇe droṇaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
c vyaśvasūtarathāṃś cakre kumārān kupito raṇe
a tathāparaiḥ suniśitair bhallais teṣāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
c puṣpāṇīva vicinvan hi sottamāṅgāny apātayat
d nyakṛntac cottamāṅgāni yathā tālavanāni ha
a te rathebhyo hatāḥ petuḥ kṣitau rājan suvarcasaḥ
c devāsure purā yuddhe yathā daiteyadānavāḥ
a tān nihatya raṇe rājan bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
c kārmukaṃ bhrāmayām āsa hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadam
d bhrāmayan bahudhā cāpaṃ haṃsapṛṣṭhaṃ durānanam
d tad asya bhrājate rājan meghamadhye taḍid yathā
a pāñcālān nihatān dṛṣṭvā devakalpān mahārathān
c dhṛṣṭadyumno bhṛśaṃ kruddho netrābhyāṃ pātayañ jalam
e abhyavartata saṃgrāme kruddho droṇarathaṃ prati
a tato hā heti sahasā nādaḥ samabhavan nṛpa
c pāñcālyena raṇe dṛṣṭvā droṇam āvāritaṃ śaraiḥ
a saṃchādyamāno bahudhā pārṣatena mahātmanā
c na vivyathe tato droṇaḥ smayann evānvayudhyata
a tato droṇaṃ mahārāja pāñcālyaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c ājaghānorasi kruddho navatyā nataparvaṇām
a sa gāḍhaviddho balinā bhāradvājo mahāyaśāḥ
c niṣasāda rathopasthe kaśmalaṃ ca jagāma ha
a taṃ vai tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ parākramī
c samutsṛjya dhanus tūrṇam asiṃ jagrāha vīryavān
a avaplutya rathāc cāpi tvaritaḥ sa mahārathaḥ
c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ bhāradvājasya māriṣa
e hartum aicchac chiraḥ kāyāt krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
a pratyāśvastas tato droṇo dhanur gṛhya mahābalaḥ
b āsannam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ jighāṃsayā
c śarair vaitastikai rājan nityam āsannayodhibhiḥ
e yodhayām āsa samare dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahāratham
a te hi vaitastikā nāma śarā āsannayodhinaḥ
c droṇasya viditā rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnam avākṣipan
a sa vadhyamāno bahubhiḥ sāyakais tair mahābalaḥ
c avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ bhagnavegaḥ parākramī
d kṛtasaṃkalpabhūyiṣṭaḥ prādravat svarathaṃ prati
a āruhya svarathaṃ vīraḥ pragṛhya ca mahad dhanuḥ
c vivyādha samare droṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
d droṇaś cāpi mahārāja śarair vivyādha pārṣatam
d tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ droṇapāñcālayos tadā
d trailokyakāṅkṣiṇor āsīc chakraprahrādayor iva
d maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi yamakānītarāṇi ca
d carantau yuddhamārgajñau tatakṣatur atheṣubhiḥ
d mohayantau manāṃsy ājau yodhānāṃ droṇapārṣatau
d sṛjantau śaravarṣāṇi varṣāsv iva balāhakau
d chādayantau mahātmānau śarair vyoma diśo mahīm
a tad adbhutaṃ tayor yuddhaṃ bhūtasaṃghā hy apūjayan
c kṣatriyāś ca mahārāja ye cānye tatra sainikāḥ
d kṣatriyā abruvan rājan vainateyo 'yam ity uta
a avaśyaṃ samare droṇo dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃgataḥ
c vaśam eṣyati no rājñaḥ pāñcālā iti cukruśuḥ
a droṇas tu tvarito yuddhe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sāratheḥ
c śiraḥ pracyāvayām āsa phalaṃ pakvaṃ taror iva
e tatas te pradrutā vāhā rājaṃs tasya mahātmanaḥ
a teṣu pradravamāṇeṣu pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃs tathā
c vyadrāvayad raṇe droṇas tatra tatra parākramī
a vijitya pāṇḍupāñcālān bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
c svaṃ vyūhaṃ punar āsthāya sthiro 'bhavad ariṃdamaḥ
e na cainaṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe jetum utsahire prabho
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato duḥśāsano rājañ śaineyaṃ samupādravat
b rathavrātena mahatā nānādeśodbhavena ca
b sarvato bharataśreṣṭha visṛjan sāyakān bahūn
b parjanya iva ghoṣeṇa nādayan vai diśo daśa
b tam āpatantam ālokya sātyakiḥ kauravaṃ raṇe
b abhidrutya mahābāhuś chādayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
b te chādyamānā bāṇaughair duḥśāsanapurogamāḥ
b prādravan samare bhītās tava putrasya paśyataḥ
b teṣu dravatsu rājendra putro duḥśāsanas tava
b tasthau vyapetabhī rājan sātyakiṃ cārdayac charaiḥ
b caturbhir vājinas tasya sārathiṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
b sātyakiṃ ca śatenājau viddhvā nādaṃ mumoca saḥ
b tataḥ kruddho mahārāja mādhavas tasya saṃyuge
b rathaṃ sūtaṃ dhvajaṃ taṃ ca cakre 'dṛśyam ajihmagaiḥ
c kirañ śarasahasrāṇi parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
a sa viddhvā sātyakiṃ ṣaṣṭyā tathā ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c nākampayat sthitaṃ yuddhe mainākam iva parvatam
a sa tu duḥśāsanaṃ vīraḥ sāyakair āvṛṇod bhṛśam
c maśakaṃ samanuprāptam ūrṇanābhir ivorṇayā
d tvaran samāvṛṇod bāṇair duḥśāsanam amitrajit
a dṛṣṭvā duḥśāsanaṃ rājā tathā śaraśatācitam
c trigartāṃś codayām āsa yuyudhānarathaṃ prati
a te 'gacchan yuyudhānasya samīpaṃ krūrakāriṇaḥ
c trigartānāṃ trisāhasrā rathā yuddhaviśāradāḥ
a te tu taṃ rathavaṃśena mahatā paryavārayan
c sthirāṃ kṛtvā matiṃ yuddhe bhūtvā saṃśaptakā mithaḥ
a teṣāṃ prayatatāṃ yuddhe śaravarṣāṇi muñcatām
c yodhān pañcaśatān mukhyān agrānīke vyapothayat
a te 'patanta hatās tūrṇaṃ śinipravarasāyakaiḥ
c mahāmārutavegena rugṇā iva mahādrumāḥ
a rathaiś ca bahudhā chinnair dhvajaiś caiva viśāṃ pate
c hayaiś ca kanakāpīḍaiḥ patitais tatra medinī
a śaineyaśarasaṃkṛttaiḥ śoṇitaughapariplutaiḥ
c aśobhata mahārāja kiṃśukair iva puṣpitaiḥ
a te vadhyamānāḥ samare yuyudhānena tāvakāḥ
c trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta paṅkamagnā iva dvipāḥ
a tatas te paryavartanta sarve droṇarathaṃ prati
c bhayāt patagarājasya gartānīva mahoragāḥ
a hatvā pañcaśatān yodhāñ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
b tatas tān hatavidhvastān kṛtvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ
c prāyāt sa śanakair vīro dhanaṃjayarathaṃ prati
a taṃ prayāntaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ putro duḥśāsanas tava
c vivyādha navabhis tūrṇaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a sa tu taṃ prativivyādha pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c rukmapuṅkhair maheṣvāso gārdhrapatrair ajihmagaiḥ
a sātyakiṃ tu mahārāja prahasann iva bhārata
c duḥśāsanas tribhir viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
a śaineyas tava putraṃ tu viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
c dhanuś cāsya raṇe chittvā vismayann arjunaṃ yayau
a tato duḥśāsanaḥ kruddho vṛṣṇivīrāya gacchate
c sarvapāraśavīṃ śaktiṃ visasarja jighāṃsayā
a tāṃ tu śaktiṃ tadā ghorāṃ tava putrasya sātyakiḥ
c ciccheda śatadhā rājan niśitaiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
a athānyad dhanur ādāya putras tava janeśvara
c sātyakiṃ daśabhir viddhvā siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ha
a sātyakis tu raṇe kruddho mohayitvā sutaṃ tava
c śarair agniśikhākārair ājaghāna stanāntare
d tribhir eva mahābhāgaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
d tato 'sya vāhān niśitaiś caturbhir ahanac charaiḥ
d sārathiṃ cāsya saṃkruddho rathi      
e sarvāyasais tīkṣṇavaktrair aṣṭābhir vivyadhe punaḥ
a duḥśāsanas tu viṃśatyā sātyakiṃ pratyavidhyata
b preṣayām āsa vīrāya gṛddhrapakṣāñ śilāśitān
c sātvato 'pi mahārāja taṃ vivyādha stanāntare
e tribhir eva mahāvegaiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a tato 'sya vāhān niśitaiḥ śarair jaghne mahārathaḥ
c sārathiṃ ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a dhanur ekena bhallena hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
c dhvajaṃ ca rathaśaktiṃ ca bhallābhyāṃ paramāstravit
e ciccheda viśikhais tīkṣṇais tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī
f nimeṣamātreṇa śarair ubhau ca prāṣṭhisārathī
a sa chinnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
c trigartasenāpatinā svarathenāpavāhitaḥ
a tam abhidrutya śaineyo muhūrtam iva bhārata
b taṃ prāptam api neyeṣa hantuṃ duḥśāsanaṃ raṇe
c na jaghāna mahābāhur bhīmasenavacaḥ smaran
a bhīmasenena hi vadhaḥ sutānāṃ tava bhārata
c pratijñātaḥ sabhāmadhye sarveṣām eva saṃyuge
a tathā duḥśāsanaṃ jitvā sātyakiḥ saṃyuge prabho
c jagāma tvarito rājan yena yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a kiṃ tasyāṃ mama senāyāṃ nāsan ke cin mahārathāḥ
c ye tathā sātyakiṃ yāntaṃ naivāghnan nāpy avārayan
d yat kṛtaṃ vṛṣṇivīreṇa karma śaṃsasi me raṇe
d naitad utsahate kartuṃ karma śakro 'pi saṃjaya
d aśraddheyam acintyaṃ ca karma tasya mahātmanaḥ
d vṛṣṇyandhakapravīrasya śrutvā me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
a eko hi samare karma kṛtavān satyavikramaḥ
c śakratulyabalo yuddhe mahendro dānaveṣv iva
a atha vā śūnyam āsīt tad yena yātaḥ sa sātyakiḥ
c eko vai bahulāḥ senāḥ pramṛdnan puruṣarṣabhaḥ
d na santi tasmāt putrā me yathā saṃjaya bhāṣase
a kathaṃ ca yudhyamānānām apakrānto mahātmanām
c eko bahūnāṃ śaineyas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a rājan senāsamudyogo rathanāgāśvapattimān
c tumulas tava sainyānāṃ yugāntasadṛśo 'bhavat
a āhṇikeṣu samūheṣu tava sainyasya mānada
c nāsti loke samaḥ kaś cit samūha iti me matiḥ
a tatra devāḥ sma bhāṣante cāraṇāś ca samāgatāḥ
c etad antāḥ samūhā vai bhaviṣyanti mahītale
a na caiva tādṛśaḥ kaś cid vyūha āsīd viśāṃ pate
c yādṛg jayadrathavadhe droṇena vihito 'bhavat
d uddhṛtā pṛthivī nūnaṃ yuddhahetoḥ samāgataiḥ
d iti tatra janāḥ smāhur dṛṣṭvā tāṃ janasaṃsadam
a caṇḍavātābhipannānāṃ samudrāṇām iva svanaḥ
c raṇe 'bhavad balaughānām anyonyam abhidhāvatām
a pārthivānāṃ sametānāṃ bahūny āsan narottama
c tvadbale pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
d tāvakānāṃ tadā hy āsan prayutāny arbudāni ca
d tathaiva rājan pāṇḍūnāṃ sahasrāṇi sahasraśaḥ
a saṃrabdhānāṃ pravīrāṇāṃ samare dṛḍhakarmaṇām
c tatrāsīt sumahāñ śabdas tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
d pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca garjatām itaretaram
d kṣveḍāḥ kilakilāśabdās tatrāsan vai sahasraśaḥ
d bherīśabdāś ca tumulā bāṇaśabdāś ca bhārata
d anyonyaṃ nighnatāṃ caiva narāṇāṃ śuśruve svanaḥ
a athākrandad bhīmaseno dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca māriṣa
c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dharmarājaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
a āgacchata praharata balavat paridhāvata
c praviṣṭāv arisenāṃ hi vīrau mādhavapāṇḍavau
a yathā sukhena gacchetāṃ jayadrathavadhaṃ prati
c tathā prakuruta kṣipram iti sainyāny acodayat
e tayor abhāve kuravaḥ kṛtārthāḥ syur vayaṃ jitāḥ
f yatra yātau mahātmānau tūrṇaṃ parapuraṃjayau
a te yūyaṃ sahitā bhūtvā tūrṇam eva balārṇavam
c kṣobhayadhvaṃ mahāvegāḥ pavanāḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
a bhīmasenena te rājan pāñcālyena ca coditāḥ
c ājaghnuḥ kauravān saṃkhye tyaktvāsūn ātmanaḥ priyān
a icchanto nidhanaṃ yuddhe śastrair uttamatejasaḥ
c svargārthaṃ mitrakāryārthaṃ nābhyarakṣanta jīvitam
a tathaiva tāvakā rājan prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yuddhāyaivopatasthire
a tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne mahābhaye
c hatvā sarvāṇi sainyāni prāyāt sātyakir arjunam
a kavacānāṃ prabhās tatra sūryaraśmivicitritāḥ
c dṛṣṭīḥ saṃkhye sainikānāṃ pratijaghnuḥ samantataḥ
d dhvajaśastrapratihatā lokān samavadīpayan
a tathā prayatamāneṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu nirbhayaḥ
c duryodhano mahārāja vyagāhata mahad balam
a sa saṃnipātas tumulas teṣāṃ tasya ca bhārata
c abhavat sarvasainyānām abhāvakaraṇo mahān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tathā gateṣu sainyeṣu tathā kṛcchragataḥ svayam
c kaccid duryodhanaḥ sūta nākārṣīt pṛṣṭhato raṇam
a ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca saṃnipāto mahāhave
c viśeṣato nṛpatinā viṣamaḥ pratibhāti me
a so 'tyantasukhasaṃvṛddho lakṣmyā lokasya ceśvaraḥ
c eko bahūn samāsādya kaccin nāsīt parāṅmukhaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ tava putrasya bhārata
c ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca śṛṇuṣva gadato 'dbhutam
a duryodhanena sahasā pāṇḍavī pṛtanā raṇe
c nalinī dviradeneva samantād vipraloḍitā
a tathā senāṃ kṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putreṇa kaurava
c bhīmasenapurogās taṃ pāñcālāḥ samupādravan
a sa bhīmasenaṃ daśabhir mādrīputrau tribhis tribhiḥ
b tribhis tribhir yamau vīrau dharmarājaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
c virāṭadrupadau ṣaḍbhiḥ śatena ca śikhaṇḍinam
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca viṃśatyā dharmaputraṃ ca saptabhiḥ
c kekayān daśabhir viddhvā draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
a śataśaś cāparān yodhān sadvipāṃś ca rathān raṇe
c śarair avacakartograiḥ kruddho 'ntaka iva prajāḥ
a na saṃdadhan vimuñcan vā maṇḍalīkṛtakārmukaḥ
c adṛśyata ripūn nighnañ śikṣayāstrabalena ca
a tasya tān nighnataḥ śatrūn hemapṛṣṭhaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
c bhallābhyāṃ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhas tridhā ciccheda māriṣa
d ajastraṃ maṇḍalībhūtaṃ dadṛśuḥ samare janāḥ
d tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhallābhyām acchinad dhanuḥ
d tava putrasya kauravya yatamānasya saṃyuge
a vivyādha cainaṃ bahubhiḥ samyag astaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c varmāṇy āśu samāsādya te bhagnāḥ kṣitim āviśan
a tataḥ pramuditāḥ pārthāḥ parivavrur yudhiṣṭhiram
c yathā vṛtravadhe devā mudā śakraṃ maharṣibhiḥ
a atha duryodhano rājā dṛḍham ādāya kārmukam
b tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya tava putraḥ pratāpavān
c tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti rājānaṃ bruvan pāṇḍavam abhyayāt
a taṃ tathā vādinaṃ rājaṃs tava putraṃ mahāratham
c pratyudyayuḥ pramuditāḥ pāñcālā jayagṛddhinaḥ
a tān droṇaḥ pratijagrāha parīpsan yudhi pāṇḍavam
c caṇḍavātoddhutān meghān sajalān acalo yathā
d tathā tava mahat sainyaṃ tad vyarocata tāpayan
d saṃprahṛṣṭas tu sahasā tava sainyārṇavaṃ prati
d loḷayan sarvato gatvā samudraṃ makaro yathā
a tatra rājan mahān āsīt saṃgrāmo bhūrivardhanaḥ
b pāṇḍavānāṃ mahābāho tāvakānāṃ ca saṃyuge
b tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt punar yena dhanaṃjayaḥ
b atīva sarvaśabdebhyo lomaharṣakaraḥ prabho
b arjunasya mahābāho tāvakānāṃ ca dhanvinām
b madhye bhāratasainyasya mādhavasya mahāraṇe
b droṇasyāpi paraiḥ sārdhaṃ vyūhadvāre mahāraṇe
b evam eṣa kṣayo vṛttaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpate
b kruddhe 'rjune tathā droṇe sātvate ca mahārathe
b tatra sma kadanaṃ ghoraṃ vartate pāṇḍupūrvaja
c rudrasyākrīḍasaṃkāśaḥ saṃhāraḥ sarvadehinām
 saṃjaya uvāca
a aparāhṇe mahārāja saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyata
c parjanyasamanirghoṣaḥ punar droṇasya somakaiḥ
a śoṇāśvaṃ ratham āsthāya naravīraḥ samāhitaḥ
c samare 'bhyadravat pāṇḍūñ javam āsthāya madhyamam
a tava priyahite yukto maheṣvāso mahābalaḥ
c citrapuṅkhaiḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kalaśottamasaṃbhavaḥ
d jaghāna somakān rājan sṛñjayān kekayān api
a varān varān hi yodhānāṃ vicinvann iva bhārata
c akrīḍata raṇe rājan bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
a tam abhyayād bṛhatkṣatraḥ kekayānāṃ mahārathaḥ
b bhrātṝṇāṃ pañcamo jyeṣṭhaḥ spardhamāno mahārathaḥ
c bhrātṝṇāṃ vīrapañcānāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ samarakarkaśaḥ
a vimuñcan viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān ācāryaṃ chādayan bhṛśam
c mahāmegho yathā varṣaṃ vimuñcan gandhamādane
a tasya droṇo mahārāja svarṇapuṅkhāñ śilāśitān
c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ sāyakān daśa sapta ca
a tāṃs tu droṇadhanurmuktān ghorān āśīviṣopamān
c ekaikaṃ daśabhir bāṇair yudhi ciccheda hṛṣṭavat
a tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasan dvijasattamaḥ
c preṣayām āsa viśikhān aṣṭau saṃnataparvaṇaḥ
d preṣayat sa śarān aṣṭau sahasraṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
a tān dṛṣṭvā patataḥ śīghraṃ droṇacāpacyutāñ śarān
c avārayac charair eva tāvadbhir niśitair dṛḍhaiḥ
a tato 'bhavan mahārāja tava sainyasya vismayaḥ
c bṛhatkṣatreṇa tat karma kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduṣkaram
a tato droṇo mahārāja kekayaṃ vai viśeṣayan
c prāduścakre raṇe divyaṃ brāhmam astraṃ mahātapāḥ
a tad asya rājan kaikeyaḥ pratyavārayad acyutaḥ
c brāhmeṇaiva mahābāhur āhave samudīritam
d brāhmeṇāstreṇa tan muktaṃ brāhmam astraṃ viśāṃ pate

b kaikeyo 'straṃ samālokya muktaṃ droṇena saṃyuge
b brahmāstreṇaiva rājendra brāhmam astram aśātayat
b tato 'stre nihate brāhme bṛhatkṣatraś ca bhārata
c vivyādha brāhmaṇaṃ ṣaṣṭyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
a taṃ droṇo dvipadāṃ śreṣṭho nārācena samarpayat

c krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vyāvṛtya nayane śubhe

c sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena bāhvor urasi cārpayat
a droṇas tu bahudhā viddho bṛhatkṣatreṇa māriṣa
c asṛjad viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān kekayasya rathaṃ prati
a vyākulīkṛtya taṃ droṇo bṛhatkṣatraṃ mahāratham
b aśvāṃś caturbhir nyavadhīc caturo 'sya patatribhiḥ
b sārathiṃ cāsya bāṇena rathanīḍād apāharat
b dvābhyāṃ dhvajaṃ ca chattraṃ ca chittvā bhūmāv apātayat
c vyasṛjat sāyakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kekayaṃ prati bhārata
d vyasṛjat sarvato bāṇān kekayasya vimohanāt
f tam avidhyat pṛṣatkena droṇo rājan stanāntare
f bhrātṝṇāṃ pañcamo jyeṣṭho mahābalaparākramaḥ
a sa gāḍhaviddhas tenāśu mahārāja stanāntare
c rathāt puruṣaśārdūlaḥ saṃbhinnahṛdayo 'patat

c hṛdy avidhyad bṛhatkṣatraṃ

c śaiśupāliḥ susaṃkruddho yantāram idam abravīt

b sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyāc cakarta prahasann iva
c athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samārpayat

c gadāṃ cikṣepa saṃkruddho bhāradvājarathaṃ prati
d avaplutya rathāc caidyo gadām ādāya satvaraḥ
d bhāradvājāya cikṣepa ruṣitām iva pannagīm

c aśmasāramayīṃ gurvīṃ tapanīyavibhūṣitām
