c śaktiṃ ciccheda sahasā kṛtahasto mahābalaḥ
d tomaraṃ pañcabhiś chittvā śaktiṃ ciccheda saptabhiḥ
d tau jagmatur mahīṃ chinnau sarpāv iva garutmatā
a tato 'sya viśikhaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vadhārthaṃ vadhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
c preṣayām āsa samare bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
a sa tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā hṛdayaṃ cāmitaujasaḥ
c abhyagād dharaṇīṃ bāṇo haṃsaḥ padmasaro yathā
d sa gāḍhaviddhas tenāśu hṛdi rājan mahārathaḥ
d papāta ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ dhṛṣṭaketur mahāyaśāḥ
a pataṃgaṃ hi grasec cāṣo yathā rājan bubhukṣitaḥ
c tathā droṇo 'grasac chūro dhṛṣṭaketuṃ mahāmṛdhe
a nihate cedirāje tu tat khaṇḍaṃ pitryam āviśat
c amarṣavaśam āpannaḥ putro 'sya paramāstravit
a tam api prahasan droṇaḥ śarair ninye yamakṣayam
c mahāvyāghro mahāraṇye mṛgaśāvaṃ yathā balī
a teṣu prakṣīyamāṇeṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu bhārata
c jarāsaṃdhasuto vīraḥ svayaṃ droṇam upādravat
a sa tu droṇaṃ mahārāja chādayan sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
c adṛśyam akarot tūrṇaṃ jalado bhāskaraṃ yathā
a tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
c vyasṛjat sāyakāṃs tūrṇaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a chādayitvā raṇe droṇo rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
c jārāsaṃdhim atho jaghne miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
a yo yaḥ sma līyate droṇaṃ taṃ taṃ droṇo 'ntakopamaḥ
c ādatta sarvabhūtāni prāpte kāle yathāntakaḥ
a tato droṇo maheṣvāso nāma viśrāvya saṃyuge
c śarair anekasāhasraiḥ pāṇḍaveyān vyamohayat
a tato droṇāṅkitā bāṇāḥ svarṇapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥ
c narān nāgān hayāṃś caiva nijaghnuḥ sarvato raṇe
a te vadhyamānā droṇena śakreṇeva mahāsurāḥ
c samakampanta pāñcālā gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
a tato niṣṭānako ghoraḥ pāṇḍavānām ajāyata
c droṇena vadhyamāneṣu sainyeṣu bharatarṣabha
d pratāpyamānāḥ sūryeṇa hanyamānāś ca sāyakaiḥ
d anvapadyanta pāñcālās tadā saṃtrastacetasaḥ
a mohitāḥ śaravarṣeṇa bhāradvājasya saṃyuge
c ūrugrāhagṛhītā hi pāñcālānāṃ mahārathāḥ
a cedayaś ca mahārāja sṛñjayāḥ somakās tathā
c abhyadravanta saṃhṛṣṭā bhāradvājaṃ yuyutsayā
d bruvantaś ca raṇe 'nyonyaṃ cedipāñcālasṛñjayāḥ
a hata droṇaṃ hata droṇam iti te droṇam abhyayuḥ
c yatantaḥ puruṣavyāghrāḥ sarvaśaktyā mahādyutim
e ninīṣanto raṇe droṇaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati
a yatamānāṃs tu tān vīrān bhāradvājaḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
c yamāya preṣayām āsa cedimukhyān viśeṣataḥ
a teṣu prakṣīyamāṇeṣu cedimukhyeṣu bhārata
c pāñcālāḥ samakampanta droṇasāyakapīḍitāḥ
a prākrośan bhīmasenaṃ te dhṛṣṭadyumnarathaṃ prati
c dṛṣṭvā droṇasya karmāṇi tathārūpāṇi māriṣa
a brāhmaṇena tapo nūnaṃ caritaṃ duścaraṃ mahat
c tathā hi yudhi vikrānto dahati kṣatriyarṣabhān
a dharmo yuddhaṃ kṣatriyasya brāhmaṇasya paraṃ tapaḥ
c tapasvī kṛtavidyaś ca prekṣitenāpi nirdahet
a droṇāstram agnisaṃsparśaṃ praviṣṭāḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
c bahavo dustaraṃ ghoraṃ yatrādahyanta bhārata
a yathābalaṃ yathotsāhaṃ yathāsattvaṃ mahādyutiḥ
c mohayan sarvabhūtāni droṇo hanti balāni naḥ
a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṣatradharmā vyavasthitaḥ
c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda droṇasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
c   kṣatradharmā mahābalaḥ
c krodhasaṃvignamanaso
a sa saṃrabdhataro bhūtvā droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
c anyat kārmukam ādāya bhāsvaraṃ vegavattaram
a tatrādhāya śaraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ bhāraghnaṃ vimalaṃ dṛḍham
c ākarṇapūrṇam ācāryo balavān abhyavāsṛjat
d sa jīvitam upādāya dhārṣṭadyumneḥ śarottamaḥ
a sa hatvā kṣatradharmāṇaṃ jagāma dharaṇītalam
c sa bhinnahṛdayo vāhād apatan medinītale
a tataḥ sainyāny akampanta dhṛṣṭadyumnasute hate
c atha droṇaṃ samārohac cekitāno mahārathaḥ
d vyasṛjat samare bāṇān pratyamitrajighāṃsayā
a sa droṇaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare
c caturbhiḥ sārathiṃ cāsya caturbhiś caturo hayān
a tasyācāryaḥ ṣoḍaśabhir avidhyad dakṣiṇaṃ bhujam
c dhvajaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir bāṇair yantāraṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
d tam ācāryas tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārdayat
d dhvajaṃ saptabhir unmathya yantāram avadhīt tribhiḥ
a tasya sūte hate te 'śvā ratham ādāya vidrutāḥ
c samare śarasaṃvītā bhāradvājena māriṣa
a cekitānarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidrutaṃ hatasārathim
c pāñcālān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva mahad bhayam athāviśat
a tān sametān raṇe śūrāṃś cedipāñcālasṛñjayān
c samantād drāvayan droṇo bahv aśobhata māriṣa
a ākarṇapalitaḥ śyāmo vayasāśītikāt paraḥ
c raṇe paryacarad droṇo vṛddhaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣavat
a atha droṇaṃ mahārāja vicarantam abhītavat
c vajrahastam amanyanta śatravaḥ śatrusūdanam
a tato 'bravīn mahārāja drupado buddhimān nṛpa
c lubdho 'yaṃ kṣatriyān hanti vyāghraḥ kṣudramṛgān iva
a kṛcchrān duryodhano lokān pāpaḥ prāpsyati durmatiḥ
c yasya lobhād vinihatāḥ samare kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
a śataśaḥ śerate bhūmau nikṛttā govṛṣā iva
c rudhireṇa parītāṅgāḥ śvasṛgālādanīkṛtāḥ
a evam uktvā mahārāja drupado 'kṣauhiṇīpatiḥ
c puraskṛtya raṇe pārthān droṇam abhyadravad drutam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a vyūheṣv āloḍyamāneṣu pāṇḍavānāṃ tatas tataḥ
c sudūram anvayuḥ pārthāḥ pāñcālāḥ saha somakaiḥ
a vartamāne tathā raudre saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
c prakṣaye jagatas tīvre yugānta iva bhārata
a droṇe yudhi parākrānte nardamāne muhur muhuḥ
c pāñcāleṣu ca kṣīṇeṣu vadhyamāneṣu pāṇḍuṣu
a nāpaśyac charaṇaṃ kiṃ cid dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c cintayām āsa rājendra katham etad bhaviṣyati
a tatrāvekṣya diśaḥ sarvāḥ savyasācididṛkṣayā
c yudhiṣṭhiro dadarśātha naiva pārthaṃ na mādhavam
a so 'paśyan naraśārdūlaṃ vānararṣabhalakṣaṇam
c gāṇḍīvasya ca nirghoṣam aśṛṇvan vyathitendriyaḥ
a apaśyan sātyakiṃ cāpi vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaraṃ ratham
c cintayābhiparītāṅgo dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
e nādhyagacchat tadā śāntiṃ tāv apaśyan nararṣabhau
a lokopakrośabhīrutvād dharmarājo mahāyaśāḥ
c acintayan mahābāhuḥ śaineyasya rathaṃ prati
a padavīṃ preṣitaś caiva phalgunasya mayā raṇe
c śaineyaḥ sātyakiḥ satyo mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
a tad idaṃ hy ekam evāsīd dvidhā jātaṃ mamādya vai
c sātyakiś ca hi me jñeyaḥ pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
a sātyakiṃ preṣayitvā tu pāṇḍavasya padānugam
c sātvatasyāpi kaṃ yuddhe preṣayiṣye padānugam
a kariṣyāmi prayatnena bhrātur anveṣaṇaṃ yadi
c yuyudhānam ananviṣya loko māṃ garhayiṣyati
a bhrātur anveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c parityajati vārṣṇeyaṃ sātyakiṃ satyavikramam
a lokāpavādabhīrutvāt so 'haṃ pārthaṃ vṛkodaram
c padavīṃ preṣayiṣyāmi mādhavasya mahātmanaḥ
a yathaiva ca mama prītir arjune śatrusūdane
c tathaiva vṛṣṇivīre 'pi sātvate yuddhadurmade
a atibhāre niyuktaś ca mayā śaineyanandanaḥ
c sa tu mitroparodhena gauravāc ca mahābalaḥ
e praviṣṭo bhāratīṃ senāṃ makaraḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
a asau hi śrūyate śabdaḥ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c mithaḥ saṃyudhyamānānāṃ vṛṣṇivīreṇa dhīmatā
a prāptakālaṃ subalavan niścitya bahudhā hi me
c tatraiva pāṇḍaveyasya bhīmasenasya dhanvinaḥ
e gamanaṃ rocate mahyaṃ yatra yātau mahārathau
a na cāpy asahyaṃ bhīmasya vidyate bhuvi kiṃ cana
c śakto hy eṣa raṇe yattān pṛthivyāṃ sarvadhanvinaḥ
e svabāhubalam āsthāya prativyūhitum añjasā
a yasya bāhubalaṃ sarve samāśritya mahātmanaḥ
c vanavāsān nivṛttāḥ sma na ca yuddheṣu nirjitāḥ
a ito gate bhīmasene sātvataṃ prati pāṇḍave
c sanāthau bhavitārau hi yudhi sātvataphalgunau
a kāmaṃ tv aśocanīyau tau raṇe sātvataphalgunau
c rakṣitau vāsudevena svayaṃ cāstraviśāradau
a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryam ātmanaḥ śokanāśanam
c tasmād bhīmaṃ niyokṣyāmi sātvatasya padānugam
e tataḥ pratikṛtaṃ manye vidhānaṃ sātyakiṃ prati
a evaṃ niścitya manasā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c yantāram abravīd rājan bhīmaṃ prati nayasva mām
a dharmarājavacaḥ śrutvā sārathir hayakovidaḥ
c rathaṃ hemapariṣkāraṃ bhīmāntikam upānayat
a bhīmasenam anuprāpya prāptakālam anusmaran
c kaśmalaṃ prāviśad rājā bahu tatra samādiśan
d sa kaśmalasamāviṣṭo bhīmam āhūya pārthivaḥ
d abravīd vacanaṃ rājan kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a yaḥ sadevān sagandharvān daityāṃś caikaratho 'jayat
c tasya lakṣma na paśyāmi bhīmasenānujasya te
a tato 'bravīd dharmarājaṃ bhīmasenas tathāgatam
c naivādrākṣaṃ na cāśrauṣaṃ tava kaśmalam īdṛśam
a purā hi duḥkhadīrṇānāṃ bhavān gatir abhūd dhi naḥ
c uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha rājendra śādhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
a na hy asādhyam akāryaṃ vā vidyate mama mānada
c ājñāpaya kuruśreṣṭha mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
a tam abravīd aśrupūrṇaḥ kṛṣṇasarpa iva śvasan
c bhīmasenam idaṃ vākyaṃ pramlānavadano nṛpaḥ
a yathā śaṅkhasya nirghoṣaḥ pāñcajanyasya śrūyate
b yathā hi pāñcajanyasya śrūyate ninado mahān
c prerito vāsudevena saṃrabdhena yaśasvinā
e nūnam adya hataḥ śete tava bhrātā dhanaṃjayaḥ
a tasmin vinihate nūnaṃ yudhyate 'sau janārdanaḥ
c yasya sattvavato vīryam upajīvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
a yaṃ bhayeṣv abhigacchanti sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
c sa śūraḥ saindhavaprepsur anvayād bhāratīṃ camūm
a tasya vai gamanaṃ vidmo bhīma nāvartanaṃ punaḥ
c śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyo mahābhujaḥ
a vyūḍhorasko mahāskandho mattadviradavikramaḥ
c cakoranetras tāmrākṣo dviṣatām aghavardhanaḥ
d mama priyahitārthaṃ ca śakralokād ihāgataḥ
d vṛddhopasevī dhṛtimān kṛtajñaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
d praviṣṭo mahatīṃ senām arpayantāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
d praviṣṭe ca camūṃ ghorām arjune śatrunāśane
d preṣitaḥ sātvato vīraḥ phalgunasya padānugaḥ
d tasyābhigamanaṃ jāne bhīma nāvartanaṃ punaḥ
a tad idaṃ mama bhadraṃ te śokasthānam ariṃdama
c arjunārthaṃ mahābāho sātvatasya ca kāraṇāt
a vardhate haviṣevāgnir idhyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c tasya lakṣma na paśyāmi tena vindāmi kaśmalam
a taṃ viddhi puruṣavyāghraṃ sātvataṃ ca mahāratham
c sa taṃ mahārathaṃ paścād anuyātas tavānujam
e tam apaśyan mahābāhum ahaṃ vindāmi kaśmalam
f pārthe tasmin hate caiva yudhyate nūnam agraṇīḥ
f sahāyo nāsya vai kaś cit tena vindāmi kaśmalam
f athainaṃ punar ācakṣva lohitākṣaṃ sakeśavam
f dṛṣṭvā kuśalinau kṛṣṇau sātvataṃ caiva sātyakim
f saṃvidaṃ mama kuryās tvaṃ siṃhanādena pāṇḍava
f asau hi pāñcajanyasya nadataḥ śrūyate svanaḥ
f kruddhena vāsudevena pūryamāṇasya pāṇḍava
f nūnaṃ vinihataḥ śūraḥ savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
f pārthe tasmin hate caiva yudhyate garuḍadhvajaḥ
f na hy asya priyakṛt kaś cid anyaḥ pāṇḍava vidyate
a tasmāt kṛṣṇo raṇe nūnaṃ yudhyate yuddhakovidaḥ
c yasya vīryavato vīryam upajīvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
d na hi śudhyati me bhāvas tayor evaṃ paraṃtapa
a sa tatra gaccha kaunteya yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
c sātyakiś ca mahāvīryaḥ kartavyaṃ yadi manyase
e vacanaṃ mama dharmajña jyeṣṭho bhrātā bhavāmi te
a na te 'rjunas tathā jñeyo jñātavyaḥ sātyakir yathā
c cikīrṣur matpriyaṃ pārtha prayātaḥ savyasācinaḥ
e padavīṃ durgamāṃ ghorām agamyām akṛtātmabhiḥ
 bhīmasena uvāca
a brahmeśānendravaruṇān avahad yaḥ purā rathaḥ
c tam āsthāya gatau kṛṣṇau na tayor vidyate bhayam
a ājñāṃ tu śirasā bibhrad eṣa gacchāmi mā śucaḥ
c sametya tān naravyāghrāṃs tava dāsyāmi saṃvidam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a etāvad uktvā prayayau paridāya yudhiṣṭhiram
c dhṛṣṭadyumnāya balavān suhṛdbhyaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
e dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ cedam āha bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
a viditaṃ te mahābāho yathā droṇo mahārathaḥ

a pariṣvaktas tu kaunteyo dharmarājena bhārata
b rājñā mūrdhani cāghrātaḥ pariṣvaktaś ca śatruhā
c āghrātaś ca tathā mūrdhni śrāvitaś cāśiṣaḥ śubhāḥ
d kṛtvā pradakṣiṇān viprān arcitāṃs tuṣṭamānasān

d ratham āruhya niryuktaṃ sarvopakaraṇānvitam
a tasya kārṣṇāyasaṃ varma hemacitraṃ maharddhimat

a prayāte bhīmasene tu tava sainyaṃ yuyutsayā

c muhyantīva hi me sarvā dhanaṃjayadidṛkṣayā

f bhīmaseno mahābāhuḥ kavacī daṃśito balī
a gaccha gaccheti ca punar bhīmasenam abhāṣata
b tataḥ pāṇḍusuto rājan bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān
b baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇaḥ pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥ
c bhṛśaṃ sa prahito bhrātrā bhrātā bhrātuḥ priyaṃkaraḥ
e āhatya dundubhiṃ bhīmaḥ śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāya cāsakṛt

b talaśabdena vīrāṇāṃ pātayitvā manāṃsy uta

a ārujan virujan pārtho jyāṃ vikarṣaṃś ca pāṇinā
c so 'vakarṣan vikarṣaṃś ca senāgraṃ samaloḍayat
a taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ pāñcālāḥ sahasomakāḥ
b taṃ samāyāntam ālokya ghorarūpaṃ sutās tava
c pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayuḥ śūrā maghavantam ivāmarāḥ
a taṃ sasenā mahārāja sodaryāḥ paryavārayan
c duḥśalaś citrasenaś ca kuṇḍabhedī viviṃśatiḥ
a durmukho duḥsahaś caiva vikarṇaś ca śalas tathā
c vindānuvindau sumukho dīrghabāhuḥ sudarśanaḥ
a vṛndārakaḥ suhastaś ca suṣeṇo dīrghalocanaḥ
c abhayo raudrakarmā ca suvarmā durvimocanaḥ
a vividhai rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ saha sainyaiḥ sahānugaiḥ
c saṃyattāḥ samare śūrā bhīmasenam upādravan

a kiṃ cid vicalitaḥ karṇaḥ suprahārābhipīḍitaḥ
c sasāyakaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā bhīmaṃ vivyādha māriṣa
e cikṣepa ca punar bāṇāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a sa chādyamānaḥ sahasā karṇena dṛḍhadhanvinā
c dhanurjyām acchinat tūrṇam utsmayan pāṇḍunandanaḥ
a sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena prāhiṇod yamasādanam
c vāhāṃś ca caturaḥ saṃkhye vyasūṃś cakre mahārathaḥ
a hatāśvāt tu rathāt karṇaḥ samāplutya viśāṃ pate
c syandanaṃ vṛṣasenasya samārohan mahārathaḥ
a nirjitya tu raṇe karṇaṃ bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān
c nanāda sumahānādaṃ parjanyaninadopamam
a tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā prahṛṣṭo 'bhūd yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c karṇaṃ ca nirjitaṃ matvā bhīmasenena bhārata
a samantāc chaṅkhaninadaṃ pāṇḍusenākarot tadā
b cakre yudhiṣṭhiraḥ saṃkhye harṣanādaiś ca saṃkulām
c śatrusenādhvaniṃ śrutvā tāvakā hy api nānadan
e gāṇḍīvaṃ prākṣipat pārthaḥ kṛṣṇo 'py abjam avādayat
a tam antardhāya ninadaṃ dhvanir bhīmasya nardataḥ
c aśrūyata mahārāja sarvasainyeṣu bhārata
d śuśruve bhīmasenasya tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tato vyāyacchatām astraiḥ pṛthak pṛthag ariṃdamau
c mṛdupūrvaṃ ca rādheyo dṛḍhapūrvaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
d tato vyāyacchamānasya bhīmasenasya saṃyuge
d tat sainyaṃ kaluṣībhūtaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
d bhīmo 'pi ca mahārāja vaikartanam upādravat
d āsure tu mahāsainye tārakaṃ pāvakir yathā
d tayor evaṃ mahad yuddham abhavad bhīmakarṇayoḥ
d taṃ bhīmaseno mahatā śaravarṣeṇa vārayan
d vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya hayāṃś ca caturaḥ śaraiḥ
d dhvajaṃ cāsya patākāṃ ca bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
d rathaṃ ca cakrarakṣau ca bhīmaś ciccheda māriṣa
d karṇo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhīmasenena kampitaḥ
d khaḍgacarmadharo rājan bhīmam abhyadravad balī
d bhīmaś ciccheda khaḍgaṃ ca carmaṇā saha māriṣa
d dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ ca pārthena bādhitaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
d duryodhano mahārāja duḥśalaṃ pratyabhāṣata
d karṇaṃ kṛcchragataṃ paśya śīghraṃ yānaṃ prayaccha ha
d evam uktas tato rājā duḥśalaḥ samupādravat
d duḥśalasya rathaṃ karṇaś cāruroha mahārathaḥ
d tau pārthaḥ sahasā gatvā vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
d punaś ca karṇaṃ viddhvāpi duḥśalasya śiro 'harat
d duḥśalaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenena māriṣa
d tasyaiva dhanur ādāya karṇo vivyādha pāṇḍavam
d anyonyaṃ samare vīrau yuyudhāte mahābalau
d śatrughnau śatrumadhye tu balavajrabhṛtāv iva
d bhīmo viddhvā hayāṃś caiva sārathiṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
d karṇam abhyadravat pārthaḥ prahasaṃś ca mahābalaḥ
d tato vyāyacchamānasya bhīmasenasya saṃyuge
d tat sainyaṃ śakalībhūtaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tasmin vilulite sainye saindhavāyārjune gate
c sātvate bhīmasene ca putras te droṇam abhyayāt
e tvarann ekarathenaiva bahukṛtyaṃ vicintayan
a sa rathas tava putrasya tvarayā parayā yutaḥ
c tūrṇam abhyapatad droṇaṃ manomārutavegavān
d iha dṛṣṭa ito naṣṭaḥ sarathaḥ prādravan nṛpaḥ
d muhūrtād iva putras te droṇam āsādya māriṣa
a uvāca cainaṃ putras te saṃrambhād raktalocanaḥ
b sasaṃrambham idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurunandanaḥ
c arjuno bhīmasenaś ca sātyakiś cāparājitaḥ
a vijitya sarvasainyāni sumahānti mahārathāḥ
b atikramya ca hatvā ca sainyāni sumahānti ca
c saṃprāptāḥ sindhurājasya samīpam arikarśanāḥ
e vyāyacchanti ca tatrāpi sarva evāparājitāḥ
a yadi tāvad raṇe pārtho vyatikrānto mahārathaḥ
c kathaṃ sātyakibhīmābhyāṃ vyatikrānto 'si mānada
a āścaryabhūtaṃ loke 'smin samudrasyeva śoṣaṇam
c nirjayaṃ tava viprāgrya sātvatenārjunena ca
a tathaiva bhīmasenena lokaḥ saṃvadate bhṛśam
c kathaṃ droṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye dhanurvedasya pāragaḥ
d ity evaṃ bruvate yodhā aśraddheyam idaṃ tava
a nāśa eva tu me nūnaṃ mandabhāgyasya saṃyuge
c yatra tvāṃ puruṣavyāghram atikrāntās trayo rathāḥ
a evaṃ gate tu kṛtye 'smin brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
c yad gataṃ gatam eveha śeṣaṃ cintaya mānada
a yat kṛtyaṃ sindhurājasya prāptakālam anantaram
c tad bravītu bhavān kṣipraṃ sādhu tat saṃvidhīyatām
 droṇa uvāca
a cintyaṃ bahu mahārāja kṛtyaṃ yat tatra me śṛṇu
c trayo hi samatikrāntāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
e yāvad eva bhayaṃ paścāt tāvad eṣāṃ puraḥsaram
a tad garīyastaraṃ manye yatra kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
c sā purastāc ca paścāc ca gṛhītā bhāratī camūḥ
a tatra kṛtyam ahaṃ manye saindhavasyābhirakṣaṇam
c sa no rakṣyatamas tāta kruddhād bhīto dhanaṃjayāt
a gatau hi saindhavaṃ vīrau yuyudhānavṛkodarau
c saṃprāptaṃ tad idaṃ dyūtaṃ yat tac chakunibuddhijam
a na sabhāyāṃ jayo vṛtto nāpi tatra parājayaḥ
c iha no glahamānānām adya tāta jayājayau
a yān sma tān glahate ghorāñ śakuniḥ kurusaṃsadi
c akṣān saṃmanyamānaḥ sa prā kśarās te durāsadāḥ
d na te 'kṣā niśitā ghorāḥ śarā yuṣmat tanucchadaḥ
a yatra te bahavas tāta kuravaḥ paryavasthitāḥ
c senāṃ durodaraṃ viddhi śarān akṣān viśāṃ pate
a glahaṃ ca saindhavaṃ rājann atra dyūtasya niścayaḥ
c saindhave hi mahādyūtaṃ samāsaktaṃ paraiḥ saha
d atra te dhruvam āyatto jayo vājaya eva vā
a atra sarve mahārāja tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
c saindhavasya raṇe rakṣāṃ vidhivat kartum arhatha
e tatra no glahamānānāṃ dhruvau tāta jayājayau
a yatra te parameṣvāsā yattā rakṣanti saindhavam
c tatra yāhi svayaṃ śīghraṃ tāṃś ca rakṣasva rakṣiṇaḥ
a ihaiva tv aham āsiṣye preṣayiṣyāmi cāparān
c nirotsyāmi ca pāñcālān sahitān pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥ
a tato duryodhanaḥ prāyāt tūrṇam ācāryaśāsanāt
c udyamyātmānam ugrāya karmaṇe sapadānugaḥ
a cakrarakṣau tu pāñcālyau yudhāmanyūttamaujasau
c bāhyena senām abhyetya jagmatuḥ savyasācinam
a tau hi pūrvaṃ mahārāja vāritau kṛtavarmaṇā
c praviṣṭe tv arjune rājaṃs tava sainyaṃ yuyutsayā
d pārśvena senām āyāntau kururājo dadarśa ha
d pārśve bhittvā camūṃ vīrau praviṣṭau tava vāhinīm
a tābhyāṃ duryodhanaḥ sārdham agacchad yuddham uttamam
c tvaritas tvaramāṇābhyāṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ bhārato balī
a tāv abhidravatām enam ubhāv udyatakārmukau
c mahārathasamākhyātau kṣatriyapravarau yudhi
d tam avidhyad yudhāmanyus triṃśatā kaṅkapatribhiḥ
d viṃśatyā sārathiṃ cāsya caturbhiś caturo hayān
d duryodhano yudhāmanyor dhvajam ekeṣuṇācchinat
d iṣudhīkārmukaṃ cāsya samakṛntad rathottame
d sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apāharat
d tato 'vidhyac charais tīkṣṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
d yudhāmanyuś ca pāñcālya uttamaujās tathaiva ca
d bhittvā pārśvena sainyaṃ tu praviṣṭau phalgunaṃ prati
d tau samāsādayad vīraḥ śaraiḥ kāyāsthibhedibhiḥ
d saptabhiś ca yudhāmanyuṃ ṣaḍbhiś caivottamaujasam
d tau taṃ suniśitair bāṇair avidhyetāṃ mahārathau
d uttamaujās tu bhallena cāpaṃ ciccheda vīryavān
d athānyat sumahātejā dhanur gṛhya mahābalaḥ
d chādayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pāñcālau kurunandanaḥ
a yudhāmanyus tu saṃkruddhaḥ śarāṃs triṃśatam āyasān
c vyasṛjat tava putrasya tvaramāṇaḥ stanāntare
d tathottamaujāḥ saṃkruddhaḥ śarair hemavibhūṣitaiḥ
d avidhyat sārathiṃ cāsya prāhiṇod yamasādanam
a duryodhano 'pi rājendra pāñcālyasyottamaujasaḥ
c jaghāna caturaś cāśvān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
a uttamaujā hatāśvas tu hatasūtaś ca saṃyuge
c āruroha rathaṃ bhrātur yudhāmanyor abhitvaran
d yudhāmanyurathaṃ śīghram āruroha paraṃtapaḥ
a sa rathaṃ prāpya taṃ bhrātur duryodhanahayāñ śaraiḥ
c bahubhis tāḍayām āsa te hatāḥ prāpatan bhuvi
a hayeṣu patiteṣv asya ciccheda parameṣuṇā
c yudhāmanyur dhanuḥ śīghraṃ śarāvāpaṃ ca saṃyuge
a hatāśvasūtāt sa rathād avaplutya mahārathaḥ
c gadām ādāya te putraḥ pāñcālyāv abhyadhāvata
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kruddhaṃ parapuraṃjayam
c avaplutau rathopasthād yudhāmanyūttamaujasau
a tataḥ sa hemacitraṃ taṃ syandanapravaraṃ gadī
c gadayā pothayām āsa sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ raṇe
d etad īdṛśakaṃ kārṣīt putras tava janādhipa
d gadayā gadināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvalokamahārathaḥ
a hatvā cainaṃ sa putras te hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
c madrarājarathaṃ tūrṇam āruroha paraṃtapaḥ
a pāñcālānāṃ tu mukhyau tau rājaputrau mahābalau
c ratham anyaṃ samāruhya dhanaṃjayam abhīyatuḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 vartamāne mahārāja saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
 vyākuleṣu ca sainyeṣu pīḍyamāneṣu sarvaśaḥ
 rādheyo bhīmam ānarcchad yuddhāya bharatarṣabha
 yathā nāgo vane nāgaṃ matto mattam abhidravat
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a yau tau karṇaś ca bhīmaś ca saṃprayuddhau mahābalau
c arjunasya rathopānte kīdṛśaḥ so 'bhavad raṇaḥ
a pūrvaṃ hi nirjitaḥ karṇo bhīmasenena saṃyuge
c kathaṃ bhūyas tu rādheyo bhīmam āgān mahārathaḥ
a bhīmo vā sūtatanayaṃ pratyudyātaḥ kathaṃ raṇe
c mahārathasamākhyātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pravaraṃ ratham
a bhīṣmadroṇāv atikramya dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c nānyato bhayam ādatta vinā karṇaṃ dhanurdharam
a bhayān na śete satataṃ cintayan vai mahāratham
b bhayād yasya mahābāhor na śete bahulāḥ samāḥ
b cintayan nityaśo vīryaṃ rādheyasya mahātmanaḥ
c taṃ kathaṃ sūtaputraṃ hi bhīmo 'yudhyata saṃyuge
a brahmaṇyaṃ vīryasaṃpannaṃ samareṣv anivartinam
c kathaṃ karṇaṃ yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhīmo 'yudhyata saṃyuge
a yau tau samīyatur vīrāv arjunasya rathaṃ prati
c kathaṃ nu tāv ayudhyetāṃ sūtaputravṛkodarau
a bhrātṛtvaṃ darśitaṃ pūrvaṃ ghṛṇī cāpi sa sūtajaḥ
c kathaṃ bhīmena yuyudhe kuntyā vākyam anusmaran
a bhīmo vā sūtaputreṇa smaran vairaṃ purā kṛtam
c so 'yudhyata kathaṃ vīraḥ karṇena saha saṃyuge
a āśāste ca sadā sūta putro duryodhano mama
c karṇo jeṣyati saṃgrāme sahitān pāṇḍavān iti
a jayāśā yatra mandasya putrasya mama saṃyuge
c sa kathaṃ bhīmakarmāṇaṃ bhīmasenam ayudhyata
a yaṃ samāśritya putrair me kṛtaṃ vairaṃ mahārathaiḥ
c taṃ sūtatanayaṃ tāta kathaṃ bhīmo hy ayodhayat
a anekān viprakārāṃś ca sūtaputrasamudbhavān
c smaramāṇaḥ kathaṃ bhīmo yuyudhe sūtasūnunā
a yo 'jayat pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ rathenaikena vīryavān
c taṃ sūtatanayaṃ yuddhe kathaṃ bhīmo hy ayodhayat
a yo jātaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca kavacena sahaiva ca
c taṃ sūtaputraṃ samare bhīmaḥ katham ayodhayat
d astrahetoḥ purā tāta bhārgavaṃ samapūjayat
d tasya prasādād brahmāstraṃ labdhavāṃś ca bhṛgūttamāt
a yathā tayor yuddham abhūd yaś cāsīd vijayī tayoḥ
c tan mamācakṣva tattvena kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a bhīmasenas tu rādheyam utsṛjya rathināṃ varam
c iyeṣa gantuṃ yatrāstāṃ vīrau kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
a taṃ prayāntam abhidrutya rādheyaḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
c abhyavarṣan mahārāja megho vṛṣṭyeva parvatam
a phullatā paṅkajeneva vaktreṇābhyutsmayan balī
c ājuhāva raṇe yāntaṃ bhīmam ādhirathis tadā
d karṇa uvāca
d bhīmāhitais tava raṇe svapne 'pi na vibhāvitam
d tad darśayasi kasmān me pṛṣṭhaṃ pārthadidṛkṣayā
d kuntyāḥ putrasya sadṛśaṃ nedaṃ pāṇḍavanandana
d tena mām abhitaḥ sthitvā śaravarṣair avākira
a bhīmasenas tadāhvānaṃ karṇān nāmarṣayad yudhi
c ardhamaṇḍalam āvṛtya sūtaputram ayodhayat
a avakragāmibhir bāṇair abhyavarṣan mahāyasaiḥ
c dvairathe daṃśitaṃ yattaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
a vidhitsuḥ kalahasyāntaṃ jighāṃsuḥ karṇam akṣiṇot
c taṃ ca hatvetarān sarvān hantukāmo mahābalaḥ
a tasmai prāsṛjad ugrāṇi vividhāni paraṃtapaḥ
c amarṣī pāṇḍavaḥ kruddhaḥ śaravarṣāṇi māriṣa
a tasya tānīṣuvarṣāṇi mattadviradagāminaḥ
c sūtaputro 'stramāyābhir agrasat sumahāyaśāḥ
a sa yathāvan mahārāja vidyayā vai supūjitaḥ
c ācāryavan maheṣvāsaḥ karṇaḥ paryacarad raṇe
a saṃrambheṇa tu yudhyantaṃ bhīmasenaṃ smayann iva
c abhyapadyata rādheyas tam amarṣī vṛkodaram
a tan nāmṛṣyata kaunteyaḥ karṇasya smitam āhave
c yudhyamāneṣu vīreṣu paśyatsu ca samantataḥ
a taṃ bhīmasenaḥ saṃprāptaṃ vatsadantaiḥ stanāntare
c vivyādha balavān kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipam
a sūtaṃ tu sūtaputrasya supuṅkhair niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c sumuktaiś citravarmāṇaṃ nirbibheda trisaptabhiḥ
a karṇo jāmbūnadair jālaiḥ saṃchannān vātaraṃhasaḥ
c vivyādha turagān vīraḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a tato bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ bhīmasenarathaṃ prati
c karṇena vihitaṃ rājan nimeṣārdhād adṛśyata
a sarathaḥ sadhvajas tatra sasūtaḥ pāṇḍavas tadā
c prācchādyata mahārāja karṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
a tasya karṇaś catuḥṣaṣṭyā vyadhamat kavacaṃ dṛḍham
c kruddhaś cāpy ahanat pārśve nārācair marmabhedibhiḥ
a tato 'cintya mahāvegān karṇakārmukaniḥsṛtān
c samāśliṣyad asaṃbhrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ vṛkodaraḥ
a sa karṇacāpaprabhavān iṣūn āśīviṣopamān
c bibhrad bhīmo mahārāja na jagāma vyathāṃ raṇe
d sa karṇacāpaṃ ciccheda bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
d trāsayitvā mahārāja gām amitavikramaḥ
a tato dvātriṃśatā bhallair niśitais tigmatejanaiḥ
c vivyādha samare karṇaṃ bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān
a ayatnenaiva taṃ karṇaḥ śarair upa samākirat
c bhīmasenaṃ mahābāhuṃ saindhavasya vadhaiṣiṇam
a mṛdupūrvaṃ ca rādheyo bhīmam ājāv ayodhayat
c krodhapūrvaṃ tathā bhīmaḥ pūrvavairam anusmaran
a taṃ bhīmaseno nāmṛṣyad avamānam amarṣaṇaḥ
c sa tasmai vyasṛjat tūrṇaṃ śaravarṣam amitrajit
a te śarāḥ preṣitā rājan bhīmasenena saṃyuge
c nipetuḥ sarvato bhīmāḥ kūjanta iva pakṣiṇaḥ
a hemapuṅkhā mahārāja bhīmasenadhanuścyutāḥ
c abhyadravaṃs te rādheyaṃ vṛkāḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
a karṇas tu rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś chādyamānaḥ samantataḥ
c rājan vyasṛjad ugrāṇi śaravarṣāṇi saṃyuge
a tasya tān aśaniprakhyān iṣūn samaraśobhinaḥ
c ciccheda bahubhir bhallair asaṃprāptān vṛkodaraḥ
a punaś ca śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsa bhārata
c karṇo vaikartano yuddhe bhīmasenaṃ mahāratham
d punar bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjat pāṇḍavaṃ prati
d tathā karṇena samare pīḍyamānaḥ samantataḥ
a tatra bhārata bhīmaṃ tu dṛṣṭavantaḥ sma sāyakaiḥ
c samācitatanuṃ saṃkhye śvāvidhaṃ śalalair iva
a hemapuṅkhāñ śilādhautān karṇacāpacyutāñ śarān
c dadhāra samare vīraḥ svaraśmīn iva bhāskaraḥ
a rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgo bhīmaseno vyarocata
c tapanīyanibhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ palāśa iva kānane
d samṛddhakusumāpīḍo vasante 'śokavat taruḥ
a tat tu bhīmo mahārāja karṇasya caritaṃ raṇe
c nāmṛṣyata maheṣvāsaḥ krodhād udvṛtya cakṣuṣī
a sa karṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā nārācānāṃ samārpayat
c mahīdharam iva śvetaṃ gūḍhapādair viṣolbaṇaiḥ
d viviśuś ca yathaivogrā valmīkaṃ bhujagottamāḥ
d saptabhir niśitais tūrṇaṃ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
a taṃ vivyādha punar bhīmaḥ ṣaḍbhir aṣṭābhir eva ca
c marmasv amaravikrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ mahāraṇe
d marmaṇy anaparādhī saṃdidhitsuḥ kalahaṃ tadā
a tataḥ karṇasya saṃkruddho bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān

a te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā svarṇapuṅkhā mahaujasaḥ
c hemacitrā mahārāja dyotayanto diśo daśa

c kruddhā iva manuṣyendra bhujagāḥ kālacoditāḥ

b te medinīṃ prasarpantaḥ śobhante rudhirokṣitāḥ
c ardhapraviṣṭāḥ saṃrabdhā bilānīva mahoragāḥ
a taṃ pratyavidhyad rādheyo jāmbūnadavibhūṣitaiḥ
c caturdaśabhir aty ugrair nārācair avicārayan

c prāviśan medinīṃ bhīmāḥ krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva

c gacchaty astaṃ dinakare dīpyamānā ivāṃśavaḥ
a sa nirbhinno raṇe bhīmo nārācair marmabhedibhiḥ
c susrāva rudhiraṃ bhūri parvataḥ salilaṃ yathā
a sa bhīmas tribhir āyastaḥ sūtaputraṃ patatribhiḥ
c suparṇavegair vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
a sa vihvalo mahārāja karṇo bhīmabalārditaḥ
c prādravaj javanair aśvai raṇaṃ hitvā mahāyaśāḥ
d tathā puruṣamānī san pratyapāyād raṇājirāt
a bhīmasenas tu visphārya cāpaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam
c āhave 'tiratho 'tiṣṭhaj jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a daivam eva paraṃ manye dhik pauruṣam anarthakam
c yatrādhirathir āyasto nātarat pāṇḍavaṃ raṇe
a karṇaḥ pārthān sagovindāñ jetum utsahate raṇe
c na ca karṇasamaṃ yodhaṃ loke paśyāmi kaṃ cana

a karṇo hi balavāñ śūro dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥ
c iti mām abravīt sūta mando duryodhanaḥ purā
a vasuṣeṇasahāyaṃ māṃ nālaṃ devāpi saṃyuge

a tatra taṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhujaṃgam iva nirviṣam
c yuddhāt karṇam apakrāntaṃ kiṃ svid duryodhano 'bravīt
a aho durmukham evaikaṃ yuddhānām aviśāradam
c prāveśayad dhutavahaṃ pataṃgam iva mohitaḥ
d ko hi prāveśayen nūnaṃ muktvā taṃ mama putrakam
d pataṃgam iva saṃdīptaṃ bhīmāgniṃ samaveśayat

c na śaktāḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ nūnaṃ bhīmasya saṃjaya

c jānanto vyavasāyaṃ ca krūraṃ mārutatejasaḥ

c bhīmasenam anādṛtya raṇe 'yudhyata sūtajaḥ
a yo 'jayat samare karṇaṃ puraṃdara ivāsuram
c na sa pāṇḍusuto jetuṃ śakyaḥ kena cid āhave

c udyatāśanivajrasya mahendrasyeva dānavaḥ

c karṇo duḥśāsano 'haṃ ca jeṣyāmo yudhi pāṇḍavān

c na bhīmamukhasaṃprāpto mucyeteti matir mama
a na pāṇḍavā na pāñcālā na ca keśavasātyakī
c jānanti yudhi saṃrabdhā jīvitaṃ parirakṣitum
d aho mama sutānāṃ hi vipannaṃ sūta jīvitam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a yat saṃśocasi kauravya vartamāne janakṣaye

a durmarṣaṇo duḥsahaś ca durmado durdharo jayaḥ
c pāṇḍavaṃ citrasaṃnāhās taṃ pratīpam upādravan
a te samantān mahābāhuṃ parivārya vṛkodaram

c pratijagrāha samare bhīmaseno hasann iva

a visṛjan viśikhān rājan svarṇapuṅkhāñ śilāśitān
c taṃ tu bhīmo 'bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ vāryamāṇaḥ sutais tava
a kuravas tu tataḥ karṇaṃ parivārya samantataḥ
c avākiran bhīmasenaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ

b bhīmasenas tato bāṇaiḥ pañca rājan sutāṃs tava
c sasūtān bhīmadhanuṣo bhīmo ninye yamakṣayam
a prāpatan syandanebhyas te sārdhaṃ sūtair gatāsavaḥ
c citrapuṣpadharā bhagnā vāteneva mahādrumāḥ
a tatrādbhutam apaśyāma bhīmasenasya vikramam

a sa vāryamāṇo bhīmena śitair bāṇaiḥ samantataḥ
c sūtaputro mahārāja bhīmasenam avaikṣata
a taṃ bhīmasenaḥ saṃrambhāt krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
c visphārya sumahac cāpaṃ muhuḥ karṇam avaikṣata
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tavātmajāṃs tu patitān dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ pratāpavān
c krodhena mahatāviṣṭo nirviṇṇo 'bhūt sa jīvitāt
a āgaskṛtam ivātmānaṃ mene cādhirathis tadā
b yat pratyakṣaṃ tava sutā bhīmena nihatā raṇe
c bhīmasenaṃ tataḥ kruddhaḥ samādravata saṃbhramāt
d nicakhāna sa saṃbhrāntaḥ pūrvavairam anusmaran
a sa bhīmaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā rādheyaḥ prahasann iva
c punar vivyādha saptatyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
a avahāsaṃ tu taṃ pārtho nāmṛṣyata vṛkodaraḥ
c tato vivyādha rādheyaṃ śatena nataparvaṇām
a punaś ca viśikhais tīkṣṇair viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
b raṇe bhūyo 'pi rādheyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
c dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sūtaputrasya māriṣa
a athānyad dhanur ādāya karṇo bhārata durmanāḥ
c iṣubhiś chādayām āsa bhīmasenaṃ samantataḥ
a tasya bhīmo hayān hatvā vinihatya ca sārathim
c prajahāsa mahāhāsaṃ kṛte pratikṛtaṃ punaḥ
a iṣubhiḥ kārmukaṃ cāsya cakarta puruṣarṣabhaḥ
c tat papāta mahārāja svarṇapṛṣṭhaṃ mahāsvanam
d papātātha mahac cāpaṃ hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadam
a avārohad rathāt tasmād atha karṇo mahārathaḥ
c gadāṃ gṛhītvā samare bhīmasenāya cākṣipat
a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛkodaraḥ
c śarair avārayad rājan sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
a tato bāṇasahasrāṇi preṣayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ

c kavacaṃ bhīmasenasya pātayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
a athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ samārpayat
c paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat

c raṇe 'preṣayata kruddhaḥ sūtaputrasya māriṣa
a te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā tathā bāhuṃ ca dakṣiṇam
c abhyagur dharaṇīṃ tīkṣṇā valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
d sa chādyamāno bāṇaughair bhīmasenadhanuścyutaiḥ
d punar evābhavat karṇo bhīmasenāt parāṅmukhaḥ

c bhīmasenena saṃrabdhaṃ rājā duryodhano 'bravīt

c abhyayuḥ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe visṛjantaḥ śitāñ śarān
a citropacitraś citrākṣaś cārucitraḥ śarāsanaḥ
c citrāyudhaś citravarmā samare citrayodhinaḥ
a āgacchatas tān sahasā bhīmo rājan mahārathaḥ
b tān āpatata evāśu bhīmaseno mahārathaḥ

c abhyayāt pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe tvaramāṇaḥ parākramī
a tāv anyonyaṃ śarair viddhvā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
c vyabhrājetāṃ mahārāja puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
a ṣaṭtriṃśadbhis tato bhallair niśitais tigmatejanaiḥ
c vyadhamat kavacaṃ kruddhaḥ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍavaḥ
d sūtaputro 'pi kaunteyaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
d pañcāśatā mahābāhur vivyādha bharatarṣabha

c vivarmāṇau vyarājetāṃ nirmuktāv iva pannagau

a vyāghrāv iva naravyāghrau daṃṣṭrābhir itaretaram
c śaradaṃṣṭrā vidhunvānau tatakṣatur ariṃdamau
d śaradhārāsṛjau vīrau meghāv iva vavarṣatuḥ
a vāraṇāv iva saṃsaktau raṅgamadhye virejatuḥ
c tudantau viśikhais tīkṣṇair mattavāraṇavikramau
a pracchādayantau samare śarajālaiḥ parasparam
c rathābhyāṃ nādayantau ca diśaḥ sarvā viceratuḥ
a tau rathābhyāṃ mahārāja maṇḍalāvartanādiṣu
c vyarocetāṃ mahātmānau vṛtravajradharāv iva
d vāraṇāv iva cānyonyaṃ viṣāṇābhyām ariṃdamau
d nirbhindantau svagātrāṇi sāyakaiś cāru rejatuḥ
d nādayantau pravalgantau vikrīḍantau parasparam
d maṇḍalāni vikurvāṇau rathābhyāṃ rathasattamau
d vṛṣabhāv iva nardantau balinau vāsitāntare
d siṃhāv iva parākrāntau narasiṃhau mahābalau
d parasparaṃ vīkṣamāṇau krodhasaṃraktalocanau
d yuyudhāte mahāvīryau śakravairocanī yathā
a sahastābharaṇābhyāṃ tu bhujābhyāṃ vikṣipan dhanuḥ
c vyarocata raṇe bhīmaḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ
a sa cāpaghoṣastanitaḥ śaradhārāmbudo mahān
c bhīmamegho mahārāja karṇaparvatam abhyayāt
a tataḥ śarasahasreṇa dhanurmuktena bhārata
c pāṇḍavo vyakirat karṇaṃ ghano 'drim iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ
d bhīmam ācchādayat tūrṇaṃ yathādriṃ toyado 'mbunā

c sātyakiṃ cakrarakṣau ca bhīmaḥ karṇam ayodhayat
a vikramaṃ bhujayor vīryaṃ dhairyaṃ ca viditātmanaḥ
c putrās tava mahārāja dadṛśuḥ pāṇḍavasya ha
 saṃjaya uvāca
a bhīmasenasya rādheyaḥ śrutvā jyātalanisvanam

a dṛṣṭvā tu bhīmasenasya vikramaṃ yudhi bhārata

a rājñaś ca rājaputrāṃś ca sodaryāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ

c prajāsaṃharaṇe rājan somaṃ sapta grahā iva

a nirasyann iva dehebhyas tanayānām asūṃs tava
b nirāsata sa dehebhyaḥ putrāṇām atha tair asūn
c bhīmaseno mahārāja pūrvavairam anusmaran
a te kṣiptā bhīmasenena śarā bhārata bhāratān

a teṣāṃ vidārya cetāṃsi śarā hemavibhūṣitāḥ
b hitvā hitvā kṣitiṃ jagmus teṣām evāsubhiḥ saha
c vyarājanta mahārāja suparṇā iva khecarāḥ
a śoṇitādigdhavājāgrāḥ sapta hemapariṣkṛtāḥ
c putrāṇāṃ tava rājendra pītvā śoṇitam udgatāḥ

c girisānuruhā bhagnā dvipeneva mahādrumāḥ
a śatruṃjayaḥ śatrusahaś citraś citrāyudho dṛḍhaḥ
c citraseno vikarṇaś ca saptaite vinipātitāḥ
d putrāṇāṃ tava sarveṣāṃ nihatānāṃ vṛkodaraḥ
d śocaty atibhṛśaṃ duḥkhād vikarṇaṃ pāṇḍavaḥ priyam
d pratijñeyaṃ mayā dattā nihantavyās tu saṃyuge
d vikarṇa tenāsi hataḥ pratijñā rakṣitā mayā

b sa vadhyamāno balavān karṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ

a tasya tac caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃgrāme vijayaiṣiṇaḥ
c layam āsthāya rādheyo bhīmasenam avañcayat

b śarair bhīmam atikramya karṇo bhṛśam apīḍayat

b abhyadhāvata rādheyaṃ mūrtimān anilaḥ svayam

d saṃjayaḥ

c pūrvavṛttāni cāpy enaṃ rūkṣāṇy aśrāvayad bhṛśam

c prahasaṃś ca punar vākyaṃ bhīmam āha vṛṣas tadā

a evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā karṇo rājan vyakatthata
c pramukhe vṛṣṇisiṃhasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
d taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bhīmas tu kāṅkṣan bhīmaparākramaḥ
d na cākārṣīd drutaṃ smṛtvā hy arjunasya mahābalam
d tasya kārmukam ārujya babhañjāśu parākramī
d tato dṛṣṭvā mahārāja vāsudevo mahādyutiḥ
d saṃjayaḥ
d arjunārjuna paśyemaṃ bhīmaṃ karṇena bādhitam
d evam uktas tadā pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā

d amarṣavaśam āpanno nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā

a tato rājañ śilādhautāñ śarāñ śākhāmṛgadhvajaḥ
c prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya keśavena pracoditaḥ
a tataḥ pārthabhujotsṛṣṭāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
c gāṇḍīvaprabhavāḥ karṇaṃ haṃsāḥ krauñcam ivāviśan

c bhīmasenād apāsedhat sūtaputraṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
a sa chinnadhanvā bhīmena dhanaṃjayaśarāhataḥ

a bhīmo 'pi sātyaker vāhaṃ samāruhya nararṣabhaḥ
c anvayād bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye pāṇḍavaṃ savyasācinam
d so 'vaplutya drutaṃ sūto yuyudhānarathaṃ yayau
a tataḥ karṇaṃ samuddiśya tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥ
c nārācaṃ krodhatāmrākṣaḥ praiṣīn mṛtyum ivāntakaḥ
a sa garutmān ivākāśe prārthayan bhujagottamam
c nārāco 'bhyapatat karṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ gāṇḍīvacoditaḥ
a tam antarikṣe nārācaṃ drauṇiś ciccheda patriṇā
c dhanaṃjayabhayāt karṇam ujjihīrṣur mahārathaḥ
a tato drauṇiṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā vivyādha kupito 'rjunaḥ
b taṃ parīpsan mahārāja satyajit pārtham abhyayāt

b karṇe pārthena vikṣiptaṃ nārācaṃ drauṇir acchinat
c śilīmukhair mahārāja mā gās tiṣṭheti cābravīt
a sa tu mattagajākīrṇam anīkaṃ rathasaṃkulam
c tūrṇam abhyāviśad drauṇir dhanaṃjayaśarārditaḥ
a tataḥ suvarṇapṛṣṭhānāṃ dhanuṣāṃ kūjatāṃ raṇe

a dhanaṃjayas tathā yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhato drauṇim abhyayāt

c kaṅkabarhiṇavāsobhir balaṃ vyadhamad arjunaḥ

 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
 dātavyam adya manye 'haṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ svakaṃ punaḥ
 na vigraho hi balinā śreyase syād yathātathā

c rakṣitaṃ droṇakarṇābhyām apraveśyaṃ surair api
a tābhyām ūrjitavīryābhyām āpyāyitaparākramaḥ

c grastān hi pratipaśyāmi bhūmipālān sasaindhavān

a anumānāc ca paśyāmi nāsti saṃjaya saindhavaḥ
b kruddhasya devarājasya śakrasyeva mahādyuteḥ

a yac ca vikṣobhya mahatīṃ senāṃ saṃloḍya cāsakṛt
c ekaḥ praviṣṭaḥ saṃkruddho nalinīm iva kuñjaraḥ

a tathā tu vaikartanapīḍitaṃ taṃ

a nadan yathā vajradharas tapānte

c nighnann amitrān dhanuṣā dṛḍhena

a taṃ yāntam aśvai rajataprakāśair
āyodhane naravīraṃ carantam
c nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ tvadīyāḥ

a amarṣapūrṇas tv anivṛttayodhī
śarāsanī kāñcanavarmadhārī

a tayor abhūd bhārata saṃprahāras

d tataḥ prāyād asaṃbhrānto dadarśa ca dhanaṃjayam

a eṣa śiṣyaḥ sakhā caiva tava satyaparākramaḥ

a eṣa kauravayodhānāṃ kṛtvā ghoram upadravam

a dharmarājapriyānveṣī hatvā yodhān varān varān

a kṛtvā suduṣkaraṃ karma sainyamadhye mahābalaḥ

a bahūn ekarathenājau yodhayitvā mahārathān
c ācāryapramukhān pārtha āyāty eṣa hi sātyakiḥ
a svabāhubalam āśritya vidārya ca varūthinīm
c preṣito dharmaputreṇa parthaiṣo 'bhyeti sātyakiḥ
d priyaśiṣyaś ca te pārtha tvayā tulyaparākramaḥ
d vidārya kauravīṃ senām eṣa āyāti satyakaḥ
a yasya nāsti samo yodhaḥ kauraveṣu kathaṃ cana
c so 'yam āyāti kaunteya sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
a kurusainyād vimukto vai siṃho madhyād gavām iva
c nihatya bahulāḥ senāḥ pārthaiṣo 'bhyeti sātyakiḥ
a eṣa rājasahasrāṇāṃ vaktraiḥ paṅkajasaṃnibhaiḥ
c āstīrya vasudhāṃ pārtha kṣipram āyāti sātyakiḥ
a eṣa duryodhanaṃ jitvā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaṃ raṇe
c nihatya jalasaṃdhaṃ ca kṣipram āyāti sātyakiḥ
a rudhiraughavatīṃ kṛtvā nadīṃ śoṇitakardamām
b rudhirasya nadīṃ kṛtvā rathebhanaravājinām
c tṛṇavan nyasya kauravyān eṣa āyāti sātyakiḥ
d iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā keśavasyārjunas tadā
a tato 'prahṛṣṭaḥ kaunteyaḥ keśavaṃ vākyam abravīt
c na me priyaṃ mahābāho yan mām abhyeti sātyakiḥ
a na hi jānāmi vṛttāntaṃ dharmarājasya keśava
c sātvatena vihīnaḥ sa yadi jīvati vā na vā
a etena hi mahābāho rakṣitavyaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
c tam eṣa katham utsṛjya mama kṛṣṇa padānugaḥ
a rājā droṇāya cotsṛṣṭaḥ saindhavaś cānipātitaḥ
c pratyudyātaś ca śaineyam eṣa bhūriśravā raṇe
a so 'yaṃ gurutaro bhāraḥ saindhavān me samāhitaḥ
c jñātavyaś ca hi me rājā rakṣitavyaś ca sātyakiḥ
a jayadrathaś ca hantavyo lambate ca divākaraḥ
c śrāntaś caiṣa mahābāhur alpaprāṇaś ca sāṃpratam
a pariśrāntā hayāś cāsya hayayantā ca mādhava
c na ca bhūriśravāḥ śrāntaḥ sasahāyaś ca keśava
d bhūriśravāḥ kṛtāstraś ca rakṣyo mādhava satyakaḥ
a apīdānīṃ bhaved asya kṣemam asmin samāgame
c kaccin na sāgaraṃ tīrtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
e goṣpadaṃ prāpya sīdeta mahaujāḥ śinipuṃgavaḥ
a api kauravamukhyena kṛtāstreṇa mahātmanā
c sametya bhūriśravasā svastimān sātyakir bhavet
a vyatikramam imaṃ manye dharmarājasya keśava
c ācāryād bhayam utsṛjya yaḥ preṣayati sātyakim
a grahaṇaṃ dharmarājasya khagaḥ śyena ivāmiṣam
c nityam āśaṃsate droṇaḥ kaccit syāt kuśalī nṛpaḥ
d āmiṣārthī yathā śyeno nityaṃ tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ
d grahaṇe dharmaputrasya kaś cit kṣemī bhaven nṛpaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ yuddhadurmadam
c krodhād bhūriśravā rājan sahasā samupādravat
a tam abravīn mahābāhuḥ kauravyaḥ śinipuṃgavam
c adya prāpto 'si diṣṭyā me cakṣurviṣayam ity uta
a cirābhilaṣitaṃ kāmam adya prāpsyāmi saṃyuge
c na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase raṇam
a adya tvāṃ samare hatvā nityaṃ śūrābhimāninam
c nandayiṣyāmi dāśārha kururājaṃ suyodhanam
a adya madbāṇanirdagdhaṃ patitaṃ dharaṇītale
c drakṣyatas tvāṃ raṇe vīrau sahitau keśavārjunau
a adya dharmasuto rājā śrutvā tvāṃ nihataṃ mayā
c savrīḍo bhavitā sadyo yenāsīha praveśitaḥ
a adya me vikramaṃ pārtho vijñāsyati dhanaṃjayaḥ
c tvayi bhūmau vinihate śayāne rudhirokṣite
a cirābhilaṣito hy adya tvayā saha samāgamaḥ
c purā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya balinā yathā
a adya yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ tava dāsyāmi sātvata
c tato jñāsyasi tattvena madvīryabalapauruṣam
a adya saṃyamanīṃ yātā mayā tvaṃ nihato raṇe
c yathā rāmānujenājau rāvaṇir lakṣmaṇena vai
a adya kṛṣṇaś ca pārthaś ca dharmarājaś ca mādhava
c hate tvayi nirutsāhā raṇaṃ tyakṣyanty asaṃśayam
a adya te 'pacitiṃ kṛtvā śitair mādhava sāyakaiḥ
c tatstriyo nandayiṣyāmi ye tvayā nihatā raṇe
a cakṣurviṣayasaṃprāpto na tvaṃ mādhava mokṣyase
c siṃhasya viṣayaṃ prāpto yathā kṣudramṛgas tathā
a yuyudhānas tu taṃ rājan pratyuvāca hasann iva
c kauraveya na saṃtrāso vidyate mama saṃyuge
d nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyo vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam
a sa māṃ nihanyāt saṃgrāme yo māṃ kuryān nirāyudham
c samās tu śāśvatīr hanyād yo māṃ hanyād dhi saṃyuge
a kiṃ mṛṣoktena bahunā karmaṇā tu samācara
c śāradasyeva meghasya garjitaṃ niṣphalaṃ hi te
a śrutvaitad garjitaṃ vīra hāsyaṃ hi mama jāyate
c cirakālepsitaṃ loke yuddham adyāstu kaurava
a tvarate me matis tāta tvayi yuddhābhikāṅkṣiṇi
c nāhatvā saṃnivartiṣye tvām adya puruṣādhama
a anyonyaṃ tau tadā vāgbhis takṣantau narapuṃgavau
c jighāṃsū paramakruddhāv abhijaghnatur āhave
a sametau tau naravyāghrau śuṣmiṇau spardhinau raṇe
c dviradāv iva saṃkruddhau vāśitārthe madotkaṭau
a bhūriśravāḥ sātyakiś ca vavarṣatur ariṃdamau
c śaravarṣāṇi bhīmāni meghāv iva parasparam
c tāv ubhau śaravarṣābhyām anyonyam abhivarṣatām
c bhūriśravāḥ sātyakiś ca
a saumadattis tu śaineyaṃ pracchādyeṣubhir āśugaiḥ
c jighāṃsur bharataśreṣṭha vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a daśabhiḥ sātyakiṃ viddhvā saumadattir athāparān
c mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ jighāṃsuḥ śinipuṃgavam
c daśabhiḥ satyako 'vidhyat saumadattim athāśugaiḥ
c saumadattiḥ śarān asyañ
a tān asya viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān antarikṣe viśāṃ pate
c aprāptān astramāyābhir agrasat sātyakiḥ prabho
a tau pṛthak śaravarṣābhyām avarṣetāṃ parasparam
c uttamābhijanau vīrau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskarau
a tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau
c rathaśaktibhir anyonyaṃ viśikhaiś cāpy akṛntatām
a nirbhidantau hi gātrāṇi vikṣarantau ca śoṇitam
c vyaṣṭambhayetām anyonyaṃ prāṇadyūtābhidevinau
a evam uttamakarmāṇau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskarau
c parasparam ayudhyetāṃ vāraṇāv iva yūthapau
a tāv adīrgheṇa kālena brahmalokapuraskṛtau
c jigīṣantau paraṃ sthānam anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
a sātyakiḥ saumadattiś ca śaravṛṣṭyā parasparam
c hṛṣṭavad dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ paśyatām abhyavarṣatām
d vṛṣṭiṃ tām abhivarṣantau śarāṇāṃ mahatīṃ tadā
a saṃpraikṣanta janās tatra yudhyamānau yudhāṃ patī
c yūthapau vāśitāhetoḥ prayuddhāv iva kuñjarau
d bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarai rājaṃs takṣantau krodhamūrcchitau
d ayudhyetāṃ mahāraṅge vane kesariṇāv iva
d marmajñāv iva saṃkruddhau jighāṃsantau jagarjatuḥ
d vimardantāv athānyonyaṃ balavajradharāv iva
d athānyonyaṃ patākāś ca rathopakaraṇāni ca
d saṃcicchedatur āyastau bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
d punaś ca śaravarṣābhyām anyonyam abhivarṣatām
d ubhau ca jaghnatus tūrṇam itaretarasārathī
a anyonyasya hayān hatvā dhanuṣī vinikṛtya ca
c virathāv asiyuddhāya sameyātāṃ mahāraṇe
a ārṣabhe carmaṇī citre pragṛhya vipule śubhe
c vikośau cāpy asī kṛtvā samare tau viceratuḥ
a carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
c muhur ājaghnatuḥ kruddhāv anyonyam arimardanau
a sakhaḍgau citravarmāṇau saniṣkāṅgadabhūṣaṇau
b bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ drutam
b saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayantau yaśasvinau
b asibhyāṃ saṃprajahrāte parasparam ariṃdamau
b ubhau chidraiṣiṇau vīrāv ubhau citraṃ vavalgatuḥ
b darśayantāv ubhau śikṣāṃ lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ tathā
c raṇe raṇotkaṭau rājann anyonyaṃ paryakarṣatām
a muhūrtam iva rājendra parikṛṣya parasparam
c paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ vīrāv āśvasatāṃ punaḥ
a asibhyāṃ carmaṇī śubhre vipule ca śarāvare
c nikṛtya puruṣavyāghrau bāhuyuddhaṃ pracakratuḥ
a vyūḍhoraskau dīrghabhujau niyuddhakuśalāv ubhau
c bāhubhiḥ samasajjetām āyasaiḥ parighair iva
a tayor āsan bhujāghātā nigrahapragrahau tathā
c śikṣābalasamudbhūtāḥ sarvayodhapraharṣaṇāḥ
a tayor nṛvarayo rājan samare yudhyamānayoḥ
c bhīmo 'bhavan mahāśabdo vajraparvatayor iva
a dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva maharṣabhau
b bhujayoktrāvabandhaiś ca śirobhyāṃ cāvaghātanaiḥ
b pādāvakarṣasaṃdānais tomarāṃkuśalāsanaiḥ
b pādodaravibandhaiś ca bhūmāv udbhramaṇais tathā
b gatapratyāgatākṣepaiḥ pātanotthānasaṃplutaiḥ
c yuyudhāte mahātmānau kurusātvatapuṃgavau
d dvātriṃśat karaṇāni syur yāni yuddhāni bhārata
d tāny adarśayatāṃ tatra yudhyamānau mahābalau
a kṣīṇāyudhe sātvate yudhyamāne
tato 'bravīd arjunaṃ vāsudevaḥ
c paśyasvainaṃ virathaṃ yudhyamānaṃ
raṇe ketuṃ sarvadhanurdharāṇām
d saṃjaya uvāca
d sindhurājavadhe saktaṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇo 'bravīt punaḥ
d sīdantaṃ sātyakiṃ paśya pārthainaṃ parirakṣa ca
a praviṣṭo bhāratīṃ senāṃ tava pāṇḍava pṛṣṭhataḥ
c yodhitaś ca mahāvīryaiḥ sarvair bhārata bhārataiḥ
d dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca ye mukhyā ye ca mukhyā mahārathāḥ
d nihatā vṛṣṇivīreṇa śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a pariśrānto yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃprāpto bhūridakṣiṇam
c yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam āyāntaṃ naitat samam ivārjuna
a tato bhūriśravāḥ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ yuddhadurmadam
c udyamya nyahanad rājan matto mattam iva dvipam
d tato jaladanirghoṣaḥ samīpe nṛpasattama
a rathasthayor dvayor yuddhe kruddhayor yodhamukhyayoḥ
c keśavārjunayo rājan samare prekṣamāṇayoḥ
a atha kṛṣṇo mahābāhur arjunaṃ pratyabhāṣata
b bahubhir yas tu senābhir durjayaḥ samare 'nagha
c paśya vṛṣṇyandhakavyāghraṃ saumadattivaśaṃ gatam
a pariśrāntaṃ gataṃ bhūmau kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
c tavāntevāsinaṃ śūraṃ pālayārjuna sātyakim
a na vaśaṃ yajñaśīlasya gacched eṣa varārihan
c tvatkṛte puruṣavyāghra tad āśu kriyatāṃ vibho
a athābravīd dhṛṣṭamanā vāsudevaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
c paśya vṛṣṇipravīreṇa krīḍantaṃ kurupuṃgavam
e mahādvipeneva vane mattena hariyūthapam
f saṃjaya uvāca
f ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇe tu pāṇḍave vai dhanaṃjaye
a hāhākāro mahān āsīt sainyānāṃ bharatarṣabha
c yad udyamya mahābāhuḥ sātyakiṃ nyahanad bhuvi
d pātite tv atha śaineye kṛṣṇo 'rjunam abhāṣata
a sa siṃha iva mātaṅgaṃ vikarṣan bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
c vyarocata kuruśreṣṭhaḥ sātvatapravaraṃ yudhi
d arjuna uvāca
d mām eva ca mahābāho pariyānti mahārathāḥ
d yathāśakti yatante māṃ yodhayanto janārdana
d dhruvaṃ ca yodhayāmy etāñ chidrānveṣaṇatatparān
d rakṣāmi sātyakiṃ caiva saumadattiṃ vaśaṃ gatam
d aprāpto na mayā kṛṣṇa hantuṃ bhūriśravā raṇe
d anyena tu samāsaktaṃ mano notsahate mama
d avaśyaṃ ca mayā kṛṣṇa vṛṣṇivīrasya rakṣaṇam
d madarthaṃ yudhyamānasya kāryaṃ prāṇair api prabho
d adharmo vāstu dharmo vā mama mādhava mādhavaḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d pareṇa nihato mā sma prāṇān hāsīn mahārathaḥ
d evam uktvārjunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ parān āśu śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
d chādayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pare cāpi dhanaṃjayam
d evaṃ sma yudhyate vīraḥ sātyakiṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
d prekṣate sma naravyāghro bhūriśravasam eva ca
a atha kośād viniṣkṛṣya khaḍgaṃ bhūriśravā raṇe
c mūrdhajeṣu nijagrāha padā corasy atāḍayat
d ākramya cāpy athodyamya sa sāsiṃ subhujo bhujam
d śuśubhe sa bhujas tasya tapanīyavibhūṣitaḥ
d madhye rathasamūhasya indradhvaja ivocchritaḥ
d tato 'sya chettum ārabdhaḥ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṃḍalam
d tāvat kṣaṇāt sātvato 'pi śiraḥ saṃbhramayaṃs tvaran
d yathā rathāṃgaṃ kaulālo daṇḍaviddhaṃ tu bhārata
d sahaiva bhūriśravaso bāhunā keśadhāriṇā
d grastaṃ tam atibhīmena pañcāsyeneva bhoginā
d hāhākṛtam abhūt sarvaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
d tāvakāś ca mudā yuktāḥ siṃhanādaṃ vicukruśuḥ
d nimīlitākṣās tv abhavañ janāḥ saṃgrāmabhīravaḥ
d tathā bhūriśravogras te sātvate naṣṭavikrame
a tathā tu parikṛṣyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave
c vāsudevas tato rājan bhūyo 'rjunam abhāṣata
a paśya vṛṣṇyandhakavyāghraṃ saumadattivaśaṃ gatam
c tava śiṣyaṃ mahābāho dhanuṣy anavaraṃ tvayā
a asatyo vikramaḥ pārtha yatra bhūriśravā raṇe
c viśeṣayati vārṣṇeyaṃ sātyakiṃ satyavikramam
d bahubhir mahārathair eṣa parākrāntair yuyutsubhiḥ
d yuddhvā bhṛśaṃ pariśrāntaḥ kṣīṇāyudhaparicchadaḥ
a evam ukto mahābāhur vāsudevena pāṇḍavaḥ
c manasā pūjayām āsa bhūriśravasam āhave
a vikarṣan sātvataśreṣṭhaṃ krīḍamāna ivāhave
c saṃharṣayati māṃ bhūyaḥ kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ
a pravaraṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ yan na hanyād dhi sātyakim
c mahādvipam ivāraṇye mṛgendra iva karṣati
a evaṃ tu manasā rājan pārthaḥ saṃpūjya kauravam
b ayudhyatāribhir vīras taṃ sma saṃprekṣate muhuḥ
c vāsudevaṃ mahābāhur arjunaḥ pratyabhāṣata
a saindhavāsaktadṛṣṭitvān nainaṃ paśyāmi mādhava
c eṣa tv asukaraṃ karma yādavārthe karomy aham
d mama śiṣyo mamārthāya yudhyate mama śatrubhiḥ
d taṃ kṛṣṇa mokṣayiṣyāmi dāvāt siṃhaśiśuṃ yathā
a ity uktvā vacanaṃ kurvan vāsudevasya pāṇḍavaḥ
b tataḥ kṣurapraṃ niśitaṃ gāṇḍīve samayojayat
b pārthabāhuvisṛṣṭaḥ sa maholkeva nabhaścyutā
c sakhaḍgaṃ yajñaśīlasya patriṇā bāhum acchinat
 saṃjaya uvāca
a sa bāhur apatad bhūmau sakhaḍgaḥ saśubhāṅgadaḥ
b yantramukto mahendrasya dhvajo vṛttotsavo yathā
c ādadhaj jīvalokasya duḥkham uttamam uttamaḥ
a prahariṣyan hṛto bāhur adṛśyena kirīṭinā
c vegenābhyapatad bhūmau pañcāsya iva pannagaḥ
a sa moghaṃ kṛtam ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthena kauravaḥ
c utsṛjya sātyakiṃ krodhād garhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
d sa vibāhur mahārāja ekapakṣa ivāṇḍajaḥ
d ekacakro ratho yadvad dharaṇīm āsthito nṛpaḥ
d uvāca pāṇḍavaṃ caiva sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ
a nṛśaṃsaṃ bata kaunteya karmedaṃ kṛtavān asi
c apaśyato viṣaktasya yan me bāhum acicchidaḥ
c   vyāsaktasya ca sātvate
c anāgaso 'nyamanaso
a kiṃ nu vakṣyasi rājānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c kiṃ kurvāṇo mayā saṃkhye hato bhūriśravā iti
a idam indreṇa te sākṣād upadiṣṭaṃ mahātmanā
c astraṃ rudreṇa vā pārtha droṇenātha kṛpeṇa vā
a nanu nāma svadharmajñas tvaṃ loke 'bhyadhikaḥ paraiḥ
c ayudhyamānasya kathaṃ raṇe prahṛtavān asi
a na pramattāya bhītāya virathāya prayācate
c vyasane vartamānāya praharanti manasvinaḥ
a idaṃ tu nīcācaritam asatpuruṣasevitam
c katham ācaritaṃ pārtha tvayā karma suduṣkaram
a āryeṇa sukaraṃ hy āhur āryakarma dhanaṃjaya
c anāryakarma tv āryeṇa suduṣkarataraṃ bhuvi
a yeṣu yeṣu naraḥ pārtha yatra yatra ca vartate
c āśu tacchīlatām eti tad idaṃ tvayi dṛśyate
a kathaṃ hi rājavaṃśyas tvaṃ kauraveyo viśeṣataḥ
c kṣatradharmād apakrāntaḥ suvṛttaś caritavrataḥ
d alpas tavāparādho 'tra na tvāṃ tāta vigarhaye
d vārṣṇeyāpasadaṃ prāpya kṣudraṃ kṛtam idaṃ tvayā
a idaṃ tu yad atikṣudraṃ vārṣṇeyārthe kṛtaṃ tvayā
c vāsudevamataṃ nūnaṃ naitat tvayy upapadyate
a ko hi nāma pramattāya pareṇa saha yudhyate
c īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ dadyād yo na kṛṣṇasakho bhavet
a vrātyāḥ saṃśliṣṭakarmāṇaḥ prakṛtyaiva vigarhitāḥ
c vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kathaṃ pārtha pramāṇaṃ bhavatā kṛtāḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d evam ukto raṇe pārtho bhūriśravasam abravīt
d vyaktam eva hi jīrṇaḥ san buddhiṃ rañjayase nṛpa
d anarthakam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat tvayā vyāhṛtaṃ prabho
d hṛṣīkeśena saṃbandhaṃ garhase māṃ ca mūḍhavat
d raṇānām asi dharmajñaḥ sarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ
d na cādharmam ahaṃ kuryāṃ jānaṃś caiva hi muhyase
d yudhyante kṣatriyāḥ śatrūn svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtā nṛpa
d bhrātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ putrais tathā saṃbandhibāndhavaiḥ
d vayasyair atha mitraiś ca svabāhubalam āśritāḥ
d ahaṃ hi sātyakiṃ śiṣyaṃ sukhasaṃbandhim eva ca
d madarthe yudhyamānaṃ ca tyaktvā prāṇān sudustyajān
d mama bāhuṃ raṇe rājan dakṣiṇaṃ yuddhadurmadam
d nikṛtyamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ śatruvaśaṃ gatam
d tvayā nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān asmi niṣkriyam
d na cātmā rakṣitavyo hi eko raṇagatena hi
d yo yasya yudhyate 'rthāya sa saṃrakṣyo narādhipa
d tai rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa nṛpo rakṣitavyo mahāmṛdhe
d yady ahaṃ sātyakiṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīm āsiṣya āhave
d tatas tena viyogaś ca prāpyaṃ narakam eva ca
d rakṣitaś ca mayā yasmāt tasmāl labdho mayā sa ca
d yaśaś caiva svapakṣebhyaḥ phalaṃ mitrasya rakṣaṇāt
d yac ca māṃ garhase rājann anyena saha saṃgatam
d kas tena saṃgamaṃ necchet tatra te buddhivibhramaḥ
d kavacaṃ dhunvatas tubhyaṃ rathaṃ cārohataḥ svayam
d dhanurjyāṃ karṣataś caiva yudhyataḥ saha śatrubhiḥ
d evaṃ rathagajākīrṇe hayapattisamākule
d siṃhanādoddhatarave gambhīre sainyasāgare
d svaiś cāpi samupetasya vikrāntasya tathā raṇe
d satyakena kathaṃ yogyaḥ saṃgrāmas te bhaviṣyati
d bahubhiḥ saha saṃgamya nirjitya ca mahārathān
d śrāntaś ca śrāntavāhaś ca kṣīṇasarvāyudhas tvayā
d īdṛśaṃ sātyakiṃ saṃkhye nirjitya ca mahāratham
d adhikaṃ tvaṃ vijānīṣe tathāpy anyamanā bhavān
d yad icchasi śiraś cāsya asinā hartum āhave
d tathā kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā sātyakiṃ kaḥ kṣamiṣyati
d tvaṃ tu garhaya cātmānam ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣasi
d kathaṃ kariṣyase vīra yo vā tvāṃ saṃśrayej janaḥ
d āttaśastrasya hi raṇe vṛṣṇīputraṃ jighāṃsataḥ
d chinnavān yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ naital lokavigarhitam
d nyastaśastrasya hi punar vikalasya vivarmaṇaḥ
d abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko nu pūjayet
a evam uktvā mahābāhur yūpaketur mahāyaśāḥ
b dhanaṃjayena vīreṇa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
c yuyudhānaṃ parityajya raṇe prāyam upāviśat
a śarān āstīrya savyena pāṇinā puṇyalakṣaṇaḥ
c yiyāsur brahmalokāya prāṇān prāṇeṣv athājuhot
a sūrye cakṣuḥ samādhāya prasannaṃ salile manaḥ
c dhyāyan mahopaniṣadaṃ yogayukto 'bhavan muniḥ
a tataḥ sa sarvasenāyāṃ janaḥ kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
c garhayām āsa taṃ cāpi śaśaṃsa puruṣarṣabham
d garhayām āsur apy etau śaśaṃsur bhūridakṣiṇam
a nindyamānau tathā kṛṣṇau nocatuḥ kiṃ cid apriyam
c praśasyamānaś ca tathā nāhṛṣyad yūpaketanaḥ
a tāṃs tathā vādino rājan putrāṃs tava dhanaṃjayaḥ
c amṛṣyamāṇo manasā teṣāṃ tasya ca bhāṣitam
a asaṃkruddhamanā vācā smārayann iva bhārata
c uvāca pāṇḍutanayaḥ sākṣepam iva phalgunaḥ
a mama sarve 'pi rājāno jānanty etan mahāvratam
c na śakyo māmako hantuṃ yo me syād bāṇagocare
a yūpaketo samīkṣya tvaṃ na māṃ garhitum arhasi
c na hi dharmam avijñāya yuktaṃ garhayituṃ param
a āttaśastrasya hi raṇe vṛṣṇivīraṃ jighāṃsataḥ
c yad ahaṃ bāhum acchaitsaṃ na sa dharmo vigarhitaḥ
d acchinaṃ yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ tatra garhyaṃ kim asti ca
a nyastaśastrasya bālasya virathasya vivarmaṇaḥ
c abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko na pūjayet
d nābhimanyor vadhaṃ yūyaṃ garhayadhvaṃ kutas tadā
d duryodhanasya kṣudrasya na pramāṇe ca tiṣṭhataḥ
d saumadatter ayaṃ sādhu sarvasāhāyyakāriṇaḥ
d asmadīyā mayā rakṣyāḥ prāṇabādha upasthite
d ye me pratyakṣato vīrā hanyerann iti me matiḥ
d satyakaś ca vaśaṃ nītaḥ kauraveṇa mahātmanā
d saṃjaya uvāca
d tato mayaitac caritaṃ pratijñārakṣaṇaṃ prati
d punaś ca kṛpayāviṣṭo bahu tat tad vicintayan
d uvāca cainaṃ kauravyam arjunaḥ śokapīḍitaḥ
d dhig astu kṣatradharmaṃ tu yatra tvaṃ puruṣeśvaraḥ
d avasthām īdṛśīṃ prāptaḥ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇapradaḥ
d nātibhāraḥ kṛtāntasya vidyate kurunandana
d yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
d nātmanaḥ sukṛtasyāsya phalaṃ vai nṛpasattama
d yatra tvaṃ kuruśārdūla prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
d rauravaṃ narakaṃ bhīmaṃ gamiṣyati suyodhanaḥ
d yatkṛte naraśārdūlaḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
d ko hi nāma pumāṃl loke mādṛśaḥ puruṣottama
d praharet tvadvidhe tv adya pratijñā yadi no bhavet
a evam uktas tu pārthena śirasā bhūmim aspṛśat
c pāṇinā caiva savyena prāhiṇod asya dakṣiṇam
a etat pārthasya tu vacas tataḥ śrutvā mahādyutiḥ
c yūpaketur mahārāja tūṣṇīm āsīd avāṅmukhaḥ
 arjuna uvāca
a yā prītir dharmarāje me bhīme ca vadatāṃ vare
c nakule sahadeve ca sā me tvayi śalāgraja
a mayā tu samanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā
c gaccha puṇyakṛtāṃl lokāñ śibir auśīnaro yathā
d vāsudeva uvāca
d ye lokā mama vimalāḥ sakṛdvibhātā
d brahmādyaiḥ suravṛṣabhair apīṣyamāṇāḥ
d tān kṣipraṃ vraja satatāgnihotrayājin
d mattulyo bhava garuḍottamāṅgayānaḥ
d saṃjaya uvāca
d dhanaṃjaye bruvaty evaṃ ghṛṇayā ca pariplute
d avāṅmukhā babhūvuś ca sainikāḥ sarva eva te
d muhūrtād iva viśramya sātyakiḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ
d amarṣavaśam āpannaḥ saumadattinirākṛtaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tata utthāya śaineyo vimuktaḥ saumadattinā
c khaḍgam ādāya cicchitsuḥ śiras tasya mahātmanaḥ
a nihataṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa pramattaṃ bhūridakṣiṇam
c iyeṣa sātyakir hantuṃ śalāgrajam akalmaṣam
d nivāryamāṇaḥ kṛṣṇena phalgunena ca māriṣa
d prāyopaviṣṭasya sataḥ pārthac chinnabhujasya ca
d nṛśaṃsaṃ kṛtavān pāpo yuyudhāno narādhipa
a nikṛttabhujam āsīnaṃ chinnahastam iva dvipam
c krośatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ nindyamānaḥ sudurmanāḥ
a vāryamāṇaḥ sa kṛṣṇena pārthena ca mahātmanā
c bhīmena cakrarakṣābhyām aśvatthāmnā kṛpeṇa ca
a karṇena vṛṣasenena saindhavena tathaiva ca
c vikrośatāṃ ca sainyānām avadhīt taṃ yatavratam
a prāyopaviṣṭāya raṇe pārthena chinnabāhave
c sātyakiḥ kauravendrāya khaḍgenāpāharac chiraḥ
d satyakaḥ kurumukhyasya cicchedaiva śiras tataḥ
a nābhyanandanta tatsainyāḥ sātyakiṃ tena karmaṇā
c arjunena hataṃ pūrvaṃ yaj jaghāna kurūdvaham
a sahasrākṣasamaṃ tatra siddhacāraṇamānavāḥ
c bhūriśravasam ālokya yuddhe prāyagataṃ hatam
a apūjayanta taṃ devā vismitās tasya karmabhiḥ
c pakṣavādāṃś ca bahuśaḥ prāvadaṃs tasya sainikāḥ
a na vārṣṇeyasyāparādho bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
c tasmān manyur na vaḥ kāryaḥ krodho duḥkhakaro nṛṇām
a hantavyaś caiṣa vīreṇa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
c vihito hy asya dhātraiva mṛtyuḥ sātyakir āhave
d martavyam eva sarveṇa caramaṃ pūrvam eva vā
d manyadhvaṃ mṛta ity eva mā bhūd vo buddhilāghavam
d tasmin hate mahābāhau yūpaketau mahātmani
d dhig enam iti cākrandan kṣatriyāḥ krodhamūrcchitāḥ
d anyena yuktam ity eva bhavitavyaṃ tatheti ca
d ke cid āsan vimanasaḥ ke cid duḥkhasamanvitāḥ
 sātyakir uvāca
a na hantavyo na hantavya iti yan māṃ prabhāṣatha
c dharmavādair adharmiṣṭhā dharmakañcukam āsthitāḥ
a yadā bālaḥ subhadrāyāḥ sutaḥ śastravinākṛtaḥ
c yuṣmābhir nihato yuddhe tadā dharmaḥ kva vo gataḥ
a mayā tv etat pratijñātaṃ kṣepe kasmiṃś cid eva hi
b śrutvā tat sarvabhāvena garhayadhvaṃ na cārjunam
b śṛṇudhvaṃ sarvam eveha śrutvā garhatha mānavāḥ
c yo māṃ niṣpiṣya saṃgrāme jīvan hanyāt padā ruṣā
e sa me vadhyo bhavec chatrur yady api syān munivrataḥ
a ceṣṭamānaṃ pratīghāte sabhujaṃ māṃ sacakṣuṣaḥ
c manyadhvaṃ mṛtam ity evam etad vo buddhilāghavam
e yukto hy asya pratīghātaḥ kṛto me kurupuṃgavāḥ
a yat tu pārthena matsnehāt svāṃ pratijñāṃ ca rakṣatā
c sakhaḍgo 'sya hṛto bāhur etenaivāsmi vañcitaḥ
a bhavitavyaṃ ca yad bhāvi daivaṃ ceṣṭayatīva ca
c so 'yaṃ hato vimarde 'smin kim atrādharmaceṣṭitam
a api cāyaṃ purā gītaḥ śloko vālmīkinā bhuvi
b na hantavyāḥ striya iti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
b sarvakālaṃ manuṣyeṇa vyavasāyavatā sadā
c pīḍākaram amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eva tat
d anuṣṭhitaṃ mayā tac ca tasmād garhatha mūḍhavat
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam ukte mahārāja sarve kauravapāṇḍavāḥ
c na sma kiṃ cid abhāṣanta manasā samapūjayan
a mantrair hi pūtasya mahādhvareṣu
yaśasvino bhūrisahasradasya
c muner ivāraṇyagatasya tasya
na tatra kaś cid vadham abhyanandat
c mantraiḥ pūtasya sumahatsv adhareṣu yaśasvinaḥ
c bhūriśravasa sic
tasyāśu naivāraṇyagatasya ca
a sunīlakeśaṃ varadasya tasya
śūrasya pārāvatalohitākṣam
b dṛṣṭvā sunāsaṃ sukapolayuktaṃ
c aśvasya medhyasya śiro nikṛttaṃ
nyastaṃ havirdhānam ivottareṇa
a sa tejasā śastrahatena pūto
mahāhave dehavaraṃ visṛjya
c ākrāmad ūrdhvaṃ varado varārho
vyāvṛtya dharmeṇa pareṇa rodasī
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
 śaineyasya ca votpattir bhūriśravasam eva ca
 vistareṇa mamācakṣva sarvam eva tu saṃjaya
a ajito droṇarādheyavikarṇakṛtavarmabhiḥ
b ajito droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ karṇena ca kṛpeṇa ca
b yaś caivotsahate jetuṃ samastaṃ māmakaṃ balam
c tīrṇaḥ sainyārṇavaṃ vīraḥ pratiśrutya yudhiṣṭhire
a sa kathaṃ kauraveyeṇa samareṣv anivāritaḥ
c nigṛhya bhūriśravasā balād bhuvi nipātitaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śṛṇu rājann ihotpattiṃ śaineyasya yathā purā
c yathā ca bhūriśravaso yatra te saṃśayo nṛpa
d brahyaṇas tv abhavat putro mānaso 'trir mahātapāḥ
a atreḥ putro 'bhavat somaḥ somasya tu budhaḥ smṛtaḥ
b yadur nāma mahārāja sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ
c budhasyāsīn mahendrābhaḥ putra ekaḥ purūravāḥ
a purūravasa āyus tu āyuṣo nahuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
c nahuṣasya yayātis tu rājarṣir devasaṃmitaḥ
a yayāter devayānyāṃ tu yadur jyeṣṭho 'bhavat sutaḥ
c yador abhūd anvavāye devamīḍha iti śrutaḥ
a yādavas tasya ca sutaḥ śūras trailokyasaṃmataḥ
c śūrasya śaurir nṛvaro vasudevo mahāyaśāḥ
a dhanuṣy anavaraḥ śūraḥ kārtavīryasamo yudhi
c tadvīryaś cāpi tatraiva kule śinir abhūn nṛpaḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu devakasya mahātmanaḥ
c duhituḥ svayaṃvare rājan sarvakṣatrasamāgame
a tatra vai devakīṃ devīṃ vasudevārtham āptavān
c nirjitya pārthivān sarvān ratham āropayac chiniḥ
a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā devakīṃ śaure rathasthāṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
b tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nīyamānāṃ tu vasudevāya devakīm
c nāmṛṣyata mahātejāḥ somadattaḥ śiner nṛpa
a tayor yuddham abhūd rājan dinārdhaṃ citram adbhutam
c bāhuyuddhaṃ subalinoḥ śakraprahrādayor iva
a śininā somadattas tu prasahya bhuvi pātitaḥ
c asim udyamya keśeṣu pragṛhya ca padā hataḥ
a madhye rājasahasrāṇāṃ prekṣakāṇāṃ samantataḥ
c kṛpayā ca punas tena jīveti sa visarjitaḥ
a tadavasthaḥ kṛtas tena somadatto 'tha māriṣa
c prasādayan mahādevam amarṣavaśam āsthitaḥ
a tasya tuṣṭo mahādevo varāṇāṃ varadaḥ prabhuḥ
c vareṇa chandayām āsa sa tu vavre varaṃ nṛpaḥ
a putram icchāmi bhagavan yo nihanyāc chineḥ sutam
c madhye rājasahasrāṇāṃ padā hanyāc ca saṃyuge
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā somadattasya pārthiva
b sa śiraḥkampam āhedaṃ naitad evaṃ bhaven nṛpa
b sa pūrvam eva tapasā mām ārādhya jagattraye
b kasyāpy ajayyas tan mattaḥ prāptavān varam uttamam
b tathāpy ayaṃ prayāsas tu niṣphalo na bhaviṣyati
b tasya pautraṃ tu samare tvatputro mohayiṣyati
b na tu mārayituṃ śakyaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃrakṣito hy asau
b aham eva ca kṛṣṇo 'smi nāvayor antaraṃ kva cit
c evam astv iti tatroktvā sa devo 'ntaradhīyata
d nātihṛṣṭamanāḥ so 'pi puram āgān mahīpatiḥ
a sa tena varadānena labdhavān bhūridakṣiṇam
c nyapātayac ca samare saumadattiḥ śineḥ sutam
d paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ padā cainam atāḍayat
a etat te kathitaṃ rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c na hi śakyā raṇe jetuṃ sātvatā manujarṣabha
a labdhalakṣyāś ca saṃgrāme bahavaś citrayodhinaḥ
c devadānavagandharvān vijetāro hy avismitāḥ
e svavīryavijaye yuktā naite paraparigrahāḥ
a na tulyaṃ vṛṣṇibhir iha dṛśyate kiṃ cana prabho
c bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca balena bharatarṣabha
a na jñātim avamanyante vṛddhānāṃ śāsane ratāḥ
c na devāsuragandharvā na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ
e jetāro vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ na punar mānuṣā raṇe
a brahmadravye gurudravye jñātidravye 'py ahiṃsakāḥ
c eteṣāṃ rakṣitāraś ca ye syuḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
a arthavanto na cotsiktā brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ
c samarthān nāvamanyante dīnān abhyuddharanti ca
a nityaṃ devaparā dāntā dātāraś cāvikatthanāḥ
c tena vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ cakraṃ na pratihanyate
a api meruṃ vahet kaś cit tared vā makarālayam
c na tu vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ sametyāntaṃ vrajen nṛpa
d śiner duhitṛsaṃbhūta eṣa vīraḥ sa sātyakiḥ
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yatra te saṃśayo vibho
c kururāja naraśreṣṭha tava hy apanayo mahān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tadavasthe hate tasmin bhūriśravasi kaurave
c yathā bhūyo 'bhavad yuddhaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a bhūriśravasi saṃkrānte paralokāya bhārata
c vāsudevaṃ mahābāhur arjunaḥ samacūcudat
a codayāśvān bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇa yato rājā jayadrathaḥ
b pratijñāṃ saphalāṃ cāpi kartum arhasi me 'nagha
b śrūyate puṇḍarīkākṣa triṣu dharmeṣu vartate
c astam eti mahābāho tvaramāṇo divākaraḥ
a etad dhi puruṣavyāghra mahad abhyudyataṃ mayā
c kāryaṃ saṃrakṣyate caiṣa kurusenāmahārathaiḥ
a nāstam eti yathā sūryo yathā satyaṃ bhaved vacaḥ
c codayāśvāṃs tathā kṛṣṇa yathā hanyāṃ jayadratham
d saṃjaya uvāca
d jayadrathavadhe prāpte tāv ubhau kurupāṇḍavau
d sasmitau samudekṣetāṃ prauḍhā bālā vadhūr iva
a tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahābāhū rajatapratimān hayān
c hayajñaś codayām āsa jayadratharathaṃ prati
a taṃ prayāntam amogheṣum utpatadbhir ivāśugaiḥ
c tvaramāṇā mahārāja senāmukhyāḥ samāvrajan
a duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno 'tha madrarāṭ
c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥ
a samāsādya tu bībhatsuḥ saindhavaṃ pramukhe sthitam
c netrābhyāṃ krodhadīptābhyāṃ saṃpraikṣan nirdahann iva
a tato duryodhano rājā rādheyaṃ tvarito 'bravīt
b amānuṣāṇi karmāṇi kurvantau puruṣarṣabhau
b satyakaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca yattau tau darśayann iva
c arjunaṃ vīkṣya saṃyāntaṃ jayadratharathaṃ prati
d uvāca rājan putras te karṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ
a ayaṃ sa vaikartana yuddhakālo
vidarśayasvātmabalaṃ mahātman
c yathā na vadhyeta raṇe 'rjunena
jayadrathaḥ karṇa tathā kuruṣva
a alpāvaśiṣṭaṃ divasaṃ nṛvīra
vighātayasvādya ripuṃ śaraughaiḥ
c dinakṣayaṃ prāpya narapravīra
dhruvaṃ hi naḥ karṇa jayo bhaviṣyati
a saindhave rakṣyamāṇe tu sūryasyāstamayaṃ prati
c mithyāpratijñaḥ kaunteyaḥ pravekṣyati hutāśanam
a anarjunāyāṃ ca bhuvi muhūrtam api mānada
c jīvituṃ notsaheran vai bhrātaro 'sya sahānugāḥ
a vinaṣṭaiḥ pāṇḍaveyaiś ca saśailavanakānanām
c vasuṃdharām imāṃ karṇa bhokṣyāmo hatakaṇṭakām
a daivenopahataḥ pārtho viparītaś ca mānada
c kāryākāryam ajānan vai pratijñāṃ kṛtavān raṇe
a nūnam ātmavināśāya pāṇḍavena kirīṭinā
c pratijñeyaṃ kṛtā karṇa jayadrathavadhaṃ prati
a kathaṃ jīvati durdharṣe tvayi rādheya phalgunaḥ
c anastaṃgata āditye hanyāt saindhavakaṃ nṛpam
a rakṣitaṃ madrarājena kṛpeṇa ca mahātmanā
c jayadrathaṃ raṇamukhe kathaṃ hanyād dhanaṃjayaḥ
a drauṇinā rakṣyamāṇaṃ ca mayā duḥśāsanena ca
c kathaṃ prāpsyati bībhatsuḥ saindhavaṃ kālacoditaḥ
a yudhyante bahavaḥ śūrā lambate ca divākaraḥ
c śaṅke jayadrathaṃ pārtho naiva prāpsyati mānada
a sa tvaṃ karṇa mayā sārdhaṃ śūraiś cānyair mahārathaiḥ
b drauṇinā tvaṃ hi sahito madreśena kṛpeṇa ca
c yudhyasva yatnam āsthāya paraṃ pārthena saṃyuge
a evam uktas tu rādheyas tava putreṇa māriṣa
c duryodhanam idaṃ vākyaṃ pratyuvāca kurūttamam
a dṛḍhalakṣyeṇa śūreṇa bhīmasenena dhanvinā
c bhṛśam udvejitaḥ saṃkhye śarajālair anekaśaḥ
a sthātavyam iti tiṣṭhāmi raṇe saṃprati mānada
c naivāṅgam iṅgati kiṃ cin me saṃtaptasya raṇeṣubhiḥ
a yotsyāmi tu tathā rājañ śaktyāhaṃ parayā raṇe
b tad yathā prayatiṣye 'haṃ paraṃ śaktyā suyodhana
c yathā pāṇḍavamukhyo 'sau na haniṣyati saindhavam
a na hi me yudhyamānasya sāyakāṃś cāsyataḥ śitān
c saindhavaṃ prāpsyate vīraḥ savyasācī dhanaṃjayaḥ
a yat tu śaktimatā kāryaṃ satataṃ hitakāriṇā
c tat kariṣyāmi kauravya jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ
d saindhavārthe paraṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmy adya saṃyuge
d tvatpriyārthaṃ mahārāja jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a adya yotsye 'rjunam ahaṃ pauruṣaṃ svaṃ vyapāśritaḥ
c tvadarthaṃ puruṣavyāghra jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a adya yuddhaṃ kuruśreṣṭha mama pārthasya cobhayoḥ
c paśyantu sarvabhūtāni dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
a karṇakauravayor evaṃ raṇe saṃbhāṣamāṇayoḥ
c arjuno niśitair bāṇair jaghāna tava vāhinīm
a ciccheda tīkṣṇāgramukhaiḥ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c bhujān parighasaṃkāśān hastihastopamān raṇe
a śirāṃsi ca mahābāhuś ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c hastihastān hayagrīvā rathākṣāṃś ca samantataḥ
a śoṇitāktān hayārohān gṛhītaprāsatomarān
c kṣuraiś ciccheda bībhatsur dvidhaikaikaṃ tridhaiva ca
a hayavāraṇamukhyāś ca prāpatanta sahasraśaḥ
c dhvajāś chatrāṇi cāpāni cāmarāṇi śirāṃsi ca
a kakṣam agnim ivoddhūtaḥ pradahaṃs tava vāhinīm
c acireṇa mahīṃ pārthaś cakāra rudhirottarām
a hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balī
c āsasāda durādharṣaḥ saindhavaṃ satyavikramaḥ
a bībhatsur bhīmasenena sātvatena ca rakṣitaḥ
c sa babhau bharataśreṣṭha jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
a taṃ tathāvasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvadīyā vīryasaṃmatāḥ
c nāmṛṣyanta maheṣvāsāḥ phalgunaṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
a duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno 'tha madrarāṭ
c aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥ
a saṃrabdhāḥ saindhavasyārthe samāvṛṇvan kirīṭinam
c nṛtyantaṃ rathamārgeṣu dhanurjyātalanisvanaiḥ
a saṃgrāmakovidaṃ pārthaṃ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
c abhītāḥ paryavartanta vyāditāsyam ivāntakam
a saindhavaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā jighāṃsanto 'rjunācyutau
c sūryāstamayam icchanto lohitāyati bhāskare
a te bhujair bhogibhogābhair dhanūṃṣy āyamya sāyakān
c mumucuḥ sūryaraśmyābhāñ śataśaḥ phalgunaṃ prati
a tān astān asyamānāṃś ca kirīṭī yuddhadurmadaḥ
c dvidhā tridhāṣṭadhaikaikaṃ chittvā vivyādha tān raṇe
a siṃhalāṅgūlaketus tu darśayañ śaktim ātmanaḥ
c śāradvatīsuto rājann arjunaṃ pratyavārayat
a sa viddhvā daśabhiḥ pārthaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
c atiṣṭhad rathamārgeṣu saindhavaṃ paripālayan
a athainaṃ kauravaśreṣṭhāḥ sarva eva mahārathāḥ
c mahatā rathavaṃśena sarvataḥ paryavārayan
a visphārayantaś cāpāni visṛjantaś ca sāyakān
c saindhavaṃ paryarakṣanta śāsanāt tanayasya te
a tatra pārthasya śūrasya bāhvor balam adṛśyata
c iṣūṇām akṣayatvaṃ ca dhanuṣo gāṇḍivasya ca
a astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya drauṇeḥ śāradvatasya ca
c ekaikaṃ navabhir bāṇaiḥ sarvān eva samarpayat
a taṃ drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā vṛṣasenaś ca saptabhiḥ
c duryodhanaś ca viṃśatyā karṇaśalyau tribhis tribhiḥ
a ta enam abhigarjanto vidhyantaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
c vidhunvantaś ca cāpāni sarvataḥ paryavārayan
a śliṣṭaṃ tu sarvataś cakrū rathamaṇḍalam āśu te
c sūryāstamayam icchantas tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
a ta enam abhinardanto vidhunvānā dhanūṃṣi ca
c siṣicur mārgaṇair ghorair giriṃ meghā ivāmbubhiḥ
a te mahāstrāṇi divyāni tatra rājan vyadarśayan
c dhanaṃjayasya gātreṣu śūrāḥ parighabāhavaḥ
d nivārya tāñ śaravrātair divyāny astrāṇi darśayan
a hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balī
c āsasāda durādharṣaḥ saindhavaṃ satyavikramaḥ
a taṃ karṇaḥ saṃyuge rājan pratyavārayad āśugaiḥ
c miṣato bhīmasenasya sātvatasya ca bhārata
a taṃ pārtho daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire
c sūtaputraṃ mahābāhuḥ sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
a sātvataś ca tribhir bāṇaiḥ karṇaṃ vivyādha māriṣa
c bhīmasenas tribhiś caiva punaḥ pārthaś ca saptabhiḥ
a tān karṇaḥ prativivyādha ṣaṣṭyā ṣaṣṭyā mahārathaḥ
c tad yuddham abhavad rājan karṇasya bahubhiḥ saha
a tatrādbhutam apaśyāma sūtaputrasya māriṣa
c yad ekaḥ samare kruddhas trīn rathān paryavārayat
a phalgunas tu mahābāhuḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ raṇe
c sāyakānāṃ śatenaiva sarvamarmasv atāḍayat
a rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgaḥ sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
c śaraiḥ pañcāśatā vīraḥ phalgunaṃ pratyavidhyata
e tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāmṛṣyata raṇe 'rjunaḥ
a tataḥ pārtho dhanuś chittvā vivyādhainaṃ stanāntare
c sāyakair navabhir vīras tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥ
a vadhārthaṃ cāsya samare sāyakaṃ sūryavarcasam
c cikṣepa tvarayā yuktas tvarākāle dhanaṃjayaḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ vegena drauṇiś ciccheda sāyakam
c ardhacandreṇa tīkṣṇena sa chinnaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
a athānyad dhanur ādāya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
b sāyakair bahusāhasraiś chādayām āsa pāṇḍavam
b tāṃ śastravṛṣṭim atulāṃ karṇacāpasamutthitām
b vyadhamat sāyakaiḥ pārthaḥ śalabhān iva mārutaḥ
b chādayām āsa ca tadā sāyakair arjuno raṇe
b paśyatāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ darśayan pāṇilāghavam
b   narasiṃho mahārathaḥ
b vavarṣa sāyakais tīkṣṇair
c karṇo 'pi dviṣatāṃ hantā chādayām āsa phalgunam
e sāyakair bahusāhasraiḥ kṛtapratikṛtepsayā
a tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau narasiṃhau mahārathau
c sāyakaughapraticchannaṃ cakratuḥ kham ajihmagaiḥ
e adṛśyau ca śaraughais tau nighnatām itaretaram
a pārtho 'ham asmi tiṣṭha tvaṃ karṇo 'haṃ tiṣṭha phalguna
c ity evaṃ tarjayantau tau vākśalyais tudatāṃ tathā
a yudhyetāṃ samare vīrau citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
c prekṣaṇīyau cābhavatāṃ sarvayodhasamāgame
a praśasyamānau samare siddhacāraṇavātikaiḥ
c ayudhyetāṃ mahārāja parasparavadhaiṣiṇau
a tato duryodhano rājaṃs tāvakān abhyabhāṣata
c yattā rakṣata rādheyaṃ nāhatvā samare 'rjunam
e nivartiṣyati rādheya iti mām uktavān vṛṣaḥ
a etasminn antare rājan dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
c ākarṇamuktair iṣubhiḥ karṇasya caturo hayān
e anayan mṛtyulokāya caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ
a sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apāharat
c chādayām āsa ca śarais tava putrasya paśyataḥ
a sa chādyamānaḥ samare hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
c mohitaḥ śarajālena kartavyaṃ nābhyapadyata
a taṃ tathā virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā ratham āropya svaṃ tadā
c aśvatthāmā mahārāja bhūyo 'rjunam ayodhayat
a madrarājas tu kaunteyam avidhyat triṃśatā śaraiḥ
b āvavre 'rjunamārgaṃ ca śarajālena bhārata
c śāradvatas tu viṃśatyā vāsudevaṃ samārpayat
e dhanaṃjayaṃ dvādaśabhir ājaghāna śilīmukhaiḥ
a caturbhiḥ sindhurājaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca saptabhiḥ
c pṛthak pṛthaṅ mahārāja kṛṣṇapārthāv avidhyatām
a tathaiva tān pratyavidhyat kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
c droṇaputraṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā madrarājaṃ śatena ca
a saindhavaṃ daśabhir bhallair vṛṣasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
c śāradvataṃ ca viṃśatyā viddhvā pārthaḥ samunnadat
a te pratijñāpratīghātam icchantaḥ savyasācinaḥ
c sahitās tāvakās tūrṇam abhipetur dhanaṃjayam
a athārjunaḥ sarvatodhāram astraṃ
prāduścakre trāsayan dhārtarāṣṭrān
c taṃ pratyudīyuḥ kuravaḥ pāṇḍusūnuṃ
rathair mahārhaiḥ śaravarṣāṇy avarṣan
a tatas tu tasmiṃs tumule samutthite
sudāruṇe bhārata mohanīye
c nāmuhyata prāpya sa rājaputraḥ
kirīṭamālī visṛjan pṛṣatkān
a rājyaprepsuḥ savyasācī kurūṇāṃ
smaran kleśān dvādaśavarṣavṛttān
c gāṇḍīvamuktair iṣubhir mahātmā
sarvā diśo vyāvṛṇod aprameyaiḥ
a pradīptolkam abhavac cāntarikṣaṃ
deheṣu bhūrīṇy apatan vayāṃsi
c yat piṅgalajyena kirīṭamālī
kruddho ripūn ājagavena hanti
a kirīṭamālī mahatā mahāyaśāḥ
śarāsanenāsya śarān anīkajit
c hayapravekottamanāgadhūrgatān
kurupravīrān iṣubhir nyapātayat
a gadāś ca gurvīḥ parighān ayasmayān
asīṃś ca śaktīś ca raṇe narādhipāḥ
c mahānti śastrāṇi ca bhīmadarśanāḥ
pragṛhya pārthaṃ sahasābhidudruvuḥ
d tato yugāntābhrasamasvanaṃ mahan
d mahendracāpapratimaṃ sa gāṇḍivam
d cakarṣa dorbhyāṃ vihasan bhṛśaṃ yayau
d dahaṃs tvadīyān yamarāṣṭravardhanaḥ
a sa tān udīrṇān sarathāśvavāraṇān
padātisaṃghāṃś ca mahādhanurdharaḥ
c vipannasarvāyudhajīvitān raṇe
cakāra vīro yamarāṣṭravardhanān
 saṃjaya uvāca
 śrutvā ninādaṃ dhanuṣaś ca tasya
 vispaṣṭam utkṛṣṭam ivāntakasya
 śakrāśanisphoṭasamaṃ sughoraṃ
 vikṛṣyamāṇasya dhanaṃjayena
 trāsodvignaṃ bhayodbhrāntaṃ tvadīyaṃ tad balaṃ nṛpa
 yugāntavātasaṃkṣubdhaṃ caladvīcitaraṅgitam
 pralīnamīnamakaraṃ sāgarāmbha ivābhavat
a sa raṇe vyacarat pārthaḥ prekṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ
c yugapad dikṣu sarvāsu citrāṇy astrāṇi darśayan
d ādadānaṃ mahārāja saṃdadhānaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
d utkarṣantaṃ vikarṣantaṃ nābhyapaśyāma lāghavāt
d tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur aindram astraṃ durāsadam
d prāduś cakre mahārāja trāsayan sarvabhāratān
d tataḥ śarāḥ prādur āsan divyāstrapratimantritāḥ
d pradīptāś ca śikhimukhāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d ākarṇapūrṇanirmuktair agnyarkāṃśunibhaiḥ śaraiḥ
d nabho 'bhavat tad duṣprekṣyam ulkābhir iva saṃvṛtam
d tataḥ śastrāndhakāraṃ tat kauravaiḥ samudīritam
d aśakyaṃ manasāpy anyaiḥ pāṇḍavaḥ saṃbhramann iva
d nāśayām āsa vikramya śarair divyāstramantritaiḥ
d naiśaṃ tamo 'ṃśubhiḥ kṣipraṃ dinādāv iva bhāskaraḥ
d tatas tu tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ dīptaiḥ śaragabhastibhiḥ
d ākṣipat palvalāmbūni nidāghārka iva prabhuḥ
d tato divyāstraviduṣā prahitāḥ sāyakāṃśavaḥ
d samāplavan dviṣatsainyaṃ lokaṃ bhānor ivāṃśavaḥ
d tathāpare samutsṛṣṭā viśikhās tigmatejasaḥ
d hṛdayāny āśu vīrāṇāṃ viviśuḥ priyabandhuvat
d ya enam īyuḥ samare tvadyodhāḥ śūramāninaḥ
d śalabhā iva te dīptā agniṃ prāpya yayuḥ kṣayam
d evaṃ sa mṛdnañ śatrūṇāṃ jīvitāni yaśāṃsi ca
d pārthaś cacāra saṃgrāme mṛtyur vigrahavān iva
d sakirīṭāni vastrāṇi sāṅgadān vipulān bhujān
d sakuṇḍalayugān karṇān keṣāṃ cid aharac charaiḥ
d satomarān gajasthānāṃ saprāsān hayasādinām
d sacarmaṇaḥ padātīnāṃ rathināṃ ca sadhanvanaḥ
d sapratodān niyantṝṇāṃ bāhūṃś ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
d pradīptograśarārciṣmān babhau tatra dhanaṃjayaḥ
d savisphuliṅgāgraśikho jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
d taṃ devarājapratimaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
d yugapad dikṣu sarvāsu rathasthaṃ puruṣarṣabham
d darśayantaṃ mahāstrāṇi prekṣaṇīyaṃ dhanaṃjayam
d nṛtyantaṃ rathamārgeṣu dhanurjyātalanādinam
d nirīkṣituṃ na śekus te yatnavanto 'pi pārthivāḥ
d madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ pratapantam ivāmbare
d dīptograsaṃbhṛtaśaraḥ kirīṭī virarāja ha
d varṣāsv ivodīrṇajalaḥ sendradhanvāmbudo mahān
d mahāstrasaṃplave tasmiñ jiṣṇunā saṃpravartite
d sudustare mahāghore mamajjur yodhapuṃgavāḥ
d utkṛttavadanair dehaiḥ śarīraiḥ kṛttabāhubhiḥ
d bhujaiś ca pāṇinirmuktaiḥ pāṇibhir vyaṅgulīkṛtaiḥ
d kṛttāgrahastaiḥ karibhiḥ kṛttadantair madotkaṭaiḥ
d hayaiś chinnakhuragrīvai rathaiś ca śakalīkṛtaiḥ
d nikṛttāntraiḥ kṛttapādais tathānyaiḥ kṛttasaṃdhibhiḥ
d niśceṣṭair visphuradbhiś ca kūjadbhiś ca sahasraśaḥ
d mṛtyor āghātalalitaṃ tat pārthāyodhanaṃ mahat
d apaśyāma mahīpāla bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanam
d ākrīḍam iva rudrasya purābhyardayataḥ paśūn
d gajānāṃ kṣuranirmuktaiḥ karaiḥ sabhujageva bhūḥ
d kva cid babhau sragviṇīva vakrapadmaiḥ samācitā
d vicitroṣṇīṣamukuṭaiḥ keyūrāṅgadakuṇḍalaiḥ
d svarṇacitratanutraiś ca bhāṇḍaiś ca gajavājinām
d kirīṭaśatasaṃkīrṇā tatra tatra samācitā
d virarāja bhṛśaṃ citrā mahī navavadhūr iva
d majjāmedaḥkardaminīṃ śoṇitaughataraṅgiṇīm
d marmāsthibhir agādhāṃ ca keśaśaivalaśādvalām
d śirobāhūpalataṭāṃ rugṇakroḍāsthisaṃkaṭām
d citradhvajapatākāḍhyāṃ chattracāpormimālinīm
d vigatāsumahākāyāṃ gajadehābhisaṃkulām
d rathoḍupaśatākīrṇāṃ hayasaṃghātarodhasam
d rathacakrayugeṣākṣakūbarair atidurgamām
d prāsāsiśaktiparaśuviśikhāhidurāsadām
d balakaṅkamahānakrāṃ gomāyumakarotkaṭām
d gṛdhrodagramahāgrāhāṃ śivāvirutabhairavām
d nṛtyatpretapiśācādyair bhūtaiḥ kīrṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ
d gatāsuyodhaniśceṣṭaśarīraśatavāhinīm
d mahāpratibhayāṃ raudrāṃ ghorāṃ vaitaraṇīm iva
d nadīṃ pravartayām āsa bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinīm
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya vikrāntam antakasyeva rūpiṇaḥ
d abhūtapūrvaṃ kuruṣu bhayam āgād raṇājire
d tata ādāya vīrāṇām astrair astrāṇi pāṇḍavaḥ
d ātmānaṃ raudram ācaṣṭa raudrakarmaṇi niṣṭhitaḥ
d tato rathavarān rājann abhyatikrāmad arjunaḥ
a madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ pratapantam ivāmbare
c na śekuḥ sarvabhūtāni pāṇḍavaṃ prativīkṣitum
a prasṛtāṃs tasya gāṇḍīvāc charavrātān mahātmanaḥ
c saṃgrāme samapaśyāma haṃsapaṅktīr ivāmbare
d ākāśe samadṛśyanta haṃsānām iva paṅktayaḥ

c ākulīkṛtya kaunteyo jayadratham upādravat

c aṣṭābhir vājino 'vidhyad dhvajaṃ caikena patriṇā
d sarvamarmasu marmajño vāsudevaṃ śatena ca

c yugapat tasya ciccheda śarābhyāṃ saindhavasya ha

d kṛpaṃ vivyādha viṃśatyā karṇaṃ pañcāśatā śaraiḥ

d karṇaṃ drauṇiṃ kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ vṛṣasenaṃ suyodhanam

c astaṃ mahīdharaśreṣṭhaṃ yiyāsati divākaraḥ

c tavāpi śatadhā mūrdhā phaliṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
a yathā caitan na jānīyāt sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥ
c tathā kuru kuruśreṣṭha divyam astram upāśritaḥ
a na hy asādhyam akāryaṃ vā vidyate tava kiṃ cana
b astrasyāsya prabhāveṇa paśubhartuḥ kathaṃ cana

a tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam
c vāsudevaś ca bībhatsuṃ praśaśaṃsa mahāratham
a tato dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ sindhurājaṃ jayadratham
b tato vinihate rājan sindhurāje kirīṭinā
b tamas tad vāsudevena saṃhṛtaṃ bharatarṣabha
b paścāj jñātaṃ mahīpāla tava putraiḥ sahānugaiḥ
b vāsudevaprayukteyaṃ māyeti nṛpasattama

b akṣauhiṇīr aṣṭa hatvā jāmātā tava saindhavaḥ
b hataṃ jayadrathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrā narādhipa
b karmaṇā tena pārthasya vismitāḥ sarvadevatāḥ
b sarvathā samare yasya goptā nityaṃ janārdanaḥ
b kathaṃ tasya jayo na syād iti bhūtāni menire
b etadarthaṃ śiras tasya cyāvayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
b syamantapañcakād bāhyaṃ śarair eva yathākramam

b astraṃ pāśupataṃ pārthaḥ saṃhartum upacakrame
