b vavau śītaḥ sugandhaś ca pavano hlādayann iva
b saṃhāraṃ ca pramokṣaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatra divaukasaḥ
b vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ praśaśaṃsuś ca pāṇḍavam
b evam astreṇa tān vīro yodhayitvā dhanaṃjayaḥ
b jayadrathaśiraḥ paścāc cyāvayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
b tac chiraś cyāvamānaṃ tu dadṛśus tāvakā yudhi
b śalyakarṇakṛpā rājan mohitāḥ savyasācinā
b śirasi cyāvite tasya śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
b paścāt kāyo 'patad bhūmiṃ śocayan sarvapārthivān
b dṛṣṭvā tu nihataṃ saṃkhe sindhurājaṃ mahāratham
c putrāṇāṃ tava netrebhyo duḥkhād bahv apataj jalam
d duḥkhād aśrūṇi mumucur nirāśāś cābhavañ jaye
d tato jayadrathe rājan hate pārthena keśavaḥ
d dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahābāhur arjunaś ca paraṃtapaḥ
d tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre saindhave lokaviśrute
d praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe kṛṣṇaḥ pārthaś ca bhārata
a bhīmaseno 'pi saṃgrāme bodhayann iva pāṇḍavam
c siṃhanādena mahatā pūrayām āsa rodasī
d bhīmaś ca vṛṣṇisiṃhaś ca yudhāmanyuś ca bhārata
d uttamaujāś ca vikrāntaḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak
a taṃ śrutvā tu mahānādaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c saindhavaṃ nihataṃ mene phalgunena mahātmanā
a tato vāditraghoṣeṇa svān yodhān abhiharṣayan
c abhyavartata saṃgrāme bhāradvājaṃ yuyutsayā
d udapadyata sainyasya pāṇḍūnāṃ hṛṣṭacetasām
a tataḥ pravavṛte rājann astaṃ gacchati bhāskare
c droṇasya somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
a te tu sarvaprayatnena bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsavaḥ
c saindhave nihate rājann ayudhyanta mahārathāḥ
a pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā saindhavaṃ vinihatya ca
c ayodhayaṃs tato droṇaṃ jayonmattās tatas tataḥ
a arjuno 'pi raṇe yodhāṃs tāvakān rathasattamān
c ayodhayan mahārāja hatvā saindhavakaṃ nṛpam
a sa devaśatrūn iva devarājaḥ
kirīṭamālī vyadhamat samantāt
c yathā tamāṃsy abhyuditas tamoghnaḥ
pūrvāṃ pratijñāṃ samavāpya vīraḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d etat sucaritaṃ rājan yaḥ śṛṇotīha bhaktitaḥ
d apamṛtyuṃ jayaty āśu labhate sarvasaṃpadaḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tasmin vinihate vīre saindhave savyasācinā
c māmakā yad akurvanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
d paśyatāṃ sarvayodhānāṃ māmakānāṃ mahāraṇe
d ahanyata kathaṃ yuddhe saindhavaḥ savyasācinā
d kathaṃ drauṇikṛpair guptaḥ karṇena ca mahāraṇe
d phalgunāgnimukhaṃ ghoraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sādhu saindhavaḥ
d tasmin hate maheṣvāse mandātmā sa suyodhanaḥ
d bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sūta kim akārṣīd anantaram
 saṃjaya uvāca
a saindhavaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe pārthena māriṣa
c amarṣavaśam āpannaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tadā
a mahatā śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaṃ samavākirat
c drauṇiś cābhyadravat pārthaṃ ratham āsthāya phalgunam
a tāv enaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhau rathābhyāṃ rathasattamam
c ubhāv ubhayatas tīkṣṇair viśikhair abhyavarṣatām
a sa tathā śaravarṣābhyāṃ sumahadbhyāṃ mahābhujaḥ
c pīḍyamānaḥ parām ārtim agamad rathināṃ varaḥ
a so 'jighāṃsur guruṃ saṃkhye guros tanayam eva ca
c cakārācāryakaṃ tatra kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
a astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya drauṇeḥ śāradvatasya ca
c mandavegān iṣūṃs tābhyām ajighāṃsur avāsṛjat
a te nātibhṛśam abhyaghnan viśikhā jayacoditāḥ
c bahutvāt tu parām ārtiṃ śarāṇāṃ tāv agacchatām
a atha śāradvato rājan kaunteyaśarapīḍitaḥ
c avāsīdad rathopasthe mūrcchām abhijagāma ha
a vihvalaṃ tam abhijñāya bhartāraṃ śarapīḍitam
c hato 'yam iti ca jñātvā sārathis tam apāvahat
a tasmin sanne mahārāja kṛpe śāradvate yudhi
c aśvatthāmāpy apāyāsīt pāṇḍaveyād rathāntaram
a dṛṣṭvā śāradvataṃ pārtho mūrchitaṃ śarapīḍitam
c ratha eva maheṣvāsaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ paryadevayat
d aśrupūrṇamukho dīno vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
a paśyann idaṃ mahāprājñaḥ kṣattā rājānam uktavān
c kulāntakaraṇe pāpe jātamātre suyodhane
a nīyatāṃ paralokāya sādhv ayaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ
c asmād dhi kurumukhyānāṃ mahad utpatsyate bhayam
a tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ
c tatkṛte hy adya paśyāmi śaratalpagataṃ kṛpam
a dhig astu kṣātram ācāraṃ dhig astu balapauruṣam
c ko hi brāhmaṇam ācāryam abhidruhyeta mādṛśaḥ
a ṛṣiputro mamācāryo droṇasya dayitaḥ sakhā
c eṣa śete rathopasthe madbāṇair abhipīḍitaḥ
a akāmayānena mayā viśikhair ardito bhṛśam
c avāsīdad rathopasthe prāṇān pīḍayatīva me
a śarārditena hi mayā prekṣaṇīyo mahādyutiḥ
b putraśokābhibhūtena śarair abhyarditena ca
c pratyasto bahubhir bāṇair daśadharmagatena vai
a śocayaty eṣa nipatan bhūyaḥ putravadhād dhi mām
c kṛpaṇaṃ svarathe sannaṃ paśya kṛṣṇa yathā gatam
a upākṛtya tu vai vidyām ācāryebhyo nararṣabhāḥ
c prayacchantīha ye kāmān devatvam upayānti te
a ye tu vidyām upādāya gurubhyaḥ puruṣādhamāḥ
c ghnanti tān eva durvṛttās te vai nirayagāminaḥ
a tad idaṃ narakāyādya kṛtaṃ karma mayā dhruvam
c ācāryaṃ śaravarṣeṇa rathe sādayatā kṛpam
a yat tat pūrvam upākurvann astraṃ mām abravīt kṛpaḥ
c na kathaṃ cana kauravya prahartavyaṃ gurāv iti
a tad idaṃ vacanaṃ sādhor ācāryasya mahātmanaḥ
c nānuṣṭhitaṃ tam evājau viśikhair abhivarṣatā
a namas tasmai supūjyāya gautamāyāpalāyine
c dhig astu mama vārṣṇeya yo hy asmai praharāmy aham
a tathā vilapamāne tu savyasācini taṃ prati
b tataḥ kirīṭinā rājan vihvale gautame kṛte
b yathāgnir indhaneddho vai krodhendhanasamīritaḥ
c saindhavaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rādheyaḥ samupādravat
d saindhavasya mukhaṃ tyaktvā karṇaḥ sātvatam abhyayāt
d tam āpatantaṃ rādheyam arjunasya rathaṃ prati
d pāñcālyau sātyakiś caiva sahasā samupādravan
a upāyāntaṃ tu rādheyaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārtho mahārathaḥ
c prahasan devakīputram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a eṣa prayāty ādhirathiḥ sātyakeḥ syandanaṃ prati
c na mṛṣyati hataṃ nūnaṃ bhūriśravasam āhave
a yatra yāty eṣa tatra tvaṃ codayāśvāñ janārdana
c mā somadatteḥ padavīṃ gamayet sātyakiṃ vṛṣaḥ
a evam ukto mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ savyasācinā
c pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ kālayuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
a alam eṣa mahābāhuḥ karṇāyaiko hi pāṇḍava
c kiṃ punar draupadeyābhyāṃ sahitaḥ sātvatarṣabhaḥ
a na ca tāvat kṣamaḥ pārtha karṇena tava saṃgaraḥ
c prajvalantī maholkeva tiṣṭhaty asya hi vāsavī
e tvadarthaṃ pūjyamānaiṣā rakṣyate paravīrahan
f na karṇaṃ prākṛtaṃ manye tena yuddhaṃ na rocaye
f karṇo hi balavān ekaḥ śakto 'smāñ jetum ojasā
f na karṇaṃ hi vayaṃ śaktā jetuṃ sabalavāhanāḥ
f karṇasyaiṣa mahādoṣo yaj jīyeta pade pade
f pramādāc ca ghṛṇitvāc ca tena śakyatamo mataḥ
a ataḥ karṇaḥ prayātv atra sātvatasya yathā tathā
c ahaṃ jñāsyāmi kauravya kālam asya durātmanaḥ
d yatrainaṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayiṣyati bhūtale
d tadā gantāsi pārtha tvaṃ tena yoddhuṃ durātmanā
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a yo 'sau karṇena vīreṇa vārṣṇeyasya samāgamaḥ
b akāṅkṣitaś ca karṇena sa bhavatv atitejasaḥ
c hate tu bhūriśravasi saindhave ca nipātite
d saumadattiṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tad yuddham abhavat katham
a sātyakiś cāpi virathaḥ kaṃ samārūḍhavān ratham
c cakrarakṣau ca pāñcālyau tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a hanta te varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvṛttaṃ mahāraṇe
c śuśrūṣasva sthiro bhūtvā durācaritam ātmanaḥ
d paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ keśavārjunayor api
a pūrvam eva hi kṛṣṇasya manogatam idaṃ prabho
c vijetavyo yathā vīraḥ sātyakir yūpaketunā
a atītānāgataṃ rājan sa hi vetti janārdanaḥ
c ataḥ sūtaṃ samāhūya dārukaṃ saṃdideśa ha
e ratho me yujyatāṃ kālyam iti rājan mahābalaḥ
f dārukaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃdiṣṭaṃ rātrāv uktaṃ hṛdā vahan
a na hi devā na gandharvā na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ
c mānavā vā vijetāraḥ kṛṣṇayoḥ santi ke cana
d ubhayoḥ senayoś caiva ye yaudhāḥ santi ke cana
a pitāmahapurogāś ca devāḥ siddhāś ca taṃ viduḥ
c tayoḥ prabhāvam atulaṃ śṛṇu yuddhaṃ ca tad yathā
a sātyakiṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ cābhyudyatāyudham
c dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahāvegam ārṣabheṇātha mādhavaḥ
a dāruko 'vetya saṃdeśaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya ca svanam
c ratham anvānayat tasmai suparṇocchritaketanam
a sa keśavasyānumate rathaṃ dārukasaṃyutam
c āruroha śineḥ pautro jvalanādityasaṃnibham
a kāmagaiḥ sainyasugrīvameghapuṣpabalāhakaiḥ
c hayodagrair mahāvegair hemabhāṇḍavibhūṣitaiḥ
a yuktaṃ samāruhya ca taṃ vimānapratimaṃ ratham
c abhyadravata rādheyaṃ pravapan sāyakān bahūn
a cakrarakṣāv api tadā yudhāmanyūttamaujasau
c dhanaṃjayarathaṃ hitvā rādheyaṃ pratyudīyayuḥ
a rādheyo 'pi mahārāja śaravarṣaṃ samutsṛjan
c abhyadravat susaṃkruddho raṇe śaineyam acyutam
a naiva daivaṃ na gāndharvaṃ nāsuroragarākṣasam
c tādṛśaṃ bhuvi vā yuddhaṃ divi vā śrutam ity uta
a upāramata tat sainyaṃ sarathāśvanaradvipam
c tayor dṛṣṭvā mahārāja karma saṃmūḍhacetanam
a sarve ca samapaśyanta tad yuddham atimānuṣam
c tayor nṛvarayo rājan sārathyaṃ dārukasya ca
a gatapratyāgatāvṛttair maṇḍalaiḥ saṃnivartanaiḥ
c sārathes tu rathasthasya kāśyapeyasya vismitāḥ
a nabhastalagatāś caiva devagandharvadānavāḥ
c atīvāvahitā draṣṭuṃ karṇaśaineyayo raṇam
a mitrārthe tau parākrāntau spardhinau śuṣmiṇau raṇe
c karṇaś cāmarasaṃkāśo yuyudhānaś ca sātyakiḥ
d karṇas tv amitavikrāntas tava priyahite rataḥ
a anyonyaṃ tau mahārāja śaravarṣair avarṣatām
c pramamātha śineḥ pautraṃ karṇaḥ sāyakavṛṣṭibhiḥ
a amṛṣyamāṇo nidhanaṃ kauravyajalasaṃdhayoḥ
b jalasaṃdhaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūriśravasam eva ca
c karṇaḥ śokasamāviṣṭo mahoraga iva śvasan
a sa śaineyaṃ raṇe kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā
c abhyadravata vegena punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥ
d abhyardayan mahābāhuḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ
a taṃ tu saṃprekṣya saṃkruddhaṃ sātyakiḥ pratyavidhyata
b śarair eva prajagrāha satyako vṛṣṇipuṃgavaḥ
b tatrāścaryaṃ tadā rājann akaroc chininandanaḥ
b karṇaṃ ca prativivyādha śarāṃs tatprahitāñ śitān
b tatas tau spardhayā vīrāv ubhau yuddhaviśāradau
b atakṣatām athānyonyaṃ ubhau vijayakāṅkṣiṇau
c mahatā śaravarṣeṇa gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathā
a tau sametya naravyāghrau vyāghrāv iva tarasvinau
b bāṇasaṃkulayuddhaiś ca spardhinau yuddhadurmadau
c anyonyaṃ saṃtatakṣāte raṇe 'nupamavikramau
a tataḥ karṇaṃ śineḥ pautraḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥ
c bibheda sarvagātreṣu punaḥ punar ariṃdamaḥ
a sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena rathanīḍād apāharat
c aśvāṃś ca caturaḥ śvetān nijaghne niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a chittvā dhvajaṃ śatenaiva śatadhā puruṣarṣabhaḥ
b dhvajaṃ ciccheda chattraṃ ca rathaṃ ca śatadhākarot
c cakāra virathaṃ karṇaṃ tava putrasya paśyataḥ
a tato vimanaso rājaṃs tāvakāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c vṛṣasenaḥ karṇasutaḥ śalyo madrādhipas tathā
d kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca saṃyuge
a droṇaputraś ca śaineyaṃ sarvataḥ paryavārayan
c tataḥ paryākulaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
a tathā sātyakinā vīre virathe sūtaje kṛte
b tadā puruṣavīreṇa satyakena tathākṛte
c hāhākāras tato rājan sarvasainyeṣu cābhavat
a karṇo 'pi vihvalo rājan sātvatenārditaḥ śaraiḥ
c duryodhanarathaṃ rājann āruroha viniḥśvasan
a mānayaṃs tava putrasya bālyāt prabhṛti sauhṛdam
c kṛtāṃ rājyapradānena pratijñāṃ paripālayan
a tathā tu virathe karṇe putrān vai tava pārthiva
c duḥśāsanamukhāñ śūrān nāvadhīt sātyakir vaśī
a rakṣan pratijñāṃ ca punar bhīmasenakṛtāṃ purā
c virathān vihvalāṃś cakre na tu prāṇair vyayojayat
a bhīmasenena tu vadhaḥ putrāṇāṃ te pratiśrutaḥ
c punardyūte ca pārthena vadhaḥ karṇasya śaṃśrutaḥ
a vadhe tv akurvan yatnaṃ te tasya karṇamukhās tadā
b vadhe yatnam athākārṣīt karṇas tava sutaiḥ saha
c nāśaknuvaṃś ca taṃ hantuṃ sātyakiṃ pravarā rathāḥ
d satyakas tu sutāṃs te vai vyadhamal līlayā śaraiḥ
a drauṇiś ca kṛtavarmā ca tathaivānye mahārathāḥ
c nirjitā dhanuṣaikena śataśaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
e kāṅkṣatā paralokaṃ ca dharmarājasya ca priyam
a kṛṣṇayoḥ sadṛśo vīrye sātyakiḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
b jitavān sarvasainyāni tāvakāni hasann iva
c kṛṣṇo vāpi bhavel loke pārtho vāpi dhanurdharaḥ
e śaineyo vā naravyāghraś caturtho nopalabhyate
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ajayyaṃ ratham āsthāya vāsudevasya sātyakiḥ
c virathaṃ kṛtavān karṇaṃ vāsudevasamo yuvā
d cakāra virathaṃ karṇaṃ tava sainyasya paśyataḥ
d pārthena sadṛśo yuddhe vāsudevasamo yuvā
d sarvakṣatriyavīrāṇāṃ ekavīras tu sūtajam
a dārukeṇa samāyuktaṃ svabāhubaladarpitaḥ
c kaccid anyaṃ samārūḍhaḥ sa rathaṃ sātyakiḥ punaḥ
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ kuśalo hy asi bhāṣitum
c asahyaṃ tam ahaṃ manye tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
d asahyaṃ sātyakiṃ manye rathameghaughanisvanam
d saṃjayācakṣva bhūyo me yac cakrāte punaś ca tau
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śṛṇu rājan yathā tasya ratham anyaṃ mahāmatiḥ
c dārukasyānujas tūrṇaṃ kalpanāvidhikalpitam
a āyasaiḥ kāñcanaiś cāpi paṭṭair naddhaṃ sakūbaram
c tārāsahasrakhacitaṃ siṃhadhvajapatākinam
a aśvair vātajavair yuktaṃ hemabhāṇḍaparicchadaiḥ
c pāṇḍurair indusaṃkāśaiḥ sarvaśabdātigair dṛḍhaiḥ
a citrakāñcanasaṃnāhair vājimukhyair viśāṃ pate
c ghaṇṭājālākularavaṃ śaktitomaravidyutam
a vṛtaṃ sāṃgrāmikair dravyair bahuśastraparicchadam
c rathaṃ saṃpādayām āsa meghagambhīranisvanam
a taṃ samāruhya śaineyas tava sainyam upādravat
c dāruko 'pi yathākāmaṃ prayayau keśavāntikam
a karṇasyāpi mahārāja śaṅkhagokṣīrapāṇḍuraiḥ
c citrakāñcanasaṃnāhaiḥ sadaśvair vegavattaraiḥ
a hemakakṣyādhvajopetaṃ kḷptayantrapatākinam
c agryaṃ rathaṃ suyantāraṃ bahuśastraparicchadam
a upājahrus tam āsthāya karṇo 'py abhyadravad ripūn
c etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
a bhūyaś cāpi nibodha tvaṃ tavāpanayajaṃ kṣayam
c ekatriṃśat tava sutā bhīmasenena pātitāḥ
a durmukhaṃ pramukhe kṛtvā satataṃ citrayodhinam
c śataśo nihatāḥ śūrāḥ sātvatenārjunena ca
a bhīṣmaṃ pramukhataḥ kṛtvā bhagadattaṃ ca māriṣa
c evam eṣa kṣayo vṛtto rājan durmantrite tava
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tathā gateṣu śūreṣu teṣāṃ mama ca saṃjaya
c kiṃ vai bhīmas tadākārṣīt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
d kiṃ vai bhīmārjunau tatra sātyakiś cākarot tadā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a viratho bhīmaseno vai karṇavākśalyapīḍitaḥ
c amarṣavaśam āpannaḥ phalgunaṃ vākyam abravīt
a punaḥ punas tūbaraka mūḍha audariketi ca
c akṛtāstraka mā yodhīr bāla saṃgrāmakātara
a iti mām abravīt karṇaḥ paśyatas te dhanaṃjaya
c evaṃ vaktā ca me vadhyas tena cokto 'smi bhārata
a etad vrataṃ mahābāho tvayā saha kṛtaṃ mayā
c yathaitan mama kaunteya tathā tava na saṃśayaḥ
a tadvadhāya naraśreṣṭha smaraitad vacanaṃ mama
c yathā bhavati tat satyaṃ tathā kuru dhanaṃjaya
a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya bhīmasyāmitavikramaḥ
b vacanaṃ bhīmasenasya śrutvā tv amaravikramaḥ
c tato 'rjuno 'bravīt karṇaṃ kiṃ cid abhyetya saṃyuge
a karṇa karṇa vṛthādṛṣṭe sūtaputrātmasaṃstuta
c adharmabuddhe śṛṇu me yat tvā vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam
a dvividhaṃ karma śūrāṇāṃ yuddhe jayaparājayau
c tau cāpy anityau rādheya vāsavasyāpi yudhyataḥ
d raṇam utsṛjya nirlajja gacchase vai punaḥ punaḥ
d māhātmyaṃ paśya bhīmasya karṇa janma kule tathā
d noktavān paruṣaṃ yat tvā palāyanaparāyaṇam
d bhūyas tvam api saṃgamya sakṛd eva yadṛcchayā
d virathaṃ hatavān vīraṃ pāṇḍavaṃ sūtadāyada
d kulasya sadṛśaṃ cāpi rādheya kṛtavān asi
d tvam idānīṃ naraśreṣṭha prastutaṃ nāvabudhyase
d sṛgāla iva manye 'haṃ kṣatraṃ tvam avamanyase
d pitryaṃ karmāsya saṃgrāmas tavāstv anyaḥ kulocitaḥ
d ahaṃ tvām api rādheya bravīmi raṇamūrdhani
d sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ madhye kuru kāryāṇi sarvaśaḥ
d naikāntasiddhiḥ saṃgrāme vāsavasyāpi vidyate
a mumūrṣur yuyudhānena viratho 'si visarjitaḥ
b madvadhyas tvam iti jñātvā jitvā jīvan visarjitaḥ
c yadṛcchayā bhīmasenaṃ virathaṃ kṛtavān asi
d sa tvayā bhīmasenasya jayaḥ prāpto yadṛcchayā
a adharmas tv eṣa rādheya yat tvaṃ bhīmam avocathāḥ
c yuddhadharmaṃ vijānan vai yudhyantam apalāyinam
d kathaṃ cid virathaṃ kṛtvā yat tvaṃ rūkṣam abhāṣathāḥ
d adharmas tv eṣa sumahān anāryacaritaṃ ca tat
d nāriṃ jitvātikatthante na ca jalpanti durvacaḥ
d na ca kaṃ cana nindanti santaḥ śūrā nararṣabhāḥ
d tvaṃ tu prākṛtavijñānas tat tad vadasi sūtaja
d bahvabaddham akarṇyaṃ ca cāpalād aparīkṣitam
e pūrayantaṃ yathāśakti śūrakarmāhave tathā
f yudhyamānaṃ parākrāntaṃ śūram āryavrate ratam
f yad avoco 'priyaṃ bhīmaṃ naitat satyaṃ vacas tava
a paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ keśavasya mamaiva ca
c viratho bhīmasenena kṛto 'si bahuśo raṇe
e na ca tvāṃ paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid uktavān paṇḍunandanaḥ
a yasmāt tu bahu rūkṣaṃ ca śrāvitas te vṛkodaraḥ
c parokṣaṃ yac ca saubhadro yuṣmābhir nihato mama
a tasmād asyāvalepasya sadyaḥ phalam avāpnuhi
c tvayā tasya dhanuś chinnam ātmanāśāya durmate
a tasmād vadhyo 'si me mūḍha sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
c kuru tvaṃ sarvakṛtyāni mahat te bhayam āgatam
a hantāsmi vṛṣasenaṃ te prekṣamāṇasya saṃyuge
c ye cānye 'py upayāsyanti buddhimohena māṃ nṛpāḥ
d ye ca tatrāpi hantāram upayāsyanti māṃ yudhi
e tāṃś ca sarvān haniṣyāmi satyenāyudham ālabhe
a tvāṃ ca mūḍhākṛtaprajñam atimāninam āhave
b muṇḍinaṃ tu haniṣyāmi tvāṃ ca karṇātimāninam
c dṛṣṭvā duryodhano mando bhṛśaṃ tapsyati pātitam
a arjunena pratijñāte vadhe karṇasutasya tu
c mahān sutumulaḥ śabdo babhūva rathināṃ tadā
a tasminn ākulasaṃgrāme vartamāne mahābhaye
c mandaraśmiḥ sahasrāṃśur astaṃ girim upāgamat
d tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsīnāḥ sarva eva nṛpottamāḥ
d vyadṛśyantottamaruco mūrtimanta ivāgnayaḥ
d lohitāyati cāditye tvaramāṇo dhanaṃjayaḥ
d sahitaś cakrarakṣābhyāṃ śinīnām ṛṣabheṇa ca
d yudhāmanyurathasthena bhīmena sahito 'nagha
d jayadrathānugair vīrair yuddhāya samupāyayau
a tato rājan hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃgrāmaśirasi sthitam
c tīrṇapratijñaṃ bībhatsuṃ pariṣvajyedam abravīt
a diṣṭyā saṃpāditā jiṣṇo pratijñā mahatī tvayā
c diṣṭyā ca nihataḥ pāpo vṛddhakṣatraḥ sahātmajaḥ
a dhārtarāṣṭrabalaṃ prāpya devasenāpi bhārata
c sīdeta samare jiṣṇo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
a na taṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu cintayan puruṣaṃ kva cit
c tvad ṛte puruṣavyāghra ya etad yodhayed balam
a mahāprabhāvā bahavas tvayā tulyādhikāpi vā
c sametāḥ pṛthivīpālā dhārtarāṣṭrasya kāraṇāt
e te tvāṃ prāpya raṇe kruddhaṃ nābhyavartanta daṃśitāḥ
a tava vīryaṃ balaṃ caiva rudraśakrāntakopamam
c nedṛśaṃ śaknuyāt kaś cid raṇe kartuṃ parākramam
e yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān adya tvam ekaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
a evam eva hate karṇe sānubandhe durātmani
c vardhayiṣyāmi bhūyas tvāṃ vijitāriṃ hatadviṣam
a tam arjunaḥ pratyuvāca prasādāt tava mādhava
c pratijñeyaṃ mayottīrṇā vibudhair api dustarā
a anāścaryo jayas teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ nātho 'si mādhava
c tvatprasādān mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saṃprāpsyati yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a tavaiva bhāro vārṣṇeya tavaiva vijayaḥ prabho
c vardhanīyās tava vayaṃ preṣyāś ca madhusūdana
a evam uktaḥ smayan kṛṣṇaḥ śanakair vāhayan hayān
c darśayām āsa pārthāya krūram āyodhanaṃ mahat
 śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca
a prārthayanto jayaṃ yuddhe prathitaṃ ca mahad yaśaḥ
c pṛthivyāṃ śerate śūrāḥ pārthivās tvaccharair hatāḥ
a vikīrṇaśastrābharaṇā vipannāśvarathadvipāḥ
c saṃchinnabhinnavarmāṇo vaiklavyaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
a sasattvā gatasattvāś ca prabhayā parayā yutāḥ
c sajīvā iva lakṣyante gatasattvā narādhipāḥ
a teṣāṃ śaraiḥ svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śastraiś ca vividhaiḥ śitaiḥ
c vāhanair āyudhaiś caiva saṃpūrṇāṃ paśya medinīm
a varmabhiś carmabhir hāraiḥ śirobhiś ca sakuṇḍalaiḥ
c uṣṇīṣair mukuṭaiḥ sragbhiś cūḍāmaṇibhir ambaraiḥ
a kaṇṭhasūtrair aṅgadaiś ca niṣkair api ca suprabhaiḥ
c anyaiś cābharaṇaiś citrair bhāti bhārata medinī
d anukarṣair upāsaṅgaiḥ patākābhir dhvajais tathā
d upaskarair adhiṣṭhānair īṣādaṇḍakabandhuraiḥ
d cakraiḥ pramathitaiś citrair akṣaiś ca bahudhā raṇe
d yugair yoktraiḥ kalāpaiś ca dhanurbhiḥ sāyakais tathā
d paristomaiḥ kuthābhiś ca parighair aṅkuśais tathā
d śaktibhir bhindipālaiś ca tūṇaiḥ śūlaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
d prāsaiś ca tomaraiś caiva kuntair yaṣṭibhir eva ca
d śataghnībhir bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśubhis tathā
d musalair mudgaraiś caiva gadābhiḥ kuṇapais tathā
d suvarṇavikṛtābhiś ca kaśābhir bharatarṣabha
d ghaṇṭābhiś ca gajendrāṇāṃ bhāṇḍaiś ca vividhair api
d sragbhiś ca nānābharaṇair vastraiś caiva mahādhanaiḥ
d apaviddhair babhau bhūmir grahair dyaur iva śāradī
d pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīhetoḥ pṛthivīpatayo hatāḥ
d pṛthivīm upaguhyāṅgaiḥ suptāḥ kāntām iva priyām
d imāṃś ca girikūṭābhān nāgān airāvatopamān
d kṣarataḥ śoṇitaṃ bhūri śastracchedadarīmukhaiḥ
d darīmukhair iva girīn gairikāmbuparisravān
d tava bāṇahatān vīra paśya niṣṭanataḥ kṣitau
d hayāṃś ca patitān paśya svarṇabhāṇḍavibhūṣitān
d gandharvanagarākārān rathāṃś ca nihateśvarān
d chinnadhvajapatākākṣān vicakrān hatasārathīn
d nikṛttakūbarayugān bhagneṣān bandhurān prabho
d paśya pārtha hayān bhūmau vimānopamadarśanān
d pattīṃś ca nihatān vīra śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d dhanurbhṛtaś carmabhṛtaḥ śayānān rudhirokṣitān
d mahīm āliṅgya sarvāṅgaiḥ pāṃsudhvastaśiroruhān
d paśya yodhān mahābāho tvaccharair bhinnavigrahān
d nipātitadviparathavājisaṃkulam
d asṛgvasāpiśitasamṛddhakardamam
d niśācaraśvavṛkapiśācamodanaṃ
d mahītalaṃ naravara paśya durdṛśam
d idaṃ mahat tvayy upapadyate vibho
d raṇājire karma yaśobhivardhanam
d śatakratau cāpi ca devasattame
d mahāhave jaghnuṣi daityadānavān
d sa darśayann eva kirīṭine 'rihā
d janārdanas tām aribhūmim añjasā
d ajātaśatruṃ samupetya pāṇḍavaṃ
d nivedayām āsa hataṃ jayadratham
a cāmarair vyajanaiś citrair dhvajaiś cāśvarathadvipaiḥ
c vividhaiś ca paristomair aśvānāṃ ca prakīrṇakaiḥ
a kuthābhiś ca vicitrābhir varūthaiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
c saṃstīrṇāṃ vasudhāṃ paśya citrapaṭṭair ivāvṛtām
a nāgebhyaḥ patitān anyān kalpitebhyo dvipaiḥ saha
c siṃhān vajrapraṇunnebhyo giryagrebhya iva cyutān
a saṃsyūtān vājibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dharaṇyāṃ paśya cāparān
c padātisādisaṃghāṃś ca kṣatajaughapariplutān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evaṃ saṃdarśayan kṛṣṇo raṇabhūmiṃ kirīṭinaḥ
c svaiḥ sametaḥ sa muditaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ vyanādayat
d sa darśayann eva kirīṭīne 'rihā
d janārdanas tām aribhūmim añjasā
d ajātaśatruṃ samupetya pāṇḍavaṃ
d nivedayām āsa hataṃ jayadratham
d sātyakiḥ pārtham abhyāyād bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
d yudhāmanyūttamaujau ca pāñcālasyātmajāv ubhau
d te nivārya śarair drauṇiṃ karṇaṃ ca saha bhūmipaiḥ
d agacchan rathinaś caiva yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 tato rājānam abhyetya dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
 cacakṣe saṃprahṛṣṭātmā hataṃ pārthena saindhavam
 diṣṭyā vardhasi rājendra hataśatrur narottama
 diṣṭyā nistīrṇavāṃś caiva pratijñām anujas tava
 sa tv evam uktaḥ kṛṣṇena hṛṣṭaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā rathād āplutya bhārata
c paryaṣvajat tadā kṛṣṇāv ānandāśrupariplutaḥ
d avatīrya rathād rājā paryaṣvajata keśavam
d saṃprahṛṣṭamanā rājan dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a pramṛjya vadanaṃ śubhraṃ puṇḍarīkasamaprabham
c abravīd vāsudevaṃ ca pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
a diṣṭyā paśyāmi saṃgrāme tīrṇabhārau mahārathau
c diṣṭyā ca nihataḥ pāpaḥ saindhavaḥ puruṣādhamaḥ
a kṛṣṇa diṣṭyā mama prītir mahatī pratipāditā
c diṣṭyā śatrugaṇāś caiva nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
a na teṣāṃ duṣkaraṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
c sarvalokagurur yeṣāṃ tvaṃ nātho madhusūdana
a tava prasādād govinda vayaṃ jeṣyāmahe ripūn
c yathā pūrvaṃ prasādāt te dānavān pākaśāsanaḥ
a pṛthivīvijayo vāpi trailokyavijayo 'pi vā
c dhruvo hi teṣāṃ vārṣṇeya yeṣāṃ tuṣṭo 'si mādhava
d tvatprasādād dhṛṣīkeśa rājyaṃ prāpsyāmi cottamam
a na teṣāṃ vidyate pāpaṃ saṃgrāme vā parājayaḥ
c tridaśeśvaranāthas tvaṃ yeṣāṃ tuṣṭo 'si mādhava
a tvatprasādād dhṛṣīkeśa śakraḥ suragaṇeśvaraḥ
c trailokyavijayaṃ śrīmān prāptavān raṇamūrdhani
a tava caiva prasādena tridaśās tridaśeśvara
c amaratvaṃ gatāḥ kṛṣṇa lokāṃś cāśnuvate 'kṣayān
a tvatprasādasamutthena vikrameṇārisūdana
c sureśatvaṃ gataḥ śakro hatvā daityān sahasraśaḥ
a tvatprasādād dhṛṣīkeśa jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
c svavartmani sthitaṃ vīra japahomeṣu vartate
a ekārṇavam idaṃ pūrvaṃ sarvam āsīt tamomayam
c tvatprasādāt prakāśatvaṃ jagat prāptaṃ narottama
a sraṣṭāraṃ sarvalokānāṃ paramātmānam acyutam
c ye prapannā hṛṣīkeśaṃ na te muhyanti karhi cit
d purāṇaṃ paramaṃ devaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam
d ye prapannāḥ suraguruṃ na te muhyanti karhi cit
a anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ lokakartāram avyayam
c tvāṃ bhaktā ye hṛṣīkeśa durgāṇy atitaranti te
a paraṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇānāṃ paraṃ ca yat
c prapadyatas taṃ paramaṃ parā bhūtir vidhīyate
d goptāraṃ sarvalokānāṃ yat tad brahma sanātanam
d lokādiṃ viśvakarmāṇam akṣayakṣaram akṣaram
d manasaḥ paramāṃ yoniṃ khaṃ vāyur jyotiṣāṃ nidhim
a yo 'gāta caturo vedān yaś ca vedeṣu gīyate
c taṃ prapadya mahātmānaṃ bhūtim āpnoty anuttamām
d sraṣṭāraṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ bhuvaś ca prakṛtiṃ parām
d yogānāṃ ca paraṃ brahma dīptaṃ brahmavidāṃ nidhim
d carācarasya sraṣṭāraṃ pratihartāram eva ca
d tvām ajaṃ kāraṇātmānaṃ prapadye pāṇḍavapriyam
d parameśa pareśeśa tiryag īśa nareśvara
d sarveśvareśvareśeśa namas te puruṣottama
d tvam īśeśeśvareśāna prabho vardhasva mādhava
d prabhavāpyaya sarvasya sarvātman pṛthulocana
a dhanaṃjayasakhā yaś ca dhanaṃjayahitaś ca yaḥ
c taṃ dhanaṃjayagoptāraṃ prapadya sukham edhate
d saṃhṛṣṭendriyacittātmā nāśakad vaktum ojasā
d muhūrtam iva harṣeṇa tūṣṇīṃ bhūtvā mahāmatiḥ
d tato harṣānvito rājā harṣāśruplutalocanaḥ
d uvāca paramaprītaḥ sagadgadam idaṃ vacaḥ
d priyam etad upaśrutya tvattaḥ puṣkaralocana
d nāntaṃ gacchāmi harṣasya titīrṣur udadher iva
d atyadbhutam idaṃ kṛṣṇa kṛtaṃ pārthena dhīmatā
d tvayā guptena govinda ghnatā pāpaṃ jayadratham
d kiṃ tu nātyadbhutaṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ nas tvaṃ samāśrayaḥ
d sthitaḥ sarvātmanā nityaṃ priyeṣu ca hiteṣu ca
d tvaṃ caivāsmābhir āśritya kṛtaḥ śastrasamudyamaḥ
d surair ivāsuravadhe śakraṃ śakrānujāhave
d asaṃbhāvyam idaṃ karma devair api janārdana
d tvadbuddhibalavīryeṇa kṛtavān eṣa phalgunaḥ
d bālyāt prabhṛti te kṛṣṇa karmāṇi śrutavān aham
d amānuṣāṇi divyāni mahānti ca bahūni ca
d yadaivānugṛhītāḥ sma tvayā snehānurāgataḥ
d tadaivājñāsiṣaṃ śatrūn hatān prāptāṃ ca medinīm
d mārkaṇḍeyaḥ purāṇarṣiś caritajñas tavānagha
d māhātmyam anubhāvaṃ ca purā kīrtitavān muniḥ
d asito devalaś caiva nāradaś ca mahātapāḥ
d pitāmahaś ca me vyāsas tvām āhur vidhim uttamam
d tvaṃ tejas tvaṃ paraṃ brahma tvaṃ satyaṃ tvaṃ mahat tapaḥ
d tvaṃ śreyas tvaṃ yaśaś cāgryaṃ kāraṇaṃ jagatas tathā
d tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
d pralaye samanuprāpte tvāṃ vai niviśate punaḥ
d anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ viśvam īśaṃ prajāpatim
d dhātāram ajam avyaktam āhur vedavido janāḥ
d bhūtātmānaṃ mahātmānam anantaṃ viśvatomukham
d api devā na jānanti guhyam ādyaṃ jagatpatim
d nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ devaṃ paramātmānam aīśvaram
d jñānayoniṃ hariṃ viṣṇuṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ parāyaṇam
d paraṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇānāṃ paraṃ ca yat
d evamādiguṇānāṃ te karmaṇāṃ divi ceha ca
d atītabhūtabhavyānāṃ saṃkhyātātra na vidyate
d sarvato rakṣaṇīyāḥ sma saśakrāṇāṃ divaukasām
d yais tvaṃ sarvaguṇopetaḥ suhṛn na upapāditaḥ
d ity evaṃ dharmarājena harir ukto mahāyaśāḥ
d anurūpam idaṃ vākyaṃ pratyuvāca janārdanaḥ
d bhavatas tapasogreṇa dharmeṇa parameṇa ca
d sādhutvād ārjavāc caiva hataḥ pāpo jayadrathaḥ
d ayaṃ ca puruṣavyāghra tvadanudhyānabṛṃhitaḥ
d hatvā yodhasahasrāṇi nyahañ jiṣṇur jayadratham
d kṛtitve bāhuvīrye ca tathaivāsaṃbhrame 'pi ca
d śīghratāmoghavedhitve nāsti pārthasamaḥ kva cit
d tad ayaṃ bharataśreṣṭha bhrātā te pāṇḍavārjunaḥ
d sainyakṣayaṃ raṇe kṛtvā sindhurājaśiro 'harat
d tato dharmasuto jiṣṇuṃ pariṣvajya viśāṃ pate
d pramṛjya vadanaṃ cāsya paryāśvāsayata prabhuḥ
d atīva sumahat karma kṛtavān asi phalguna
d asahyaṃ cāviṣahyaṃ ca devair api savāsavaiḥ
d diṣṭyā nistīrṇabhāro 'si hatāriś cāsi śatruhan
d diṣṭyā satyā pratijñeyaṃ kṛtā hatvā jayadratham
d evam uktvā guḍākeśaṃ dharmarājo mahāyaśāḥ
d pasparśa puṇyagandhena pṛṣṭhe hastena pārthivaḥ
a ity uktau tau mahātmānāv ubhau keśavapāṇḍavau
c tāv abrūtāṃ tadā hṛṣṭau rājānaṃ pṛthivīpatim
a tava kopāgninā dagdhaḥ pāpo rājā jayadrathaḥ
c udīrṇaṃ cāpi sumahad dhārtarāṣṭrabalaṃ raṇe
a hanyate nihataṃ caiva vinaṅkṣyati ca bhārata
c tava krodhahatā hy ete kauravāḥ śatrusūdana
a tvāṃ hi cakṣurhaṇaṃ vīraṃ kopayitvā suyodhanaḥ
c samitrabandhuḥ samare prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati durmatiḥ
a tava krodhahataḥ pūrvaṃ devair api sudurjayaḥ
c śaratalpagataḥ śete bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
a durlabho hi jayas teṣāṃ saṃgrāme ripusūdana
c yātā mṛtyuvaśaṃ te vai yeṣāṃ kruddho 'si pāṇḍava
a rājyaṃ prāṇāḥ priyāḥ putrāḥ saukhyāni vividhāni ca
c acirāt tasya naśyanti yeṣāṃ kruddho 'si mānada
a vinaṣṭān kauravān manye saputrapaśubāndhavān
b śrībhagavān uvāca
b evam etan mahābāho vinaṣṭāḥ kauravā mṛdhe
c rājadharmapare nityaṃ tvayi kruddhe yudhiṣṭhira
a tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
c abhivādya guruṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ mārgaṇaiḥ kṣatavikṣatau
e sthitāv āstāṃ maheṣvāsau pāñcālyaiḥ parivāritau
a tau dṛṣṭva muditau vīrau prāñjalī cāgrataḥ sthitau
c abhyanandata kaunteyas tāv ubhau bhīmasātyakī
a diṣṭyā paśyāmi vāṃ vīrau vimuktau sainyasāgarāt
c droṇagrāhād durādharṣād dhārdikyamakarālayāt
e diṣṭyā ca nirjitāḥ saṃkhye pṛthivyāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ
a yuvāṃ vijayinau cāpi diṣṭyā paśyāmi saṃyuge
c diṣṭyā droṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye hārdikyaś ca mahābalaḥ
d diṣṭyā vikarṇibhiḥ karṇo raṇe nītaḥ parābhavam
d vimukhaś ca kṛtaḥ śalyo yuvābhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhau
d diṣṭyā yuvāṃ kuśalinau saṃgrāmāt punar āgatau
d paśyāmi rathināṃ śreṣṭhāv ubhau yuddhaviśāradau
d mama vākyakarau vīrau mama gauravayantritau
a sainyārṇavaṃ samuttīrṇau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cānaghau
c samaraślāghinau vīrau samareṣv apalāyinau
e mama prāṇasamau caiva diṣṭyā paśyāmi vām aham
a ity uktvā pāṇḍavo rājā yuyudhānavṛkodarau
c sasvaje puruṣavyāghrau harṣād bāṣpaṃ mumoca ha
a tataḥ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ balam āsīd viśāṃ pate
c pāṇḍavānāṃ jayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yuddhāya ca mano dadhe
 saṃjaya uvāca
a saindhave nihate rājan putras tava suyodhanaḥ
c aśruklinnamukho dīno nirutsāho dviṣajjaye
d durmanā niḥśvasann uṣṇo bhagnadaṃṣṭra ivoragaḥ
d āgaskṛt sarvalokasya putras te 'rtiṃ parām agāt
d dṛṣṭvā tat kadanaṃ ghoraṃ svabalasya kṛtaṃ mahat
d jiṣṇunā bhīmasenena sātvatena ca saṃyuge
d sa vivarṇaḥ kṛśo dīno bāṣpaviplutalocanaḥ
e amanyatārjunasamo yodho bhuvi na vidyate
a na droṇo na ca rādheyo nāśvatthāmā kṛpo na ca
c kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ paryāptā iti māriṣa
a nirjitya hi raṇe pārthaḥ sarvān mama mahārathān
c avadhīt saindhavaṃ saṃkhye nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat
a sarvathā hatam evaitat kauravāṇāṃ mahad balam
c na hy asya vidyate trātā sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
a yam upāśritya saṃgrāme kṛtaḥ śastrasamudyamaḥ
c sa karṇo nirjitaḥ saṃkhye hataś caiva jayadrathaḥ
a paruṣāṇi sabhāmadhye proktavān yaḥ sma pāṇḍavān
b vadho yena pratijñātaḥ saṃyuge savyasācinaḥ
c sa karṇo nirjitaḥ saṃkhye saindhavaś ca nipātitaḥ
a yasya vīryaṃ samāśritya śamaṃ yācantam acyutam
c tṛṇavat tam ahaṃ manye sa karṇo nirjito yudhi
a evaṃ klāntamanā rājann upāyād droṇam īkṣitum
c āgaskṛt sarvalokasya putras te bharatarṣabha
a tatas tat sarvam ācakhyau kurūṇāṃ vaiśasaṃ mahat
c parān vijayataś cāpi dhārtarāṣṭrān nimajjataḥ
 duryodhana uvāca
a paśya mūrdhāvasiktānām ācārya kadanaṃ kṛtam
c kṛtvā pramukhataḥ śūraṃ bhīṣmaṃ mama pitāmaham
a taṃ nihatya pralubdho 'yaṃ śikhaṇḍī pūrṇamānasaḥ
c pāñcālaiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ senāgram abhikarṣati
a aparaś cāpi durdharṣaḥ śiṣyas te savyasācinā
c akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta hatvā hato rājā jayadrathaḥ
a asmadvijayakāmānāṃ suhṛdām upakāriṇām
c gantāsmi katham ānṛṇyaṃ gatānāṃ yamasādanam
a ye madarthaṃ parīpsanti vasudhāṃ vasudhādhipāḥ
c te hitvā vasudhaiśvaryaṃ vasudhām adhiśerate
a so 'haṃ kāpuruṣaḥ kṛtvā mitrāṇāṃ kṣayam īdṛśam
c nāśvamedhasahasreṇa pātum ātmānam utsahe
a mama lubdhasya pāpasya tathā dharmāpacāyinaḥ
c vyāyacchanto jigīṣantaḥ prāptā vaivasvatakṣayam
a kathaṃ patitavṛttasya pṛthivī suhṛdāṃ druhaḥ
c vivaraṃ nāśakad dātuṃ mama pārthivasaṃsadi
a so 'haṃ rudhirasiktāṅgaṃ rājñāṃ madhye pitāmaham
c śayānaṃ nāśakaṃ trātuṃ bhīṣmam āyodhane hatam
a taṃ mām anāryapuruṣaṃ mitradruham adhārmikam
c kiṃ sa vakṣyati durdharṣaḥ sametya paralokajit
a jalasaṃdhaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ paśya sātyakinā hatam
c madartham udyataṃ śūraṃ prāṇāṃs tyaktvā mahāratham
a kāmbojaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā tathālambusam eva ca
c anyān bahūṃś ca suhṛdo jīvitārtho 'dya ko mama
a vyāyacchanto hatāḥ śūrā madarthe ye 'parāṅmukhāḥ
c yatamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā vijetum ahitān mama
a teṣāṃ gatvāham ānṛṇyam adya śaktyā paraṃtapa
c tarpayiṣyāmi tān eva jalena yamunām anu
a satyaṃ te pratijānāmi sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ vara
c iṣṭāpūrtena ca śape vīryeṇa ca sutair api
a nihatya tān raṇe sarvān pāñcālān pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
c śāntiṃ labdhāsmi teṣāṃ vā raṇe gantā salokatām
a na hīdānīṃ sahāyā me parīpsanty anupaskṛtāḥ
c śreyo hi pāṇḍūn manyante na tathāsmān mahābhuja
a svayaṃ hi mṛtyur vihitaḥ satyasaṃdhena saṃyuge
c bhavān upekṣāṃ kurute suśiṣyatvād dhanaṃjaye
a ato vinihatāḥ sarve ye 'smajjayacikīrṣavaḥ
c karṇam eva tu paśyāmi saṃpraty asmajjayaiṣiṇam
a yo hi mitram avijñāya yāthātathyena mandadhīḥ
c mitrārthe yojayaty enaṃ tasya so 'rtho 'vasīdati
a tādṛgrūpam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ mama suhṛdbruvaiḥ
c mohāl lubdhasya pāpasya jihmācārais tatas tataḥ
a hato jayadrathaś caiva saumadattiś ca vīryavān
c abhīṣāhāḥ śūrasenāḥ śibayo 'tha vasātayaḥ
a so 'ham adya gamiṣyāmi yatra te puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c hatā madarthaṃ saṃgrāme yudhyamānāḥ kirīṭinā
a na hi me jīvitenārthas tān ṛte puruṣarṣabhān
c ācāryaḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇām anujānātu no bhavān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a sindhurāje hate tāta samare savyasācinā
c tathaiva bhūriśravasi kim āsīd vo manas tadā
a duryodhanena ca droṇas tathoktaḥ kurusaṃsadi
c kim uktavān paraṃ tasmāt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a niṣṭānako mahān āsīt sainyānāṃ tava bhārata
c saindhavaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūriśravasam eva ca
a mantritaṃ tava putrasya te sarvam avamenire
b avamenire ca te sarve tava putrasya mantritam
c yena mantreṇa nihatāḥ śataśaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
a droṇas tu tad vacaḥ śrutvā putrasya tava durmanāḥ
c muhūrtam iva tu dhyātvā bhṛśam ārto 'bhyabhāṣata
a duryodhana kim evaṃ māṃ vākśarair abhikṛntasi
c ajayyaṃ samare nityaṃ bruvāṇaṃ savyasācinam
a etenaivārjunaṃ jñātum alaṃ kaurava saṃyuge
c yac chikhaṇḍy avadhīd bhīṣmaṃ pālyamānaḥ kirīṭinā
a avadhyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃyuge devamānuṣaiḥ
c tadaivājñāsiṣam ahaṃ neyam astīti bhāratī
a yaṃ puṃsāṃ triṣu lokeṣu sarvaśūram amaṃsmahi
c tasmin vinihate śūre kiṃ śeṣaṃ paryupāsmahe
a yān sma tān glahate tātaḥ śakuniḥ kurusaṃsadi
c akṣān na te 'kṣā niśitā bāṇās te śatrutāpanāḥ
d akṣāṃs tu manyase bāṇāñ śobhamānāñ śitāñ śarān
a ta ete ghnanti nas tāta viśikhā jayacoditāḥ
c yāṃs tadā khyāpyamānāṃs tvaṃ vidureṇa na budhyase
a tās tā vilapataś cāpi vidurasya mahātmanaḥ
c dhīrasya vāco nāśrauṣīḥ kṣemāya vadataḥ śivāḥ
a tad idaṃ vartate ghoram āgataṃ vaiśasaṃ mahat
c tasyāvamānād vākyasya duryodhana kṛte tava
d yo 'vamanya vacaḥ pathyaṃ suhṛdām āptakāriṇām
d svamataṃ kurute mūḍhaḥ sa śocyo nacirād iva
d neha vai paralokāya pāpam iccheta pārthivāḥ
a yac ca naḥ prekṣamāṇānāṃ kṛṣṇām ānāyayaḥ sabhām
c anarhatīṃ kule jātāṃ sarvadharmānucāriṇīm
a tasyādharmasya gāndhāre phalaṃ prāptam idaṃ tvayā
c no cet pāpaṃ pare loke tvam arcchethās tato 'dhikam
a yac ca tān pāṇḍavān dyūte viṣameṇa vijitya ha
c prāvrājayas tadāraṇye rauravājinavāsasaḥ
a putrāṇām iva caiteṣāṃ dharmam ācaratāṃ sadā
c druhyet ko nu naro loke mad anyo brāhmaṇabruvaḥ
d garbhādhānādiyuktaś ca tathopanayanena ca
d na karma kṛtavā
taṃ nādhīte sa bhaved brāhmaṇabruvaḥ
a pāṇḍavānām ayaṃ kopas tvayā śakuninā saha
c āhṛto dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃmate kurusaṃsadi
a duḥśāsanena saṃyuktaḥ karṇena parivardhitaḥ
c kṣattur vākyam anādṛtya tvayābhyastaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d tad dhi naḥ krodhavṛkṣaś ca kṛtamūlo mahātmanām
d tasya puṣpaphale rājann upabhuṃkṣva mahābala
a yat tat sarve parābhūya paryavārayatārjunim
c sindhurājānam āśritya sa vo madhye kathaṃ hataḥ
a kathaṃ tvayi ca karṇe ca kṛpe śalye ca jīvati
c aśvatthāmni ca kauravya nidhanaṃ saindhavo 'gamat
a yad vas tat sarvarājānas tejas tigmam upāsate
c sindhurājaṃ paritrātuṃ sa vo madhye kathaṃ hataḥ
a mayy eva hi viśeṣeṇa tathā duryodhana tvayi
c āśaṃsata paritrāṇam arjunāt sa mahīpatiḥ
a tatas tasmin paritrāṇam alabdhavati phalgunāt
c na kiṃ cid anupaśyāmi jīvitatrāṇam ātmanaḥ
a majjantam iva cātmānaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnasya kilbiṣe
c paśyāmy ahatvā pāñcālān saha tena śikhaṇḍinā
a tan mā kim abhitapyantaṃ vākśarair abhikṛntasi
c aśaktaḥ sindhurājasya bhūtvā trāṇāya bhārata
a sauvarṇaṃ satyasaṃdhasya dhvajam akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
c apaśyan yudhi bhīṣmasya katham āśaṃsase jayam
a madhye mahārathānāṃ ca yatrāhanyata saindhavaḥ
c hato bhūriśravāś caiva kiṃ śeṣaṃ tatra manyase
a kṛpa eva ca durdharṣo yadi jīvati pārthiva
c yo nāgāt sindhurājasya vartma taṃ pūjayāmy aham
a yac cāpaśyaṃ hataṃ bhīṣmaṃ paśyatas te 'nujasya vai
c duḥśāsanasya kauravya kurvāṇaṃ karma duṣkaram
e avadhyakalpaṃ saṃgrāme devair api savāsavaiḥ
a na te vasuṃdharāstīti tad ahaṃ cintaye nṛpa
c imāni pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sṛñjayānāṃ ca bhārata
e anīkāny ādravante māṃ sahitāny adya māriṣa
a nāhatvā sarvapāñcālān kavacasya vimokṣaṇam
c kartāsmi samare karma dhārtarāṣṭra hitaṃ tava
a rājan brūyāḥ sutaṃ me tvam aśvatthāmānam āhave
c na somakāḥ pramoktavyā jīvitaṃ parirakṣatā
a yac ca pitrānuśiṣṭo 'si tad vacaḥ paripālaya
c ānṛśaṃsye dame satye ārjave ca sthiro bhava
a dharmārthakāmakuśalo dharmārthāv apy apīḍayan
c dharmapradhānaḥ kāryāṇi kuryāś ceti punaḥ punaḥ
a cakṣurmanobhyāṃ saṃtoṣyā viprāḥ sevyāś ca śaktitaḥ
c na caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kāryaṃ te hi vahniśikhopamāḥ
a eṣa tv aham anīkāni praviśāmy arisūdana
c raṇāya mahate rājaṃs tvayā vākśalyapīḍitaḥ
a tvaṃ ca duryodhana balaṃ yadi śaknoṣi dhāraya
c rātrāv api hi yotsyante saṃrabdhāḥ kurusṛñjayāḥ
a evam uktvā tataḥ prāyād droṇaḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayān
c muṣṇan kṣatriyatejāṃsi nakṣatrāṇām ivāṃśumān
d dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kṣatriyāntakaro balī
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato duryodhano rājā droṇenaivaṃ pracoditaḥ
c amarṣavaśam āpanno yuddhāyaiva mano dadhe
a abravīc ca tadā karṇaṃ putro duryodhanas tava
c paśya kṛṣṇasahāyena pāṇḍavena kirīṭinā
e ācāryavihitaṃ vyūhaṃ bhinnaṃ devaiḥ sudurbhidam
a tava vyāyacchamānasya droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
c miṣatāṃ yodhamukhyānāṃ saindhavo vinipātitaḥ
a paśya rādheya rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pravarā yudhi
c pārthenaikena nihatāḥ siṃhenevetarā mṛgāḥ
a mama vyāyacchamānasya samare śatrusūdana
c alpāvaśeṣaṃ sainyaṃ me kṛtaṃ śakrātmajena ha
a kathaṃ hy anicchamānasya droṇasya yudhi phalgunaḥ
c bhindyāt sudurbhidaṃ vyūhaṃ yatamāno 'pi saṃyuge
d pratijñāyā gataḥ pāraṃ hṛtvā saindhavam arjunaḥ
d paśya rādheya pṛthvīśān pṛthivyāṃ pātitān bahūn
d pārthena nihatān saṃkhye mahendropamavikramān
d anicchataḥ kathaṃ vīra droṇasya yudhi pāṇḍavaḥ
a priyo hi phalguno nityam ācāryasya mahātmanaḥ
c tato 'sya dattavān dvāraṃ nayuddhenārimardana
a abhayaṃ saindhavasyājau dattvā droṇaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
c prādāt kirīṭine dvāraṃ paśya nirguṇatāṃ mama
a yady adāsyam anujñāṃ vai pūrvam eva gṛhān prati
c sindhurājasya samare nābhaviṣyaj janakṣayaḥ
a jayadratho jīvitārthī gacchamāno gṛhān prati
c mayānāryeṇa saṃruddho droṇāt prāpyābhayaṃ raṇe
d trāsyāmi saindhavaṃ yuddhe nainaṃ prāpsyati phalgunaḥ
d mama sainyavināśāya ruddho vipreṇa saindhavaḥ
d tasya me mandabhāgasya yatamānasya saṃyuge
d hatāni sarvasainyāni hato rājā jayadrathaḥ
d paśya yodhavarān karṇa śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d pārthanāmāṅkitair bāṇaiḥ sarve nītā yamakṣayam
d katham ekarathenājau bahūnāṃ naḥ prapaśyatām
d vipannaḥ saindhavo rājā yodhāś caiva sahasraśaḥ
a adya me bhrātaraḥ kṣīṇāś citrasenādayo yudhi
c bhīmasenaṃ samāsādya paśyatāṃ no durātmanām
 karṇa uvāca
a ācāryaṃ mā vigarhasva śaktyā yudhyaty asau dvijaḥ
b yathābalaṃ yathotsāhaṃ tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
b yady enaṃ samatikramya praviṣṭaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
b nātra sūkṣmo 'pi doṣaḥ syād ācāryasya kathaṃ cana
b kṛtī dakṣo yuvā śūraḥ kṛtāstro laghuvikramaḥ
b divyāstrayuktam āsthāya rathaṃ vānaralakṣaṇam
b kṛṣṇena ca gṛhītāśvam abhedyakavacāvṛtaḥ
b gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ divyaṃ dhanur ādāya vīryavān
b pravarṣan niśitān bāṇān bāhudraviṇadarpitaḥ
b yad arjuno 'bhyayād droṇam upapannaṃ hi tasya tat
b ācāryaḥ sthaviro rājañ śīghrayāne tathākṣamaḥ
b bāhuvyāyāmaceṣṭāyām aśaktas tu narādhipa
b tenainam abhyatikrāntaḥ śvetāśvaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
b tasmād doṣaṃ na paśyāmi droṇasyānena hetunā
c ajayyān pāṇḍavān manye droṇenāstravidā mṛdhe
a tathā hy enam atikramya praviṣṭaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
c daivadṛṣṭo 'nyathābhāvo na manye vidyate kva cit
a tato no yudhyamānānāṃ paraṃ śaktyā suyodhana
c saindhavo nihato rājan daivam atra paraṃ smṛtam
a paraṃ yatnaṃ kurvatāṃ ca tvayā sārdhaṃ raṇājire
c hatvāsmākaṃ pauruṣaṃ hi daivaṃ paścāt karoti naḥ
e satataṃ ceṣṭamānānāṃ nikṛtyā vikrameṇa ca
f na sidhyati mahārāja daivam atra paraṃ smṛtam
f nihatya yatnaṃ cāsmākaṃ daivaṃ yāti svakāryatām
f nūnam etena mārgeṇa gantavyo janasaṃkṣayaḥ
f tato vyāyacchamānānāṃ daivaṃ paścāt karoti naḥ
a daivopasṛṣṭaḥ puruṣo yat karma kurute kva cit
c kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ sma tat tasya daivena vinihanyate
a yat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa vyavasāyavatā satā
c tat kāryam aviśaṅkena siddhir daive pratiṣṭhitā
a nikṛtyā nikṛtāḥ pārthā viṣayogaiś ca bhārata
c dagdhā jatugṛhe cāpi dyūtena ca parājitāḥ
a rājanītiṃ vyapāśritya prahitāś caiva kānanam
c yatnena ca kṛtaṃ yat te daivena vinipātitam
a yudhyasva yatnam āsthāya mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
c yatatas tava teṣāṃ ca daivaṃ mārgeṇa yāsyati
a na teṣāṃ matipūrvaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ dṛśyate kva cit
c duṣkṛtaṃ tava vā vīra buddhyā hīnaṃ kurūdvaha
a daivaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvasya sukṛtasyetarasya vā
c ananyakarma daivaṃ hi jāgarti svapatām api
d tena yukto hi puruṣaḥ kāryākāryaṃ niyujyate
a bahūni tava sainyāni yodhāś ca bahavas tathā
c na tathā pāṇḍuputrāṇām evaṃ yuddham avartata
a tair alpair bahavo yūyaṃ kṣayaṃ nītāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c śaṅke daivasya tat karma pauruṣaṃ yena nāśitam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇānāṃ bahu tat taj janādhipa
c pāṇḍavānām anīkāni samadṛśyanta saṃyuge
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ vyatiṣaktarathadvipam
c tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājan durmantrite tava
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tad udīrṇagajāśvaughaṃ balaṃ tava janādhipa
c pāṇḍusenām abhidrutya yodhayām āsa sarvataḥ
a pāñcālāḥ kuravaś caiva yodhayantaḥ parasparam
c yamarāṣṭrāya mahate paralokāya dīkṣitāḥ
a śūrāḥ śūraiḥ samāgamya śaratomaraśaktibhiḥ
c vivyadhuḥ samare tūrṇaṃ ninyuś caiva yamakṣayam
a rathināṃ rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rudhirasrāvi dāruṇam
c prāvartata mahad yuddhaṃ nighnatām itaretaram
a vāraṇāś ca mahārāja samāsādya parasparam
c viṣāṇair dārayām āsuḥ saṃkruddhāś ca madotkaṭāḥ
a hayārohān hayārohāḥ prāsaśaktiparaśvadhaiḥ
c bibhidus tumule yuddhe prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
a pattayaś ca mahābāho śataśaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ
c anyonyam ārdayan rājan nityayattāḥ parākrame
a gotrāṇāṃ nāmadheyānāṃ kulānāṃ caiva māriṣa
c śravaṇād dhi vijānīmaḥ pāñcālān kurubhiḥ saha
a anyonyaṃ samare yodhāḥ śaraśaktiparaśvadhaiḥ
c preṣayan paralokāya vicaranto hy abhītavat
a śarair daśa diśo rājaṃs teṣāṃ muktaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
c na bhrājanta yathāpūrvaṃ bhāskare 'staṃ gate 'pi ca
a tathā prayudhyamāneṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu nirbhayaḥ
c duryodhano mahārāja vyavagāhata tad balam
a saindhavasya vadhenaiva bhṛśaṃ duḥkhasamanvitaḥ
c martavyam iti saṃcintya prāviśat tu dviṣadbalam
a nādayan rathaghoṣeṇa kampayann iva medinīm
c abhyavartata putras te pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
a sa saṃnipātas tumulas tasya teṣāṃ ca bhārata
c abhavat sarvasainyānām abhāvakaraṇo mahān
d dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
d tathā hateṣu sainyeṣu tathā kṛcchragataḥ svayam
d kaccid duryodhanaḥ sūta nākārṣīt pṛṣṭhato raṇam
d ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca saṃnipāto mahān abhūt
d viśeṣato hi nṛpater viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
d so 'tyantasukhasaṃvṛddho rakṣyo lokasya ceśvaraḥ
d eko bahūn samāsādya kaccin nāsīt parāṅmukhaḥ
d droṇaḥ karṇaḥ kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
d nāvārayan kathaṃ yuddhe rājānaṃ rājakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
d sarvopāyair hi yuddheṣu rakṣitavyo mahīpatiḥ
d eṣā nītiḥ parā yuddhe dṛṣṭā tatra maharṣibhiḥ
d praviṣṭe vai mama sute pareṣāṃ vai mahad balam
d saṃjaya uvāca
d māmakā rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kim akurvata saṃjaya
d rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ putrasya tava bhārata
d ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca śṛṇu me bruvato 'dbhutam
d droṇena vāryamāṇo 'sau karṇena ca kṛpeṇa ca
d prāviśat pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ makaraḥ sāgaraṃ yathā
d kirann iṣusahasrāṇi tatra tatra tadā tadā
d pāñcālān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
d yathodyamya tataḥ sūryo raśmibhir nāśayet tamaḥ
d tathā putras tava balaṃ nāśayat tan mahābalaḥ
a madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ pratapantaṃ gabhastibhiḥ
c tathā tava sutaṃ madhye pratapantaṃ śarormibhiḥ
a na śekur bhārataṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavāḥ samavekṣitum
c palāyane kṛtotsāhā nirutsāhā dviṣajjaye
a paryadhāvanta pāñcālā vadhyamānā mahātmanā
c rukmapuṅkhaiḥ prasannāgrais tava putreṇa dhanvinā
e ardyamānāḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ nyapatan pāṇḍusainikāḥ
f vyadravaṃś ca bhayād yodhā dṛṣṭvā taṃ paramāhave
f vyāttānanam iva prāptam antakaṃ prāṇahāriṇam
a na tādṛśaṃ raṇe karma kṛtavantas tu tāvakāḥ
c yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān rājā putras tava viśāṃ pate
a putreṇa tava sā senā pāṇḍavī mathitā raṇe
c nalinī dviradeneva samantāt phullapaṅkajā
a kṣīṇatoyānilārkābhyāṃ hatatviḍ iva padminī
c babhūva pāṇḍavī senā tava putrasya tejasā
a pāṇḍusenāṃ hatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putreṇa bhārata
c bhīmasenapurogās tu pāñcālāḥ samupādravan
a sa bhīmasenaṃ daśabhir mādrīputrau tribhis tribhiḥ
c virāṭadrupadau ṣaḍbhiḥ śatena ca śikhaṇḍinam
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca saptatyā dharmaputraṃ ca saptabhiḥ
c kekayāṃś caiva cedīṃś ca bahubhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a sātvataṃ pañcabhir viddhvā draupadeyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
c ghaṭotkacaṃ ca samare viddhvā siṃha ivānadat
a śataśaś cāparān yodhān sadvipāśvarathān raṇe
c śarair avacakartograiḥ kruddho 'ntaka iva prajāḥ
d sā tena pāṇḍavī senā vadhyamānā śilīmukhaiḥ
d tava putreṇa saṃgrāme vidudrāva narādhipa
d taṃ tapantam ivādityaṃ kururājaṃ mahāhave
d nāśakan vīkṣituṃ rājan pāṇḍuputrasya sainikāḥ
d tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā kupito rājasattama
d abhyadhāvat kurupatiṃ tava putraṃ jigīṣayā
d tāv ubhau yudhi kauravyau samīyatur ariṃdamau
d svārthahetoḥ parākrāntau duryodhanayudhiṣṭhirau
d tato duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
d vivyādha daśabhis tūrṇaṃ dhvajaṃ ciccheda ceṣuṇā
d indrasenaṃ tribhiś caiva lalāṭe jaghnivān nṛpa
d sārathiṃ dayitaṃ rājñaḥ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
d dhanuś ca punar anyena cakartāsya mahārathaḥ
d caturbhiś caturaś caiva bāṇair vivyādha vājinaḥ
d tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kruddho nimeṣād iva kārmukam
d anyad ādāya vegena kauravaṃ pratyavārayat
a tasya tān nighnataḥ śatrūn rukmapṛṣṭhaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
c bhallābhyāṃ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhas tridhā ciccheda māriṣa
a vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhiḥ samyagastaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c marmāṇi bhittvā te sarve saṃbhagnāḥ kṣitim āviśan
a tataḥ pramuditā yodhāḥ parivavrur yudhiṣṭhiram
c vṛtrahatyai yathā devāḥ parivavruḥ puraṃdaram
d vṛtreṇa saha yudhyantaṃ yadvad devā śatakratum
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tava putrasya māriṣa
c śaraṃ paramadurvāraṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
d sa śaraṃ sūryaraśmyābham atyugram anivāraṇam
d hā hato 'sīti rājānam uktvāmuñcad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d sa tenākarṇamuktena viddho bāṇena kauravaḥ
e sa tena bhṛśasaṃviddho niṣasāda rathottame
f niṣasāda rathopasthe bhṛśaṃ saṃmūḍhacetanaḥ
a tataḥ pāñcālasainyānāṃ bhṛśam āsīd ravo mahān
c hato rājeti rājendra muditānāṃ samantataḥ
a bāṇaśabdaravaś cograḥ śuśruve tatra māriṣa
c atha droṇo drutaṃ tatra pratyadṛśyata saṃyuge
a hṛṣṭo duryodhanaś cāpi dṛḍham ādāya kārmukam
c tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti rājānaṃ bruvan pāṇḍavam abhyayāt
d tam evaṃvādinaṃ vīraṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ mahāratham
a pratyudyayus taṃ tvaritāḥ pāñcālā rājagṛddhinaḥ
c tān droṇaḥ pratijagrāha parīpsan kurusattamam
e caṇḍavātoddhatān meghān nighnan raśmimuco yathā
a tato rājan mahān āsīt saṃgrāmo bhūrivardhanaḥ
c tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca sametānāṃ yuyutsayā
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a yat tadā prāviśat pāṇḍūn ācāryaḥ kupito vaśī
c uktvā duryodhanaṃ samyaṅ mama śāstrātigaṃ sutam
a praviśya vicarantaṃ ca raṇe śūram avasthitam
c kathaṃ droṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ paryavārayan
a ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakram ācāryasya mahātmanaḥ
c ke cottaram arakṣanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
d ke cāsya pṛṣṭhato 'nvāsan vīrā vīrasya yodhinaḥ
d ke purastād avartanta rathinas tasya śatravaḥ
d manye tān aspṛśac chītam ativelam anārtavam
d manye te samavepanta gāvo vai śiśire yathā
d yat prāviśan maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālān aparājitaḥ
a nṛtyan sa rathamārgeṣu sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
b nirdahan sarvasainyāni pāñcālānāṃ ratharṣabhaḥ
c dhūmaketur iva kruddhaḥ kathaṃ mṛtyum upeyivān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a sāyāhne saindhavaṃ hatvā rājñā pārthaḥ sametya ca
c sātyakiś ca maheṣvāso droṇam evābhyadhāvatām
a tathā yudhiṣṭhiras tūrṇaṃ bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c pṛthak camūbhyāṃ saṃsaktau droṇam evābhyadhāvatām
a tathaiva nakulo dhīmān sahadevaś ca durjayaḥ
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śatānīko virāṭaś ca sakekayaḥ
e matsyāḥ śālveyasenāś ca droṇam eva yayur yudhi
a drupadaś ca tathā rājā pāñcālair abhirakṣitaḥ
c dhṛṣṭadyumnapitā rājan droṇam evābhyavartata
a draupadeyā maheṣvāsā rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
c sasenās te 'bhyavartanta droṇam eva mahādyutim
a prabhadrakāś ca pāñcālāḥ ṣaṭsahasrāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c droṇam evābhyavartanta puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam
a tathetare naravyāghrāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
c sahitāḥ saṃnyavartanta droṇam eva dvijarṣabham
a teṣu śūreṣu yuddhāya gateṣu bharatarṣabha
c babhūva rajanī ghorā bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinī
a yodhānām aśivā raudrā rājann antakagāminī
c kuñjarāśvamanuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇāntakaraṇī tadā
a tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ ghorāyāṃ nadantyaḥ sarvataḥ śivāḥ
c nyavedayan bhayaṃ ghoraṃ sajvālakavalair mukhaiḥ
a ulūkāś cāpy adṛśyanta śaṃsanto vipulaṃ bhayam
c viśeṣataḥ kauravāṇāṃ dhvajinyām atidāruṇam
a tataḥ sainyeṣu rājendra śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
c bherīśabdena mahatā mṛdaṅgānāṃ svanena ca
a gajānāṃ garjitaiś cāpi turaṅgāṇāṃ ca heṣitaiḥ
c khuraśabdanipātaiś ca tumulaḥ sarvato 'bhavat
a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ saṃdhyāyām atidāruṇam
c droṇasya ca mahārāja sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a tamasā cāvṛte loke na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
c sainyena rajasā caiva samantād utthitena ha
a narasyāśvasya nāgasya samasajjata śoṇitam
c nāpaśyāma rajo bhaumaṃ kaśmalenābhisaṃvṛtāḥ
a rātrau vaṃśavanasyeva dahyamānasya parvate
b mṛdaṅgānakanirhrādair jharjharaiḥ paṭahais tathā
b phetkārair hreṣitaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarvam evākulaṃ babhau
c ghoraś caṭacaṭāśabdaḥ śastrāṇāṃ patatām abhūt
a naiva sve na pare rājan prājñāyanta tamovṛte
c unmattam iva tat sarvaṃ babhūva rajanīmukhe
a bhaumaṃ rajo 'tha rājendra śoṇitena praśāmitam
c śātakaumbhaiś ca kavacair bhūṣaṇaiś ca tamo 'bhyagāt
a tataḥ sā bhāratī senā maṇihemavibhūṣitā
c dyaur ivāsīt sanakṣatrā rajanyāṃ bharatarṣabha
a gomāyubaḍasaṃghuṣṭā śaktidhvajasamākulā
c dāruṇābhirutā ghorā kṣveḍitotkruṣṭanāditā
a tato 'bhavan mahāśabdas tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
c samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvā mahendrāśaninisvanaḥ
a sā niśīthe mahārāja senādṛśyata bhāratī
c aṅgadaiḥ kuṇḍalair niṣkaiḥ śastraiś caivāvabhāsitā
a tatra nāgā rathāś caiva jāmbūnadavibhūṣitāḥ
c niśāyāṃ pratyadṛśyanta meghā iva savidyutaḥ
a ṛṣṭiśaktigadābāṇamusalaprāsapaṭṭiśāḥ
c saṃpatanto vyadṛśyanta bhrājamānā ivāgnayaḥ
a duryodhanapurovātāṃ rathanāgabalāhakām
c vāditraghoṣastanitāṃ cāpavidyuddhvajair vṛtām
a droṇapāṇḍavaparjanyāṃ khaḍgaśaktigadāśanim
c śaradhārāstrapavanāṃ bhṛśaṃ śītoṣṇasaṃkulām
a ghorāṃ vismāpanīm ugrāṃ jīvitacchidam aplavām
c tāṃ prāviśann atibhayāṃ senāṃ yuddhacikīrṣavaḥ
a tasmin rātrimukhe ghore mahāśabdaninādite
c bhīrūṇāṃ trāsajanane śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhane
a rātriyuddhe tadā ghore vartamāne sudāruṇe
c droṇam abhyadravan kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ pāṇḍusṛñjayāḥ
a ye ye pramukhato rājan nyavartanta mahātmanaḥ
c tān sarvān vimukhāṃś cakre kāṃś cin ninye yamakṣayam
d tāni nāgasahasrāṇi rathānām ayutāni ca
d padātihayasaṃghānāṃ prayutāny arbudāni ca
d droṇenaikena nārācair nirbhinnāni niśāmukhe
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tasmin praviṣṭe durdharṣe sṛñjayān amitaujasi
c amṛṣyamāṇe saṃrabdhe kā vo 'bhūd vai matis tadā
a duryodhanaṃ tathā putram uktvā śāstrātigaṃ mama
c yat prāviśad ameyātmā kiṃ pārthaḥ pratyapadyata
a nihate saindhave vīre bhūriśravasi caiva hi
c yad abhyagān mahātejāḥ pāñcālān aparājitaḥ
a kim amanyata durdharṣaḥ praviṣṭe śatrutāpane
c duryodhanaś ca kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyata
a ke ca taṃ varadaṃ vīram anvayur dvijasattamam
c ke cāsya pṛṣṭhato 'gacchan vīrāḥ śūrasya yudhyataḥ
e ke purastād ayudhyanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
a manye 'haṃ pāṇḍavān sarvān bhāradvājaśarārditān
c śiśire kampamānā vai kṛśā gāva ivābhibho
a praviśya sa maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālān arimardanaḥ
c kathaṃ nu puruṣavyāghraḥ pañcatvam upajagmivān
a sarveṣu sainyeṣu ca saṃgateṣu
rātrau sameteṣu mahāratheṣu
c saṃloḍyamāneṣu pṛthagvidheṣu
ke vas tadānīṃ matimanta āsan
a hatāṃś caiva viṣaktāṃś ca parābhūtāṃś ca śaṃsasi
c rathino virathāṃś caiva kṛtān yuddheṣu māmakān
d teṣāṃ saṃloḍyamānānāṃ pāṇḍavair hatacetasām
d andhe tamasi kiṃ jyotir abhavat kā matis tadā
d prahṛṣṭāṃś cāpy udagrāṃś ca nityaṃ śaṃsasi pāṇḍavān
d aprahṛṣṭān vimanaso vitrastāṃś caiva māmakān
a katham eṣāṃ tadā tatra pārthānām apalāyinām
c prakāśam abhavad rātrau kathaṃ kuruṣu saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a rātriyuddhe tadā rājan vartamāne sudāruṇe
c droṇam abhyadravan rātrau pāṇḍavāḥ sahasainikāḥ
a tato droṇaḥ kekayāṃś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cātmajān
c preṣayan mṛtyulokāya sarvān iṣubhir āśugaiḥ
a tasya pramukhato rājan ye 'vartanta mahārathāḥ
c tān sarvān preṣayām āsa paralokāya bhārata
a pramathnantaṃ tadā vīraṃ bhāradvājaṃ mahāratham
c abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ śibī rājan pratāpavān
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāratham
c vivyādha daśabhir droṇaḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥ
a taṃ śibiḥ prativivyādha triṃśatā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena smayamāno nyapātayat
a tasya droṇo hayān hatvā sārathiṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
c athāsya saśirastrāṇaṃ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
d tato 'sya sārathiṃ kṣipram anyaṃ duryodhano 'diśat
d sa tena saṃgṛhītāśvaḥ punar abhyadravad ripūn
a kaliṅgānāṃ ca sainyena kaliṅgasya suto raṇe
c pūrvaṃ pitṛvadhāt kruddho bhīmasenam upādravat
a sa bhīmaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
c viśokaṃ tribhir ājaghne dhvajam ekena patriṇā
a kaliṅgānāṃ tu taṃ śūraṃ kruddhaṃ kruddho vṛkodaraḥ
c rathād ratham abhidrutya muṣṭinābhijaghāna ha
a tasya muṣṭihatasyājau pāṇḍavena balīyasā
c sarvāṇy asthīni sahasā prāpatan vai pṛthak pṛthak
d tasmiṃs tathā hate tena siṃhanādo mahān abhūt
d pāñcālānāṃ mahārāja sādhu sādhv iti pāṇḍavam
a taṃ karṇo bhrātaraś cāsya nāmṛṣyanta mahārathāḥ
c te bhīmasenaṃ nārācair jaghnur āśīviṣopamaiḥ
a tataḥ śatrurathaṃ tyaktvā bhīmo dhruvarathaṃ gataḥ
c dhruvaṃ cāsyantam aniśaṃ muṣṭinā samapothayat
d   bhīmaḥ svaṃ ratham āgamat
d punaś cotpatya vegena tasyānujam apātayat
d yathā kācamaṇir nyasto muṣṭinaikena līlayā
d sa hataḥ sahasā cūrṇo raktam evopapadyata
d tathā cūrṇam abhūt tatra karṇabhrātā drumas tathā
e sa tathā pāṇḍuputreṇa balinā nihato 'patat
a taṃ nihatya mahārāja bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
c jayarātarathaṃ prāpya muhuḥ siṃha ivānadat
a jayarātam athākṣipya nadan savyena pāṇinā
b sūtaṃ cāsya mahābāhur gṛhya rājaṃs tathaiva ca
c talena nāśayām āsa karṇasyaivāgrataḥ sthitam

 duryodhana uvāca

a teṣu rājasahasreṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu bhārata
