 saṃjaya uvāca
a udīryamāṇaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
c aviṣahyaṃ ca manvānaḥ karṇaṃ duryodhano 'bravīt
a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto mitrāṇāṃ mitravatsala
c trāyasva samare karṇa sarvān yodhān mahābala
a pāñcālair matsyakaikeyaiḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
c vṛtān samantāt saṃkruddhair niḥśvasadbhir ivoragaiḥ
a ete nadanti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ pāṇḍavā jitakāśinaḥ
c śakropamāś ca bahavaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajāḥ
 karṇa uvāca
a paritrātum iha prāpto yadi pārthaṃ puraṃdaraḥ
c tam apy āśu parājitya tato hantāsmi pāṇḍavam
a satyaṃ te pratijānāmi samāśvasihi bhārata
c hantāsmi pāṇḍutanayān pāñcālāṃś ca samāgatān
a jayaṃ te pratijānāmi vāsavasyeva pāvakiḥ
c priyaṃ tava mayā kāryam iti jīvāmi pārthiva
a sarveṣām eva pārthānāṃ phalguno balavattaraḥ
c tasyāmoghāṃ vimokṣyāmi śaktiṃ śakravinirmitām
a tasmin hate maheṣvāse bhrātaras tasya mānada
c tava vaśyā bhaviṣyanti vanaṃ yāsyanti vā punaḥ
a mayi jīvati kauravya viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ kva cit
c ahaṃ jeṣyāmi samare sahitān sarvapāṇḍavān
a pāñcālān kekayāṃś caiva vṛṣṇīṃś cāpi samāgatān
c bāṇaughaiḥ śakalīkṛtya tava dāsyāmi medinīm
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ karṇaṃ tu kṛpaḥ śāradvato 'bravīt
c smayann iva mahābāhuḥ sūtaputram idaṃ vacaḥ
a śobhanaṃ śobhanaṃ karṇa sanāthaḥ kurupuṃgavaḥ
c tvayā nāthena rādheya vacasā yadi sidhyati
a bahuśaḥ katthase karṇa kauravyasya samīpataḥ
c na tu te vikramaḥ kaś cid dṛśyate balam eva vā
a samāgamaḥ pāṇḍusutair dṛṣṭas te bahuśo yudhi
c sarvatra nirjitaś cāsi pāṇḍavaiḥ sūtanandana
a hriyamāṇe tadā karṇa gandharvair dhṛtarāṣṭraje
c tadāyudhyanta sainyāni tvam ekas tu palāyathāḥ
a virāṭanagare cāpi sametāḥ sarvakauravāḥ
c pārthena nirjitā yuddhe tvaṃ ca karṇa sahānujaḥ
a ekasyāpy asamarthas tvaṃ phalgunasya raṇājire
c katham utsahase jetuṃ sakṛṣṇān sarvapāṇḍavān
a abruvan karṇa yudhyasva bahu katthasi sūtaja
c anuktvā vikramed yas tu tad vai satpuruṣavratam
a garjitvā sūtaputra tvaṃ śāradābhram ivājalam
c niṣphalo dṛśyase karṇa tac ca rājā na budhyate
a tāvad garjasi rādheya yāvat pārthaṃ na paśyasi
c purā pārthaṃ hi te dṛṣṭvā durlabhaṃ garjitaṃ bhavet
a tvam anāsādya tān bāṇān phalgunasya vigarjasi
c pārthasāyakaviddhasya durlabhaṃ garjitaṃ bhavet
a bāhubhiḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūrā vāgbhiḥ śūrā dvijātayaḥ
c dhanuṣā phalgunaḥ śūraḥ karṇaḥ śūro manorathaiḥ
d toṣito yena rudro 'pi kaḥ pārthaṃ pratighātayet
a evaṃ paruṣitas tena tadā śāradvatena saḥ
c karṇaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛpaṃ vākyam athābravīt
a śūrā garjanti satataṃ prāvṛṣīva balāhakāḥ
c phalaṃ cāśu prayacchanti bījam uptam ṛtāv iva
a doṣam atra na paśyāmi śūrāṇāṃ raṇamūrdhani
c tat tad vikatthamānānāṃ bhāraṃ codvahatāṃ mṛdhe
a yaṃ bhāraṃ puruṣo voḍhuṃ manasā hi vyavasyati
c daivam asya dhruvaṃ tatra sāhāyyāyopapadyate
a vyavasāyadvitīyo 'haṃ manasā bhāram udvahan
c garjāmi yady ahaṃ vipra tava kiṃ tatra naśyati
a vṛthā śūrā na garjanti sajalā iva toyadāḥ
c sāmarthyam ātmano jñātvā tato garjanti paṇḍitāḥ
a so 'ham adya raṇe yattaḥ sahitau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
c utsahe tarasā jetuṃ tato garjāmi gautama
a paśya tvaṃ garjitasyāsya phalaṃ me vipra sānugaḥ
c hatvā pāṇḍusutān ājau sahakṛṣṇān sasātvatān
e duryodhanāya dāsyāmi pṛthivīṃ hatakaṇṭakām
 kṛpa uvāca
 kiṃ no bahupralāpena phalam āpnuhi sūtaja
a manorathapralāpo me na grāhyas tava sūtaja
c yadā kṣipasi vai kṛṣṇau dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
a dhruvas tatra jayaḥ karṇa yatra yuddhaviśāradau
c devagandharvayakṣāṇāṃ manuṣyoragarakṣasām
e daṃśitānām api raṇe ajeyau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
a brahmaṇyaḥ satyavāg dānto gurudaivatapūjakaḥ
c nityaṃ dharmarataś caiva kṛtāstraś ca viśeṣataḥ
e dhṛtimāṃś ca kṛtajñaś ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a bhrātaraś cāsya balinaḥ sarvāstreṣu kṛtaśramāḥ
c guruvṛttiratāḥ prājñā dharmanityā yaśasvinaḥ
a saṃbandhinaś cendravīryāḥ svanuraktāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca daurmukhir janamejayaḥ
a candraseno bhadrasenaḥ kīrtidharmā dhruvo dharaḥ
c vasucandro dāmacandraḥ siṃhacandraḥ suvedhanaḥ
a drupadasya tathā putrā drupadaś ca mahāstravit
c yeṣām arthāya saṃyatto matsyarājaḥ sahānugaḥ
a śatānīkaḥ sudaśanaḥ śrutānīkaḥ śrutadhvajaḥ
c balānīko jayānīko jayāśvo rathavāhanaḥ
c   jayānīko jayapriyaḥ
c vijayo labdhalakṣaś ca
a candrodayaḥ kāmaratho virāṭabhrātaraḥ śubhāḥ
c yamau ca draupadeyāś ca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
e yeṣām arthāya yudhyante na teṣāṃ vidyate kṣayaḥ
a kāmaṃ khalu jagat sarvaṃ sadevāsuramānavam
c sayakṣarākṣasagaṇaṃ sabhūtabhujagadvipam
e niḥśeṣam astravīryeṇa kuryātāṃ bhīmaphalgunau
a yudhiṣṭhiraś ca pṛthivīṃ nirdahed ghoracakṣuṣā
c aprameyabalaḥ śaurir yeṣām arthe ca daṃśitaḥ
e kathaṃ tān saṃyuge karṇa jetum utsahase parān
a mahān apanayas tv eṣa tava nityaṃ hi sūtaja
c yas tvam utsahase yoddhuṃ samare śauriṇā saha
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktas tu rādheyaḥ prahasan bharatarṣabha
c abravīc ca tadā karṇo guruṃ śāradvataṃ kṛpam
a satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman pāṇḍavān prati yad vacaḥ
c ete cānye ca bahavo guṇāḥ pāṇḍusuteṣu vai
a ajayyāś ca raṇe pārthā devair api savāsavaiḥ
c sadaityayakṣagandharvapiśācoragarākṣasaiḥ
e tathāpi pārthāñ jeṣyāmi śaktyā vāsavadattayā
a mamāpy amoghā datteyaṃ śaktiḥ śakreṇa vai dvija
c etayā nihaniṣyāmi savyasācinam āhave
a hate tu pāṇḍave kṛṣṇo bhrātaraś cāsya sodarāḥ
c anarjunā na śakṣyanti mahīṃ bhoktuṃ kathaṃ cana
d anarjunāyāṃ ca bhuvi vinaśyeyur na saṃśayaḥ
a teṣu naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu pṛthivīyaṃ sasāgarā
c ayatnāt kauraveyasya vaśe sthāsyati gautama
a sunītair iha sarvārthāḥ sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ
c etam artham ahaṃ jñātvā tato garjāmi gautama
a tvaṃ tu vṛddhaś ca vipraś ca aśaktaś cāpi saṃyuge
c kṛtasnehaś ca pārtheṣu mohān mām avamanyase
a yady evaṃ vakṣyase bhūyo mām apriyam iha dvija
c tatas te khaḍgam udyamya jihvāṃ chetsyāmi durmate
a yac cāpi pāṇḍavān vipra stotum icchasi saṃyuge
c bhīṣayan sarvasainyāni kauraveyāṇi durmate
e atrāpi śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yathāvad gadato dvija
a duryodhanaś ca droṇaś ca śakunir durmukho jayaḥ
c duḥśāsano vṛṣaseno madrarājas tvam eva ca
e somadattaś ca bhūriś ca tathā drauṇir viviṃśatiḥ
a tiṣṭheyur daṃśitā yatra sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
c jayed etān raṇe ko nu śakratulyabalo 'py ariḥ
a śūrāś ca hi kṛtāstrāś ca balinaḥ svargalipsavaḥ
c dharmajñā yuddhakuśalā hanyur yuddhe surān api
a ete sthāsyanti saṃgrāme pāṇḍavānāṃ vadhārthinaḥ
c jayam ākāṅkṣamāṇā hi kauraveyasya daṃśitāḥ
a daivāyattam ahaṃ manye jayaṃ subalinām api
c yatra bhīṣmo mahābāhuḥ śete śaraśatācitaḥ
a vikarṇaś citrasenaś ca bāhlīko 'tha jayadrathaḥ
c bhūriśravā jayaś caiva jalasaṃdhaḥ sudakṣiṇaḥ
a śalaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhagadattaś ca vīryavān
c ete cānye ca rājāno devair api sudurjayāḥ
a nihatāḥ samare śūrāḥ pāṇḍavair balavattarāḥ
c kim anyad daivasaṃyogān manyase puruṣādhama
a yāṃś ca tān stauṣi satataṃ duryodhanaripūn dvija
c teṣām api hatāḥ śūrāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a kṣīyante sarvasainyāni kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
c prabhāvaṃ nātra paśyāmi pāṇḍavānāṃ kathaṃ cana
a yāṃs tān balavato nityaṃ manyase tvaṃ dvijādhama
c yatiṣye 'haṃ yathāśakti yoddhuṃ taiḥ saha saṃyuge
e duryodhanahitārthāya jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tathā paruṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sūtaputreṇa mātulam
c khaḍgam udyamya vegena drauṇir abhyapatad drutam
d tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhaḥ siṃho mattam iva dvipam
d prekṣataḥ kururājasya samakṣaṃ cedam abravīt
 aśvatthāmovāca
 yad arjunaguṇāṃs tathyān kīrtayānaṃ narādhama
 śūradveṣāt sudurbuddhe tvaṃ bhartsayasi mātulam
 vikatthamānaḥ śauryeṇa sarvalokadhanurbhṛtam
 darpotsekagṛhīto 'dya na kaṃ cid gaṇayan mṛdhe
 kva te vīryaṃ kva cāstrāṇi yat tvāṃ nirjitya saṃyuge
 gāṇḍīvadhanvā hatavān prekṣatas te jayadratham
 yena sākṣān mahādevo yodhitaḥ samare purā
 tam icchasi vṛthā jetuṃ sūtādhama manorathaiḥ
 yaṃ hi kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
 jetuṃ na śaktāḥ sahitāḥ sendrā api surāsurāḥ
 lokaikavīram ajitam arjunaṃ sūta saṃyuge
 kiṃ punas tvaṃ sudurbuddhe sahaibhir vasudhādhipaiḥ
a karṇa paśya sudurbuddhe tiṣṭhedānīṃ narādhama
c eṣa te 'dya śiraḥ kāyād uddharāmi sudurmate
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tam utpatantaṃ vegena rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
c nyavārayan mahārāja kṛpaś ca dvipadāṃ varaḥ
 karṇa uvāca
a śūro 'yaṃ samaraślāghī durmatiś ca dvijādhamaḥ
c āsādayatu madvīryaṃ muñcemaṃ kurusattama
 aśvatthāmovāca
a tavaitat kṣamyate 'smābhiḥ sūtātmaja sudurmate
c darpam utsiktam etat te phalguno nāśayiṣyati
 duryodhana uvāca
a aśvatthāman prasīdasva kṣantum arhasi mānada
c kopaḥ khalu na kartavyaḥ sūtaputre kathaṃ cana
a tvayi karṇe kṛpe droṇe madrarāje 'tha saubale
c mahat kāryaṃ samāyattaṃ prasīda dvijasattama
a ete hy abhimukhāḥ sarve rādheyena yuyutsavaḥ
c āyānti pāṇḍavā brahmann āhvayantaḥ samantataḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
 prasādyamānas tu tato rājñā drauṇir mahāmanāḥ
 prasasāda mahārāja krodhamanyusamanvitaḥ
 tataḥ kṛpa uvācedam ācāryaḥ sumahāmanāḥ
 saumyasvabhāvād rājendra kṣipram āgatamārdavaḥ
 tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
 ājagmuḥ sahitās tatra tarjayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
 duryodhanavacaḥ śrutvā aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥ
 prasādam agamad rājan sūtaputrasya mānada
a karṇo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś cāpam udyamya vīryavān
c kauravāgryaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śakro devagaṇair iva
e paryatiṣṭhata tejasvī svabāhubalam āśritaḥ
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ karṇasya saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
c saṃrabdhasya mahārāja siṃhanādavināditam
a tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
c dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ mahābāhum uccaiḥ śabdam athānadan
a ayaṃ karṇaḥ kutaḥ karṇas tiṣṭha karṇa mahāraṇe
c yudhyasva sahito 'smābhir durātman puruṣādhama
a anye tu dṛṣṭvā rādheyaṃ krodharaktekṣaṇābruvan
c hanyatām ayam utsiktaḥ sūtaputro 'lpacetanaḥ
a sarvaiḥ pārthivaśārdūlair nānenārtho 'sti jīvatā
c atyantavairī pārthānāṃ satataṃ pāpapūruṣaḥ
a eṣa mūlaṃ hy anarthānāṃ duryodhanamate sthitaḥ
c hatainam iti jalpantaḥ kṣatriyāḥ samupādravan
a mahatā śaravarṣeṇa chādayanto mahārathāḥ
c vadhārthaṃ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍaveyena coditāḥ
a tāṃs tu sarvāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā dhāvamānān mahārathān
c na vivyathe sūtaputro na ca trāsam agacchata
a dṛṣṭvā nagarakalpaṃ tam uddhūtaṃ sainyasāgaram
c piprīṣus tava putrāṇāṃ saṃgrāmeṣv aparājitaḥ
a sāyakaughena balavān kṣiprakārī mahābalaḥ
c vārayām āsa tat sainyaṃ samantād bharatarṣabha
a tatas tu śaravarṣeṇa pārthivās tam avārayan
c dhanūṃṣi te vidhunvānāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
e ayodhayanta rādheyaṃ śakraṃ daityagaṇā iva
a śaravarṣaṃ tu tat karṇaḥ pārthivaiḥ samudīritam
c śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samantād vyakirat prabho
a tad yuddham abhavat teṣāṃ kṛtapratikṛtaiṣiṇām
c yathā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya saha dānavaiḥ
a tatrādbhutam apaśyāma sūtaputrasya lāghavam
c yad enaṃ samare yattā nāpnuvanta pare yudhi
a nivārya ca śaraughāṃs tān pārthivānāṃ mahārathaḥ
c yugeṣv īṣāsu chatreṣu dhvajeṣu ca hayeṣu ca
e ātmanāmāṅkitān bāṇān rādheyaḥ prāhiṇoc chitān
a tatas te vyākulībhūtā rājānaḥ karṇapīḍitāḥ
c babhramus tatra tatraiva gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
a hayānāṃ vadhyamānānāṃ gajānāṃ rathināṃ tathā
c tatra tatrābhyavekṣāmaḥ saṃghān karṇena pātitān
a śirobhiḥ patitai rājan bāhubhiś ca samantataḥ
c āstīrṇā vasudhā sarvā śūrāṇām anivartinām
a hataiś ca hanyamānaiś ca niṣṭanadbhiś ca sarvaśaḥ
c babhūvāyodhanaṃ raudraṃ vaivasvatapuropamam
a tato duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
c aśvatthāmānam āsādya tadā vākyam uvāca ha
a yudhyate 'sau raṇe karṇo daṃśitaḥ sarvapārthivaiḥ
c paśyaitāṃ dravatīṃ senāṃ karṇasāyakapīḍitām
e kārttikeyena vidhvastām āsurīṃ pṛtanām iva
a dṛṣṭvaitāṃ nirjitāṃ senāṃ raṇe karṇena dhīmatā
c abhiyāty eṣa bībhatsuḥ sūtaputrajighāṃsayā
a tad yathā paśyamānānāṃ sūtaputraṃ mahāratham
c na hanyāt pāṇḍavaḥ saṃkhye tathā nītir vidhīyatām
a tato drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ śalyo hārdikyaś ca mahārathaḥ
c pratyudyayus tadā pārthaṃ sūtaputraparīpsayā
d bībhatsur api rājendra pāñcālair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
a āyāntaṃ dṛśya kaunteyaṃ vṛtraṃ devacamūm iva
c pratyudyayau tadā karṇo yathā śakraḥ pratāpavān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a saṃrabdhaṃ phalgunaṃ dṛṣṭvā kālāntakayamopamam
c karṇo vaikartanaḥ sūta pratyapadyat kim uttaram
a sa hy aspardhata pārthena nityam eva mahārathaḥ
c āśaṃsate ca bībhatsuṃ yuddhe jetuṃ sudāruṇe
a sa tu taṃ sahasā prāptaṃ nityam atyantavairiṇam
c karṇo vaikartanaḥ sūta kim uttaram apadyata
 saṃjaya uvāca
a āyāntaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ dṛṣṭvā gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathā
c asaṃbhrāntataraḥ karṇaḥ partyudīyād dhanaṃjayam
a tam āpatantaṃ vegena vaikartanam ajihmagaiḥ
c vārayām āsa tejasvī pāṇḍavaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
a taṃ karṇaḥ śarajālena chādayām āsa māriṣa
c vivyādha ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śarais tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
d gāṇḍīvadhanuṣo maurvīṃ chittvācyutam atāḍayat
a tasya tal lāghavaṃ pārtho nāmṛṣyata mahābalaḥ
b tūrṇaṃ jyāṃ ca samāropya gāṇḍīve ca navāṃ dṛḍhām
c tasmai bāṇāñ śilādhautān prasannāgrān ajihmagān
a prāhiṇot sūtaputrāya triṃśataṃ śatrutāpanaḥ
c vivyādha cainaṃ saṃrabdho bāṇenaikena vīryavān
a savye bhujāgre balavān nārācena hasann iva
c tasya viddhasya vegena karāc cāpaṃ papāta ha
a punar ādāya tac cāpaṃ nimeṣārdhān mahābalaḥ
c chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ phalgunaṃ kṛtahastavat
a śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ muktāṃ sūtaputreṇa bhārata
c vyadhamac charavarṣeṇa smayann iva dhanaṃjayaḥ
a tau parasparam āsādya śaravarṣeṇa pārthiva
c chādayetāṃ maheṣvāsau kṛtapratikṛtaiṣiṇau
a tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ karṇapāṇḍavayor mṛdhe
c kruddhayor vāśitāhetor vanyayor gajayor iva
a tataḥ pārtho maheṣvāso dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
c muṣṭideśe dhanus tasya ciccheda tvarayānvitaḥ
a aśvāṃś ca caturo bhallair anayad yamasādanam
c sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād aharac chatrutāpanaḥ
a athainaṃ chinnadhanvānaṃ hatāśvaṃ hatasārathim
c vivyādha sāyakaiḥ pārthaś caturbhiḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya nararṣabhaḥ
c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ kṛpasya śarapīḍitaḥ
d sa nunno 'rjunabāṇaughair ācitaḥ śalyako yathā
d jīvitārtham abhiprepsuḥ kṛpasya ratham āruhat
a rādheyaṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāvakā bharatarṣabha
c dhanaṃjayaśarair nunnāḥ prādravanta diśo daśa
a dravatas tān samālokya rājā duryodhano nṛpa
c nivartayām āsa tadā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
a alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrās tiṣṭhadhvaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
c eṣa pārthavadhāyāhaṃ svayaṃ gacchāmi saṃyuge
e ahaṃ pārthān haniṣyāmi sapāñcālān sasomakān
a adya me yudhyamānasya saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
c drakṣyanti vikramaṃ pārthāḥ kālasyeva yugakṣaye
a adya madbāṇajālāni vimuktāni sahasraśaḥ
c drakṣyanti samare yodhāḥ śalabhānām ivāyatīḥ
a adya bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ sṛjato mama dhanvinaḥ
c jīmūtasyeva gharmānte drakṣyanti yudhi sainikāḥ
a jeṣyāmy adya raṇe pārthaṃ sāyakair nataparvabhiḥ
c tiṣṭhadhvaṃ samare śūrā bhayaṃ tyajata phalgunāt
a na hi madvīryam āsādya phalgunaḥ prasahiṣyati
c yathā velāṃ samāsādya sāgaro makarālayaḥ
a ity uktvā prayayau rājā sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
c phalgunaṃ prati durdharṣaḥ krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
a taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā śāradvatas tadā
c aśvatthāmānam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
a eṣa rājā mahābāhur amarṣī krodhamūrchitaḥ
c pataṃgavṛttim āsthāya phalgunaṃ yoddhum icchati
a yāvan naḥ paśyamānānāṃ prāṇān pārthena saṃgataḥ
c na jahyāt puruṣavyāghras tāvad vāraya kauravam
a yāvat phalgunabāṇānāṃ gocaraṃ nādhigacchati
c kauravaḥ pārthivo vīras tāvad vāraya taṃ drutam
a yāvat pārthaśarair ghorair nirmuktoragasaṃnibhaiḥ
c na bhasmīkriyate rājā tāvad yuddhān nivāryatām
a ayuktam iva paśyāmi tiṣṭhatsv asmāsu mānada
c svayaṃ yuddhāya yad rājā pārthaṃ yāty asahāyavān
a durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ manye kauravyasya kirīṭinā
c yudhyamānasya pārthena śārdūleneva hastinaḥ
a mātulenaivam uktas tu drauṇiḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c duryodhanam idaṃ vākyaṃ tvaritaṃ samabhāṣata
a mayi jīvati gāndhāre na yuddhaṃ gantum arhasi
c mām anādṛtya kauravya tava nityaṃ hitaiṣiṇam
a na hi te saṃbhramaḥ kāryaḥ pārthasya vijayaṃ prati
c aham āvārayiṣyāmi pārthaṃ tiṣṭha suyodhana
 duryodhana uvāca
a ācāryaḥ pāṇḍuputrān vai putravat parirakṣati
c tvam apy upekṣāṃ kuruṣe teṣu nityaṃ dvijottama
a mama vā mandabhāgyatvān mandas te vikramo yudhi
c dharmarājapriyārthaṃ vā draupadyā vā na vidma tat
a dhig astu mama lubdhasya yatkṛte sarvabāndhavāḥ
c sukhārhāḥ paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnuvanty aparājitāḥ
a ko hi śastrabhṛtāṃ mukhyo maheśvarasamo yudhi
c śatrūn na kṣapayec chakto yo na syād gautamīsutaḥ
a aśvatthāman prasīdasva nāśayaitān mamāhitān
c tavāstragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāpi nānagha
a pāñcālān somakāṃś caiva jahi drauṇe sahānugān
c vayaṃ śeṣān haniṣyāmas tvayaiva parirakṣitāḥ
a ete hi somakā vipra pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
c mama sainyeṣu saṃrabdhā vicaranti davāgnivat
a tān vāraya mahābāho kekayāṃś ca narottama
c purā kurvanti niḥśeṣaṃ rakṣyamāṇāḥ kirīṭinā
d aśvatthāmaṃs tvarāyukto yāhi śīghram ariṃdama
a ādau vā yadi vā paścāt tavedaṃ karma māriṣa
c tvam utpanno mahābāho pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ prati
a kariṣyasi jagat sarvam apāñcālaṃ kilācyuta
c evaṃ siddhābruvan vāco bhaviṣyati ca tat tathā
d tasmāt tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra pāñcālāñ jahi sānugān
a na te 'stragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥ
c kim u pārthāḥ sapāñcālāḥ satyam etad vaco mama
d na tvāṃ samarthāḥ saṃgrāme pāṇḍavāḥ saha somakaiḥ
d balād yodhayituṃ vīra satyam etad bravīmi te
d gaccha gaccha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
d iyaṃ hi dravate senā pārthasāyakapīḍitā
d śakto hy asi mahābāho divyena svena tejasā
d nigrahe pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca mānada
 saṃjaya uvāca
a duryodhanenaivam ukto drauṇir āhavadurmadaḥ
b cakārārivadhe yatnam indro daityavadhe yathā
c pratyuvāca mahābāho yathā vadasi kaurava
c   tava putram idaṃ vacaḥ
c satyam etan mahābāho
a priyā hi pāṇḍavā nityaṃ mama cāpi pituś ca me
c tathaivāvāṃ priyau teṣāṃ na tu yuddhe kurūdvaha
e śaktitas tāta yudhyāmas tyaktvā prāṇān abhītavat
a ahaṃ karṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo hārdikya eva ca
c nimeṣāt pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ kṣapayema nṛpottama
a te cāpi kauravīṃ senāṃ nimeṣārdhāt kurūdvaha
c kṣapayeyur mahābāho na syāma yadi saṃyuge
a yudhyatāṃ pāṇḍavāñ śaktyā teṣāṃ cāsmān yuyutsatām
c tejas tu teja āsādya praśamaṃ yāti bhārata
a aśakyā tarasā jetuṃ pāṇḍavānām anīkinī
c jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu tad dhi satyaṃ bravīmi te
a ātmārthaṃ yudhyamānās te samarthāḥ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
c kimarthaṃ tava sainyāni na haniṣyanti bhārata
a tvaṃ hi lubdhatamo rājan nikṛtijñaś ca kaurava
c sarvātiśaṅkī mānī ca tato 'smān atiśaṅkase
d manye tvaṃ kutsito rājan pāpātmā pāpapūruṣaḥ
d anyān api sa naḥ kṣudra śaṅkase pāpabhāvitaḥ
a ahaṃ tu yatnam āsthāya tvadarthe tyaktajīvitaḥ
c eṣa gacchāmi saṃgrāmaṃ tvatkṛte kurunandana
a yotsye 'haṃ śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ jeṣyāmi ca varān varān
c pāñcālaiḥ saha yotsyāmi somakaiḥ kekayais tathā
e pāṇḍaveyaiś ca saṃgrāme tvatpriyārtham ariṃdama
a adya madbāṇanirdagdhāḥ pāñcālāḥ somakās tathā
c siṃhenevārditā gāvo vidraviṣyanti sarvataḥ
a adya dharmasuto rājā dṛṣṭvā mama parākramam
c aśvatthāmamayaṃ lokaṃ maṃsyate saha somakaiḥ
a āgamiṣyati nirvedaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c dṛṣṭvā vinihatān saṃkhye pāñcālān somakaiḥ saha
a ye māṃ yuddhe 'bhiyotsyanti tān haniṣyāmi bhārata
c na hi te vīra mucyeran madbāhvantaram āgatāḥ
a evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tava
c abhyavartata yuddhāya drāvayan sarvadhanvinaḥ
e cikīrṣus tava putrāṇāṃ priyaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a tato 'bravīt sakaikeyān pāñcālān gautamīsutaḥ
c praharadhvam itaḥ sarve mama gātre mahārathāḥ
e sthirībhūtāś ca yudhyadhvaṃ darśayanto 'stralāghavam
a evam uktās tu te sarve śastravṛṣṭim apātayan
c drauṇiṃ prati mahārāja jalaṃ jaladharā iva
a tān nihatya śarān drauṇir daśa vīrān apothayat
c pramukhe pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cābhibho
a te hanyamānāḥ samare pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
c parityajya raṇe drauṇiṃ vyadravanta diśo daśa
a tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrān pāñcālān sahasomakān
c dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja drauṇim abhyadravad yudhi
a tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṇāṃ sajalāmbudanādinām
c vṛtaḥ śatena śūrāṇāṃ rathānām anivartinām
a putraḥ pāñcālarājasya dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
c drauṇim ity abravīd vākyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhān nipātitān
a ācāryaputra durbuddhe kim anyair nihatais tava
c samāgaccha mayā sārdhaṃ yadi śūro 'si saṃyuge
e ahaṃ tvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi tiṣṭhedānīṃ mamāgrataḥ
a tatas tam ācāryasutaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
c marmabhidbhiḥ śarais tīkṣṇair jaghāna bharatarṣabha
a te tu paṅktīkṛtā drauṇiṃ śarā viviśur āśugāḥ
c rukmapuṅkhāḥ prasannāgrāḥ sarvakāyāvadāraṇāḥ
e madhvarthina ivoddāmā bhramarāḥ puṣpitaṃ drumam
a so 'tividdho bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ padākrānta ivoragaḥ
c mānī drauṇir asaṃbhrānto bāṇapāṇir abhāṣata
a dhṛṣṭadyumna sthiro bhūtvā muhūrtaṃ pratipālaya
c yāvat tvāṃ niśitair bāṇaiḥ preṣayāmi yamakṣayam
a drauṇir evam athābhāṣya pārṣataṃ paravīrahā
c chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ samantāl laghuhastavat
a sa chādyamānaḥ samare drauṇinā yuddhadurmadaḥ
c drauṇiṃ pāñcālatanayo vāgbhir ātarjayat tadā
a na jānīṣe pratijñāṃ me viprotpattiṃ tathaiva ca
c droṇaṃ hatvā kila mayā hantavyas tvaṃ sudurmate
e tatas tvāhaṃ na hanmy adya droṇe jīvati saṃyuge
a imāṃ tu rajanīṃ prāptām aprabhātāṃ sudurmate
c nihatya pitaraṃ te 'dya tatas tvām api saṃyuge
e neṣyāmi mṛtyulokāyety evaṃ me manasi sthitam
a yas te pārtheṣu vidveṣo yā bhaktiḥ kauraveṣu ca
c tāṃ darśaya sthiro bhūtvā na me jīvan vimokṣyase
a yo hi brāhmaṇyam utsṛjya kṣatradharmarato dvijaḥ
c sa vadhyaḥ sarvalokasya yathā tvaṃ puruṣādhama
a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ pārṣatena dvijottamaḥ
c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
a nirdahann iva cakṣurbhyāṃ pārṣataṃ so 'bhyavaikṣata
c chādayām āsa ca śarair niḥśvasan pannago yathā
a sa chādyamānaḥ samare drauṇinā rājasattama
c sarvapāñcālasenābhiḥ saṃvṛto rathasattamaḥ
a nākampata mahābāhuḥ svadhairyaṃ samupāśritaḥ
c sāyakāṃś caiva vividhān aśvatthāmni mumoca ha
a tau punaḥ saṃnyavartetāṃ prāṇadyūtapare raṇe
c nivārayantau bāṇaughaiḥ parasparam amarṣiṇau
e utsṛjantau maheṣvāsau śaravṛṣṭīḥ samantataḥ
a drauṇipārṣatayor yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ bhayānakam
c dṛṣṭvā saṃpūjayām āsuḥ siddhacāraṇavātikāḥ
a śaraughaiḥ pūrayantau tāv ākāśaṃ pradiśas tathā
c alakṣyau samayudhyetāṃ mahat kṛtvā śarais tamaḥ
a nṛtyamānāv iva raṇe maṇḍalīkṛtakārmukau
c parasparavadhe yattau parasparajayaiṣiṇau
a ayudhyetāṃ mahābāhū citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
c saṃpūjyamānau samare yodhamukhyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
a tau prayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā vane vanyau gajāv iva
c ubhayoḥ senayor harṣas tumulaḥ samapadyata
a siṃhanādaravāś cāsan dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca māriṣa
c vāditrāṇy abhyavādyanta śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
c muhūrtam iva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpaṃ tadābhavat
a tato drauṇir mahārāja pārṣatasya mahātmanaḥ
c dhvajaṃ dhanus tathā chatram ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
e sūtam aśvāṃś ca caturo nihatyābhyadravad raṇe
a pāñcālāṃś caiva tān sarvān bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c vyadrāvayad ameyātmā śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a tataḥ pravivyathe senā pāṇḍavī bharatarṣabha
c dṛṣṭvā drauṇer mahat karma vāsavasyeva saṃyuge
a śatena ca śataṃ hatvā pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
c tribhiś ca niśitair bāṇair hatvā trīn vai mahārathān
a drauṇir drupadaputrasya phalgunasya ca paśyataḥ
c nāśayām āsa pāñcālān bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
a te vadhyamānāḥ pāñcālāḥ samare saha sṛñjayaiḥ
c agacchan drauṇim utsṛjya viprakīrṇarathadhvajāḥ
a sa jitvā samare śatrūn droṇaputro mahārathaḥ
c nanāda sumahānādaṃ tapānte jalado yathā
a sa nihatya bahūñ śūrān aśvatthāmā vyarocata
c yugānte sarvabhūtāni bhasma kṛtveva pāvakaḥ
a saṃpūjyamāno yudhi kauraveyair
vijitya saṃkhye 'rigaṇān sahasraśaḥ
c vyarocata droṇasutaḥ pratāpavān
yathā surendro 'rigaṇān nihatya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato yudhiṣṭhiraś caiva bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c droṇaputraṃ mahārāja samantāt paryavārayan
a tato duryodhano rājā bhāradvājena saṃvṛtaḥ
c abhyayāt pāṇḍavān saṃkhye tato yuddham avartata
e ghorarūpaṃ mahārāja bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanam
a ambaṣṭhān mālavān vaṅgāñ śibīṃs traigartakān api
c prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya gaṇān kruddho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a abhīṣāhāñ śūrasenān kṣatriyān yuddhadurmadān
c nikṛtya pṛthivīṃ cakre bhīmaḥ śoṇitakardamām
a yaudheyāraṭṭarājanyān madrakāṃś ca gaṇān yudhi
c prāhiṇon mṛtyulokāya kirīṭī niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a pragāḍham añjogatibhir nārācair abhipīḍitāḥ
c nipetur dviradā bhūmau dviśṛṅgā iva parvatāḥ
a nikṛttair hastihastaiś ca luṭhamānais tatas tataḥ
c rarāja vasudhā kīrṇā visarpadbhir ivoragaiḥ
a kṣiptaiḥ kanakacitraiś ca nṛpacchatraiḥ kṣitir babhau
c dyaur ivādityacandrādyair grahaiḥ kīrṇā yugakṣaye
a hata praharatābhītā vidhyata vyavakṛntata
c ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śoṇāśvasya rathaṃ prati
a droṇas tu paramakruddho vāyavyāstreṇa saṃyuge
c vyadhamat tān yathā vāyur meghān iva duratyayaḥ
a te hanyamānā droṇena pāñcālāḥ prādravan bhayāt
c paśyato bhīmasenasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a tataḥ kirīṭī bhīmaś ca sahasā saṃnyavartatām
c mahatā rathavaṃśena parigṛhya balaṃ tava
a bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ tu vṛkodaraḥ
c bhāradvājaṃ śaraughābhyāṃ mahadbhyām abhyavarṣatām
a tau tadā sṛñjayāś caiva pāñcālāś ca mahārathāḥ
c anvagacchan mahārāja matsyāś ca saha somakaiḥ
a tathaiva tava putrasya rathodārāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ jagmur droṇarathaṃ prati
a tataḥ sā bharatī senā vadhyamānā kirīṭinā
c tamasā nidrayā caiva punar eva vyadīryata
a droṇena vāryamāṇās te svayaṃ tava sutena ca
c na śakyante mahārāja yodhā vārayituṃ tadā
a sā pāṇḍuputrasya śarair dāryamāṇā mahācamūḥ
c tamasā saṃvṛte loke vyadravat sarvatomukhī
a utsṛjya śataśo vāhāṃs tatra ke cin narādhipāḥ
c prādravanta mahārāja bhayāviṣṭāḥ samantataḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a somadattaṃ tu saṃprekṣya vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
c sātyakiḥ prāha yantāraṃ somadattāya māṃ vaha
a na hy ahatvā raṇe śatruṃ bāhlīkaṃ kauravādhamam
c nivartiṣye raṇāt sūta satyam etad vaco mama
a tataḥ saṃpreṣayad yantā saindhavāṃs tān mahājavān
c turaṅgamāñ śaṅkhavarṇān sarvaśabdātigān raṇe
a te 'vahan yuyudhānaṃ tu manomārutaraṃhasaḥ
c yathendraṃ harayo rājan purā daityavadhodyatam
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
c somadatto mahābāhur asaṃbhrānto 'bhyavartata
a vimuñcañ śaravarṣāṇi parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
c chādayām āsa śaineyaṃ jalado bhāskaraṃ yathā
a asaṃbhrāntaś ca samare sātyakiḥ kurupuṃgavam
c chādayām āsa bāṇaughaiḥ samantād bharatarṣabha
a somadattas tu taṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādhorasi mādhavam
c sātyakiś cāpi taṃ rājann avidhyat sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
d sātyakiḥ prativivyādha somadattaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a tāv anyonyaṃ śaraiḥ kṛttau vyarājetāṃ nararṣabhau
c supuṣpau puṣpasamaye puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
a rudhirokṣitasarvāṅgau kuruvṛṣṇiyaśaskarau
c parasparam avekṣetāṃ dahantāv iva locanaiḥ
a rathamaṇḍalamārgeṣu carantāv arimardanau
c ghorarūpau hi tāv āstāṃ vṛṣṭimantāv ivāmbudau
a śarasaṃbhinnagātrau tau sarvataḥ śakalīkṛtau
c śvāvidhāv iva rājendra vyadṛṣyetāṃ śarakṣatau
a suvarṇapuṅkhair iṣubhir ācitau tau vyarocatām
c khadyotair āvṛtau rājan prāvṛṣīva vanaspatī
a saṃpradīpitasarvāṅgau sāyakais tau mahārathau
c adṛśyetāṃ raṇe kruddhāv ulkābhir iva kuñjarau
a tato yudhi mahārāja somadatto mahārathaḥ
c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda mādhavasya mahad dhanuḥ
a athainaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samārpayat
c tvaramāṇas tvarākāle punaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a athānyad dhanur ādāya sātyakir vegavattaram
c pañcabhiḥ sāyakais tūrṇaṃ somadattam avidhyata
a tato 'pareṇa bhallena dhvajaṃ ciccheda kāñcanam
c bāhlīkasya raṇe rājan sātyakiḥ prahasann iva
a somadattas tv asaṃbhrānto dṛṣṭvā ketuṃ nipātitam
c śaineyaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samācinot
a sātvato 'pi raṇe kruddhaḥ somadattasya dhanvinaḥ
c dhanuś ciccheda samare kṣurapreṇa śitena ha
a athainaṃ rukmapuṅkhānāṃ śatena nataparvaṇām
c ācinod bahudhā rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭram iva dvipam
a athānyad dhanur ādāya somadatto mahārathaḥ
c sātyakiṃ chādayām āsa śaravṛṣṭyā mahābalaḥ
a somadattaṃ tu saṃkruddho raṇe vivyādha sātyakiḥ
c sātyakiṃ ceṣujālena somadatto apīḍayat
a daśabhiḥ sātvatasyārthe bhīmo 'han bāhlikātmajam
c somadatto 'py asaṃbhrāntaḥ śaineyam avadhīc charaiḥ
a tatas tu sātvatasyārthe bhaimasenir navaṃ dṛḍham
c mumoca parighaṃ ghoraṃ somadattasya vakṣasi
a tam āpatantaṃ vegena parighaṃ ghoradarśanam
c dvidhā ciccheda samare prahasann iva kauravaḥ
a sa papāta dvidhā chinna āyasaḥ parigho mahān
c mahīdharasyeva mahac chikharaṃ vajradāritam
a tatas tu sātyakī rājan somadattasya saṃyuge
c dhanuś ciccheda bhallena hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
a caturbhis tu śarais tūrṇaṃ caturas turagottamān
c samīpaṃ preṣayām āsa pretarājasya bhārata
a sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād bhallena nataparvaṇā
c jahāra rathaśārdūlaḥ prahasañ śinipuṃgavaḥ
a tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
c mumoca sātvato rājan svarṇapuṅkhaṃ śilāśitam
a sa vimukto balavatā śaineyena śarottamaḥ
c ghoras tasyorasi vibho nipapātāśu bhārata
a so 'tividdho balavatā sātvatena mahārathaḥ
c somadatto mahābāhur nipapāta mamāra ca
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ tatra somadattaṃ mahārathāḥ
b pāṇḍavāś ca mahārāja saha madraiḥ prabhadrakaiḥ
c mahatā śaravarṣeṇa yuyudhānam upādravan
a chādyamānaṃ śarair dṛṣṭvā yuyudhānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ droṇānīkam upādravat
a tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kruddhas tāvakānāṃ mahābalam
c śarair vidrāvayām āsa bhāradvājasya paśyataḥ
a sainyāni drāvayantaṃ tu droṇo dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiram
c abhidudrāva vegena krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
a tataḥ suniśitair bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
b yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi saṃkruddhaḥ prativivyādha pañcabhiḥ
c so 'tividdho mahābāhuḥ sṛkkiṇī parisaṃlihan
e yudhiṣṭhirasya ciccheda dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
a sa chinnadhanvā tvaritas tvarākāle nṛpottamaḥ
c anyad ādatta vegena kārmukaṃ samare dṛḍham
a tataḥ śarasahasreṇa droṇaṃ vivyādha pārthivaḥ
c sāśvasūtadhvajarathaṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tato muhūrtaṃ vyathitaḥ śaraghātaprapīḍitaḥ
c niṣasāda rathopasthe droṇo bharatasattama
a pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ muhūrtād dvijasattamaḥ
c krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vāyavyāstram avāsṛjat
a asaṃbhrāntas tataḥ pārtho dhanur ākṛṣya vīryavān
c tad astram astreṇa raṇe stambhayām āsa bhārata
d ciccheda ca dhanur dīrghaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca pāṇḍavaḥ
d athānyad dhanur ādāya droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
d tad apy asya śitair bhallaiś ciccheda kurupuṃgavaḥ
a tato 'bravīd vāsudevaḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho yat tvā vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
a upāramasva yuddhāya droṇād bharatasattama
c gṛdhyate hi sadā droṇo grahaṇe tava saṃyuge
a nānurūpam ahaṃ manye yuddham asya tvayā saha
c yo 'sya sṛṣṭo vināśāya sa enaṃ śvo haniṣyati
a parivarjya guruṃ yāhi yatra rājā suyodhanaḥ
b rājā rājñā hi yoddhavyo nārājñā yuddham iṣyate
b tatra tvaṃ vraja kaunteya hastyaśvarathasaṃvṛtaḥ
b yāvan mātreṇa ca mayā sahāyena dhanaṃjayaḥ
c bhīmaś ca rathaśārdūlo yudhyate kauravaiḥ saha
a vāsudevavacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c muhūrtaṃ cintayitvā tu tato dāruṇam āhavam
a prāyād drutam amitraghno yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
c vinighnaṃs tāvakān yodhān vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ
a rathaghoṣeṇa mahatā nādayan vasudhātalam
c parjanya iva gharmānte nādayan vai diśo daśa
a bhīmasya nighnataḥ śatrūn pārṣṇiṃ jagrāha pāṇḍavaḥ
b mahatā rathavaṃśena davāgnir iva cotthitaḥ
b bhīmāntikam upāyāte rājarāje yudhiṣṭhire
b nivṛtte kauravān hantuṃ viṣṇuvākyapraṇodite
c droṇo 'pi pāṇḍupāñcālān vyadhamad rajanīmukhe
d nādayaṃs talaghoṣeṇa tava sainyāni māriṣa
 saṃjaya uvāca
a vartamāne tathā yuddhe ghorarūpe bhayāvahe
c tamasā saṃvṛte loke rajasā ca mahīpate
e nāpaśyanta raṇe yodhāḥ parasparam avasthitāḥ
a anumānena saṃjñābhir yuddhaṃ tad vavṛte mahat
c naranāgāśvamathanaṃ paramaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
a droṇakarṇakṛpā vīrā bhīmapārṣatasātyakāḥ
c anyonyaṃ kṣobhayām āsuḥ sainyāni nṛpasattama
a vadhyamānāni sainyāni samantāt tair mahārathaiḥ
c tamasā rajasā caiva samantād vipradudruvuḥ
a te sarvato vidravanto yodhā vitrastacetasaḥ
c ahanyanta mahārāja dhāvamānāś ca saṃyuge
a mahārathasahasrāṇi jaghnur anyonyam āhave
c andhe tamasi mūḍhāni putrasya tava mantrite
a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāgopāś ca bhārata
c vyamuhyanta raṇe tatra tamasā saṃvṛte sati
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a teṣāṃ saṃloḍyamānānāṃ pāṇḍavair nihataujasām
c andhe tamasi magnānām āsīt kā vo matis tadā
a kathaṃ prakāśas teṣāṃ vā mama sainyeṣu vā punaḥ
c babhūva loke tamasā tathā saṃjaya saṃvṛte
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni hataśiṣṭāni yāni vai
c senāgoptṝn athādiśya punar vyūham akalpayat
a droṇaḥ purastāj jaghane tu śalyas
tathā drauṇiḥ pārśvataḥ saubalaś ca
c svayaṃ tu sarvāṇi balāni rājan
rājābhyayād gopayan vai niśāyām
a uvāca sarvāṃś ca padātisaṃghān
duryodhanaḥ pārthiva sāntvapūrvam
c utsṛjya sarve paramāyudhāni
gṛhṇīta hastair jvalitān pradīpān
a te coditāḥ pārthivasattamena
tataḥ prahṛṣṭā jagṛhuḥ pradīpān
b devarṣigandharvasurarṣisaṅghā
b vidyādharāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāś ca
b nāgāḥ sayakṣoragakinnarāś ca
b hṛṣṭā divisthā jagṛhuḥ pradīpān
b digdaivatebhyaś ca samāpatanto
b 'dṛśyanta dīpāḥ sasugandhitailāḥ
b viśeṣato nāradaparvatābhyāṃ
b saṃbodhyamānāḥ kurupāṇḍavārtham
c sā bhūya eva dhvajinī vibhaktā
vyarocatāgniprabhayā niśāyām
a mahādhanair ābharaṇaiś ca divyaiḥ
śastraiḥ pradīptair abhisaṃpatadbhiḥ
b rathe rathe pañca vidīpakās tu
b pradīpakās tatra gaje trayaś ca
b pratyaśvam ekaś ca mahāpradīpaḥ
b kṛtās tu taiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauraveyaiḥ
c kṣaṇena sarve vihitāḥ pradīpā
vyadīpayaṃś ca dhvajinīṃ tadāśu
a sarvās tu senā vyatisevyamānāḥ
padātibhiḥ pāvakatailahastaiḥ
c prakāśyamānā dadṛśur niśāyāṃ
yathāntarikṣe jaladās taḍidbhiḥ
a prakāśitāyāṃ tu tathā dhvajinyāṃ
droṇo 'gnikalpaḥ pratapan samantāt
c rarāja rājendra suvarṇavarmā
madhyaṃ gataḥ sūrya ivāṃśumālī
a jāmbūnadeṣv ābharaṇeṣu caiva
niṣkeṣu śuddheṣu śarāvareṣu
c pīteṣu śastreṣu ca pāvakasya
pratiprabhās tatra tato babhūvuḥ
a gadāś ca śaikyāḥ parighāś ca śubhrā
ratheṣu śaktyaś ca vivartamānāḥ
c pratiprabhā raśmibhir ājamīḍha
punaḥ punaḥ saṃjanayanti dīptāḥ
a chatrāṇi bālavyajanānuṣaṅgā
dīptā maholkāś ca tathaiva rājan
c vyāghūrṇamānāś ca suvarṇamālā
vyāyacchatāṃ tatra tadā virejuḥ
a śastraprabhābhiś ca virājamānaṃ
dīpaprabhābhiś ca tadā balaṃ tat
c prakāśitaṃ cābharaṇaprabhābhir
bhṛśaṃ prakāśaṃ nṛpate babhūva
a pītāni śastrāṇy asṛgukṣitāni
vīrāvadhūtāni tanudruhāṇi
c dīptāṃ prabhāṃ prājanayanta tatra
tapātyaye vidyud ivāntarikṣe
a prakampitānām abhighātavegair
abhighnatāṃ cāpatatāṃ javena
c vaktrāṇy aśobhanta tadā narāṇāṃ
vāyvīritānīva mahāmbujāni
a mahāvane dāva iva pradīpte
yathā prabhā bhāskarasyāpi naśyet
c tathā tavāsīd dhvajinī pradīptā
mahābhaye bhārata bhīmarūpā
a tat saṃpradīptaṃ balam asmadīyaṃ
niśāmya pārthās tvaritās tathaiva
c sarveṣu sainyeṣu padātisaṃghān
acodayaṃs te 'tha cakruḥ pradīpān
a gaje gaje sapta kṛtāḥ pradīpā
rathe rathe caiva daśa pradīpāḥ
c dvāv aśvapṛṣṭhe paripārśvato 'nye
dhvajeṣu cānye jaghaneṣu cānye
a senāsu sarvāsu ca pārśvato 'nye
paścāt purastāc ca samantataś ca
c madhye tathānye jvalitāgnihastāḥ
senādvaye 'pi sma narā viceruḥ
a sarveṣu sainyeṣu padātisaṃghā
vyāmiśritā hastirathāśvavṛndaiḥ
c madhye tathānye jvalitāgnihastā
vyadīpayan pāṇḍusutasya senām
d vyadīpayaṃs te dhvajinīṃ pradīptāṃ
d tathā balaṃ pāṇḍaveyābhiguptam
a tena pradīptena tathā pradīptaṃ
balaṃ tad āsīd balavad balena
c bhāḥ kurvatā bhānumatā graheṇa
divākareṇāgnir ivābhitaptaḥ
a tayoḥ prabhāḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ
sarvā vyatikramya diśaś ca vṛddhāḥ
c tena prakāśena bhṛśaṃ prakāśaṃ
babhūva teṣāṃ tava caiva sainyam
a tena prakāśena divaṃgamena
saṃbodhitā devagaṇāś ca rājan
c gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghāḥ
samāgamann apsarasaś ca sarvāḥ
a tad devagandharvasamākulaṃ ca
yakṣāsurendrāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiś ca
c hataiś ca vīrair divam āruhadbhir
āyodhanaṃ divyakalpaṃ babhūva
a rathāśvanāgākuladīpadīptaṃ
saṃrabdhayodhāhatavidrutāśvam
c mahad balaṃ vyūḍharathāśvanāgaṃ
surāsuravyūhasamaṃ babhūva
a tac chaktisaṃghākulacaṇḍavātaṃ
mahārathābhraṃ rathavājighoṣam
c śastraughavarṣaṃ rudhirāmbudhāraṃ
niśi pravṛttaṃ naradevayuddham
a tasmin mahāgnipratimo mahātmā
saṃtāpayan pāṇḍavān vipramukhyaḥ
c gabhastibhir madhyagato yathārko
varṣātyaye tadvad abhūn narendra
 saṃjaya uvāca
a prakāśite tathā loke rajasā ca tamovṛte
c samājagmur atho vīrāḥ parasparavadhaiṣiṇaḥ
a te sametya raṇe rājañ śastraprāsāsidhāriṇaḥ
c parasparam udaikṣanta parasparakṛtāgasaḥ
a pradīpānāṃ sahasraiś ca dīpyamānaiḥ samantataḥ
b ratnācitaiḥ svarṇadaṇḍair gandhatailāvasecitaiḥ
b devagandharvadīpādyaiḥ prabhābhir adhikojjvalaiḥ
c virarāja tadā bhūmir dyaur grahair iva bhārata
a ulkāśataiḥ prajvalitai raṇabhūmir vyarājata
c dahyamāneva lokānām abhāve vai vasuṃdharā
a prādīpyanta diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradīpais taiḥ samantataḥ
c varṣāpradoṣe khadyotair vṛtā vṛkṣā ivābabhuḥ
a asajjanta tato vīrā vīreṣv eva pṛthak pṛthak
c nāgā nāgaiḥ samājagmus turagāḥ saha vājibhiḥ
a rathā rathavarair eva samājagmur mudānvitāḥ
c tasmin rātrimukhe ghore putrasya tava śāsanāt
d caturaṅgasya sainyasya saṃpātaś ca mahān abhūt
a tato 'rjuno mahārāja kauravāṇām anīkinīm
c vyadhamat tvarayā yuktaḥ kṣapayan sarvapārthivān
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tasmin praviṣṭe saṃrabdhe mama putrasya vāhinīm
c amṛṣyamāṇe durdharṣe kiṃ va āsīn manas tadā
a kim amanyanta sainyāni praviṣṭe śatrutāpane
c duryodhanaś ca kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyata
a ke cainaṃ samare vīraṃ pratyudyayur ariṃdamam
b droṇaṃ ca ke vyarakṣanta praviṣṭe śvetavāhane
c ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ ke ca droṇasya savyataḥ
a ke pṛṣṭhato 'sya hy abhavan vīrā vīrasya yudhyataḥ
c ke purastād agacchanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
a yat prāviśan maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālān aparājitaḥ
c nṛtyann iva naravyāghro rathamārgeṣu vīryavān
a dadāha ca śarair droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajān
c dhūmaketur iva kruddhaḥ sa kathaṃ mṛtyum īyivān
a avyagrān eva hi parān kathayasy aparājitān
b hṛṣṭānudīrṇān saṃgrāme na tu saṃjaya māmakān
c hatāṃś caiva viṣaṇṇāṃś ca viprakīrṇāṃś ca śaṃsasi
e rathino virathāṃś caiva kṛtān yuddheṣu māmakān
 saṃjaya uvāca
a droṇasya matam ājñāya yoddhukāmasya tāṃ niśām
c duryodhano mahārāja vaśyān bhrātṝn abhāṣata
a vikarṇaṃ citrasenaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ ca kauravam
c durdharṣaṃ dīrghabāhuṃ ca ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
a droṇaṃ yattāḥ parākrāntāḥ sarve rakṣata pṛṣṭhataḥ
c hārdikyo dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ śalyaś caivottaraṃ tathā
a trigartānāṃ ca ye śūrā hataśiṣṭā mahārathāḥ
c tāṃś caiva sarvān putras te samacodayad agrataḥ
a ācāryo hi susaṃyatto bhṛśaṃ yattāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
c taṃ rakṣata susaṃyattā nighnantaṃ śātravān raṇe
a droṇo hi balavān yuddhe kṣiprahastaḥ parākramī
c nirjayet tridaśān yuddhe kim u pārthān sasomakān
a te yūyaṃ sahitāḥ sarve bhṛśaṃ yattā mahārathāḥ
c droṇaṃ rakṣata pāñcālyād dhṛṣṭadyumnān mahārathāt
a pāṇḍaveyeṣu sainyeṣu yodhaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ na tam
c yo jayeta raṇe droṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnād ṛte nṛpāḥ
a tasya sarvātmanā manye bhāradvājasya rakṣaṇam
c sa guptaḥ somakān hanyāt sṛñjayāṃś ca sarājakān
a sṛñjayeṣv atha sarveṣu nihateṣu camūmukhe
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe drauṇir nāśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
a tathārjunaṃ raṇe karṇo vijeṣyati mahārathaḥ
c bhīmasenam ahaṃ cāpi yuddhe jeṣyāmi daṃśitaḥ
d śeṣāṃś ca pāṇḍavān yodhāḥ prasabhaṃ hīnatejasaḥ
a so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati
c tasmād rakṣata saṃgrāme droṇam eva mahārathāḥ
a ity uktvā bharataśreṣṭha putro duryodhanas tava
c vyādideśa tataḥ sainyaṃ tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ rātrau tad bharatarṣabha
c ubhayoḥ senayor ghoraṃ vijayaṃ prati kāṅkṣiṇoḥ
a arjunaḥ kauravaṃ sainyam arjunaṃ cāpi kauravāḥ
c nānāśastrasamāvāpair anyonyaṃ paryapīḍayan
a drauṇiḥ pāñcālarājānaṃ bhāradvājaś ca sṛñjayān
c chādayām āsatuḥ saṃkhye śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a pāṇḍupāñcālasenānāṃ kauravāṇāṃ ca māriṣa
c āsīn niṣṭānako ghoro nighnatām itaretaram
a naivāsmābhir na pūrvair no dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvaṃ tathāvidham
c yuddhaṃ yādṛśam evāsīt tāṃ rātriṃ sumahābhayam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a vartamāne tathā raudre rātriyuddhe viśāṃ pate
b manuṣyanaranāgānām abhāvāya narādhipa
b yudhiṣṭhiro 'bravīd rājā svān yodhān manujādhipa
c sarvabhūtakṣayakare dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a abravīt pāṇḍavāṃś caiva pāñcālāṃś ca sasomakān
c abhyadravata gacchadhvaṃ droṇam eva jighāṃsayā
a rājñas te vacanād rājan pāñcālāḥ somakās tathā
c droṇam evābhyavartanta nadanto bhairavān ravān
a tān vayaṃ pratigarjantaḥ pratyudyātās tv amarṣitāḥ
c yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ yathāsattvaṃ ca saṃyuge
a kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyo yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat
c droṇaṃ prati jighāṃsantaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam
d dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇam evānvapadyata
a śaineyaṃ śaravarṣāṇi vikirantaṃ samantataḥ
c abhyayāt kauravo rājan bhūriḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani
a sahadevam athāyāntaṃ droṇaprepsuṃ mahāratham
c karṇo vaikartano rājan vārayām āsa pāṇḍavam
a bhīmasenam athāyāntaṃ vyāditāsyam ivāntakam
c svayaṃ duryodhano yuddhe pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajat
a nakulaṃ ca yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvayuddhaviśāradam
c śakuniḥ saubalo rājan vārayām āsa satvaraḥ
a śikhaṇḍinam athāyāntaṃ rathena rathināṃ varam
c kṛpo śāradvato rājan vārayām āsa saṃyuge
a prativindhyam athāyāntaṃ mayūrasadṛśair hayaiḥ
c duḥśāsano mahārāja yatto yattam avārayat
a bhaimasenim athāyāntaṃ māyāśataviśāradam
c aśvatthāmā pitur mānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pratyaṣedhayat
a drupadaṃ vṛṣasenas tu sasainyaṃ sapadānugam
c vārayām āsa samare droṇaprepsuṃ mahāratham

c samāgacchan mahārāja vinadantaḥ pṛthak pṛthak

a yudhiṣṭhiras tu hārdikyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
c punar vivyādha viṃśatyā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt

c hārdikyaṃ daśabhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat

a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
c prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇān pañca rājañ śilāśitān
a te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā hemacitraṃ mahādhanam
c prāviśan dharaṇīm ugrā valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
a akṣṇor nimeṣamātreṇa so 'nyad ādāya kārmukam
c vivyādha pāṇḍavaṃ ṣaṣṭyā sūtaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a tasya śaktim ameyātmā pāṇḍavo bhujagopamām
c cikṣepa bharataśreṣṭha rathe nyasya mahad dhanuḥ

c hārdikyaṃ chādayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ

c punar droṇasya jugupe cakram eva mahābalaḥ

c abhyadhāvata vegena śaineyaṃ prati saṃyuge

a tāṃ śastravṛṣṭim atulāṃ vajrāśanisamasvanām

a atitīvram abhūd yuddhaṃ nararākṣasayor mṛdhe

c draṣṭṝṇāṃ prītijananaṃ sarveṣāṃ bharatarṣabha
d tau pragṛhya mahāvegau dhanuṣī bhīmanisvane
d pracchādayetām anyonyaṃ tatakṣantau maheṣubhiḥ
d tatrāsīt suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavat
d tataḥ pārtho maheṣvāso divyaṃ viṣphārayan dhanuḥ
d āpūrayan diśo bāṇair jyākṣepeṇa vinādayan
a tam arjunaḥ śatenaiva patriṇām abhyatāḍayat
c navabhiś ca śitair bāṇaiś ciccheda dhvajam ucchritam
a sārathiṃ ca tribhir bāṇais tribhir eva triveṇukam
c dhanur ekena ciccheda caturbhiś caturo hayān
e virathasyodyataṃ khaḍgaṃ śareṇāsya dvidhācchinat
a athainaṃ niśitair bāṇaiś caturbhir bharatarṣabha
c pārtho 'rdayad rākṣasendraṃ sa viddhaḥ prādravad bhayāt
a taṃ vijityārjunas tūrṇaṃ droṇāntikam upāyayau
c kirañ śaragaṇān rājan naravāraṇavājiṣu
a vadhyamānā mahārāja pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā
c sainikā nyapatann urvyāṃ vātanunnā iva drumāḥ
a teṣu tūtsādyamāneṣu phalgunena mahātmanā
c saṃprādravad balaṃ sarvaṃ putrāṇāṃ te viśāṃ pate
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śatānīkaṃ śarais tūrṇaṃ nirdahantaṃ camūṃ tava
c citrasenas tava suto vārayām āsa bhārata
a nākuliś citrasenaṃ tu nārācenārdayad bhṛśam
c sa ca taṃ prativivyādha daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a citraseno mahārāja śatānīkaṃ punar yudhi
c navabhir niśitair bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntare
a nākulis tasya viśikhair varma saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c gātrāt saṃcyāvayām āsa tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a so 'petavarmā putras te virarāja bhṛśaṃ nṛpa
c utsṛjya kāle rājendra nirmokam iva pannagaḥ
a tato 'sya niśitair bāṇair dhvajaṃ ciccheda nākuliḥ
c dhanuś caiva mahārāja yatamānasya saṃyuge
a sa chinnadhanvā samare vivarmā ca mahārathaḥ
c dhanur anyan mahārāja jagrāhārividāraṇam
a tatas tūrṇaṃ citraseno nākuliṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c vivyādha samare kruddho bharatānāṃ mahārathaḥ
a śatānīko 'tha saṃkruddhaś citrasenasya māriṣa
c jaghāna caturo vāhān sārathiṃ ca narottamaḥ
a avaplutya rathāt tasmāc citraseno mahārathaḥ
c nākuliṃ pañcaviṃśatyā śarāṇām ārdayad balī
a tasya tat kurvataḥ karma nakulasya suto raṇe
c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda cāpaṃ ratnavibhūṣitam
a sa chinnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
c āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ hārdikyasya mahātmanaḥ
a drupadaṃ tu sahānīkaṃ droṇaprepsuṃ mahāratham
c vṛṣaseno 'bhyayāt tūrṇaṃ kirañ śaraśatais tadā
a yajñasenas tu samare karṇaputraṃ mahāratham
c ṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ vivyādha bāhvor urasi cānagha
a vṛṣasenas tu saṃkruddho yajñasenaṃ rathe sthitam
c bahubhiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇair ājaghāna stanāntare
a tāv ubhau śaranunnāṅgau śarakaṇṭakinau raṇe
c vyabhrājetāṃ mahārāja śvāvidhau śalalair iva
a rukmapuṅkhair ajihmāgraiḥ śaraiś chinnatanucchadau
c rudhiraughapariklinnau vyabhrājetāṃ mahāmṛdhe
a tapanīyanibhau citrau kalpavṛkṣāv ivādbhutau
c kiṃśukāv iva cotphullau vyakāśetāṃ raṇājire
a vṛṣasenas tato rājan navabhir drupadaṃ śaraiḥ
c viddhvā vivyādha saptatyā punaś cānyais tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
d vṛṣasenaśarair nunno vyapayāsīn mahīpatiḥ
a tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi vimuñcan vibabhau tadā
c karṇaputro mahārāja varṣamāṇa ivāmbudaḥ
d drupadas tu tataḥ kruddho vṛṣasenasya kārmukam
d dvidhā ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena ca
d so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya rukmabaddhaṃ navaṃ dṛḍham
d tūṇād ākṛṣya vimalaṃ bhallaṃ pītaṃ śitaṃ dṛḍham
d kārmuke yojayitvā taṃ drupadaṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca
d ākarṇapūrṇaṃ mumuce trāsayan sarvasomakān
d hṛdayaṃ tasya bhittvā ca jagāma vasudhātalam
d kaśmalaṃ prāviśad rājā vṛṣasenaśarāhataḥ
d sārathis tam apovāha smaran sārathiceṣṭitam
d tasmin prabhagne rājendra pāñcālānāṃ mahārathe
a tatas tu drupadānīkaṃ śaraiś chinnatanucchadam
c saṃprādravad raṇe rājan niśīthe bhairave sati
a pradīpair hi parityaktair jvaladbhis taiḥ samantataḥ
c vyarājata mahī rājan vītābhrā dyaur iva grahaiḥ
a tathāṅgadair nipatitair vyarājata vasuṃdharā
c prāvṛṭkāle mahārāja vidyudbhir iva toyadaḥ
a tataḥ karṇasutatrastāḥ somakā vipradudruvuḥ
c yathendrabhayavitrastā dānavās tārakāmaye
a tenārdyamānāḥ samare dravamāṇāś ca somakāḥ
c vyarājanta mahārāja pradīpair avabhāsitāḥ
a tāṃs tu nirjitya samare karṇaputro vyarocata
c madhyaṃdinam anuprāpto gharmāṃśur iva bhārata
a teṣu rājasahasreṣu tāvakeṣu pareṣu ca
c eka eva jvalaṃs tasthau vṛṣasenaḥ pratāpavān
a sa vijitya raṇe śūrān somakānāṃ mahārathān
c jagāma tvaritas tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a prativindhyam atha kruddhaṃ pradahantaṃ raṇe ripūn
c duḥśāsanas tava sutaḥ pratyudgacchan mahārathaḥ
a tayoḥ samāgamo rājaṃś citrarūpo babhūva ha
c vyapetajalade vyomni budhabhārgavayor iva
a prativindhyaṃ tu samare kurvāṇaṃ karma duṣkaram
b apūjayan mahārāja tava sainye mahārathāḥ
c duḥśāsanas tribhir bāṇair lalāṭe samavidhyata
a so 'tividdho balavatā putreṇa tava dhanvinā
c virarāja mahābāhuḥ saśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
a duḥśāsanaṃ tu samare prativindhyo mahārathaḥ
c navabhiḥ sāyakair viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
a tatra bhārata putras te kṛtavān karma duṣkaram
c prativindhyahayān ugraiḥ pātayām āsa yac charaiḥ
a sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena dhvajaṃ ca samapātayat
c rathaṃ ca śataśo rājan vyadhamat tasya dhanvinaḥ
a patākāś ca sa tūṇīrān raśmīn yoktrāṇi cābhibho
c ciccheda tilaśaḥ kruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a virathaḥ sa tu dharmātmā dhanuṣpāṇir avasthitaḥ
c ayodhayat tava sutaṃ kirañ śaraśatān bahūn
a kṣurapreṇa dhanus tasya ciccheda kṛtahastavat
c athainaṃ daśabhir bhallaiś chinnadhanvānam ārdayat
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ tatra bhrātaro 'sya mahārathāḥ
c anvavartanta vegena mahatyā senayā saha
a āplutaḥ sa tato yānaṃ sutasomasya bhāsvaram
c dhanur gṛhya mahārāja vivyādha tanayaṃ tava
a tatas tu tāvakāḥ sarve parivārya sutaṃ tava
c abhyavartanta saṃgrāme mahatyā senayā vṛtāḥ
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
c niśīthe dāruṇe kāle yamarāṣṭravivardhanam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a nakulaṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe nighnantaṃ vāhinīṃ tava
c abhyayāt saubalaḥ kruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
a kṛtavairau tu tau vīrāv anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇau
c śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
a yathaiva saubalaḥ kṣipraṃ śaravarṣāṇi muñcati
c tathaiva nakulo rājañ śikṣāṃ saṃdarśayan yudhi
a tāv ubhau samare śūrau śarakaṇṭakinau tadā
c vyarājetāṃ mahārāja kaṇṭakair iva śālmalī
a sujihmaṃ prekṣamāṇau ca rājan vivṛtalocanau
c krodhasaṃraktanayanau nirdahantau parasparam
a syālas tu tava saṃkruddho mādrīputraṃ hasann iva
c karṇinaikena vivyādha hṛdaye niśitena ha
a nakulas tu bhṛśaṃ viddhaḥ syālena tava dhanvinā
c niṣasāda rathopasthe kaśmalaṃ cainam āviśat
a atyantavairiṇaṃ dṛptaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruṃ tathāgatam
c nanāda śakunī rājaṃs tapānte jalado yathā
a pratilabhya tataḥ saṃjñāṃ nakulaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
c abhyayāt saubalaṃ bhūyo vyāttānana ivāntakaḥ
a saṃkruddhaḥ śakuniṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha bharatarṣabha
c punaś caiva śatenaiva nārācānāṃ stanāntare
a tato 'sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭideśe sa cicchide
c dhvajaṃ ca tvaritaṃ chittvā rathād bhūmāv apātayat
d viśikhena ca tīkṣṇena pītena niśitena ca
d ūrū nirbhidya caikena nakulaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
d śyenaṃ sapakṣaṃ vyādhena pātayām āsa taṃ tadā
a so 'tividdho mahārāja rathopastha upāviśat
b dhvajayaṣṭiṃ pariṣvajya kāminīṃ kāmuko yathā
c taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā syālaṃ tavānagha
e apovāha rathenāśu sārathir dhvajinīmukhāt
a tataḥ saṃcukruśuḥ pārthā ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
c nirjitya ca raṇe śatrūn nakulaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
e abravīt sārathiṃ kruddho droṇānīkāya māṃ vaha
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥ
c prāyāt tena raṇe rājan yena droṇo 'nvayudhyata
a śikhaṇḍinaṃ tu samare droṇaprepsuṃ viśāṃ pate
c kṛpaḥ śāradvato yattaḥ pratyudgacchat suvegitaḥ
a gautamaṃ drutam āyāntaṃ droṇāntikam ariṃdamam
c vivyādha navabhir bhallaiḥ śikhaṇḍī prahasann iva
a tam ācāryo mahārāja viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
c punar vivyādha viṃśatyā putrāṇāṃ priyakṛt tava
a mahad yuddhaṃ tayor āsīd ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
c yathā devāsure yuddhe śambarāmararājayoḥ
a śarajālāvṛtaṃ vyoma cakratus tau mahārathau
b meghāv iva tapāpāye vīrau samaradurmadau
c prakṛtyā ghorarūpaṃ tad āsīd ghorataraṃ punaḥ
a rātriś ca bharataśreṣṭha yodhānāṃ yuddhaśālinām
c kālarātrinibhā hy āsīd ghorarūpā bhayāvahā
a śikhaṇḍī tu mahārāja gautamasya mahad dhanuḥ
c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda sajyaṃ saviśikhaṃ tadā
a tasya kruddhaḥ kṛpo rājañ śaktiṃ cikṣepa dāruṇām
c svarṇadaṇḍām akuṇṭhāgrāṃ karmāraparimārjitām
a tām āpatantīṃ ciccheda śikhaṇḍī bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
c sāpatan medinīṃ dīptā bhāsayantī mahāprabhā
a athānyad dhanur ādāya gautamo rathināṃ varaḥ
c prācchādayac chitair bāṇair mahārāja śikhaṇḍinam
a sa chādyamānaḥ samare gautamena yaśasvinā
c vyaṣīdata rathopasthe śikhaṇḍī rathināṃ varaḥ
a sīdantaṃ cainam ālokya kṛpaḥ śāradvato yudhi
c ājaghne bahubhir bāṇair jighāṃsann iva bhārata
a vimukhaṃ taṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā yājñaseniṃ mahāratham
c pāñcālāḥ somakāś caiva parivavruḥ samantataḥ
a tathaiva tava putrāś ca parivavrur dvijottamam
c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ tato yuddham abhūt punaḥ
a rathānāṃ ca raṇe rājann anyonyam abhidhāvatām
c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo meghānāṃ nadatām iva
a dravatāṃ sādināṃ caiva gajānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
c anyonyam abhito rājan krūram āyodhanaṃ babhau
a pattīnāṃ dravatāṃ caiva padaśabdena medinī
c akampata mahārāja bhayatrasteva cāṅganā
a rathā rathān samāsādya pradrutā vegavattaram
c nyagṛhṇan bahavo rājañ śalabhān vāyasā iva
a tathā gajān prabhinnāṃś ca suprabhinnā mahāgajāḥ
c tasminn eva pade yattā nigṛhṇanti sma bhārata
a sādī sādinam āsādya padātī ca padātinam
c samāsādya raṇe 'nyonyaṃ saṃrabdhā nāticakramuḥ
a dhāvatāṃ dravatāṃ caiva punar āvartatām api
c babhūva tatra sainyānāṃ śabdaḥ sutumulo niśi
a dīpyamānāḥ pradīpāś ca rathavāraṇavājiṣu
c adṛśyanta mahārāja maholkā iva khāc cyutāḥ
a sā niśā bharataśreṣṭha pradīpair avabhāsitā
c divasapratimā rājan babhūva raṇamūrdhani
a ādityena yathā vyāptaṃ tamo loke praṇaśyati
c tathā naṣṭaṃ tamo ghoraṃ dīpair dīptair alaṃkṛtam
d divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ caiva diśaś ca pradiśas tathā
d rajasā tamasā vyāptā dyotitāḥ prabhayā punaḥ
a śastrāṇāṃ kavacānāṃ ca maṇīnāṃ ca mahātmanām
c antardadhuḥ prabhāḥ sarvā dīpais tair avabhāsitāḥ
a tasmin kolāhale yuddhe vartamāne niśāmukhe
b na ke cid vidurātmānam ayam asmīti bhārata
c avadhīt samare putraṃ pitā bharatasattama
a putraś ca pitaraṃ mohāt sakhāyaṃ ca sakhā tathā
c saṃbandhinaṃ ca saṃbandhī svasrīyaṃ cāpi mātulaḥ
a sve svān pare parāṃś cāpi nijaghnur itaretaram
c nirmaryādam abhūd yuddhaṃ rātrau ghoraṃ bhayāvaham
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tasmin sutumule yuddhe vartamāne bhayāvahe
c dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇam evābhyavartata
a saṃmṛjāno dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ jyāṃ vikarṣan punaḥ punaḥ
c abhyavartata droṇasya rathaṃ rukmavibhūṣitam
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tadāyāntaṃ droṇasyāntacikīrṣayā
c parivavrur mahārāja pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
a tathā parivṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇam ācāryasattamam
c putrās te sarvato yattā rarakṣur droṇam āhave
a balārṇavau tatas tau tu sameyātāṃ niśāmukhe
c vātoddhūtau kṣubdhasattvau bhairavau sāgarāv iva
a tato droṇaṃ mahārāja pāñcālyaḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca
a taṃ droṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā viddhvā bhārata saṃyuge
c cicchedānyena bhallena dhanur asya mahāprabham
a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu nirviddho droṇena bharatarṣabha
c utsasarja dhanus tūrṇaṃ saṃdaśya daśanacchadam
a tataḥ kruddho mahārāja dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
c ādade 'nyad dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ droṇasyāntacikīrṣayā
a vikṛṣya ca dhanuś citram ākarṇāt paravīrahā
c droṇasyāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ vyasṛjat sāyakaṃ tataḥ
a sa visṛṣṭo balavatā śaro ghoro mahāmṛdhe
c bhāsayām āsa tat sainyaṃ divākara ivoditaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu śaraṃ ghoraṃ devagandharvamānavāḥ
c svasty astu samare rājan droṇāyety abruvan vacaḥ
a taṃ tu sāyakam aprāptam ācāryasya rathaṃ prati
c karṇo dvādaśadhā rājaṃś ciccheda kṛtahastavat
a sa chinno bahudhā rājan sūtaputreṇa māriṣa
c nipapāta śaras tūrṇaṃ nikṛttaḥ karṇasāyakaiḥ
a chittvā tu samare bāṇaṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ raṇe karṇo vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a pañcabhir droṇaputras tu svayaṃ droṇaś ca saptabhiḥ
c śalyaś ca navabhir bāṇais tribhir duḥśāsanas tathā
a duryodhanaś ca viṃśatyā śakuniś cāpi pañcabhiḥ
c pāñcālyaṃ tvaritāvidhyan sarva eva mahārathāḥ
a sa viddhaḥ saptabhir vīrair droṇatrāṇārtham āhave
c sarvān asaṃbhramād rājan pratyavidhyat tribhis tribhiḥ
e droṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca karṇaṃ ca vivyādha tava cātmajam
a te viddhvā dhanvinā tena dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ punar mṛdhe
c vivyadhuḥ pañcabhis tūrṇam ekaiko rathināṃ varaḥ
a drumasenas tu saṃkruddho rājan vivyādha patriṇā
c tribhiś cānyaiḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
a sa tu taṃ prativivyādha tribhis tīkṣṇair ajihmagaiḥ
c svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilādhautaiḥ prāṇāntakaraṇair yudhi
a bhallenānyena tu punaḥ suvarṇojjvalakuṇḍalam
c unmamātha śiraḥ kāyād drumasenasya vīryavān
a tacchiro nyapatad bhūmau saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaṃ raṇe
c mahāvātasamuddhūtaṃ pakvaṃ tālaphalaṃ yathā
d dyumatsenaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
d karṇam abhyadravad rājan sāyakair bahubhiḥ śitaiḥ
a tāṃś ca viddhvā punar vīrān vīraḥ suniśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c rādheyasyācchinad bhallaiḥ kārmukaṃ citrayodhinaḥ
a na tu tan mamṛṣe karṇo dhanuṣaś chedanaṃ tathā
c nikartanam ivātyugro lāṅgūlasya yathā hariḥ
a so 'nyad dhanuḥ samādāya krodharaktekṣaṇaḥ śvasan
c abhyavarṣac charaughais taṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahābalam
a dṛṣṭvā tu karṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ te vīrāḥ ṣaḍ ratharṣabhāḥ
c pāñcālyaputraṃ tvaritāḥ parivavrur jighāṃsayā
a ṣaṇṇāṃ yodhapravīrāṇāṃ tāvakānāṃ puraskṛtam
c mṛtyor āsyam anuprāptaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnam amaṃsmahi
a etasminn eva kāle tu dāśārho vikirañ śarān
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ parākrāntaṃ sātyakiḥ pratyapadyata
a tam āyāntaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ sātyakiṃ yuddhadurmadam
c rādheyo daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad ajihmagaiḥ
a taṃ sātyakir mahārāja vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
c paśyatāṃ sarvavīrāṇāṃ mā gās tiṣṭheti cābravīt
a sa sātyakes tu balinaḥ karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
c āsīt samāgamo ghoro balivāsavayor iva
a trāsayaṃs talaghoṣeṇa kṣatriyān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ

a tatra gacchantu bahavaḥ pravarā rathasattamāḥ

a tataḥ samabhavad yuddham ākulaṃ bharatarṣabha

c drāvayām āsa viśikhair niśāmadhye viśāṃ pate

c rathair anekasāhasrair gajaiś caiva sahasraśaḥ
e tathā hayasahasraiś ca tumulaṃ sarvato 'karot
a te mahāstrāṇi divyāni vikiranto 'rjunaṃ prati

c balavantaḥ sudurdharṣāḥ śūrā vikrāntacāriṇaḥ

a alam evāsmi karṇāya droṇāyālaṃ ca sattama

a na cātra śūrān mokṣyāmi na bhītān na kṛtāñjalīn

b evaṃ tava sutādiṣṭas tathety uktvā mahābalaḥ

c rathaś ca kīdṛśas tasya māyāḥ sarvāyudhāni ca
a kiṃpramāṇā hayās tasya rathaketur dhanus tathā
c kīdṛśaṃ varma caivāsya kaṇṭhatrāṇaṃ ca kīdṛśam
e pṛṣṭas tvam etad ācakṣva kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a lohitākṣo mahākāyas tāmrāsyo nimnitodaraḥ
c ūrdhvaromā hariśmaśruḥ śaṅkukarṇo mahāhanuḥ
a ākarṇād dāritāsyaś ca tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraḥ karālavān
c sudīrghatāmrajihvoṣṭho lambabhrūḥ sthūlanāsikaḥ
a nīlāṅgo lohitagrīvo girivarṣmā bhayaṃkaraḥ
c mahākāyo mahābāhur mahāśīrṣo mahābalaḥ
a vikacaḥ paruṣasparśo vikaṭodbaddhapiṇḍikaḥ
c sthūlasphig gūḍhanābhiś ca śithilopacayo mahān
a tathaiva hastābharaṇī mahāmāyo 'ṅgadī tathā
c urasā dhārayan niṣkam agnimālāṃ yathācalaḥ
a tasya hemamayaṃ citraṃ bahurūpāṅgaśobhitam
c toraṇapratimaṃ śubhraṃ kirīṭaṃ mūrdhny aśobhata
a kuṇḍale bālasūryābhe mālāṃ hemamayīṃ śubhām
c dhārayan vipulaṃ kāṃsyaṃ kavacaṃ ca mahāprabham
d tārājālanibhaṃ rājan pūrṇacandrasamaprabham
d kaṇṭhasūtraṃ mahac cāpi tapanīyam adhārayat
d sa tena vibhrājata vai savidyud iva toyadaḥ
a kiṅkiṇīśatanirghoṣaṃ raktadhvajapatākinam
c ṛkṣacarmāvanaddhāṅgaṃ nalvamātraṃ mahāratham
a sarvāyudhavaropetam āsthito dhvajamālinam
c aṣṭacakrasamāyuktaṃ meghagambhīranisvanam
a tatra mātaṅgasaṃkāśā lohitākṣā vibhīṣaṇāḥ
c kāmavarṇajavā yuktā balavanto 'vahan hayāḥ
d vahanto rākṣasaṃ raudraṃ balavanto jitaśramāḥ
d vipulābhiḥ saṭābhis te heṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ
d mukhair nānāvidhākārair vegavanto hayottamāḥ
d rathe 'sya yuktā garjanto 'vahaṃs te rākṣasādhipam
a rākṣaso 'sya virūpākṣaḥ sūto dīptāsyakuṇḍalaḥ
b ghorarūpo mahākāyaḥ karāḷo vikṛtānanaḥ
c raśmibhiḥ sūryaraśmyābhaiḥ saṃjagrāha hayān raṇe
e sa tena sahitas tasthāv aruṇena yathā raviḥ
a saṃsakta iva cābhreṇa yathādrir mahatā mahān
c divaspṛk sumahān ketuḥ syandane 'sya samucchritaḥ
e raktottamāṅgaḥ kravyādo gṛdhraḥ paramabhīṣaṇaḥ
a vāsavāśaninirghoṣaṃ dṛḍhajyam abhivikṣipan
c vyaktaṃ kiṣkuparīṇāhaṃ dvādaśāratni kārmukam
a rathākṣamātrair iṣubhiḥ sarvāḥ pracchādayan diśaḥ
c tasyāṃ vīrāpahāriṇyāṃ niśāyāṃ karṇam abhyayāt
a tasya vikṣipataś cāpaṃ rathe viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhataḥ
c aśrūyata dhanurghoṣo visphūrjitam ivāśaneḥ
a tena vitrāsyamānāni tava sainyāni bhārata
c samakampanta sarvāṇi sindhor iva mahormayaḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya virūpākṣaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
c utsmayann iva rādheyas tvaramāṇo 'bhyavārayat
a tataḥ karṇo 'bhyayād enam asyann asyantam antikāt
c mātaṅga iva mātaṅgaṃ yūtharṣabha ivarṣabham
a sa saṃnipātas tumulas tayor āsīd viśāṃ pate
c karṇarākṣasayo rājann indraśambarayor iva
a tau pragṛhya mahāvege dhanuṣī bhīmanisvane
c prācchādayetām anyonyaṃ takṣamāṇau maheṣubhiḥ
a tataḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭaiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
c nyavārayetām anyonyaṃ kāṃsye nirbhidya varmaṇī
a tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau
c rathaśaktibhir anyonyaṃ viśikhaiś ca tatakṣatuḥ
a saṃchindantau hi gātrāṇi saṃdadhānau ca sāyakān
c dhakṣyamāṇau śaravrātair nodīkṣitum aśaknutām
d dahantau ca śarolkābhir duṣprekṣyau ca babhūvatuḥ
a tau tu vikṣatasarvāṅgau rudhiraughapariplutau
c vyabhrājetāṃ yathā vāriprasrutau gairikācalau
a tau śarāgravibhinnāṅgau nirbhindantau parasparam
c nākampayetām anyonyaṃ yatamānau mahādyutī
a tat pravṛttaṃ niśāyuddhaṃ ciraṃ samam ivābhavat
c prāṇayor dīvyato rājan karṇarākṣasayor mṛdhe
a tasya saṃdadhatas tīkṣṇāñ śarāṃś cāsaktam asyataḥ
c dhanurghoṣeṇa vitrastāḥ sve pare ca tadābhavan
e ghaṭotkacaṃ yadā karṇo viśeṣayati no nṛpa
a tataḥ prāduṣkarod divyam astram astravidāṃ varaḥ
c karṇena vihitaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyam astraṃ ghaṭotkacaḥ

a śūlamudgaradhāriṇyā śailapādapahastayā

a tam udyatamahācāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā te vyathitā nṛpāḥ
c bhūtāntakam ivāyāntaṃ kāladaṇḍogradhāriṇam
a ghaṭotkacapramuktena siṃhanādena bhīṣitāḥ
c prasusruvur gajā mūtraṃ vivyathuś ca narā bhṛśam
a tato 'śmavṛṣṭir atyugrā mahaty āsīt samantataḥ
c ardharātre 'dhikabalair vimuktā rakṣasāṃ balaiḥ
a āyasāni ca cakrāṇi bhuśuṇḍyaḥ śaktitomarāḥ
c patanty aviralāḥ śūlāḥ śataghnyaḥ paṭṭiśās tathā
a tad ugram atiraudraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ narādhipāḥ
c putrāś ca tava yodhāś ca vyathitā vipradudruvuḥ
a tatraiko 'strabalaślāghī karṇo mānī na vivyathe
c vyadhamac ca śarair māyāṃ ghaṭotkacavinirmitām
a māyāyāṃ tu prahīṇāyām amarṣāt sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
c visasarja śarān ghorān sūtaputraṃ ta āviśan
a tatas te rudhirābhyaktā bhittvā karṇaṃ mahāhave
c viviśur dharaṇīṃ bāṇāḥ saṃkruddhā iva pannagāḥ
a sūtaputras tu saṃkruddho laghuhastaḥ pratāpavān
c ghaṭotkacam atikramya bibheda daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a ghaṭotkaco vinirbhinnaḥ sūtaputreṇa marmasu
c cakraṃ divyaṃ sahasrāram agṛhṇād vyathito bhṛśam
a kṣurāntaṃ bālasūryābhaṃ maṇiratnavibhūṣitam
c cikṣepādhiratheḥ kruddho bhaimasenir jighāṃsayā
a praviddham ativegena vikṣiptaṃ karṇasāyakaiḥ
c abhāgyasyeva saṃkalpas tan mogham apatad bhuvi
a ghaṭotkacas tu saṃkruddho dṛṣṭvā cakraṃ nipātitam
c karṇaṃ prācchādayad bāṇaiḥ svarbhānur iva bhāskaram
a sūtaputras tv asaṃbhrānto rudropendrendravikramaḥ
c ghaṭotkacarathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsa patribhiḥ
a ghaṭotkacena kruddhena gadā hemāṅgadā tadā
c kṣiptā bhrāmya śaraiḥ sāpi karṇenābhyāhatāpatat
a tato 'ntarikṣam utpatya kālamegha ivonnadan
c pravavarṣa mahākāyo drumavarṣaṃ nabhastalāt
a tato māyāvinaṃ karṇo bhīmasenasutaṃ divi
c mārgaṇair abhivivyādha ghanaṃ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
a tasya sarvān hayān hatvā saṃchidya śatadhā ratham
c abhyavarṣac charaiḥ karṇaḥ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
a na cāsyāsīd anirbhinnaṃ gātre dvyaṅgulam antaram
c so 'dṛśyata muhūrtena śvāvic chalalito yathā
a na hayān na rathaṃ tasya na dhvajaṃ na ghaṭotkacam
c dṛṣṭavantaḥ sma samare śaraughair abhisaṃvṛtam
a sa tu karṇasya tad divyam astram astreṇa śātayan

a so 'yodhayat tadā karṇaṃ māyayā lāghavena ca
c alakṣyamāṇo 'tha divi śarajāleṣu saṃpatan
a bhaimasenir mahāmāyo māyayā kurusattama
c pracakāra mahāmāyāṃ mohayann iva bhārata
a sa sma kṛtvā virūpāṇi vadanāny aśubhānanaḥ
c agrasat sūtaputrasya divyāny astrāṇi māyayā
a punaś cāpi mahākāyaḥ saṃchinnaḥ śatadhā raṇe
c gatasattvo nirutsāhaḥ patitaḥ khād vyadṛśyata
e hataṃ taṃ manyamānāḥ sma prāṇadan kurupuṃgavāḥ
a atha dehair navair anyair dikṣu sarvāsv adṛśyata
c punaś cāpi mahākāyaḥ śataśīrṣaḥ śatodaraḥ
a vyadṛśyata mahābāhur maināka iva parvataḥ
c aṅguṣṭhamātro bhūtvā ca punar eva sa rākṣasaḥ
e sāgarormir ivoddhūtas tiryag ūrdhvam avartata
a vasudhāṃ dārayitvā ca punar apsu nyamajjata
c adṛśyata tadā tatra punar unmajjito 'nyataḥ
a so 'vatīrya punas tasthau rathe hemapariṣkṛte
c kṣitiṃ dyāṃ ca diśaś caiva māyayāvṛtya daṃśitaḥ
a gatvā karṇarathābhyāśaṃ vicalat kuṇḍalānanaḥ
c prāha vākyam asaṃbhrāntaḥ sūtaputraṃ viśāṃ pate
a tiṣṭhedānīṃ na me jīvan sūtaputra gamiṣyasi
c yuddhaśraddhām ahaṃ te 'dya vineṣyāmi raṇājire
a ity uktvā roṣatāmrākṣaṃ rakṣaḥ krūraparākramam
c utpapātāntarikṣaṃ ca jahāsa ca suvisvaram
e karṇam abhyāhanac caiva gajendram iva kesarī
a rathākṣamātrair iṣubhir abhyavarṣad ghaṭotkacaḥ
c rathinām ṛṣabhaṃ karṇaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
e śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca tāṃ karṇo dūraprāptām aśātayat
a dṛṣṭvā ca vihatāṃ māyāṃ karṇena bharatarṣabha
c ghaṭotkacas tato māyāṃ sasarjāntarhitaḥ punaḥ
a so 'bhavad girir ity uccaḥ śikharais tarusaṃkaṭaiḥ
c śūlaprāsāsimusalajalaprasravaṇo mahān
a tam añjanacayaprakhyaṃ karṇo dṛṣṭvā mahīdharam
c prapātair āyudhāny ugrāṇy udvahantaṃ na cukṣubhe
a smayann iva tataḥ karṇo divyam astram udīrayat
c tataḥ so 'streṇa śailendro vikṣipto vai vyanaśyata
a tataḥ sa toyado bhūtvā nīlaḥ sendrāyudho divi
c aśmavṛṣṭibhir atyugraḥ sūtaputram avākirat
a atha saṃdhāya vāyavyam astram astravidāṃ varaḥ
c vyadhamat kālameghaṃ taṃ karṇo vaikartano vṛṣā
a sa mārgaṇagaṇaiḥ karṇo diśaḥ pracchādya sarvaśaḥ
c jaghānāstraṃ mahārāja ghaṭotkacasamīritam
a tataḥ prahasya samare bhaimasenir mahābalaḥ
c prāduścakre mahāmāyāṃ karṇaṃ prati mahāratham
a sa dṛṣṭvā punar āyāntaṃ rathena rathināṃ varam
c ghaṭotkacam asaṃbhrāntaṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtam
a siṃhaśārdūlasadṛśair mattadviradavikramaiḥ
c gajasthaiś ca rathasthaiś ca vājipṛṣṭhagatais tathā
a nānāśastradharair ghorair nānākavacabhūṣaṇaiḥ
c vṛtaṃ ghaṭotkacaṃ krūrair marudbhir iva vāsavam
e dṛṣṭvā karṇo maheṣvāso yodhayām āsa rākṣasam
a ghaṭotkacas tataḥ karṇaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
c nanāda bhairavaṃ nādaṃ bhīṣayan sarvapārthivān
a bhūyaś cāñjalikenātha samārgaṇagaṇaṃ mahat
c karṇahastasthitaṃ cāpaṃ cicchedāśu ghaṭotkacaḥ
a athānyad dhanur ādāya dṛḍhaṃ bhārasahaṃ mahat
c vyakarṣata balāt karṇa indrāyudham ivocchritam
a tataḥ karṇo mahārāja preṣayām āsa sāyakān
c suvarṇapuṅkhāñ śatrughnān khacarān rākṣasān prati
a tad bāṇair arditaṃ yūthaṃ rakṣasāṃ pīnavakṣasām
c siṃhenevārditaṃ vanyaṃ gajānām ākulaṃ kulam
d nihatya rākṣasān karṇaḥ punar haiḍimbam ardayat
d tat tu dṛṣṭvā mahat karma rādheyasya mahātmanaḥ
d krodhenābhiprajajvāla bhaimasenir ghaṭotkacaḥ
a vidhamya rākṣasān bāṇaiḥ sāśvasūtagajān vibhuḥ
c dadāha bhagavān vahnir bhūtānīva yugakṣaye
d tataḥ karṇo mahārāja rākṣasān vyadhamac charaiḥ
d sa sma kṛtvā virūpāṇi vyāttāni vadanāni ca
d rādheyasyācchinad bāṇair astrāṇi vividhāni ca
d chādayām āsa ca śarair dhārābhir iva parvatam
d gandharvanagarākāraṃ punar antaradhīyata
a sa hatvā rākṣasīṃ senāṃ śuśubhe sūtanandanaḥ
c pureva tripuraṃ dagdhvā divi devo maheśvaraḥ
a teṣu rājasahasreṣu pāṇḍaveyeṣu māriṣa
c nainaṃ nirīkṣitum api kaś cic chaknoti pārthiva
a ṛte ghaṭotkacād rājan rākṣasendrān mahābalāt
c bhīmavīryabalopetāt kruddhād vaivasvatād iva
a tasya kruddhasya netrābhyāṃ pāvakaḥ samajāyata
c maholkābhyāṃ yathā rājan sārciṣaḥ snehabindavaḥ
a talaṃ talena saṃhatya saṃdaśya daśanacchadam
c ratham āsthāya ca punar māyayā nirmitaṃ punaḥ
a yuktaṃ gajanibhair vāhaiḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ
c sa sūtam abravīt kruddhaḥ sūtaputrāya mā vaha
a sa yayau ghorarūpeṇa rathena rathināṃ varaḥ
c dvairathaṃ sūtaputreṇa punar eva viśāṃ pate
a sa cikṣepa punaḥ kruddhaḥ sūtaputrāya rākṣasaḥ
c aṣṭacakrāṃ mahāghorām aśaniṃ rudranirmitām
d dviyojanasamutsedhāṃ yojanāyām avistarām
d āyasīṃ nicitāṃ śūlaiḥ kadambam iva kesaraiḥ

c cikṣepa caināṃ tasyaiva syandanāt so 'vapupluve

c tato mumoca nārācān sūtaputraḥ paraṃtapaḥ
a aśakyaṃ kartum anyena sarvabhūteṣu mānada
c yad akārṣīt tadā karṇaḥ saṃgrāme bhīmadarśane
a sa hanyamāno nārācair dhārābhir iva parvataḥ
c gandharvanagarākāraḥ punar antaradhīyata
a evaṃ sa vai mahāmāyo māyayā lāghavena ca
c astrāṇi tāni divyāni jaghāna ripusūdanaḥ

c asaṃbhrāntas tataḥ karṇas tad rakṣaḥ pratyayudhyata
a tataḥ kruddho mahārāja bhaimasenir mahābalaḥ
c cakāra bahudhātmānaṃ bhīṣayāṇo narādhipān
a tato digbhyaḥ samāpetuḥ siṃhavyāghratarakṣavaḥ
c agnijihvāś ca bhujagā vihagāś cāpy ayomukhāḥ
a sa kīryamāṇo niśitaiḥ karṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
c nagarādrivanaprakhyas tatraivāntaradhīyata
a rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca yātudhānāḥ śalāvṛkāḥ
b śālāvṛkāś ca bahavo vṛkāś ca vikṛtānanāḥ
c te karṇaṃ bhakṣayiṣyantaḥ sarvataḥ samupādravan
e athainaṃ vāgbhir ugrābhis trāsayāṃ cakrire tadā
a udyatair bahubhir ghorair āyudhaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ
c teṣām anekair ekaikaṃ karṇo vivyādha cāśugaiḥ
a pratihatya tu tāṃ māyāṃ divyenāstreṇa rākṣasīm
c ājaghāna hayān asya śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
a te bhagnā vikṛtāṅgāś ca chinnapṛṣṭhāś ca sāyakaiḥ
c vasudhām anvapadyanta paśyatas tasya rakṣasaḥ
a sa bhagnamāyo haiḍimbaḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ tataḥ
c eṣa te vidadhe mṛtyum ity uktvāntaradhīyata
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne karṇarākṣasayor mṛdhe
c alāyudho rākṣasendro vīryavān abhyavartata
a mahatyā senayā yuktaḥ suyodhanam upāgamat

a tasya jñātir hi vikrānto brāhmaṇādo bako hataḥ
c kirmīraś ca mahātejā hiḍimbaś ca sakhā tathā

c vijñāyaitan niśāyuddhaṃ jighāṃsur bhīmam āhave

c duryodhanam idaṃ vākyam abravīd yuddhalālasaḥ
a viditaṃ te mahārāja yathā bhīmena rākṣasāḥ
c hiḍimbabakakirmīrā nihatā mama bāndhavāḥ
a parāmarśaś ca kanyāyā hiḍimbāyāḥ kṛtaḥ purā
c kim anyad rākṣasān anyān asmāṃś ca paribhūya ha
a tam ahaṃ sagaṇaṃ rājan savājirathakuñjaram
c haiḍimbaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ hantum abhyāgataḥ svayam
a adya kuntīsutān sarvān vāsudevapurogamān
c hatvā saṃbhakṣayiṣyāmi sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
e nivāraya balaṃ sarvaṃ vayaṃ yotsyāma pāṇḍavān
f tad ahaṃ sagaṇān rājan saṃyotsyāmi ca pāṇḍavān
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭo duryodhanas tadā
c pratipūjyābravīd vākyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
a tvāṃ puraskṛtya sagaṇaṃ vayaṃ yotsyāmahe parān
c na hi vairāntamanasaḥ sthāsyanti mama sainikāḥ
a evam astv iti rājānam uktvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
c abhyayāt tvarito bhīmaṃ sahitaḥ puruṣāśanaiḥ
a dīpyamānena vapuṣā rathenādityavarcasā
c tādṛśenaiva rājendra yādṛśena ghaṭotkacaḥ
a tasyāpy atulanirghoṣo bahutoraṇacitritaḥ
c ṛkṣacarmāvanaddhāṅgo nalvamātro mahārathaḥ

c so 'pi vīro mahābāhur yathaiva sa ghaṭotkacaḥ

babhūva ketur jvalanārkatulyaḥ

a dīptāṅgado dīptakirīṭamālī

śarāsanī vāraṇatulyavarṣmā

vidrāvayan pāṇḍavavāhinīṃ tām

mahābalā varmiṇaś carmiṇaś ca
c harṣānvitā yuyudhus tatra rājan

prāsāsivajrāśanimudgarāṇām
c vṛṣṭiṃ viśālāṃ jvalitāṃ patantīṃ
karṇaḥ śaraughair na śaśāka hantum
a śarāhatānāṃ patatāṃ hayānāṃ
vajrāhatānāṃ patatāṃ gajānām
c śilāhatānāṃ ca mahārathānāṃ
mahān ninādaḥ patatāṃ babhūva
c anekamāyāśataśo hatānām
a subhīmanānāvidhaśastrapātair
ghaṭotkacenābhihataṃ samantāt
c dauryodhanaṃ tad balam ārtarūpam
āvartamānaṃ dadṛśe bhramantam
a hāhākṛtaṃ saṃparivartamānaṃ
saṃlīyamānaṃ ca viṣaṇṇarūpam
c te tv āryabhāvāt puruṣapravīrāḥ
parāṅmukhā na babhūvus tadānīm
a tāṃ rākṣasīṃ ghoratarāṃ subhīmāṃ
vṛṣṭiṃ mahāśastramayīṃ patantīm
c dṛṣṭvā balaughāṃś ca nipātyamānān
mahad bhayaṃ tava putrān viveśa
a śivāś ca vaiśvānaradīptajihvāḥ
subhīmanādāḥ śataśo nadantyaḥ
c rakṣogaṇān nardataś cābhivīkṣya
narendrayodhā vyathitā babhūvuḥ
a te dīptajihvānanatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrā
vibhīṣaṇāḥ śailanikāśakāyāḥ
c nabhogatāḥ śaktiviṣaktahastā
meghā vyamuñcann iva vṛṣṭimārgam
a tair āhatās te śaraśaktiśūlair
gadābhir ugraiḥ parighaiś ca dīptaiḥ
c vajraiḥ pinākair aśaniprahāraiś
cakraiḥ śataghnyunmathitāś ca petuḥ
a huḍā bhuśuṇḍyo 'śmaguḍāḥ śataghnyaḥ
sthūṇāś ca kārṣṇāyasapaṭṭanaddhāḥ
c avākiraṃs tava putrasya sainyaṃ
tathā raudraṃ kaśmalaṃ prādurāsīt
a niṣkīrṇāntrā vihatair uttamāṅgaiḥ
saṃbhagnāṅgāḥ śerate tatra śūrāḥ
c bhinnā hayāḥ kuñjarāś cāvabhagnāḥ
saṃcūrṇitāś caiva rathāḥ śilābhiḥ
a evaṃ mahac chastravarṣaṃ sṛjantas
te yātudhānā bhuvi ghorarūpāḥ
c māyāḥ sṛṣṭās tatra ghaṭotkacena
nāmuñcan vai yācamānaṃ na bhītam
a tasmin ghore kuruvīrāvamarde
kālotsṛṣṭe kṣatriyāṇām abhāve
c te vai bhagnāḥ sahasā vyadravanta
prākrośantaḥ kauravāḥ sarva eva
a palāyadhvaṃ kuravo naitad asti
sendrā devā ghnanti naḥ pāṇḍavārthe
c tathā teṣāṃ majjatāṃ bhāratānāṃ
na sma dvīpas tatra kaś cid babhūva
a tasmin saṃkrande tumule vartamāne
sainye bhagne līyamāne kurūṇām
c anīkānāṃ pravibhāge 'prakāśe
na jñāyante kuravo netare vā
a nirmaryāde vidrave ghorarūpe
sarvā diśaḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ sma śūnyāḥ
c tāṃ śastravṛṣṭim urasā gāhamānaṃ
karṇaṃ caikaṃ tatra rājann apaśyam
a tato bāṇair āvṛṇod antarikṣaṃ
divyāṃ māyāṃ yodhayan rākṣasasya
c hrīmān kurvan duṣkaram āryakarma
naivāmuhyat saṃyuge sūtaputraḥ
a tato bhītāḥ samudaikṣanta karṇaṃ
rājan sarve saindhavā bāhlikāś ca
c asaṃmohaṃ pūjayanto 'sya saṃkhye
saṃpaśyanto vijayaṃ rākṣasasya
a tenotsṛṣṭā cakrayuktā śataghnī
samaṃ sarvāṃś caturo 'śvāñ jaghāna
c te jānubhir jagatīm anvapadyan
gatāsavo nirdaśanākṣijihvāḥ
a tato hatāśvād avaruhya vāhād
antarmanāḥ kuruṣu prādravatsu
c divye cāstre māyayā vadhyamāne
naivāmuhyac cintayan prāptakālam
a tato 'bruvan kuravaḥ sarva eva
karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorarūpāṃ ca māyām
c śaktyā rakṣo jahi karṇādya tūrṇaṃ
naśyanty ete kuravo dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
a kariṣyataḥ kiṃ ca no bhīmapārthau
tapantam enaṃ jahi rakṣo niśīthe
c yo naḥ saṃgrāmād ghorarūpād vimucyet
sa naḥ pārthān samare yodhayeta
a tasmād enaṃ rākṣasaṃ ghorarūpaṃ
jahi śaktyā dattayā vāsavena
c mā kauravāḥ sarva evendrakalpā
rātrīmukhe karṇa neśuḥ sayodhāḥ
a sa vadhyamāno rakṣasā vai niśīthe
dṛṣṭvā rājan naśyamānaṃ balaṃ ca
c mahac ca śrutvā ninadaṃ kauravāṇāṃ
matiṃ dadhre śaktimokṣāya karṇaḥ
d sa tāḍyamāno niśi rākṣasena
d rājan dṛṣṭvā vidrutaṃ te balaṃ ca
d śrutvā mahāntaṃ ninadaṃ kurūṇāṃ
d mano dadhre śaktimokṣe mahātmā
a sa vai kruddhaḥ siṃha ivātyamarṣī
nāmarṣayat pratighātaṃ raṇe tam
c śaktiṃ śreṣṭhāṃ vaijayantīm asahyāṃ
samādade tasya vadhaṃ cikīrṣan
a yāsau rājan nihitā varṣapūgān
vadhāyājau satkṛtā phalgunasya
c yāṃ vai prādāt sūtaputrāya śakraḥ
śaktiṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ nimāya
d śaktiṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ gṛhītāṃ
d puraṃdarād varmaṇādāya rājan
a tāṃ vai śaktiṃ lelihānāṃ pradīptāṃ
pāśair yuktām antakasyeva rātrim
c mṛtyoḥ svasāraṃ jvalitām ivolkāṃ
vaikartanaḥ prāhiṇod rākṣasāya
a tām uttamāṃ parakāyāpahantrīṃ
dṛṣṭvā sauter bāhusaṃsthāṃ jvalantīm
c bhītaṃ rakṣo vipradudrāva rājan
kṛtvātmānaṃ vindhyapādapramāṇam
a dṛṣṭvā śaktiṃ karṇabāhvantarasthāṃ
nedur bhūtāny antarikṣe narendra
c vavur vātās tumulāś cāpi rājan
sanirghātā cāśānir gāṃ jagāma
a sā tāṃ māyāṃ bhasma kṛtvā jvalantī
bhittvā gāḍhaṃ hṛdayaṃ rākṣasasya
c ūrdhvaṃ yayau dīpyamānā niśāyāṃ
nakṣatrāṇām antarāṇy āviśantī
a yuddhvā citrair vividhaiḥ śastrapūgair
divyair vīro mānuṣai rākṣasaiś ca
c nadan nādān vividhān bhairavāṃś ca
prāṇān iṣṭāṃs tyājitaḥ śakraśaktyā
a idaṃ cānyac citram āścaryarūpaṃ
cakārāsau karma śatrukṣayāya
c tasmin kāle śaktinirbhinnamarmā
babhau rājan meghaśailaprakāśaḥ
a tato 'ntarikṣād apatad gatāsuḥ
sa rākṣasendro bhuvi bhinnadehaḥ
c avākśirāḥ stabdhagātro vijihvo
ghaṭotkaco mahad āsthāya rūpam
a sa tad rūpaṃ bhairavaṃ bhīmakarmā
bhīmaṃ kṛtvā bhaimaseniḥ papāta
c hato 'py evaṃ tava sainyekadeśam
apothayat kauravān bhīṣayāṇaḥ
d patad rakṣaḥ svena kāyena tūrṇam
d atipramāṇena vivardhatā ca
d priyaṃ kurvan pāṇḍavānāṃ gatāsur
d akṣauhiṇīṃ tava tūrṇaṃ jaghāna
a tato miśrāḥ prāṇadan siṃhanādair
bheryaḥ śaṅkhā murajāś cānakāś ca
c dagdhāṃ māyāṃ nihataṃ rākṣasaṃ ca
dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ prāṇadan kauraveyāḥ
a tataḥ karṇaḥ kurubhiḥ pūjyamāno
yathā śakro vṛtravadhe marudbhiḥ
c anvārūḍhas tava putraṃ rathasthaṃ
hṛṣṭaś cāpi prāviśat svaṃ sa sainyam
 dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ
 tasmin hate mahāmāye mahātejasi rākṣase
 amarṣitāḥ pāṇḍaveyāḥ kim akurvan mahāraṇe
 marditāś ca bhṛśaṃ yuddhe kim akurvata saṃjaya
 ye ca te 'bhyadravan droṇaṃ vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
 sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālais te 'kurvan kiṃ mahāraṇe
 saumadatter vadhād droṇam āyattaṃ saindhavasya ca
 amarṣāj jīvitaṃ tyaktvā gāhamānaṃ varūthinīm
 jṛmbhamāṇam iva vyāghraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam
 kathaṃ pratyudyayur droṇam ajayyaṃ kurusṛñjayāḥ
 ācāryaṃ ye ca rakṣanti duryodhanapurogamāḥ
 drauṇikarṇakṛpās tāta te hy akurvan kim āhave
 bhāradvājaṃ jighāsantau savyasācivṛkodarau
 ārchatāṃ māmakān yuddhe kathaṃ saṃjaya śaṃsa me
 sindhurājavadheneme ghaṭotkacavadhena te
 amarṣitāś ca saṃkruddhā raṇaṃ cakruḥ kathaṃ yudhi
 saṃjaya uvāca
a haiḍimbaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vikīrṇam iva parvatam
c pāṇḍavā dīnamanasaḥ sarve bāṣpākulekṣaṇāḥ
a vāsudevas tu harṣeṇa mahatābhipariplutaḥ
c nanāda siṃhavan nādaṃ vyathayann iva bhārata
d hataṃ ghaṭotkacaṃ jñātvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
e vinadya ca mahānādaṃ paryaṣvajata phalgunam
a sa vinadya mahānādam abhīśūn saṃniyamya ca
c nanarta harṣasaṃvīto vātoddhūta iva drumaḥ
a tato vinirbhrāmya punaḥ pārtham āsphoṭya cāsakṛt
c rathopasthagato bhīmaṃ prāṇadat punar acyutaḥ
a prahṛṣṭamanasaṃ jñātvā vāsudevaṃ mahābalam
c abravīd arjuno rājan nātihṛṣṭamanā iva
c praharṣaṃ tasya taṃ jñātvā keśavasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
c arjuno 'py abravīd rājan
a atiharṣo 'yam asthāne tavādya madhusūdana
c śokasthāne pare prāpte haiḍimbasya vadhena vai
a vimukhāni ca sainyāni hataṃ dṛṣṭvā ghaṭotkacam
c vayaṃ ca bhṛśam āvignā haiḍimbasya nipātanāt
a naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati janārdana
c tad adya śaṃsa me pṛṣṭaḥ satyaṃ satyavatāṃ vara
a yady etan na rahasyaṃ te vaktum arhasy ariṃdama
b vyasanasya sati sthāne na prahṛṣyanti mānavāḥ
b harṣasya saty api sthāne nolbaṇaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ
c dhairyasya vaikṛtaṃ brūhi tvam adya madhusūdana
a samudrasyeva saṃkṣobho meror iva visarpaṇam
c tathaital lāghavaṃ manye tava karma janārdana
 vāsudeva uvāca
a atiharṣam imaṃ prāptaṃ śṛṇu me tvaṃ dhanaṃjaya
c atīva manasaḥ sadyaḥ prasādakaram uttamam
a śaktiṃ ghaṭotkacenemāṃ vyaṃsayitvā mahādyute
c karṇaṃ nihatam evājau viddhi sadyo dhanaṃjaya
a śaktihastaṃ punaḥ karṇaṃ ko loke 'sti pumān iha
c ya enam abhitas tiṣṭhet kārttikeyam ivāhave
a diṣṭyāpanītakavaco diṣṭyāpahṛtakuṇḍalaḥ
c diṣṭyā ca vyaṃsitā śaktir amoghāsya ghaṭotkace
a yadi hi syāt sakavacas tathaiva ca sakuṇḍalaḥ
c sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn ekaḥ karṇo jayed balī
a vāsavo vā kubero vā varuṇo vā jaleśvaraḥ
c yamo vā notsahet karṇaṃ raṇe pratisamāsitum
a gāṇḍīvam āyamya bhavāṃś cakraṃ vāhaṃ sudarśanam
c na śaktau svo raṇe jetuṃ tathāyuktaṃ nararṣabham
a tvaddhitārthaṃ tu śakreṇa māyayā hṛtakuṇḍalaḥ
c vihīnakavacaś cāyaṃ kṛtaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
a utkṛtya kavacaṃ yasmāt kuṇḍale vimale ca te
c prādāc chakrāya karṇo vai tena vaikartanaḥ smṛtaḥ
a āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ stambhito mantratejasā
c tathādya bhāti karṇo me śāntajvāla ivānalaḥ
a yadā prabhṛti karṇāya śaktir dattā mahātmanā
c vāsavena mahābāho prāptā yāsau ghaṭotkace
a kuṇḍalābhyāṃ nimāyātha divyena kavacena ca
c tāṃ prāpyāmanyata vṛṣā satataṃ tvāṃ hataṃ raṇe
a evaṃ gate 'pi śakyo 'yaṃ hantuṃ nānyena kena cit
c ṛte tvā puruṣavyāghra śape satyena cānagha
a brahmaṇyaḥ satyavādī ca tapasvī niyatavrataḥ
c ripuṣv api dayāvāṃś ca tasmāt karṇo vṛṣā smṛtaḥ
a yuddhaśauṇḍo mahābāhur nityodyataśarāsanaḥ
c kesarīva vane mardan mattamātaṅgayūthapān
e vimadān rathaśārdūlān kurute raṇamūrdhani
a madhyaṃgata ivādityo yo na śakyo nirīkṣitum
c tvadīyaiḥ puruṣavyāghra yodhamukhyair mahātmabhiḥ
e śarajālasahasrāṃśuḥ śaradīva divākaraḥ
a tapānte toyado yadvac charadhārāḥ kṣaraty asau
c divyāstrajaladaḥ karṇaḥ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
d tridaśair api cāsyadbhiḥ śaravarṣaṃ samantataḥ
d aśakyas tad ayaṃ jetuṃ sravadbhir māṃsaśoṇitam
d kavacena vihīnaś ca kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca pāṇḍava
d tenādityaṃ nirudhyed yaḥ śaravarṣaiś ca vṛṣṭimān
d tapoyukto 'bhavat pūrvaṃ divyarūpaḥ pratāpavān
e so 'dya mānuṣatāṃ prāpto vimuktaḥ śakradattayā
a eko hi yogo 'sya bhaved vadhāya
chidre hy enaṃ svapramattaḥ pramattam
c kṛcchraprāptaṃ rathacakre nimagne
hanyāḥ pūrvaṃ tvaṃ tu saṃjñāṃ vicārya
d na hy udyatāstraṃ yudhi hanyād ajayyam
d apy ekavīro balabhit savajraḥ
a jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo mahātmā
mahābalaś caikalavyo niṣādaḥ
c ekaikaśo nihatāḥ sarva eva
yogais tais tais tvaddhitārthaṃ mayaiva
a athāpare nihatā rākṣasendrā
hiḍimbakirmīrabakapradhānāḥ
c alāyudhaḥ parasainyāvamardī
ghaṭotkacaś cograkarmā tarasvī
 arjuna uvāca
a katham asmaddhitārthaṃ te kaiś ca yogair janārdana
c jarāsaṃdhaprabhṛtayo ghātitāḥ pṛthivīṣvarāḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo naiṣādiś ca mahābalaḥ
c yadi syur na hatāḥ pūrvam idānīṃ syur bhayaṃkarāḥ
a suyodhanas tān avaśyaṃ vṛṇuyād rathasattamān
c te 'smābhir nityasaṃduṣṭāḥ saṃśrayeyuś ca kauravān
a te hi vīrā mahātmānaḥ kṛtāstrā dṛḍhayodhinaḥ
c dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ camūṃ kṛtsnāṃ rakṣeyur amarā iva
a sūtaputro jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo niṣādajaḥ
c suyodhanaṃ samāśritya taperan pṛthivīm imām
a yogair api hatā yais te tān me śṛṇu dhanaṃjaya
c ajayyā hi vinā yogair mṛdhe te daivatair api
a ekaiko hi pṛthak teṣāṃ samastāṃ suravāhinīm
c yodhayet samare pārtha lokapālābhirakṣitām
a jarāsaṃdho hi ruṣito rauhiṇeyapradharṣitaḥ
c asmadvadhārthaṃ cikṣepa gadāṃ vai lohitāmukhīm
a sīmantam iva kurvāṇāṃ nabhasaḥ pāvakaprabhām
c vyadṛśyatāpatantī sā śakramuktā yathāśaniḥ
a tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva gadāṃ rohiṇinandanaḥ
c pratighātārtham astraṃ vai sthūṇākarṇam avāsṛjat
a astravegapratihatā sā gadā prāpatad bhuvi
c dārayantī dharāṃ devīṃ kampayantīva parvatān
a tatra sma rākṣasī ghorā jarā nāmāśuvikramā
c saṃdhayām āsa taṃ jātaṃ jarāsaṃdham ariṃdamam
a dvābhyāṃ jāto hi mātṛbhyām ardhadehaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
c tayā sa saṃdhito yasmāj jarāsaṃdhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a sā tu bhūmigatā pārtha hatā sasutabāndhavā
c gadayā tena cāstreṇa sthūṇākarṇena rākṣasī
a vinābhūtaḥ sa gadayā jarāsaṃdho mahāmṛdhe
c nihato bhīmasenena paśyatas te dhanaṃjaya
a yadi hi syād gadāpāṇir jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān
c sendrā devā na taṃ hantuṃ raṇe śaktā narottama
a tvaddhitārthaṃ hi naiṣādir aṅguṣṭhena viyojitaḥ
c droṇenācāryakaṃ kṛtvā chadmanā satyavikramaḥ
a sa tu baddhāṅgulitrāṇo naiṣādir dṛḍhavikramaḥ
c asyann eko vanacaro babhau rāma ivāparaḥ
a ekalavyaṃ hi sāṅguṣṭham aśaktā devadānavāḥ
c sarākṣasoragāḥ pārtha vijetuṃ yudhi karhi cit
a kim u mānuṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ syāt prativīkṣitum
c dṛḍhamuṣṭiḥ kṛtī nityam asyamāno divāniśam
a tvaddhitārthaṃ tu sa mayā hataḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani
c cedirājaś ca vikrāntaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nihatas tava
a sa cāpy aśakyaḥ saṃgrāme jetuṃ sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
b yamendrasiddhagandharvān vasurudrān marudgaṇān
b sa hi jātaś caturbāhur dhṛtajāmbūnadasrajaḥ
b ajeyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jayed api divaukasaḥ
c vadhārthaṃ tasya jāto 'ham anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām
a tvatsahāyo naravyāghra lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
c hiḍimbabakakirmīrā bhīmasenena pātitāḥ
e rāvaṇena samaprāṇā brahmayajñavināśanāḥ
a hatas tathaiva māyāvī haiḍimbenāpy alāyudhaḥ
c haiḍimbaś cāpy upāyena śaktyā karṇena ghātitaḥ
a yadi hy enaṃ nāhaniṣyat karṇaḥ śaktyā mahāmṛdhe
c mayā vadhyo 'bhaviṣyat sa bhaimasenir ghaṭotkacaḥ
a mayā na nihataḥ pūrvam eṣa yuṣmatpriyepsayā
c eṣa hi brāhmaṇadveṣī yajñadveṣī ca rākṣasaḥ
a dharmasya loptā pāpātmā tasmād eṣa nipātitaḥ
c vyaṃsitā cāpy upāyena śakradattā mayānagha
a ye hi dharmasya loptāro vadhyās te mama pāṇḍava
c dharmasaṃsthāpanārthaṃ hi pratijñaiṣā mamāvyayā
a brahma satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ dharmo hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
c yatra tatra rame nityam ahaṃ satyena te śape
a na viṣādas tvayā kāryaḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ prati
c upadekṣyāmy upāyaṃ te yena taṃ prasahiṣyasi
a suyodhanaṃ cāpi raṇe haniṣyati vṛkodaraḥ
c tasya cāpi vadhopāyaṃ vakṣyāmi tava pāṇḍava
a vardhate tumulas tv eṣa śabdaḥ paracamūṃ prati
c vidravanti ca sainyāni tvadīyāni diśo daśa
a labdhalakṣyā hi kauravyā vidhamanti camūṃ tava

 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca

a iti sātyakaye prāha tadā devakinandanaḥ
