c pratijagrāha samare droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a tato duryodhano rājā sarvodyogena pāṇḍavān
c abhyadravat susaṃkruddha icchan droṇasya jīvitam
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ śrāntavāhanasainikam
c pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca garjatām itaretaram
a nidrāndhās te mahārāja pariśrāntāś ca saṃyuge
c nābhyapadyanta samare kāṃ cic ceṣṭāṃ mahārathāḥ
a triyāmā rajanī caiṣā ghorarūpā bhayānakā
c sahasrayāmapratimā babhūva prāṇahāriṇī
e vadhyatāṃ ca tathā teṣāṃ kṣatānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
a aho rātriḥ samājajñe nidrāndhānāṃ viśeṣataḥ
c sarve hy āsan nirutsāhāḥ kṣatriyā dīnacetasaḥ
e tava caiva pareṣāṃ ca gatāstrā vigateṣavaḥ
a te tathā pārayantaś ca hrīmantaś ca viśeṣataḥ
c svadharmam anupaśyanto na jahuḥ svām anīkinīm
a śastrāṇy anye samutsṛjya nidrāndhāḥ śerate janāḥ
c gajeṣv anye ratheṣv anye hayeṣv anye ca bhārata
a nidrāndhā no bubudhire kāṃ cic ceṣṭāṃ narādhipāḥ
c te 'nyonyaṃ samare yodhāḥ preṣayanta yamakṣayam
a svapnāyamānās tv apare parān iti vicetasaḥ
c ātmānaṃ samare jaghnuḥ svān eva ca parān api
a nānāvāco vimuñcanto nidrāndhās te mahāraṇe
b asmākaṃ ca mahārāja parebhyo bahavo janāḥ
c yoddhavyam iti tiṣṭhanto nidrāsaṃsaktalocanāḥ
a saṃmardyānye raṇe ke cin nidrāndhāś ca parasparam
c jaghnuḥ śūrā raṇe rājaṃs tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
a hanyamānaṃ tathātmānaṃ parebhyo bahavo janāḥ
c nābhyajānanta samare nidrayā mohitā bhṛśam
a teṣām etādṛśīṃ ceṣṭāṃ vijñāya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
c uvāca vākyaṃ bībhatsur uccaiḥ saṃnādayan diśaḥ
a śrāntā bhavanto nidrāndhāḥ sarva eva savāhanāḥ
c tamasā cāvṛte sainye rajasā bahulena ca
a te yūyaṃ yadi manyadhvam upāramata sainikāḥ
c nimīlayata cātraiva raṇabhūmau muhūrtakam
a tato vinidrā viśrāntāś candramasy udite punaḥ
c saṃsādhayiṣyathānyonyaṃ svargāya kurupāṇḍavāḥ

c arocayanta sainyāni tathā cānyonyam abruvan
a cukruśuḥ karṇa karṇeti rājan duryodhaneti ca
c upāramata pāṇḍūnāṃ viratā hi varūthinī
a tathā vikrośamānasya phalgunasya tatas tataḥ
c upāramata pāṇḍūnāṃ senā tava ca bhārata
a tām asya vācaṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca mahātmanaḥ
c sarvasainyāni cākṣudrāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ pratyapūjayan
a tat saṃpūjya vaco 'krūraṃ sarvasainyāni bhārata
c muhūrtam asvapan rājañ śrāntāni bharatarṣabha

c manasaś ca priyān arthān vīra kṣipram avāpnuhi

c gajaskandhagatāś cānye śerate cāpare kṣitau
a sāyudhāḥ sagadāś caiva sakhaḍgāḥ saparaśvadhāḥ
c saprāsakavacāś cānye narāḥ suptāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
a gajās te pannagābhogair hastair bhūreṇurūṣitaiḥ

a samāṃ ca viṣamāṃ cakruḥ khurāgrair vikṣatāṃ mahīm
c hayāḥ kāñcanayoktrāś ca kesarālambibhir yugaiḥ
e suṣupus tatra rājendra yuktā vāheṣu sarvaśaḥ
f evaṃ hayāś ca nāgāś ca yodhāś ca bharatarṣabha

a te kṣatriyāḥ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ
parasparaṃ sāyakavikṣatāṅgāḥ
c kumbheṣu līnāḥ suṣupur gajānāṃ
kuceṣu lagnā iva kāminīnām
d vīrā vāraṇakumbheṣu suṣupur yuddhakarśitāḥ
d rātrau ratipariśrāntāḥ kāminīnāṃ kuceṣv iva
a tataḥ kumudanāthena kāminīgaṇḍapāṇḍunā
c netrānandena candreṇa māhendrī dig alaṃkṛtā
d daśaśatākṣakakubdariniḥsṛtaḥ

d timiravāraṇayūthavidāraṇaḥ
d samudiyād udayācalakesarī
d haravṛṣottamagātrasamadyutiḥ

d navavadhūsmitacārumanoharaḥ
d pravisṛtaḥ kumudākarabāndhavaḥ
d pramadayan vasudhāṃ hi sudhākaraḥ
a tato muhūrtād bhagavān purastāc chaśalakṣaṇaḥ
c aruṇaṃ darśayām āsa grasañ jyotiḥprabhaṃ prabhuḥ
a aruṇasya tu tasyānu jātarūpasamaprabham
c raśmijālaṃ mahac candro mandaṃ mandam avāsṛjat
a utsārayantaḥ prabhayā tamas te candraraśmayaḥ
c paryagacchañ śanaiḥ sarvā diśaḥ khaṃ ca kṣitiṃ tathā
a tato muhūrtād bhuvanaṃ jyotirbhūtam ivābhavat
c aprakhyam aprakāśaṃ ca jagāmāśu tamas tathā
a pratiprakāśite loke divābhūte niśākare
c vicerur na viceruś ca rājan naktaṃcarās tataḥ
a bodhyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ rājaṃś candrasya raśmibhiḥ
c bubudhe śatapatrāṇāṃ vanaṃ mahad ivāmbhasi
a yathā candrodayoddhūtaḥ kṣubhitaḥ sāgaro bhavet
c tathā candrodayoddhūtaḥ sa babhūva balārṇavaḥ
a tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ punar eva viśāṃ pate
c loke lokavināśāya paraṃ lokam abhīpsatām
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato duryodhano droṇam abhigamyedam abravīt
c amarṣavaśam āpanno janayan harṣatejasī
a na marṣaṇīyāḥ saṃgrāme viśramantaḥ śramānvitāḥ
c sapatnā glānamanaso labdhalakṣyā viśeṣataḥ
a tat tu marṣitam asmābhir bhavataḥ priyakāmyayā
c ta ete pariviśrāntāḥ pāṇḍavā balavattarāḥ
a sarvathā parihīnāḥ sma tejasā ca balena ca
c bhavatā pālyamānās te vivardhante punaḥ punaḥ
a divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi brahmāstrādīni yāny api
c tāni sarvāṇi tiṣṭhanti bhavaty eva viśeṣataḥ
a na pāṇḍaveyā na vayaṃ nānye loke dhanurdharāḥ
c yudhyamānasya te tulyāḥ satyam etad bravīmi te
a sasurāsuragandharvān imāṃl lokān dvijottama
c sarvāstravid bhavān hanyād divyair astrair na saṃśayaḥ
a sa bhavān marṣayaty enāṃs tvatto bhītān viśeṣataḥ
c śiṣyatvaṃ vā puraskṛtya mama vā mandabhāgyatām
a evam uddharṣito droṇaḥ kopitaś cātmajena te
c samanyur abravīd rājan duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ
a sthaviraḥ san paraṃ śaktyā ghaṭe duryodhanāhave
c ataḥ paraṃ mayā kāryaṃ kṣudraṃ vijayagṛddhinā
e anastravid ayaṃ sarvo hantavyo 'stravidā janaḥ
a yad bhavān manyate cāpi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
c tad vai kartāsmi kauravya vacanāt tava nānyathā
a nihatya sarvapāñcālān yuddhe kṛtvā parākramam
c vimokṣye kavacaṃ rājan satyenāyudham ālabhe
a manyase yac ca kaunteyam arjunaṃ śrāntam āhave
c tasya vīryaṃ mahābāho śṛṇu satyena kaurava
a taṃ na devā na gandharvā na yakṣā na ca rākṣasāḥ
c utsahante raṇe soḍhuṃ kupitaṃ savyasācinam
a khāṇḍave yena bhagavān pratyudyātaḥ sureśvaraḥ
c sāyakair vāritaś cāpi varṣamāṇo mahātmanā
a yakṣā nāgās tathā daityā ye cānye balagarvitāḥ
c nihatāḥ puruṣendreṇa tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
a gandharvā ghoṣayātrāyāṃ citrasenādayo jitāḥ
c yūyaṃ tair hriyamāṇāś ca mokṣitā dṛḍhadhanvanā
a nivātakavacāś cāpi devānāṃ śatravas tathā
c surair avadhyāḥ saṃgrāme tena vīreṇa nirjitāḥ
a dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi hiraṇyapuravāsinām
c vijigye puruṣavyāghraḥ sa śakyo mānuṣaiḥ katham
a pratyakṣaṃ caiva te sarvaṃ yathā balam idaṃ tava
c kṣapitaṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa ceṣṭatāṃ no viśāṃ pate
a taṃ tathābhipraśaṃsantam arjunaṃ kupitas tadā
c droṇaṃ tava suto rājan punar evedam abravīt
a ahaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ karṇaḥ śakunir mātulaś ca me
c haniṣyāmo 'rjunaṃ saṃkhye dvaidhīkṛtyādya bhāratīm
d tiṣṭha sa tvaṃ mahābāho nityaṃ śiṣyaḥ priyas tava
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhāradvājo hasann iva
c anvavartata rājānaṃ svasti te 'stv iti cābravīt
a ko hi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
c akṣayaṃ kṣapayet kaś cit kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyarṣabham
a taṃ na vittapatir nendro na yamo na jaleśvaraḥ
c nāsuroragarakṣāṃsi kṣapayeyuḥ sahāyudham
a mūḍhās tv etāni bhāṣante yānīmāny āttha bhārata
c yuddhe hy arjunam āsādya svastimān ko vrajed gṛhān
a tvaṃ tu sarvātiśaṅkitvān niṣṭhuraḥ pāpaniścayaḥ
c śreyasas tvaddhite yuktāṃs tat tad vaktum ihecchasi
a gaccha tvam api kaunteyam ātmārthebhyo hi māciram
c tvam apy āśaṃsase yoddhuṃ kulajaḥ kṣatriyo hy asi
a imān kiṃ pārthivān sarvān ghātayiṣyasy anāgasaḥ
c tvam asya mūlaṃ vairasya tasmād āsādayārjunam
a eṣa te mātulaḥ prājñaḥ kṣatradharmam anuvrataḥ
c dūrdyūtadevī gāndhāriḥ prayātv arjunam āhave
a eṣo 'kṣakuśalo jihmo dyūtakṛt kitavaḥ śaṭhaḥ
c devitā nikṛtiprajño yudhi jeṣyati pāṇḍavān
a tvayā kathitam atyantaṃ karṇena saha hṛṣṭavat
c asakṛc chūnyavan mohād dhṛtarāṣṭrasya śṛṇvataḥ
a ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca me
c pāṇḍuputrān haniṣyāmaḥ sahitāḥ samare trayaḥ
a iti te katthamānasya śrutaṃ saṃsadi saṃsadi
c anutiṣṭha pratijñāṃ tāṃ satyavāg bhava taiḥ saha
a eṣa te pāṇḍavaḥ śatrur aviṣahyo 'grataḥ sthitaḥ
c kṣatradharmam avekṣasva ślāghyas tava vadho jayāt
a dattaṃ bhuktam adhītaṃ ca prāptam aiśvaryam īpsitam
c kṛtakṛtyo 'nṛṇaś cāsi mā bhair yudhyasva pāṇḍavam
a ity uktvā samare droṇo nyavartata yataḥ pare
c dvaidhīkṛtya tataḥ senāṃ yuddhaṃ samabhavat tadā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tribhāgamātraśeṣāyāṃ rātryāṃ yuddham avartata
c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca saṃhṛṣṭānāṃ viśāṃ pate
a atha candraprabhāṃ muṣṇann ādityasya puraḥsaraḥ
c aruṇo 'bhyudayāṃ cakre tāmrīkurvann ivāmbaram
d prakāśam akarod vyoma jagat saṃrañjayann iva
d prācyāṃ diśi sahasrāṃśor aruṇenāruṇīkṛtam
d tāpanīyaṃ yathā cakraṃ bhrājate ravimaṇḍalam
d tato rathāśvāṃś ca manuṣyayānāny
d utsṛjya sarve kurupāṇḍuyodhāḥ
d divākarasyābhimukhaṃ japantaḥ
d saṃdhyāgatāḥ prāñjalayo babhūvuḥ
a tato dvaidhīkṛte sainye droṇaḥ somakapāṇḍavān
c abhyadravat sapāñcālān duryodhanapurogamaḥ
a dvaidhībhūtān kurūn dṛṣṭvā mādhavo 'rjunam abravīt
c sapatnān savyataḥ kurmi savyasācinn imān kurūn
a sa mādhavam anujñāya kuruṣveti dhanaṃjayaḥ
c droṇakarṇau maheṣvāsau savyataḥ paryavartata
a abhiprāyaṃ tu kṛṣṇasya jñātvā parapuraṃjayaḥ
c ājiśīrṣagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenaṃ samāsadat
 bhīma uvāca
a arjunārjuna bībhatso śṛṇu me tattvato vacaḥ
c yadarthaṃ kṣatriyā sūte tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
a asmiṃś ced āgate kāle śreyo na pratipatsyase

 saṃjaya uvāca

c karṇadroṇāv atikramya samantāt paryavārayat
a tam ājiśīrṣam āyāntaṃ dahantaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhān

e nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ vardhamānam ivānalam
a atha duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
c abhyavarṣañ śaravrātaiḥ kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayam

b śabdamātreṇa jānīmo vayaṃ te ca parasparam

c keṣeśu samasajjanta kavaceṣu bhujeṣu ca
a hatāśvā hatasūtāś ca niśceṣṭā rathinas tadā

a hatān gajān samāśliṣya parvatān iva vājinaḥ
c gatasattvā vyadṛśyanta tathaiva saha sādibhiḥ
a tatas tv abhyavasṛtyaiva saṃgrāmād uttarāṃ diśam

a bhrājamānaṃ śriyā yuktaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
c droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvārayas tresuś celur mamluś ca māriṣa
a āhvayantaṃ parānīkaṃ prabhinnam iva vāraṇam
c nainaṃ śaśaṃsire jetuṃ dānavā vāsavaṃ yathā
a ke cid āsan nirutsāhāḥ ke cit kruddhā manasvinaḥ
c vismitāś cābhavan ke cit ke cid āsann amarṣitāḥ
a hastair hastāgram apare pratyapiṃṣan narādhipāḥ
b vidhūyānye karān kruddhāḥ kareṣv eva nyapīḍayan
c apare daśanair oṣṭhān adaśan krodhamūrchitāḥ
a vyākṣipann āyudhān anye mamṛduś cāpare bhujān
c anye cānvapatan droṇaṃ tyaktātmāno mahaujasaḥ
a pāñcālās tu viśeṣeṇa droṇasāyakapīḍitāḥ
c samasajjanta rājendra samare bhṛśavedanāḥ
d dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ mahārāja samakampatanta pāṇḍavāḥ
d tato yodhā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātman
d dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ dīpyamānaṃ śaraughaiḥ
d tataḥ sarve sṛñjayāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca
d jighāsanto droṇam evābhijagmuḥ
a tato virāṭadrupadau droṇaṃ pratiyayū raṇe
c tathā carantaṃ saṃgrāme bhṛśaṃ samaradurjayam
a drupadasya tataḥ pautrās traya eva viśāṃ pate
c cedayaś ca maheṣvāsā droṇam evābhyayur yudhi
a teṣāṃ drupadapautrāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c tribhir droṇo 'harat prāṇāṃs te hatā nyapatan bhuvi
a tato droṇo 'jayad yuddhe cedikekayasṛñjayān
c matsyāṃś caivājayat sarvān bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ
a tatas tu drupadaḥ krodhāc charavarṣam avākirat
c droṇaṃ prati mahārāja virāṭaś caiva saṃyuge
d taṃ nihatyeṣuvarṣaṃ tu droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
d tau śaraiś chādayām āsa virāṭadrupadāv ubhau
d droṇena chādyamānau tau kruddhau saṃgrāmamūrdhani
d droṇaṃ śarair vivyadhatuḥ paramaṃ krodham āsthitau
d tato droṇo mahārāja krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥ
d bhallābhyāṃ bhṛśatīkṣṇābhyāṃ ciccheda dhanuṣī tayoḥ
d tato virāṭaḥ kupitaḥ samare tomarān daśa
d daśa cikṣepa ca śarān droṇasya vadhakāṅkṣayā
d śaktiṃ ca drupado ghorām āyasīṃ svarṇabhūṣitām
d cikṣepa bhujagendrābhāṃ kruddho droṇarathaṃ prati
d tato bhallaiḥ suniśitaiś chittvā tāṃs tomarān daśa
d śaktiṃ kanakavaiḍūryāṃ droṇaś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ
d sa tābhyām ardito vṛddho vṛddhābhyāṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ
a tato droṇaḥ supītābhyāṃ bhallābhyām arimardanaḥ
c drupadaṃ ca virāṭaṃ ca praiṣīd vaivasvatakṣayam
a hate virāṭe drupade kekayeṣu tathaiva ca
c tathaiva cedimatsyeṣu pāñcāleṣu tathaiva ca
e hateṣu triṣu vīreṣu drupadasya ca naptṛṣu
f pāñcālarājapautreṣu triṣu cādbhutakarmasu
f pitṛputravadhāyas taś cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram
a droṇasya karma tad dṛṣṭvā kopaduḥkhasamanvitaḥ
c śaśāpa rathināṃ madhye dhṛṣṭadyumno mahāmanāḥ
a iṣṭāpūrtāt tathā kṣātrād brāhmaṇyāc ca sa naśyatu
c droṇo yasyādya mucyeta yo vā droṇāt parāṅmukhaḥ
a iti teṣāṃ pratiśrutya madhye sarvadhanuṣmatām
c āyād droṇaṃ sahānīkaḥ pāñcālyaḥ paravīrahā
e pāñcālās tv ekato droṇam abhyaghnan pāṇḍavānyataḥ
a duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
c sodaryāś ca yathā mukhyās te 'rakṣan droṇam āhave
a rakṣyamāṇaṃ tathā droṇaṃ samare tair mahātmabhiḥ
c yatamānāpi pāñcālā na śekuḥ prativīkṣitum
a tatrākrudhyad bhīmaseno dhṛṣṭadyumnasya māriṣa
c sa enaṃ vāgbhir ugrābhis tatakṣa puruṣarṣabha
a drupadasya kule jātaḥ sarvāstreṣv astravittamaḥ
c kaḥ kṣatriyo manyamānaḥ prekṣetārim avasthitam
a pitṛputravadhaṃ prāpya pumān kaḥ parihāpayet
c viśeṣatas tu śapathaṃ śapitvā rājasaṃsadi
a eṣa vaiśvānara iva samiddhaḥ svena tejasā
c śaracāpendhano droṇaḥ kṣatraṃ dahati tejasā
a purā karoti niḥśeṣāṃ pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm
c sthitāḥ paśyata me karma droṇam eva vrajāmy aham
a ity uktvā prāviśat kruddho droṇānīkaṃ vṛkodaraḥ
c dṛḍhaiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair drāvayaṃs tava vāhinīm
d athodyamya gadāṃ bhīmaḥ kāladaṇḍam ivāntakaḥ
d droṇāya vyasṛjad rājan rathahayapapalvuve sic
d sāśvasūtadhvajaṃ rājan droṇasyāpothayat tadā
d prāmṛdadnan svabahūn yodhān vāyuvṛkṣān ivaujasā
d anyaṃ tu ratham āsthāya droṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
d vyūhadvāraṃ samāsthāya yuddhāya samavasthitaḥ
a dhṛṣṭadyumno 'pi pāñcālyaḥ praviśya mahatīṃ camūm
c āsasāda raṇe droṇaṃ tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahat
a naiva nas tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na ca śrutam
c yathā sūryodaye rājan samutpiñjo 'bhavan mahān
a saṃsaktāni vyadṛśyanta rathavṛndāni māriṣa
c hatāni ca vikīrṇāni śarīrāṇi śarīriṇām
a ke cid anyatra gacchantaḥ pathi cānyair upadrutāḥ
c vimukhāḥ pṛṣṭhataś cānye tāḍyante pārśvato 'pare
a tathā saṃsaktayuddhaṃ tad abhavad bhṛśadāruṇam
c atha saṃdhyāgataḥ sūryaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyata
 saṃjaya uvāca
a te tathaiva mahārāja daṃśitā raṇamūrdhani
c saṃdhyāgataṃ sahasrāṃśum ādityam upatasthire
a udite tu sahasrāṃśau taptakāñcanasaprabhe
c prakāśiteṣu lokeṣu punar yuddham avartata
a dvaṃdvāni yāni tatrāsan saṃsaktāni purodayāt
c tāny evābhyudite sūrye samasajjanta bhārata
a rathair hayā hayair nāgāḥ pādātāś cāpi kuñjaraiḥ
c hayā hayaiḥ samājagmuḥ pādātāś ca padātibhiḥ
d narā rathai rathā nāgais tathaiva puruṣarṣabha
e saṃsaktāś ca viyuktāś ca yodhāḥ saṃnyapatan raṇe
a te rātrau kṛtakarmāṇaḥ śrāntāḥ sūryasya tejasā
c kṣutpipāsāparītāṅgā visaṃjñā bahavo 'bhavan
a śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca garjatām
c visphāritavikṛṣṭānāṃ kārmukāṇāṃ ca kūjatām
a śabdaḥ samabhavad rājan divispṛg bharatarṣabha
c dravatāṃ ca padātīnāṃ śastrāṇāṃ vinipātyatām
a hayānāṃ heṣatāṃ caiva rathānāṃ ca nivartatām
c krośatāṃ garjatāṃ caiva tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahat
a vivṛddhas tumulaḥ śabdo dyām agacchan mahāsvanaḥ
c nānāyudhanikṛttānāṃ ceṣṭatām āturaḥ svanaḥ
a bhūmāv aśrūyata mahāṃs tadāsīt kṛpaṇaṃ mahat
c patatāṃ patitānāṃ ca pattyaśvarathahastinām
a teṣu sarveṣv anīkeṣu vyatiṣakteṣv anekaśaḥ
c sve svāñ jaghnuḥ pare svāṃś ca sve parāṃś ca parān pare
a vīrabāhuvisṛṣṭāś ca yodheṣu ca gajeṣu ca
c asayaḥ pratyadṛśyanta vāsasāṃ nejaneṣv iva
a udyatapratipiṣṭānāṃ khaḍgānāṃ vīrabāhubhiḥ
c sa eva śabdas tadrūpo vāsasāṃ nijyatām iva
a ardhāsibhis tathā khaḍgais tomaraiḥ saparaśvadhaiḥ
c nikṛṣṭayuddhaṃ saṃsaktaṃ mahad āsīt sudāruṇam
a gajāśvakāyaprabhavāṃ naradehapravāhinīm
c śastramatsyasusaṃpūrṇāṃ māṃsaśoṇitakardamām
a ārtanādasvanavatīṃ patākāvastraphenilām
c nadīṃ prāvartayan vīrāḥ paralokapravāhinīm
a śaraśaktyarditāḥ klāntā rātrimūḍhālpacetasaḥ
c viṣṭabhya sarvagātrāṇi vyatiṣṭhan gajavājinaḥ
e saṃśuṣkavadanā vīrāḥ śirobhiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥ
a yuddhopakaraṇaiś cānyais tatra tatra prakāśitaiḥ
c kravyādasaṃghair ākīrṇaṃ mṛtair ardhamṛtair api
e nāsīd rathapathas tatra sarvam āyodhanaṃ prati
a majjatsu cakreṣu rathān sattvam āsthāya vājinaḥ
c kathaṃ cid avahañ śrāntā vepamānāḥ śarārditāḥ
e kulasattvabalopetā vājino vāraṇopamāḥ
f babhramus tatra tatraiva rathān ādāya bhārata
a vihvalaṃ tat samudbhrāntaṃ sabhayaṃ bhāratāturam
c balam āsīt tadā sarvam ṛte droṇārjunāv ubhau
a tāv evāstāṃ nilayanaṃ tāv ārtāyanam eva ca
c tāv evānye samāsādya jagmur vaivasvatakṣayam
a āvignam abhavat sarvaṃ kauravāṇāṃ mahad balam
c pāñcālānāṃ ca saṃsaktaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
a antakākrīḍasadṛśe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānām utthite mahati kṣaye
a na tatra karṇaṃ na droṇaṃ nārjunaṃ na yudhiṣṭhiram
c na bhīmasenaṃ na yamau na pāñcālyaṃ na sātyakim
a na ca duḥśāsanaṃ drauṇiṃ na duryodhanasaubalau
c na kṛpaṃ madrarājaṃ vā kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
a na cānyān naiva cātmānaṃ na kṣitiṃ na diśas tathā
c paśyāma rājan saṃsaktān sainyena rajasāvṛtān
a saṃbhrānte tumule ghore rajomeghe samutthite
c dvitīyām iva saṃprāptām amanyanta niśāṃ tadā
a na jñāyante kauraveyā na pāñcālā na pāṇḍavāḥ
c na diśo na divaṃ norvīṃ na samaṃ viṣamaṃ tathā
d aśobhanta yathā meghāḥ śāradāś calavidyutaḥ
a hastasaṃsparśam āpannān parān vāpy atha vā svakān
c nyapātayaṃs tadā yuddhe narāḥ sma vijayaiṣiṇaḥ
a uddhūtatvāt tu rajasaḥ prasekāc choṇitasya ca
c praśaśāma rajo bhaumaṃ śīghratvād anilasya ca
a tatra nāgā hayā yodhā rathino 'tha padātayaḥ
c pārijātavanānīva vyarocan rudhirokṣitāḥ
a tato duryodhanaḥ karṇo droṇo duḥśāsanas tathā
c pāṇḍavaiḥ samasajjanta caturbhiś caturo rathāḥ
a duryodhanaḥ saha bhrātrā yamābhyāṃ samasajjata
c vṛkodareṇa rādheyo bhāradvājena cārjunaḥ
a tad ghoraṃ mahad āścaryaṃ sarve praikṣan samantataḥ
c ratharṣabhāṇām ugrāṇāṃ saṃnipātam amānuṣam
a rathamārgair vicitraiś ca vicitrarathasaṃkulam
c apaśyan rathino yuddhaṃ vicitraṃ citrayodhinām
a yatamānāḥ parākrāntāḥ parasparajigīṣavaḥ
c jīmūtā iva gharmānte śaravarṣair avākiran
a te rathān sūryasaṃkāśān āsthitāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c aśobhanta yathā meghāḥ śāradāḥ samupasthitāḥ
d yodhās te tu mahārāja krodhāmarṣasamanvitāḥ
a spardhinas te maheṣvāsāḥ kṛtayatnā dhanurdharāḥ
c abhyagacchaṃs tathānyonyaṃ mattā gajavṛṣā iva
a na nūnaṃ dehabhedo 'sti kāle tasmin samāgate
c yatra sarve na yugapad vyaśīryanta mahārathāḥ
a bāhubhiś caraṇaiś chinnaiḥ śirobhiś cārukuṇḍalaiḥ
c kārmukair viśikhaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśupaṭṭiśaiḥ
a nālīkakṣuranārācair nakharaiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
c anyaiś ca vividhākārair dhautaiḥ praharaṇottamaiḥ
a citraiś ca vividhākāraiḥ śarīrāvaraṇair api
c vicitraiś ca rathair bhagnair hataiś ca gajavājibhiḥ
a śūnyaiś ca nagarākārair hatayodhadhvajai rathaiḥ
c amanuṣyair hayais trastaiḥ kṛṣyamāṇais tatas tataḥ
a vātāyamānair asakṛd dhatavīrair alaṃkṛtaiḥ
c vyajanaiḥ kaṅkaṭaiś caiva dhvajaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
a chatrair ābharaṇair vastrair mālyaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
c hāraiḥ kirīṭair mukuṭair uṣṇīṣaiḥ kiṅkiṇīgaṇaiḥ
a urasyair maṇibhir niṣkaiś cūḍāmaṇibhir eva ca
c āsīd āyodhanaṃ tatra nabhas tārāgaṇair iva
a tato duryodhanasyāsīn nakulena samāgamaḥ
c amarṣitena kruddhasya kruddhenāmarṣitasya ca
a apasavyaṃ cakārātha mādrīputras tavātmajam
c kirañ śaraśatair hṛṣṭas tatra nādo mahān abhūt
a apasavyaṃ kṛtaḥ saṃkhye bhrātṛvyenātyamarṣiṇā
c so 'marṣitas tam apy ājau praticakre 'pasavyataḥ
d putras tava mahārāja rājā duryodhano drutam
a tataḥ praticikīrṣantam apasavyaṃ tu te sutam
c nyavārayata tejasvī nakulaś citramārgavit
a sarvato vinivāryainaṃ śarajālena pīḍayan
c vimukhaṃ nakulaś cakre tat sainyāḥ samapūjayan
a tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti nakulo babhāṣe tanayaṃ tava
c saṃsmṛtya sarvaduḥkhāni tava durmantritena ca
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tato duḥśāsanaḥ kruddhaḥ sahadevam upādravat
c rathavegena tīvreṇa kampayann iva medinīm
a tasyāpatata evāśu bhallenāmitrakarśanaḥ
c mādrīsutaḥ śiro yantuḥ saśirastrāṇam acchinat
a nainaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ sūtaṃ nāpi kaś cana sainikaḥ
c hṛtottamāṅgam āśutvāt sahadevena buddhavān
a yadā tv asaṃgṛhītatvāt prayānty aśvā yathāsukham
c tato duḥśāsanaḥ sūtaṃ buddhavān gatacetasam
a sa hayān saṃnigṛhyājau svayaṃ hayaviśāradaḥ
c yuyudhe rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
a tad asyāpūjayan karma sve pare caiva saṃyuge
c hatasūtarathenājau vyacarad yad abhītavat
a sahadevas tu tān aśvāṃs tīkṣṇair bāṇair avākirat
c pīḍyamānāḥ śaraiś cāśu prādravaṃs te tatas tataḥ
a sa raśmiṣu viṣaktatvād utsasarja śarāsanam
c dhanuṣā karma kurvaṃs tu raśmīn sa punar utsṛjat
a chidreṣu teṣu taṃ bāṇair mādrīputro 'bhyavākirat
c parīpsaṃs tvatsutaṃ karṇas tadantaram avāpatat
a vṛkodaras tataḥ karṇaṃ tribhir bhallaiḥ samāhitaiḥ
c ākarṇapūrṇair abhyaghnan bāhvor urasi cānadat
a saṃnyavartata taṃ karṇaḥ saṃghaṭṭita ivoragaḥ
b bhīmam āvārayām āsa vikiran niśitāñ śarān
b karṇas tu niśitair bāṇair vivyadhe marmabhedibhiḥ
c tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ bhīmarādheyayos tadā
d purā devāsure yuddhe vṛtravāsavayor iva
a tau vṛṣāv iva saṃkruddhau vivṛttanayanāv ubhau
c vegena mahatānyonyaṃ saṃrabdhāv abhipetatuḥ
a abhisaṃśliṣṭayos tatra tayor āhavaśauṇḍayoḥ
c abhinnaśarapātatvād gadāyuddham avartata
a gadayā bhīmasenas tu karṇasya rathakūbaram
c bibhedāśu tadā rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tato bhīmasya rādheyo gadām ādāya vīryavān
c avāsṛjad rathe tāṃ tu bibheda gadayā gadām
a tato bhīmaḥ punar gurvīṃ cikṣepādhirather gadām
c tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ karṇaḥ supuṅkhaiḥ susamāhitaiḥ
e pratyavidhyat punaś cānyaiḥ sā bhīmaṃ punar āvrajat
f vyālīva mantrābhihatā karṇabāṇair abhidrutā
a tasyāḥ pratinipātena bhīmasya vipulo dhvajaḥ
c papāta sārathiś cāsya mumoha gadayā hataḥ
a sa karṇe sāyakān aṣṭau vyasṛjat krodhamūrchitaḥ
c dhvaje śarāsane caiva śarāvāpe ca bhārata
d tais tasya niśitaiḥ pītair bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
d ciccheda paravīraghnaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
d karṇo 'py anyad dhanur gṛhya hemapṛṣṭhaṃ durāsadam
a tataḥ punas tu rādheyo hayān asya ratheṣubhiḥ
c ṛṣyavarṇāñ jaghānāśu tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī
a sa vipannaratho bhīmo nakulasyāpluto ratham
c harir yathā gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ samākrāmad ariṃdamaḥ
a tathā droṇārjunau citram ayudhyetāṃ mahārathau
c ācāryaśiṣyau rājendra kṛtapraharaṇau yudhi
a laghusaṃdhānayogābhyāṃ rathayoś ca raṇena ca
c mohayantau manuṣyāṇāṃ cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi ca
a upāramanta te sarve yodhāsmākaṃ pare tathā
c adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ paśyantas tad yuddhaṃ guruśiṣyayoḥ
a vicitrān pṛtanāmadhye rathamārgān udīryataḥ
c anyonyam apasavyaṃ ca kartuṃ vīrau tadaiṣatuḥ
e parākramaṃ tayor yodhā dadṛśus taṃ suvismitāḥ
a tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ droṇapāṇḍavayor mahat
c āmiṣārthaṃ mahārāja gagane śyenayor iva
a yad yac cakāra droṇas tu kuntīputrajigīṣayā
c tat tat pratijaghānāśu prahasaṃs tasya pāṇḍavaḥ
d tāv anyonyaṃ prati mahān saṃrambhaḥ samajāyata
d mṛdupūrvam abhūd yuddhaṃ divyāstraviduṣor dvayoḥ
a yadā droṇo na śaknoti pāṇḍavasya viśeṣaṇe
c tataḥ prāduścakārāstram astramārgaviśāradaḥ
a aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tvāṣṭraṃ vāyavyam atha vāruṇam
c muktaṃ muktaṃ droṇacāpāt taj jaghāna dhanaṃjayaḥ
a astrāṇy astrair yadā tasya vidhivad dhanti pāṇḍavaḥ
c tato 'straiḥ paramair divyair droṇaḥ pārtham avākirat
a yad yad astraṃ sa pārthāya prayuṅkte vijigīṣayā
c tasyāstrasya vighātārthaṃ tat tat sa kurute 'rjunaḥ
a sa vadhyamāneṣv astreṣu divyeṣv api yathāvidhi
c arjunenārjunaṃ droṇo manasaivābhyapūjayat
a mene cātmānam adhikaṃ pṛthivyām api bhārata
c tena śiṣyeṇa sarvebhyaḥ śastravidbhyaḥ samantataḥ
a vāryamāṇas tu pārthena tathā madhye mahātmanām
c yatamāno 'rjunaṃ prītyā pratyavārayad utsmayan
a tato 'ntarikṣe devāś ca gandharvāś ca sahasraśaḥ
c ṛṣayaḥ siddhasaṃghāś ca vyatiṣṭhanta didṛkṣayā
a tad apsarobhir ākīrṇaṃ yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulam
c śrīmad ākāśam abhavad bhūyo meghākulaṃ yathā
a tatra smāntarhitā vāco vyacaranta punaḥ punaḥ
c droṇasya stavasaṃyuktāḥ pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
e visṛjyamāneṣv astreṣu jvālayatsu diśo daśa
f abruvaṃs tatra siddhāś ca ṛṣayaś ca samāgatāḥ
a naivedaṃ mānuṣaṃ yuddhaṃ nāsuraṃ na ca rākṣasam
c na daivaṃ na ca gāndharvaṃ brāhmaṃ dhruvam idaṃ param
e vicitram idam āścaryaṃ na no dṛṣṭaṃ na ca śrutam
a ati pāṇḍavam ācāryo droṇaṃ cāpy ati pāṇḍavaḥ
c nānayor antaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śakyam astreṇa kena cit
a yadi rudro dvidhākṛtya yudhyetātmānam ātmanā
c tatra śakyopamā kartum anyatra tu na vidyate
a jñānam ekastham ācārye jñānaṃ yogaś ca pāṇḍave
b droṇe sauṣṭhavam ācārye lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ tathā
b arjune dṛśyate vyaktaṃ nānyasmiṃs tad dhanurdhare
b lakṣam ekastham ācārye lakṣaṃ vedhaś ca pāṇḍave
b śaighryam ekastham ācārye śaighryaṃ vedhaś ca pāṇḍave
b gatam ekastham ācārye gataṃ vedhaś ca pāṇḍave
c śauryam ekastham ācārye balaṃ śauryaṃ ca pāṇḍave
a nemau śakyau maheṣvāsau raṇe kṣepayituṃ paraiḥ
c icchamānau punar imau hanyetāṃ sāmaraṃ jagat
a ity abruvan mahārāja dṛṣṭvā tau puruṣarṣabhau
c antarhitāni bhūtāni prakāśāni ca saṃghaśaḥ
d yadā droṇaṃ mahārāja viśeṣayati pāṇḍavaḥ
a tato droṇo brāhmam astraṃ prāduścakre mahāmatiḥ
b tad astraṃ saṃdhitaṃ rājan ghorarūpaṃ mahāhave
c saṃtāpayan raṇe pārthaṃ bhūtāny antarhitāni ca
a tataś cacāla pṛthivī saparvatavanadrumā
b saritaś ca pratisrotaḥ samūhur vai kṣaṇāntaram
c vavau ca viṣamo vāyuḥ sāgarāś cāpi cukṣubhuḥ
a tatas trāso mahān āsīt kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥ
c sarveṣāṃ caiva bhūtānām udyate 'stre mahātmanā
a tataḥ pārtho 'py asaṃbhrāntas tad astraṃ pratijaghnivān
c brahmāstreṇaiva rājendra tataḥ sarvam aśīśamat
a yadā na gamyate pāraṃ tayor anyatarasya vā
c tataḥ saṃkulayuddhena tad yuddhaṃ vyakulīkṛtam
a nājñāyata tataḥ kiṃ cit punar eva viśāṃ pate
c pravṛtte tumule yuddhe droṇapāṇḍavayor mṛdhe
d droṇas tyajya raṇe pārthaṃ pāñcālān anvadhāvata

a saṃdadhe kārmuke tasmiñ śaram āśīviṣopamam
c droṇaṃ jighāṃsuḥ pāñcālyo mahājvālam ivānalam
a tasya rūpaṃ śarasyāsīd dhanurjyāmaṇḍalāntare
c dyotato bhāskarasyeva ghanānte pariveśinaḥ
a pārṣatena parāmṛṣṭaṃ jvalantam iva tad dhanuḥ
c antakālam iva prāptaṃ menire vīkṣya sainikāḥ
a tam iṣuṃ saṃhitaṃ tena bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
c dṛṣṭvāmanyata dehasya kālaparyāyam āgatam
a tataḥ sa yatnam ātiṣṭhad ācāryas tasya vāraṇe
c na cāsyāstrāṇi rājendra prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ
a tasya tv ahāni catvāri kṣapā caikāsyato gatā
b tasya tv ahaś ca rātriś ca śarān abhyasato 'gamat
c tasya cāhnas tribhāgena kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ patatriṇaḥ
a sa śarakṣayam āsādya putraśokena cārditaḥ
c vividhānāṃ ca divyānām astrāṇām aprasannatām

c tejasā preryamāṇaś ca yuyudhe so 'timānuṣam
a athānyat sa samādāya divyam āṅgirasaṃ dhanuḥ
c śarāṃś ca brahmadaṇḍābhān dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayodhayat
a tatas taṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākirat
c vyaśātayac ca saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnam amarṣaṇaḥ
d tataś ca pārṣato rājan samākṛṣya dhanur mahat
d śaraṃ mumoca niśitaṃ bhāradvājajighāṃsayā
a taṃ śaraṃ śatadhā cāsya droṇaś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ
c dhvajaṃ dhanuś ca niśitaiḥ sārathiṃ cāpy apātayat
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ prahasyānyat punar ādāya kārmukam
c śitena cainaṃ bāṇena pratyavidhyat stanāntare
a so 'tividdho maheṣvāsaḥ saṃbhrānta iva saṃyuge
c bhallena śitadhāreṇa cicchedāsya mahad dhanuḥ
a yac cāsya bāṇaṃ vikṛtaṃ dhanūṃṣi ca viśāṃ pate
c sarvaṃ saṃchidya durdharṣo gadāṃ khaḍgam athāpi ca
a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato 'vidhyan navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c jīvitāntakaraiḥ kruddhaḥ kruddharūpaṃ paraṃtapaḥ
a dhṛṣṭadyumnarathasyāśvān svarathāśvair mahārathaḥ
c amiśrayad ameyātmā brāhmam astram udīrayan
a te miśrā bahv aśobhanta javanā vātaraṃhasaḥ
c pārāvatasavarṇāś ca śoṇāś ca bharatarṣabha
a yathā savidyuto meghā nadanto jaladāgame
c tathā rejur mahārāja miśritā raṇamūrdhani
a īṣābandhaṃ cakrabandhaṃ rathabandhaṃ tathaiva ca
c praṇāśayad ameyātmā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥ
a sa chinnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
c uttamām āpadaṃ prāpya gadāṃ vīraḥ parāmṛśat
a tām asya viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣipyamāṇāṃ mahārathaḥ
c nijaghāna śarair droṇaḥ kruddhaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu naravyāghro droṇena nihatāṃ śaraiḥ
c vimalaṃ khaḍgam ādatta śatacandraṃ ca bhānumat
a asaṃśayaṃ tathābhūte pāñcālyaḥ sādhv amanyata
c vadham ācāryamukhyasya prāptakālaṃ mahātmanaḥ
a tataḥ svarathanīḍasthaḥ svarathasya ratheṣayā
c agacchad asim udyamya śatacandraṃ ca bhānumat
a cikīrṣur duṣkaraṃ karma dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
c iyeṣa vakṣo bhettuṃ ca bhāradvājasya saṃyuge
a so 'tiṣṭhad yugamadhye vai yugasaṃnahaneṣu ca
c śoṇānāṃ jaghanārdheṣu tat sainyāḥ samapūjayan
a tiṣṭhato yugapālīṣu śoṇān apy adhitiṣṭhataḥ
c nāpaśyad antaraṃ droṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a kṣipraṃ śyenasya carato yathaivāmiṣagṛddhinaḥ
c tadvad āsīd abhīsāro droṇaṃ prārthayato raṇe

c sarvān ekaikaśo droṇaḥ kapotābhān ajīghanat
a te hatā nyapatan bhūmau dhṛṣṭadyumnasya vājinaḥ
c śoṇāś ca paryamucyanta rathabandhād viśāṃ pate
a tān hayān nihatān dṛṣṭvā dvijāgryeṇa sa pārṣataḥ
c nāmṛṣyata yudhāṃ śreṣṭho yājñasenir mahārathaḥ
a virathaḥ sa gṛhītvā tu khaḍgaṃ khaḍgabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c droṇam abhyapatad rājan vainateya ivoragam
a tasya rūpaṃ babhau rājan bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsataḥ
c yathā rūpaṃ paraṃ viṣṇor hiraṇyakaśipor vadhe
a so 'carad vividhān mārgān prakārān ekaviṃśatim
b darśayām āsa kauravya pārṣato vicaran raṇe
c bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ prasṛtaṃ sṛtam
a parivṛttaṃ nivṛttaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ carma ca dhārayan
c saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa pārṣataḥ
d bhārataṃ kauśikaṃ caiva sātvataṃ caiva śikṣayā
d darśayan vyacarad yuddhe droṇasyāntacikīrṣayā
d caratas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmiṇaḥ
d vyasmayanta raṇe yodhā devatāś ca samāgatāḥ
a tataḥ śarasahasreṇa śatacandram apātayat
c khaḍgaṃ carma ca saṃbādhe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥ
a te tu vaitastikā nāma śarā hy āsannaghātinaḥ
c nikṛṣṭayuddhe droṇasya nānyeṣāṃ santi te śarāḥ
a śāradvatasya pārthasya drauṇer vaikartanasya ca
b ṛte śāradvatāt pārthād droṇer vaikartanāt tathā
c pradyumnayuyudhānābhyām abhimanyoś ca te śarāḥ
a athāsyeṣuṃ samādhatta dṛḍhaṃ paramasaṃśitam
c antevāsinam ācāryo jighāṃsuḥ putrasaṃmitam
a taṃ śarair daśabhis tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda śinipuṃgavaḥ
b paśyatas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmaṇi
c paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
e grastam ācāryamukhyena dhṛṣṭadyumnam amocayat
a carantaṃ rathamārgeṣu sātyakiṃ satyavikramam
c droṇakarṇāntaragataṃ kṛpasyāpi ca bhārata
e apaśyetāṃ mahātmānau viṣvaksenadhanaṃjayau
a apūjayetāṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ bruvāṇau sādhu sādhv iti
c divyāny astrāṇi sarveṣāṃ yudhi nighnantam acyutam
e abhipatya tataḥ senāṃ viṣvaksenadhanaṃjayau
a dhanaṃjayas tataḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt paśya keśava
c ācāryavaramukhyānāṃ madhye krīḍan madhūdvahaḥ
a ānandayati māṃ bhūyaḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
c mādrīputrau ca bhīmaṃ ca rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
a yac chikṣayānuddhataḥ san raṇe carati sātyakiḥ
c mahārathān upakrīḍan vṛṣṇīnāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ
a tam ete pratinandanti siddhāḥ sainyāś ca vismitāḥ
c ajayyaṃ samare dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv iti sātvatam
e yodhāś cobhayataḥ sarve karmabhiḥ samapūjayan
 saṃjaya uvāca
 sātvatasya tu tat karma dṛṣṭvā duryodhanādayaḥ
 śaineyaṃ sarvataḥ kruddhā vārayām āsur añjasā
 kṛpakarṇau ca samare putrāś ca tava māriṣa
 śaineyaṃ tvarayābhyetya vinighnan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhiras tato rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
 bhīmasenaś ca balavān sātvataṃ paryavārayan
 karṇaś ca śaravarṣeṇa gautamaś ca mahārathaḥ
 duryodhanādayas te ca śaineyaṃ paryavārayan
 tāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ sahasā rājann utthitāṃ ghorarūpiṇīm
 vārayām āsa śaineyo yodhayaṃs tān mahārathān
 teṣām astrāṇi divyāni saṃhitāni mahātmanām
 vārayām āsa vidhivad divyair astrair mahāmṛdhe
 saṃprahṛṣṭācyuto dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv iti pūjayan
 taṃ yaudhāś cābhavan sarve karmaṇānena pūjayan
 evam uktvā mahārāja vāsudevaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
 prāyāt tava balaṃ jiṣṇur bhāradvājarathaṃ prati
 tatrāsīd bhairavo nādas tāvakānāṃ jayaiṣiṇām
 samabhidravatāṃ pārthaṃ daityānām iva vāsavam
 tatrākaron mahārāja mahīṃ śoṇitakardamām
 prācchinac cottamāṅgāni pārtho 'śvanaradantinām
a krūram āyodhanaṃ jajñe tasmin rājasamāgame
c rudrasyeva hi kruddhasya nighnatas tu paśūn yathā
a hastānām uttamāṅgānāṃ kārmukāṇāṃ ca bhārata
c chatrāṇāṃ cāpaviddhānāṃ cāmarāṇāṃ ca saṃyuge
d rāśayaḥ sma vyadṛśyanta tatra tatra raṇājire
a bhagnacakrai rathaiś cāpi pātitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
c sādibhiś ca hataiḥ śūraiḥ saṃkīrṇā vasudhābhavat

a eṣa vai pārṣato vīro bhāradvājena saṃgataḥ
c ghaṭate ca yathāśakti bhāradvājasya nāśane
a yādṛśāni hi rūpāṇi dṛśyante no mahāraṇe

e te yūyaṃ sahitā bhūtvā kumbhayoniṃ parīpsata
a yudhiṣṭhirasamājñaptāḥ sṛñjayānāṃ mahārathāḥ
c abhyadravanta saṃyattā bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsavaḥ
a tān samāpatataḥ sarvān bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ
c abhyadravata vegena martavyam iti niścitaḥ
a prayāte satyasaṃdhe tu samakampata medinī
c vavur vātāḥ sanirghātās trāsayanto varūthinīm
a papāta mahatī colkā ādityān nirgateva ha
c dīpayantīva tāpena śaṃsantīva mahad bhayam
a jajvaluś caiva śastrāṇi bhāradvājasya māriṣa
c rathāḥ svananti cātyarthaṃ hayāś cāśrūṇy avāsṛjan
a hataujā iva cāpy āsīd bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ
b prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya dakṣiṇo bāhur eva ca
b vimanāś cābhavad yuddhe dṛṣṭvā pārṣatam agrataḥ
c ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmavādānāṃ svargasya gamanaṃ prati

a sa vasātīñ śibīṃś caiva bāhlīkān kauravān api

a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tadā rājan gabhastibhir ivāṃśumān
c babhau pracchādayann āśāḥ śarajālaiḥ samantataḥ
a tasya droṇo dhanuś chittvā viddhvā cainaṃ śilīmukhaiḥ
c marmāṇy abhyahanad bhūyaḥ sa vyathāṃ paramām agāt

c śanakair iva rājendra droṇaṃ vacanam abravīt

c svakarmabhir asaṃtuṣṭā na sma kṣatraṃ kṣayaṃ vrajet

c tasya ca brāhmaṇo mūlaṃ bhavāṃś ca brahmavittamaḥ
a śvapākavan mlecchagaṇān hatvā cānyān pṛthagvidhān

a śoṇitena pariklinno rathād bhūmim ariṃdamaḥ
c lohitāṅga ivādityo durdarśaḥ samapadyata
e evaṃ taṃ nihataṃ saṃkhye dadṛśe sainiko janaḥ
a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu tad rājan bhāradvājaśiro mahat
c tāvakānāṃ maheṣvāsaḥ pramukhe tat samākṣipat
a te tu dṛṣṭvā śiro rājan bhāradvājasya tāvakāḥ
b rathān nipatitaṃ droṇam ācāryaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gurum
c palāyanakṛtotsāhā dudruvuḥ sarvatodiśam
a droṇas tu divam āsthāya nakṣatrapatham āviśat
c aham eva tadādrākṣaṃ droṇasya nidhanaṃ nṛpa
a ṛṣeḥ prasādāt kṛṣṇasya satyavatyāḥ sutasya ca
a   catvāras te ca mānuṣāḥ
a agner iva śikhāṃ dīptām ulkāṃ prajvalitām iva
a apaśyāma divaṃ stabdhvā mahimānaṃ mahātmanaḥ
c vidhūmām iva saṃyāntīm ulkāṃ prajvalitām iva
e apaśyāma divaṃ stabdhvā gacchantaṃ taṃ mahādyutim
a hate droṇe nirutsāhān kurūn pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
c abhyadravan mahāvegās tataḥ sainyaṃ vyadīryata
a nihatā hayabhūyiṣṭhāḥ saṃgrāme niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c tāvakā nihate droṇe gatāsava ivābhavan
a parājayam athāvāpya paratra ca mahad bhayam
c ubhayenaiva te hīnā nāvindan dhṛtim ātmanaḥ
a anvicchantaḥ śarīraṃ tu bhāradvājasya pārthivāḥ
c nādhyagacchaṃs tadā rājan kabandhāyutasaṃkule
d patite tv eva saṃrabdhe senāyāṃ tatra bhārata
d udatiṣṭhann uruṇḍānāṃ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ
d ācchinnāḥ paṭṭasaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ prāsaiś ca bharatarṣabha

d pradhānahatabhūyiṣṭhāḥ kṛtacintāḥ palāyane

d nihatā hatabhūyiṣṭhā mṛtā iva hataprabhāḥ
d tāvakānāṃ rathaśreṣṭhā udhvastā iva bhasmanā
d adharmapūrvakaṃ yuddham upaskṛtya parājitāḥ
a pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā paratra ca mahad yaśaḥ
c bāṇaśabdaravāṃś cakruḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca puṣkalān
a bhīmasenas tato rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
c varūthinyām anṛtyetāṃ pariṣvajya parasparam
a abravīc ca tadā bhīmaḥ pārṣataṃ śatrutāpanam
c bhūyo 'haṃ tvāṃ vijayinaṃ pariṣvakṣyāmi pārṣata
e sūtaputre hate pāpe dhārtarāṣṭre ca saṃyuge
a etāvad uktvā bhīmas tu harṣeṇa mahatā yutaḥ
c bāhuśabdena pṛthivīṃ kampayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
a tasya śabdena vitrastāḥ prādravaṃs tāvakā yudhi
b pāṇḍavās tu mudā yuktāḥ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire
b prādravaṃs te sutān dṛṣṭvā sumukhaṃ caiva pārṣatam
c kṣatradharmaṃ samutsṛjya palāyanaparāyaṇāḥ
a pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā hṛṣṭā hy āsan viśāṃ pate
c arikṣayaṃ ca saṃgrāme tena te sukham āpnuvan
a tato droṇe hate rājan kuravaḥ śastrapīḍitāḥ
c hatapravīrā vidhvastā bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇāḥ
d udīrṇāṃś ca parān dṛṣṭvā hṛṣyamāṇān punaḥ punaḥ
d aśrupūrṇekṣaṇās trastā dīnā hy āsan viśāṃ pate
a vicetaso hatotsāhāḥ kaśmalābhihataujasaḥ
c ārtasvareṇa mahatā putraṃ te paryavārayan

a gāndhārarājaḥ śakunis trastas trastataraiḥ saha

a varūthinīṃ vegavatīṃ vidrutāṃ sapatākinīm

c madrāṇām īśvaraḥ śalyo vīkṣamāṇo 'payād bhayāt
a hatapravīrair bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dvipair bahupadātibhiḥ
c vṛtaḥ śāradvato 'gacchat kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭam iti bruvan
a bhojānīkena śiṣṭena kaliṅgāraṭṭabāhlikaiḥ
c kṛtavarmā vṛto rājan prāyāt sujavanair hayaiḥ
a padātigaṇasaṃyuktas trasto rājan bhayārditaḥ
c ulūkaḥ prādravat tatra dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ nipātitam
a darśanīyo yuvā caiva śaurye ca kṛtalakṣaṇaḥ
c duḥśāsano bhṛśodvignaḥ prādravad gajasaṃvṛtaḥ
d rathānām ayutaṃ gṛhya trisāhasrāṃś ca dantinaḥ
d vṛṣaseno 'payāt tūrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ nipātitam
a gajāśvarathasaṃyukto vṛtaś caiva padātibhiḥ
c duryodhano mahārāja prāyāt tatra mahārathaḥ
d saṃśaptakabalaṃ gṛhya hataśeṣaṃ kirīṭinā
d suśarmā prādravad rājan dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ nipātitam
a gajān rathān samāruhya parasyāpi hayāñ janāḥ
b prādravan sarvataḥ saṃkhye dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ hatam
b tvarayantaḥ pitṝn anye bhrātṝn anye ca mātulān
b putrān anye vayasyāṃś ca prādravan kuravas tathā
b codayantaś ca sainyāni svasrīyāṃś ca tathāpare
b sambandhinas tathānye ca prādravanta diśo daśa
b tato duryodhano rājā aśvatthāmānam abravīt
c prakīrṇakeśā vidhvastā na dvāv ekatra dhāvataḥ
a nedam astīti puruṣā hatotsāhā hataujasaḥ
c utsṛjya kavacān anye prādravaṃs tāvakā vibho
a anyonyaṃ te samākrośan sainikā bharatarṣabha
c tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti na ca te svayaṃ tatrāvatasthire
a dhuryān pramucya tu rathād dhatasūtān svalaṃkṛtān
c adhiruhya hayān yodhāḥ kṣipraṃ padbhir acodayan
a dravamāṇe tathā sainye trastarūpe hataujasi
b tasmin hāhākṛte sainye vartamāne bhayāvahe
c pratisrota iva grāho droṇaputraḥ parān iyāt
d tasyāsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ śikhaṇḍipramukhair gaṇaiḥ
d prabhadrakaiś ca pāñcālaiś cedibhiś ca sakekayaiḥ
a hatvā bahuvidhāṃ senāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ yuddhadurmadaḥ
c kathaṃ cit saṃkaṭān mukto mattadviradavikramaḥ
a dravamāṇaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyanakṛtakṣaṇam
c duryodhanaṃ samāsādya droṇaputro 'bravīd idam
a kim iyaṃ dravate senā trastarūpeva bhārata
c dravamāṇāṃ ca rājendra nāvasthāpayase raṇe
a tvaṃ cāpi na yathāpūrvaṃ prakṛtistho narādhipa
c karṇaprabhṛtayaś ceme nāvatiṣṭhanti pārthivāḥ
a anyeṣv api ca yuddheṣu naiva senādravat tadā
c kaccit kṣemaṃ mahābāho tava sainyasya bhārata
a kasminn idaṃ hate rājan rathasiṃhe balaṃ tava
c etām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ tan mamācakṣva kaurava
a tat tu duryodhanaḥ śrutvā droṇaputrasya bhāṣitam
c ghoram apriyam ākhyātuṃ nāśakat pārthivarṣabhaḥ
a bhinnā naur iva te putro nimagnaḥ śokasāgare
b aplave plavam anvicchan yathāgādhe naro 'mbhasi
c bāṣpeṇa pihito dṛṣṭvā droṇaputraṃ rathe sthitam
a tataḥ śāradvataṃ rājā savrīḍam idam abravīt
c śaṃseha sarvaṃ bhadraṃ te yathā sainyam idaṃ drutam
a atha śāradvato rājann ārtiṃ gacchan punaḥ punaḥ
c śaśaṃsa droṇaputrāya yathā droṇo nipātitaḥ
 kṛpa uvāca
a vayaṃ droṇaṃ puraskṛtya pṛthivyāṃ pravaraṃ ratham
c prāvartayāma saṃgrāmaṃ pāñcālair eva kevalaiḥ
a tataḥ pravṛtte saṃgrāme vimiśrāḥ kurusomakāḥ
c anyonyam abhigarjantaḥ śastrair dehān apātayan
d vartamāne tathā yuddhe kṣīyamāṇeṣu saṃyuge
d dhārtarāṣṭreṣu saṃkruddhaḥ pitā te 'stram udairayat

c ahanac chātravān bhallaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d pitā tava susaṃkruddho ripūn abhimukhe sthitaḥ
d nihanti prabalas tatra vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā
a pāṇḍavāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ pāñcālāś ca viśeṣataḥ
c saṃkhye droṇarathaṃ prāpya vyanaśan kālacoditāḥ
a sahasraṃ rathasiṃhānāṃ dvisāhasraṃ ca dantinām
c droṇo brahmāstranirdagdhaṃ preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
a ākarṇapalitaḥ śyāmo vayasāśītipañcakaḥ
c raṇe paryacarad droṇo vṛddhaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣavat
a kliśyamāneṣu sainyeṣu vadhyamāneṣu rājasu
c amarṣavaśam āpannāḥ pāñcālā vimukhābhavan
a teṣu kiṃ cit prabhagneṣu vimukheṣu sapatnajit
c divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇo babhūvārka ivoditaḥ
a sa madhyaṃ prāpya pāṇḍūnāṃ śararaśmiḥ pratāpavān
c madhyaṃgata ivādityo duṣprekṣyas te pitābhavat
a te dahyamānā droṇena sūryeṇeva virājatā
c dagdhavīryā nirutsāhā babhūvur gatacetasaḥ
a tān dṛṣṭvā pīḍitān bāṇair droṇena madhusūdanaḥ
c jayaiṣī pāṇḍuputrāṇām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a naiṣa jātu paraiḥ śakyo jetuṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c api vṛtrahaṇā saṃkhye rathayūthapayūthapaḥ
a te yūyaṃ dharmam utsṛjya jayaṃ rakṣata pāṇḍavāḥ
b jaye hi yatamānānāṃ śrīr dharmaś ca pravartate
c yathā vaḥ saṃyuge sarvān na hanyād rukmavāhanaḥ
a aśvatthāmni hate naiṣa yudhyed iti matir mama
c hataṃ taṃ saṃyuge kaś cid ākhyātv asmai mṛṣā naraḥ
a etan nārocayad vākyaṃ kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
c arocayaṃs tu sarve 'nye kṛcchreṇa tu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a bhīmasenas tu savrīḍam abravīt pitaraṃ tava
c aśvatthāmā hata iti tac cābudhyata te pitā
a sa śaṅkamānas tan mithyā dharmarājam apṛcchata
c hataṃ vāpy ahataṃ vājau tvāṃ pitā putravatsalaḥ
a tadatathyabhaye magno jaye sakto yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c aśvatthāmānam āhedaṃ hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
e bhīmena girivarṣmāṇaṃ mālavasyendravarmaṇaḥ
a upasṛtya tadā droṇam uccair idam abhāṣata
c yasyārthe śastram ādhatse yam avekṣya ca jīvasi
e putras te dayito nityaṃ śo 'śvatthāmā nipātitaḥ
f śete vinihato bhūmau vane siṃhaśiśur yathā
f jānann apy anṛtasyātha doṣān sa dvijasattamam
f avyaktam abravīd rājā hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
a tac chrutvā vimanās tatra ācāryo mahad apriyam
b sa tvāṃ nihatam ākrandan kṛtvā tvannāmapīḍitaḥ
c niyamya divyāny astrāṇi nāyudhyata yathā purā
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramodvignaṃ śokopahatacetasam
c pāñcālarājasya sutaḥ krūrakarmā samādravat
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vihitaṃ mṛtyuṃ lokatattvavicakṣaṇaḥ
c divyāny astrāṇy athotsṛjya raṇe prāya upāviśat
a tato 'sya keśān savyena gṛhītvā pāṇinā tadā
c pārṣataḥ krośamānānāṃ vīrāṇām acchinac chiraḥ
a na hantavyo na hantavya iti te sarvato 'bruvan
c tathaiva cārjuno vāhād avaruhyainam ādravat
a udyamya bāhū tvarito bruvāṇaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
c jīvantam ānayācāryaṃ mā vadhīr iti dharmavit
a tathāpi vāryamāṇena kauravair arjunena ca
c hata eva nṛśaṃsena pitā tava nararṣabha
a sainikāś ca tataḥ sarve prādravanta bhayārditāḥ
c vayaṃ cāpi nirutsāhā hate pitari te 'nagha
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tac chrutvā droṇaputras tu nidhanaṃ pitur āhave
c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ padāhata ivoragaḥ
d tataḥ kruddho raṇe drauṇir bhṛśaṃ jajvāla māriṣa
d yathendhanaṃ mahat prāpya prājvalad dhavyavāhanaḥ
d talaṃ talena niṣpiṣya dantair dantān upaspṛśan
d niḥśvasann urago yadval lohitākṣo 'bhavat tadā
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a adharmeṇa hataṃ śrutvā dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃjaya
c brāhmaṇaṃ pitaraṃ vṛddham aśvatthāmā kim abravīt
d śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca tejasā jvalanopamaḥ
d yad abravīt tadā sūta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
d yo veda divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a mānuṣaṃ vāruṇāgneyaṃ brāhmam astraṃ ca vīryavān
c aindraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ caiva yasmin nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a tam adharmeṇa dharmiṣṭhaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃjaya
c śrutvā nihatam ācāryam aśvatthāmā kim abravīt
a yena rāmād avāpyeha dhanurvedaṃ mahātmanā
c proktāny astrāṇi divyāni putrāya gurukāṅkṣiṇe
a ekam eva hi loke 'sminn ātmano guṇavattaram
c icchanti putraṃ puruṣā loke nānyaṃ kathaṃ cana
a ācāryāṇāṃ bhavanty eva rahasyāni mahātmanām
c tāni putrāya vā dadyuḥ śiṣyāyānugatāya vā
a sa śilpaṃ prāpya tat sarvaṃ saviśeṣaṃ ca saṃjaya
c śūraḥ śāradvatīputraḥ saṃkhye droṇād anantaraḥ
a rāmasyānumataḥ śāstre puraṃdarasamo yudhi
c kārtavīryasamo vīrye bṛhaspatisamo matau
a mahīdharasamo dhṛtyā tejasāgnisamo yuvā
c samudra iva gāmbhīrye krodhe sarpaviṣopamaḥ
a sa rathī prathamo loke dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥ
c śīghro 'nila ivākrande caran kruddha ivāntakaḥ
a asyatā yena saṃgrāme dharaṇyabhinipīḍitā
b meghastanitanirghoṣā kampate bhayaviklavā
c yo na vyathati saṃgrāme vīraḥ satyaparākramaḥ
a vedasnāto vratasnāto dhanurvede ca pāragaḥ
c mahodadhir ivākṣobhyo rāmo dāśarathir yathā
a tam adharmeṇa dharmiṣṭhaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃyuge
c śrutvā nihatam ācāryam aśvatthāmā kim abravīt

c yathā droṇasya pāñcālyo yajñasenasuto 'bhavat
a taṃ nṛśaṃsena pāpena krūreṇātyalpadarśinā
c śrutvā nihatam ācāryam aśvatthāmā kim abravīt
 saṃjaya uvāca
a chadmanā nihataṃ śrutvā pitaraṃ pāpakarmaṇā
c bāṣpeṇāpūryata drauṇī roṣeṇa ca nararṣabha
a tasya kruddhasya rājendra vapur divyam adṛśyata
c antakasyeva bhūtāni jihīrṣoḥ kālaparyaye
a aśrupūrṇe tato netre apamṛjya punaḥ punaḥ
c uvāca kopān niḥśvasya duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ
a pitā mama yathā kṣudrair nyastaśastro nipātitaḥ
c dharmadhvajavatā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tad viditaṃ mama
e anāryaṃ sunṛśaṃsasya dharmaputrasya me śrutam
f asatyavākyaṃ yat tena lobhād uktaṃ durātmanā
f rājyahetor nṛśaṃsena tac cāpi viditaṃ mayā
a yuddheṣv api pravṛttānāṃ dhruvau jayaparājayau
c dvayam etad bhaved rājan vadhas tatra praśasyate
a nyāyavṛtto vadho yas tu saṃgrāme yudhyato bhavet
c na sa duḥkhāya bhavati tathā dṛṣṭo hi sa dvijaḥ
a gataḥ sa vīralokāya pitā mama na saṃśayaḥ
c na śocyaḥ puruṣavyāghras tathā sa nidhanaṃ gataḥ
a yat tu dharmapravṛttaḥ san keśagrahaṇam āptavān
c paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ tan me marmāṇi kṛntati
d mayi jīvati yat tātaḥ keśagraham avāptavān
d katham anye kariṣyanti putrebhyaḥ putriṇaḥ spṛhām
a kāmāt krodhād avajñānād darpād bālyena vā punaḥ
c vaidharmikāni kurvanti tathā paribhavena ca
