c avajñāya ca māṃ nūnaṃ nṛśaṃsena durātmanā
a tasyānubandhaṃ sa draṣṭā dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ sudāruṇam
c anāryaṃ paramaṃ kṛtvā mithyāvādī ca pāṇḍavaḥ
a yo hy asau chadmanācāryaṃ śastraṃ saṃnyāsayat tadā
c tasyādya dharmarājasya bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
d śape satyena kauravya iṣṭāpūrtena cānagha
d ahatvā sarvapāñcālāñ jīveyaṃ na kathaṃ cana
a sarvopāyair yatiṣyāmi pāñcālānām ahaṃ vadhe
c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca samare hantāhaṃ pāpakāriṇam
a karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā
c pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ labdhāsmi kaurava
a yadarthaṃ puruṣavyāghra putram icchanti mānavāḥ
c pretya ceha ca saṃprāptaṃ trāṇāya mahato bhayāt
a pitrā tu mama sāvasthā prāptā nirbandhunā yathā
c mayi śailapratīkāśe putre śiṣye ca jīvati
a dhiṅ mamāstrāṇi divyāni dhig bāhū dhik parākramam
c yan māṃ droṇaḥ sutaṃ prāpya keśagrahaṇam āptavān
a sa tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā bharatasattama
c paralokagatasyāpi gamiṣyāmy anṛṇaḥ pituḥ
a āryeṇa tu na vaktavyā kadā cit stutir ātmanaḥ
c pitur vadham amṛṣyaṃs tu vakṣyāmy adyeha pauruṣam
a adya paśyantu me vīryaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sajanārdanāḥ
c mṛdnataḥ sarvasainyāni yugāntam iva kurvataḥ
a na hi devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
c adya śaktā raṇe jetuṃ rathasthaṃ māṃ nararṣabha
a mad anyo nāsti loke 'sminn arjunād vāstravittamaḥ
c ahaṃ hi jvalatāṃ madhye mayūkhānām ivāṃśumān
e prayoktā devasṛṣṭānām astrāṇāṃ pṛtanāgataḥ
a kṛśāśvatanayā hy adya matprayuktā mahāmṛdhe
c darśayanto ''tmano vīryaṃ pramathiṣyanti pāṇḍavān
a adya sarvā diśo rājan dhārābhir iva saṃkulāḥ
c āvṛtāḥ patribhis tīkṣṇair draṣṭāro māmakair iha
d bhaviṣyanti mahārāja maccharair vidiśas tathā
a kiran hi śarajālāni sarvato bhairavasvaram
c śatrūn nipātayiṣyāmi mahāvāta iva drumān
a na ca jānāti bībhatsus tad astraṃ na janārdanaḥ
c na bhīmaseno na yamau na ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a na pārṣato durātmāsau na śikhaṇḍī na sātyakiḥ
c yad idaṃ mayi kauravya sakalyaṃ sanivartanam
a nārāyaṇāya me pitrā praṇamya vidhipūrvakam
c upahāraḥ purā datto brahmarūpa upasthite
a taṃ svayaṃ pratigṛhyātha bhagavān sa varaṃ dadau
c vavre pitā me paramam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tataḥ
a athainam abravīd rājan bhagavān devasattamaḥ
c bhavitā tvatsamo nānyaḥ kaś cid yudhi naraḥ kva cit
d gṛhāṇāstram idaṃ vipra nārāyaṇam anuttamam
a na tv idaṃ sahasā brahman prayoktavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
c na hy etad astram anyatra vadhāc chatror nivartate
a na caitac chakyate jñātuṃ ko na vadhyed iti prabho
c avadhyam api hanyād dhi tasmān naitat prayojayet
a vadhaḥ saṃkhye dravaś caiva śastrāṇāṃ ca visarjanam
c prayācanaṃ ca śatrūṇāṃ gamanaṃ śaraṇasya ca
a ete praśamane yogā mahāstrasya paraṃtapa
c sarvathā pīḍito hi syād avadhyān pīḍayan raṇe
a taj jagrāha pitā mahyam abravīc caiva sa prabhuḥ
c tvaṃ varṣiṣyasi divyāni śastravarṣāṇy anekaśaḥ
e anenāstreṇa saṃgrāme tejasā ca jvaliṣyasi
a evam uktvā sa bhagavān divam ācakrame prabhuḥ
c etan nārāyaṇād astraṃ tat prāptaṃ mama bandhunā
d tatprasādān mayā prāptaṃ mahāstram idam uttamam
a tenāhaṃ pāṇḍavāṃś caiva pāñcālān matsyakekayān
c vidrāvayiṣyāmi raṇe śacīpatir ivāsurān
a yathā yathāham iccheyaṃ tathā bhūtvā śarā mama
c nipateyuḥ sapatneṣu vikramatsv api bhārata
d iccheyaṃ yadi dūrasthān nihaniṣyanti me śarāḥ
a yatheṣṭam aśmavarṣeṇa pravarṣiṣye raṇe sthitaḥ
c ayomukhaiś ca vihagair drāvayiṣye mahārathān
e paraśvadhāṃś ca vividhān prasakṣye 'ham asaṃśayam
a so 'haṃ nārāyaṇāstreṇa mahatā śatrutāpana
c śatrūn vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmi kadarthīkṛtya pāṇḍavān
a mitrabrahmagurudveṣī jālmakaḥ suvigarhitaḥ
c pāñcālāpasadaś cādya na me jīvan vimokṣyate
d evam uktvā tato drauṇiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau sa māriṣa
d pūrayan pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ saśailavanakānanām
d tasya śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā tava sainyāni māriṣa
d nyavartanta raṇāyaiva bhayaṃ tyaktvā mahārathāḥ
a tac chrutvā droṇaputrasya paryavartata vāhinī
c tataḥ sarve mahāśaṅkhān dadhmuḥ puruṣasattamāḥ
a bherīś cābhyahanan hṛṣṭā ḍiṇḍimāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
c tathā nanāda vasudhā khuranemiprapīḍitā
e sa śabdas tumulaḥ khaṃ dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca vyanādayat
a taṃ śabdaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ śrutvā parjanyaninadopamam
c sametya rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ sahitāḥ saṃnyamantrayan
a tathoktvā droṇaputro 'pi tadopaspṛśya bhārata
c prāduścakāra tad divyam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a prādurbhūte tatas tasminn astre nārāyaṇe tadā
c prāvāt sapṛṣato vāyur anabhre stanayitnumān
a cacāla pṛthivī cāpi cukṣubhe ca mahodadhiḥ
c pratisrotaḥ pravṛttāś ca gantuṃ tatra samudragāḥ
a śikharāṇi vyadīryanta girīṇāṃ tatra bhārata
c apasavyaṃ mṛgāś caiva pāṇḍuputrān pracakrire
a tamasā cāvakīryanta sūryaś ca kaluṣo 'bhavat
c saṃpatanti ca bhūtāni kravyādāni prahṛṣṭavat
a devadānavagandharvās trastā āsan viśāṃ pate
c kathaṃ kathābhavat tīvrā dṛṣṭvā tad vyākulaṃ mahat
a vyathitāḥ sarvarājānas tadā hy āsan vicetasaḥ
c tad dṛṣṭvā ghorarūpaṃ tu drauṇer astraṃ bhayāvaham
d petur ākāśagās tatra vimanaskā viśāṃ pate
d rodasī ca viyac caiva sarvaṃ jvālāsamāvṛtam
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a nivartiteṣu sainyeṣu droṇaputreṇa saṃyuge
c bhṛśaṃ śokābhitaptena pitur vadham amṛṣyatā
a kurūn āpatato dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya rakṣaṇe
c ko mantraḥ pāṇḍaveṣv āsīt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a prāg eva vidrutān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c punaś ca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvārjunam abhāṣata
a ācārye nihate droṇe dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃyuge
c nihate vajrahastena yathā vṛtre mahāsure
a nāśaṃsanta jayaṃ yuddhe dīnātmāno dhanaṃjaya
c ātmatrāṇe matiṃ kṛtvā prādravan kuravo yathā
a ke cid bhrāntai rathais tūrṇaṃ nihatapārṣṇiyantṛbhiḥ
c vipatākadhvajacchatraiḥ pārthivāḥ śīrṇakūbaraiḥ
a bhagnanīḍair ākulāśvair āruhyānye vicetasaḥ
c bhītāḥ pādair hayān ke cit tvarayantaḥ svayaṃ rathaiḥ
e yugacakrākṣabhagnaiś ca drutāḥ ke cid bhayāturāḥ
f rathān viśīrṇān utsṛjya padbhiḥ ke cic ca vidrutāḥ
f hayapṛṣṭhagatāś cānye kṛṣyante 'rdhacyutāsanāḥ
a gajaskandheṣu saṃsyūtā nārācaiś calitāsanāḥ
c śarārtair vidrutair nāgair hṛtāḥ ke cid diśo daśa
a viśastrakavacāś cānye vāhanebhyaḥ kṣitiṃ gatāḥ
c saṃchinnā nemiṣu gatā mṛditāś ca hayadvipaiḥ
a krośantas tāta putreti palāyanto 'pare bhayāt
c nābhijānanti cānyonyaṃ kaśmalābhihataujasaḥ
a putrān pitṝn sakhīn bhrātṝn samāropya dṛḍhakṣatān
c jalena kledayanty anye vimucya kavacāny api
d palāyanaparāś cānye yodhāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
d avasthitaṃ punar dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya tad balam
d dharmaputro mahārāja dhanaṃjayam athābravīt
a avasthāṃ tādṛśīṃ prāpya hate droṇe drutaṃ balam
b evam etad drutaṃ bhagnaṃ droṇe yudhi nipātite
b avasthānam avindan vai vikṣataṃ śarapīḍitam
c punarāvartitaṃ kena yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
a hayānāṃ heṣatāṃ śabdaḥ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca bṛṃhatām
c rathanemisvanaś cātra vimiśraḥ śrūyate mahān
a ete śabdā bhṛśaṃ tīvrāḥ pravṛttāḥ kurusāgare
c muhur muhur udīryantaḥ kampayanti hi māmakān
a ya eṣa tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate lomaharṣaṇaḥ
c sendrān apy eṣa lokāṃs trīn bhañjyād iti matir mama
a manye vajradharasyaiṣa ninādo bhairavasvanaḥ
c droṇe hate kauravārthaṃ vyaktam abhyeti vāsavaḥ
a prahṛṣṭalomakūpāḥ sma saṃvignarathakuñjarāḥ
c dhanaṃjaya guruṃ śrutvā tatra nādaṃ subhīṣaṇam
a ka eṣa kauravān dīrṇān avasthāpya mahārathaḥ
c nivartayati yuddhārthaṃ mṛdhe deveśvaro yathā
 arjuna uvāca
a udyamyātmānam ugrāya karmaṇe dhairyam āsthitāḥ
c dhamanti kauravāḥ śaṅkhān yasya vīryam upāśritāḥ
a yatra te saṃśayo rājan nyastaśastre gurau hate
c dhārtarāṣṭrān avasthāpya ka eṣa nadatīti ha
a hrīmantaṃ taṃ mahābāhuṃ mattadviradagāminam
b indraviṣṇusamaṃ vīrye kope 'ntakam iva sthitam
b bṛhaspatisamaṃ buddhyā nītimantaṃ mahāratham
c vyākhyāsyāmy ugrakarmāṇaṃ kurūṇām abhayaṃkaram
a yasmiñ jāte dadau droṇo gavāṃ daśaśataṃ dhanam
b sa eṣa nardati drauṇir gharmānte jalado yathā
c brāhmaṇebhyo mahārhebhyaḥ so 'śvatthāmaiṣa garjati
a jātamātreṇa vīreṇa yenoccaiḥśravasā iva
c heṣatā kampitā bhūmir lokāś ca sakalās trayaḥ
a tac chrutvāntarhitaṃ bhūtaṃ nāma cāsyākarot tadā
c aśvatthāmeti so 'dyaiṣa śūro nadati pāṇḍava
a yo 'dyānātha ivākramya pārṣatena hatas tathā
c karmaṇā sunṛśaṃsena tasya nātho vyavasthitaḥ
a guruṃ me yatra pāñcālyaḥ keśapakṣe parāmṛśat
c tan na jātu kṣamed drauṇir jānan pauruṣam ātmanaḥ
d sa hi tenaiva naḥ sarvān kṣapayed iti me matiḥ
a upacīrṇo gurur mithyā bhavatā rājyakāraṇāt
c dharmajñena satā nāma so 'dharmaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥ
d ciraṃ sthāsyati cākīrtis trailokye sacarācare
d rāme vālivadhād yadvad evaṃ droṇe nipātite
a sarvadharmopapanno 'yaṃ mama śiṣyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c nāyaṃ vakṣyati mithyeti pratyayaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvayi
a sa satyakañcukaṃ nāma praviṣṭena tato 'nṛtam
c ācārya ukto bhavatā hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
a tataḥ śastraṃ samutsṛjya nirmamo gatacetanaḥ
c āsīt sa vihvalo rājan yathā dṛṣṭas tvayā vibhuḥ
a sa tu śokena cāviṣṭo vimukhaḥ putravatsalaḥ
c śāśvataṃ dharmam utsṛjya guruḥ śiṣyeṇa ghātitaḥ
a nyastaśastram adharmeṇa ghātayitvā guruṃ bhavān
c rakṣatv idānīṃ sāmātyo yadi śaknoṣi pārṣatam
a grastam ācāryaputreṇa kruddhena hatabandhunā
c sarve vayaṃ paritrātuṃ na śakṣyāmo 'dya pārṣatam
a sauhārdaṃ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ karoty atimātraśaḥ
c so 'dya keśagrahaṃ śrutvā pitur dhakṣyati no raṇe
a vikrośamāne hi mayi bhṛśam ācāryagṛddhini
c avakīrya svadharmaṃ hi śiṣyeṇa nihato guruḥ
a yadā gataṃ vayo bhūyaḥ śiṣṭam alpataraṃ ca naḥ
c tasyedānīṃ vikāro 'yam adharmo yatkṛto mahān
a piteva nityaṃ sauhārdāt piteva sa hi dharmataḥ
c so 'lpakālasya rājyasya kāraṇān nihato guruḥ
a dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa bhīṣmāya droṇāya ca viśāṃ pate
c visṛṣṭā pṛthivī sarvā saha putraiś ca tatparaiḥ
a sa prāpya tādṛśīṃ vṛttiṃ satkṛtaḥ satataṃ paraiḥ
c avṛṇīta sadā putrān mām evābhyadhikaṃ guruḥ
a akṣīyamāṇo nyastāstras tvadvākyenāhave hataḥ
c na tv enaṃ yudhyamānaṃ vai hanyād api śatakratuḥ
a tasyācāryasya vṛddhasya droho nityopakāriṇaḥ
c kṛto hy anāryair asmābhī rājyārthe laghubuddhibhiḥ
d aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sudāruṇaṃ
d yad rājyasukhalobhena droṇo 'yaṃ sādhu ghātitaḥ
a putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn dārāñ jīvitaṃ caiva vāsaviḥ
c tyajet sarvaṃ mama premṇā jānāty etad dhi me guruḥ
a sa mayā rājyakāmena hanyamāno 'py upekṣitaḥ
c tasmād avākśirā rājan prāpto 'smi narakaṃ vibho
a brāhmaṇaṃ vṛddham ācāryaṃ nyastaśastraṃ yathā munim
c ghātayitvādya rājyārthe mṛtaṃ śreyo na jīvitam
 saṃjaya uvāca
a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā nocus tatra mahārathāḥ
c apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi mahārāja dhanaṃjayam
a tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur bhīmaseno 'bhyabhāṣata
c utsmayann iva kaunteyam arjunaṃ bharatarṣabha
a munir yathāraṇyagato bhāṣase dharmasaṃhitam
c nyastadaṇḍo yathā pārtha brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
a kṣatāt trātā kṣatāj jīvan kṣāntas triṣv api sādhuṣu
c kṣatriyaḥ kṣitim āpnoti kṣipraṃ dharmaṃ yaśaḥ śriyam
a sa bhavān kṣatriyaguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ kulodvahaḥ
c avipaścid yathā vākyaṃ vyāharan nādya śobhase
d vartamāne yathā pāpe ugrakarmaṇi bhārata
d svadharmam anavasthāpya kim etāni prabhāṣase
a parākramas te kaunteya śakrasyeva śacīpateḥ
c na cātivartase dharmaṃ velām iva mahodadhiḥ
a na pūjayet tvā ko 'nvadya yat trayodaśavārṣikam
c amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā dharmam evābhikāṅkṣase
d aham āvārayiṣyāmi gadayā sarvakauravān
d tvayā vinā yadi mahīṃ dharmaputrāya dhīmate
d na dadyāṃ pañcame prāpte divase nāsmi kṣatriyaḥ
a diṣṭyā tāta manas te 'dya svadharmam anuvartate
c ānṛśaṃsye ca te diṣṭyā buddhiḥ satatam acyuta
a yat tu dharmapravṛttasya hṛtaṃ rājyam adharmataḥ
c draupadī ca parāmṛṣṭā sabhām ānīya śatrubhiḥ
d kathaṃ vṛddheṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhārmikeṣu mahatsu ca
d draupadī prāpnuyāt kleśaṃ veśyā yoṣeva bhārata
d kim u teṣāṃ bilvaphalaṃ mukhe hy āsīn mahātmanām
d utāho badhirā hy āsan mūkā vāpi dhanaṃjaya
d andhā vasaṃs tadā te tu yaiś ca noktaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
d atha tatra bhaved dharmo na caivātrāsty anāryakam
d anurūpaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi bhīṣmadroṇakṛpādibhiḥ
d putraiḥ śiṣyaiś ca yat sārdhaṃ saṃnaddhā yoddhum āhave
a vanaṃ pravrājitāś cāsma valkalājinavāsasaḥ
c anarhamāṇās taṃ bhāvaṃ trayodaśa samāḥ paraiḥ
d bahūni kṣāmya śatrūṇāṃ satyadharmaratā vayam
d tathā tan marṣayitvā tu yathā te utpathasthitāḥ
a etāny amarṣasthānāni marṣitāni tvayānagha
c kṣatradharmaprasaktena sarvam etad anuṣṭhitam
a tam adharmam apākraṣṭum ārabdhaḥ sahitas tvayā
c sānubandhān haniṣyāmi kṣudrān rājyaharān aham
a tvayā tu kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ yuddhāyābhyāgatā vayam
c ghaṭāmaś ca yathāśakti tvaṃ tu no 'dya jugupsase
a svadharmaṃ necchase jñātuṃ mithyā vacanam eva te
c bhayārditānām asmākaṃ vācā marmāṇi kṛntasi
a vapan vraṇe kṣāram iva kṣatānāṃ śatrukarśana
c vidīryate me hṛdayaṃ tvayā vākśalyapīḍitam
a adharmam etad vipulaṃ dhārmikaḥ san na budhyase
c yat tvam ātmānam asmāṃś ca praśaṃsyān na praśaṃsasi
d vāsudeve sthite cāpi droṇaputraṃ praśaṃsasi
e yaḥ kalāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ tvatto nārhate taṃ praśaṃsasi
a svayam evātmano vaktuṃ na yuktaṃ guṇasaṃstavam
b mama nāgāyutaṃ pārtha balaṃ bāhvor vidhīyate
b prapātayeyaṃ ca śaraiḥ sendrān devān samāgatān
b sarākṣasagaṇān pārtha sāsuroragamānavān
c dārayeyaṃ mahīṃ krodhād vikireyaṃ ca parvatān
a āvidhya ca gadāṃ gurvīṃ bhīmāṃ kāñcanamālinīm
c giriprakāśān kṣitijān bhañjeyam anilo yathā
a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ jānan bhrātaraṃ māṃ nararṣabha
c droṇaputrād bhayaṃ kartuṃ nārhasy amitavikrama
a atha vā tiṣṭha bībhatso saha sarvair nararṣabhaiḥ
c aham enaṃ gadāpāṇir jeṣyāmy eko mahāhave
a tataḥ pāñcālarājasya putraḥ pārtham athābravīt
c saṃkruddham iva nardantaṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ hariḥ
a bībhatso viprakarmāṇi viditāni manīṣiṇām
c yājanādhyāpane dānaṃ tathā yajñapratigrahau
a ṣaṣṭham adhyayanaṃ nāma teṣāṃ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c hato droṇo mayā yat tat kiṃ māṃ pārtha vigarhase
a apakrāntaḥ svadharmāc ca kṣatradharmam upāśritaḥ
c amānuṣeṇa hanty asmān astreṇa kṣudrakarmakṛt
a tathā māyāṃ prayuñjānam asahyaṃ brāhmaṇabruvam
c māyayaiva nihanyād yo na yuktaṃ pārtha tatra kim
a tasmiṃs tathā mayā śaste yadi drauṇāyanī ruṣā
c kurute bhairavaṃ nādaṃ tatra kiṃ mama hīyate
a na cādbhutam idaṃ manye yad drauṇiḥ śuddhagarjayā
c ghātayiṣyati kauravyān paritrātum aśaknuvan
a yac ca māṃ dhārmiko bhūtvā bravīṣi gurughātinam
c tadartham aham utpannaḥ pāñcālyasya suto 'nalāt
a yasya kāryam akāryaṃ vā yudhyataḥ syāt samaṃ raṇe
c taṃ kathaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāḥ kṣatriyaṃ vā dhanaṃjaya
a yo hy anastravido hanyād brahmāstraiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c sarvopāyair na sa kathaṃ vadhyaḥ puruṣasattama
d viśeṣāt pitṛhantā me na sa vadhyaḥ kathaṃ mayā
d yo 'yaṃ pāpaḥ sudurmedhā bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
d tasya viprabruvavadhe kathaṃ pāpaṃ bhaven mama
a vidharmiṇaṃ dharmavidbhiḥ proktaṃ teṣāṃ viṣopamam
c jānan dharmārthatattvajñaḥ kim arjuna vigarhase
a nṛśaṃsaḥ sa mayākramya ratha eva nipātitaḥ
c tan mābhinandyaṃ bībhatso kimarthaṃ nābhinandase
a kṛte raṇe kathaṃ pārtha jvalanārkaviṣopamam
c bhīmaṃ droṇaśiraśchede praśasyaṃ na praśaṃsasi
a yo 'sau mamaiva nānyasya bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
c chittvāpi tasya mūrdhānaṃ naivāsmi vigatajvaraḥ
a tac ca me kṛntate marma yan na tasya śiro mayā
c niṣādaviṣaye kṣiptaṃ jayadrathaśiro yathā
a avadhaś cāpi śatrūṇām adharmaḥ śiṣyate 'rjuna
c kṣatriyasya hy ayaṃ dharmo hanyād dhanyeta vā punaḥ
a sa śatrur nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā dharmeṇa pāṇḍava
c yathā tvayā hataḥ śūro bhagadattaḥ pituḥ sakhā
a pitāmahaṃ raṇe hatvā manyase dharmam ātmanaḥ
c mayā śatrau hate kasmāt pāpe dharmaṃ na manyase
d saṃbandhāvanataṃ pārtha na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase
d svagātrakṛtasopānaṃ niṣaṇṇam iva dantinam
d kṣamāmi te sarvam eva vāgvyatikramam arjuna
d draupadyā draupadeyānāṃ kṛte nānyena hetunā
d kulakramāgataṃ vairaṃ mamācāryeṇa viśrutam
d tathā jānāty ayaṃ loko na yūyaṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
a nānṛtaḥ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭho nāhaṃ vādhārmiko 'rjuna
b na kṣatriya iti prāhur yo na hanti raṇājire
b pitaraṃ vā guruṃ vāpi jighāṃsuṃ putraśiṣyayoḥ
b jihmena vāpy ajihmena hanyād evāvicārayan
b ity uktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ dviṣadvadhe
b tasmāc chiṣyeṇa nihataḥ śatrur me brāhmaṇabruvaḥ
b yaḥ kṣatriyasuto hanyāt pitaraṃ vā guruṃ ca vā
b aniṣṭaṃ kṣatriyo hanyāt sa vai kṣatriya ucyate
c śiṣyadhruṅ nihataḥ pāpo yudhyasva vijayas tava
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a sāṅgā vedā yathānyāyaṃ yenādhītā mahātmanā
c yasmin sākṣād dhanurvedo hrīniṣedhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a tasminn ākruśyati droṇe maharṣitanaye tadā
c nīcātmanā nṛśaṃsena kṣudreṇa gurughātinā
a yasya prasādāt karmāṇi kurvanti puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c amānuṣāṇi saṃgrāme devair asukarāṇi ca
a tasminn ākruśyati droṇe samakṣaṃ pāpakarmiṇaḥ
c nāmarṣaṃ tatra kurvanti dhik kṣatraṃ dhig amarṣitam
a pārthāḥ sarve ca rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ye dhanurdharāḥ
c śrutvā kim āhuḥ pāñcālyaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
 saṃjaya uvāca
a śrutvā drupadaputrasya tā vācaḥ krūrakarmaṇaḥ
c tūṣṇīṃ babhūvū rājānaḥ sarva eva viśāṃ pate
a arjunas tu kaṭākṣeṇa jihmaṃ prekṣya ca pārṣatam
c sabāṣpam abhiniḥśvasya dhig dhig dhig iti cābravīt
a yudhiṣṭhiraś ca bhīmaś ca yamau kṛṣṇas tathāpare
c āsan suvrīḍitā rājan sātyakir idam abravīt
a nehāsti puruṣaḥ kaś cid ya imaṃ pāpapūruṣam
c bhāṣamāṇam akalyāṇaṃ śīghraṃ hanyān narādhamam
d ete tvāṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kutsayanti vivitsayā
d karmaṇā tena pāpena śvapākam iva brāhmaṇāḥ
d etat kṛtvā mahat pāpaṃ ninditaṃ sarvasādhubhiḥ
d na lajjase kathaṃ vaktuṃ samitiṃ prāpya śobhanām
a kathaṃ ca śatadhā jihvā na te mūrdhā ca dīryate
c gurum ākrośataḥ kṣudra na cādharmeṇa pātyase
a yāpyas tvam asi pārthaiś ca sarvaiś cāndhakavṛṣṇibhiḥ
c yat karma kaluṣaṃ kṛtvā ślāghase janasaṃsadi
a akāryaṃ tādṛśaṃ kṛtvā punar eva guruṃ kṣipan
c vadhyas tvaṃ na tvayārtho 'sti muhūrtam api jīvatā
a kas tv etad vyavased āryas tvad anyaḥ puruṣādhamaḥ
c nigṛhya keśeṣu vadhaṃ guror dharmātmanaḥ sataḥ
a saptāvare tathā pūrve bāndhavās te nipātitāḥ
c yaśasā ca parityaktās tvāṃ prāpya kulapāṃsanam
a uktavāṃś cāpi yat pārthaṃ bhīṣmaṃ prati nararṣabham
c tathānto vihitas tena svayam eva mahātmanā
a tasyāpi tava sodaryo nihantā pāpakṛttamaḥ
c nānyaḥ pāñcālaputrebhyo vidyate bhuvi pāpakṛt
a sa cāpi sṛṣṭaḥ pitrā te bhīṣmasyāntakaraḥ kila
c śikhaṇḍī rakṣitas tena sa ca mṛtyur mahātmanaḥ
a pāñcālāś calitā dharmāt kṣudrā mitragurudruhaḥ
c tvāṃ prāpya sahasodaryaṃ dhikkṛtaṃ sarvasādhubhiḥ
a punaś ced īdṛśīṃ vācaṃ matsamīpe vadiṣyasi
c śiras te pātayiṣyāmi gadayā vajrakalpayā
d tvāṃ ca brahmahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janaḥ sūryam avekṣate
d brahmahatyā hi te pāpaṃ prāyaścittārtham ātmanaḥ
d pāñcālaka sudurvṛtta mamaiva gurum agrataḥ
d guror guruṃ ca bhūyo 'pi kṣipan naiva hi lajjase
d tiṣṭha tiṣṭha sahasvaikaṃ gadāpātam imaṃ mama
d tava cāpi sahiṣye 'haṃ gadāpātān anekaśaḥ
a sātvatenaivam ākṣiptaḥ pārṣataḥ paruṣākṣaram
c saṃrabdhaḥ sātyakiṃ prāha saṃkruddhaḥ prahasann iva
a śrūyate śrūyate ceti kṣamyate ceti mādhava
c na cānārya śubhaṃ sādhuṃ puruṣaṃ kṣeptum arhasi
a kṣamā praśasyate loke na tu pāpo 'rhati kṣamām
c kṣamāvantaṃ hi pāpātmā jito 'yam iti manyate
a sa tvaṃ kṣudrasamācāro nīcātmā pāpaniścayaḥ
c ā keśāgrān nakhāgrāc ca vaktavyo vaktum icchasi
d varaṃ hi te mṛtaṃ pāpa na ca te vṛttam īdṛśam
d śrotuṃ vaktavyatāmūlaṃ nīcā vakṣyanti mānavāḥ
d parān kṣipanti doṣeṇa sveṣu doṣeṣv adṛṣṭayaḥ
a yaḥ sa bhūriśravāś chinne bhuje prāyagatas tvayā
c vāryamāṇena nihatas tataḥ pāpataraṃ nu kim
a vyūhamāno mayā droṇo divyenāstreṇa saṃyuge
c visṛṣṭaśastro nihataḥ kiṃ tatra krūra duṣkṛtam
a ayudhyamānaṃ yas tv ājau tathā prāyagataṃ munim
c chinnabāhuṃ parair hanyāt sātyake sa kathaṃ bhavet
a nihatya tvāṃ yadā bhūmau sa vikrāmati vīryavān
c kiṃ tadā na nihaṃsy enaṃ bhūtvā puruṣasattamaḥ
a tvayā punar anāryeṇa pūrvaṃ pārthena nirjitaḥ
c yadā tadā hataḥ śūraḥ saumadattiḥ pratāpavān
a yatra yatra tu pāṇḍūnāṃ droṇo drāvayate camūm
c kirañ śarasahasrāṇi tatra tatra prayāmy aham
a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtvā karma cāṇḍālavat svayam
c vaktum icchasi vaktavyaḥ kasmān māṃ paruṣāṇy atha
a kartā tvaṃ karmaṇograsya nāhaṃ vṛṣṇikulādhama
c pāpānāṃ ca tvam āvāsaḥ karmaṇāṃ mā punar vada
a joṣam āssva na māṃ bhūyo vaktum arhasy ataḥ param
c adharottaram etad dhi yan mā tvaṃ vaktum icchasi
a atha vakṣyasi māṃ maurkhyād bhūyaḥ paruṣam īdṛśam
c gamayiṣyāmi bāṇais tvāṃ yudhi vaivasvatakṣayam
a na caiva mūrkha dharmeṇa kevalenaiva śakyate
c teṣām api hy adharmeṇa ceṣṭitaṃ śṛṇu yādṛśam
a vañcitaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ pūrvam adharmeṇa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c draupadī ca parikliṣṭā tathādharmeṇa sātyake
a pravrājitā vanaṃ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
c sarvasvam apakṛṣṭaṃ ca tathādharmeṇa bāliśa
a adharmeṇāpakṛṣṭaś ca madrarājaḥ parair itaḥ
b adharmeṇa tathā bālaḥ saubhadro vinipātitaḥ
c ito 'py adharmeṇa hato bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
e bhūriśravā hy adharmeṇa tvayā dharmavidā hataḥ
a evaṃ parair ācaritaṃ pāṇḍaveyaiś ca saṃyuge
c rakṣamāṇair jayaṃ vīrair dharmajñair api sātvata
a durjñeyaḥ paramo dharmas tathādharmaḥ sudurvidaḥ
c yudhyasva kauravaiḥ sārdhaṃ mā gāḥ pitṛniveśanam
a evamādīni vākyāni krūrāṇi paruṣāṇi ca
c śrāvitaḥ sātyakiḥ śrīmān ākampita ivābhavat
a tac chrutvā krodhatāmrākṣaḥ sātyakis tv ādade gadām
c viniḥśvasya yathā sarpaḥ praṇidhāya rathe dhanuḥ
a tato 'bhipatya pāñcālyaṃ saṃrambheṇedam abravīt
c na tvāṃ vakṣyāmi paruṣaṃ haniṣye tvāṃ vadhakṣamam
a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā mahābalam amarṣaṇam
c pāñcālyāyābhisaṃkruddham antakāyāntakopamam
a codito vāsudevena bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
c avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ bāhubhyāṃ samavārayat
a dravamāṇaṃ tathā kruddhaṃ sātyakiṃ pāṇḍavo balī
c praskandamānam ādāya jagāma balinaṃ balāt
a sthitvā viṣṭabhya caraṇau bhīmena śinipuṃgavaḥ
c nigṛhītaḥ pade ṣaṣṭhe balena balināṃ varaḥ
d tathāpi bhīmād ātmānam āmucya balinocchritaḥ
d jagāmānilavegena bhīmam unmucya mādhavaḥ
d bhīmenāthāśu mahatā vegam āsthāya madhyamam
d viṣṭabhya vidhṛto darpāt sātyakir daśame pade
a avaruhya rathāt taṃ tu hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā
c uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā sahadevo viśāṃ pate
a asmākaṃ puruṣavyāghra mitram anyan na vidyate
c param andhakavṛṣṇibhyaḥ pāñcālebhyaś ca mādhava
a tathaivāndhakavṛṣṇīnāṃ tava caiva viśeṣataḥ
c kṛṣṇasya ca tathāsmatto mitram anyan na vidyate
a pāñcālānāṃ ca vārṣṇeya samudrāntāṃ vicinvatām
c nānyad asti paraṃ mitraṃ yathā pāṇḍavavṛṣṇayaḥ
a sa bhavān īdṛśaṃ mitraṃ manyate ca yathā bhavān
c bhavantaś ca yathāsmākaṃ bhavatāṃ ca tathā vayam
a sa evaṃ sarvadharmajño mitradharmam anusmaran
c niyaccha manyuṃ pāñcālyāt praśāmya śinipuṃgava
a pārṣatasya kṣama tvaṃ vai kṣamatāṃ tava pārṣataḥ
c vayaṃ kṣamayitāraś ca kim anyatra śamād bhavet
a praśāmyamāne śaineye sahadevena māriṣa
c pāñcālarājasya sutaḥ prahasann idam abravīt
a muñca muñca śineḥ pautraṃ bhīma yuddhamadānvitam
c āsādayatu mām eṣa dharādharam ivānilaḥ
a yāvad asya śitair bāṇaiḥ saṃrambhaṃ vinayāmy aham
c yuddhaśraddhāṃ ca kaunteya jīvitasya ca saṃyuge
a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ kāryaṃ yad idam udyatam
c sumahat pāṇḍuputrāṇām āyānty ete hi kauravāḥ
a atha vā phalgunaḥ sarvān vārayiṣyati saṃyuge
c aham apy asya mūrdhānaṃ pātayiṣyāmi sāyakaiḥ
a manyate chinnabāhuṃ māṃ bhūriśravasam āhave
c utsṛjainam ahaṃ vainam eṣa māṃ vā haniṣyati
a śṛṇvan pāñcālavākyāni sātyakiḥ sarpavac chvasan
c bhīmabāhvantare sakto visphuraty aniśaṃ balī
d tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau bāhuśālinau
a tvarayā vāsudevaś ca dharmarājaś ca māriṣa
c yatnena mahatā vīrau vārayām āsatus tataḥ
a nivārya parameṣvāsau krodhasaṃraktalocanau
c yuyutsavaḥ parān saṃkhye pratīyuḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a tataḥ sa kadanaṃ cakre ripūṇāṃ droṇanandanaḥ
c yugānte sarvabhūtānāṃ kālasṛṣṭa ivāntakaḥ
a dhvajadrumaṃ śastraśṛṅgaṃ hatanāgamahāśilam
c aśvakiṃpuruṣākīrṇaṃ śarāsanalatāvṛtam
a śūlakravyādasaṃghuṣṭaṃ bhūtayakṣagaṇākulam
c nihatya śātravān bhallaiḥ so 'cinod dehaparvatam
a tato vegena mahatā vinadya sa nararṣabhaḥ
c pratijñāṃ śrāvayām āsa punar eva tavātmajam
a yasmād yudhyantam ācāryaṃ dharmakañcukam āsthitaḥ
c muñca śastram iti prāha kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a tasmāt saṃpaśyatas tasya drāvayiṣyāmi vāhinīm
c vidrāvya satyaṃ hantāsmi pāpaṃ pāñcālyam eva tu
a sarvān etān haniṣyāmi yadi yotsyanti māṃ raṇe
c satyaṃ te pratijānāmi parāvartaya vāhinīm
a tac chrutvā tava putras tu vāhinīṃ paryavartayat
c siṃhanādena mahatā vyapohya sumahad bhayam
d bherīś cāvādayan hṛṣṭāḥ paṭahān dundubhīṃś ca ha
d āḍambarān mṛdaṅgāṃś ca jharjharīś cānakān api
d maḍḍukān paṇavān vīṇā ḍiṇḍimāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
d sarve caiva maheṣvāsā dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān mahāsvanān
d tato nanāda vasudhā khuranemisamāhatā
d sa śabdas tumulaḥ khaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca vyanādayat
d kurūṇām atha taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā ghoraṃ samutthitam
d pāṇḍavāḥ somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ samapadyanta vismitāḥ
d te tu dṛṣṭvā kurūn rājan nadato bhairavān ravān
d abhyavartanta vegena mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
a tataḥ samāgamo rājan kurupāṇḍavasenayoḥ
c punar evābhavat tīvraḥ pūrṇasāgarayor iva
a saṃrabdhā hi sthirībhūtā droṇaputreṇa kauravāḥ
c udagrāḥ pāṇḍupāñcālā droṇasya nidhanena ca
a teṣāṃ paramahṛṣṭānāṃ jayam ātmani paśyatām
c saṃrabdhānāṃ mahāvegaḥ prādurāsīd raṇājire
a yathā śiloccaye śailaḥ sāgare sāgaro yathā
c pratihanyeta rājendra tathāsan kurupāṇḍavāḥ
a tataḥ śaṅkhasahasrāṇi bherīṇām ayutāni ca
c avādayanta saṃhṛṣṭāḥ kurupāṇḍavasainikāḥ
d cukṣubhe pṛthivī sarvā diśaś ca pratisasvanuḥ
d saṃbhrāntāni ca bhūtāni jalajāny api māriṣa
d te ca sarve tathā yaudhāḥ saṃprahṛṣṭā yuyutsavaḥ
d vartamāne tathā śabde raudre tasmin bhayānake
d saṃpatatsu rathaugheṣu tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
a tato nirmathyamānasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥ
c abhavat tasya sainyasya sumahān adbhutopamaḥ
a prāduścakre tato drauṇir astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadā
c abhisaṃdhāya pāṇḍūnāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca vāhinīm
a prādurāsaṃs tato bāṇā dīptāgrāḥ khe sahasraśaḥ
c pāṇḍavān bhakṣayiṣyanto dīptāsyā iva pannagāḥ
a te diśaḥ khaṃ ca sainyaṃ ca samāvṛṇvan mahāhave
b tato 'ntarikṣaṃ khagamair nānāliṅgaiḥ subhairavaiḥ
c muhūrtād bhāskarasyeva rājaṃl lokaṃ gabhastayaḥ
a tathāpare dyotamānā jyotīṃṣīvāmbare 'male
c prādurāsan mahīpāla kārṣṇāyasamayā guḍāḥ
a caturdiśaṃ vicitrāś ca śataghnyo 'tha hutāśadāḥ
c cakrāṇi ca kṣurāntāni maṇḍalānīva bhāsvataḥ
d pāśāś ca vividhākārā nārācāñjalikās tathā
d saṃpatantaḥ sma dṛśyante śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d yathā yugakṣaye ghore paribhūtaṃ jagad bhavet
d tadvad āsīt tadā rājañ jyotirbhūtaṃ nabhaḥsthalam
a śastrākṛtibhir ākīrṇam atīva bharatarṣabha
c dṛṣṭvāntarikṣam āvignāḥ pāṇḍupāñcālasṛñjayāḥ
a yathā yathā hy ayudhyanta pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
c tathā tathā tad astraṃ vai vyavardhata janādhipa
a vadhyamānās tathāstreṇa tena nārāyaṇena vai
b prapetuḥ kuñjarās tatra śastrasaṃghair nipātitāḥ
b vyadīryamāṇā girayo vajranunnā yathā purā
b hastihastaiś ca saṃchinnair gātraiś caiva viśāṃ pate
b aparaiś ca tathā bāṇaiḥ kuntaiś ca kanakojjvalaiḥ
b saṃkīrṇā pṛthivī jajñe māṃsaśoṇitakardamā
b gajebhyaś cyavamānānāṃ yantṝṇāṃ tatra bhārata
b vibhujānāṃ viśīrṇānāṃ nyastakārmukavarmaṇām
b pūrṇam āyodhanaṃ jajñe pretarājapuropamam
b aṅkuśair apaviddhaiś ca tomaraiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
b alaṃkāraiś ca nāgānāṃ graiveyaiś ca sakaṅkaṭaiḥ
b kakṣyābhir agnikuṇḍaiś ca yantraiś caiva patākibhiḥ
b śaktibhiś ca mahārāja bāṇaiś ca nataparvabhiḥ
b rathināṃ ca rathair bhagnaiś chinnair vā yugadaṇḍakaiḥ
b cakrair vimathitair bhagnair yugair akṣaiś ca bhūṣitā
b tūṇīrair apaviddhaiś ca cāpaiś ca sumahādhanaiḥ
b anukarṣaiḥ patākābhir yoktraiś caiva viśāṃ pate
b raśmibhiś ca pratodaiś ca kiṅkiṇībhiś ca māriṣa
b kavacaiś ca tathā dīptaiś cāmaravyajanair api
b chattraiś ca candrasaṃkāśair vṛṣṭyātapanivāribhiḥ
b aṅgulitraiḥ sakeyūrair dīptair niṣkaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
b karṇasūtraiḥ kirīṭaiś ca mukuṭaiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
b citrair vastrair alaṃkāraiḥ kuṇḍalaiś cāpi bhārata
b apaviddhais tathā śīrṣair bāhubhiś ca mahātmanām
b saṃchannā pṛthivī reje tatra tatra yathātatham
b uraśchadais tathā citrair ghaṇṭājālaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥ
b nihatais turagaiś caiva nirjihvaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ
b hayārohaparaiś caiva nirdagdhair astratejasā
b nānāṅgāvayavair hīnā yaudhāḥ sasrur bhayārditāḥ
b cukruśus tāta tāteti hā hā putreti cāsakṛt
b yaudhā nūnaṃ te nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ pāṇḍaveyā mahārathāḥ
b vāsudevaś ca vārṣṇeyas tathā somakasṛñjayāḥ
b jīvatsu samare teṣu na hi vīreṣu sainikāḥ
b imām avasthāṃ sahasā gaccheyur vai kathaṃ cana
b ity abruvaṃs tathā yaudhā hanyamānās tadā raṇe
b kruddhena droṇaputreṇa kāleneva yugakṣaye
b hanyamānās tathāstreṇa tena nārāyaṇena te
c dahyamānānaleneva sarvato 'bhyarditā raṇe
a yathā hi śiśirāpāye dahet kakṣaṃ hutāśanaḥ
c tathā tad astraṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ dadāha dhvajinīṃ prabho
a āpūryamāṇenāstreṇa sainye kṣīyati cābhibho
c jagāma paramaṃ trāsaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a dravamāṇaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatacetanam
c madhyasthatāṃ ca pārthasya dharmaputro 'bravīd idam
a dhṛṣṭadyumna palāyasva saha pāñcālasenayā
c sātyake tvaṃ ca gacchasva vṛṣṇyandhakavṛto gṛhān
a vāsudevo 'pi dharmātmā kariṣyaty ātmanaḥ kṣamam
c upadeṣṭuṃ samartho 'yaṃ lokasya kim utātmanaḥ
a saṃgrāmas tu na kartavyaḥ sarvasainyān bravīmi vaḥ
c ahaṃ hi saha sodaryaiḥ pravekṣye havyavāhanam
a bhīṣmadroṇārṇavaṃ tīrtvā saṃgrāmaṃ bhīrudustaram
c avasatsyāmy asalile sagaṇo drauṇigoṣpade
a kāmaḥ saṃpadyatām asya bībhatsor āśu māṃ prati
c kalyāṇavṛtta ācāryo mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ
a yena bālaḥ sa saubhadro yuddhānām aviśāradaḥ
c samarthair bahubhiḥ krūrair ghātito nābhipālitaḥ
a yenāvibruvatā praśnaṃ tathā kṛṣṇā sabhāṃ gatā
c upekṣitā saputreṇa dāsabhāvaṃ niyacchatī
d rakṣaṇe ca mahān yatnaḥ saindhavasya kṛto yudhi
d arjunasya vighātārthaṃ pratijñā yena rakṣitā
d vyūhadvāri vayaṃ caiva dhṛtā yena jigīṣavaḥ
d vāritaṃ ca mahat sainyaṃ prāviśat tad yathābalam
a jighāṃsur dhārtarāṣṭraś ca śrānteṣv aśveṣu phalgunam
c kavacena tathā yukto rakṣārthaṃ saindhavasya ca
a yena brahmāstraviduṣā pāñcālāḥ satyajinmukhāḥ
c kurvāṇā majjaye yatnaṃ samūlā vinipātitāḥ
d grahaṇe ca paro yatnaḥ kṛtas tena yathā mama
d viditaṃ sarvam evaitad bhavatāṃ sarvayodhinām
a yena pravrājyamānāś ca rājyād vayam adharmataḥ
c nivāryamāṇenāsmābhir anugantuṃ tad eṣitāḥ
d vanavāsān nivṛttānāṃ samaye ca tathā kṛte
d snehaś ca darśito nityaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vo mahārathāḥ
a yo 'sāv atyantam asmāsu kurvāṇaḥ sauhṛdaṃ param
c hatas tadarthe maraṇaṃ gamiṣyāmi sabāndhavaḥ
a evaṃ bruvati kaunteye dāśārhas tvaritas tataḥ
c nivārya sainyaṃ bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a śīghraṃ nyasyata śastrāṇi vāhebhyaś cāvarohata
c eṣa yogo 'tra vihitaḥ pratighāto mahātmanā
a dvipāśvasyandanebhyaś ca kṣitiṃ sarve 'varohata
c evam etan na vo hanyād astraṃ bhūmau nirāyudhān
d sāyudhān yudhyamānān vo hanyād etān api dhruvam
a yathā yathā hi yudhyante yodhā hy astrabalaṃ prati
c tathā tathā bhavanty ete kauravā balavattarāḥ
d rāmeṇa pṛthivī sarvā niḥkṣatriyagaṇā kṛtā
d anenāstreṇa bhīmena kṣatram utsāditaṃ purā
d yat tan nārāyaṇaṃ tejaḥ astratejaḥpramardanam
d tad astraṃ nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
d yadā nipātito daityo hiraṇyākṣo mahāsuraḥ
d tadā nārāyaṇāstraṃ hi pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi viṣṇunā
d taṃ nipātya mahādaityaṃ dvāparānte nṛpottama
d rāmeṇa tapa āsthāya labdhaṃ pūrvaṃ mahātmanā
d devadevaṃ samārādhya viṣṇuṃ tribhuvaneśvaram
d tasmād droṇam anuprāptaṃ sarvāstraprativāraṇam
d tathaitad dhi mahāśastraṃ kena cin na nivāryate
d nārāyaṇāstrasya nṛpā eṣa yogo nivāraṇe
a nikṣepsyanti ca śastrāṇi vāhanebhyo 'varuhya ye
b ye 'ñjaliṃ kurvate vīrā namanti ca vivāhanāḥ
c tān naitad astraṃ saṃgrāme nihaniṣyati mānavān
a ye tv etat pratiyotsyanti manasāpīha ke cana
c nihaniṣyati tān sarvān rasātalagatān api
a te vacas tasya tac chrutvā vāsudevasya bhārata
c īṣuḥ sarve 'stram utsraṣṭuṃ manobhiḥ karaṇena ca
a tata utsraṣṭukāmāṃs tān astrāṇy ālakṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
c bhīmaseno 'bravīd rājann idaṃ saṃharṣayan vacaḥ
a na kathaṃ cana śastrāṇi moktavyānīha kena cit
c aham āvārayiṣyāmi droṇaputrāstram āśugaiḥ
a atha vāpy anayā gurvyā hemavigrahayā raṇe
c kālavad vicariṣyāmi drauṇer astraṃ viśātayan
a na hi me vikrame tulyaḥ kaś cid asti pumān iha
c yathaiva savitus tulyaṃ jyotir anyan na vidyate
a paśyadhvaṃ me dṛḍhau bāhū nāgarājakaropamā
c samarthau parvatasyāpi śaiśirasya nipātane
a nāgāyutasamaprāṇo hy aham eko nareṣv iha
c śakro yathā pratidvaṃdvo divi deveṣu viśrutaḥ
a adya paśyata me vīryaṃ bāhvoḥ pīnāṃsayor yudhi
c jvalamānasya dīptasya drauṇer astrasya vāraṇe
a yadi nārāyaṇāstrasya pratiyoddhā na vidyate
c adyainaṃ pratiyotsyāmi paśyatsu kurupāṇḍuṣu
d arjunārjuna bībhatso na nyasyaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ tvayā
d arjuna uvāca
d śaśāṅkasyeva te paṅko nairmalyaṃ pātayiṣyati
d bhīma nārāyaṇāstre me goṣu ca brāhmaṇeṣu ca
d eteṣu gāṇḍivaṃ nyasyam etad dhi vratam uttamam
a evam uktvā tato bhīmo droṇaputram ariṃdamaḥ
c abhyayān meghaghoṣeṇa rathenādityavarcasā
d kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ trāsayaṃś ca camūṃ tava
d śaṅkhaśabdaṃ mahat kṛtvā bhujaśabdaṃ ca pāṇḍavaḥ
d tasya śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā bāhuśabdaṃ ca tāvakāḥ
d samantāt koṣṭhakīkṛtya śaravrātair avākiran
d samakampanta vitrastāḥ śakṛn mūtraṃ prasusruvuḥ
a sa enam iṣujālena laghutvāc chīghravikramaḥ
c nimeṣamātreṇāsādya kuntīputro 'bhyavākirat
a tato drauṇiḥ prahasyainam udāsam abhibhāṣya ca
c avākirat pradīptāgraiḥ śarais tair abhimantritaiḥ
a pannagair iva dīptāsyair vamadbhir analaṃ raṇe
c avakīrṇo 'bhavat pārthaḥ sphuliṅgair iva kāñcanaiḥ
a tasya rūpam abhūd rājan bhīmasenasya saṃyuge
c khadyotair āvṛtasyeva parvatasya dinakṣaye
a tad astraṃ droṇaputrasya tasmin pratisamasyati
c avardhata mahārāja yathāgnir aniloddhataḥ
a vivardhamānam ālakṣya tad astraṃ bhīmavikramam
c pāṇḍusainyam ṛte bhīmaṃ sumahad bhayam āviśat
a tataḥ śastrāṇi te sarve samutsṛjya mahītale
c avārohan rathebhyaś ca hastyaśvebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
a teṣu nikṣiptaśastreṣu vāhanebhyaś cyuteṣu ca
b upariṣṭād bhraman yatra yatra yodhān prapaśyati
b gṛhītaśastrān ārūḍhān vāhaneṣu mahātmasu
b yatra yatra prayāti sma kramamāṇaṃ raṇājire
b tatra tatra vimuktās tāḥ sarve 'dṛśyanta saṃghaśaḥ
b tato 'paśyad raṇe bhīmaṃ gadāhastam ariṃdamam
b asaṃbhrāntaṃ samāyāntaṃ droṇaputrarathaṃ prati
c tad astravīryaṃ vipulaṃ bhīmamūrdhany athāpatat
a hāhākṛtāni bhūtāni pāṇḍavāś ca viśeṣataḥ
c bhīmasenam apaśyanta tejasā saṃvṛtaṃ tadā
 saṃjaya uvāca
a bhīmasenaṃ samākīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvāstreṇa dhanaṃjayaḥ
c tejasaḥ pratighātārthaṃ vāruṇena samāvṛṇot
a nālakṣayata taṃ kaś cid vāruṇāstreṇa saṃvṛtam
c arjunasya laghutvāc ca saṃvṛtatvāc ca tejasaḥ
a sāśvasūtaratho bhīmo droṇaputrāstrasaṃvṛtaḥ
c agnāv agnir iva nyasto jvālāmālī sudurdṛśaḥ
a yathā rātrikṣaye rājañ jyotīṃṣy astagiriṃ prati
c samāpetus tathā bāṇā bhīmasenarathaṃ prati
d tad astraṃ vāruṇaṃ bhaktā nārāyaṇasamudbhavam
d prajajvāla punar bhīmaṃ saṃvṛtya tu raṇājire
a sa hi bhīmo rathaś cāsya hayāḥ sūtaś ca māriṣa
c saṃvṛtā droṇaputreṇa pāvakāntargatābhavan
a yathā dagdhvā jagat kṛtsnaṃ samaye sacarācaram
c gacched agnir vibhor āsyaṃ tathāstraṃ bhīmam āvṛṇot
a sūryam agniḥ praviṣṭaḥ syād yathā cāgniṃ divākaraḥ
c tathā praviṣṭaṃ tat tejo na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
d tad astraṃ bhīmahuṃkārād apayāti punaḥ punaḥ
d punaḥ punas tam āyāti huṃkārāt taṃ vimuñcati
d tato devā sagandharvā bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā suvismitāḥ
a vikīrṇam astraṃ tad dṛṣṭvā tathā bhīmarathaṃ prati
c udīryamāṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca niṣpratidvaṃdvam āhave
a sarvasainyāni pāṇḍūnāṃ nyastaśastrāṇy acetasaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhirapurogāṃś ca vimukhāṃs tān mahārathān
a arjuno vāsudevaś ca tvaramāṇau mahādyutī
c avaplutya rathād vīrau bhīmam ādravatāṃ tataḥ
a tatas tad droṇaputrasya tejo 'strabalasaṃbhavam
c vigāhya tau subalinau māyayāviśatāṃ tadā
a nyastaśastrau tatas tau tu nādahad astrajo 'nalaḥ
c vāruṇāstraprayogāc ca vīryavattvāc ca kṛṣṇayoḥ
a tataś cakṛṣatur bhīmaṃ tasya sarvāyudhāni ca
c nārāyaṇāstraśāntyarthaṃ naranārāyaṇau balāt
d pātayām āsatuḥ punar bhīmasenaṃ raṇe balāt
d bhīmaṃ nirāyudhaṃ kṛtvā tadā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
a apakṛṣyamāṇaḥ kaunteyo nadaty eva mahārathaḥ
c vardhate caiva tad ghoraṃ drauṇer astraṃ sudurjayam
a tam abravīd vāsudevaḥ kim idaṃ pāṇḍunandana
c vāryamāṇo 'pi kaunteya yad yuddhān na nivartase
a yadi yuddhena jeyāḥ syur ime kauravanandanāḥ
c vayam apy atra yudhyema tathā ceme nararṣabhāḥ
a rathebhyas tv avatīrṇās tu sarva eva sma tāvakāḥ
c tasmāt tvam api kaunteya rathāt tūrṇam apākrama
a evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇo rathād bhūmim apātayat
c niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ krodhasaṃraktalocanam
a yadāpakṛṣṭaḥ sa rathān nyāsitaś cāyudhaṃ bhuvi
c tato nārāyaṇāstraṃ tat praśāntaṃ śatrutāpanam
a tasmin praśānte vidhinā tadā tejasi duḥsahe
c babhūvur vimalāḥ sarvā diśaḥ pradiśa eva ca
a pravavuś ca śivā vātāḥ praśāntā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
c vāhanāni ca hṛṣṭāni yodhāś ca manujeśvara
a vyapoḍhe ca tato ghore tasmiṃs tejasi bhārata
c babhau bhīmo niśāpāye dhīmān sūrya ivoditaḥ
a hataśeṣaṃ balaṃ tatra pāṇḍavānām atiṣṭhata
c astravyuparamād dhṛṣṭaṃ tava putrajighāṃsayā
a vyavasthite bale tasminn astre pratihate tathā
c duryodhano mahārāja droṇaputram athābravīt
a aśvatthāman punaḥ śīghram astram etat prayojaya
c vyavasthitā hi pāñcālāḥ punar eva jayaiṣiṇaḥ
a aśvatthāmā tathoktas tu tava putreṇa māriṣa
c sudīnam abhiniḥśvasya rājānam idam abravīt
a naitad āvartate rājann astraṃ dvir nopapadyate
c āvartayan nihanty etat prayoktāraṃ na saṃśayaḥ
a eṣa cāstrapratīghātaṃ vāsudevaḥ prayuktavān
b astrasya tu hy eṣa veda mānuṣeṣu na vidyate
b parāvarajño lokānāṃ na tad asti na vetti yat
b tad etad astraṃ praśamaṃ yātaṃ kṛṣṇasya mantrite
c anyathā vihitaḥ saṃkhye vadhaḥ śatror janādhipa
a parājayo vā mṛtyur vā śreyo mṛtyur na nirjayaḥ
c nirjitāś cārayo hy ete śastrotsargān mṛtopamāḥ
 duryodhana uvāca
a ācāryaputra yady etad dvir astraṃ na prayujyate
c anyair gurughnā vadhyantām astrair astravidāṃ vara
a tvayi hy astrāṇi divyāni yathā syus tryambake tathā
c icchato na hi te mucyet kruddhasyāpi puraṃdaraḥ
d ghnataitān sumahāvīrya śātravān yuddhakovida
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tasminn astre pratihate droṇe copadhinā hate
c tathā duryodhanenokto drauṇiḥ kim akarot punaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā pārthāṃś ca saṃgrāme yuddhāya samavasthitān
c nārāyaṇāstranirmuktāṃś carataḥ pṛtanāmukhe
 saṃjaya uvāca
a jānan pituḥ sa nidhanaṃ siṃhalāṅgūlaketanaḥ
c sakrodho bhayam utsṛjya abhidudrāva pārṣatam
a abhidrutya ca viṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇāṃ nararṣabhaḥ
c pañcabhiś cātivegena vivyādha puruṣarṣabham
a dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājañ jvalantam iva pāvakam
b tam ātmabhujavegena vikarṣantaṃ śarāsanam
b taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddhaṃ kālānalayamopamam
b vimuñcan viśikhāṃs tūrṇaṃ pārṣato 'bhyadravad raṇe
b tau drauṇiḥ krodhatāmrākṣo didhikṣann iva tejasā
b chādayām āsa bāṇaughair dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ samantataḥ
b dhṛṣṭadyumno 'pi saṃbhrāntaḥ śareṇānataparvaṇā
b pratyavidhyata saṃkruddhaḥ pārṣataṃ prayato balāt
b tasya drauṇir dhanuś chittvā sthūṇena paravīrahā
b dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ trisaptatyā vivyādha niśitair nadan
b tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
b anyat kārmukam ādāya so 'śvatthāmānam ārdayat
b sa tad apy asya saṃkruddhaś ciccheda paramāstravit
b taṃ cāpy avākirad bāṇair dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ paraṃtapaḥ
b tataḥ sa pārṣatas tūrṇaṃ śaktiṃ hemapariṣkṛtām
b cikṣepa paramakruddho jvalantīm aśanīm iva
b tām āpatantīṃ sahasā vyālīkāla ivāhave
b ciccheda saptadhā rājañ śaraiḥ paramatejanaiḥ
b tāṃ nikṛttāṃ tato dṛṣṭvā drauṇinā pārṣatas tataḥ
b dhanur anyat samādāya samare vegavattaram
b tato 'vidhyat sutīkṣṇābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ drauṇim āhave
b tato dvābhyāṃ sutīkṣṇābhyāṃ bhallābhyāṃ tatra kārmukam
b drauṇir drupadaputrasya ciccheda prahasann iva
b taṃ ca bāṇair mahātejāḥ punar anyaiḥ samāvṛṇot
b sāśvasūtarathaṃ tūrṇaṃ chādayām āsa saṃyuge
b tasya cānucarān sarvān dīptāstrān pārśvataḥ sthitān
b vyadrāvayata saṃkruddhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
b brahmadattaṃ tato bāṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnajighāṃsayā
b droṇaputraḥ pracikṣepa sātyakis tad dvidhācchinat
b sātyakis tu tam ādāya rājaputraṃ śarārditam
b aṣṭābhir niśitair bāṇair aśvatthāmānam ārdayat
b aśītyā punar āhatya nānārūpair amarṣaṇaḥ
b vivyādhāsya tribhiḥ sūtaṃ caturbhiś caturo hayān
b evam uktvā śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ sātyakiṃ tūrṇam āvṛṇot
b saṃrabdhaḥ krodhatāmrākṣo droṇaputraḥ pratāpavān
b sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ śareṇānataparvaṇā
b droṇaputraṃ samājaghne sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
b tato drauṇir mahārāja bāṇaiḥ saṃchādya sātyakim
b dhanuḥ krodhaparītātmā cicchedāśu mahāstravit
b tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāghorāṃ hemadaṇḍām ayasmayīm
b cikṣepa sātyakis tūrṇaṃ droṇaputrajighāṃsayā
b tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śakramuktām ivāśanim
b aprāptām eva ciccheda drauṇiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ
b tāṃ nikṛttāṃ śarair dṛṣṭvā drauṇinā sāyakair bhṛśam
b so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya bhāraghnaṃ vegavattaram
b tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpaṃ sātyakiḥ sātvatāṃ varaḥ
b sāyakair bahubhis tūrṇam aśvatthāmānam ārdayat
b tato drauṇiḥ susaṃrabdhaḥ śarajālena mādhavam
b chādayām āsa samare sātyakiṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ
b tāny asya śarajālāni antarikṣe viśāṃ pate
b aprāptān eva ciccheda yuyudhāno mahārathaḥ
b tataḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair hemapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
b bāṇair vivyādha sudṛḍhaṃ droṇaputram amarṣitaḥ
b tathā sa viddhaḥ subhṛśaṃ droṇaputro 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
b śaineyaṃ samare kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā
b avākirad ameyātmā bāṇavarṣaiḥ samantataḥ
b parvataṃ vāridhārābhis tapānte jalado yathā
c droṇaputraṃ triṣaṣṭyā tu rājan vivyādha patriṇām
a sārathiṃ cāsya viṃśatyā svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
c hayāṃś ca caturo 'vidhyac caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a viddhvā viddhvānadad drauṇiḥ kampayann iva medinīm
c ādadat sarvalokasya prāṇān iva mahāraṇe
a pārṣatas tu balī rājan kṛtāstraḥ kṛtaniśramaḥ

a gandhenāpi hi saṃgrāme tasya kruddhasya śatravaḥ
c visaṃjñā hatabhūyiṣṭhā vepanti ca patanti ca
a tasmai namas tu kurvanto devās tiṣṭhanti vai divi
c ye cānye mānavā loke ye ca svargajito narāḥ
a ye bhaktā varadaṃ devaṃ śivaṃ rudram umāpatim
b ananyabhāvena sadā sarveśaṃ samupāsate
b saṃgrāmeṣu jayaṃ prāpya pālayanti mahīm imām
c iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya te yānti paramāṃ gatim
a namaskuruṣva kaunteya tasmai śāntāya vai sadā
c rudrāya śitikaṇṭhāya kaniṣṭhāya suvarcase
a kapardine karālāya haryakṣṇe varadāya ca
c yāmyāyāvyaktakeśāya sadvṛtte śaṃkarāya ca
a kāmyāya harinetrāya sthāṇave puruṣāya ca
c harikeśāya muṇḍāya kṛśāyottaraṇāya ca
a bhāskarāya sutīrthāya devadevāya raṃhase
c bahurūpāya śarvāya priyāya priyavāsase
a uṣṇīṣiṇe suvaktrāya sahasrākṣāya mīḍhuṣe
b namo vṛkṣāya senānye madhyamāya namo namaḥ
c giriśāya praśāntāya pataye cīravāsase
a hiraṇyabāhave caiva ugrāya pataye diśām
b diśāṃ digdantināṃ caiva dikkālapataye namaḥ
c parjanyapataye caiva bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ
a vṛkṣāṇāṃ pataye caiva apāṃ ca pataye tathā
c vṛkṣair āvṛtakāyāya senānye madhyamāya ca
a sruvahastāya devāya dhanvine bhārgavāya ca
c bahurūpāya viśvasya pataye cīravāsase
a sahasraśirase caiva sahasranayanāya ca
c sahasrabāhave caiva sahasracaraṇāya ca
d sahasrabāhvor upādāya namo 'saṃkhyeyakarmaṇe
a śaraṇaṃ prāpya kaunteya varadaṃ bhuvaneśvaram
c umāpatiṃ virūpākṣaṃ dakṣayajñanibarhaṇam
e prajānāṃ patim avyagraṃ bhūtānāṃ patim avyayam
a kapardinaṃ vṛṣāvartaṃ vṛṣanābhaṃ vṛṣadhvajam
c vṛṣadarpaṃ vṛṣapatiṃ vṛṣaśṛṅgaṃ vṛṣarṣabham
a vṛṣāṅkaṃ vṛṣabhodāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vṛṣabhekṣaṇam
c vṛṣāyudhaṃ vṛṣaśaraṃ vṛṣabhūtaṃ maheśvaram
a mahodaraṃ mahākāyaṃ dvīpicarmanivāsinam
c lokeśaṃ varadaṃ muṇḍaṃ brahmaṇyaṃ brāhmaṇapriyam
a triśūlapāṇiṃ varadaṃ khaḍgacarmadharaṃ prabhum
c pinākinaṃ khaṇḍaparaśuṃ lokānāṃ patim īśvaram
d niṣaṅginaṃ paraśuhastaṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca prakāśakam
e prapadye śaraṇaṃ devaṃ śaraṇyaṃ cīravāsasam
a namas tasmai sureśāya yasya vaiśravaṇaḥ sakhā
c suvāsase namo nityaṃ suvratāya sudhanvine
d ugrāyudhāya devāya suvratāya bhavāya ca
a sruvahastāya devāya sukhadhanvāya dhanvine
c dhanvantarāya dhanuṣe dhanvācāryāya dhanvine
a ugrāyudhāya devāya namaḥ suravarāya ca
c namo 'stu bahurūpāya namaś ca bahudhanvine
a namo 'stu sthāṇave nityaṃ suvratāya sudhanvine
c namo 'stu tripuraghnāya bhagaghnāya ca vai namaḥ
a vanaspatīnāṃ pataye narāṇāṃ pataye namaḥ
b mātṝṇāṃ pataye caiva gaṇānāṃ pataye namaḥ
c apāṃ ca pataye nityaṃ yajñānāṃ pataye namaḥ
a pūṣṇo dantavināśāya tryakṣāya varadāya ca
c nīlakaṇṭhāya piṅgāya svarṇakeśāya vai namaḥ
a karmāṇi caiva divyāni mahādevasya dhīmataḥ
c tāni te kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāprajñaṃ yathāśrutam
a na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na rākṣasāḥ
c sukham edhanti kupite tasminn api guhāgatāḥ
d dakṣasya yajamānasya vidhivat saṃbhṛtaṃ purā
a vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadā
c dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda ca
a te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ lebhire sma surās tadā
c vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
a tena jyātalaghoṣeṇa sarve lokāḥ samākulāḥ
c babhūvur vaśagāḥ pārtha nipetuś ca surāsurāḥ
a āpaś cukṣubhire sarvāś cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
c parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta diśo nāgāś ca mohitāḥ
a andhāś ca tamasā lokā na prakāśanta saṃvṛtāḥ
c jaghnivān saha sūryeṇa sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ prabhāḥ
a cukruśur bhayabhītāś ca śāntiṃ cakrus tathaiva ca
c ṛṣayaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca sukhaiṣiṇaḥ
a pūṣāṇam abhyadravata śaṃkaraḥ prahasann iva
c puroḍāśaṃ bhakṣayato daśanān vai vyaśātayat
a tato niścakramur devā vepamānā natāḥ sma tam
c punaś ca saṃdadhe dīptaṃ devānāṃ niśitaṃ śaram
d sadhūmavisphuliṅgābhaṃ vidyuttoyadasaṃnibham
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu surāḥ sarve praṇipatya maheśvaram
a rudrasya yajñabhāgaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ te nv akalpayan
c bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedire
a tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitas tadā
c yattāś cāpi surā āsan yattāś cādyāpi taṃ prati
a asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divi
c āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ mahat
a āyasaṃ tārakākṣasya kamalākṣasya rājatam
c sauvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy āsīd vidyunmālina eva ca
a na śaktas tāni maghavān bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair api
c atha sarve 'marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇam arditāḥ
a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
b brahmadattavarā hy ete ghorās tripuravāsinaḥ
b pīḍayanty adhikaṃ lokaṃ yasmāt te varadarpitāḥ
b tvad ṛte devadeveśa nānyaḥ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
b hantuṃ daityān mahādeva tvaṃ hantā ca suradviṣām
c rudra raudrā bhaviṣyanti paśavaḥ sarvakarmasu
e nipātayiṣyase cainān asurān bhuvaneśvara
a sa tathoktas tathety uktvā devānāṃ hitakāmyayā
b śalyam agniṃ ca vai kṛtvā puṅkhe somam apāṃ patim
b sa kṛtvā dhanur oṃkāraṃ sāvitrīṃ jyāṃ maheśvaraḥ
b hayāṃś ca caturo vedān sarvavedamayaṃ ratham
b prajāpatiṃ rathaśreṣṭhe viniyujya sa sārathim
b gandhamādanavindhyau ca kṛtvā vaṃśadhvajau haraḥ
b pṛthvīṃ sasāgaravanāṃ rathaṃ kṛtvā tu śaṃkaraḥ
b akṣaṃ kṛtvā tu nāgendraṃ śeṣaṃ nāgaṃ trilocanaḥ
b cakraṃ kṛtvā tu candrārkau devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk
b aṇī kṛtvailapatraṃ ca puṣpadantaṃ ca tryambakaḥ
b yūpaṃ kṛtvā ca malayam avanāhaṃ ca takṣakam
b yoktrāṅgāni ca catvāri kṛtvā śarvaḥ pratāpavān
b vedān kṛtvātha caturaś caturo 'śvān maheśvaraḥ
b upavedān khalīnāṃś ca kṛtvā lokatrayeśvaraḥ
b gāyatrīṃ pragrahaṃ kṛtvā sāvitrīṃ ca maheśvaraḥ
b kṛtvoṃkāraṃ pratodaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ caiva sārathim
b gāṇḍīvaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā guṇaṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
b viṣṇuṃ śarottamaṃ kṛtvā śalyam agniṃ tathaiva ca
b vāyuṃ kṛtvātha vājābhyāṃ puṅkhe vaivasvataṃ yamam
b vidyut kṛtvātha niśrāṇaṃ meruṃ kṛtvātha vai dhvajam
b āruhya sa rathaṃ divyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ śivaḥ
b tripurasya vadhārthāya sthāṇuḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
b asurāṇām antakaraḥ śrīmān atulavikramaḥ
b stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ pārtha ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
b sthānaṃ māheśvaraṃ kṛtvā divyam apratimaṃ prabhuḥ
c atiṣṭhat sthāṇubhūtaḥ sa sahasraṃ parivatsarān
a yadā trīṇi sametāni antarikṣe purāṇi vai
c triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ
a purāṇi na ca taṃ śekur dānavāḥ prativīkṣitum
c śaraṃ kālāgnisaṃyuktaṃ viṣṇusomasamāyutam
d purāṇi dagdhavantaṃ taṃ devī yātā pravīkṣitum
d mumoca bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ purāṇy ādiśya vīryavān
d tato daityā mahābhāga saputrāḥ saparigrahāḥ
d bhasmībhūtā durātmāno bhinnāś ca tripure purā
d hatvā daityān mahādevaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sabhājitaḥ
d ṛṣibhiḥ saṃstutaś caiva parāṃ mudam upāgamat
d tato brahmā suraiḥ sārdhaṃ bṛhaspatipurogamaiḥ
d stutim ārebhire kartuṃ bhinne tripuramandire
d devyāḥ svayaṃvare vṛttaṃ śṛṇuṣvānyad dhanaṃjaya
a bālam aṅkagataṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥ
c umā jijñāsamānā vai ko 'yam ity abravīt surān
d asūyataś ca śakrasya vajreṇa prahariṣyataḥ
a bāhuṃ savajraṃ śakrasya kruddhasyāstambhayat prabhuḥ
b prahasya bhagavāṃs tūrṇaṃ sarvalokeśvaraḥ śivaḥ
b tataḥ saṃstambhitabhujaḥ śakro devagaṇair vṛtaḥ
b jagāma śaraṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ brahmāṇaṃ prabhum avyayam
b te taṃ praṇamya śirasā procuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
b kim apy aṅkagataṃ brahman pārvatyā bhūtam adbhutam
b bālarūpadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāsmābhis tac ca lakṣitam
b tasmāt tvāṃ praṣṭum icchāmo nirjitā yena vai vayam
b ayudhyatā hi bālena līlayā sapuraṃdarāḥ
b teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
b dhyātvā sa śaṃbhuṃ bhagavān bālaṃ cāmitatejasam
b uvāca bhagavān brahmā śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
b carācarasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ sa bhagavān haraḥ
b tasmāt parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti maheśvarāt
b yo dṛṣṭo hy umayā sārdhaṃ yuṣmābhir amitadyutiḥ
b sa pārvatyāḥ kṛte devaḥ kṛtavān bālarūpatām
b te mayā sahitā yūyaṃ prapadyadhvaṃ tam eva hi
c sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
d evam uktā gatā devā yatra devo maheśvaraḥ
d athānyena svarūpeṇa brahmā dṛṣṭvā tam avyayam
a na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaram
c saprajāpatayaḥ sarve bālārkasadṛśaprabham
a athābhyetya tato brahmā dṛṣṭvā ca sa maheśvaram
c ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande taṃ pitāmahaḥ
d brahmovāca
d tvaṃ yajño bhuvanasyāsya tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ parāyaṇam
d tvaṃ bhavas tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ dhāma paramaṃ padam
d tvayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
d bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa lokanātha jagatpate
d prasādaṃ kuru śakrasya tvayā krodhārditasya vai
d vyāsa uvāca
d padmayoner vacaḥ śrutvā tataḥ prīto maheśvaraḥ
d prasādābhimukho bhūtvā cāṭṭahāsam athākarot
a tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥ
c abhavac ca punar bāhur yathāprakṛti vajriṇaḥ
a teṣāṃ prasanno bhagavān sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥ
c devānāṃ tridaśaśreṣṭho dakṣayajñavināśanaḥ
a sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so 'gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvavit
c sa cendraś caiva vāyuś ca so 'śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ
a sa bhavaḥ sa ca parjanyo mahādevaḥ sa cānaghaḥ
c sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥ
a sa kālaḥ so 'ntako mṛtyuḥ sa yamo rātryahāni ca
c māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥ
a sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca viśvātmā viśvakarmakṛt
c sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ ca dhārayaty avapur vapuḥ
a sarvair devaiḥ stuto devaḥ saikadhā bahudhā ca saḥ
c śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhā
d dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ
d ghorā cānyā śivā cānyā te tanū bahudhā punaḥ
d ghorā tu yā tanus tasya so 'gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ
d somārdhaṃ punar evāsya āpo jyotīṃṣi candramāḥ
d vedāṅgāḥ sopaniṣadaḥ purāṇādhyātmaniścayāḥ
d yad atra paramaṃ guhyaṃ sa vai devo maheśvaraḥ
a īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ajaḥ
c na hi sarve mayā śakyā vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇāḥ
d api varṣasahasreṇa satataṃ pāṇḍunandana
a sarvair grahair gṛhītān vai sarvapāpasamanvitān
c sa mocayati suprītaḥ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatān
a āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalān
c sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa caivākṣipate punaḥ
a sendrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyate
c sa caiva vyāhṛte loke manuṣyāṇāṃ śubhāśubhe
a aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate
c maheśvaraś ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥ
a bahubhir bahudhā rūpair viśvaṃ vyāpnoti vai jagat
c asya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre tad atiṣṭhata
d vaḍavāmukheti vikhyātaṃ pibat toyamayaṃ haviḥ
a eṣa caiva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥ
c yajanty enaṃ janās tatra vīrasthāna itīśvaram
a asya dīptāni rūpāṇi ghorāṇi ca bahūni ca
c loke yāny asya kurvanti manuṣyāḥ pravadanti ca
a nāmadheyāni lokeṣu bahūny atra yathārthavat
c nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathā
a vede cāsya samāmnātaṃ śatarudrīyam uttamam
c nāmnā cānantarudreti upasthānaṃ mahātmanaḥ
a sa kāmānāṃ prabhur devo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
c sa vibhuḥ sa prabhur devo viśvaṃ vyāpnuvate mahat
a jyeṣṭhaṃ bhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā munayas tathā
c prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād asyānalo 'bhavat
a sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥ
c teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ
a nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam
c mahayanti ca lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
c liṅgam asyārcayanti sma tac cāpy ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitam
d urdhvaliṅgas tataś cokto bhagavān brāhmaṇaiḥ sadā
a pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ
c sukhī prītaś ca bhavati prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥ
a yad asya bahudhā rūpaṃ bhūtabhavyabhavatsthitam
c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a ekākṣo jājvalann āste sarvatokṣimayo 'pi vā
c krodhād yaś cāviśal lokāṃs tasmāc charva iti smṛtaḥ
a dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭis tena ucyate
c viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a tisro devīr yadā caiva bhajate bhuvaneśvaraḥ
c dyām apaḥ pṛthivīṃ caiva tryambakaś ca tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a samedhayati yan nityaṃ sarvārthān sarvakarmasu
c śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eśa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
a sahasrākṣo 'yutākṣo vā sarvatokṣimayo 'pi vā
c yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
a dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattisthitaś ca yat
c sthitaliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥ
d sūryācandramasor loke prakāśanty aṃśavaś ca ye
d te keśāḥ saṃjñitās tasya vyomakeśas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
d kapiḥ śreṣṭha iti prokto dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate
d sa devadevo bhagavān kīrtyate vai vṛṣākapiḥ
d brahmāṇam indraṃ varuṇaṃ yamaṃ dhanadam eva ca
d nigṛhya harate yasmāt tasmād dhara iti smṛtaḥ
d nimīlitābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ bālyād devyā maheśvaraḥ
d lalāṭe netram asṛjat tena tryakṣaḥ sa ucyate
d bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ sarvam aśeṣataḥ
d bhava eṣa tato yasmād bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥ
a viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu samaś ca prāṇinām iha
c sa vāyur viṣamastheṣu prāṇāpānaśarīriṣu
a pūjayed vigrahaṃ yas tu liṅgaṃ vāpi samarcayet
c liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute
a ūrubhyām ardham āgneyaṃ somārdhaṃ ca śivā tanuḥ
c ātmano 'rdhaṃ ca tasyāgniḥ somo 'rdhaṃ punar ucyate
a taijasī mahatī dīptā devebhyaś ca śivā tanuḥ
c bhāsvatī mānuṣeṣv asya tanur ghorāgnir ucyate
a brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tayā
c yāsya ghoratarā mūrtiḥ sarvān atti tayeśvaraḥ
a yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavān
c māṃsaśoṇitamajjādo yat tato rudra ucyate
a eṣa devo mahādevo yo 'sau pārtha tavāgrataḥ
c saṃgrāme śātravān nighnaṃs tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pinākadhṛk
d sindhurājavadhārthāya pratijñāte tvayānagha
d kṛṣṇena darśite svapne yas te śailendramūrdhani
a eṣa vai bhagavān devaḥ saṃgrāme yāti te 'grataḥ
c yena dattāni te 'strāṇi yais tvayā dānavā hatāḥ
a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃjñitam
c devadevasya te pārtha vyākhyātaṃ śatarudriyam
a sarvārthasādhakaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvakilbiṣanāśanam
c sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvaduḥkhabhayāpaham
d aśvamedhasahasrasya rājasūyaśatasya ca
d iṣṭasya phalam āpnoti durācāro 'pi mānavaḥ
d gavāṃ koṭiśatasyāpi dānasya phalam aśnute
a caturvidham idaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadā
c vijitya sarvāñ śatrūn sa rudraloke mahīyate
a caritaṃ mahātmano divyaṃ sāṃgrāmikam idaṃ śubham
c paṭhan vai śatarudrīyaṃ śṛṇvaṃś ca satatotthitaḥ
d yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā yaś cāpi parikīrtayet
d divā vā yadi vā rātrau brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati
a bhakto viśveśvaraṃ devaṃ mānuṣeṣu tu yaḥ sadā
c varān sa kāmāṃl labhate prasanne tryambake naraḥ
a gaccha yudhyasva kaunteya na tavāsti parājayaḥ
c yasya mantrī ca goptā ca pārśvatas te janārdanaḥ
 saṃjaya uvāca
a evam uktvārjunaṃ saṃkhye parāśarasutas tadā
c jagāma bharataśreṣṭha yathāgatam ariṃdama
d saṃjaya uvāca
d yuddhaṃ kṛtvā mahāghoraṃ pañcāhāni mahābalaḥ
d brāhmaṇo nihato rājan brahmalokam avāptavān
d adhīte yat phalaṃ vede tad asminn api parvaṇi
d kṣatriyāṇām abhīrūṇāṃ viśuddhaṃ khyāpyate yaśaḥ
d ya idaṃ paṭhate parva śṛṇuyād vāpi nityaśaḥ
d sa mucyate mahāpāpaiḥ kṛtair ghoraiś ca karmabhiḥ
d idaṃ paṭhet sarvamahārthasaṃyutaṃ
d raṇe jayaṃ pāṇḍavavṛṣṇisiṃhayoḥ
d sadā śubhaṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyāt tathā naraḥ
d sa mucyate pāpakaro 'pi karmabhiḥ
d yajñāvāptir brāhmaṇasyeha nityaṃ
d yuddhe nityaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ jayaś ca
d śeṣau varṇau kāmam iṣṭaṃ labhete
d putrān pautrān nityam iṣṭāṃs tathaiva
d etad ākhyāya vai sūto rājñaḥ sarvaṃ tu saṃjayaḥ
d prayātaḥ śibirāyaiva draṣṭuṃ karṇasya vaiśasam
